name: 10 Deep
preparation: All right start with 1/2 cup of ice mix the vodka and the coconut at the same time but leave the vodka for an extra second...then add the cran-rasb until it turns red and then add ur lime and tampico....make sure to mix it..

name: '61 Imperial
preparation: In a tall chimney glass or hurricane glass fill with cubed ice; add all liquor except the blue curacao. Add the pineapple juice stir well and float the blue curacao on top. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry and serve.
Serve on ice in a highball glass.
Mix the rum pepsi vanilla and grenadine in a cup and serve chilled or mix the grenadine and rum in a shot glass and drop into a cup of pepsi vanilla.

name: .50 Caliber
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey Jim Beam bourbon whiskey dry gin and Absolut vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Squirt and serve.

name: 100 Miles per Hour
preparation: Mix all ingredients together over ice in a highball glass. Shake up then top with sprite and serve.

name: Ice Bear
preparation: Mix vodka and Curacao. Pour in a high glass. Fill it up with soda.

name: Fat Frog
preparation: Get 2 pint glasses pour one half of Smirnoff Ice into one pint glass and the rest in the other glass then do the same with the orange breezer then followed by the Blue WKD. Mix and the drink should turn green. Add ice as desired and serve.

name: Colorado Bulldog
preparation: In a shaker mix Vodka Kahlua and milk. Pour into a rocks glass and add a splash of Coca-Cola.

name: Strawberry Ice
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Tokyo Tea
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a small highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Pensacola Bushwacker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender (ice cream optional) with two cups of ice and blend until mixed. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
preparation: Add ingredients with a bit of ice in a blender. Blend and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish w/ strawberry. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' '1zNGl3ODoesWavJNpf-tfgkdBxPrejpN' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Cafe Imperial
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top and serve.

name: Golden Screw
preparation: Build over ice in a higball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Laser Beam
preparation: Combine all liquors in a collins glass filled with ice. Shake well. Garnish with an orange and a cherry.

name: Deep Freeze
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Deep Throat
preparation: Pour the Bailey's and Kahlua into a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Deep Blue
preparation: Stir vodka and blue curacao together with ice in a glass. Top with champagne and drop a blue maraschino cherry to the bottom.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
preparation: In a tall glass pour shots over ice and top off with cranberry juice and lemon wedge (squeeze if you like). Give the drink a little shake (if you like) and drink up!

name: Flying Kangaroo
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass with crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Cohutta Twister
preparation: Pour the Malibu vodka orange juice and cran-orange juice into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Orange Surfboard
preparation: Combine liquors in a tall glass with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and add a splash of cranberry juice. Shake to mix and serve.

name: Deep Dark Love
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a couple of whole coffee beans and serve.

name: Vesper
preparation: Shake well until ice cold strain into a deep champagne goblet. Add a thin slice of lemon-peel.

name: Flaming Lamborghini
preparation: Pour the sambuca and kahlua into a cocktail glass. Pour the baileys and blue curacao into two seperate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concoction in the cocktail glass and start to drink through a straw (this drink should be drunk in one). As the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the baileys and blue curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone.

name: Grateful Dead #2
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add all the white alcohol. Add the sour mix. Top off the glass with razzmatazz or chambord raspberry liqueur. Then shake to mix contents. This is a fruity version of a 'Long Island Iced Tea'.

name: Bolduc On The Beach
preparation: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

name: Key West Cooler
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail tin. Shake. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Corkscrew #2
preparation: Softly stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Happy Happy
preparation: Add ingredients to an old fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: 2000 Flushes #2
preparation: In a shaker over ice pour equal parts of vodka and Malibu. Add a splash of pineapple juice and blue curacao (for color). Shake and strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Tokyo Ice Tea
preparation: Mix the alcohol. Add sugar syrup ice and 7-up to taste. Garnish with/add pieces of lemon. Stir.

name: Cornwall-Nash
preparation: Pour the rum gin triple sec and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Long Island Cocktail
preparation: Combine and mix all ingredients in a collins glass and serve.

name: Mojito
preparation: Place mint leaves in bottom of glass. Add crushed ice Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum sugar and lime juice and muddle. Add soda water and garnish with mint leaves. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'd1YWl3ODprVlIuHQpzgw2ONqfPZTex4c' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Boston Ice Tea
preparation: Build over ice. Stir. Garnish with lemon slice and a straw.

name: El Bastardo
preparation: Mix all at the same time into a blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. Oh it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.

name: Orange Rumbler
preparation: Pour the Rumple Minze and Stolichnaya orange vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with an orange or lime. Add splash of Grand Marnier if desired. Serve.

name: Deep Sea Sex
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the contents into a highball glass and serve.

name: Adios Mother
preparation: Add vodka gin white rum and blue curacao to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill the glass with equal parts sour mix and 7-Up garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Twister
preparation: Pour vodka and juice of lime into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda stir and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw
preparation: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian
preparation: Blend light rum blue curacao pineapple juice and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'FqeWh3ODo5YKdq-Ppv-8k7L8iTvV9sJ2' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Caipirinha
preparation: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the cachaca into the glass. Stir well.

name: Fat Box
preparation: Mix ingredients in mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Deep South
preparation: Mix pineapple juice and molasses well either shake or blend stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. Serve slightly cooler than room temp or over ice.

name: French Martini
preparation: Pour each of the above into a tall bar glass. Shake with ice pour into a cocktail or martini glass and serve.

name: Raw Sewage
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Deep Sea Martini
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Moody Blue
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve

name: Flaming Jesse
preparation: Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake strain into a collins glass garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Baltimore Zoo
preparation: Add the liquors and grenadine to a highball glass with ice. Top off with sweet and sour mix add a splash of beer and stir.

name: Lava Flow
preparation: Blend banana coconut cream and pineapple juice in a blender and set aside. In the bottom of a hurricane glass stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix slowly into the glass. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

name: Amaretto Sour
preparation: Pour the amaretto liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a splash or two of sweet and sour mix and shake well. Strain or pour into an old-fashioned glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'tmd2h3ODo43cx4Ucs44K7wHsUJBOEORH' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Tequila Sunrise
preparation: Pour tequila in a highball glass with ice and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish stirrer straw and cherry-orange.

name: Madras
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except lime wedge) into a highball glass over ice. Add the lime wedge and serve.

name: Wa-Hoo-Wa
preparation: Combine vodka and curacao in a collins glass over ice. Fill with orange juice. Stir and serve.

name: Grateful Dead
preparation: Shake ingredients pour over ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Luscious Lou
preparation: Pour the Stoli Ohranj (orange vodka) into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau orange juice and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda and serve.

name: Deep Blue Something
preparation: Mix the vodka peach schnapps and Red Bull together in a collins glass. Add a small amount of curacao until the mixture is a deep green. Add some ice and pour the remainder of the curacao down the side of the glass to leave a blue layer at the base of the glass.

name: Walk Me Down (Sweet Jesus)
preparation: Shake ingredients (except Sprite) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and stir. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice and serve.

name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker and shake three to four times. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Green Demon
preparation: Shake vodka rum and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Nuts and Berries
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into a chilled stemmed or rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Yo Mama Cocktail
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add soda top with a splash of orange juice and serve.

name: Caribou Lou
preparation: Shake or serve up with ice in a highball glass. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'ExOWl3ODqiXa_bGhX4lLBp8ctujgk1U5' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Deep Sea Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dionisia
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Carrot Top Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka DeKuyper peach schnapps triple sec sour mix orange juice and grenadine into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Jack and Coke
preparation: Pour jack daniels into large glass filled with ice. Pour coca-cola into the glass. Stir lightly. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'g2M2x3ODpjBiwYwxY6zdpXxkrAzNXxDX' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Captain and Coke
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's Original Spiced Rum and Coca-Cola into a highball glass on the rocks. Mix until the coke fizzes at the top and serve.

name: Shining Bull
preparation: Pour Stoli Ohranj over lots of ice in a large Collins glass hurricane or highball. Add 1 can of Red Bull Energy Drink. Top off with a large splash of Sprite (optional). Stir and enjoy.

name: Bakunin
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake well. Pour into a small highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Lemmings Leap
preparation: Pour the vodka Malibu rum and gin into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Float orange juice on top and serve.

name: Absolutely Bananas
preparation: Shake well with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Vibrator
preparation: Pour liquors into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and cranberru juice. Shake garnish with two cherries and serve.

name: Painkiller
preparation: Shake or stir ingredients and pour over ice in a tall glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve

name: Red Death
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Deep Pleasure
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice then add the Kahlua coffee liqueur Bailey's Irish cream and butterscotch schnapps. Add half-and-half as desired. For less cream put in an old fashioned glass.

name: Cape Cod Islander
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and Sprite soda. Top with the Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice in the center of the drink. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Stoli Around the World
preparation: Build in a pint glass (preferably) shake and serve with a lemon wedge. Or you can mix in tin and serve over ice.

name: Ice Bomb
preparation: Pour all liquors into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' '5pY2l3ODqjulcHX5peQUf-nonZ1OTDO5' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Italian Apple Martini
preparation: Pour all into iced shaker tin shake until tin is cold to the touch and strain into martini glass. Garnish with lime wheel and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'g1OWl3ODreJRKmg74CQ3B7faQrZFJzJB' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Apple Pie Punch
preparation: Put the juice cider and cinnamon sticks into a pan and let simmer on the stove for about 2 hours (not boil). Turn off heat pour in 1 liter or 2/3 liter Everclear (no taste of alcohol) to the batch and pour into punch cups. Very potent tastes exactly like apple pie.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'FkNWl3ODqG0tMVr5b-POWvs01bK5Je6U' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Double-O-Seven
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add Stoli O vodk and almost fill the glass with 7-up. Top with a splash of orange juice and serve.

name: Nitequell
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass.

name: Washington Apple Cocktail
preparation: Pour DeKuyper sour apple pucker and Crown Royal canadian whisky into a highball glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice more to taste if desired and serve.

name: Gin and Tonic
preparation: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour
preparation: Shake and serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Fruit Tingle #2
preparation: Pour the blue curacao and vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

name: Jack Daniel's Lynchburg Lemonade
preparation: Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.

name: Blue Motorcycle
preparation: Build over ice in a collins glass. Fill with sour mix and add a splash of 7-Up.

name: Blue Whip
preparation: Shake vodka curacao and orange juice with ice cubes and top off with sprite or 7-up. Garnish with fanned slices of orange floating on top and serve with a straw.

name: Mojito Diablo
preparation: Muddle sugar mint and squeezed lime wedges in mixing tin until mixture smells like spearmint gum. Fill with ice add tequila and cassis shake until the tin is icey to the touch. Pour into a collins glass top with 7-up and garnish with a sugarcane stick and fresh mint. name: Mountain Breeze
preparation: Build ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass shake and garnish with a lime wedge. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'hiZGl3ODp39w36MKHYImkFXwBXaRUUBk' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Imperial Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dale's Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Shake all the ingredients except the cola with ice and strain into a collins glass filled 3/4 with ice. Top with coke and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Malibu Bay Breeze
preparation: Blend ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Adios Motherfucker
preparation: Pour all ingredients except the 7-Up into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up and stir gently.

name: Midori Sour
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the midori sour mix and sprite give a quick stir and add cherries.

name: Midnight Flight to Malibu
preparation: Build with ice. Can be shaken or left layered.

name: Screwdriver With Color
preparation: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add orange juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua just until it has a bit of color. Then some ice and stir.

name: Bocci Ball
preparation: Shake amaretto and orange juice first then top with soda.

name: Texas Tea
preparation: Fill a 1 gallon pitcher with ice. Add all the ingredients except the coca-cola. Stir then add the coca-cola and stir again. Pour into your favorite glass with ice and enjoy.

name: Long Island Tea
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Fat Hooker
preparation: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pineapple juice stir well and serve.

name: Big Dumb Russian #2
preparation: Fill a 16-oz. pint glass with ice cubes. Add 2 oz of vodka then fill the glass to slightly more than 3/4 full with Sprite. Add pineapple juice to the glass then add enough blue curacao to give it a Caribbean ocean blue color.

name: Orange Bliss
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Nummer 10
preparation: Fill a whiskey sour glass one-third full with raspberry vodka. Sprinkle a few drops of kahlua on top and mix. Fill with schweppes russian and serve.

name: Midori Illusion
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur vodka Bacardi white rum Cointeau blue curacao and pineapple juice (to taste) into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade stir again gently and serve.

name: Mind Over Marny
preparation: Pour vodka into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add the juices and top with club soda.

name: Ruby Relaxer
preparation: Combine peach schnapps vodka and malibu rum in a cocktail glass. Almost fill with pineapple juice add a splash of cranberry juice and serve.

name: Stoli Fruit Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients together in an ice filled glass. Shake and pour back into glass.

name: Yellow Bird
preparation: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass. Stir sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.

name: Coco Loco
preparation: Pour the rums vodka creme de bananes pineapple juice coconut cream and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Blue Long Island
preparation: Typical long island with a kick. Pour into a collins glass on ice. Liquors first followed by sour mix and then blue curacao to preferance. Straw and garnish with a lemon.

name: Deep Valley
preparation: Pour gin and blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemon juice pineapple juice and soda. Stir and garnish with a long lemon twist a cherry and mint leaves.

name: Swimming Pool
preparation: Mix ingredients well pour into an exotic glass and float the blue curacao on top.

name: Ohranj Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) orange juice and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Orange Breeze
preparation: Build in a large goblet with ice and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: The Green One
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a glass.

name: Michael Moros Detroit Boy
preparation: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a blender. Blend for a few seconds until smooth. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with mint leaves and serve.

name: Kosmo
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Serve over ice in a chilled collins glass.

name: Red Devil
preparation: Mix alcohols into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Add the juice and grenadine and shake. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

name: Godiva Chocolate Martini
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'xtdWt3ODrNebFP_rXeZvjR0ZwD00-fDa' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Call a Cab
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a hurricane glass with ice or combine in a blender. Add juices and sprite to fill glass and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail
preparation: Shake vodka triple sec lime and cranberry juice vigorously in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass garnish with a lime wedge on the rim and serve. name: Absolut Stress
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing tin and shake with ice. Pour into a collins glass. No garnish.

name: White Russian
preparation: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'x4NGx3ODrtMzgOwDztQQ_v3odWqXyT60' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Becky's Bomber
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add vodkas and fill with cranberrry juice.

name: Brass Monkey
preparation: Toss the rum and vodka together and stir gently. Pour in the orange juice and shake well. Pour over ice in a highball or tall glass.

name: Malibu Screw
preparation: Add chilled orange juice to vodka and malibu rum over ice (if desired).

name: Georgia Peach Iced Tea
preparation: Fill collins glass with ice add vodka gin and rum. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Pour peach schnapps on top.

name: Liam's Lucky Charm
preparation: Fill glass with ice pour the Lime vodka absolute citron pineapple juice. add just a splash of Blue Curaco. Enjoy

name: Black Opal
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a beer glass. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge. When done right it should taste like a grape otter pop.

name: Dingo
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain over plenty of ice in a highball glass garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Saronno Kir Imperial
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Kiss on the Lips
preparation: The mango mix should be blended with crushed ice firstly with the schnapps. Pour the schnapps and mango mix into a cocktail glass with the grenadine already placed at the bottom.

name: Hurricane
preparation: Pour all but the juices in order listed into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of grapefruit and pineapple juice and serve.

name: Monte Carlo Imperial
preparation: Shake gin creme de menthe and lemon juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Long Beach Cocktail
preparation: Mix as a long island ice tea.

name: Adios Motherfucker #3
preparation: Shake alcohol then add sprite on top. Serve on the rocks.

name: Hurricane Sunrise
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice as desired and mix well. Garnish with maraschino cherries and orange slices (optional) and serve.

name: Addison Special
preparation: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

name: Blue Lagoon
preparation: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade top with the cherry and serve.

name: Blue Light Special
preparation: Shake.

name: Cape Cod
preparation: Combine in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'd1MWx3ODoMITf2m5XQigD0z75LGHI8or' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Electric Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Gerbil
preparation: Mix and serve over ice in a lowball glass.

name: Sex on the Beach
preparation: Add vodka and peach schnapps to a highball glass over ice. Fill with equal measures of cranberry juice and orange juice and stir. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'hpNml3ODpibFOlmZChKKhmZjGQtY5U_V' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Blue MotherFucker #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bury Me Deep
preparation: Shake all but lemonade in a shaker and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Orange Crush
preparation: Add all ingredients to tumbler and pour as a shot.

name: Greek Sex On The Beach
preparation: Put all ingredients in together and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

name: Miami Vice
preparation: 1. Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. Set aside. 2. Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum w/ ice. 3. While frozen add pina colada mix to a cocktail glass. Add the daiquiri mix on top keeping it seperated from the pina colada mix. Serve.

name: Imperial Moka
preparation: Shake and serve.

name: Imperial Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Terror From the Deep
preparation: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.

name: Bloody Mary
preparation: Add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka tomato juice red hot sauce green hot sauce worchester sauce lemon juice pinch of salt pinch of pepper. Pour back and forth between two mixing glasses. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Oral Sex on the Beach
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps blue curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Kansas City Ice Water
preparation: Pour gin vodka and lime juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Deep Dark Secret
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Double Omega
preparation: Mix all the alcohol then lime. Cola on the top.

name: JD's Private Beach
preparation: Add the blue curacao with 1/3 cup of crushed ice to a blender and blend until slushy. Pour the creme de bananes Malibu rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass. Pour the slushy blue curacao over the back of a spoon into the glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge add blue straws and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw #2
preparation: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts pineapple juice and orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice or a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Chocolate Coke
preparation: Pour the Bacardi white rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola and serve.

name: Strawberry-Peach Daiquiri
preparation: Add strawberries Bacardi white rum DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps sugar and lemon juice to a blender with one cup of crushed ice (more or less if desired). Blend until icy with no chunks of ice remaining. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a slice or two of strawberry and serve.

name: Midori Colada
preparation: Blend ingredients. Best served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: International Akbar
preparation: Squeeze lime wedge and drop into bottom of glass. Fill highball glass with ice. Add shot of dark rum. Fill to rim with San Pellegrino Aranciata stir and serve.

name: Bahama Mama #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.

name: Navy Grog
preparation: Pour liquors into an ice-filled collins glass. Add juices shake and garnish with an orange wedge and pineapple chunk.

name: Jamaican Zombie
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Monsoon
preparation: Pour all ingredients except myer's dark rum and stir in an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add dark rum at the top mix and serve.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Blue Heaven
preparation: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto rum and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Liquid Cocaine 8-Ball
preparation: Mix together and wait for the effects.

name: Bacardi Hurricane
preparation: Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Ice-T
preparation: Shake or stir. Serve with ice cubes.

name: Three Wiser Men
preparation: Combine all 3 in a shot glass and throw it back with your boys.

name: Brain Damage
preparation: Pour all the ingredients over an ice-cube and stir gently.

name: Three Wise Men
preparation: Add into a shot glass in equal parts.

name: Triple J
preparation: Its very very simple and hard core. Mix equal parts of the ingredients in any way you see fit then shoot your way to glory (and quite possibly death). Enjoy!

name: Mexican Three Wise Men
preparation: Combine ingredients straight up or on the rocks. Shoot.

name: Robot Cocktail
preparation: Combine jack daniel's vodka and grenadine in a highball glass. Mix well add ice and serve.

name: Dickhead's Delight
preparation: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a highball glass then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

name: Shotgun
preparation: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

name: Screwdriver #2
preparation: Pour in rum and then add orange juice. Add three ice cubes and serve.

name: Midori Chan
preparation: Add ingredients to a blender with ice and mix until desired consistency is achieved. Strain into a highball glass with/without ice.

name: Goombay Smash Charleston Style
preparation: Cut banana into small pieces; mix with rums and juices and ice in a mixing tin; shake vigorously pour into glass and add a splash of grenadine for color.

name: Christopher Walken
preparation: Stir rum melon liqueur and juices together in a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up and stir in sugar to make a nice fizz. Top with a mini-umbrella for festive flair!

name: M.O.A.B.
preparation: Drop a shot glass filled with equal parts of Jack Daniel's and Jim Beam into a pint of American beer and serve.

name: New Orleans Buck
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Jamaican Me Crazy
preparation: Mix in a shaker glass and serve.

name: Hummingbird
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

name: Habaneros
preparation: Pour the rum lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Romulan Ale
preparation: Pour rum and curacao into a tall narrow glass. Fill (almost) with sprite and add tabasco sauce. Add a grain of salt and serve.

name: Pina Colada
preparation: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'I0Nml3ODqje7jlkf8hcpY8ffrAhL9wvs' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Kona Village Mai Tai
preparation: Mix first 6 ingredients in a pitcher. Fill highball glasses with ice. Pour the mixture over. Garnish with pineapple wedges if desired.

name: Frozen Peach Daiquiri
preparation: Mix with shaved ice in blender; serve in wine glass. Variations: Substitute several large ripe strawberries for the peach.

name: Cherry Blow Pop
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into an short shaker with ice. For better taste let it chill for a bit.

name: Fourth of July
preparation: Layer in a shot glass banded red/white/blue shot is perfect for the fourth of july.

name: Flaming Turd Rocket
preparation: Pour the whiskey and peach liqueur into a shot glass and leave enough room for a layer of 151 over the top. Light the 151 with a lighter (torch lighter preferable). Extinguish the flame with your hand and immediately shoot.

name: Original Zombie
preparation: Pour light rum dark rum creme de almond and triple sec into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Almost-fill with equal parts of sweet and sour and orange juice. Top with 151 rum. Add a large straw and serve unstirred.

name: Passion Colada
preparation: Pour the white rum cream passion-fruit juice and coconut syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple chunk or a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Columbian Necktie
preparation: Fill the Collins Glass with ice. Add 2 oz. Bacardi 151 2 oz. Southern Comfort. Fill with Ginger Ale and add a splash of grenadine. Give the drink one solid shake add a cherry to top and enjoy.

name: Cuba Libre
preparation: Pour lime juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add rum fill with cola stir and serve.

name: Grim Reaper
preparation: Mix kahlua and 151 proof rum in an old-fashioned glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over the top to give an ice red tint.

name: Mooselips
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Authentic Pina Colada
preparation: Pour rum cream of coconut and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: The Head
preparation: Pour rum and peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice stir and serve.

name: Banana Daiquiri
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for five seconds then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute top with the cherry and serve.

name: Miles
preparation: Take an Imperial pint / 0.5 lt glass and add in several ice cubes. Pour the Midori liqueur vodka & peach scnapps over the ice and then add the lemonade to fill the glass to the top. Give the mix a gentle stir & it is ready to drink.

name: Bull's Milk
preparation: Shake rum brandy milk and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg and the pinch of cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Rum Screwdriver
preparation: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice stir and serve.

name: Zombie
preparation: Blend all ingredients with ice except Bacardi 151 proof rum. Pour into a collins glass. Float Bacardi 151 proof rum on top. Garnish with a fruit slice sprig of mint and a cherry.

name: Black Orchid
preparation: Shake and serve. You should not use Meyers Dark Rum for this one.

name: Coast Colada
preparation: Blend all ingredients together in a blender. Pour into a hurricane glass garnished with a slice of starfruit and serve.

name: Canadian Zombie
preparation: Fill collins glass halfway up with ice. Add white and dark rum. Fill up with half orange- half lemon juice. Pour grenadine and curacao along rim of glass. Top with 151 proof rum.

name: Strawberry Colada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Cream Puff
preparation: Pour the rum light cream and powdered sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Tom's Rum Runner
preparation: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.

name: Real Romulan Ale
preparation: Combine ingredients in a (just over) one-liter bottle. Chill in freezer for two hours. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Crazy Erika
preparation: Add all ingredients except sprite to a collins glass and stir well to dissolve sugar. Add sprite stir lightly fill glass with ice amd serve.

name: Devil's Candy-Cane
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass carefully ignite and allow to burn then extinguish and shoot.

name: Hummer
preparation: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Southern Brain Damage
preparation: Fill 2/3 shot with Southern Comfort. Add 1/3 left Tia Maria. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine for effect (or for sweetness desired).

name: Strawberry Kiss
preparation: Add all ingredients in the order shown above and stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.

name: Aussie Beach Blond
preparation: Combine the rum Cointreau lime juice orange juice sugar and the juice from one passion-fruit in a blender with 1/4 cup of crushed ice. Blend and add further crushed ice where needed until slushy consistancy is achieved. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a slice of lemon lime and orange and serve.

name: The End Of The World
preparation: Serve warm. Straight into the shot glass.

name: Blue Lightning
preparation: Pour the blue curacao Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with prepared lime mix and serve.

name: Naked Lady
preparation: Pour the white rum sweet vermouth apricot brandy grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Frozen Cherry Daiquiri
preparation: Place all ingredients in blender with a cup of crushed ice and blend well. Serve in a margarita or hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Breath of God
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: China Village Mai Tai
preparation: In a metal shaker add a fair amount of ice cubes. Add dark rum and light rum then grenadine orange juice and pineapple juice. Finally add triple sec and shake vigorously. Pour in a thick tall ribbed glass. Top with a cherry or a dash of triple sec.

name: Stars and Stripes
preparation: Make pousse-cafe (layered) in a cordial or liqueur glass and serve.

name: Ironlung
preparation: Pour yukon jack into a shot glass. Top with a small float of bacardi 151 rum. Add a small topping of whipped cream.

name: Rocket Fuel #3
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Mt. Jack
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir and serve.

name: Screaming Blue Viking
preparation: Combine liquors in a shaker of ice and shake. Strain into shot glasses. Partakers must scream Valhalla!! before doing the shot. Can also be served on the rocks in a large goblet for the brave warrior.

name: Nuclear Blue
preparation: Pour the blue curacao Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey whiskey into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Fill with lime mix and serve.

name: Paralyzer #2
preparation: Build ingredients in order over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Blue Monday
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel on the glass and serve.

name: Vodka Collins
preparation: Shake vodka lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Liquid Cocaine #6
preparation: Mix together in a champagne flute and drink.

name: Peach Tumbler
preparation: Stir all ingredients together with a few ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass or tumbler and serve.

name: Cape Codder
preparation: Pour Vodka and Cranberry Juice into a highball glass over ice. Stir well add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Chocolate Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice then pour into martini glass.

name: Black and Blue #2
preparation: Gently shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Bloody Smurf #2
preparation: Pour the vodka blue Curacao liqueur and Chambord raspberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake briefly strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Cock 'n Balls
preparation: Pour the raspberry lemonade into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the vodka's by stirring in as you pour and serve.

name: Blue Meanie
preparation: Combine Blue Curacao Vodka and Sour mix in a shaker with ice shake and strain into a shot glass. Could also be made on the rocks.

name: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
preparation: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

name: Polar Bear
preparation: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty! OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' '52eXQ1ZDrwxg0pOfY43zzLcp3x13tXE_' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Vodka and Coke
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Coca-cola add a straw and serve.

name: Grizzly Bear
preparation: Serve over ice. Sounds nasty but tastes great.

name: Vodka and Tonic
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Trane
preparation: Pour the vodka blue curacao and 2-3 ice cubes into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour unstrained into a rocks lowball or old-fashioned glass. Top with club soda and serve.

name: Chi-Chi
preparation: Blend vodka pineapple juice and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a red wine glass decorate with the slice of pineapple and the cherry and serve.

name: Kursk
preparation: Pour vodka and curacao into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill it up with battery.

name: Caribbean Cruise
preparation: Combine all ingredients shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).

name: Ice Cream Genius
preparation: Blend all ingredients together in a blender.

name: Cough Syrup
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a shot glass.

name: Swedish Polar Bear
preparation: Mix absolut vodka and blue curacao in a glass with ice cubes. Fill with sprite and serve.

name: Blue Bayou
preparation: Pour curacao and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade stir and serve.

name: Anabolic Steroid
preparation: Pour blue curacao into a shot glass followed by midori then vodka. Serve.

name: Bullvodka
preparation: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

name: Canadian Killer Kool-Aid
preparation: Pour amaretto melon liqueur and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add cranberry juice to taste and stir again. Top with Sprite to taste and serve.

name: Knoxville Lemonade
preparation: Pour peach schnapps and vodka into a mason jar three-quarters filled with ice cubes. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange add two straws and serve.

name: Sand in Your Shorts
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker shake and strain over ice in a tall glass.

name: Buddy's Bloody Mary
preparation: Add several ice cubes to a highball glass grind some pepper on top and add some celery salt to make seasoned ice cubes. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain the mixture over the ice cubes in the highball glass. Squeeze a lime slice over the drink and drop it in the glass. Serve.

name: Shamrocks
preparation: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and Orange Juice for a light green color.

name: Bloody Caesar
preparation: Rim tall glass with celery salt fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick straw and lime.

name: Long Vodka
preparation: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and angostura coating the inside of the glass. Pour on the vodka add a slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder mix with tonic stir and serve.

name: Russian Qualude
preparation: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream or milk stir and serve.

name: Polar Bear #2
preparation: Blend with ice in a highball glass.

name: Cheeky Vimto
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Vodka Orange
preparation: Pour vodka over three or four ice cubes in a highball glass and add fresh orange juice.

name: Key West Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the vodka into a frozen highball glass and add the lime juice. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Bald Pussy
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and shake.

name: Ice Cream Float
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vanilla schnapps fill glass with favorite soda (anything you would put on ice cream...root beer dr. pepper orange) leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Fill with cream.. not milk. Serve.

name: Kermit The Frog Piss
preparation: Pour ingredients into a glass and serve.

name: Green Frog
preparation: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a highball glass. Add the sprite a few drops of lime juice and ice cubes. Serve with a straw.

name: Squish Frog
preparation: Pour Midori into a shot glass. Drizzle creme de bananes down one side turn the shot glass around and drizzle creme de cerise down the other side. Drip Bailey's irish cream over the top to give the 'squished' effect and serve.

name: Leap Frog Highball
preparation: Pour gin and juice of lemon over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Green Monkey
preparation: Just pour a 1/3 of each bottle into a pint glass and enjoy

name: Fat Sailor
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Lemon Drop #6
preparation: Put the vodka and cointreau into a shaker. Squeeze the lemon juice into the shaker. Put a good amount of ice in the shaker close and shake until cold. Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass and then dip the rim in the sugar. Strain the contents of the shaker into the glass. Garnish with lemon zest for a decorative touch.

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake Martini
preparation: Shake pineapple juice and vanilla vodka with ice in a tumbler. Pour into a martini cocktail glass. Add dash of grenadine and serve.

name: Frog Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Squashed Frog
preparation: Pour Midori then Advocaat in glass. Add a few dashes of grenadine and then float Bailey's on top.

name: Fat Cat
preparation: Fill mixing cup 1/4 full with ice. Add all three ingredients. Shake and strain into a shot glass or serve on the rocks.

name: Blue Frog
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Turlock Bulldog
preparation: Mix Kahlua and Bailey's in glass. Fill with rootbeer.

name: Blue MotherFucker
preparation: Shake ingredients strain over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Milky Way Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients mix and serve in a cocktail glass without ice.

name: Colorado Pitbull
preparation: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum Kahlua and Cream. Pur into a mason jar filled with ice and add a splash of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.

name: Ballet Russe Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bomb Pop
preparation: Combine ingredients over ice in a small rocks glass and serve.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Place the sugar and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Swirl the shaker around so that both ingredients are mixed thoroughly. Add ice cubes. Add the vodka triple sec and margarita mix and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add rimmers to make the drink look nice if you have them.

name: Cherry Vodka Sour
preparation: Place ice in a cocktail glass. Fill 1/2 the glass with Vodka and the rest of the glass (leaving 3 cm at the top) with sour mix. Add a tablespoon of Grenadine per 8 oz. glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry!

name: Black Russian
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Key Lime Pie #3
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime and then dip it into graham cracker crumbs. Strain the cocktail into the glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Russian Cream
preparation: Pour vodka and kahlua into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir add irish cream light cream and serve.

name: Cosmo
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec cranberry juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel #2
preparation: Orange juice last stir and enjoy!

name: Appletini
preparation: Stir ingredients together with crushed ice in a cocktail/martini glass and serve.

name: Vegas Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Slice the 1/4 lemon into two seperate wedges. Place in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour the Absolut Citron into the shaker and add one teaspoon of sugar. Shake vigorously. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Vodka Greyhound
preparation: Pour vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dead Little Green Frog
preparation: Mix lemon-lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients. Pour over ice in seperate highball glasses and top each drink off with 1/2 oz of cherry liqueur.

name: White Russian #3
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka and kahlua over ice. Top off with light cream and enjoy.

name: Hard Strawberry Lemonade
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice. Blend at the highest setting. Serve in a hurricane glass with a straw and garnish with lemon and/or strawberry. (Make sure if you don't get La Paz strawberry margarita mix that you get a margarita mix that has strawberry puree otherwise the drink isn't as good).

name: Caipiroska
preparation: Crush sugar into the lime wedges with a spoon. Place the lime wedges in the bottom of an 8 oz. glass. Cover with crushed ice fill glass with vodka and serve.

name: Pomegranate Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Add a dash of rose water if available. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve. Our fan Murray W. on Facebook recommends trying the recipe with Grand Mariner [or Cointreau] instead of simple syrup.

name: Fat Bastard
preparation: Combine in glass over ice (first vodka then godiva then milk). Stir thoroughly and serve.

name: The Jolly Rancher
preparation: Pour vodka and melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker and fill with cranberry juice. Shake pour over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: The Fat Albert
preparation: In a blender mix the chocolate milk ice and maple syrup for about 5 seconds. Then add the chocolate mint liqueur and kahlua blending for another 2 seconds. Pour and top with whipped cream.

name: Caucasian
preparation: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur (kahlua) over ice cubes. Add desired amount of Half-and-Half.

name: Purple People Eater
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

name: Dirty Vodka Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Caribbean Bulldog
preparation: Build the kahlua caribbean cream and milk (or half-and-half) over ice in a tall highball glass. Add coca-cola and stir gently. Add straws and serve.

name: Fjellbekk (Mountain Stream)
preparation: Mix everything in a glass with ice.

name: Apple Martini
preparation: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

name: Pearl Jam
preparation: Pour orange vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Add club soda top with orange juice and serve.

name: Fat Titties
preparation: Stir ingredients over a few ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Carlitos
preparation: Pour over ice in a tall glass. Stir.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
preparation: Pour the tia maria vodka and cherry brandy together into a pint glass. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill with equal amounts of dry cider and 7-up and add ice cubes.

name: Ultimate Mudslide
preparation: Place all ingredients except grated chocolate in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Colonel Dan's Ice Tea
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add lemon juice. Fill 3/4 of the way with sweetened iced tea (prepared). Top with 7-Up. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Blue Kamikaze
preparation: Combine the Vodka Blue Curacao and Lime Juice in a glass with ice. Shake well then pour through a strainer into a normal glass with ice in it. Makes 1 drink. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'BqeXQ1ZDp54lx6h9mAWLmasY-cuttcYg' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Harvey Wallbanger
preparation: In a glass with ice add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and orange juice. Stir and float liqueur on top. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Colorado Rattlesnake
preparation: Pour chilled Tequila in shot glass and put to the side. Pour Tomato Juice in a second shot glass and dash Black Pepper and Tabasco in the Tomato Juice. Shoot the Tequila and chase with the shot of Tomato Juice.

name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker
preparation: Pour into shot glass starting with tequila followed by J.D. and finally Southern. Shoot it.

name: German Bulldog
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Purple Motherfucker
preparation: Combine vodka southern comfort amaretto razzmatazz and sour mix in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake and pour into a collins glass. Top with 7-up and serve.

name: Tidy Bowl
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass float 4 to 6 raisins and serve.

name: The Leap Frog
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime and two maraschino cherries on both ends of the lime.

name: Cosmopolitan Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice shake and strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Screwdriver
preparation: Add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka in ice-filled glass and top with orange juice.

name: Berry Fusion Martini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with frozen blueberries placed inside the glass.

name: Tree Frog
preparation: Mix vodka Maui and grapefruit juice together then pour over highball glass with ice.

name: Caesar Cocktail
preparation: Line the rim of a glass with salt and pepper. Over ice add vodka fill with clamato juice then add the remaining ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick. Add more tabasco sauce if desired.

name: Widow Maker
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass half full with ice. Add first three ingredients into the glass and sway lightly to mix them together. Add the 2 drops of grenadine for the red hour glass on the bottom of the widow maker spider.

name: Burberry Bulldog
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Pour in the vodka Chambord raspberry liqueur Kahlua coffee liqueur and Irish cream. Stir then fill up the glass with equal portions of milk and Dr. Pepper soda. Stir again and serve.

name: Fat Girl
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass stir and shoot.

name: Pink Russian
preparation: Pour liquor into a highball glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream and shake.

name: Mangled Frog
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Bailey's Irish cream on top. Drop the grenadine down through the center creating a dead mangled frog effect and serve.

name: Smooth Black Russian
preparation: Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.

name: Swedish Polar Bear
preparation: Combine and mix absolut vodka and blue curacao over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with sprite and serve.

name: Autodafe
preparation: Mix vodka and lime juice together in a highball glass. Fill up with soda water and serve. NOTE: Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

name: Orient Express
preparation: Put cinnamon and sugar mixed on the rim of a cocktail glass. Add the Smirnoff Frangelico Bailey's and espresso to the glass and mix thoroughly. Add cream to taste and serve.

name: Mage's Fire
preparation: Mix the schnapps and curacao into a bottle with vodka. Chill for 24 hours and serve as cold shots.

name: Frothy Snowman
preparation: Combine Kahlua vodka milk and chocolate in blender. Blend until frothy. Serve over ice in a large cocktail glass.

name: Melon Ball
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a melon ball and a slice of lime on a stick and serve with straws.

name: Double Your Pleasure Double Your Fun
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake pour into cocktail glass and garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Colorado Bulldog #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Mud Slide
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Bay Breeze
preparation: First add cubed ice then add the three parts stoli then add the pineapple juice and last but not least add the cranberry juice for color.

name: Bulldog Highball
preparation: Pour gin and juice of orange into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: White Girl
preparation: Pour Bailey's irish cream Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka over ice in a parfait glass. Fill with milk or cream stir and serve.

name: Colorado Motherfucker #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Miami Ice
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except peach schnapps) into a beer mug. Stir gently and almost-fill with ice. Add peach schnapps and serve.

name: Chocolate Martini #3
preparation: Mix vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur in shaker filled with ice. Strain into either wine glass or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: British Bulldog
preparation: Pour DeKuyper Buttershots Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in half-and-half until the glass is full. Garnish with a maraschino cherry add a straw and serve.

name: Gummy Bear
preparation: In a cocktail glass 3/4 full with ice pour vodka and raspberry schnapps. Fill with cranberry juice stir and serve.

name: Colorado Motherfucker
preparation: Pour the tequila coffee liqueur and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk and serve.

name: The Quan
preparation: Pour vodka and curacao into a highball glass. Add ice fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Colorado Cider
preparation: Combine all ingredients in small snifter. Sip slowly or take as a shot.

name: Bloody Mary #2
preparation: Combine vodka tomato juice lemon juice pepper salt celery salt Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a stick of celery and a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Colorado Coolaid
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with a scoop of ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Desperate Housewife
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drizzle with chocolate sauce and serve.

name: Dirty Girl Scout
preparation: Mix the vodka kahlua and bailey's and pour over ice. Pour the creme de menthe down the center of the glass. Looks gross but tastes delicious!

name: Big Dog
preparation: Pour the Kahlua and vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add chilled milk almost to the brim of the glass. Top with a splash of Pepsi cola. Stir and serve.

name: Woo Woo
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Black Cow #3
preparation: Pour Coke into glass of milk.

name: Pooh Bear
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice.

name: Apple Sharlotka
preparation: Combine the Zubrowka vodka with clear apple juice to taste and add ice. Stir but don't shake.

name: Mind Eraser
preparation: Pour vodka kahlua and tonic water into a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Alexi's Spicy Bloody Mary
preparation: Add vodka sauces pickle juice and brine to a mug full of ice. Fill with tomato juice. Add salt pepper and celery salt to taste. Pour mixture back and fourth between two glasses to mix it well. Garnish with olives a pickle and a slice of lime.

name: Klingon Koffee
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice and serve.

name: Vit Ryss
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass add ice and mix.

name: Black and White
preparation: Stir the ingredients with and and pour into a well-chilled cocktail glass.

name: Colorado Crackpipe
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled pint glass/beer mug and serve.

name: Dew-Driver #2
preparation: The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the Orange Juice until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add the less vodka taste you have. (The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste). Then enjoy.

name: Sex on the Beach #11
preparation: Pour into a glass and serve unstirred.

name: Butterfinger #2
preparation: Put all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add hershey's chocolate syrup to the cocktail glass if desired. Serve.

name: Bullfrog #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a beer pilsner. Fill with milk add ice and serve.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Bulldog Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tijuana Bulldog
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Heart Warmer
preparation: Build over ice in an old-fasioned glass.

name: Kamikaze
preparation: Add lime juice triple sec and Smirnoff No.21 Vodka. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Peppermint Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Vodka Gimlet
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ohio Bulldog
preparation: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and shake up. Pour over ice in old-fashioned glass. Serve with a coffee stirrer.

name: Caribbean Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice. Pour into glass.

name: Frozen Black Irish
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a double-cocktail glass garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Oprah's Favorite Pomegranate Martini
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker 1/4 filled with chopped ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with a squeeze of lemon.

name: Hypnosis
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker full with ice. Add vodka and Hpnotiq liqueur Shake vigorously. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with Squirt. Garnish with a cherry or pineapple chunk and serve.

name: Italian Bulldog
preparation: Shake Galliano herbal liqueur Kahlua coffee liqueur and milk together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add Coca-cola and serve.

name: Colorado Skies
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bear
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass with 1 1/2 oz of crushed ice. Pour the cola and milk simultaneously until full and serve.

name: Strawberry Split
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except lemonade) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add lemonade garnish with a strawberry add straws and serve.

name: Strawberry Overdose
preparation: Place a handful of crushed ice in the bottom of a blender. Add 3/4 punnet (about 6-9 ounces) of strawberries. Blend. Add a shot of all alcohols. Blend more. Add cream to desired consistency and blend again. Pour into a cocktail glass or several depending on size. Crumble chocolate flakes on top and slices from the remaining strawberries. Add an umbrella and serve.

name: Strawberry Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake. Place the rim of a chilled cocktail/martini glass in a bowl of lemon juice then transfer to a bowl of sugar in order to coat the rim. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker into the cocktail glass and serve.

name: Virgin Strawberry Colada
preparation: Combine the strawberries pineapple juice coconut cream and crushed ice in a blender and blend well at high speed. Pour into a collins glass garnish with a cherry and pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Peachy Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli strawberry vodka (Strasberi) and peach brandy into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Ladies Night
preparation: Chill all ingredients. Add together in a beautiful champagne glass and share with the ladies.

name: Stinky Pinky
preparation: Fill glass with ice pour in vodka pour in sprite top off with Grapefruit juice till pink. Shake Gently.

name: Strawberry Dream
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

name: Strawberry Fields
preparation: Blend strawberries into 4 oz puree add 2 oz of rum (and some sugar if you want to) and blend for a couple of second. Pour into sugar rimmed glass. Mix the orange juice and 1 oz of rum and gently layer on top in glass.

name: Dirty Strawberry
preparation: Add ingredients to glass with ice and stir. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Babyface Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Gummi Worms
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Strawberry Dawn
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except mint sprig) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: MoCo Melon
preparation: Shake all ingredients except Midori in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass and float Midori on top.

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a fresh strawberry and serve.

name: Frappe Ramal 5
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in margarita glasses.

name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass.

name: Canadian Sweet Tea
preparation: Fill mason jar completely with ice cubes. Add 2 ounces of YUKON JACK. Top off with unsweetened tea. I prefer more yukon than this. However 2 ounces is plenty to sweeten the tea. Cool and refreshing in the summer. Warm your bones in the winter. Can also be made by the pitcher.

name: Dead Hand
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Pirate's Tea
preparation: Pour spiced rum into an ice-filled mason jar. Add coca-cola to the ridge of the jar and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Toxic Antifreeze
preparation: Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice add 1 ounce of vodka 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.

name: GTV
preparation: The ingredients are best preserved cold for this purpose. To mix just pour the ingredients into a glass. Add an ice cube if you like.

name: Elf Tea
preparation: Pour the peppermint liqueur and iced tea into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and sweeten to taste. Squeeze the juice from half a lemon over the top and serve.

name: Blueberry Tea
preparation: Mix amaretto and grand marnier in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste.

name: Long Island Raspberry Iced Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients except raspberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker with a bit of ice. Pour into a highball glass. Carefully layer the raspberry liqueur on top and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Gentle Ben
preparation: Mix together in a highball glass add some ice and a straw. Serve.

name: Green Dinosaur
preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: WOP
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Tropical Spiced Tea
preparation: Combine all ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Honeydew Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka melon liqueur and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Legspreader
preparation: Mix in glass and enjoy.

name: Unabomber
preparation: Mix all ingredients place in shot glass. Introduce to mouth.

name: Buttercream Tea
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Long Island Pucker
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Carolina Iced Tea
preparation: Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and serve. Note: Add a splash of lemon and garnish with a twist for a classy drink or serve in a mason jar for a real down-home feel.

name: Green Dinosaur #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

name: Mid-Summer Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes add orange juice and serve.

name: Acid Trip
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Green Wave
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Chill and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Serve immediately.

name: Dixieland Tea
preparation: Shake or stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Green Dinosaur #3
preparation: Stir ingredients in ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Blue Sex
preparation: Pour the blue curacao tequila Midori melon liqueur and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Long Island Taxi
preparation: Pour all liquors into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add orange juice to taste and shake. Strain into shot glasses or a single highball glass and serve.

name: Beach Bum Shake
preparation: Pour the tequila orange juice vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice and shake for about a minute. Strain into hurricane glass. Add a tiny umbrella and slice of lemon (optional) and serve.

name: Peach Tea Cooler
preparation: Mix and serve on the rocks.

name: Speedball
preparation: Pour the alcoholic ingredients into a shot glass and squeeze a little amount of lime juice on top.

name: Mexican Dream
preparation: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur milk and ice cream in a blender. Blend until milk-like consistency. Pour into a hurricane glass add straws and serve.

name: Crickets
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Add enough ice-cream to make the drink thick like a malt. Serves two.

name: Bushwacker #2
preparation: Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best). Add a small splash of vodka a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amaretto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of ice cubes. Mix until smooth. Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top!

name: Bad Headgasket
preparation: Fill glass half full of ice then slowly pour one ounce of coffee liquer then one ounce of the Jagermeister and finally three ounces of the half & half. Do not stir or shake.

name: Mocha Martini
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Dirty Banana
preparation: Blend six ice cubes with ice-cream in a blender until smooth. Add liqueurs and continue blending again until smooth. Add more ice-cream if needed (for milk-shake consistency). Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: The World's Best Pina Colada
preparation: Combine rum cream of coconut and pineapple juice in a regular sized blender. Blend on low speed and fill with ice. Blend on high speed until ice is grainy. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Chocolate Shot
preparation: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Rum Runner #2
preparation: Blend with crushed ice pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Butcherblock
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a large glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate.

name: Black Cow #2
preparation: Pour over ice. Stir lightly. Tastes like the treat known as a Black Cow which is vanilla ice cream and root beer.

name: Rattlesnake
preparation: Carefully layer into a shot glass test tube or tumbler.

name: Rebel Russian
preparation: Mix ingredients well and pour over ice cubes.

name: Bushwacker #4
preparation: First place three or four ice cubes in a rock glass. The Bailey's is placed in the glass first otherwise the cream will curdle. Then the Bushmill's whiskey is added slowly and stirred until thoroughly mixed.

name: Bushwacker #3
preparation: Put all contents in a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half.

name: Creamy Anyie
preparation: Layer the ingredients in the order listed in a shot glass and serve.

name: Bushwacker
preparation: Combine ingredients with two cups of ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and serve up in two 12 oz cups.

name: Hammer Horror
preparation: Blend briefly in a highball glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate. Serve with straws.

name: Frozen Steppes
preparation: Pour ingredients over finely shaven ice in a parfait glass and stir well. Garnish with a slices of fruit and serve.

name: Baby Eskimo
preparation: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light great for following a heavy drink.

name: Panty Dropper
preparation: Pour kahlua and sloe gin into a tall ice-filled glass. Fill with half and half and serve.

name: Spunky Monkey
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a blender with 6 ice cubes. Blend on high until the ice is crushed and serve in a highball glass.

name: Gulyuz
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half-filled with cracked ice and shake for 1 minute. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cuban Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry Daiquiri
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into a chilled daiquiri/margarita glass garnish with a chocolate covered strawberry and serve.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with shaved ice strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
