preparation: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute top with the cherry and serve.

name: Strawberry Splash
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Swirl around gently and serve.

name: Creole Scream
preparation: Mix the rum grenadine vermouth and angostura. Shake with ice. Add the olive.

name: Corkscrew
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum peach schnapps and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Coconut Toastie
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except coconut) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute garnish with shredded coconut and serve.

name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
preparation: Combine the rum pineapple juice maraschino liqueur and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Bacardi Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Cow
preparation: Shake rum creme de banana cream and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Continental
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Jungle Flame
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into whiskey-sour glasses. Garnish with twists of lemon.

name: Daiquiri Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Zombie #6
preparation: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a tumbler on crushed ice.

name: Chambord Daiquiri
preparation: Blend with one cup of crushed ice in a shaker or blender for 30 seconds. Strain into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Mexican Blonde
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mojito Tampa
preparation: Squeeze and add the lime slices into an old-fashioned glass. Add the mint leaves and decorate with mint leaves on the stem. Add the ice sugar and soda water to make simple syrup. Use a large wooden spoon to crush and infuse the ingredients together. Add the rum last and serve.

name: Little Princess Cocktail
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lavender Lady
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate and whipped cream. Serve.

name: Carolina Dream
preparation: Blend with two cups of ice until all chunks of peach and ice are gone. This drink was inspired by the intense heat of the fourth of july in the south east.

name: Seattle Sidecar
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and serve. Substitute apple juice for the apple cider if none is available.

name: Beachcomber #3
preparation: Pour white rum triple sec grenadine and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Rum Gimlet
preparation: Pour the rum and rose's lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Bacardi Pina Colada
preparation: Frappe and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Papa Doble
preparation: Shake rum grapefruit juice and sweetened lime juice with ice and pour or strain into a glass. Add a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Julia
preparation: Blend briefly in a cocktail glass with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
preparation: Add the sugar butter and cloves to a coffee mug. Pour the rum and stir well. Fill with boiling water. Stir again and serve.

name: La Floridita Cocktail
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Beachcomber
preparation: Add pineapple juice orange juice Smirnoff No.21 Vodka Captain Morgan Parrot Bay Coconut Rum. Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Bacardi Martini
preparation: Stir and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Serve with a green olive.

name: Bacardi Lime Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hemingway Special
preparation: Squeeze lime juice into a shaker add remaining ingredients and shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a frosted cocktail glass.

name: Cuban Sour
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Passion Daiquiri
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ti-Punch
preparation: Wash a lime remove top and bottom and thinly slice into half rings. Add lime pieces to glass and crush with the flat end of a barspoon. Add rum and sugar syrup top with broken ice and muddle together. Add a short straw and serve.

name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Melon Daiquiri
preparation: Blend ingredients with a handful of ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a large goblet garnish with melon balls and serve.

name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
preparation: Pour the rum and lemon juice and sugar into a champagne saucer with some shaved ice. Stir well. Garnish with 4 strawberries sliced or otherwise and serve.

name: Orgasm on the Beach
preparation: In a shaker add all ingredients and shake well to chill then pour into a cocktail glass. You can garnish it with some cherries or lemon slices or both as desired.

name: Lifesaver
preparation: Place liquors and juice into a shaker and mix well. Serve in a rocks glass.

name: Old-Fashioned Rum and Coke
preparation: Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Pineapple Buganda
preparation: Cut the pineapple into small pieces enough for two cups. Combine with everything else in a blender until smooth and thick. Serve in whiskey-sour glasses and garnish with mint sprigs and maraschino cherries.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri Punch
preparation: Chop strawberries and add to strawberry daiquiri mix. Add fruit punch followed by lemon juice and serve.

name: Coo Coo
preparation: In a blender combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

name: Caipirissima
preparation: Same as caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add white rum. It's great!

name: Havana Special
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
preparation: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 full with ice and add strawberries pieces of watermelon and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

name: Blonde Bombshell
preparation: Add ice rum and frozen lemonade concentrate to a blender. Blend at high speed. Pour into a margarita glass.

name: Hot Rum Toddy
preparation: Place a sugar cube or equivalent into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add rum and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Bavarian Coffee
preparation: Add coffee and liquors to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Coffee Break
preparation: Pour coffee and liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Coffee 43
preparation: Put licor 43 and coffee into mug. Pour cream gently over the coffee don't let them mix.

name: Galliano Hotshot
preparation: Layer galliano then hot coffee then cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.

name: Chambord Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top garnish with a fresh raspberry and serve.

name: French Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee cointreau and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top add a teaspoon of cointreau and serve.

name: Cafe Au Kirsch
preparation: Combine the kirsch sugar and egg white in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a wine glass. Fill with coffee stir and serve.

name: Frozen Irish Coffee
preparation: Shake briefly in a highball glass with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Top with ice cream and sprinkle with grated chocolate. Serve with straws.

name: Cafe Oliver
preparation: Pour the espresso into a small cup. Add sambuca and serve.

name: Caribbean Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Irish Coffee #4
preparation: Combine the whiskey coffee and syrup in an irish coffee cup. Gently ladle the cream on top and serve.

name: Calypso Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Jen's Creamy Sighs
preparation: In an irish coffee cup combine amaretto and bailey's. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream. Float grand marnier over the whipped cream. After serving consumer may stir for a full flavor combination.

name: Nutty Irish Coffee
preparation: Fill a coffee mug two-thirds full with coffee. Add liquors chocolate syrup and stir. Top with a mound of whipped cream sprinkled with cinnamon or nutmeg.

name: Lasseman's Partysaver
preparation: Mix the black coffee with the ouzo (until you can't feel the ouzo taste anymore) and put a little blob of whipped cream on top. Drink and enjoy.

name: Cloud 9
preparation: Mix all ingredients except whipped cream in a blender until ice is well chopped. Pour in coffee mug and top with generous portion of whipped cream.

name: Crapachino
preparation: Combine all the ingredients together leaving out the chocolate ice-cream. Leave in fridge until cold. Add in the chocolate ice-cream blend. Serve.

name: Cancun Coffee
preparation: Moisten rim of coffee mug with lime and dip rim in sugar. Pour liqueurs into mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream.

name: Cafe Kirsch
preparation: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Irish Coffee #2
preparation: Mix coffee and chilled irish cream with half & half. Add sugar and stir. Serve hot in an irish coffee cup.

name: Cafe D'Amour
preparation: Rim a coffee cup with lemon juice and sugar. Simmer coffee zest of half a lemon cinnamon stick and sugar (to taste) in a small saucepan. Heat and ignite cognac in a soup ladle add to coffee and extinguish. Strain into the cup and serve.

name: German Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top garnish with a black cherry and serve.

name: Mocha Frappe
preparation: Pour chilled coffee milk and instant chocolate milk powder into a blender. Mix together. Add whipped cream and ice cream and blend together at 'frappe' setting. Pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream nutmeg cinnamon or chocolate shavings.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Store in the refrigerator for up to one month.

name: Prince Charles Coffee
preparation: Pour drambuie and coffee into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with chocolate.

name: La Cafe
preparation: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: Balearic Coffee
preparation: Add coffee and liquor to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Irish 49
preparation: Add to a heat-proof cup sweeten to taste and serve.

name: Pepinos Cafe
preparation: Heat tequila and kahlua in a heat-resistant glass or cup and stir in sugar. Fill with coffee stir again and top with cream.

name: Cafe Trinidad
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Iced Coffee
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Add short straws a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Flori's Hot Tub Heaven
preparation: Please add in order from light to heavy finishing with coffee. No mixing required.

name: Italian Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Cafe Disaronno
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream and place three coffee beans on top.

name: Portland Coffee
preparation: Dip the rim of an irish coffee cup into a puddle of triple sec then a plate of sugar. Pour in the rum kahlua and one splash of triple sec. Light with a match to crystalize the sugar-rim. Add cinnamon and nutmeg and pour in the coffee (and extinguish flame) until three-quarters full. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Tropical Coffee
preparation: Pour gold rum and coffee into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top sprinkle wth cinnamon and serve.

name: Stanley Steamer
preparation: Take a warm beer mug w/handle. Put in the liquor. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream dashing a little Orange Liqueur (Grand Marnier) on top. Serve with a straw.

name: Thai Coffee
preparation: 1. Ensure your coffee beans are rich and finely grounded. Ground some whole green Cardamom Pods. 2. Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual let it cool. In a tall glass dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). 3. Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

name: Paradise Cafe
preparation: Pour the spiced rum and hot coffee into a mug and sweeten to taste. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Flaming Spanish Fly
preparation: Moisten rim of glass with cherry juice or water. Dip rim into coarse sugar to coat heavily. Pour tequila and coffee liquor into glass. Gently float 151 proof rum on top. Carefully ignite rum and swirl glass to lightly melt sugar with flame. Immediately pour in coffee to extinguish flames and fill cup. Top with whipped cream and cherry.

name: Fria Cafe Italiano
preparation: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

name: Dutch Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Buttsex
preparation: Start with the coffee preferably espresso. Add in the vodka triple sec and lemon juice (lime juice can be used instead) and stir. Top with the whipped cream.

name: Hot Shot
preparation: Pour hot coffee into a shot glass and gently add the galliano so it floats on the coffee. Then add some lightly whipped cream over it.

name: Royale Coffee
preparation: Add coffee and cognac to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float whipped cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Cafe Grande
preparation: Pour coffee and liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top add a cherry and serve.

name: Mexican Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Ice Cappuccino
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into a poco grande glass.

name: ABC Pousse Cafe
preparation: Pour into a pousse-cafe or cordial glass in order; amaretto bailey's irish cream and cointreau.

name: Irish Coffee
preparation: Combine whiskey sugar and coffee in a mug and stir to dissolve. Float cold cream gently on top. Do not mix.

name: Spanish Coffee #2
preparation: Mix congac kahlua and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Calypso Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee rum and cacao into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top add amaretto and serve.

name: Scandinavian Coffee
preparation: Add coffee and aquavit to an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Cafe Toledo
preparation: Pour liquors and coffee into a coffee mug over the chocolate syrup. Sweeten to taste and top with cream.

name: Tijuana Coffee
preparation: Add the a heat-proof goblet and sweeten to taste. Mix briskly allowing foam to form and sprinkle with ground cinnamon.

name: Spanish Coffee
preparation: Build the ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cherry.

name: Hot Dick
preparation: Pour bailey's and grand marnier into mug. Add espresso. Serve it hot with lots of cream and sprinkle with chocolate.

name: Seville Chocolate
preparation: Combine mandarin napoleon and cocoa in a heat-proof irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Coffee Nudge
preparation: Combine all with coffee and top with whipped cream.

name: Tennesee Mud
preparation: Mix coffee jack daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

name: Shamrock Coffee
preparation: Pour irish mist and coffee into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top sprinkle wth chocolate and serve.

name: Irish Coffee (Simple)
preparation: Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey followed by the coffee. Stir until sugar is dissolved and let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top and serve.

name: Coffee Chaser
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Galliano Hotshot #2
preparation: Pour galliano into a shot glass float hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.

name: Monte Cristo
preparation: Moisten the rim of an irish coffee cup with lemon juice and dip into sugar. Pour the kahlua and grand marnier into the cup and fill (almost to the top) with coffee. Top with whipped cream and grated chocolate.

name: Cafe Brulot
preparation: Warm cognac in a heat-resistant glass. Pour in the hot coffee and add dashes of triple sec. Add twists of lemon and orange peel a clove and sprinkle with cinnamon. Sweeten to taste and serve.

name: An Irish Kiss
preparation: Pour Baileys and Kahlua into Irish coffee glass fill glass with hot coffee and top with whipped cream.

name: Keoke Coffee
preparation: Mix alcohols add coffee top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Jamaican Coffee
preparation: Stir the rum coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

name: Cafe Seattle
preparation: Measure irish cream and vodka into coffee mug. Add hershey's chocolate syrup. Fill will coffee and top with whipping cream.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur #3
preparation: Blend (use blender) all ingredients until smooth. Store tightly covered in refrigerator. Shake before serving. Keeps up to one month.

name: Thai Iced Coffee
preparation: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice with cream. To get the layered effect place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

name: Golden Cola
preparation: Fill a highball glass halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

name: Golden Sip
preparation: Pour over lots of ice.

name: Left Handed Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the vodka and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Power Screwdriver
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass with three or four ice cubes. Add orange juice and coca-cola to taste.

name: Hairy Navel
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Golden Happiness
preparation: Mix together Golden Grain and Mountain Dew in equal portions. Top off with pineapple juice until the 'bite' subsides. Drink chilled or over ice.

name: Mistolin
preparation: Pour vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the orange juice and pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

name: Golden Goose
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Passionate Screw
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.......Garnish with cherry & an Orange wedge.

name: Machine
preparation: 1. Pour the orange juice into a shot glass take a napkin and place it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. (As far as it can go without touching the juice.) 2. Slowly pour the vodka so that it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice. Remove the napkin and drink.

name: Ghetto Romance
preparation: Mix ingredients. Serve on the rocks or shake and strain.

name: Golden Nugget
preparation: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Nest
preparation: Combine the juices egg and grenadine in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Peachy Screw
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka peach schnapps Malibu rum and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sour mix and orange juice to taste. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Screwdriver #3
preparation: Add orange juice first then add vodka and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pouring should do most of the stirring.

name: Bull Driver
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Golden Dawn
preparation: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with grenadine.

name: Golden Cadillac
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Brown Hen
preparation: Fill glass with ice then vodka then bitters. Stir.

name: Hamlet
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Golden Shot
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in order into a shot glass; barenjager goldenschlager vanilla schnapps. Serve.

name: Golden Buckle
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Cranberry Cooler
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a large container and freeze for approximately 24 hours. Pour into cocktail glasses when ready to serve.

name: Cuban Screw
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Golden Delicious
preparation: Pour sparkling apple cider into a highball glass. Add goldschlager stir and serve.

name: Golden Glow Punch
preparation: Pour the concentrate and the apple juice into the punch bowl. Stir the ginger ale into the bowl. Spoon in sherbet or add an ice ring. Serve immediately.

name: Comfortable Screw
preparation: Pour southern comfort and orange juice into a highball glass. Serve chilled.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #2
preparation: Shake with ice in a tumbler. Strain and pour.

name: Beam Me Up Scotty
preparation: Carefully add the ingredients in the order listed into a cordial glass; layering each on top of the previous.

name: Grape Beam
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with grape soda and serve.

name: Orange Rush Shots
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into 4 seperate shot glasses. Color should be light orange.

name: Beam Me Up
preparation: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add Jim Beam Bourbon and Amaretto. Then add Coca-Cola and stir.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #2
preparation: Fill shaker glass with ice. Add ingredients. Shake well. Pour into highball glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Laser Beam Shot
preparation: Chill the ingredients beforehand. Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass; Midori at the bottom (or other melon schnapps) Goldschlager Jagermeister at the top.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Delight
preparation: Serve on ice or blend for a milk shake effect.

name: Candy Store
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a highball glass.

name: Ha Ha Tonka
preparation: Fill a 16 oz cup with ice pour in alcohol then top with orange juice.

name: Barracuda
preparation: Put the liquor in the shot glass equally.

name: Mitch's Jim Beam Drink
preparation: Pour ingredients into a pint glass stir and serve.

name: Blue Coconut
preparation: Pour the coconut rum and blue curacao into a tall glass half-filled wtih ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with 7-up stir lightly and serve.

name: Beam and 7
preparation: Pour whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Chambord and Champagne
preparation: Pour the champagne into a champagne flute. Add a healthy splash of Chambord raspberry liqueur and serve.

name: Prison Bitch
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into tall glass.

name: Cherry Fucker
preparation: Stir the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker and Chambord raspberry liqueur together with the pine-apple juice over ice in a small collins glass. Garnish with 2 cherries and serve.

name: Hyper Beam
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila into a shot glass first then add the A&W Creme Soda. Serve.

name: French Fantasy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Alabama Slammer #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Beam 'n Squirt
preparation: Pour both ingredients over 6 ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Melberry
preparation: Pour midori chambord and raspberry juice into a shaker. Add a squeeze of lemon and lime juice. Shake and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Golden Beam
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Sexual Chocolate
preparation: Shake well and serve on the rocks.

name: Marsupial
preparation: Combine raspberry Sour Puss and banana liqueur in a collins glass. Top with 7-Up(to taste) ice and orange or lemon slice.

name: Mr. Freeze
preparation: Add fisherman's friend bags to a bottle of vodka. Mix together so that the fishermans friend dissolves. Rest for a couple of days pour into shot glasses and serve.

name: Jim Beam and Ginger
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with ginger ale (any brand) stir lightly and serve.

name: Twitcher
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

name: Dr. Raspberry
preparation: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add Chambord. Stir to mix and serve chilled.

name: Jim Beam and Coke
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill glass with Coca-Cola stir lightly and serve.

name: Sex on the Pool Table
preparation: Mix equal parts of each alcohol over ice and top with grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.

name: Cutty Beam
preparation: Combine Cutty Sark scotch and Jim Beam bourbon in a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Autumn Thunder
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour contents (including ice) into a highball glass and serve.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw
preparation: Pour sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice stir well and serve.

name: Blueberry Freeze
preparation: Blend ingredients thoroughly and pour into a specialty glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a teaspoon of blueberries.

name: Alabama Slammer
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Brain Freeze
preparation: Mix jose cuervo and grenadine in a pitcher with crushed ice. Sweeten with powdered sugar if desired.

name: Italian Soda #2
preparation: Pour chambord into bottom of the glass. Top with soda water. Do not stir. Serve with straw.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw
preparation: Stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice.

name: Raspberry Zima
preparation: Fill a beer mug with zima and add the raspberry liqueur. Stir well.

name: Anti Freeze #5
preparation: Shake vodka and Midori with ice and strain or pour on the rocks into a large or double-shot glass. Serve.

name: Beam Me Up Jimmy
preparation: Combine all whiskies in a shot glass top with grenadine last and stir.

name: Raspberry Fancy
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Mix creme de cassis Frangelico Chambord and sour mix together. Add lemonade and rasberries on top.

name: Moana Sands
preparation: Pour chambord and peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup fill the other half with orange juice and stir. Garnish with a paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge. After a few minutes the juice and syrup should separate from the alcohol giving it a sand-like look. (But it tastes much better.)

name: Kool-Aid Shot
preparation: Just put all ingredients in a large glass with ice and shake it up. Add cranberry juice to taste.

name: Beam Me Up Scottie
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Pussy-tat
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Orange Beam
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange soda and serve.

name: Chambord Kazi
preparation: Mix everythang in cocktail mixer with crushed ice and pour into cocktail glass.

name: Electric Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the shots into a highball glass fill with orange juice (to taste) and serve.

name: Friday Freeze
preparation: Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be semi - thick: not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin add sherbet if too thick  add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

name: Birch Beam
preparation: Pour Jim Beam whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with birch beer stir lightly and serve.

name: Red Devil #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain into your favorite ice filled glass.

name: Chameleon
preparation: Combine all ingredients over ice.

name: Beam Scream
preparation: Mix shots in 3-4 oz glass stir then drain it.

name: Sno-Cone
preparation: Fill glass with ice then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

name: Cherry Over The Edge
preparation: Mix southern comfort vodka and orange juice with crushed ice in a tall glass.

name: Mocha Freeze
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice. Blend until the chunks of ice are small and serve into two tall glasses.

name: French Summer
preparation: Pour chambord into a wine glass filled with ice. Add sparkling water squeeze in a slice of lemon and orange and stir.

name: Titia's Tushie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass and shake.

name: Cherry Chocolate Freeze
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry. Sprinkle with grated chocolate add straws and serve.

name: Raspberry Stupid
preparation: Mix well in a highball glass and serve.

name: Blue Velvet
preparation: Combine the black raspberry liqueur melon liqueur and vanilla ice cream in a blender. Add a cup of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Add blue curacao on top garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Neopolitan Dynamite
preparation: Pour all 3 ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Creamy Pussy
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Cum Shot
preparation: Blend liquors in shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Slippery Nipple #3
preparation: Put the Irish cream in first. Then slowly pour the Kahlua down the side of the glass so it doesn't mix. Then add the Butterscoth Schnapps on top nice and slow.

name: Chocohol
preparation: Pour equal parts of Bailey's irish cream and chocolate milk over ice cubes in a highball glass or pre-chill first and leave the ice and serve.

name: Bazooka Joe
preparation: Fill tin with ice. Mix all three ingredients with ice. Shake and strain into glass.

name: Sore Throat
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a slice of lemon and serve.

name: WCPP Carly Cumlips
preparation: Dip rims of shot glasses in cream. Pour ingredients over ice and shake briskly until mixture thickens. Strain into shot glasses and finish with a sprinkling of grated chocolate.

name: Dublin Double
preparation: Fill a shot glass 1/2 full with Baileys then fill the rest of the way with Kahlua.

name: Jedi Mind Trick #2
preparation: Combine about 1/3 oz. of each of the above into one shot glass and shoot.

name: Skull
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Buttsniffer
preparation: Add all three ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Boize Kumm
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream into a shot glass. Layer the banana liqueur on top. Top with a dash of whipped cream and serve.

name: Alien Nipple #2
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass. Layer the Bailey's Irish cream on top and finally add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps. Serve.

name: Mini Murphy
preparation: Pour kahlua into a shot glass until three-quarters full. Carefully layer a thin sheet of Bailey's irish cream on top and serve.

name: Bartender's Wet Dream
preparation: Simply put the ingredients in a shot glass and place a little bit of whipped cream on the top.

name: I Blow Up
preparation: Pour in Melon at the bottom of the glass. Layer Baily's Irish Creme and then cover in Grenadine.

name: Cum Shot #2
preparation: Sprinkle grains of salt in bottom of shot glass. Pour equal parts of peach schnapps and irish cream. Top with whipped cream. Drink is to be consumed with no hands (glass picked up with the mouth and slammed back in one swallow.) Creamy with just a hint of salt to cut the sweetness.

name: B-57
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glasses.

name: Hot and Spicy Dirty Angel
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Tastes like cinnamon iced mocha.

name: French Toast
preparation: Mix ingredients the shot should taste like a piece of french toast.

name: Cunnilingus
preparation: Mix bailey's peach schnapps and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a shot glass. Top with whipped cream.

name: Southern Ireland
preparation: Mix together and shoot or mix 2 oz of each and serve over ice.

name: After Dark
preparation: Layer in order.

name: Jam Donut
preparation: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass and carefully layer the Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Serve.

name: Chocolate Snake Bite
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Baby Guinness
preparation: Pour Kahlua almost filling shot glass. Then carefully pour Baileys using wall of shot glass. This will give the Guinness its head.

name: Pumpkin Pie #2
preparation: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into a tall shot glass. Carefully layer warm Goldschlager on top of the Bailey's and ignite. Sprinkle ground cinnamon over the flame extinguish and serve.

name: Quick Fuck
preparation: Pour into a shot glass; baileys first midori last. Shoot slowly.

name: Chocolate Monk
preparation: Shaken with ice.

name: Copper Camel
preparation: Add the Bailey's Irish Cream to a shot glass and add Butterscotch Schnapps on top.

name: B-51
preparation: This drink is best when shaken and strained but the proper way is to layer the drink. Kahlua is poured first then Bailey's is next and Frangelico is layered on top.

name: Blow Job
preparation: Pour liqueurs into a shot glass and top with whipped cream. Have an individual place their hands behind their back then; pick-up the filled shot glass with their mouth tilt head back and drink.

name: Doug's Modified Cement Mixer
preparation: Put Bailey's into a shot glass about 2/3 full. Fill the rest of the shot with Lemon or Lime juice. Take the shot and swish it around in your mouth. It feels really neat. Swallow it before it becomes solid.

name: Slippery Nipple #2
preparation: Pour sambuca into a shot glass and float Bailey's on top. Enjoy.

name: Ghostbuster
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Brain Hemorrhage
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps into a shot glass. Slowly add the Bailey's top with the grenadine and serve.

name: Kelly's Buttery Nipple
preparation: Mix the three together in a big glass and pour into shot glasses. Top each shot off with whipped cream.

name: Gorilla Snot
preparation: Measure the port into a brandy glass the pour the bailey's in. As the bailey's enters the port it will solidify forming a glob.

name: The Milky Way
preparation: Pour the root beer schnapps into a shot glass and add the irish cream. Top with goldschlager.

name: Cliffhanger
preparation: Mix the kahlua brandy and irish cream together. Garnish with whipped cream. Chill.

name: Attitude Adjustment
preparation: Layer in a shot glass and serve.

name: Brown Eyed Girl
preparation: Layer ingredients in order in a shot glass and serve.

name: Girl Scout Cookie
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Texas Mudslide
preparation: Put ice in a shaker and pour all three ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a glass. This is intended to be more like a shot than a sipping drink.

name: Carrot Cake #2
preparation: Fill mixing cup up with ice. Add ingredients. Shake and strain.

name: Hot Apple Pie #2
preparation: Fill a shot glass half full with the bailey's irish cream and the rest of the way with the goldschlager. Mix with a toothpick. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on the top and light it with a match (it may take a couple of tries to get it to stay lit). Let it burn for a few seconds and gently blow out the flame being careful not to splash the drink out of the glass. Then drink!

name: Bumble Bee
preparation: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!

name: Mudslide
preparation: Pour hershey's chocolate syrup around the inside rim of a rocks glass. Fill with ice add ingredients and serve.

name: Cement Mixer
preparation: Hold one shot of bailey's in your mouth and take one shot of lime juice. Mix rapidly in mouth by shaking head vigorously then consume.

name: Spice Cake
preparation: Mix with ice strain and serve in shot glass.

name: Slick Irish Rootbeer Lollipop
preparation: Pour equal parts into a stainless shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Real Slippery Nipple
preparation: Pour the buttershots and carolanns into a shot glass. (let them mix) Add grenadine to form a perfect nipple in the bottom of the shot glass. Take as shooter lick nipple from bottom of glass.

name: Tonsil Tickler
preparation: Pour Tia Maria coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Carefully layer an equal amount of butterscotch schanpps on top then do the same with Bailey's irish cream and serve.

name: Cement Mixer #3
preparation: Pour the Bailey's into a shot glass until three-quarters full. Add half a teaspoon or a quick squeeze of lemon juice. Quickly consume and let it coagulate inside your mouth then swallow.

name: Patti's Blow Job
preparation: Carefully layer in order into a shot glass. Shoot without hands.

name: Lewinsky
preparation: Pour together into a shot glass and serve.

name: Irish Gold
preparation: Mix half an ounce of goldshlager with half an ounce of bailey's irish cream in a regular shot glass and stir.

name: Rattlesnake Shooter
preparation: Carefully layer each ingredient into a shot or sherry glass in the order listed.

name: Fiery Blue Mustang
preparation: Mix ingredients and light on fire. Blow out flame saddle up and enjoy the ride!

name: Cherry Lover
preparation: Combine the first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well for 20 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with Club Soda.

name: Canoe River Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender 3/4 filled with crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Moon
preparation: Pour the Cointreau orange liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice fill with lemonade and serve.

name: D.P.R.
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

name: Chambord Royale
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a martini glass and serve.

name: White Lily Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Inverted Traffic Light
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Pour in peach schnapps then add orange juice 3/4 to the top and shake. Slowly add and sink the grenadine to the bottom. In a mixer mix the blue curacao with vodka and slowly strain that into the cocktail glass.

name: Darth Vader
preparation: Pour vodkaGinTequilaTriple sec and rum into a Collins glass filled with ice then top with 1/2 oz.Jaegermeister.

name: Baltic Murder Mystery
preparation: Pour vodka and creme de cassis in cocktail glass and fill with 7-up. If it is too sweet try soda water. A slice of lemon compliments the drink quite nicely.

name: Snyder
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Galliano Island Iced Tea
preparation: Serve with ice. Stir vigorously until it has the consistency and appearance of iced tea.

name: Blue Flush
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky peach schnapps blue curacao and cranberry juice all into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses or a single large shot glass and serve.

name: Tea-riffic
preparation: Pour in the 6 oz. of triple sec to the sweet tea and add the juice of 2 lemon wedges to it. Leave lemon wedges in drink then add 5 ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Tight Snatch
preparation: Shake with ice. Serve in ice-filled glass.

name: Green Froggy
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir.

name: Chocolate Martini Lite
preparation: While chilling a cocktail glass shake vodka creme de cacao and milk. Pour into the chilled cocktail glass over 1/2 chunk of Andes mint chocolate candy and serve.

name: Masturbating Butterfly
preparation: Pour Midori Absolut and sour mix into a glass on the rocks. Splash with the Sprite. With a spoon turned scoop side down float your shot of Jager on top. Serve.

name: Esirnus
preparation: Pour midori and chambord over ice in a glass and stir. Partially fill the glass with Sprite. Stir in vodka and add the maraschino cherry.

name: Tattooed Love Goddess
preparation: Fill glass w/ ice add all liquers top off w/cream and shake well.

name: Sunset Breeze
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Dea Lea
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Braindead
preparation: Fill the shaker half with ice cubes and add the ingredients. Shake well. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Absolute Vacation
preparation: Shake everything with ice; pour into glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Give a couple shakes and pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Coke to make it a little dark on the top half (may use more coke for a less stronger drink). Garnish if desired and serve.

name: Gold Wizard
preparation: Shake the Chardonnay the banana liqueur and the vodka together in a cocktail shaker with 2 ice cubes for 30 seconds. Pour into a cocktail glass with a cherry at the bottom and serve.

name: Intercourse
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka and orange juice into a cocktail glass. Stir well. Top with equal amounts of Hawaiian fruit punch and mountain dew and serve.

name: Electric Iced Tea
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Squeeze in lemon wedges stir and serve.

name: Blue Bucky
preparation: Pour all ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #4
preparation: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.

name: Eskimo Slugger
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a small old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Pimp Daddy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a beer mug filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Long Beach Ice Tea
preparation: Garnish with fresh lime cuts.

name: Haleakala Martini
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka Chambord raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hunter Mountain
preparation: Combine bailey's and frangelico over ice and stir. Add vodka stir again and serve.

name: Crantini
preparation: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.( Soak the cranberries in vodka first)

name: Tini Rita
preparation: Chill martini glass with ice and water. Fill cocktail shaker with ice vodka Cointreau Grand Marnier lime juice and sour mix. Shake vigorously until shaker is frosty. Empty martini glass and rim with salt and sugar mix. Pour contents into glass and garnish with lime wedge. Serve.

name: Licking Lisa
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add Absolut vodka and Kahlua Especial to the glass. Top off with Hershey's Chocolate Milk. Great drink for chocolate & coffee lovers.

name: Mount Red
preparation: Add the vodka rum gin and schnapps to a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice and serve with a lime slice.

name: Long Iver Iced Tea
preparation: Pour liquor over ice. Fill 3/4 full with sour mix. Shake. Top with cola and add a lemon wedge.

name: Kamakazie #2
preparation: Pour absolut and cointreau over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Squeeze and drop in lime wedge to taste.

name: Erictini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Pour a splash of grenadine syrup on top and serve.

name: Thai Iced Tea
preparation: Combine Thai tea (i.e. the powder) boiling water and sweetened condensed milk stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

name: Killer Kool-Aid (Rhode Island)
preparation: Pour equal parts into a mug/glass. Add the alcohol first then add the cranberry juice last. This drink may be mixed/stirred but it isn't required.

name: The Lowee
preparation: Stir it up and serve.

name: Blue Passion
preparation: Pour the spiced rum blue curacao and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple flag and serve.

name: San Diego Silver Bullet
preparation: Shake the ingredients over ice strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve. Down it in one.

name: Lara's Russian Qualude
preparation: Combine the three liquors over ice and top with vodka. Stir and serve.

name: Backseat Boogie
preparation: Pour Gin and Vodka over ice followed by the cranberry juice and then the ginger ale.

name: Schnapp It Up
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Martini
preparation: Combine vodka and schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

name: Lake George Iced Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and pour into a highball glass. Fill with pepsi stir gently and serve.

name: Jordan's Blue Razz Buzz
preparation: Combine preferred vodka with Rose's blue raspberry mixer over ice in a highball glass. Fill glass with cold Sprite stir and serve.

name: Absolut Reese's
preparation: Spoon ice cream into a blender pouring vodka and rum over it. Blend together gradually adding ice until desired thickness. Serve in large party cups. Garnish w/ peanut butter cup optional.

name: Electric Ski-mask
preparation: Add vodka and triple sec to a highball glass or old-fashioned glass. Add Rockstar energy drink then add cranberry juice and serve.

name: Strawberry Blonde
preparation: Stir gently with a swizzle stick before serving.

name: Mike's Long Beach
preparation: Shake all the ingredients except the cranberry juice with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled 3/4 with ice. Top with cranberry juice and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Blue Dream
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a pina colada glass over ice. Add the pina colada mix and blue curacao; serve unstirred to see color difference stir when ready to drink. It's very pretty. Serve with whipped cream on top if you wish.

name: Julian's Midori
preparation: Build all ingredients in an old-fashioned with ice cubes and serve.

name: Love Potion
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Liquid Desert
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Serena
preparation: First of all put in the mixing glass absolut vodka then strawberry vodka dry vermouth pineapple juice blue curacao and lemon juice. Now shake with ice and fill up the glass.

name: Black Martini #2
preparation: Combine in shaker. Shake vigorously. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Blue Mountain
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Blue Haze
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a large punch bowl with a large block of ice.

name: Donna Reed
preparation: Pour cranberry juice (more or less to taste) and sour mix over one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend for a few seconds add vodka and blend again until frothy. Serve in a cocktail or margarita glass or freeze until slushy.

name: Purple Passion
preparation: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Charlie Coke
preparation: Add the Absolut Vodka to a cocktail glass filled with ice top off with Coca-Cola.

name: The Bozek
preparation: Add ingrediants in following order: ice vodka lime and then pineapple. Stir vigorously.

name: Green Appletini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into large cocktail glass. Add a big squeeze of lime juice. Garnish with a thin granny smith apple slice and serve.

name: Blue Canary
preparation: Pour the gin grapefruit juice and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Flying Bull
preparation: Pour the rums and Red Bull into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Top with orange juice to taste. Stir well and serve.

name: Bahia
preparation: Pour pineapple juice coconut cream and white rum into a shaker. Add a barspoon of cream. Shake well and strain into a large highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and amarelle cherry and serve.

name: Flying Grapefruit
preparation: Pour the rum vodka cranberry juice and lemon juice into a sugar-frosted highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the cranberry juice then the vermouth and serve.

name: Flying Dutchman
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

name: Olympia-Flip
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with fine cracked almonds.

name: Colada Brazil
preparation: Blend ingredients together with crushed ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Russian Cadillac
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Flying Cow
preparation: Add liquors and banana to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Add cream to taste. Blend until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Flying Fairbrother
preparation: Combine the grapefruit juice orange juice cranberry juice and honey in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale stir well and serve.

name: Flying Teetsie Fly
preparation: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

name: Amy's Risky Passion
preparation: Pour the vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the juices gently top with passoa and serve.

name: Coconut Lips
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice add a pineapple chunk and an amarelle cherry and serve.

name: Florida Freeze
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 3/4 cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Flying Scotsman
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Island Punch
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add the white rum. Fill with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with cherries.

name: Goldberg
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Flying Masturbator
preparation: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Add OJ until the cup is about half full add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full add ice to fill the cup and shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

name: Chambord Colada
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir vigorously and serve.

name: Alice Cocktail
preparation: Shake well strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Flying Fortress
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Flying Grasshopper
preparation: Shake briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve with a short straw in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Flying Moose
preparation: Pour liquors into a highball glass balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

name: Wedding Anniversary
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Flying Squadron
preparation: First add some ice. Then pour in your jack daniels. Finally add pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.

name: Flying Monkey
preparation: Layer each ingredient starting with kahlua then bailey's and finish with the banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.

name: Desert Sunrise
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with grenadine and serve.

name: Flying Purple Squirrel
preparation: Combine the rums curacao grenadine and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime and serve.

name: Blue Knickers
preparation: Shake the Vodka Blue Curacao Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

name: Flying Fuck
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Kangaroo
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chillled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

name: Golden Colada
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Kangaroo Kicker
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Flying Guinness
preparation: Pour half pint of Guinness into a bubble pint glass. Then place a spoon over the top of the glass upside down then pour the Red Bull or energy drink over the top of the spoon (this helps the drink seperate). Serve.

name: 42 Flying Mules
preparation: Slice the half lime into 4 seperate wedges. Muddle the wedges and chili with a dash of lemon juice and transfer to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the vodka and sake and shake well. Pour the contents including ice into a highball glass. Top with ginger beer to taste and serve.

name: Malibu Twister
preparation: Pour malibu rum into a glass and add tropicana; orange strawberry or pineapple. Add cranberry juice and stir.

name: Naked Twister
preparation: Pour midori vodka and tuaca into a pint glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice and top with 7-up. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Arizona Twister
preparation: Mix in the shots of rum vodka and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

name: Tropical Titty Twister
preparation: Mix in glass then shake.

name: Lemon Twister
preparation: Shake together stirring bruises the vodka.

name: Cranberry Twister
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a punch bowl and serve chilled in a cup full of ice.

name: Coconut Orange
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the orange juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange on the rim and serve.

name: Acapulco Twister
preparation: Mix the lemon tabasco sauce clamato juice salt and pepper. Fill the glass with some ice add the rum and fill with Corona beer.

name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
preparation: 1. Place both cans of cream of coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. 2. Pour the pineapple juice orange juice cream of coconut and grenadine into a large punch bowl. Add the rum (to taste) or add it seperately to each drink later. (1 1/2 ounce per 12 ounce serving kids will enjoy it without rum.) Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. 3. Serve in glasses over crushed ice. Garnish each drink with a pineapple and orange wedge and a maraschino cherry on a tooth pick.

name: Naked Twister Shots
preparation: Pour both ingredients into seperate shot glasses. Drink half the Pepsi shoot the Bacardi Limon then finish the Pepsi shot. Rinse and repeat.

name: Shogun
preparation: Mix in blender and garnish with orange slice.

name: Navel Caribbean Love
preparation: Pour malibu into a hurricane glass and slowly add the orange juice.

name: Malibu Bomber
preparation: Pour Malibu rum over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add orange juice and cranberry juice and splash with key largo schnapps. Stir and serve.

name: Penelope
preparation: Mix alcohols in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Add the juice and grenadine and shake. Pour into a hurricane glass (incl. ice) add puree and serve.

name: Coco Rush
preparation: Add OJ Cranberry juice and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.

name: Orange Rush
preparation: Blend ingredients with ice. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orange Fizz Shot
preparation: Mix Absolut Citron vodka and peach schnapps together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a shot glass. To a seperate larger glass add the Red Bull and orange juice. Drop the shot glass into the larger glass and chug.

name: Caribbean Sunset #3
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Passoa Orange
preparation: Pour the Passoa into a collins glass almost filled with ice. Fill to the top with orange juice stir well and serve.

name: Blood Orange Cosmo
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Tropical Sunset
preparation: Start off with the Malibu Cocanut rum poured over ice. Fill glass (mug) almost to top. add orange juice and a splash of cranberry juice or grenadine. Can add a cherry

name: Barbie Shot
preparation: In shaker tin with ice mix and shake all ingredients.

name: Orange Bomb #2
preparation: Pour Red bull into a beer mug. Pour the orange vodka seperately into a shot glass drop into the beer mug and chug.

name: Orange Rita
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh orange and lime slices.

name: Caribbean Sunset
preparation: Combine melon liqueur and malibu rum together in a hurricane glass. Slowly pour cranberry juice on top until it fills half the remaining space. Float orange juice on top and serve.

name: Orange Margarita
preparation: Combine tequila triple sec and orange juice over ice in a margarita glass. Stir top with lime juice or sour mix and serve.

name: Crushed Orange
preparation: Pour Cointreau sweetened lime juice and Absolut Mandarin vodka over 8 ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. If available garnish with a slice of fresh orange on glass rim. Serve immediately while it is still extremely cold.

name: Purple Nurple #1
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Orange Dream
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Orange Smile
preparation: Combine the juice of one large orange with the egg and grenadine. Shake with ice strain into a wine glass and serve.

name: Orange Coffee Cocktail
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker (coffee last so as to not melt the ice). Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Perch an orange slice on the rim and serve.

name: Muscovy Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli cinnamon vodka (Zinamon) Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) triple sec and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel first squeezing it over the drink then dropping it on top. Sprinkle a bit of ground cinnamon over the top and serve.

name: Orange Jeff
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with slices or pieces of tropical fruit add a straw and serve.

name: Mozart Orange
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass. Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass add a straw and serve.

name: Malibu Sunset
preparation: Pour Malibu rum into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Add pineapple juice and orange juice. Top off with a splash of cranberry juice garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Mochatini
preparation: Shake all ingredents with ice in a martini shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Orange Creamsicle
preparation: Pour advocaat into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with cracked ice. Add 7-Up or Sprite to taste stir gently and serve.

name: Ohranj Blossom
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) triple sec orange juice and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tropical Orgasm #2
preparation: Add all ingredients. Shake and pour into glass with ice.

name: Orange Safari
preparation: Build over ice in highball glass. Stir.

name: Orange Tic Tac
preparation: Pour the Red Bull into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Bacardi O rum and serve.

name: Orange Champagne
preparation: Mix ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: Ohranj Julius
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) triple sec sour mix and orange juice into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Ohrangarita
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) triple sec sour mix and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Creamsicle #2
preparation: Pour the vanilla vodka into a collins glass with ice. Add orange crush til it tastes good. Serve.

name: Creature from the Black Lagoon
preparation: Combine both the Grey Goose vanilla vodka and the green creme de menthe in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass that has been drizzled with chocolate syrup. Enjoy!

name: Dimple Cocktail
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps and Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry and orange juices. Garnish the drink with 2 cherries and serve.

name: Flame of Love
preparation: Swirl the sherry in an old-fashioned glass to coat. Add vodka garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Orange Amnesia
preparation: To successfully mix this large quantity of drink I recommend a gallon jug with a screw-down lid. Fill the gallon jug half full of 7-up Sierra Mist or any other decent lemon lime soda. Next add in four cups of Sunny Delight. Add all six packets of Crystal Light classic orange screw down the lid and shake until the contents are mixed thoroughly. Pour the orange mix into a punch bowl. Immediately add both bottles of vodka and the remaining lemon lime soda and sunny delight. If desired add a bottle or two of Bawls to the mix for an added kick. Serve chilled. Serves up to five people very well!

name: Blue Dragonfly
preparation: Combine the Hpnotiq liqueur and Absolut Vanilla vodka over ice in a chilled cocktail glass. Top with Sprite and serve.

name: Soho Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Death by Chocolate Martini
preparation: Mix 3 tablespoons Oreo cookie crumbs (available in most groceries in baking isle) plus 1 tablesoon powdered sugar on a flat plate. Coat rim of chilled cocktail Martini glass with lime and then dip rim of glass in Oreo mixture. Set aside. Mix Godiva liqueur creme de cacao vodka and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into the set aside cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Albino Russian
preparation: Pour the vanilla vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: Slippery Panties
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Melon Starburst
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cherrylicious
preparation: Add all ingredients together in a shaker half filled with ice. Shake until chilled. Strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Love Potion #9
preparation: Pour kool-aid into a jug add vodka and rum 1 pouch of kool-aid (cherry or orange) cover and shake.

name: Guinness Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a medium-large chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Carrot Cake Martini
preparation: Combine the vanilla vodka toffee liqueur and Aftershock cinnamon schnapps in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bukhara Coffee
preparation: Stir the vodka Bailey's Irish Cream and creme de cacao in a large preheated mug. Pour into boiling hot coffee top with whipped cream and serve. Alternatively for a cold drink chill all the ingredients until ice cold. Mix in a chilled stemmed glass and top with whipped cream. Add a scoop of vanilla or chocolate ice cream if desired.

name: Love in a Glass
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into two glasses. Great for weddings.

name: Ultimate Chocolate Martini
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and serve. To enhance appearance drizzle chocolate syrup into glass before pouring martini. Note: do not substitute creme de cocoa or any other chocolate flavored liquor for the Godiva liquors as they are the key to the drink and well-worth the added expense. After this chocolate martini cheap imitations made with creme de cocoa are unacceptable.

name: Dark 'n Stormy
preparation: Mix ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice and serve.

name: Dark and Stormy #2
preparation: Pour rum into a tall glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Serve.

name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
preparation: In a moderately sized glass (about 8 to 12 oz or so) pour in finely crushed ice followed by the cinnamon schnapps and vanilla vodka.

name: Slippery Nutcracker
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Lynna's Gingerbread Man
preparation: Pour vodka over a couple of ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Add ginger beer garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: B-2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Key Lime Martini #2
preparation: Pour vodka Ke Ke Beach liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve with a twist of lime.

name: Black Russian #4
preparation: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mixing glass with a few ice cubes and stir well. Pour that and the Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass and stir. Pour Guinness on top from a height to create a creamy head and serve.

name: Fudgesicle
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Add a straw and serve.

name: Lesbian Love
preparation: Layer in above order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Black and White Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli vanilla vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with black and white licorice candy and serve.

name: Love Wrench
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Undertaker
preparation: In a martini shaker over ice add the Vanilla Vodka Kahlua and Creme de Cacao. Shake. Strain ice and pour into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Stir in the chilled espresso and serve.

name: Della's After Dark
preparation: Place ice in blender add remaining items and mix well into a slushi. Pour into a large glass of 16 oz or more hurricane glass is recommended. Top drinks with whipped topping and a whole cherry and drizzle coco syrup over whipped topping. Add a large straw into glass preferably a large plastic flex straw. Maybe strong tasting due to Kamora so you can dilute mix with vodka if desired.

name: Chocolate Cake Martini
preparation: Fill two cocktail glasses with ice water; set aside. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice add vanilla vodka creme de cacao and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur. Shake vigorously. Empty glasses of ice water and dip edges into a flat dish filled with sweetened cocoa powder. Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the 2 cocktail glasses and add a twist of lemon to each before serving.

name: Tony Roma's Chocolate Martini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Key Lime Martini #3
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve. Optional: Coat rim of glass with crushed graham crakers and top with a squirt of whipped cream.

name: Key Lime Martini
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Mama's Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli Vanil vodka apricot brandy angostura bitters and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: First Love
preparation: Pour the champagne gin sugar and cherry heering into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pepe's Flame of Love Martini
preparation: Swirl a few drops of la ina sherry in a chilled cocktail glass and pour back out. Squeeze a strip of orange peel into the glass flame' it with a match then discard burnt peel. Fill the glass with ice cubes; until chilled and remove ice. Add vodka flame' another orange peel around the rim then discard burnt peel. Stir gently and serve. By Pepe Ruiz of Beverly Hills Chasen's Restaurant.

name: Ca-Boom
preparation: Place the vanilla vodka in a martini shaker and fill the shaker with the diet lime Coke. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Love Potion #69
preparation: Pour the coconut rum and peach schnapps into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice and fill with cranberry juice. Splash rum on top and serve.

name: Arise My Love
preparation: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

name: Black Pearls
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Love Byte
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Garnish with a piece of pineapple and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Chewbacca
preparation: Build as listed garnish with orange then scream like a wookie.

name: Dark and Stormy
preparation: Pour rum over ice add ginger ale and stir. NOTE: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum.

name: Caribbean Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice. Pour into glass.

name: Long Kiss Goodnight Martini
preparation: Freeze a martini glass with shaved chocolate on rim. In a shaker put ice stoli vanilla stoli vodka and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into the martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

name: Creme Soda
preparation: Stir ingredients gently together in a chilled cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice and serve.

name: Deja Vu
preparation: Put ice into double old-fashioned glass. Add one or two shots of vanilla vodka depending on preference. Add 6 oz. (half a can) of root beer or diet root beer.

name: Key Lime Pie Martini
preparation: Coat the rim of chilled cocktail glass with lime and dip rim in a mixture of 2 tablespoons crushed grahm crackers and 1 tablespoon powdered sugar(on a flat plate). Set glass aside. Mix Vodka Ke Ke Beach Liqueur Rose's and fresh lime juice and half and half in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and pour into the set aside chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Dark Nightmare
preparation: Mix milk last. Stir. Enjoy.

name: Dark Destroyer
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Lambraz
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka over plenty of ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add goldschlager peppermint schnapps and top with Bailey's irish cream.

name: The Dark Side
preparation: Mix all ingredients in mixer pour into highball glass. Optional - Frost glass with chocolate syrup before pouring.

name: Ovaltini
preparation: Rim a cocktail glass with ovaltine cocoa powder. Add Stoli Vanil vodka and white creme de cacao to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into the prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with a Hershey kiss and serve.

name: Espresso Martini
preparation: Pour coffee liqueur vodka and espresso into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled Martini (cocktail) glass and serve. The drink should be slightly frothy.

name: James Bond Martini #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Amy
preparation: Shake Vodka Gin and Lillet in a mixer with ice and pour with the orange juice in a cocktail glass.

name: Kamel Drivare
