preparation: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass and layer the bailey's by pouring over a spoon into the same glass. Do not allow to mix.

name: Banana Cream Pie #2
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: B-52
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in order into a shot glass; kahlua amaretto then irish cream.

name: Killer Sniff
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a small rocks glass. Ignite allow to burn momentarily and extinguish before serving.

name: Flaming Gorilla
preparation: Pour into shot glass layering ingredients from top to bottom. Light on fire and extinguish after 15 seconds.

name: Flaming Asshole
preparation: Layer in this order: grenadine creme de menthe banana liqueur white rum. Ignite rum before serving. Server with a straw.

name: Gingerbread Man
preparation: Layer in sequence in a shot glass.

name: Jellyfish #2
preparation: Mix blue curacao and sambuca together in a double-shot glass. Layer Bailey's irish cream on top. Drop grenadine over the Bailey's to make the apperance of the jellyfish and serve.

name: B-55 #2
preparation: Carefully layer the ingredients in order into a shot glass; kahlua at the bottom followed by irish cream and topped with absinthe.

name: Toronto Maple Leafs
preparation: Layer in shot glass.

name: Slapper
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: B-53
preparation: Layer the Kahlua Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glass in that order. Better than B-52

name: Dirty Nipple
preparation: Layer the ingredients in order - the Bailey's must be on top.

name: Da Monkey
preparation: Layer the Kahlua and creme de bananes in that order into a shot glass. Top with Bailey's Irish cream and serve.

name: Sinfonian
preparation: In the shot glass layer equal parts of each liquor the Grenadine on the bottom the Kahlua in the middle and the Grand Marnier on top. This creates Red Black and Gold layers.

name: Skid Marks
preparation: Add Chocolate syrup at bottom of shot glass. Add Kahlua and stir with a small spoon. Enjoy!

name: Pumpkin Pie
preparation: Slowly layer the ingredients in the order listed above into a large shot glass.

name: Flaming Hot Chocolate
preparation: Fill a shot glass three-quarters full with creme de cacao. Top with Bacardi 151 rum and ignite. Allow to burn for 10- 20 seconds extinguish and serve.

name: Blue and White
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Muff Diver
preparation: Mix all the alcohol in a shaker with ice and strain into a shot glass. Place shot glass into a wide-mouth rocks or old-fashioned glass fill with whipped cream and add a cherry if desired. Shoot without hands.

name: K.G.B. #2
preparation: Layer/float the ingredients in a shot glass. Make sure galliano is on top.

name: Bruce's Puce
preparation: In a regular-sized shot glass layer with a spoon or cherry the grenadine the Kahlua then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

name: Flaming Dr.
preparation: Pour both into a pint glass mix and drink.

name: Flaming Blue Lamborghini
preparation: Take the 151 and put it into a cocktail glass. Light it on fire. Put two straws into the drink begin to drink and immediately pour the Kahlua and Spiced Rum into the glass. Then pour the Blue Maui and Milk into the glass and finish the drink off.

name: American Dream
preparation: Chill with ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Flaming Orgasm
preparation: Pour rum into a shot glass and the beer into a large mug. Light the rum on fire and drop into the beer. Make sure that the fire is out then slam.

name: Napalm-Death
preparation: Carefully layer into a shot glass in equal parts and in order; kahlua first.

name: Mint Chocolate
preparation: Mix in shot glass.

name: Pierced Nipple
preparation: Shake with ice strain into shot glass.

name: Ice Bolts
preparation: Mix kahlua and tonic water with crushed ice and strain into a glass with ice.

name: Black Death
preparation: In a layering glass layer the ingredients in the following order: Kahlua Romana Sambuca Bailey's and half and half.

name: Flaming Tiki Torch
preparation: Place 2 highball glasses next to each other one right side up and one upside down. Stack a shot glass on on in between the two highball glasses. Combine the Malibu rum peach schnapps and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Fill the right side up tall glass half way with Smirnoff Ice. Pour the contents of your cocktail shaker into the shot glass. Add a splash of Razzmatazz and 151 to the shot glass. Next step is optional; either light the top of the shot with a match or blow fire at it with 151 in your mouth. Then knock the shot glass into the tall glass and serve.

name: Flaming Blue
preparation: Mix into a shot glass and splash the bacardi on the very top. Be careful not to mix it into the rest of the drink. Then carefully light the rum on fire with a match. Blow out the flame and drink it fast before the rim gets too hot.

name: Flaming 7-7
preparation: Pour the Seagram's 7 Crown whiskey into a double-shot glass. Seperately pour the 7-Up into a highball glass. Ignite the Seagram's 7 on fire (use extreme caution) and drop into the highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Psychadelic Tiger
preparation: First put the Kahlua at the bottom of the shot-glass then pour in the gomme syrup. The gomme sinks to the bottom then add a splash of grenadine in the middle. It will sink through the kahlua and create a lava-lamp style effect. Then add the Blue Curacau on top of the Kahlua.

name: Flaming Pumpkin
preparation: Layer in order then light on fire and sprinkle some cinnamon on top. Extinguish fire and serve.

name: Coffee Crisp Shot
preparation: Pour first three in order layer Bailey's on top.

name: Bananas and Cream
preparation: Stir until ingredients are mixed well.

name: Flaming Ho
preparation: Take a shot glass and add the brown sugar and the flakes of dried prune. Fill the glass with 2/3 Midori melon liqueur and 1/3 tequila. Ignite it let it burn for about 10 seconds and then blow out the flame. Bottoms up!

name: Flaming Blue Fuck
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass. Ignite and drink through a straw quickly.

name: New York Motherfucker #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into collins glass. Garnish with a lemon. Serve.

name: Flaming Delicious
preparation: Combine Everclear Aristocrat vodka triple sec and tequila in a cocktail shaker. Add heavy cream salt and molasses and decant into a wine goblet. Apply a flame wait for 10 seconds then cover goblet. Apply lemon twists and Worcestershire sauce and consume.

name: Jenny's Banana Pudding
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: French Connection #2
preparation: Combine ingredients into a snifter and serve neat or add a small amount of ice if desired.

name: Flaming Mouthwash
preparation: Pour the green creme de menthe into a shot glass. Add blue curacao top with Everclear and ignite. Take care and extinguish before consuming.

name: Island Breeze #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass. Add ice as desired and serve.

name: Black Unicorn
preparation: Pour in kahlua then butterscotch schnapps. Layer Irish cream on top.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Shot
preparation: Add in the order written and mix then add the grenadine.

name: Pineapple Tea
preparation: Add liquors and sour mix to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with pineapple juice (to taste) and serve.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
preparation: 1. Fill a shot glass about 3/4 full with amaretto and top it off with enough 151 proof rum to be able to burn. 2. Place the shot glass in another glass and fill the outer glass with beer (right up to the level of the shot glass). 3. Ignite the amaretto/151 and let it burn for a while. Blow it out (or leave it burning if you're brave - not recommended) and slam it. Tastes just like Dr. Pepper. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'duNmx3ODovQ6S1rqg5yplIZEBEqvH_-x' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Lava Lamp #2
preparation: In a shot glass pour kahlua strawberry liqueur and frangelico. Float bailey's irish cream on top of the other spirits and dribble 2-3 drops of advocaat on top.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper #2
preparation: Fill the shot glass about 3/4 full with amaretto and top it off with enough 151 proof rum to make it burn. Put the shot glass in another glass and fill the new glass with beer (right up to the level of the shot glass). Light the amaretto/151 and let it burn a while. Blow it out (or leave it burning if you're brave) and slam it. Tastes just like Dr. Pepper.

name: The Red and Black
preparation: Pour the kahlua into a shot glass. Carefully layer the grenadine on top and serve.

name: Smashing Pumpkin
preparation: Add ingredients to a small shaker with ice. Stir. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Miami Beach
preparation: Mix ingredients together over ice in a collins glass. Pour into a shaker. Shake a couple times and pour ingredients back into glass. Garnish with lemon.

name: H-Bomb Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Braindead #2
preparation: Fill 2/3rds of a shot glass with white sambuca and layer Kahlua down side of glass. Allow it to settle at the bottom. Drop in small amounts of advocaat and cherry advocaat. The advocaat will seperate giving the look of a brain. Using a straw suck out half of the concoction shot the remainder then immediately cup your hand over the shot glass insert the straw between you fingers and suck out the vapours.

name: Eliminator #2
preparation: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Add the Jack Daniel's whiskey then tequila. Place a thin film of 151 rum on top; ignite extinguish and serve.

name: Nuttylua
preparation: Stir the Kahlua and hazelnut-flavor creamer together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Flaming JT Bomber
preparation: Layer the first 4 ingredients in a shot glass or pony glass. Carefully flame the 151 rum (the 1/4 oz) and slowly pour on top. Serve.

name: Evil Spell #2
preparation: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour rye whisky maple syrup and fill with freshly pressed apple juice. Stir until maple syrup has dissolved and add cinnamon stick. Garnish with apple slice and serve.

name: Backseat Boogie #2
preparation: Pour vodka and gin over ice in a collins glass. Fill with equal parts of ginger ale and cranberry juice. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Flaming Lamborghini #2
preparation: Take a martini glass and set it on the table. Inside the martini glass put 1/2 ounce of curacao blue and 1/2 ounce of chartreuse green. Then place a 2 inch wide spacer on top of the martini glass so that you can place 3 cocktail glasses one on top of the other above the martini glass (upside down). Inside a separate brandy glass put 1 and 1/2 ounces of white sambuca and heat with an open flame and allow to catch on fire. Once lit pour the sambuce over the top upside down cocktail glass and let the flaming liquid flow down once it reaches the bottom glass. Pour 1 ounce of galliano and 1 ounce of baileys into the martini glass where you already should have the 1/2 ounce of chartreuse and 1/2 ounce of curacao. Place a straw in the martini glass and the party drinking the drink sucks it dry and hopefully doesnt catch on fire. Enjoy.

name: Sit on my face
preparation: Layer in order.

name: Zimamazing
preparation: Put the first six ingredients in a shaker glass without ice and shake until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker glass at the time so it is a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.(depending on the ice) Tastes like an Electric Lemonade with Zima instead of lemon-lime soda and more sour mix. Instead of triple sec you can also use blue curacao. It makes it a pretty blue-green drink. Also keep a LOT of extra ice on hand because this drink has so much alcohol it melts the ice immediately which is why you should not put ice in the shaker it will dilute the drink.

name: Kokopa
preparation: Layer. Peppermint schnapps first then the kahlua on top.

name: Cockroach
preparation: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and mix. Sing a verse of La Cucaracha or sing la-la-la-la-laaa lots. Bonus points if you can sing it in Spanish. Continue until you can no longer sing la-la-la-la-laaaaa.

name: Justine #2
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a shot glass. Chase with a slice of lime.

name: Rhino
preparation: Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass. Ignite burn for a few seconds and extinguish. Serve.

name: Fireball #2
preparation: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Add the sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce (or 2 - 3 coffee beans). Pour some sambuca all over the glass and ignite. Let it burn for approx. 10 to 20 seconds. Sip through a straw or extinguish to drink.

name: Tossed Salad
preparation: Dip rim of shot glass in chocolate syrup. Add Kahlua and Jgermeister. Place arms behind back. Drink shot using mouth only (a la blowjob).

name: Punheta
preparation: Pour sambuca followed by blue curacao. This should layer slightly. Share with a special friend.

name: Crispy Crunch
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Grateful Dead #3
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add each liquor fill with sour mix and stir. Add a splash of 7-up or sprite and serve.

name: Black Cat #2
preparation: Pour the Kirschwasser vodka and grenadine into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola to taste and serve.

name: Lover's Kiss #2
preparation: Fill a parfait glass with ice-cubes add ingredients and stir until pink. Absente may be used instead of Absinthe with several dashes of wormwood extract.

name: Miraclazing
preparation: Add all Ingredients into 1/2 glass of ice. Pour all into mixer and shake. Pour all back into glass and top with more Sweet and Sour. Drink should have some fizz on top. Use a top shelf Tequila to up the grade of the drink.

name: California Iced Tea
preparation: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Ragnar #2
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a tall or highball glass filled with ice. Add rose's lime (to taste) fill with sprite and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Long Island Ice Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass (incl. ice) and serve.

name: Burried Treasure #2
preparation: Pour the rum and Goldschlager into a shot glass and serve. Also works best when screaming Arrrr! immediately after consumption.

name: Grateful Dead Punch
preparation: In a large container such as a 1 gallon water jug put in 1/3 of the bottle of rum 1/3 of the vodka 1/3 of the triple sec and 1/3 of the sour mix. Add the grapes in to make sure they soak up some of the alcohol. Let it sit for a while or continue combining depending on how strong you want your grapes. Combine the rest with the cranberry juice and the sprite. It should be a dark red color that's got fizz to it but shouldn't be completely diluted. You're ready to go!

name: Old Fashioned (Sweet) #2
preparation: Add drops of bitters to bottom of glass and stir in sugar. Once bitters and sugar are combined add ice and pour in brandy. Top off with 7-up/Sprite and add a splash of grenadine. Serve with cherry/orange slice. Also works with whiskey.

name: Full Moon #2
preparation: Tilt a brandy snifter and pour in the amaretto. While still tilting add grand marnier. Gently roll snifter in the tilted position set upright and serve.

name: Lion Tamer #2
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass. Add Sprite and a splash of lemon juice. Add ice and serve.

name: Fish House Punch #2
preparation: Heat water. Stir in sugar tea and honey and allow to boil. Add liquors stir well and simmer. Stir in lime juice and peels. Serve hot in heat-resistant cups or glasses or cool seal and bottle.

name: Five in the Morning
preparation: Place ice in glass and pour in the five liquors. Next pour in the the orange juice and the sour mix. Finally shake and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Metropolitan #2
preparation: Build ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain carefully into a sugar-rimmed 10-oz cocktail glass so as not to knock sugar off rim. Garnish with a large lemon twist and serve.

name: Phillips Head
preparation: Mix everything together with lots of ice.

name: Sex on the Beach - Bettsy Style
preparation: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

name: Sex on the Beach - Jersey Style
preparation: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liqueurs in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm On The Beach
preparation: Fill glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all liquors and speed shake. Top with club soda.

name: Gayhound
preparation: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

name: Blindside
preparation: Pour strawberry syrup orange juice and grapefruit juice into a large glass. Add vodka and serve.

name: Lysekil's Groggen
preparation: Add vodka then orange juice and stir. Fill with schweppes russian and ice cubes.

name: Virgin Sex On The Beach
preparation: Mix equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice add nectar and pour over ice. Sink the grenadine garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Doggy Style On the Beach
preparation: Add all ingredients (except 7-Up) to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass top with 7-Up and serve.

name: Sex on The Beach #13
preparation: Pour peach schnapps Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum into a hurricane glass. Add juices add a straw and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients together over ice. Chill and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Shannon on the Beach
preparation: Mix the two alcohols and fill with orange and cranberry juice.

name: Sex on the Beach #10
preparation: Shake vigorously with some ice strain into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Peach on the Beach
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the vodka schnapps and pineapple juice. Fill with cranberry juice. Stir and serve.

name: After Sex
preparation: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar.

name: Sex on the Beach #8
preparation: Pour the rum into a highball glass. Almost-fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine and sprite. Coconut rum can be substituted for malibu rum.

name: Safe Sex on the Beach
preparation: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Grapefruit and Orange Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Buzzsaw
preparation: Pour the vodka citrus juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #12
preparation: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.

name: Goat Juice For Everyone
preparation: Mix the vodka and grapefruit juice in a cooler with a ratio of 1 vodka to 2 grapefruit. Serve with ice in cups.

name: Anyie on the Beach
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec and peach schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill halfway with club soda garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Vodka Sunrise
preparation: Mix vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine and serve.

name: Key Lime Shooter
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into 2 shot glasses.

name: Texas Cool-Aid
preparation: Pour over ice shake until cooled then pour into glass.

name: Wu Wu
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of orange and cranberry juice and serve.

name: Matteress
preparation: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a highball glass followed by orange juice. Add a splash of cranberry juice and serve.

name: Klondike Cooler
preparation: Mix powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add blended whiskey. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add twist of lemon peel and orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Cabin Cooler
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher and chill preferably in ice. Pour into suitable glasses. Garnish rim of each glass with a lime slice and serve.

name: Floradora Cooler
preparation: Add the lime juice grenadine and sugar to a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add gin and top with club soda. Stir well and serve.

name: Raspberry Cooler
preparation: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Stop Light
preparation: Line up three shot glasses. Pour 1 shot of vodka into each glass. Add a splash of midori to one a splash of orange juice to another and a splash of cranberry juice to the third. Drink them down Red Yellow Green. It's a stop light!

name: Key West Rootbeer
preparation: Shake root beer schnapps and Jagermeister with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into shot glass. Add a splash of Coke and serve.

name: Malibu Reggae Rainbow
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Pour in the Malibu rum then Midori melon liqueur (which will sink to the bottom). Gently pour in pineapple juice. Do not shake. Gently splash in a bit of cranberry juice. Do not mix. Drink will be layered from top to bottom; green yellow red.

name: The Jolly Rancher
preparation: Shake ingredients and serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Key West Key Lime Pie Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Take a small slice of lime squeeze in a martini glass and leave slice in glass. Strain drink into glass.

name: Maddress
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add the juices stir briefly and serve.

name: Vodka Cooler
preparation: Pour the vodka and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Cactus Cooler
preparation: Fill a shot glass half with triple sec half mandarin vodka; then drop into a pint glass half-filled with Rockstar energy drink and serve.

name: Curacao Cooler
preparation: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Add a spiral of lime and serve.

name: Caribbean Cooler
preparation: Whirl all ingredients together in a blender at low speed for 10 - 15 seconds with 1 cup of crushed ice. Pour into a wine goblet. Garnish with grated coconut and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cranberry Toad
preparation: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Key Largo OJ
preparation: Add ice and then equal parts of key largo and orange juice. Mix and enjoy.

name: A Roa
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker shake 3 - 4 times and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Bahia Cooler
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Key Lime Quencher
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 12-oz. (1 1/2 cups) of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a 16-oz hurricane or specialty glass. Garnish with a lime wheel sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs and serve.

name: Gorky Park Cooler
preparation: Shake or blend over ice and pour into a large chilled wine goblet. Add ice cubes if necessary and garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Key West Song
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Key West Lemonade
preparation: Mix vodka and sweet and sour mix proportionally in any size batch then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly a dash each per serving. Directions are for single regular bar size servings.

name: Malibu Woo Woo
preparation: Add the vodka and Malibu to a cocktail shaker with ice shake vigorously. Pour into a chilled highball glass and top up with cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Confusion
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Mister Wu
preparation: Pour two ounces of whiskey and one ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #2
preparation: Pour creme de cacao vodka and cream into a blender. Add ice half a sliced banana and sugar to taste. Blend until smooth and pureed and pour into a glass. Serve.

name: Angel's Kiss #2
preparation: Pour the vodka and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.

name: Masala Chai #2
preparation: 1. Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon cardamom and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. 2. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves cover and turn off the heat. Sit for 2 minutes. 3. Strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

name: Cuban Breeze #2
preparation: Pour vodka and amaretto into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Creamsicle #2
preparation: Stir with a straw.

name: Big Red Hooter #2
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a pint glass or 500ml tall glass. Fill to the top with ice. Carefully add the vodka which should remain seperate above the Midori. Pour orange and cranberry juice in equal measures until the glass is 3/4 full. Pour a ring of cherry brandy. Add 1/3 of a can of red-bull (or similar energy drink) and finally pour a ring of galliano on top and serve. When done correctly the glass will be almost full there will be a green layer at the bottom from the midori and the rest of the drink will be red.

name: Happy Megan
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl. Adjust to taste.

name: Gecko
preparation: Add vodka triple sec then blue curacao. Fill with orange juice.

name: Happy Hawaiian
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with pineapple juice or add to taste and serve.

name: Happy Honey Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a small martini glass.

name: Happy Face
preparation: Pour gin vodka liqueur tonic and pina colada into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Crack an egg and drop into shaker. Shake well and strongly. Pour the shaker contents (with ice) into glass and fill up the glass with orange juice. Garnish with two cherrys and a slice of lemon with puting it on the top of the egg foam so that it makes a happy face.

name: Happy Skipper
preparation: Pour captain morgan's spiced rum over ice and fill the glass with ginger ale. Garnish with lime.

name: Orange Venom
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.Garnish with orange wheel or wedge.

name: Fuzzy Logic
preparation: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice shake and pour.

name: Happy Juice
preparation: Combine the schnapps and Malibu rum in a highball glass; add in the pineapple juice. Add in the mango nectar and guava juice til the taste is suitable (may want to go light on the guava juice for it's heavy distinctive taste) then top off with a splash of passion fruit juice and serve.

name: Hawaiian Screw #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Orange Smartie
preparation: Pour the vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice to taste. Shake well pour contents into a highball glass and serve.

name: Happy Birthday Motherfucker
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Happy Camper
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Happy Hollander
preparation: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Happy Camper #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Happy Monkey
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass vodka first and Sprite last. Serve.

name: Happy Colada
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice and serve.

name: Jamie's Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Happy Youth
preparation: Pour the cherry brandy and orange juice over the sugar in a champagne flute. Add the champagne and serve.

name: Happy New Year
preparation: Shake brandy port and orange juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: P.T.O.
preparation: Pour the rum vodka triple sec and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Hairy Happy Trail
preparation: Mix with whatever is available.

name: Tampon String
preparation: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

name: Body Shot
preparation: Using a partner of the opposite sex lick their neck to moisten. Pour packet of sugar onto their neck. Place wedge of lemon in their mouth with the skin pointed inward. You first lick the sugar from their neck then shoot the vodka then suck the lemon from their mouth (while gently holding back of their neck).

name: Apple Pie Shot #2
preparation: Bang glass on table and immediately take shot.

name: Lemon Drop #2
preparation: Place sugar on lemon place in mouth and take shot then bite down on lemon.

name: Melonchawsey
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake Shot
preparation: Frost the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar and lemon. Add the vanilla vodka and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur; stir together. Lick the sugar rim shoot the mixture and bite a piece of lemon. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'k5MGx3ODrC63nxNDenxP4yBAbm_a5goO' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Fuzzy Russian
preparation: Mix both ingredients in a shot glass. Tilt head back. Swallow.

name: Fong Juice
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add malibu then add pineapple juice. Stir.

name: Funky Cold Medina
preparation: Pour over ice and top off with cranberry juice.

name: Malibu Barbie
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a collins glass and serve.

name: 2000 Flushes
preparation: Combine the Captain Morgan Original spiced rum and Parrot Bay mango rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add Sprite and lemonade and serve.

name: China White
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice shake strain into shot glass.

name: Mind Eraser #2
preparation: Place three to four ice cubes in a small narrow glass. Carefully layer the kahlua vodka and finally the sprite. (Sprite should be about half of the shot or to taste.) Serve unstirred with a wide straw.

name: Under Kurant
preparation: Shake the absolut kurant blue curacao and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a shot or low-ball glass be sure and leave a bit of room to spare. Add just enough chambord to color the bottom of the glass.

name: Tropical Dream
preparation: Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.

name: Black and Blue
preparation: Layer in order.

name: White Cotton Panties
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Purple Motherfucker #3
preparation: Mix vodka blue curacao and blueberry schnapps in a mixing glass. Add cranberry juice until purple. Pour into shot glass and serve.

name: Panty Ripper
preparation: Stir together with ice and serve in a cordial glass.

name: Blue Nut
preparation: Pour into a shaker with ice and shake and strain.

name: Touchdown
preparation: Fill a shot glass with Absolut Mandrin. Seperately fill a highball glass a little less then 1/2 way with Red Bull. Drop the shot class of Absolut Mandarin into the glass of Red Bull and slam it.

name: Mad Dog Shot
preparation: Pour the vodka into a shot glass and add some raspberry syrup (should be concentrated look for it at a Polish section in an international supermarket). Add a few drops of Tabasco hot sauce. and shoot.

name: Flaming Lemon Drop
preparation: Pour absolut citron into a shot glass and top off with a splash of galliano. Place one half lemon slice flat on the rim of the shot glass put some sugar on the slice and soak the sugar with 151 proof rum. -- Just before drinking ignite the sugar. Blow the flame out when it seems to caramelize the sugar. Lick the sugar off the lemon slice down the vodka mixture then either suck the juices or bite the pulp of the lemon.

name: Caribbean Pineapple
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake
preparation: Add vodka and frangelico to a shaker with ice. Shake. Garnish with a sugar-coated lemon. Shoot the drink like you would tequila.

name: Kool-Aid Slammer
preparation: Fill half a shot glass with the kool-aid. Put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

name: Butterbeer #2
preparation: Take a pint glass or mug and fill with ice cubes. Half-fill the glass with Mickey Finn's Butterscotch and Vanilla liqueur (available at grocery stores) and fill the rest of the glass with root beer before serving.

name: Dirty Gecko
preparation: Add all ingredients with a cup of ice into a shaker. Shake well. Makes up to about 6 shots. Should come out to a dirty purple color.

name: Butt Plug
preparation: Fill a beer glass or an old-fashioned glass 1/2 with Red Bull energy drink. Seperately fill a shot glass 1/2 with vodka and 1/2 with blue curacao. Drop the shot glass into the larger glass and shoot.

name: Lemon Drop
preparation: Add sugar to the rim of an old-fashioned glass and drop a cube or packet of sugar into the bottom of the glass. Pour vodka and lemon juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Pour into the prepared old-fashioned glass and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'h5NGl3ODrl5UYrxu8tAzBMUwvdgrnD5I' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Midori 2000
preparation: Build over ice and garnish with a pineapple wedge three pineapple leaves and two cherries.

name: Liquid Cocaine #2
preparation: Combine 4 alcohols and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixer with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Urban Violence
preparation: Use strawberry orange or banana tropicana. Put some ice in your favorite glass. Add liquor. Fill up remainder with the tropicana stir and serve.

name: Blue Memphis
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except curacao) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Add blue curacao and shake again briefly. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Oreo Cookie
preparation: Carefully layer the kahlua creme de cacao and bailey's into a shot glass. Top with a splash of vodka.

name: Key Lime Pie
preparation: Pour ingredients into mixing cup filled with ice shake and strain into glass.

name: Sex On Daytona Beach
preparation: Blend ingredients by shaking well.

name: Jack Hammer #2
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake #2
preparation: Pour 3/4 oz of vodka and 1/4 oz frangelico into a shot glass. Cover the slice of lime with powdered sugar. Bite on the lime with powdered sugar on it and hold the juice in your mouth. Then take the shot while the lime juice is still in your mouth. You now have a chocolate cake shot.

name: Zipperhead
preparation: Fill glass with rocks add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom then Vodka then soda on top).

name: Absolute Suicide
preparation: Chill each ingredient. Pour into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Fisherman's Friend
preparation: Add both ingredients to a shot glass. Stir to dissolve the crushed Fisherman's Friend candy tablet and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake Shooter
preparation: Mix equal parts Absolut Citron and Frangelico into a shot glass. Drink the shot and follow it immediately by sucking on a sugar-coated lemon wedge. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'AyMHU1ZDpUpgwOcUWiqBZFnOlXP6AWHp' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Cherry Bomb Shot
preparation: Pour vodka and Red Bull energy drink into a small glass. Add grenadine slowly so it sinks to the bottom without mixing for a cool layered effect.

name: Apple Pie Shooter
preparation: This drink requires at least 2 people. Drinker sits in a chair head back mouth open. Person 2 pours the apple juice then the vodka in the drinker's mouth (drinker must be VERY careful to keep his/her throat closed). Then person 2 sprays some in whipped cream and tops with a SMALL amount of cinnamon (too much will make drinker sneeze and possible other not-so-fun things). Drinker sits up swishes all ingredients together and swallows.

name: Panty Dropper
preparation: Pour Stoli raspberry vodka and blueberry schnapps into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Malibu Heaven
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Neon Nightmare
preparation: Combine ingredients into a mixing tin full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange flag.

name: Apple Bomb
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff Green Apple vodka into a highball glass. Add the Red Bull (pre-chilled) and serve.

name: The Kelman
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a cup and serve.

name: Grape Crush
preparation: Add ingredients to a small shaker with ice. Stir and strain into shot glass.

name: Kamakazie
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain mixture into a shot glass. Salute.

name: Bling Bling
preparation: Pour butterscotch schnapps and raspberry vodka in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Purple Hooter Shooter
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Arizona Anti-Freeze
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam.

name: Malibu Pop
preparation: Shake malibu rum and blue curacao in a cocktail shaker. Add the juices and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Purple Hooter
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Chronic Ice Tea
preparation: Fill the glass with ice and start with a shot of raspberry vodka. Next add half shots of Malibu melon and blue curacao. Add some sweet and sour mix nearly fill the glass with 7-up and finally float a 1/2 oz of spiced rum. Garnish with a flag (or 2 cherries!)

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka and pineapple juice into a shot glass. Add a drop of grenadine and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'FyeXQ1ZDo4dmJpxeVLCdREaOd6p38oyw' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Desi
preparation: Pour vodka and mango juice over ice in a shaker. Shake until frozen and strain into a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Banana Cream Pie
preparation: Mix in a shaker with ice then strain.

name: Lemon Drop #3
preparation: Mix equal parts absolut citron and sweet and sour mix over ice then strain into a shot glass. Sprinkle sugar on lemon slice. Drink shot then suck the lemon.

name: Danny Borracho
preparation: Combine vodka tequila and lime juice over ice in a rocks glass. Fill the rest w/ Sprite or 7-up. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Silk Panties
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Shamrock Juice
preparation: In an Hurricane Glass filled with Ice pour equal amounts of all liquors. Top off with Orange Juice. Garnish with a slice of an Orange and a couple of cherries.

name: Kentucky Bullfrog
preparation: Pour out or consume the mountain dew until it reaches the top of the label. Add the Kool-aid and fill the rest up with vodka. Shake and chill. Serve as is from the bottle or into glasses.

name: Miami Iced Tea
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Texas Sweat
preparation: Mix all together and filter back and forth through ice to chill and mix. Not a sipping drink shoot it.

name: Fireman's Ice Tea
preparation: Mix 4 white alcohols as if you were making a long island (over ice). Near the top of the glass add the grenadine and then the sprite. Garnish with cherry if wanted. Add more granadine to taste.

name: Montana Tornado
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mason jar and stir.

name: Killer Ice Tea with Orange
preparation: Almost fill the glass with ice cubes then add the alcoholic drinks. Fill about 2/3 of the height with them. Add the Coke stir it. Add a slice of orange and maybe a red cocktail cherry and serve.

name: Purple Haze #3
preparation: Add liquors to an ice-filled margarita glass. Add sour mix top with 7-up and serve.

name: Westwood Ice Tea
preparation: In a beer mug full of ice pour in the tequila gin light rum and stir. Stir in the cinnamon schnapps then stir in the vanilla vodka. Splash the high proof rum on top.

name: Long Island Ice Tea (Low Cal)
preparation: Take a long piece of lemon rind and twist it hard to release the oils in an empty glass rub it around the inside of the glass and throw it in the bottom. Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into a shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top.

name: Nuclear Ice Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except sour mix) into an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill with sour mix top with 7-up and serve.

name: Caribbean Ice Tea
preparation: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange.

name: Oyama
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Novebuche
preparation: Stir with ice cubes and serve.

name: Maiden's Blush
preparation: Combine the gin triple sec cherry brandy and lemon juice in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Maiden's Prayer
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Monkey Wrench
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Kalabreeze
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Hornpipe
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Kiss in the Dark
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Newbury Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin sweet vermouth and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: French Rose Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Droog's Date Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Xanthia Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ulanda Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Voodoo Sunrise
preparation: Pour rum and vodka into a collins glass. Tilt the glass and pour the grenadine down the inside. Fill with chilled orange juice and serve.

name: Ambassador
preparation: Stir and serve in a collins glass over ice. Garnish with the slice of orange.

name: Hot Damn Shooter
preparation: Shake all ingredients adding orange juice to taste. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Long Island Sunset
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass shake and strain into a highball glass. Add a cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Bent Bum
preparation: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka Gin 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J. then rest with Grapefruit. Skake don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

name: Orange Flux
preparation: Fill a shaker half full with ice cubes. Pour all ingredients into shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Bohus Jude
preparation: Pour the gin vodka rum tequila and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice and stir. Garnish as desired and serve.

name: Tequillya
preparation: Pour ingredients together into glass over ice. Mix well. Serve with lime and salted glass if desired.

name: Baseball Pleasure
preparation: Begin by making a standard Screwdriver (OJ and vodka). Add the whiskey and the amaretto mix and serve.

name: Beth's Own
preparation: Mix alcohol first then add cola.

name: Ebola
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in pitcher. To add a cooler edge throw in some crushed ice and a touch of cinammon.

name: Whiting Sunset
preparation: Pour vodka tequila and orange juice into a cocktail glass. Finally add a dash of grenadine.

name: Long Island Milkshake
preparation: In a large blender cup add ice sugar cubes creme de cacao vanilla extract (optional) and the cream. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order then hit the frappe or whip button on the blender for 15-20 seconds or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a pre-chilled collins glass. No garnish required serve with a large-diameter straw.

name: Piledriver
preparation: Add rum and vodka to a beer mug. Top with coca-cola and orange juice and add ice if possible.

name: Long Island Fruit Punch
preparation: Fill all ingredients in pint glass give one quick shake and serve with ice.

name: Malibu Mojito
preparation: Muddle lime wedges mint leaves and sugar with a splash of club soda. Fill glass with ice and add the Malibu rum & 1 oz. club soda. Shake all ingredients together. Try not to shake too hard so you don't flatten the soda.

name: Feni Mojito
preparation: Crush the apple slices with the sugar in the bottom of a highball glass. Stir thoroughly and top with ice. Add the Kazkar Feni cashew apple liqueur top off with apple juice and stir. Garnish with an apple wheel and lime wedge and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Rickey
preparation: Pour the apple brandy and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and fill with club soda. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Apricot Adventure
preparation: Crush part of the mint together with the sugar and some Zwack. Shake the rest of the Zwack with the lime juice and ice as desired and pour into the glass. Fill up with club soda and decorate with the remaining mint and perhaps some lime.

name: La Mojita
preparation: Tear up the mint leaves and add them to an old-fashioned glass containing the lime juice and sugar. Press the laves with the back of a spoon against the glass to release the aroma. Add vodka. Fill the glass with ice cubes and top off with club soda. Add the raspberries. Mix it with a spoon so that mint leaves and raspberries get distributed throughout the glass. Serve.

name: Mojito Martini
preparation: Wet the rim of a cocktail glass and press down in sugar to get it on the rim. Put mint leaves and lime juice (per drink) in a cocktail shaker. Mash (muddle) the mint with spoon. Add light rum and ice. Shake strain pour. If it's too tart add sugar to the shaker.

name: Mango Mojito
preparation: Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedge in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add Cruzan mango rum and club soda as above or adjusted to taste. Add ice cubes and serve.

name: Cranberry Cordial
preparation: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. When ready strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

name: Rum Rickey
preparation: Pour light rum lime juice and sugar syrup into an ice-filled mixing glass. Shake strain into an ice-filled collins glass and fill with club soda. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Cutty Rickey
preparation: Pour the whisky and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda and stir again briefly. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Jamaican Rum Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Citrus Tequila Fizz
preparation: 1. Juice a lemon and a lime half; cut into wedges and add into a cocktail shaker along with the mint leaves and sugar (use superfine sugar or simple syrup if available). Muddle ingredients to release oils from the mint leaves. 2. Add the tequila lemon and lime juices and club soda; stir and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mojito Nihongo
preparation: In a chilled Collins glass add in order the first three ingredients. Muddle until aromatic and well mixed. Add ice then pour the sake over the ice. Top with Sprite and garnish with a whole shiso leaf.

name: Pineapple Fizz
preparation: Shake everything except the soda with ice; strain into a highball glass. Fill with the soda.

name: Amaretto Rose
preparation: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Derby Daiquiri
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Apple Mojito
preparation: Add the lime sugar and mint sprigs to a highball glass and muddle with a muddler. Add several ice cubes and pour in the Bacardi apple rum. Top with club soda (adjust to taste) and stir. Garnish with an apple slice and a lime wedge and serve.

name: Acapulco
preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Bambi's Iced Tea
preparation: Put ice in glass. Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!

name: Royal Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Boston Tea Hardy
preparation: Pour the rum orange juice and iced tea into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a mint sprig and serve.

name: National Aquarium
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well and serve on the rocks.

name: The Extinguisher
preparation: Combine all alcohol in 12 oz. glass with ice. Add Sour Mix. Add a splash of Cranberry Juice to form a layer of red at the top of the glass. Top with foam from draft beer tap.

name: Boston Tea Party
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except coca-cola) in a shaker shake and strain over ice or combine ingredients in a collins glass with ice and shake. Top with coke garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Black Ukrainian
preparation: Pour the vodka Tia Maria coffee liqueur Southern Comfort and Coca-cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Purple Passion Tea
preparation: Pour into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Forest Fire
preparation: Mix in shot glass it's that simple. Use more tabasco for more fire less for more alcohol.

name: Fire And Torture
preparation: Pour all the contents into a shot glass at once.

name: Jack-Hammer II
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and slam it.

name: El Negro
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum into a shot glass. Add the Southern Comfort and Captain Morgan spiced rum; the mixture should turn dark and obtain a fire smell. Serve; beware the delayed hard-hitting bite.

name: El Swavo
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Desert Water
preparation: Add the tabasco sauce to a shot glass and fill with the tequila. Use a spoon when you pour the tequila into the glass so it doesn't mix with the tabasco.

name: Three Stages of Friendship
preparation: Mix all three in a shot glass and shoot the damn thing.

name: El Salvador
preparation: Mix shake stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Riddler's Shot
preparation: Pour tequila into a shot glass add tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Satan's Revenge
preparation: Combine in sequence in shot glass shoot.

name: Brave Bull Shooter
preparation: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

name: Red Tequila
preparation: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Add tabasco sauce until a strong red color. Serve with a half-slice of lemon on the rim.

name: El Chupacabras
preparation: Pour the mango juice and Dr. Pepper Vanilla to a cocktail glass. In two seperate mixing glasses mix the Patron tequila with the lime juice and the Agavero tequila with the lemon juice. Pour both into the cocktail glass. Top with Tapatio and serve.

name: El Stoner
preparation: Pour the vodka into a large container. Take the frozen limeade and pour it all inside and stir it. Pour in 12 light beers and stir until it is all liquified. Add ice and serve.

name: El Cid
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #2
preparation: Pour into shot glass starting with Tequila followed by J.D. then by Southern. Top with drops of Tabasco and shoot.

name: Canadian Snake Bite
preparation: Pour the Sambuca into a brandy snifter and the tequila seperately into a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Add a couple dashes of Tabasco sauce to the glass with tequila. Roll the Sambuca around the snifter (like a cement mixer) ignite and allow to burn for a second or two. Pour the Sambuca into the tequila rocks glass and cap it with the brandy snifter so as to extinguish the flames. This should form some smoke within the glasses. Carefully lift the snifter and inhale the fumes then pound the tequila and Sambuca mixture. Packs a pretty good wallop.

name: Tequila Surprise Shooter
preparation: Fill a shot glass with tequila. Add drops of Tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Bastardo
preparation: Build in a highball glass and fill with club soda.

name: El Presidente Cocktail #3
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice; shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist. Grenadine and lemon juice are optional.

name: Snakebite #3
preparation: Add 1 part Jack Daniels whiskey and 1 part tequila to your shot glass. Then add a few (5 to 10) drops of tabasco sauce. Take it down like a shot.

name: Shot of Respect
preparation: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

name: El Torro Loco
preparation: Add crushed ice gin vodka and red bull to a cocktail shaker or use two glasses to mix. Pour into a collins glass over ice add a splash of grenadine and garnish with cherries.

name: El Floridita
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: El Presidente Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.

name: El Diablo
preparation: Stir tequila and creme de cassis over ice in a chilled collins glass. Fill with ginger ale squeeze in the lime wedge's juice and drop in the spent shell.

name: El Chupacabra
preparation: Mix vodka sour mix and ice in shaker. Strain over ice in old fashioned glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: El Bano
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and top with tonic water. Stir briefly. Garnish with half of a Twix chocolate bar.

name: El Presidente Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Prairie Fire
preparation: Fill a shot glass with tequila and drop a dash of tabasco sauce in and around the edge.

name: Freight Train
preparation: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass.

name: The Graveyard
preparation: Pour 1 oz of Tobasco Sauce over ice. Add 1 oz. of Tequila and fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Shake or stir and serve.

name: El Nino
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a hurricane glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Midori Sour #2
preparation: Pour midori into a highball glass add sweet and sour until three-quarters full and fill with sprite. Stir.

name: Aquatini
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Chartreuse
preparation: Fill glass half full with crushed ice. Add midori then fill glass the rest of the way full with ginger ale. This should result in a chartreuse colored drink. Add more midori to your taste.

name: Belinda's Fuzzy Melon
preparation: Shake and strain into a highball glass.

name: Zimadori Zinger
preparation: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori - don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Skinny Dipper
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Sex with the Captain
preparation: Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Mile Highball
preparation: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add lemon twist and serve.

name: By The Pool
preparation: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Kellikilla
preparation: Pour Midori melon liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Add Sprite pineapple juice and cranberry juice on top.

name: Wet Kiss
preparation: Layer the ingredients in the order listed into a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

name: Watermelon Crawl
preparation: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

name: Schnappster
preparation: Mix together in a large collins glass and serve.

name: Tootsy Pop
preparation: Pour orange juice in first then the peach schnapps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

name: Sex in the Shower
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into Champagne Flute.

name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fuck
preparation: Mix blue curacao and melon liqueur (cold strain for best results) and top off with 2 splashes of Canadian Club Rye.

name: Fuzzy Melon Ball
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur and peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice stir and serve.

name: Kim Special
preparation: Build over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: My Sweet Midori
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale squeeze in the juice from 2 or 3 lime wedges and serve.

name: Lickalotapuss
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper watermelon pucker and 7-up into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Lace with amaretto and serve.

name: Hot Sex
preparation: Pour the triple sec and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine. Garnish with maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Wonder Woman
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in order into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Serve unstirred garnished with a cherry.

name: Sour Apple #2
preparation: Place ingredients in mixing cup with ice shake strain into glass.

name: Frozen Midori Sour
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish.

name: Island Affair
preparation: Shake melon liqueur cointreau and juices and strain into a pina colada glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add curacao and float cream on top. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Mel's Swing
preparation: Shake all three ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Sex on the Brain
preparation: Fill glass with ice insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka Midori Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. *The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom yellow in the middle and red on top.

name: Sea Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

name: Algae
preparation: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.

name: Sex At My House
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Shake and strain.

name: Toasted Fisherman
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry.

name: Green Lantern
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in order shake once and pour into a glass.

name: Sex with the Bartender
preparation: Mix rum triple sec lime juice grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime then splash irish cream down the middle.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun #2
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Rainbow Orgy
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur strawberry liqueur and banana liqueur into a cocktail shaker one-third filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour entire contents into a highball glass. Top with orange juice and serve.

name: Peachy Green
preparation: Fill 1/3 of a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Midori peach schnapps and orange juice. Shake until well chilled and pour into highball glass. Fill glass with cold 7-Up. Add an orange slice on top.

name: Jimmy.A Special
preparation: Pour the liqueurs into a cocktail glass. Add lemonade and serve.

name: Otter Pop
preparation: Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: Glow-Worm
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix. Float blue curacao on top.

name: Neon Tower
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass and add slice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with straws.

name: Five Dollar Shake
preparation: Pour all ingredients into pint glass. Drink.

name: Wild Squirrel Sex
preparation: Fill a 16 oz. cup with ice. Add shots and almost-fill with equal parts of sour mix and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Heaven
preparation: Pour liquors into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice and serve.

name: Green Alien
preparation: Shake midori lemon juice and lime juice with ice and pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sprite and soda to taste. Garnish with a lime wedge and add a straw.

name: Electric Popsicle
preparation: Pour both the melon liqueur and blue curacao in the collins glass and fill with 7-up. Place the slice of lime on the top of the glass.

name: Cesar Chavez
preparation: Pour the grenadine into a collins glass THEN add ice. Swirl the grenadine to chill it so it stays on the bottom during the build. Pour in the Dekuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps. Carefully add 7-Up (or Sprite or Red Bull) to create a clear layer in the middle. Layer the Midori on top. The drink now looks like the Mexican flag. Place in straw but DO NOT STIR. The preferred consumption method is known as melon picking. The drinker (often female) sucks on the straw and pulls it up from the bottom so all the flavors individually flow quickly through the straw.

name: Nerds
preparation: Pour midori and blue curacao into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Fill with lemonade.

name: The Lynchmob
preparation: Pour in the sweet and sour mix then the amaretto and then orange soda and stir.

name: Bend Me Over #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass or large shot glass and shoot.

name: King Willy
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur onto two ice cubes in a highball glass. Add a few drops of green curacao and fill with 7-up or sprite. Pour a few drops of grenadine in a way that will look like its shaping a stripe down the drink.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour #2
preparation: Pour amaretto orange juice and sour mix into a tall glass over ice and serve.

name: Electric Jam
preparation: Pour vodka blue curacao and sour mix over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Pink Fizzy
preparation: Pour watermelon schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass until half-full. Fill with sprite or 7-up stir and serve.

name: Mountain Melon
preparation: Pour Mountain Dew into a highball glass. Add watermelon pucker and stir. Add more pucker to taste if desired.

name: Sex On Acid
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter

name: Raspberry Sex
preparation: Combine vodka and cranberry juice over ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a shot glass. Top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

name: Sex with an Alligator
preparation: Add sweet and sour & Midori to a shaker w/ice shake and strain. Layer in razzberry liqueur and jager. Razzberry should go to the bottom and jager should float on top. Works best in Martini glass.

name: Tropical Waters
preparation: Pour the Melon liqueur and the Blue curacao into a highball glass. Then add Sprite and finally the ice cubes.

name: Grenamirodi
preparation: Pour ingredients in to a shaker. Shake with crushed ice or blend with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Midori Sour Ultra
preparation: Mix ingredients in a boston shaker with cracked ice. In a highball glass or champagne flute (optional) fill glass three quarters full with ice. Pour one tablespoon of cherry juice into the glass before pouring in mixed ingredients. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and lemon wedge. Drink through a straw.

name: Dirty Mother #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Mother Moo
preparation: Pour the licor 43 into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with milk and add a stirring pin.

name: The Big-V
preparation: Try to layer in shot glass.

name: Italian Ice
preparation: Shake well and serve with crushed ice.

name: Brevann Springwater
preparation: Everything goes in a highball glass with ice. Pour Seven Up or Sprite on the top Garnish with lemon and some other fresh fruit. Drink with a straw.

name: Rocky Mountain Mother Fucker
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice and chill. Strain pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Mother Fucking Ape
preparation: Pour all ingredients except for brandy into a mug filled with ice cubes and stir. Drizzle brandy on top and serve.

name: Naked Yellow Bird
preparation: Mix equal parts over ice. Shake strain and serve.

name: Dirty White Mother
preparation: Pour brandy and Kahlua into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and stir. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Kamikaze Version
preparation: Add vodka and mixers to a cocktail glass with ice. Fill with sour mix and shake.

name: Brevann
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and drink with a straw.

name: Mother Fucker
preparation: Equal parts of Kahlua and Rumple Minze. Top with 151.

name: Mother Cocktail
preparation: Mix gin vodka grenadine and sour mix together in a shaker. Pour into a collins glass with ice filling from half to three-quarters full. Top with beer to taste and serve.

name: Mother Pucker
preparation: Pour appropriate amounts into a mixing container to your liking. Serve in highball glasses.

name: Smooth Pink Lemonade
preparation: Build drink. Usually it's best to use a slight bit more sour than cranberry. Experiment to personal taste. Garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Patrick's Bloody Mother
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass stir a little and serve.

name: Blues Night
preparation: Pour the vodka and blue curacao into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top up with 7-Up or Sprite. Sprinkle salt on top stir with a stick or straw remove and serve.

name: Aqua
preparation: Shake Vodka Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-Up.

name: American Pie
preparation: Pour grenadine in glass. Add straw and ice carefully. Fill 1/3 of glass with sweet and sour. Add Vodka. Fill glass almost to the rim with 7-up. Add Blue Curacao. Do not stir.

name: Dirty Mother
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes stir well and serve.

name: Adios Motherfucker #2
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Kiss Your Mother
preparation: Combine ingredients in a glass. Let it layer out or mix it to get a stunning green effect.

name: Piledriver
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Syberian Sunrise
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass with ice and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish with a stirrer straw maraschino cherry and an orange slice.

name: Liquid Sword
preparation: Mix liquors in a tall glass with ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Hal Ligon
preparation: Add the vodka and orange juice to a collins glass filled with ice. Top with 7-Up.

name: Oakland Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka dry vermouth and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Grand Hawaiian Screw
preparation: Pour ingredients into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish a slice of orange or a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Hawaiian Dream
preparation: Pour the Maui blue Hawaiian schnapps vodka and rum into a 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with fresh chilled pineapple juice stir briefly and serve.

name: Hawaiian Screw
preparation: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Blue Screw
preparation: Fill glass with ice pour Mandrin and Blue in then fill it with OJ. Simple.

name: Idonis
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sea Breeze
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Melonball
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur and vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice or orange juice.

name: Black & Blue Berries
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Lemon Squash
preparation: Mix lemon juice with sugar syrup in a highball glass stir well and fill up with soda water. Serve with drinking straw.

name: Sloe Gin Fizz
preparation: Shake the gin lemon juice and simple syrup with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with soda garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Gin Gin Mule
preparation: Muddle the lime juice syrup and mint sprigs at the bottom of a mixing glass. Add gin and ginger beer and shake well. Pour over ice in a highball glass top with soda and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Sangria Liqueur #2
preparation: Peel the apples and cut into small cubes. Peel the oranges take out the pips and cut them into small cubes. Warm the orange juice the sugar and the mandarin peels until the sugar dissolves. Mix all the ingredients - except the ice and the soda. The ice and the soda add just before serving.

name: Egg Cream
preparation: Mix syrup and milk in a tall glass. Add soda water and serve with a straw.

name: Amer Picon Punch
preparation: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.

name: Honey Lemonade
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Broken Heart Zombie Mai Tai
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass half-filled with ice. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange a cherry and a piece of cantaloupe melon.

name: Red Wine Punch
preparation: Mix large parts of icing sugar with red wine in a punch bowl and stir well. Add the soda plenty of ice and drop in a few orange (or lemon) slices. Serve immediately.

name: Cinderella
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and add soda. Garnish with a slice of lemon add a straw and serve.

name: Virgin Bellini
preparation: Pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: Campari Soda
preparation: Pour the Campari over ice cubes in a highball glass then fill with sparkling/soda water. Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass drop it in and serve.

name: Tap That Ass
preparation: Fill the hurricane glass with ice. Pour the Hennessy Red Alize and Yellow Alize. Splash in some Cranberry Juice and top it off with soda. For garnish you can add a slice of pineapple and cherries.

name: Fruit Punch
preparation: Make up the kool-aid ahead of time by dissolving in a small amount on water (as little as possible). Don't add sugar! Cool this mixture. -- With everything cold mix it all together just before the party. You can add sherbert to keep it cold or make ice cubes or an ice cube ring using the kool-aid mixture. You probably won't need to add any sugar to this as the soda lemonade and pineapple juice should contain plenty.

name: Campari and Soda
preparation: Pour Campari bitters into a highball glass until half-full. Completely fill the rest of the glass with soda water and serve.

name: Classic Walker
preparation: Take an old-fashioned glass and place 2 thin slices of lime and ice into it. Add some perrier to extract the essence of the lime. Add Johnnie Walker Black with lime juice to finish it off. Add a stirrer and serve.

name: Fruit Cooler
preparation: Toss strawberries with sugar and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice strawberries apple juice and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor really). In glasses put ice cubes and a slice of apple. Pour drink in and serve.

name: Southside
preparation: Muddle one sprig of mint with the lime pieces lime juice and simple syrup in the bottom of a bar glass. Add gin and shake well. Pour into a goblet over crushed ice and stir until the outer-glass frosts. Top with soda water garnish with remaining sprig of mint and serve.

name: Purple Rain
preparation: Pour gin into an ice-filled highball glass and fill with cranberry juice. Add blue curacao sour mix and soda. Shake gently add more curacao (until royal-purple) and serve.

name: Chilton
preparation: Fill a salt rimmed cocktail glass with ice. Pour in vodka and add lemon juice. Fill with soda. Insert straw and stir slightly. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Horse's Ass
preparation: Mix with ice.

name: Hello Kitty
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice and pour ingredients in order. Similar to a tequila sunrise; the hello kitty is layered when presented but stirred before drinking.

name: Lemon Daisy
preparation: Stir the lemon juice grenadine and simple syrup together in a white wine glass. Add ice top with equal parts 7-up and soda water and serve.

name: Blue Downy
preparation: Pour the light rum blue curacao coconut milk and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Shake or stir well. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Hawaiian Cherry Popper
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a slice of pineapple. Add an umbrella and serve.

name: Hawaiian Parrot
preparation: Pour the coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with equal parts of Hawaiian punch and Sprite soda. Stir and serve.

name: Jamaican Dust
preparation: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Evil Blue Thing
preparation: Pour ingredients into glass and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary but it makes the drink more fun.

name: Hawaii Five-O
preparation: Add all ingredients on top of ice in a highball glass.

name: Bigger Better Blue Lagoon
preparation: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

name: Hawaiian Passion
preparation: Stir both ingredients together in a mixing glass with a few ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Moonraker
preparation: Pour the tequila and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and stir well. Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Mango Tango #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with fresh pineapple and cherry on a skewer. Serve.

name: Butch's Blue Lagoon #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a tall glass filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Earth Shake
