preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Blue Sky #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour everything into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add an umbrella and serve.

name: Scarlet O'Hara
preparation: Pour 2 oz. Southern Comfort over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze one wedge of lime into drink. Stir and serve.

name: Tanqueray and Tonic
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Tanqueray London Dry lime juice and tonic water.

name: Tequila Shot
preparation: Hold lime between finger and thumb and place salt at base of thumb on same hand. Quickly lick the salt down the tequila and bite the lime.

name: Gimlet
preparation: Pour the gin and lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Yucca
preparation: Put the Vodka and the sugar into a container. Slice 10 lemons and 10 limes and add them to the Vodka. Mix for 10 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved.

name: Ultimate Margarita
preparation: Pour tequila cointreau and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

name: Gin Rickey
preparation: Pour juice of lime and gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Gin and Juice
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Fill a highball glass almost full of ice cubes and dump ice into shaker. Shake well and pour drink into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Frozen Margarita
preparation: Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly reserve lime. Pour tequila triple sec lime juice and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Suck Bang and Blow
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Panty Dropper Punch
preparation: Fill a 5-gallon cooler (with pour spout) with ice. Add the rum tequila Carlos Rosi and stir. Add remaining ingredients and stir again. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving out.

name: Bartender's Margarita
preparation: Shake tequila triple sec sweet & sour cranberry juice and lime juice in a pint glass. Rim another pint glass with salt and transfer contents. Float the Gran Marnier garnish with a lime and straw and serve.

name: Fidel Castro
preparation: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Watermelon Margarita
preparation: Cut up a watermelon removing seeds. Liquify in a blender until you have about 16 oz. Add remaining ingredients top with ice and blend until smooth. Taste and add sugar if watermelon is not sweet enough. Serve in a margarita glass with a sugar-coated rim.

name: Elven Blood
preparation: Pour the cranberry-raspberry juice into a champagne saucer and stir in the Smirnoff Vanilla Twist vodka next. Add a splash of Malibu coconut rum on top and serve.

name: Lisa's Tease
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with ice cubes. Pour in the peach schnapps. Top off glass with cran-raspberry juice. Enjoy as the sweetness washes over your tongue teasing your tastebuds.

name: Pansy Ass
preparation: Add ingredients to a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Dr. Pecker
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cape Coral
preparation: Pour vodka over a handful of ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add cranberry-raspberry juice and shake for 5 secs. Pour mixture into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Chekhov Cooler
preparation: Pour the Stoli raspberry vodka sloe gin and cranberry-raspberry juice over several ice cubes in a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Add fresh raspberries garnish with a mint sprig and serve.

name: Cranberry Gin
preparation: Shake gin and cran-raspberry juice with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker; pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Fruity Exploration
preparation: Drop 3 regular sized ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour cranberry-raspberry juice in then orange juice then pour in the 99 Apples or 99 Oranges leaving which ever flavor you like the most last. Stir gently and wait until the drink is sufficiently chilled before serving. You may want to change ratios depending on your tastes and sensitivity to alochol.

name: Batida Abaci
preparation: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

name: Caipirinha #2
preparation: Cut the 1/4 lime into a few chunks. With the sugar crush them against the bottom and sides of the glass with a spoon. Add a few ice cubes. Add two medium spoonfuls of crushed ice. Fill the glass to halfway with vodka. Fill the rest of the way with limeade. Stir well and serve with a straw.

name: Fedbergs Favorite Caipirinha
preparation: Slice a lime into eight slices and put two into a glass. Pour the tablespoons of cane sugar over it and mash these together - if you don't have a long shafted mortar the end of a ladle can be used. Pour coarsely crushed ice-cubes to the brim of the glass and fill it with the Havana Club white rum. Serve with medium sized straight straws. Vary the lime / cane sugar ratio according to personal taste.

name: Batida de Coco
preparation: Blend well and add crushed ice.

name: Coconut Batida
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Nightboat to Brazil
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain.

name: Nightboat to Recife
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a tumbler with crushed ice.

name: Kiwi & Lime Caipirinha
preparation: Lime & kiwi - Cut out the skins and cut small pieces. Put the fruits in a Old Fashioned glass and mix with the sugar. Mash with a muddler. Add ice cubs and Cachaa! Serve!

name: Cranberry Caipirinha
preparation: With a muddler or wooden spoon muddle the cranberries with the sugar and water and 1 lime wedge. Add the aquavit and a handful of ice and shake well. Strain into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with remaining lime wedge and serve.

name: Batidas Frozen
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and serve.

name: Fig
preparation: Shake well pour into shot glass and serve.

name: Agua Mouthwash
preparation: Very similar to a normal Agua. Roughly put the ingredients together in similar proportions into a shot glass making sure you finish with the Bailey's - which should sink to the bottom then swirl through the blue-green.

name: Booger
preparation: After the first 1/2 oz drop just a tiny bit of Bailey's on top.

name: Lilly Pad
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice and stir well. Float the blue curacao on top. Cut a lime slice in the shape of a lilly pad and place on top placing a small gummy frog candy on top of that to finish and serve.

name: Fat Charley
preparation: Pour the Bacardi rum Malibu rum and 99 Bananas into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice adding a splash of cranberry juice to top. Stir and serve.

name: Green Voodoo
preparation: Add ingredients and ice to a mixing tin. Shake 3 to 5 times and strain into a shot glass.

name: Hokey Pokey
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Surfer On Acid
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into a large shot or old-fashioned glass and shoot. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'xydmt3ODpaKYRWg8NE0deUJhVroziIQL' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Blue Balls
preparation: Mix all ingredients. Chill with ice and strain into a shooter glass!

name: Lunch Box
preparation: Fill a glass almost full with beer. Fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of amaretto and drop it into the cup with the beer and orange juice.

name: Fat Face
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Cherry Bomb
preparation: Take a shot glass pour green creme de menthe creme de bananes Malibu coconut rum then peach schnapps. Finish with a small drop of grenadine syrup.

name: Southern Pink Flamingo
preparation: Mix in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain into a pony glass.

name: Coconita
preparation: Carefully layer all ingredients in equal parts on top of one another in a shot glass; Kahlua first Bailey's in the middle and Malibu on top.

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake #3
preparation: Fill a stainless steel shaker 1/2 with cubed ice. Pour all ingredients over the ice. Shake until condensation forms on shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Jello Shots
preparation: Mix hot water and jello. Add rum. Pour into 2 ounce cups. Serve after the jello has set.

name: Motor Oil
preparation: Pour jagermeister into a triple shot glass. Add in order; peppermint schnapps goldshlager and malibu rum.

name: C-Dot's Pina Colada Jello Shot
preparation: Boil water and mix with (1) 3-oz package of Island Pineapple Jello. Mix until jello is completely dissolved. Add 3/4-cup of Malibu coconut rum. Add 1/2-cup of Cruzan pineapple rum. Mix again and pour into 2-oz plastic cups. NOTE: I found the cups at party city and a similar retailer. I also prefer plastic versus paper. Each package of jello makes approx. (16) 2-oz cups. Fun for the whole family...

name: Dennis the Menace
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Coppertone Punch
preparation: Combine Creme de Banana Malibu Rum Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

name: Electric Smurf
preparation: Put three ice cubes in a glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with Sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

name: Fat Friar
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Slippery Box
preparation: In a glass put in all liquor and then fill the remaining glass with the kool-aid.

name: Dr. Malibu
preparation: Pour Malibu coconut rum and Dr. Pepper into a tall shot glass and serve.

name: Lunch Box #2
preparation: Mix the beer and orange juice in a beer mug drop the shot of amaretto in and down it.

name: Purple Lei
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Malibu Jello
preparation: Boil the water and add to peach passion fruit jello. Allow to dissolve for 2 minutes. Add the malibu rum and pour into shot glasses or one-ounce cups found in party stores. Chill for four hours before serving.

name: Boom Box
preparation: Add Vodka and White Wine to the coffee. The coffee must still be hot.

name: Pearl Diver #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Frutty Fuck-Me-Up
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jager and Malibu
preparation: Serve in a 2-oz shot glass.

name: Jamaican Qualude
preparation: Mix the ingredients in shaker with ice. Strain into small or regular size rocks glass.

name: Scooby Snack
preparation: Pour rum creme de banane melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Add whipped cream and shake; until well mixed and sufficiently chilled. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Kilted Black Leprechaun
preparation: Layer ingredients in the above order into a shot glass.

name: Agua
preparation: Roughly pour the ingredients together in similar proportions into a shot glass making sure you finish with the Bailey's - which should sink to the bottom then swirl through the blue.

name: Jamaican Twist
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum Midori melon liqueur and creme de bananes into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and pour the contents into a tall glass. Add pineapple juice to taste and serve.

name: Italian Surfer #2
preparation: Add the Malibu and amaretto to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of pineapple juice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fat Lighter
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bayou Juice
preparation: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice. Chill shake and strain!

name: Jello Shot
preparation: Mix hot water and jello. Add rum. Pour into 2 ounce cups. Serve after the jello has set.

name: Kreeper
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into several shot glasses. Serve as individual shots.

name: BMW #2
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

name: Kali Fury
preparation: Pour Malibu Rum into a Lg. Rocks(Bucket)glass or Collins glass filled with ice then pour in juices and top with 1/2 oz. Creme de Banana.

name: Horny Mohican
preparation: Free pour each ingredient into a test tube and serve.

name: Almond Joy #2
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a mixing glass. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Creamy Nuts
preparation: Combine the Bailey's irish cream Malibu rum and Paul Masson chocolate hazelnut cream liqueur into a shot glass and top with a splash of half and half.

name: Shot in the Dark
preparation: Pour equal parts Kahlua and Malibu rum into a shot glass. Add a few drops of Bailey's irish cream and serve.

name: Butternut Rum Lifesaver
preparation: Mix ingredients. Chill over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Jay In Your Tummy
preparation: Shake all the above ingredients in a tin with ice.

name: Nazi Surfer
preparation: Chill shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Dirty Bong Water #2
preparation: Blend chill and serve in 2-3 shot glasses.

name: Monkey Island
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Jessica in the Snow
preparation: Mix ingredients together and serve cold.

name: Dinky Car Vrroooom
preparation: Pour ingredients in a shot glass. Doesn't matter which order. Enjoy. Beep Beep

name: One Night in Heaven
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker; strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Rotten Pussy
preparation: Shake all ingredients and serve as a shot.

name: Scooby Snack #3
preparation: Pour all into shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into highball glass.

name: Jamaican Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Grog
preparation: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

name: South African Smoothie
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high power until smooth. Pour into a collins glass garnish with chocolate shavings and a cherry and serve.

name: Tropical Teaser
preparation: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

name: South Beach Martini
preparation: Shake well with ice. Strain into large martini glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.

name: Lamb Brothers
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: South Beach
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: South Side
preparation: Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluctuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.

name: Quentin
preparation: Combine the rum kahlua and cream in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Sitarski
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Chocolate Corvette
preparation: Pour the rum creme de cacao and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top and serve.

name: Vernon's Grog
preparation: Pour the rum into the container of your choice. A mug is suggested if a hot beverage is desired but a glass works for a cool drink. Real Jamaican rum has the strong flavor that's desired for grog. Add sugar. Brown sugar can work as a substitute; white sugar is too flavorless to work well. Add a good tablespoon of lemon juice. Add cool or boiling water depending on choice. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. For extra flavor cinnamon in the form of a stick or powder can be added. One stick or a pinch of powdered cinnamon is sufficient.

name: Golden Oldie
preparation: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Anna's Wish
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec and pineapple juice into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dr. Funk
preparation: Add liquid ingredients to crushed ice in shaker. Cut limes in half and squeeze into shaker dropping in the shells; add sugar. Shake well; pour the whole mess into a 12-oz chimney glass; fill rest of glass with charged water and decorate with fruit or freshly picked geranium leaf.

name: Dirty Rotten
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice combine the rum sherry and lime juice. Fill with club soda. Garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Tiger's Milk
preparation: Shake ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain ingredients into an old-fashioned glass of ice.

name: Melon Cooler
preparation: Build melon liqueur and dark rum in a medium-sized cocktail glass. Add cranberry juice and orange juice stir garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Dirty South #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with ice and serve.

name: Cremat
preparation: Add all ingredients to a terracotta pot. On the side heat up some rum on the stove. Once the rum is hot light it and slowly pour it into the terracotta pot. Stir the beverage slowly until 2/3 of the liquid remains then serve. Serves 8 people.

name: Johnny Loftus
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur butterscotch schnapps and chocolate liqueur into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a medium-sized cocktail glass float the rum on top and serve.

name: Jamaica Glow
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot M.M.M.
preparation: Heat in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Add twists of orange and lemon peel and serve.

name: Bolo Cocktail
preparation: Pour the dark rum lemon juice orange juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Frozen Fruit Daiquiri
preparation: Add pieces of a chosen fruit syrup (of that chosen fruit) rums sugar lime juice and crushed ice to a blender and blend. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve. Popular fruits to choose; bananas pineapples and strawberries.

name: Shark's Mai Tai
preparation: Mix all ingedients in a blender except for the 151 rum. Pour into a cocktail glass with ice to about 1 inch below the rim. Add the shot of 151 but do not mix. Let settle for about 1 minute before serving.

name: Chocolate Mint Rum
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jo Jo Original
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add dark rum and amaretto. Fill with coke. Add a splash of high proof rum to taste.

name: South Bank
preparation: Shake the spirits with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with Grape Tonic and stir gently. Serve with a Lemon Slice on the rim and a straw. *If you find the Grape Tonic too sweet add a splash or two of Lemon Juice or Sour Mix. A Sour Bank is made in an old-fashioned glass with two ice cubes and Grape Fruit Juice instead. A Southern Bank is a South Bank which has 1 part Southern Comfort added.

name: Caribe Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rum pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and serve.

name: Alexander Baby
preparation: Pour the dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the creme de cacao and double cream. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Dirty Monkey
preparation: Pour into a brandy snifter in the order listed and serve unstirred.

name: Dirty Grandmother
preparation: Pour Newfoundland Screech dark rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with milk or light cream stir and serve.

name: Aunt Agatha
preparation: Pour the rum and orange juice into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Float the bitters on top garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Chinese Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dirty South
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Angel's Treat
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and sprinkle grated chocolate on the surface.

name: South Of The Border
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Jacqueline Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: South Padre Island
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order listed above. Allow Cranberry to float. Do not stir this drink. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Caribbean Kiss
preparation: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass into kahlua and into brown sugar. Shake the spirits and cream with ice strain into a frosted glass and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Livingston
preparation: Mix ingredients over ice and stir add an optional lime.

name: Tahiti Club
preparation: Pour rums juices and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Havana Beach Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredents into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
preparation: Stir or shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into sour glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange or a Maraschino Cherry.

name: Latin Manhattan
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass add the lemon and serve.

name: Gay Marine
preparation: Muddle the mint leaves and lime wedges with cane sugar and Grand Marnier orange liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Add crushed ice and pour in the Mount Gay Barbados rum. Using a swizzle stick stir the ingredients together so that the rum lime and mint layers through the drink. Top up with apple juice. Serve with a mint garnish.

name: Banana Rum Cream
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apple a la Mode
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double cocktail glass with a sprig of mint.

name: Elephant Lips
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Russian Kamikaze
preparation: Pour both the vodka and Chambord raspberry liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lovely Wife
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: French Horn
preparation: Stir and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.

name: Regatta Moscow Mule
preparation: Fill glass with ice (use a copper mug if possible). Then pour in the vodka and ginger beer. Top with a lightly squeezed lemon or lime wedge and serve.

name: Chamtini
preparation: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add the twist of lemon and serve.

name: Purple Haze #2
preparation: Stir with ice in a mixing glass and strain into shot glass.

name: French Colada
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Chambord Royale
preparation: Should be shaked over ice. Garnished with a lemon. More pineapple than cranberry juice.

name: Dan's Dewberry Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker cup. Add ice last. Stir ingredients (do not shake unless asked to). Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Peachy Keen Martini
preparation: Pour vodka peach schnapps and pineapple juice into shaker full of ice. Shake strain and pour into cocktail (martini) glass. Add a splash of grenadine so it will fall to the bottom and float the Grand Marnier on top.

name: Chambord Royale
preparation: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur vodka pineapple and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lemon Shooters
preparation: Cover lemon slice with sugar. Shoot vodka then suck lemon.

name: French Monkey
preparation: Add the 2 together and you've got French Monkey Madness!.

name: Grape Nehi
preparation: Crush ice with lemon (or orange) and alcohols in a large glass. Use a strainer and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge or salt on the glass.

name: Harry Denton Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: French Whore
preparation: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Elderflower Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake until very chilled; serve immediately.

name: Lily Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve.

name: French Martini #2
preparation: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Can also be served on the rocks.

name: Purple Crayon
preparation: Pour chambord and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice and garnish with a purple grape and pineapple slice.

name: Big Easy Martini
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into chilled sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Fruity Pebble
preparation: Shake with ice. Drink as a shooter or pour over rocks.

name: Cristianne
preparation: Pour Blue Curacao in a champagne flute followed by Vodka and White Wine. Then pour Grenadine. Don't shake it!

name: Raw Sewage #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a glass.

name: Pinko
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Honolulu Hammer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Patriot
preparation: Pour grenadine into a shot glass. Slowly pour in blue Curacao to create a blue layer then slowly add vodka to create clear top layer. Serve.

name: Purple VW
preparation: Fill two-thirds of a shot glass with blue curacao. Fill completely with grenadine stir and serve. Drink slowly.

name: Pineapple Sunrise
preparation: Pour pineapple juice over a glass of ice. Add a squirt of grenadine and serve.

name: Vodkalenius
preparation: Stir pre-chilled ingredients with ice cubes in a grog-like glass. Add a straw if desired and serve.

name: Saketini
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin or vodka with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

name: Mainbrace
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Amber Dream
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass with ice and stir. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Octopus's Garden
preparation: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive and serve.

name: Magique
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin and creme de cassis into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Moon Martini
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Leaning Tower
preparation: Pour the gin vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mint Martini
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin and creme de menthe. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Dirty Martini #2
preparation: Use mixing glass with ice pour gin and splash of olive juice from the jar or fruit tray. Shake or stir does not matter. Strain into Martini glass. Garnish with at least 3 olives.

name: Astoria
preparation: Shake with cracked ice: strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with twist of orange or lemon.

name: Golf Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bitch on Wheels #2
preparation: Coat a martini glass with a few drops of green creme de menthe. Put six ice cubes into a cocktail shaker and add the liquor. Shake to chill and strain into the martini glass.

name: Velvet Crush
preparation: Pour gin into a glass with ice. Add flavored kool aid (to taste) and serve.

name: Don Giovanni
preparation: Pour liquids into a champagne saucer. Add a dollop of whipped cream to the center sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Night Skies Over London
preparation: Serve in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: San Francisco Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Martinez
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Gin and Pear
preparation: Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and fill the rest of the glass with Looza pear nectar. Stir with knife or back end of fork and serve.

name: Last Round
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gin Daisy
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the wine lemon juice sugar and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Christmas Martini
preparation: Pour the gin dry vermouth and peppermint schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a candy cane and serve.

name: Desert Martini
preparation: Dip a toothpick into dry vermouth. Pour the gin into a cocktail/martini glass and stir it with the toothpick.

name: Monkey Gland
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange wrapped around a cherry.

name: Montgomery
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon.

name: Jasmine
preparation: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Strawberry Martini
preparation: Rub rim of chilled martini glass with a cut strawberry. Dip rim into a bowl of sugar until evenly coated. Pour Gin/Vodka vermouth and grenadine into a mixing glass with plenty of ice and stir briskly. Strain into martini glass and drop in a strawberry.

name: Bombay Cosmo
preparation: Pour the gin Cointreau and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lemon twist and serve.

name: Thanksgiving Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin apricot brandy creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apricot-Mango Martini
preparation: Muddle the fresh mango in the bottom of a mixing glass and add all other ingredients. Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Superman
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: Nick and Nora Martini
preparation: Pour gin and vermouth into a mixing glass filled with ice and stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Gibson
preparation: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.

name: Maritime Martini
preparation: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive and serve.

name: Gloom Raiser
preparation: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

name: Absinthe Martini
preparation: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass swirl it around and then add the martini.

name: Velvetized(TM) Martini
preparation: Add the gin vermouth and Orange Bitters to a shaker of ice. Stir (or shake). Pour into a stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Alexander Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Admiral Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Colony Club Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Beauty Spot Cocktail
preparation: Pour a dash of grenadine into a cocktail glass. Shake remaining ingredients with ice strain into glass over grenadine and serve.

name: Allied Requirements
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Martini
preparation: Place both ingredients a cocktail shaker a cocktail glass and 2 almond-stuffed olives in a freezer for approximately 4 hours. Remove when ready. Pour the gin and vermouth into the chilled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the 2 almond-stuffed olives and serve.

name: Genie Martini
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake quickly and drain into a cockatil glass. Garnish with an olive. Alternatively add olive juice (from the jar) before mixing according to taste.

name: Twenty Thousand Leagues
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Martini Cocktail
preparation: Stir with ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive or a twist of lemon.

name: Bikini Martini
preparation: Add equal parts of each ingredient to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled martini glass with an orange slice and serve.

name: Dirty Martini
preparation: 1. Place an ice cube and a small amount of water in a cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2 - 3 minutes. 2. Fill a mixer with all ingredients including garnish. Cover and shake hard 3 - 4 times. 3. Remove cocktail glass from freezer and empty. Strain contents of the mixer into the cocktail glass include one of the olives and serve with a mysterious smile.

name: Almond Cocktail
preparation: Warm the gin up in a mixing glass and add the brandy the sugar syrup and 6 almond slivers. Chill. When needed pour the chilled mixture over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the remaining ingredients.

name: In and Out Martini
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and add a splash of dry vermouth. While glass chills add 4 fingers of gin in a mixer of ice. Throw away ice/vermouth in cocktail glass then strain in gin.

name: Pegu
preparation: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Hoffman House Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Buckeye Martini
preparation: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive and serve.

name: Florida Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Westerman Sings the Blues
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Dry Martini
preparation: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass add the olive and serve.

name: Gin Gin
preparation: Pour ginger ale over gin in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gin Buck
preparation: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Aviation
preparation: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass. The strict recipe does not have any sugar but I like to add a little.

name: Martian Martini
preparation: Combine gin and midori in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass.

name: Negroni Cocktail
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Add a splash of soda water if desired. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

name: Burnso Tropical
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well before serving.

name: Juicy Fruit
preparation: Pour the above ingredients in the order listed into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a wedge of pineapple.

name: Pineapple Splash
preparation: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice add 1 shot peach schnapps 1 shot vodka. Fill half with pineapple juice and top it off with orange juice. Mix with spoon or straw and enjoy.

name: Blue Fire
preparation: Pour the Jone's into a collins glass and mix in the Everclear well before serving.

name: Lusty Lisa
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and pour into a shot glass.

name: Peachy Blue
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Peach
preparation: Mix the two in shaker with ice. Shake. Pour in shot glass.

name: Blue Diablo
preparation: Colour some regular salt by adding blue food dye. (Food dye optional.) Salt the rim of an old-fashioned glass; rub a slice of citrus fruit preferably lemon around the rim and then roll the edge of the glass in a saucer full of the above salt. Chill the glass by placing in fridge or freezer. When chilled fill the glass about 2/3's full of ice. Add a shot of top-shelf tequila. Add a squeeze of lemon juice preferably fresh and a dash each of both lime cordial and blue curacao. Serve while the blue curacao runs down the middle of the drink.

name: Betonimylly
preparation: Frst you take Vodka but don't swallow it and then you take Cream in you mouth and mix then in your mouth and swallow.

name: Bailey-Bu
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a brandy snifter stir lightly and serve.

name: Concrete
preparation: First you drink the vodka (no swallowing) then you drink the Bailey's. You mix it in the mouth and swallow.

name: More Orgasms
preparation: Stir ingredients together until it just looks like dark bailey's.

name: Irish Curdling Cow
preparation: Pour irish cream vodka and bourbon into a highball glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

name: Orgasm a la Denmark
preparation: Stir together until it masks the vodka and looks like bailey's.

name: Christer Petterson
preparation: Mix and serve with crushed ice in a small rocks glass.

name: MOB
preparation: Pour the Malibu orange juice and Bailey's into a highball glass. Stir add a few ice cubes and serve.

name: Dreamsicle
preparation: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.

name: G. T. O.
preparation: Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!

name: Car Crash
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort and amaretto almond liqueur into a collins glass over 1 or2 ice cubes. Fill the glass with 1/2 sweet and sour mix and 1/2 orange juice. Top with grenadine and serve.

name: Brooklyn Zoo
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Mix rum vodka and gin. Add splash of pinepple juice Razzmatazz and sour mix. Drinker or assistant pours beer.

name: Confederate
preparation: 1. Pour the amaretto almond liqueur peach schnapps Southern Comfort sour mix and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. 2. In a hurricane glass add the grenadine then add ice. 3. Strain the mixture from the cocktail shaker into the hurricane glass layering the two. Float the blue curacao on top and serve. Colors from bottom-to-top will be as follows; red clear and blue.

name: Hayfever Remedy
preparation: Shake strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Elmo
preparation: Pour southern comfort amaretto vodka and sour mix into a shaker. Fill with sprite shake and strain (or roll) into a glass.

name: Attitude Adjustment #2
preparation: Pour all ingredents into a mixing tin with ice and strain into glass.

name: Black Baltimore
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Pixie Stix
preparation: Pour southern comfort and amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix top with sprite and float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Nagshead Lemonade
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Zoo Station
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Baltimore Eggnog
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Baltimore Bracer
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Holy Water
preparation: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water then add one dash of grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

name: Red Rattlesnake
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass shake and serve.

name: Lava Lamp
preparation: Pour a shot of DeKuyper raspberry pucker schnapps into a shot glass. Place the shot glass inside the bottom of a pint glass. Pour Bacardi silver rum around the outside of shot glass (but inside the pint glass) and carefully float some on top of the raspberry pucker by pouring over the back of a spoon pressed against the inside of the shot glass. Top it all off with Guinness. If done correctly all ingredients should stay separated until the drink is downed in one fell swoop.

name: Go With the Flow
preparation: Pour each ingredient over cracked ice into highball glass and stir gently. Serve.

name: Light Flow
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Malibu Express
preparation: Blend and serve on ice.

name: Lava Shot
preparation: Add all three ingredients to a shot glass and serve.

name: Virgin Banana Colada
preparation: Cut the banana into chunks and add to a blender. Add the pineapple juice coconut cream and crushed ice. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Caribbean Breeze #2
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Kevin on the Floor
preparation: Pour the rums over some crushed ice in a tall collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: Andrea's Colada Collision
preparation: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.

name: Pina Colada #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with crushed ice. Mix well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple and serve.

name: Tropical Life Saver
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Then add the Malibu and Midori. Then fill the remainder of the glass up with Pineapple Juice. Shake and enjoy!

name: Lava Lamp
preparation: Pour grenadine over ice in a highball glass. Add absolut citron and fill with apple juice.

name: Havana Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Heavy Flow
preparation: Combine and mix vodka schnapps and gin over ice in a tall glass. Pour and add equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Add 2 counts of grenadine and mix.

name: Alien Secretion
preparation: Combine and mix all ingredients in equal portions and serve.

name: Sundowner
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tipsy Island
preparation: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

name: Fluffy Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rums and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain over crushed ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Midori Pearl Diver
preparation: Add Midori and Malibu to a highball glass full of ice. Fill glass with pineapple juice. Stir and serve.

name: Amaretto Cola
preparation: Put some ice into a glass and pour a shot of amaretto over the ice. Then take the cola and pour it in to the glass and stir it together. Add the wedge of lemon on the rim of the glass and enjoy.

name: The Nick
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Full Moon
preparation: Pour above ingredients into an ice-filled rocks glass and serve.

name: K-Dawg's Apple Pie
preparation: Pour the amaretto into a cup. Add a tablespoon of cinnamon schnapps and fill with apple juice. Stir and serve warm.

name: Almond Joy
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Amaretto Sour #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously pour over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Apricot Brandy Sour
preparation: Pour apricot brandy. Add lemon juice. Fill in with orange juice and add ice cubes. Shake. Optional: Add 1/2 oz triple sec or 1 teaspoon grenadine.

name: Winter Parker
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Amaretto Sombrero
preparation: Mix in lowball glass.

name: Bend Me Over
preparation: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice if desired.

name: Amaretto Sour #3
preparation: Pour the amaretto lemon juice and simple syrup into a shaker two-thirds full of ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sour glass. Garnish with the cherry and serve.

name: Creamsicle #7
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker or blender with crushed ice depending whether you want it chilled or not. May have to adjust orange juice and cream for taste whether you like it tart or not. These are just approx. on juice and cream. Excellent drink for the person who likes creamy drinks.

name: Amaretto Frappe
preparation: Add to a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with short straws and a cherry.

name: Amaretto Heartwarmer
preparation: Warm the southern comfort and add the almonds peach and sugar. Stir. Allow to cool and add the vermouth and amaretto. Stir again and strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Chocolate Snow Bear
preparation: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Orgasm #9
preparation: Pour all three ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Windjammer
preparation: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top with a maraschino cherry.

name: Amaretto Cherry Sour
preparation: Chill all ingredients before serving. Pour over crushed ice in a medium-sized cocktail glass and stir well. Top with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Night
preparation: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add amaretto to taste. Stir and serve.

name: A True Amaretto Sour
preparation: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good frosted rim. Shake amaretto with lemon juice and strain into the glass; over ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Italian Delight
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Homecoming
preparation: Pour amaretto and baileys into an ice-filled rocks glass. Add a stirrer and serve.

name: Burning Sunset
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass; add grenadine last. Serve and admire the sunset!

name: Turby's Amaretto
preparation: No matter what size glass used make sure the amount of pepsi to amaretto is at least 2 to 1 (as shown). Stir the drink lightly and add coke/other ingredients to suit your personal taste.

name: Agincourt Cocktail
preparation: Pour vermouths amaretto and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Saronno Rose
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Scotch Holiday Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Watermelon Shooter #4
preparation: Add ingredients in a shaker tin with ice stir and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
preparation: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1 of pineapple juice 1/2 of melon liqeur and 1/2 to 1/4 of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner. This is made in a blender hence the measurements are according to a blender.

name: Cosmic Kool-Aid
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass. Drop in two maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Nuts and Cream
preparation: Pour ingrdients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Milky Way Galaxy
preparation: Combine milk amaretto and vanilla extract in a blender for 60 seconds. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and sprinkle with cinnamon. Stir with a straw and serve.

name: Rye Sour
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a whiskey sour glass add a cherry and serve.

name: Foxy Lady
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Amaretto And Cream
preparation: Shake well with cracked ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bacci Ball
preparation: Serve with ice and stir.

name: Amaretto 151
preparation: Pour amaretto sweet and sour mix and bacardi into a cocktail shaker. Shake and serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Almond Fog
preparation: Mix the Amaretto and Bailey's together in a cocktail shaker; strain into a coffee mug. Add milk to taste/to fill the mug and serve.

name: Buttery Nutty Squirrel
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Amaretto Alexander
preparation: Combine liquers in shaker along with cream and ice. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Cactus Juice
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order.

name: A Piece of Ass
preparation: Pour liquors over ice in a glass. Fill with sour mix and serve.

name: Royal Temptation
preparation: Blend ingredients in a cocktail glass rimmed with white and brown chocolate flakes. Serve.

name: Cherry Lifesaver
preparation: Pour both ingredients over a small handful of crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Almond Grove
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Rock Lobster #2
preparation: Layer ingredients in order into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Silver Cloud
preparation: Mix amaretto kahlua and milk together. Fill with ice cubes and top with whipped cream.

name: Dirty Sewer
preparation: Combine ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Mafia's Kiss
preparation: Add amaretto southern comfort and sour mix to an ice-filled glass. Stir and serve.

name: White Dove
preparation: Pour amaretto and cream de cacao into a blender cup with the ice cream. Blend until smooth like a shake. Line the inside of a snifter glass with chocolate syrup. Pour drink into a cup and top with whipped cream. Add cherry to top.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
preparation: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

name: Pisco Sour #2
preparation: Shake ingredients vigorously with ice. Strain into a champagne flute and add the bitters as an aromatic garnish.

name: Nutty Italian
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass and serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Butternut
preparation: Add schnapps and amaretto to a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate and top with whipped cream.

name: Amaretto Sunrise Crush
preparation: Blend orange juice amaretto grenadine and ice cubes in blender until smooth. Pour into margarita/coupette glass and add lemon juice.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
preparation: In a shaker tin with ice add sour mix tequila and amaretto. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Wet Dream
preparation: Mix all ingredients except chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float chambord to the bottom of the glass.

name: Vodka Amaretto Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mexican Kelman
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Frozen Passion Margarita
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend. Strain into a margarita glass rimmed with coarse salt garnish with a wheel of lime and serve.

name: Tequila Screwdriver
preparation: Pour a shot of Tequila in glass and fill with orange juice. Stir.

name: Peach Harpoon
preparation: Stir together in an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Mexican Flag
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients into a highball glass (using a spoon) in the order given; grenadine creme de menthe tequila. The layers form the mexican flag.

name: Fuzzy Sunrise
preparation: Pour the tequila peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.

name: Mexican Colada
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Adam Sunrise
preparation: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with bartons vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

name: White Bull
preparation: Pour ice into a glass add tequila and kahlua fill with cream shake and serve.

name: Green Mexican
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add tequila and midori fill rest of glass with sour mix and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Naked Surfer
preparation: Pour vodka half-way up an ice-filled beer mug. Add roughly a shot of grenadine. Fill with orange juice stir and serve.

name: Arizona Sunrise
preparation: Add ice into a tall-stemed cocktail glass pour grenadine over ice add enough that some settles on the bottom of the glass Add tequila orange juice and lime juice into shaker with ice. Shake thourghly. Garnish with a straw lime wedge OR orange and cherry.

name: Tequila Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Tequila Body Slammer
preparation: Put salt on some part of somebody else's body. Hold shot glass in left hand and lemon in right hand. Lick salt slam the tequila then suck lemon.

name: Mango Sunrise
preparation: Pour the mango liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and top with grenadine. Serve unstirred.

name: Campbell F. Craig
preparation: Pour the tequila orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the Chambord into the center of the drink.

name: Mexican Screw
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cowgirl's Prayer
preparation: Pour the tequila and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with lemonade and stir well. Garnish with slices of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Tequila Bay Breeze
preparation: Blend.

name: Coconut Tequila
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Pour into a medium-sized cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Tequila
preparation: Shake ingredients and pour into a champagne tulip. Top with dry sparkling wine and serve.

name: Poker Face
preparation: Pour tequila Cointreau and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Shady Lady
preparation: Pour melon liqueur tequila and grapefruit juice over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime top with the cherry and serve.

name: Ethiopian Camel Basher
preparation: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroughly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color but not one nor the other.

name: Creamsicle Drink
preparation: Put ice in Tall glass; add orange juice papaya juice and top with grenadine. Pour in blender and whip til ice melts; juice will be a little frozen. Pour in glass. Top with Cherry.

name: Russian Sunrise
preparation: Mix with ice in a collins glass. Orange juice to taste.

name: Frogster
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice add the blue curacao add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color fill the glass with the orange juice.

name: Latin Lover
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice add a pineapple chunk and serve.

name: Perfect Margarita
preparation: 1. Pour ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice. Squeeze in the juice of two lime wedges and shake well. 2. Rim the outside of a white wine glass with lime and salt and add fresh crushed ice. 3. Strain the shaken mixture into the glass and add the juice from a further lime wedge. Serve.

name: German Hooker (Die Deutsche Nutte)
preparation: In a shaker half filled with crushed ice combine tequila and apfelkorn. Shake well. Strain into a high-ball glass filled with a few ice cubes. Fill up with orange juice. Serve with salt and lemon as a usual tequila shot.

name: Tequila Gimlet
preparation: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Flaming Armageddon
preparation: Pour a can of Sparks energy drink shared between 2 seperate beer mugs. Shake tequila Jagermeister and Rumple Minze on ice and strain into 2 seperate shot glasses. Add 151 to the top of each and ignite. Drop shots into the beer glasses with Sparks in and drink. Serves 2.

name: John Stalker
preparation: Use proper alcoholic grenadine (e.g Harvey's of Bristol). Combine the tequila and grenadine in a highball glass top with 7-up stir briefly and serve.

name: Spic
preparation: Pour in all ingredients then mix completely so that the drink turns a red color. Add more Grenadine for a sweeter thicker taste.

name: Tequila Fizz #2
preparation: Pour tequila lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda stir well and serve.

name: Lemonade Lush
preparation: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Tequila and Tonic
preparation: Pour 2 1/2 ounces Cuervo Gold Tequila over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with tonic. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Mexicola
preparation: Pour tequila and juice of lime over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with cola stir and serve.

name: Border Crossing
preparation: Pour the tequila lime juice lemon juice and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Bittersweet With A Twist
preparation: Add all liquid ingredients to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

name: Frozen Tequila Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with finely shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Cape Sunrise
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum over ice cubes in a highball glass and fill with guava juice. Stir drizzle grenadine on top and serve.

name: Tequila Sunrise Jello Shot
preparation: Bring 1 cup of water to a boil. Pour the water into a bowl and stir in 1 package of orange jello for 2 minutes or until the jello is completely dissolved. Allow the jello mix to cool for a little while before adding the tequila this will help prevent alcohol loss. When the mix is cool mix in your favorite brand of tequila. If desired spray cups with PAM cooking spray to prevent sticking. (Don't worry you will not taste it) Pour into shot glasses or small plastic cup Chill for at least 4 hours for it to set. Serve

name: Jeannie in a Bottle
preparation: Combine ingredients in shaker. Shake vigorously with ice and pour (incl. ice) into highball glass. Serve.

name: Tequila (Straight)
preparation: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt slam the tequila then suck lemon.

name: Slim's Sunrise
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice stir and serve.

name: Tender Loving Care
preparation: Pour a premium tequila over a handful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add cola. Garnish with a thick slice of lime and serve.

name: Henny Sunrise
preparation: Combine Hennessey Cola and Sour mix in a Highball glass. Give it a short shake and top it with Grenadine.

name: Bloody Hurricane
preparation: Pour tequila into a collins glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Add 7-Up and splash grenadine. Allow to chill for 10 seconds. Serve.

name: Rieber Red Margarita
preparation: Add strawberry margarita mix tequila and triple sec to a blender with crushed ice. Blend and serve with a straw in a chilled glass or mug.

name: Malibu Sunrise
preparation: Pour malibu rum in a highball glass and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side. (by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly) The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Enjoy!

name: OJ's Revenge
preparation: Drink out of an orange juice carton until about 3/4 or 1/2 full. Fill the carton the rest of the way with tequila (almost to the top) then pour just a little raspberry vodka in. Put the top back on the carton and mix very well. Stand in a circle with friends take a swig of it and then pass it around the circle until it's empty.

name: Carabinieri
preparation: Shake well with ice serve in high glass half filled with ice.

name: Paloma
preparation: Pour the tequila into a salt-rimmed collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Splash lime juice on top and serve.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon float the galliano on top of the drink and serve.

name: Flip Passion
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dream Cocktail
preparation: Shake strain into highball glass with ice and serve.

name: Big Red Hooter
preparation: Pour Tequila and Amaretto over ice into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Champange Rita
preparation: Pour the tequila and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Add limeade and champagne stir briefly and serve.

name: Guilty O.J.
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the contents into a highball glass and top with grenadine. Garnish with 2 crushed maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Fuzzy Pierced Navel
preparation: Pour over ice stir.

name: Harvest Moon
preparation: Pour first 4 ingredients over ice into a collins glass slowly adding grenadine as you stir.

name: Bangin' Margarita
preparation: Rim a hurricane glass lip with salt (moisten with some lime juice). Add the tequila triple sec and Rose's lime juice then fill the rest of the glass with ice cubes until the level of liquor reaches the salt rimmed top. Serve.

name: Tequila Collins
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several ice cubes fill with club soda and stir. Decorate with slices of lemon and orange and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Grenadine Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients with plenty of ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Tequila Sunset
preparation: Pour tequila into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and stir well. Top with blackberry brandy and stir lightly. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Paloma #2
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice to the top. Squeeze in juice of half of a small lime. Sprinkle salt over top. Add tequila. Fill with Squirt. Give a little stir then sprinkle a little salt on the top before serving (optional).

name: Pacific Sunshine
preparation: Mix with cracked ice and pour with ice into a chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Cazuela
preparation: In a cazuela that is made of clay put ice salt lime orange lemon and grapefruit. Add grenadine tequila and fill with squirt. Use a straws to shake and serve.

name: Cinco de Mayo #2
preparation: Pour the watermelon schnapps into a collins glass. Fill halfway with ice. Stand up a gold foil covered chocolate coin in ice against the contour of the glass. Fill rest of glass with ice. Now that the schnapps has chilled tilt the glass and gently pour in the tequila. Cut up a lemon and squeeze the juice of two wedges into the tequila and carefully bring the drink to about an ounce and a half from full with 7-Up or Sprite. Float the Midori on the top. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Caribbean Madras
preparation: Pour the dark rum orange juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Haacker Special
preparation: Pour vodka into a glass. Add sugar and a suitable amount of crushed ice with the lime cubes. Stir until all sugar is dissolved.

name: Saskatchewan Paralyzer
preparation: Fill a chilled highball glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua and vodka. Pour in cola next. Very important otherwise the milk will curdle. Top with cold milk and a cherry for the ladies. Add a straw. The drink should be served unstirred. You can just use 1-oz vodka if you don't have Kahlua. You can also substute the vodka with tequila.

name: Mexican Madras
preparation: Pour juices and tequila into a shaker 1/2 filled with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Heated Cape Cod
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a saucepan and heat gently. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Russian Turkey
preparation: Stir together in an old-fashioned/rocks glass with ice.

name: Morgan Madras
preparation: Pour the spiced rum orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Parrot Bay Mango Madras
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay mango rum over ice in a collins glass. Add cranberry and orange juice stir and serve.

name: Cranberry Frog
preparation: Shake vigorously. Serve.

name: O Madras
preparation: Blend ingredients with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Orangatang
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender jar cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: A Gilligan's Island
preparation: Shaken not stirred.

name: Green Widow
preparation: Pour blue curacao into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice over it. Stir and serve cold.

name: Lady in Green
preparation: Shake strain into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Baldini Blues
preparation: Pour vodka blue curaao and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a champagne flute then top with Prosecco wine and serve.

name: Nuclear Waste #3
preparation: Combine the orange juice blue Curacao liqueur and vodka in a small punch bowl or large pitcher. Chill for about 3 hours until cold. Just before serving add the ginger ale. Stir gently. Serve over ice. Makes about 8 cups.

name: Gooseberry Jam
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. Shake until slightly frothy pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Dutch summer
preparation: Shake Vodka Cointreaux orange juice with plenty of ice Strain in glass with sugary edge add dash of Blue Curacao Add piece of knotted orange peel

name: Hawaiian Seduction
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Mashed Kermit
preparation: Prepare vodka jelly as on the packet of jello however substitute vodka in place of the water (required additional vodka to above). Mix the above liquids; vodka blue curacao and orange juice in a highball glass. Drop a lump of the prepared jelly into the glass and down the entire drink.

name: Cool Kid
preparation: Pour ingredients in a hurricane glass mix it up and serve.

name: Vampire
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice. Serve as shots in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Sinlet
preparation: Mix the ingredients with a great deal of ice cubes and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Dead Bastard
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tall glass over ice stir and serve.

name: Dead Hitler
preparation: Fill a shot glass equally in parts with Rumple Minze Jgermeister and Goldschlager.

name: Dead Pirate Seaspray
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Dead Dog
preparation: Add in the order given and enjoy!

name: Dead Lizard
preparation: Pour vodka into glass. Add cordial until colour becomes light red. Add coke until definite colour change occurs. Drink.

name: Screaming Dead Nazi
preparation: Pour all in shot glass one by one. Set a flame blow it out and enjoy.

name: Dead Man Walking
preparation: Pour both ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Dead Man's Handle
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Bullet to the Head
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice pour in the ingredients as listed then pour the glass' contents into a blender and use the blender to make it smooth. Pour back into the glass and serve.

name: Dead Grasshopper
preparation: Shake creme de menthe creme de cacao and milk with ice cubes in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and add a dash of aftershock. Do not stir.

name: Dead Green Frog
preparation: Chill on ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Sperm
preparation: Fill the slammer glass with tequila and vodka and drop carefully some cream in it.

name: Our Stanley
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dead Dog Vomit
preparation: In a high-ball glass add one shot of 151 proof rum and then layer each of the other ingredents on top.

name: Orlando Amethyst
preparation: Stir the gin and chambord raspberry liqueur together in a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Dead Baby Boy
preparation: Pour the gin and tonic into a highball glass. Attach the olive to the sugar cube with a piece of dental floss and drop it into the drink. When the sugar cube has dissolved the olive will float to the surface. The olive represents the dead baby boy and the sugarcube is the ballast.

name: I See Dead People
preparation: Serve in equal parts in a 2-oz shot glass.

name: Dead Man Walking
preparation: Mix the Jack Daniel's and Jagermeister into a 2-oz shot glass and shoot. Chase with tequila.

name: Dead Nazi
preparation: Chill ingredients before use. Pour rumple minze into a shot glass and add jagermeister. Serve.

name: Russian Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Screw The City
preparation: Pour vodka and Cointreau over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add cranberry juice and a splash of orange juice. Shake vigorously and pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Take an orange peel (about 1 in.) squeeze it over a match on top of the cocktail. Place orange peel in cocktail and serve.

name: Karoff
preparation: Pour the vodka cranberry juice and club soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Pavlova Peach
preparation: Pour the Stoli peach vodka (Persik) cranberry juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and pour entire contents into a double old-fashioned glass with several ice cubes. Garnish with a peach slice and serve.

name: Shotgun Lou
preparation: Mix brandy milk and brown sugar on ice. Top with ginger ale and serve.

name: Affair
preparation: Pour schnapps orange juice and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

name: Rosetta
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel and serve.

name: NT Pucker Punch Fizz
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bluesberry Cooler
preparation: Fill coctail chimney glass with crushed ice fill 3/4 full with club soda add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #4
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail or martini shaker with ice and 2 squeezed lime wedges. Shake violently for 10 seconds. Strain into a martini or cocktail glass garnished with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Luscious Leslie
preparation: Pour equal shots of Malibu coconut rum Southern Comfort amaretto almond liqueur and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with pineapple juice and add just a splash of grenadine. Shake well to mix all ingredients and serve.

name: Hari Kari
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Luscious Butta
preparation: Pour Bailey's Irish cream into a cocktail glass. Add Hennessy. Stir and serve at room temperature.

name: Something Peachie
preparation: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange.

name: Midweek Tweak
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

name: Masterblaster
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Leprechaun Bomb
preparation: Shake liquors in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass with Red Bull already in it. The mixture will start off bright green and get darker.

name: Heart Attack
preparation: Pour over Ice and serve. Your heart will race.

name: Kleinfeld
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into a collins glass and serve.

name: Beeta Bomb
preparation: Pour Red Bull into a small glass. Add vodka. In a double-shot glass pour the peach schnapps and carefully place the shot glass into the small glass containing the Red Bull and vodka. Serve.

name: Excitabull
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps and Red Bull into a tall glass. Stir. Top with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Fizzy Green Hunnit
preparation: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Red Bull stir and serve.

name: Jungle Juice #2
