preparation: Mix all equal parts shake and strain. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Matisse
preparation: Pour stoli oranj over ice in a shaker and shake. Glaze a chilled cocktail glass with chambord and add the stoli oranj. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Neopolitan Martini
preparation: Pour stoli vanil stoli oranj grand marnier parfait d'amour and lime juice into a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with orange peel.

name: Ohranj Juice
preparation: Pour the Stoli orange vodka (Ohranj) peach schnapps and cranberry juice into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Laurie Goes Hawaiian
preparation: Pour the Stoli flavored vodkas Malibu rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of fresh pineapple and serve.

name: Love Potion #2
preparation: Chill all ingredients over ice strain into a chilled shot glass serve and enjoy.

name: Apples and Oranges Martini
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a large pitcher with ice. Stir 50 times to properly dilute the drink and remove ice. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use. Pour into a chilled martini glasses. Garnish each with a twist of orange peel and an apple slice and serve.

name: Guthrie
preparation: Pour all liquors into a highball glass. Fill remainder of the glass with equal parts sweet and sour mix and Sprite or 7-Up.

name: Jamaica Me Crazy
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in rum and tia maria. Add pineapple juice.

name: Down Under
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kick Me in the Jimmy
preparation: Combine in mixing tin with ice shake and strain.

name: Peach Me Tender
preparation: Shake ingredients and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange.

name: Long Walk off a Short Pier
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a tall 16-oz glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Coca-cola completely or to taste. Stir well and serve.

name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
preparation: Best in a large mason jar. Blue going down blue coming up.

name: Kiss Me Quick
preparation: Mix in a highball glass.

name: Down Home Punch #3
preparation: Blend the orange juice ginger ale and Seagram's gin in a blender. Once well blended cut and add lemon. Blend further and strain into two tall glasses to serve.

name: Walk the Plank
preparation: Pour rum over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Broken Down Golf Cart #2
preparation: Place amaretto melon liqueur cranberry juice and ice in a shaker. Then strain into a shot glass.

name: Throw Me Down and Fuck Me
preparation: Place the two liquors into the bottom of a shot glas. Add pineapple juice and grenadine mix well and serve.

name: Motherfucker #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Pick Me Up Jose
preparation: Lay a shot glass in a clean ash tray right side up and start to pour the drinks into the glass until they overflow into the ash tray. Ignite the liquor blow it out take the shot from the shot glass then drink out of the ash tray.

name: Kiss Me Slow
preparation: Stir ingredients together into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blue Motorcycle #2
preparation: Fill glass with ice add the ingredients shake and serve.

name: Broken Down Golf Cart
preparation: Shake and strain through ice.

name: Fuck Me By The Pool
preparation: Start with one part Blue Maui add one part Peach schnapps and finish it up with orange juice.

name: Hypnotize Me
preparation: Mix together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Sea Dragon
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Ultimate June Bug
preparation: Blend all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Jamaican Rum Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a blender or punch bowl. Pour over ice cubes in any type of glass.

name: Goombay Smash
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and shake. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Bahamas Rum Punch
preparation: Mix it up varying the ingredients to taste. Balance the Orange and Pineapple add a little Malibu rum till you can slightly taste the coconut then enough Campari to redden it and then make up the rest with rum. A delicious and authentic island drink that will make you very drunk if you aren't careful ('cuz its so good to drink!).

name: Midori Splice
preparation: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

name: Liquid Marijuana Shot
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Scooby Snack #4
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake until blended pour into a rocks or old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Creamy Sex on the Beach
preparation: Pour the vodka Malibu rum peach schnapps pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the whipped cream and shake vigorously until frothy. Pour into a small highball glass or equivalent and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Breeze
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain over ice into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Hypnotic Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a martini or cocktail glass and serve.

name: Caribbean Breeze
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve!

name: Watermelon Pucker Fucker
preparation: Mix in a hurricane glass.

name: Rum Runner
preparation: Add Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum blackberry liqueur crme de banana liqueur orange juice grenadine and crushed ice in a blender. Blend until slushy and pour into glass.

name: Watermelon Shooter #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients in any order into a sifting glass filled with ice. Shake for 5 seconds and pour the chilled contents into your cocktail glass.

name: Green Lantern #2
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a cocktail glass. Add crushed ice fill with Jone's green apple soda stir and serve.

name: Green Lizard
preparation: Combine either Wild Turkey 151 or Bacardi 151 proof rum with the green chartreuse in an old-fashioned rocks glass or serve up in a cocktail glass.

name: Aztec Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch so don't over do it.

name: Green Dream
preparation: Blend on low speed with ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Emerald Isle #2
preparation: Stir with ice and serve.

name: Gold Emerald Shooter
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Beezer Punch
preparation: Stir the vodka rum and orange juice together over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute garnish with a green maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Electric Lizard
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Lime Green Sensation
preparation: Add ingredients to martini shaker with ice shake well strain into cocktail glass and enjoy!

name: Snow Blinder
preparation: Pour vodka in blender and add ice cream. Blend. Top with lemonade.

name: Green Fairy
preparation: Shake thoroughly with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Green Room
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hard Green Bricaki
preparation: Fill a glass with ice and add liquors. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Shake well and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

name: Green Angel
preparation: Blend pisang ambon peachtree schnapps malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in a collins glass and pour the mix over. Fill up with sprite and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.

name: Green Card
preparation: Pour the Grey Goose vodka into a double-shot glass. Add the Makers Mark bourbon whiskey the Cointreau orange liqueur and Rose's infused blue raspberry mixer (the mixture should turn a dirty green); serve.

name: Green Machine
preparation: Pour the Hpnotiq into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill up with Mountain Dew soda. Stir slightly; the drink will turn a bright green. Serve.

name: Hard Lemon Ice
preparation: Combine lemonade and vodka with ice in a blender. Blend until slurpee consistency and pour into collins glasses topped with a touch of raspberry syrup.

name: Green Headache
preparation: Mix in a cocktail glass and slam it! Be prepared for a five-alarm headache if you do too many of these.

name: Green Goblin
preparation: Cider First Lager then Curacao

name: Green Demon #2
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a highball glass. Add green hawaiian punch. Stir well and serve.

name: Green Eyed Blonde
preparation: Layer carefully in a shot glass.

name: Green Casa Noble
preparation: Shake ingredients in a mixing glass with ice except lime twist then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

name: Green Goblin Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Serve with a lime wedge.

name: Celeste Sunrise
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur strawberry liqueur advocaat and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with lemonade until frothy. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Liquid Rocher
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cordial glass. Enjoy.

name: Cum in your Mouth
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tully's Nuts & Berries
preparation: Pour ingredients into chiller and pour into shot glass.

name: Berries 'n Cream
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with the crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a single large glass two medium-sized glasses or 4/5 cocktail glasses. Garnish with strawberries blueberries or raspberries.

name: No Fucking Idea
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes (on the rocks) and serve.

name: Creamy Crispy Crunch
preparation: Shake with ice (drink should be a bit foamy). Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Jose and Ginger
preparation: Pour Jose Cuervo gold tequila into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Add ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Black and Fall
preparation: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie and Hot Chocolate
preparation: Add liqueurs to a mug of hot chocolate. Stir top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. Enjoy!

name: Lick and a Promise
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka Cointreau cranberry juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle Midori melon liqueur on top and serve.

name: Banana Nut
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Monk's Nuts
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a shot glass and layer the cream on top. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Southern Comfort and Lime
preparation: Mix 4oz. Southern Comfort and 2 oz. Lime juice in a shaker half filled with ice. Shake until the outside surface of shaker is cool to the touch. Serve on the rocks or neat in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with lemon wedge and enjoy!

name: To Hell With Swords And Garter
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: George and Ginger
preparation: Pour george dickel over ice into a tall glass. Add ginger ale and stir.

name: Rye and Pepper
preparation: Pour whiskey into a glass with ice. Add dr. pepper stir and serve.

name: Friar Tuck
preparation: Shake and pour into a v-shape and garnish with cinnamon.

name: Field of Hearts
preparation: In a cocktail glass layer the strawberry liqueur onto the midori. Shake and strain frangelico and layer onto the strawberry liqueur. On top of the creamy layer add a couple of drops of red or pink food dye run a toothpick through the center of each drop to create a heart shape. Garnish with an open strawberry.

name: Alize and Hpno
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Nun
preparation: Pour frangelico into a brandy snifter glass. Add honey lemon peel and cloves and fill snifter with hot water.

name: Nutty Irishman
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into a chilled stemmed or rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Smooth Operator
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice. Strain into cocktail glass(es).

name: Canadian and Campari
preparation: Pour the whisky Campari bitters and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Nuts 'n Berries
preparation: Mix and chill in a mixing tin. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Toblerone #2
preparation: Blend ingredients with ice until a creamy consistancy is reached. Don't add too much ice this will make the drink too thick. Pour into a honey lined glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and an open strawberry.

name: End of the Road
preparation: Put all the ingredients in a shaker (except the nuts) add ice and shake well. Pour in the glass and add the nuts on top.

name: Bitches Tit
preparation: Pour the chamborde into a shaker add cream or milk and shake well. Pour into an Irish Cream mug filled with ice. Enjoy!

name: Butter Pecan
preparation: Pour frangelico into a double-cocktail glass and add the ice-cream. Coarsely chop the pecan nuts and put them in.

name: Liquid Snickers
preparation: Pour creme de cacao irish cream and frangelico liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Top with light cream stir and serve.

name: Peanut Butter Cup #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice shake strain into an old-fashioned glass straight up or on the rocks. (Note: you can substitute any chocolate liqueur for the Godiva including dark creme de cacao Vermeer Bailey's Irish cream or Cask & Creme Chocolate Temptation. If you use a cream liqueur you can cut down on the half and half.)

name: Snicker
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Meredith's Skip and Go Naked
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl mix and serve chilled.

name: Hot Nuts
preparation: Pour Amaretto and Frangelico into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream then slowly pour 1/8 oz. Cherry Brandy in a circular motion on to the whipped creamtop with a cherry.

name: Raspberry Trouffle
preparation: Pour in chambord into an ice-filled glass. Add amaretto and balance with cream. Shake and serve with a straw and a cherry garnish. Good with desserts.

name: Raspberry Kiss
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: G-Boy
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a sour glass.

name: Monk's Rope Coffee
preparation: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and creme de cacao; stir. Float the heavy cream on top and serve.

name: Nuck'n Futs
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail glass with crushed/shaven ice stir and serve.

name: Heavenly Orgasm
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/3 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Irish Monk
preparation: Pour liqueurs into an irish coffee cup. Fill with good quality hot chocolate. Add plenty of whipped cream.

name: Nut Crusher
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Sprinkle with chopped hazelnuts and serve.

name: Vixen
preparation: Pour grenadine and frangelico into an ice-filled cocktail shaker and shake until frothy. Strain into a chilled martini glass and slowly add the kahlua. Garnish with a cherry or hershey's kiss and serve.

name: End of My Rope
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur creme de bananes pineapple juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple Dream
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Cinnamon Nuts and Cream
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Diana Cocktail
preparation: Pour the white creme de menthe into a brandy snifter filled with crushed ice. Carefully pour the brandy over the back of a teaspoon in order to float it on top of the creme de menthe. Serve.

name: Tipperary Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Delmonico Cocktail
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin brandy sweet vermouth dry vermouth and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: New York Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Chartreuse Cocktail
preparation: Stir and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Ojen Cocktail
preparation: Pour the ojen peychaud bitters sugar and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sarah Cocktail
preparation: Pour vodka cherry brandy dry vermouth Campari and creme de bananes into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Milkshake Cocktail
preparation: Combine the Bailey's irish cream milk egg yolk lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Panama Cocktail
preparation: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Spencer Cocktail
preparation: Shake brandy gin orange juice and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel top with the cherry and serve.

name: Debonaire Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together to chill strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Sand-Martin Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Nantucket Cocktail
preparation: Pour the white brandy cranberry juice and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Dempsey Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
preparation: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Loftus Special
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime juice) well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice add lime juice and serve.

name: King Kong
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and combine on medium power for 45 seconds. Serve in a pitcher with a cute umbrella and a straw.

name: ChoozyMothers Milk
preparation: In a large kettle (lobster pot) mix the Bacardi 151 Dark Rum Bacardi White Rum Kahlua Milk and Vanilla Ice Cream (keep the ice cream in its form from the carton). Stir and mix in the cinnamon powder.

name: Pain in the Ass
preparation: Pour Midori melon liqueur Bacardi 151 Sour Apple Pucker and Malibu Rum into a highball glass. Top off with pineapple juice and 7-Up stir and serve.

name: Daredevil
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Tiffany's Wet and Ready
preparation: Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of grenadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry pineapple or other fruit slice.

name: Hell on Earth
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Bahama Todd
preparation: Add light rum dark rum spiced rum and malibu rum to an ice-filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top and serve.

name: Texas Sling
preparation: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass topped with whipped cream.

name: Harlee's Planters Punch
preparation: Measure light and dark rum into a glass. Add the juices and grenadine shake well then top with 151 rum. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Wet and Wild Lip Tickler
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: The Shanaynay
preparation: Mix the water and rum and add powdered lemonade mix to taste. Stir and serve.

name: No Pressure
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass one-third full with frozen strawberry daiquiri mix. Carefully layer the frozen pina colada mix until two-thirds full. Add a splash of blue curacao on top and insert a straw. Fill with 151 proof rum.

name: New Orleans Hurricane
preparation: Shake all ingredients except 151-proof rum in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass and float the 151-proof rum on top. Drink through a straw from the bottom up.

name: Flaming Mo
preparation: Pour Stoli peach vodka and Malibu rum into a shot glass. Top with enough 151 proof rum to be able to burn. Fill a pint glass with pineapple juice (right up to the level of the shot glass). Ignite the Stoli peach vodka/Malibu/151 mixture and allow to burn for a while. Pick up the burning shot glass drop it into the pint glass and slam it.

name: Scottie Mac
preparation: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first then Bailey's and float rum on top.

name: Paris Paradise
preparation: Pour ingredients into a blender mix together and serve in a beer pilsner.

name: Midori Splice
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Midori then Malibu and top with pineapple juice to create a layered effect. Serve.

name: Party Gras
preparation: Fill a mixing tin with ice. Pour the rum melon liqueur coconut rum and pineapple juice into tin and shake. Pour contents into a hurricane glass. Top it with a splash of orange juice and float a swirl of grenadine atop that. Garnish with an orange and cherry 'flag' and serve.

name: Guilty Verdict
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange juice and serve.

name: Tree Smacker
preparation: Add liquors then add juices. Color red with grenadine. Float the 151 proof rum.

name: Mountaineer On Acid
preparation: Mix in shaker and serve chilled.

name: Rain Man
preparation: Shake all ingredients together pour into a hurricane glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Pain Killer
preparation: Pour midori melon liqueur in an ice-filled collins glass. Almost-fill with equal parts; cranberry orange and pineapple juice. Add rum garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Fuzzy Leprechaun
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
preparation: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

name: Italian Surfer
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice filled glass. Stir to mix.

name: Bahama Mama #3
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Southern Bacardi
preparation: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in a hurricane glass stir and serve.

name: Metromelt
preparation: Mix hot chocolate to taste in a large mug. Add liquors top with whipped cream sprinkle with cinnamon and serve.

name: Hurricane New Orleans Style
preparation: Combine all ingredients mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in hurricane glass. Best enjoyed through a small straw. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired.

name: P'tit Caribou
preparation: Stir all ingredients together and serve in a chilled red wine glass.

name: Voodoo Dew
preparation: Pour shots into a mason jar or large glass. Add mountain dew mix well and serve.

name: Dick in the Dirt
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.

name: Ray-Ray
preparation: Shake and pour into a highball glass. Serve with a lemon slice centered between two cherries.

name: Hard Core
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the cola last. Hang orange on rim of glass.

name: Candy Cocktail
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour the 151 proof rum dr. pepper and amaretto stir and serve.

name: Bacardi Stinger
preparation: Add Amaretto and rum fill with coke and stir. Consume slowly this drink packs a punch.

name: Caribou Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli Kafya (a coffee-flavored vodka) into a cocktail glass. Top with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist add a coffee bean and serve.

name: 151 Reasons
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Ichabod Crane
preparation: Blend the ice cream with the Bols Pumpkin Smash and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur in a blender. Blend well and pour into a Champagne flute. Pour Bacardi 151 rum over the top and garnish with nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Wild Sex
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice pour in malibu peach schnapps and 151. Pour juices on top followed by a splash of grenadine. Use a shaker tin to cover the glass and give a couple of good shakes.

name: Shitface
preparation: Add rum grenadine and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.

name: Apple 151
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mug with ice and serve.

name: Caruso Blanco
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Leaning Tower
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Indispensable Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Rebel Yell Cocktail
preparation: Combine bourbon cointreau lemon juice and egg white in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Dusty Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with Scotch whisky. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Blonde Jenny
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Jamaican Tease
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Buttershots butterscotch schnapps and Malibu rum into a highball glass. Fill with chilled orange juice and serve.

name: Baby Aspirin
preparation: Pour equal parts into cup mix and pour into shot glass.

name: Fuzzy Nipple
preparation: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into highball glass and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

name: Razzberi Kazi
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cherry Blossom #3
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff Black Cherry vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with orange juice adding a splash of sour mix and touch of grenadine before serving.

name: Billionaire
preparation: Combine everything but the sour mix into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sour mix.

name: Tequila Stone Sour
preparation: Pour tequila into a cocktail glass. Add a splash of triple sec and fill with swee and sour mix and orange juice. Serve.

name: Tiger Jack
preparation: Pour a measure (depending on sweetness required 1/2 to 1 shot is average) of grenadine into a tall cool glass. In a cocktail shaker add ice 2 shots of Jack 1 shot of Triple Sec then top up with enough orange juice to fill the glass. Give it a good shake and pour slowly into the glass.

name: Triple Sec Sunrise
preparation: First fill glass 3/4 full with Orange Juice. Next add 1/4 Triple Sec. Finaly add Grenadine and mix thoroughly! Garnish with a slice of Orange. *If too weak add more Triple Sec.

name: Panama Red
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Southern Sour
preparation: In a medium glass half-filled with ice add jack daniels and southern comfort. Fill the remainder of the glass with 7-up or sprite. Add a squeeze of a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Russian Sunset
preparation: Mix vodka triple sec and sour mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled collins glass add a dash of grenadine to the top and swirl slightly. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice if desired and serve.

name: Hennessy and Cherry Coke
preparation: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add cherry coke stir lightly and serve.

name: Jack Leg
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey Amaretto Di Saronno pineapple juice and Sprite over ice in a mason jar and serve.

name: Stock Market Crash
preparation: Ice first next is the liquor and then the pop.

name: Misty
preparation: Prepare half a pint of lager. Seperately mix a Jack & Coke without ice. Pour your Jack Daniel's into a glass and pour over the coke. Once you have the two drinks pour the Jack D. mix into the half lager and stir a little. Serve.

name: Jack Rogers
preparation: Pour jack daniels over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke and lace with grenadine to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional) and serve.

name: Evil Jake
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey into a collins or similar tall glass filled with ice cubes. Pour Coca-cola into the glass and add Grenadine. Stir lightly. Pierce a maraschino cherry with a toothpick top and serve.

name: Jack Lemmon M.D.
preparation: Pour jack daniels and lemon juice over ice. Top off with dr. pepper. Garnish with a lemon slice. Stir.

name: Monkey Spanker
preparation: Pour 2 - 3 oz whiskey into a beer glass and fill with vernors ginger ale.

name: Nikki Sixx
preparation: Build over lots of ice in a highball glass. Squeeze a couple of lime wedges into the glass and fill up with Sprite.

name: Jim Kroener
preparation: Mix all the ingredients in a mason jar and enjoy!

name: Gas and Coke
preparation: Pour over ice into a highball glass.

name: Jack and Cherries
preparation: Put the ice cubes into a tall glass and add Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey. Stirring continuously add the Coca-cola grenadine cherry juice and top off with a cherry.

name: Jack-Off
preparation: Pour in one shot of jack daniel's on ice more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of coca-cola on top leaving room for the iced tea. Finally fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

name: Dr. Daniel
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Gently swirl to mix and serve.

name: Jack and Dewanne
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass (more or less mountain dew to taste) and serve.

name: Special K
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Neumann
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into an ice-filled highball glass. Add orange juice and serve.

name: Hennessy and Coke
preparation: Pour Hennessy cognac into a large collins glass filled with ice. Add Coca-cola stir lightly and serve.

name: Jack Hammer #3
preparation: Build in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Saturday Night Special
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey into a pint glass. Add Bacardi Breezer and serve.

name: Jillian's Yankee
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
preparation: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

name: Jack Pepper
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's into a collins glass over ice. Fill with dr pepper stir and serve.

name: Jack and Ginger
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour jack daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

name: Jake Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Beau's Rum and Coke
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a tall glass and add 3 - 5 ice cubes. Stir with a stirrer to get the vanilla off the bottom.

name: The Jumpin' Black Jack
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice pour in both liquors give a quick stir and serve.

name: Jack and Cherry Coke
preparation: Pour Jack Daniels into a large glass half-filled with ice. Pour cherry coke into the glass. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Dell Boy
preparation: Mix all ingredients except sprite. Pour into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with sprite. Garnish with red cherry and lime wheel.

name: Black Tooth
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's Dr. Pepper and Coca-Cola into a beer mug (pint glass). Fill up with ice and serve.

name: Blue Latvian
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey into a mixing glass. Add blue raspberry juice until the mixture is more blue than brown. Finish with lemon-lime soda until the mixture is fizzing. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Mir
preparation: Pour both shots over rocks in a highball glass. Fill with coke or soda of your choice.

name: Cactus Jack
preparation: Add all ingredients to a beer mug stir and serve.

name: Hennessy and Vanilla Coke
preparation: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a collins or other tall glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add vanilla coke stir lightly and serve.

name: Jack Your Melon
preparation: Pour the mountain dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Add the shots of watermelon schnapps and jack daniels to the glass stir and serve.

name: Coke and Drops
preparation: Take a glass pour the coke in the glass then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

name: Amaretto Jack
preparation: Shake amaretto and jack daniel's with ice and strain into an iced highball glass. Add equal parts pineapple and orange juice then splash with cherry syrup for colour. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry. Enjoy!

name: Pee Wee Herman
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

name: CJC
preparation: Mix the ingredients in equal parts in a highball glass and serve.

name: Cherasberry Rum and Coke
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cream of Jack
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey and amaretto into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add cream soda. Stir well and serve.

name: Jack and The Dr.
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey and Dr. Pepper into a tall glass stir and serve.

name: Snapple Sensation
preparation: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a hurricane glass with 4 lemon drops.

name: Agent Orange #2
preparation: Mix in a tall glass. Adjust orange juice to taste.

name: Jack-Off #2
preparation: Pour 2 ounces of Jack Daniel's into a collins glass. Add the Smirnoff Ice then top with an extra ounce of Jack Daniel's. Drink slowly.

name: Daisy Dueller
preparation: Shake the tennessee whiskey lemon juice simple syrup and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill to taste with club soda. Garnish with fruit slices and serve.

name: Bull Jacks
preparation: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster
preparation: Shake the orange juice the Jack and the peach schnapps in a shaker 3/4 full with ice cubes. When it's chilled strain into the highball glass and drizzle some of the blue Curacao liqueur over the top of it. Add a citrus twist (and bizarrely an olive if you're a DNA purist) sit back and be prepared to have your brain smashed out by gold bricks lemons and allsorts.

name: Bloody Jack
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's over roughly 3 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-cola until the glass is nearly full then add cherry grenadine. Mix together with a straw and serve.

name: Iced Jack
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Lithium Motherfucker
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Japanese Jack
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.

name: Fuck You #2
preparation: Fill a collins glass or pint glass half-way with Coca-cola. Add the Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and Jagermeister. Add the rest of the Coke and serve.

name: Flaming Cornholio
preparation: Mix the orange juice and jack daniel's in a beer mug and drop a shot glass of firewater in it.

name: Crucifix of Love
preparation: Pour Red Bull into glass over ice. Then add Jack then the shot of Bailey's. Drink quickly.

name: Jack Brisk
preparation: Pour Jack Daniels into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes then fill with lipton brisk stir and serve.

name: Jailbreak
preparation: Pump Guinness and Coke into a wine glass. Mix Kahlua Jack Daniel's and Amaretto separately with some crushed ice. Pour over the Guinness and Coke. Serve unstirred.

name: Alaskan Thunder
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's Southern Comfort and raspberry schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice top with a splash of sour mix and serve.

name: Ciclon and Coke
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Ciclon rum over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add Coke to fill or to taste and serve.

name: Binford
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain over ice in a 16-oz highball glass.

name: Captain's Shadow
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Captain Do
preparation: Pour rum into a large glass and add soda/mountain dew.

name: Captain's Son
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with 3-4 ice cubes and serve.

name: Skittles
preparation: Add Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum and Coca-Cola to a collins glass. In a seperate container mix all of the pineapple starfruit concentrate and the berry punch together. Pour into the collins glass until full stir and serve.

name: Captain Creamsicle
preparation: Add captain morgan's to a blender. Add equal parts vanilla ice-cream and orange sherbert to taste and blend well. Pour over ice in a medium glass and serve. NOTE: Orange juice can be substitued for sherbert.

name: Pirate's Float
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a glass with ice. Add cola to taste and serve on the rocks.

name: Windy Beach
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

name: Captain's Elixir
preparation: Mix together the tea (plain hot) Coca-cola and Captain Morgan spiced rum in a pint mason jar and serve.

name: Neon Iguana
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tall glass stir and serve.

name: Captain Ron
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Add the juicy juice orange-tangerine juice stir and serve.

name: Blackbeard
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's and root beer schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Coke or Pepsi and serve.

name: Captain Butter Cream
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan into a pint glass with ice and add buttershots. Top off with the cream soda of your choice. Shake do not stir and serve.

name: Captain Cola
preparation: Funnel the rum armagnac and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml) roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard stein or british pint) and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle and serve.

name: Captain Pepper
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Captain's Spiced Cider
preparation: Pour (over ice is best but not necessary) spiced rum into glass fill with apple cider stir.

name: Eye of the Storm
preparation: Pour lime juice captain morgan's and coca-cola into a large collins glass. Stir gently and serve.

name: Captain and Tonic
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water stir and serve.

name: Boat Drink
preparation: Pour captain morgan's spiced rum into a glass and add a splash of tonic water. Circle the rim of the glass with a lime and serve.

name: Short Island Iced Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients except Coke over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

name: Hard Root Beer
preparation: Combine Captain Morgan spiced rum with IBC Root Beer over ice in a collins or tall glass. Stir and serve.

name: Captain Pepsi
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Pepsi cola and serve.

name: Tsunami
preparation: Fill glass with ice add Capt. Morgan and malibu. Fill with the pineapple juice. Float 1/2 oz of grenadine and then add 1/2 oz of a dark rum (meyers) for color. Found this to a very popular drink at my bar.

name: Bayou Self
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan spiced rum butterscotch schnapps and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Top with grenadine and garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of pineapple.

name: Pussy Charger
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan rum into a collins glass filled with ice. Add peach schapps and fill with pineapple juice. Add just a dash of grenadine garnish with a cherry and orange wedge and serve.

name: Buttered Pancakes
preparation: Pour peach schnapps Captain Morgan spiced rum and Pepsi cola into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Captain Slim
preparation: Stir together in a beer mug over ice and serve.

name: Broken Leg
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a tall glass. Stir garnish with a cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Black Haus Chimney
preparation: Pour the Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a mug. Top with hot chocolate and fresh whipped cream.

name: Black Napkin
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and Captain Morgan spiced rum. Top with a healthy dose of Royal Crown cola. Serve unstirred topped with a lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

name: Holiday Captain Pepsi
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Holiday Spice Pepsi cola and serve.

name: Baby Aspirine of Humbolt
preparation: Serve over ice in a chilled pint glass.

name: Jamaican Sunset
preparation: Shake and strain this drink into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Float myer's rum and garnish with a pineapple orange or cherry pinwheel.

name: Captain's and Creme
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's over ice and add cream soda.

name: Captain Mike's Lemonade
preparation: Pour rum over 2-3 ice cubes. Add lemonade stir gently and serve.

name: Evil Tea
preparation: Mix well and pour over ice.

name: Murray's Cocktail
preparation: Pour rum vodka and citron vodka over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up stir and serve.

name: Captain's Cream Soda
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up stir and enjoy!

name: Embolism
preparation: Add rum and grenadine to a glass. Fill with coke. Ice optional.

name: Cuban Crime of Passion
preparation: Pour all the ingredients into a mixer glass shake violently and then pour the mixture into a 12 oz. glass with ice.

name: Dr. Morgan
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Captains Saddle
preparation: Mix rootbeer schnaps with spiced rum and chill with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass and enjoy.

name: Captain Guy
preparation: Served with ice. Poor the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Add the raspberry iced tea (from concentrate for best results) and serve.

name: Captain Defender
preparation: Fill a highball glass almost completely with ice cubes or cracked ice. Add the Captain Morgan spiced rum Coca-cola and Sprite. Stir and serve.

name: Toocan Sam
preparation: In a shaker half filled with ice add first 5 ingredients. Shake well. Strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. Lace with grenadine.

name: Raging Bull #2
preparation: Pour vodka and tequila into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with red bull. Add a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Black Bull
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Bull Kick
preparation: Pour Red Bull (roughly half of a small can) and a splash of gin into a large jigger filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Using the same jigger filled with new or the same ice pour the southern comfort into a shot glass. Drop the shot into the red bull and guzzle.

name: Bloody Bull
preparation: Pour vodka tomato juice and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Bull Shot
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and shake well. Strain into a pint glass over ice garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Brave Bull
preparation: Pour tequila and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve.

name: Horny Bull
preparation: Pour and slug back.

name: Orange Pez
preparation: Pour the Red Bull into a pint glass. Drop in a shot glass filled with Stoli Ohranj vodka and chug.

name: Bull Shit
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shaker with ice and serve into a large shot glass or tumbler.

name: Canadian Bull
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Bull Blaster
preparation: Pour a small can of red bull into a highball glass. Add jagermeister and serve.

name: Pit Bull On Crack
preparation: Combine ingredients all pre-chilled in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Bloody Virgin Bull
preparation: Pour tomato juice bouillon and lemon juice over ice cubes in a collins glass. Add sauces salt and pepper to taste. Serve.

name: Citrus Bull
preparation: Pour the vodka and Red Bull into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Bull Rider
preparation: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

name: Big Bull
preparation: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

name: Jens Special
preparation: Pour bacardi limn into a glass add the sprite and the red bull then stir to mix.

name: Raging Bull
preparation: Layer in a shot glass; in order.

name: Robson Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Tiger
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a Rocks glass filled with ice.Garnish with orange wheel or wedge.

name: Wavebender
preparation: Pour the orange juice lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale stir well and serve.

name: BeeGee OJ
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the orange juice a little grenadine and serve.

name: Gloom Chaser
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: A1 Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin Grand Marnier lemon juice and grenadine over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Slaughtering the Slothman
preparation: Shake the Grand Marnier Orange Curacao freshly squeezed lemon juice and a dash of grenadine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Red Lion
preparation: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Moisten rim with water or juice dip in caster sugar and serve.

name: Jagermonster
preparation: Pour Jagermeister over ice in a 12 oz highball or old-fashioned glass. Add a dash of grenadine add orange juice and serve.

name: Southern Sunrise
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into cocktail glasses.

name: Le Grand Sunset
preparation: Pour the vodka and grand marnier over ice cubes in a highball glass. Almost fill with orange juice. Dribble with grenadine. Shake gently to mix and serve.

name: Gin and Sin
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Man of the Moment
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Honey Bunny
preparation: Build all three ingredients over ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Leap Year
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

name: Graham Cracker Smasher
preparation: Blend with ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Nolan
preparation: Blend ingredients briefly in a highball glass.

name: Scurvy
preparation: Pour the banana liqueur into a glass. Add vodka and last the orange juice to taste.

name: Absolutely Fruity
preparation: Mix banana and watermelon liqueur in shot glass top with vodka.

name: Melon Madness
preparation: Mix all ingredients above pour in pineapple juice last. Serve over ice.

name: Banana Split Shooter
preparation: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Dirty Blonde
preparation: Shake ingredients except vermouth in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glassthen sprinkle vermouth over the top to make it dirty.

name: Absolutely Jak'd
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Absolutely Cranberry Smash
preparation: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

name: Arnie's Cocktail
preparation: Pour ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Cuban Breeze
preparation: Pour vodka and creme de almond into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pearl Harbor
preparation: Add ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

name: Banangrove
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice cubes.

name: Jade #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Smurfs Up
preparation: Combine and stir.

name: Party Girl
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Razberi Kicker
preparation: Add stolichnaya razberi vodka cranberry juice and sprite to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Vibrator #2
preparation: Layer in order in a pousse-cafe glass.

name: Voodoo Doll
preparation: Add vodka and chambord to a shaker. Add orange juice and cranberry juice until desired taste. Shake and serve with ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Parrot Bay Sunset
preparation: Combine in a tall glass over ice stir well and serve.

name: Planter's Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients and serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a maraschino cherry.

name: Villa Park
preparation: Combine bourbon orange juice and pineapple juice in a shaker and shake well. Pour into a highball glass with ice and serve.

name: Hawaiian Mai Tai
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with pineapple spear maraschino cherry and mint sprig. Serve.

name: A Kiss Goodnight
preparation: Add strawberry vodka and raspberry pucker then fill half way with cranberry juice. Fill the rest with 7-up and float a splash of dark rum on top.

name: Bahama Mama
preparation: Combine all ingredients and pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Decorate with a strawberry or cherry and serve.

name: Painkiller
preparation: Mix well in a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass garnish with a pineapple piece and serve.

name: Bermuda Triangle
preparation: Add ingredients over ice stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

name: Orange Velvet
preparation: Shake cream pineapple juice and orange juice with some ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Hot Rum Chocolate
preparation: Combine rum and cocoa in an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Top with cream sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Mardi Gras Flasher
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with/without ice. Add more grenadine if desired stir again and serve.

name: Almond Hot Chocolate
preparation: Mix in pousse cafe glass.

name: Crash & Burn
preparation: Shake and pour into a large glass. Garnish with lime slices orange slices and cherries.

name: Tropical Highball
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Mango Daiquiri
preparation: Combine the rum orange curacao mango pieces and sour mix in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Pour into a tall glass garnish with a mango stick and serve.

name: Chachodaddy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Aloha Screwdriver
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Use the orange juice and pineapple juice to fill in a 1:2 ratio.

name: Goombay Smash #2
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice add all ingredients and shake well.

name: Ciao Baby
preparation: Combine all ingredients with two cups of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until slushy and serve in an elegant glass; hurricane or otherwise.

name: Dark'n Dirty
preparation: Mix like ordinary drink and serve with ice.

name: Godiva Chocolate Covered Banana
preparation: Blend in a bar blender until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with some of the remaining banana.

name: Yellowjacket
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Oi-Loa
preparation: Add all measured ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake ingredients for at least thirty seconds (watering down this drink a little bit is a good thing). Serve in a pint glass a collins glass or a hurricane glass. Add a straw and garnish with a pineapple wedge or lime/lemon slice. If almond syrup is not readily available you may use the following substitute: 1/2 oz. of simple syrup and 1/2 oz. of almond liqueur. You can also use Mount Gay or Appleton Estate rum if Myer's is not available.

name: Four Wheeler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one scoop (half a cup) of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Evil
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Mai Tai
preparation: Pour light rum creme de almond and triple sec in order into a collins glass. Almost fill with equal parts of sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice. Add dark rum a large straw and serve unstirred. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'NoNWl3ODrbZkraw6r-Vg53lQlZLO-4Gp' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Rum Runner Island Style
preparation: Pour liquors into a blender with one and a half cups of ice and mix until thick-consistency. Pour into a hurricane glass add a cherry on top and serve.

name: Florida Pina Colada
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Bailey's Banana Colada
preparation: Put the banana and banana liqueur into a blender until it becomes a thick paste. Add bailey's to taste; pina colada mix and rum to taste as well. Blend well add ice and blend again until smooth. Serve in a pina-colada glass.

name: Shark's Tooth
preparation: Pour rum lemon juice lime juice and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir then add splash of soda.

name: Bleeding Surgeon
preparation: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull warm surge may foam over the glass.

name: Bahama Mama Sunrise
preparation: Serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Cruiser Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cuba Libra
preparation: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

name: Murder of Crows
preparation: Pour ingredeints into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Jamaican Fizz
preparation: Pour the rum pineapple juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda stir and serve.

name: Amy's Tattoo
preparation: Shake all in tall glass.

name: Northside Special
preparation: Add all ingredients (except soda) to a collins glass. Dissolve sugar filled with crushed ice and add soda. Garnish with a cherry slices of lemon and orange and serve with straws.

name: Big Bird
preparation: Pour banana schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the way with pineapple and orange juice and serve.

name: Mochito
preparation: Place mint leaves with lemon juice in a collins glass and mash the mint with a spoon. Add ice rum and fill up with club soda. Top with angostura bitters and serve.

name: Planter's Punch (Americanised)
preparation: Shake and strain all ingredients (except soda) into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add the soda. Garnish with fruit and a mint sprig. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve with straws.

name: Bossa Nova
preparation: Pour dark rum apricot brandy galliano and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple fruit flag and serve.

name: Sandra Buys A Dog
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Californian Hurricane
preparation: Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together in a punch bowl or pitcher and add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Fruity Fuck
preparation: Pour the banana liqueur dark rum Midori melon liqueur peach schnapps creme de cassis and grenadine into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Fuzzy Pusser
preparation: Mix together in a pitcher. Pour into hurricane glass.

name: Yellow Bird #2
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Guava Colada
preparation: Pour the rum guava juice and coconut cream into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a kiwi wheel a tropical edible flower or a pineapple flag and serve.

name: The Shiwala
preparation: Shake well with ice and pour into Hurricane glass. Add a floater of Myer's dark rum for an additional kick.

name: Dirty Bloody Red Headed Slut
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve without ice in a small rocks glass.

name: Red Nail
preparation: Mix the vodka and the campari in a cocktail glass and add four ice cubes. Rest for seven minutes and serve.

name: Red Hurricane
preparation: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Black Death
preparation: Stir the ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass and drink through a straw.

name: Kamakazi Deluxe
preparation: Adjust mixture to taste.

name: Southern Death Cult
preparation: Put ice in a highball glass and the add the liquors. Top the glass off with Coke and 7-up and a lemon twist. Stir.

name: Red Raider
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Death By Sex
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into shot glasses and serve. Makes 2-3 servings.

name: Green Eye-Opener
preparation: Shake everything but celery in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with celery.

name: Death Wish
preparation: Pour in cup and stir.

name: Red Eye
preparation: Pour vodka into a beer glass one half to three-quarters filled with beer. Top with tomato juice and serve.

name: Red Hot
preparation: Mix and serve in a whiskey sour glass.

name: Death Sentence
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir well and serve.

name: Peachy Red
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: The Crypt
preparation: Pour all ingredients except 151 rum into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain over ice in a tall glass. Float the 151 rum on the top and serve.

name: Red Finnish
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Red Sox Revenge
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir well.

name: Detroit Red Wing
preparation: Mix with ice in a tall glass.

name: True Alabama Slammer
preparation: Pour in a bowl.

name: God's Alabama Slammer
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with lots of ice. Blend well pour into a suitable glass and serve.

name: Mike's Chocolate Pudding
preparation: Pour kahlua and irish cream into a collins glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add coke then the cream. Stir together. Top off with a small shot of whipped cream.

name: Neutron Bomb
preparation: Pour the butterscotch float the bailey's and let the kahlua sink to the bottom of the shot glass.

name: Mr. Insaneo The Cow
preparation: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur chocolate liqueur and milk in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Drizzle the Hershey's chocolate syrup over the top and serve.

name: Slippery Dick
preparation: Pour over ice in 10-12 oz. rocks/old-fashioned glass.

name: Candy Bar
preparation: Blend kahlua creme de cacao and frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

name: Tripple Pleasure
preparation: Dump it in a glass of ice and enjoy.

name: Juiffee
preparation: Mix ingredients in a a highball glass.

name: Datsun Cocktail
preparation: Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur Tia Maria coffee liqueur Cointreau and milk to a blender. Blend for 5 seconds and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice. Layer whipped cream on top garnish with a half-strawberry and serve.

name: Nightcap
preparation: Heat the milk. Add sugar and kahlua sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brown Cow From Hell
preparation: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled.

name: Slippery Nipple
preparation: Serve as is.

name: Hershey Highway
preparation: Coat the bottom of a collins glass with chocolate syrup. Fill the glass half-way with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur Irish cream and creme de cacao. Fill with chocolate milk and shake gently. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings if desired and serve.

name: Caffeine Attack
preparation: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: The Gold The Bad and The Ugly
preparation: Pour the kahlua and bailey's irish cream into a glass. Fill most of the glass with milk leaving enough room for the goldschlager. Float the goldschlager using the back of a spoon.

name: New Guinea
preparation: Serve over ice in glass.

name: Gingersnap
preparation: Shake kahlua bailey's irish cream frangelico and jagermeister in an ice-filled shaker and strain contents into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with cola.

name: Peaches and Cream
preparation: Pour kahlua and schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with milk shake and serve.

name: Peanut Butter Cup
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk stir well and serve.

name: Nicky's Sweet Tooth
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass. Optional; add a small scoop of ice cream chocolate fudge stirred and mixed or a healthy dose of whipped cream on top.

name: Chocolate Buzz
preparation: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass. Add 2 shots of kahlua and 2 shots of irish cream. Serve cold.

name: Gorilla Milk #2
preparation: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

name: Wild Slippery Mudslide
preparation: Pour hershey's chocolate syrup around the inside rim of a rocks glass. Fill with ice add all ingredients and serve.

name: Black Ice
preparation: Pour the Kahlua and Rumple Minze into a highball glass and pour the Coca-cola over the top. Put the glass to your mouth and enjoy the flavor.

name: Creamy Punani
preparation: Fill a blender about 3/4 full with vanilla ice-cream (not solid). Add the amaretto and kahlua followed by the bailey's irish cream. Blend until smooth and pour into tall glasses.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherries
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in order into a brandy snifter; grenadine kahlua and then bailey's irish cream.

name: Peppermint Aztec
preparation: Pour milk and liquors into a coffee mug and add a peppermint stick or candy cane.

name: My Pleasure
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Peanut Coffee Frenzy
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add the 7-up and serve.

name: Smith and Kearns
preparation: Build in an iced highball glass. Top with soda and serve.

name: Chunky Monkey
preparation: Shake the chocolate syrup and kahlua and slowly mix in the desired amount of cottage cheese. Serve cold.

name: Butterbee
preparation: Pour the butterscotch shnapps in first then slowly pour the baileys down the inside so that it rests on top of the butterscotch.

name: Kahlua Cream Soda
preparation: Shake kahlua and cream and strain into a highball glass. Add soda and serve with a straw.

name: Just What the Doctor Ordered
preparation: Pull half a pint of lager into a pint glass add two shots of kahlua then fill with Dr. Pepper mixing gently as you pour.

name: After Eighteen
preparation: Pour kahlua and white creme de menthe into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with chocolate milk and serve.

name: Cocksucking Cowboy
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into the shot glass. Carefully add the Bailey's letting it float on top and serve.

name: Butterscotch Mudslide Shake
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 cups of ice cubes. Blend until thick like a shake and pour into a collins glass. Add or subtract ice to liking for thickness. This is also good unblended on the rocks. Makes two drinks.

name: Kahlua Cookie
preparation: Combine all in a blender. Blend extremely well pour into a large glass (ie. hurricane) and serve.

name: Dirty Grasshopper
preparation: Pour creme de menthe and kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like and serve.

name: Camel Hump
preparation: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps into a shot glass 3/4 of the way full. Fill rest of drink with Bailey's Irish Cream.

name: Pure Pleasure
preparation: Shake ingredients with lots of ice cubes. Stir into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Dirty Apple
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add more cream if desired. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Peppermint Crisp
preparation: Blend the creme de menthe and kahlua together. Fill with ice cold milk add a few ice cubes and serve.

name: Cowboy Cocksucker
preparation: Blend ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Tropical Clarkson
preparation: Prepare the hot chocolate and add the Kahlua. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Buttery Nipple #2
preparation: The Butterscotch Schnapps makes up the bottom layer. The top layer of Baileys should be added using a spoon. This is a layered shot. Delicious!

name: Skier's Toddy
preparation: Rinse out a large mug with boiling water add steaming hot chocolate and stir in liqueurs. Top with several marshmallows.

name: Peppermint Pleasure
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice and serve.

name: Chocolate Toasted Almond
preparation: Mix all together. Serve in a collins glass over ice.

name: Kahlua Hot Chocolate
preparation: Combine kahlua and cocoa in an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Top with cream sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Alco Choco Milkshake
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a blender and blend for 30 seconds. Add a few cubes of ice to the blend if you prefer a frozen drink. Pour contents into a tall glass and enjoy.

name: Chocolate Cow
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice (add cream to taste) in cocktail glass.

name: Cape Snow
preparation: Blend briefly in a blender. Pour into a wine goblet garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Coconut Dream #2
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a small highball or old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Nutty Islander
preparation: Pour ingredients in above order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Cape Cod Cooler
preparation: Pour the gins cranberry juice lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Cape Of Good Will
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cape Cod Crush
preparation: Blend the Southern Comfort cranberry juice and ice in a blender. Pour and serve.

name: Cape Cod #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Russian Apple
preparation: Mix all three ingredients with ice shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Popcicle
preparation: This is a layered drink. Fill glass with ice pour hpnotiq in glass till half full next slow pour malibu rum till glass is 3/4 of the way full next take remainding 1/4 of glass slow pour the cranberry juice until you half of the remainding 1/4 then top with pineapple jucie. If done right it looks like a big stick popcicle. Also best to use Dole pineapple juice.

name: Barn Door
preparation: Pour into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Float the cranberry juice.

name: Cape Breton Lemonade
preparation: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.

name: Hawaiian Russian
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Ocean Breeze
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Kalamazoo
preparation: Stir well with a few ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Concoction Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cape Brenton Slide
preparation: Add drambuie to a pousse-cafe glass. Use a knife/spoon to drizzle the shot of irish cream so it layers on top and serve.

name: Alaena
preparation: Each ingredient should be poured in (no particular order though bar tenders will typically add the vodka shot last). And the drink should only be stirred - never shaken - to help maintain the soda water's fizz.

name: Cape Breeze
preparation: Pour the coconut rum juices and sugar into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: See You in the Morning
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker and pour into shots. Sit down on the floor legs crossed. Down the shot and then stand up quickly.

name: Around The World
preparation: Pour rum cognac orange juice sour mix and creme de noyaux into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth pour into a wine goblet and serve.

name: The Spiff
preparation: Stir the Amaretto with the Dr. Pepper. Pour over ice cubes and add two cherries. Enjoy.

name: The Classic
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain in a cooled cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry on a stick.

name: The Quickening
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a sugar-frosted-rimmed or cinnamon-frosted-rimmed collins glass and serve.

name: The Perfect Ten
preparation: Pour the liquors into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with equal parts of lemon juice and sprite.

name: Nectar of the Gods
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Wayne's World
preparation: Fill the shot glass about 2/3 full of jager and then top it off with the sambuca.

name: Fruitloops
preparation: Stir all ingredients and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: The Celt
preparation: Layer the drink pouring the Tattoo in first as it is slightly heavier than the scotch.

name: The Dash
preparation: Pop a couple of ice cubes in the glass. Pour the advocaat slowly over the ice. Then wait for a moment before adding the creme de fraise. Serve it as soon as it's poured as it starts to curdle.

name: Cox in the Morning
preparation: Chill Orange Crystal Light add Malibu. Perfect for any day this summer!

name: Four Twenty
preparation: Mix all ingredients in glass.

name: Jager Bomb
preparation: Pour red bull into a medium sized glass. Add a shot glass of jagermeister and chug. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'g5MWl3ODrkl8c0j64ARI-gVNyaBGluHQ' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Midori Dream
preparation: Pour the vodka and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with chilled Sprite stir gently and serve.

name: Irish Car Bomb
preparation: Add the Bailey's and Jameson to a shot glass layering the Bailey's on the bottom. Pour the Guinness into a pint glass or beer mug 3/4 of the way full and let settle. Drop the shot glass into the Guinness and chug. If you don't drink it fast enough it will curdle and increasingly taste worse. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'g5MWl3ODrkl8c0j64ARI-gVNyaBGluHQ' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Cabo Bomb
preparation: Pour the Cabo Wabo tequila into an old-fashioned glass. Add the Red Bull and shoot.

name: Pink Pantie Pulldown
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade followed by Sprite and serve.

name: Dixie Car Bomb
preparation: Done just like an Irish Car Bomb pour the whiskey on top of the schnapps in a shot glass and drop it into a pint of Pabst beer.

name: Dirty Shirley
preparation: Pour the vodka over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the glass the rest of the way with Sprite. Add grenadine garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Blue Angel #2
preparation: Pour the vodka and parfait amour into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with Sprite to taste. Stir and serve.

name: Dirty Mexican Lemonade
preparation: First add vodka to lemonade sprite goes in last. Stir and serve.

name: Windex
preparation: Combine and mix vodka blue UV and lemon lime-soda in a highball glass.

name: Pink Passion
preparation: Build in a highball glass in order with ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

name: Dirty Lemonade
preparation: Mix vodka and lemonade in a collins glass. Top with sprite.

name: Jaguar
preparation: Mix in a highball glass. Add ice if desired.

name: Vodka Ricki
preparation: Pour vodka into a tall ice-filled glass. Add sprite and squeeze in the lime wedges.

name: Yellow Birdie
preparation: Pour Vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana then top it up with Sprite & stir. *Can substitute Light Rum for Vodka.

name: Gibbs
preparation: Mix in a tall glass and stir well.

name: Gale Warning
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Mandarin Bomb
preparation: Add the Red Bull to a pilsner glass. Drop a shot of Absolut Mandrin into the glass and drink immediately.

name: Jacobo's Melon Bomb
preparation: Pour the Cherry 7-UP into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Smirnoff watermelon vodka and top with Red Bull. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Mind Bomb
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Coquito
preparation: Boil the cinnamon sticks in the water. Take the sticks out when the water is yellow and has the smell and taste of cinnamon. Add the evaporated milk condensed milk and egg yolks and cook at low temperature. While it's cooking stir to avoid it sticking to the bottom of the pot. When it is boiling for a few minutes add the cream of coconut and rum. Stir well and take off the burner. Let it cool and it will be ready. Keep it in the refrigerator and it will last for a very long time.

name: Italian Stallion Martini
