preparation: To start you'll need a shaker filled with crushed ice. Add the three primary ingredients into the shaker and shake for at least 60 seconds to get the alcohol truly chilled. After completion of the shaking pour the contents of the shaker into a chilled cocktail glass. Next add a long strand of lemon peel making sure that you peel it over the glass to obtain the vast majority of the oil from the peel. The last step is to drink up and enjoy! Make sure you drink responsibly and have a plan in place if you need transportation.

name: Red Apple Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with cracked ice cover and shake. Served in a chilled martini cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and garnished with a red apple slice. To rim the glass with sugar: pour a small amount of grenadine onto a small plate. Set the rim of the chilled martini glass into the grenadine and carefully rotate the glass for even coverage. Then to rim with the sugar: using sugar on a seperate plate after the glass has been rimmed with the grenadine gently sit the rim of the glass into the sugar and remove. Immediatly after strain the chilled martini mixture into the sugar rimmed glass and garnish with a thinly sliced red apple slice.

name: Hot Buttered Snow
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apple Pie Martini
preparation: Pour the vanilla vodka Calvados brandy and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin slice of apple and serve.

name: Indian Apple Martini
preparation: Shake the above ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a martini cocktail glass with a sour apple sugar rim. Garnish with an apple slice and serve.

name: Princess Alexandra
preparation: Shake or blend with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Mandarin Metropolitan
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of mandarin orange on the side.

name: Caramel Apple Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Adam's Apple #2
preparation: Pour the Black Haus blackberry schnapps and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice stir well and serve.

name: Apple Martini #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dali Lama
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle the chocolate syrup into an old-fashioned glass coating the edges and leaving a pool of chocolate in the base of the glass. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker through a strainer into the chocolate-lined glass and serve.

name: Eraser
preparation: Stir ingredients together with a couple of ice cubes in a collins glass and serve.

name: Johanna
preparation: Mix and top it with some ice cubes.

name: Banana Russian
preparation: Fill Cocktail glass with ice. Shake Stoli Vanil Creme de Banane and half & half. Pour over ice.

name: Creamy Russian
preparation: Fill glass 1/3 of the way with Vodka (Stoli Vanil recommended). Top off with your favorite Ginger Ale and stir well. Tastes like cream soda.

name: Carrie Special
preparation: Combine the 151 rum and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps together in a mixing glass. Add the cranberry juice and shake; serve shot glasses.

name: New Orleans Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli vanilla vodka (Vanil) dry vermouth Pernod and Angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Midori Firecracker
preparation: Fill a whiskey sour glass with cubed ice. Pour in Midori then sour apple and finish with cranberry juice producing a layered effect. Serve.

name: Candy Apple Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake firmly and pour into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Candy Apple Martini #2
preparation: Shake alcohol and grenadine with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker; strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Carmel Apple Martini
preparation: Add ingredients to a martini shaker shake pour and enjoy.

name: Granny's Apple Pie Martini
preparation: Pour Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps Smirnoff vodka sweet and sour mix and DeKuyper sour apple schnapps into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with cinnamon and sugar and serve.

name: Pink Mocha Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. For more dramatic appearance keep Chambord seperate and pour in slowly at end - it will settle to the bottom.

name: Sour Apple Martini
preparation: Assemble all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a slice of apple and serve.

name: Ginger Apple Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved ginger and a slice of apple.

name: Golden Cadillac #2
preparation: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.

name: Cherry Bomb #8
preparation: Pour the amaretto and Midori into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to fill stir well. Add a straw and serve.

name: Jolly Rancher #4
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fruity Pebbles #2
preparation: Mix ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into glass of choice - martini or margarita preferably. This really does taste like fruity pebbles. The above ought to make 1 large drink or two medium sized drinks.

name: Granny Smith's Best Apple Martini
preparation: Place vodka and green apple schnapps in a martini shaker with plenty of ice. Shake until very well chilled. Pour into two martini glasses and top with thin apple slices.

name: Cranapple Martini
preparation: Add vodka and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker to an ice-filled cocktail or martini shaker. Splash enough cranberry juice to give red tint. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Por Vida Kahiki
preparation: Shake very well Strain into coctail glass. Garnish with wedge of Pineapple

name: Apple Martini #3
preparation: Chill a champagne or cocktail glass. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Martini #5
preparation: Mix cocoa and powdered sugar to taste. Dip rim of a large martini glass in caramel sauce then in cocoa/sugar mixture. Put a drop of chocolate in bottom of glass. Shake Stoli creme de cacao and praline liqueur in a shaker to chill. Fill glass almost full with crushed or shaved ice. Strain drink into glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate and serve.

name: Strudel
preparation: Stir rum and apple juice together in a highball glass. Add a pinch of cinnamon and serve.

name: Hot Apple Pie #3
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Apple Cider Punch #2
preparation: Make sure ingreadients are well chilled. Cut unpeeled apples 1cm cubes. Combine fruit and mint with apple juice in large punch bowl. Mix well cover and refrigerate until serving. Before serving add chilled apple cider and lemonade.

name: Apple Pie Shot #5
preparation: Mix the DeKuyper apple pucker and Goldschlager in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Top with about a 1/4 of amaretto and serve.

name: Apple Pie With A Crust
preparation: Combine the apple juice and malibu rum in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle cloves or cinnamon on top and serve; warm or cold.

name: Apple Pie Margarita
preparation: Chill all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice. Rim the glass with cinnamon and sugar (liberally). Shake and strain into a margarita glass there will be usually be a lot left in the tin for seconds or thirds. Sauza tequila (a light tequila) is recommended for this cocktail. Enjoy tastes just like sweet apple pie!

name: Apple Pie Shot #3
preparation: Lick hand and cover with cinnamon (same as where the salt would go in a tequila shot). Hold shot of vodka in one hand and the shot of apple juice in the other. Lick cinnamon take vodka shot take apple juice shot and top off with a squirt of whipped cream.

name: Hot Apple Pie
preparation: Mix tuaca and cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high power for 2 1/2 minutes. Stir again and serve.

name: Apple Pie Shot #4
preparation: Pour liqueurs into a shot glass top with cinnamon and serve.

name: Apple Pie Shot
preparation: Pour apple juice and vodka into a shot glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on the tongue and pour contents of shot glass into your mouth. Shake head until cinnamon is dissolved and consume.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir well dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Warm Apple Pie
preparation: Carefully layer the liquors on top of one another in a shot glass. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and serve.

name: Hot Apple Pie with Sparks
preparation: Layer the Irish cream and Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass. Very gently pour the Bacardi 151 on top. Carefully ignite the 151. Throw small handfuls of cinnamon powder on top 2 - 3 times to make sparks. Blow out and serve.

name: Cider Snap
preparation: In a 4-cup measure combine apple cider and dnnamon candies. Micro-cook uncovered on 100% power for 4 to 5 minutes or till candies dissolve and the cider is steaming hot stirring once. Serve in mugs. Garnish with apple slices if desired.

name: Hot Apple Pie #5
preparation: Bring 1 gallon apple juice and 1 gallon apple cider to a boil on the stove. After it's boiling add one cup sugar and 1 liter bottle of Absolute vodka. Remove from heat. Put back into 1 gallon jugs and place in fridge to cool. After it cools serve it as is.

name: Tom Collins
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Instant Apple Pie
preparation: Hold the vodka cinnamon and whipped cream in your mouth. Pour in some apple juice and swallow. Should taste like apple pie.

name: Apple Cider Punch
preparation: If you use the whole all spice and cloves tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink rum would be nice.

name: Coney Island Iced Tea
preparation: Pour rum and iced tea into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice and serve.

name: Back Packer
preparation: Add the vodka orange juice and 7-up to a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Summer Cooler
preparation: Pour orange juice over ice in a collins glass and add angostura bitters. Fill with 7-up stir and serve.

name: Marvellaid
preparation: Combine equal parts of orange vodka and cointreau in a shaker with ice. Shake until well chilled and strain into a chilled martini (cocktail) glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Screw-Up
preparation: Fill glass with ice cubes add all ingredients mix then drink.

name: Schmooze
preparation: Add Orange Juice and 7-up. Stir. Add ice.

name: Anti-Freeze
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Green Russian #2
preparation: Stir over crushed ice in a small highball glass. Add a small amount of soda if desired and serve.

name: Russian Shamrock
preparation: Pour vodka into a shot glass and add the creme de menthe on top. Swirl lightly with a swizzle stick and serve.

name: Blue Russian
preparation: Place 2 - 3 crushed ice cubes in a parfait glass. Pour the blue curacao over the ice and add the vodka. Top with cream and serve.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apple Brandy Cocktail
preparation: Pour the apple brandy grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kodiak Sled Dog
preparation: Blend everything to a milkshake consistency. Makes one serving.

name: Avalanche
preparation: Mix in highball glass over ice shake well.

name: Red Frog
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Royal Caribbean Fuck
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker over shake well and strain into a highball glass.

name: Red Baron #2
preparation: Shake over ice pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Crime Loyal
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Apple Granny Crisp
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well and pour into a cocktail glass. Add whipped cream dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Washington Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Drink Of Champions
preparation: Pour Crown Royal into beer mug. Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently.

name: Macintosh
preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass over ice. Stir but do not shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hendershlager
preparation: Pour over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Rock Lobster
preparation: Pour razzmatazz and crown royal into an ice-filled glass. Fill with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Royal Peaches and Cream
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into a mason jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach if desired.

name: Bearded Clam
preparation: Pour all ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Frozen Apple
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bear Juice
preparation: Combine ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Red Snapper #2
preparation: Mix over ice strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail #3
preparation: Build apple schnapps and cinnamon schnapps over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of apple dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #6
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky into a glass filled with a can of Red Bull and serve.

name: Mowed Lawn
preparation: Pour Crown Royal and DeKuyper sour apple pucker over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add 7-up to taste shake and strain over ice in a collins glass.

name: Douchebag
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a glass and serve.

name: Hairy Ass
preparation: Pour the liquors into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well and pour into a collins glass. Top with soda and serve.

name: Golden Delicious #3
preparation: Pour Crown Royal apple schnapps and pineapple juice over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Royal Fuck
preparation: Pour just a tad of Crown (depending on how much you can handle) into a shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with Apple Pucker.

name: Royal Crown Royal
preparation: Pour whiskey into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add cola stir and serve.

name: Alaskan Apple
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Red Snapper
preparation: Shake pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Washington Apple Shot
preparation: Pour Crown Royal canadian whisky DeKuyper sour apple pucker and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-Up if desired and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'RmeGt3ODq9RblwcbJJTVfN_d0Q7Uckej' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Washington Apple Shot #2
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Johnny on the Spot
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Kevin's Special Blend
preparation: Put iced tea mix into a glass and fill about half full of water. Add rye whiskey then fill remainder of glass with water. Stir. Add ice cubes. The colder this drink is the better.

name: Gremlin
preparation: Into a mason jar filled with cracked ice pour 6 oz Canadian Whisky and 3 oz Sweetened lime juice. Stir with a fork.

name: Crown & Ginger
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Ramos Fizz
preparation: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda to taste.

name: Grappa Gimlet
preparation: Shake and pour over ice-cubes.

name: Gin Fizz
preparation: Shake gin juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Slow Gin and Tonic
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Add a half-slice of lemon and serve.

name: Bramble
preparation: Shake the gin lime juice and syrup well with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Dribble the creme de mure down through the ice and garnish with a lime wheel and raspberries.

name: Gin and Fresca
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Salty Dog
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin if preferred.)

name: Genuine Singapore Sling
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

name: Dragonfly
preparation: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Fog Horn
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Singapore Sling #2
preparation: Combine gin cherry brandy pineapple juice and grenadine into a collins glass. Stir well. Top up with club soda and garnish with the cherry.

name: Diamond Fizz
preparation: Shake gin juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne stir and serve.

name: Bahamas Highball
preparation: Stir in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Gin Jock
preparation: Build over ice in a collins glass and stir with a swizzle stick.

name: JMO Sling
preparation: Combine the gin sloe gin and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda and serve.

name: Queerwig
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Consume quickly.

name: Batman
preparation: Mix all. Serve cold.

name: Pink Gin Tonic
preparation: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well top with campari (to add more colour and taste) and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Pimm's Rangoon
preparation: Pour pimm's no.1 over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with a lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Gin and Bitters
preparation: Put Bitters into a cocktail glass and revolve the glass until it is entirely coated. Fill with gin.

name: Erin's Gin & Tonic
preparation: Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with tonic water and top with grenadine syrup. Stir garnish with maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Chartreuse and Tonic
preparation: In glass filled with ice mix Chartreuse and Tonic Water. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Gin and Bitter Lemon
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

name: A Curious Feeling
preparation: Combine dry gin bitters coffee liqueur and orange juice in a mixing glass and stir. Decant contents into a microwave-safe container and microwave for 30 seconds. Add ice to a blender and pour contents of container into it. Add clamato juice and brown sugar cap container and turn blender on. When mixture has the consistency of a frozen drink pour into highball glass. Garnish with straw a dash of kosher salt and peppermint leaves.

name: Mandarin Delight
preparation: Pour absolut mandrin into a glass over ice. Fill with tonic water. Squeeze and drop the wedge of lime or orange into the drink. Stir and serve.

name: Royal Gin Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Slow Screw
preparation: Pour sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice stir well and serve.

name: Fireworks
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Blue Moon
preparation: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Fin n' Tonic
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Desert Healer
preparation: Build ingredients (except ginger ale) in a highball glass over ice and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with orange peel and a cherry and serve.

name: Singapore Sling
preparation: Pour grenadine into the bottom of a collins glass and fill with ice. Add gin and almost-fill with equal parts of sweet and sour and chilled soda. Top with cherry brandy and serve unstirred garnished with a cherry.

name: Flash Gordon
preparation: Mix everything into a glass add ice and lime on top.

name: Fruit Pastille
preparation: Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of gin followed by the dry vermouth. Fill to desired level with orange juice. Gently pour in dashes of blue curacao so that about 2/3 of the orange turns green. Pour the dashes of grenadine to turn bottom of the drink red. Serve with a straw.

name: Gin Fix
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar lemon juice and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Chocolate Soldier
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Midori Sun
preparation: Shake well with ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Vary lemon-lime mix to taste. Garnish with a lime wedge or a cherry a slice of orange and serve.

name: Jen's Mountain Gin
preparation: Rub lime peel around the rim of a highball glass. Dip the glass upside-down into sugar. Mix lemon gin and mountain dew together and pour into the glass over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gin and It
preparation: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink)

name: Born on the 4th of July
preparation: Pour blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Carefully layer both the sloe gin and cream on top of the ice. (The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.)

name: Alabama Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and garnish with two sprigs of fresh mint.

name: Gin and Pink
preparation: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin tonic water and bitters. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Champagne Fizz
preparation: Pour the gin lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a champagne flute add champagne and serve.

name: Billy Taylor
preparation: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Cockney Champagne
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Pimm's Cup
preparation: Pour pimm's no.1 into a highball glass. Add a twist of lemon and fill with 7-up. Garnish with a slice of cucumber.

name: Cotton Candy #3
preparation: Pour the gin blue hawaiian schnapps and tom collins mix over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Pour into a tall glass or cup top it off with sprite (to taste) and serve.

name: Reynolds Special
preparation: Pour gin and grapefruit juice into a highball glass. Add four or five ice cubes and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: French 75
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin sugar and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Gin Lime Rickey
preparation: Mix the gin and tonic in a highball glass over ice and pour the lime juice. Drop two lemon wedges into the glass and serve.

name: Bombay Safari
preparation: Build directly in a collins glass filled with ice cubes; do not shake. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Gin Thing
preparation: Build gin and lime juice in a highball glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Gin Balalajka
preparation: Mix the gin and juice and fill up with schweppes russian. The gin and juice may be shaken for better taste.

name: Nicky's 1 a.m. Sunrise
preparation: Pour the gin and pineapple juice into a highball glass with a few ice cubes. Add a bit of tonic water if desired. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange and serve.

name: Smurf-o-Tonic
preparation: Pour the gin blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want you can add the blue curacao after stirring the drink.

name: Mint Collins
preparation: Shake gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add slices of orange and lemon top with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Armageddon
preparation: Pour amaretto peach schnapps and raspberry sour puss into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add equal amounts of orange and cranberry juice top with soda stir and serve.

name: Black Fruit Tree
preparation: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

name: Pineapple Bomber
preparation: Pour equal parts of amaretto and southern comfort into an ice-filled highball glass. Add (at least) another equal part of pineapple juice to fill and serve.

name: Cokaretto
preparation: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Add amaretto and stir. Drink with straw.

name: Amaretto Seduction
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender with/without ice. Blend well pour over ice (if not already used) in a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Electric Koolaid
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Italian Sunset
preparation: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Leah's Piece of Ass
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: European Dr. Pepper
preparation: Pour the Coke on ice in a highball glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur and serve.

name: Bitches Ain't Shit
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Lunchpail
preparation: Pour beer and orange juice into a pint glass. Drop a shot glass filled with amaretto into the pint glass and chug.

name: Di Saronno Driver
preparation: Shake with a glassful of ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #2
preparation: Combine the shots in a collins glass. Fill the glass three-quarters full with coke and add crushed ice.

name: Dr. Nut
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour in ingredients and mix.

name: Amore Ade
preparation: Pour the amaretto triple sec and club soda into a large red wine glass. Add ice garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Bubbly Boccie Ball
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir before serving.

name: Friesian
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Di Saronno Punch
preparation: Shake amaretto curacao juices and bitters with ice and strain into a collins glass. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Bomber
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Amarita
preparation: Pour Amaretto and margarita mix over ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Mandy Sea
preparation: Blend the amaretto triple sec sour mix and juices in a mixing cup. Pour over ice in a collins glass and top with grenadine and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a flag or two cherries.

name: Electric Banana
preparation: Pour ingredients in glass and shake vigorously.

name: Zimaretto
preparation: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

name: Italian Tickler
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes stir gently and serve.

name: Gladiator
preparation: Mix the amaretto and southern comfort. Drop this mixture into a glass with the orange juice mixed with the 7-up.

name: Tootsie Pop
preparation: Layer grenadine amaretto and lemon juice then stir. Add 2 drops of chocolate syrup let sink and serve.

name: Pussy Paws
preparation: Stir cranberry juice amaretto and sour mix in a mixing glass. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with club soda add twist of lime and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Bocci Ball #2
preparation: Pour the amaretto and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: The Berserker
preparation: Pour shot of Amaretto into glass and fill with pineapple juice. Mixing is optional.

name: Frozen Dreamsicle
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Amaretto Stone Sweet
preparation: Blend with ice.

name: Toasted Almond
preparation: Shake strain into highball glass.

name: Enchantress
preparation: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and pineapple slice and serve.

name: Mob Witnesses
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tall collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

name: Bourbon Stone Sour
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Almond Amaretto Float
preparation: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur into a highball glass. Pour milk or cream into the glass until the glass is 2/3rds the way full. Top off the glass with Pepsi and serve.

name: Dreamsicle #2
preparation: Shake and strain contents into a highball glass filled with ice. Tastes just like the popsicle.

name: Lindsey's Night Cap
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mug and serve.

name: Hawaiian Hooker
preparation: Pour Amaretto and Southern Comfort over ice. Add pineapple juice and grenadine. Add splash of club soda. Shake and serve.

name: Stone Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Alaskan Polar Bear
preparation: Blend ingredients until of milkshake consistancy. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Hot Gold
preparation: Pour orange juice into a red wine glass and add amaretto. Garnish with the stick of cinnamon as a stirrer and serve.

name: Brute
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Nutty Colada
preparation: Combine the amaretto coconut milk and crushed pineapple with two cups of crushed ice in a blender. Blend on high for a short period and pour into a collins glass. Add a straw and serve.

name: Fruit Lush
preparation: Mix ingredients in order stir enjoy.

name: Summer Brew
preparation: I suggest Pabst or Bud Light as your beer and Smirnoff as your vodka. It seems to me that the beer is not for taste so much as it is needed to give the drink some carbonation a few bubbles seem to make everything better. 1. Pour everything into something big enough to hold it all. (I suggest a big water jug with a spout at the bottom.) Take care with the beer! Don't loose all those bubbles. 2. Wait for the lemon-aid to melt. Takes somewhere between 30-45min depending on elevation.

name: Fruit Loop #2
preparation: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Fruit Tingle
preparation: Pour curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add raspberry cordial and lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Tastes like the lollies called Fruit Tingles.

name: Juicy Fruit #2
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of banana and serve.

name: Lucky Lemon
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a glass stir and enjoy!

name: Bomb Pop
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Razz rum into a small rocks glass or otherwise. Add blue curacao and then lemonade and serve.

name: Coral Queensland
preparation: Add vodka to a Champagne flute add a dash of limoncello (to taste) and a dash of blue curacao (to taste). Fill the glass with lemonade. Add ice if desired and serve.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked #3
preparation: Thaw the lemonade concentrate and dump it into a pitcher. Fill the empty lemonade can with vodka and pour into pitcher. Pour in three beers. Add ice and mix.

name: Harpic
preparation: Pour the vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur and blue curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade and serve.

name: Fruit Cocktail #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Hair Gel
preparation: Add the blue curacao vodka lemonade and candy (jelly tots) to a blender with crushed ice. Blend until slushy. Pour into an old-fashioned glass top with a dash of blue curacao and serve.

name: Dry Lemonade
preparation: Pour the Absolut Citron into an 8-oz highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up and add lime juice. Sweeten with sugar. Top with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Casco Bay Lemonade
preparation: Pour the citrus vodka sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda. Float a lemon slice on top and serve.

name: Redneck Margarita
preparation: Salt the rim of a large rocks glass and fill with ice. Pour in the whiskey triple sec and margarita mix. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Double Jack
preparation: Combine the two jacks in glass.

name: Madison Lemonade
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher. Mix together. Serve into collins glasses.

name: Nay-Nay Strohmeyer
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a large container in any order.

name: Mount Fuji
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
preparation: Mix ingredients into a punch bowl.

name: Lethal Lemonade
preparation: Pour the vodka and lemonade over 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Don't pour everything; first adjust proportions to desired strength then serve.

name: Disco Lemonade
preparation: Pour the vodka and blue curacao into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with lemonade stir well and serve.

name: Jack's Fruit Punch
preparation: Shake ingredients with about a cup of ice. Strain into a cocktail glass with or without ice (whatever you feel) and serve. If not strong enough make the harder version by doubling the amount of Jack Daniel's.

name: Jersey Lemonade
preparation: Add all ingredients to a collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

name: Tennessee Tea
preparation: Combine all ingredients and poor over ice in a mason jar.

name: Jak Jack
preparation: Pour the Red Jack into a pint glass. Drop in a shot glass filled with Jack Daniel's and chug.

name: Jim Beam's Clermont Lemonade
preparation: Add ice to and stir together in a collins glass. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries. Serve.

name: Jack Frost
preparation: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.

name: Jakesade
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Scooley Slammer
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour Triple Sec and Peachtree into glass. Add Sour mix and Sprite. Stir gently and enjoy.

name: Maggie's Whiskey Sour
preparation: Mix the Jack Daniel's and Sour Mix in a Sour Glass filled with ice. Add the lime juice.

name: Jack Sprite
preparation: Pour the jack daniels into a glass followed by sprite to taste. Add a slice of lemon. Stir the beverage and enjoy.

name: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
preparation: Add sugar vodka and sour mix over ice and shake. Fill with sprite/7-up and top with grenadine or cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge.

name: Blue Sunset
preparation: Mix over ice and serve.

name: Dirty Ashtray
preparation: Fill a cup or highball glass with ice and combine all ingredients. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Sky #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Licorice Whip
preparation: Fill glas with ice. Pour Sambuca and Vodka and then fill with 7-Up. Mix well.

name: Blue Pixie Stick
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Jihad
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Irish Comfort
preparation: Combine southern comfort and blue curacao in a highball glass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue curacao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

name: Davey Crockett
preparation: Mix the blue curacao peach schnapps and orange juice together in a mixing glass. Pour over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass or large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Toxic Waste
preparation: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: La Bomba Negra
preparation: Pour the rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cubed or cracked ice. Add the sugar and squeeze in the juice from the lime. Shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Diablo
preparation: Pour casa noble reposado tequila creme de cassis and fresh lime juice into a glass with ice. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve with a wedge of lime on top.

name: Diablo de Blanco
preparation: Shake the Dr. McGillicuddy's vanilla schnapps and gin together in a cocktail shaker. Pour into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and stir in the milk. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Ragnar
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a tall highball glass. Add a few drops of lime juice and fill with 7-up.

name: Malibu Breeze
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine and top with pineapple juice. Stir and serve.

name: Bahia Breeze
preparation: Build in order in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Breeze #2
preparation: Combine all ingrdients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cool Breeze Fru-Fru
preparation: Pour the Stolichnaya (Stoli) vodka Lemon Perrier tangerine juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass over 5 ice cubes. Add the juice extracted from half a lemon. Stir and serve.

name: Jackson 5
preparation: Mix the shots of rum vodka amaretto over ice add a dash of sour mix then fill the rest with cranberry juice.

name: Cool Breeze
preparation: Pour the Stolichnaya (Stoli) vodka into a highball glass over 5 ice cubes. Fill with Lemon Perrier and add the juice extracted from half a lemon. Stir and serve.

name: Frozen Bay Breeze
preparation: Blend everything together and serve garnished with a pineapple wedge if desired.

name: Brazilian Breeze
preparation: Pour the vanilla vodka and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker into a highball glass. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Hypnotiq Breeze
preparation: Stir ingredients together with a few ice cubes in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Princeton Cocktail
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Martinet
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fitzgerald
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Mamie's Sister
preparation: Pour the gin and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir well and serve.

name: Coconut Gin
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Green Devil
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over a few ice cubes.

name: Shaft
preparation: Pour Apoerol and gin over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Fill with sparkling white wine.

name: Foghorn
preparation: Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale. Add half a lime first squeezed over then dropped in. Stir well and serve.

name: Summer Cooler #2
preparation: Fill tall glass with Ice cubes squeeze a twist of lime over ice pour in 2 ounces of Gin Fill glass with Squirt.

name: Cesar Ritz
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry soaked in eau de vie.

name: Bourbon Slush
preparation: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve take out of freezer and put desired amount in blender for a second or put in a bowl and mix till it is semi-liquified. Serve in old-fashioned glasses.

name: Fruit Cocktail
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a wine goblet. Garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: Orange Julius
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender with ten ice cubes for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

name: Mexican Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a large cocktail/martini glass (8+ ounces) with a salt rim. Add two olives on a spear and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach #3
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher of ice to chill adding just enough grenadine to color pink. Add more or less OJ and 7-up to achieve desired strength. Strain into bottle to serve as shooters or serve the whole pitcher with a number of straws for a group to slurp down at the same time!

name: A Day at the Beach
preparation: Shake rum amaretto and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Add grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.

name: Jungle Juice
preparation: Use a large container ie. ice chest or similar. Allow the fruit to soak in all the alcohol for about 4 - 12 hours. Add all the juice and let sit overnight. Serve the next day. name: Mimosa
preparation: Pour orange juice into a collins glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne stir very gently and serve.

name: Little Devil
preparation: Pour the gin rum triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Belles Of St. Mary's
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Margarita Cocktail #2
preparation: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with lemon juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients with ice strain into the glass and serve.

name: Lemony Crab Par-Tea Cooler
preparation: Pour all three cans of lemon iced-tea (use diet... save the calories for the booze) vodka rum and lemon juice into a pitcher. Mix thoroughly. Serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Firehammer
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Beige Blindfold
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Malcolm Lowry
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled (salt-rimmed if desired) cocktail glass.

name: London Iced Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a collins glass three-quarters filled with ice. Top with coca-cola and stir. Garnish a wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Caribbean Mist
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum Midori melon liqueur blue curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Top with 7-up and stir briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple flag and serve.

name: Malibu Punch
preparation: Pour malibu rum into an ice-filled collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and a splash of 7-up.

name: Malibu Hooter
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice and mix ingredients in order. Stir well and enjoy!

name: Jamaican 10-Speed
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum melon liqueur and creme de bananes into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice and a splash of milk. Stir well and serve.

name: Mekong
preparation: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu peach strawberry banana melon blue orange juice pineapple juice pina mix 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass then top with cream. Serve with fresh fruit (except lime) and some filberts if desired.

name: After Work Special
preparation: Pour the Di Amore amaretto Malibu rum and Bacardi rum over 5 ice cubes in a hurricane glass. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice and pineapple juice to taste and serve.

name: German Chocolate Cake
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake and strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with four squirts of canned whipped cream (about 3/4 inches high) at 3 6 9 and 12 o'clock positions.

name: Malibu Italian Surfer
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

name: Monkey In a Tree
preparation: Add rum creme de banane and grenadine to a collins glass. Almost fill with pineapple juice and mix. Float midori on top and serve.

name: Bahama Mama NC
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Pour into a pina-colada glass filled with crushed or cubed ice and serve.

name: Malibu Surfer
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Brain Candy
preparation: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

name: Miss V
preparation: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Oyster Bay
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Malibu Cherry
preparation: Stir ingredients together with 3 or 4 ice cubes in a highball glass. Add 2 or 3 maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Cabo Beach Party
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Bong Water
preparation: Add all ingredients (except 7-up) to a highball glass with ice. Shake top with 7-up and serve.

name: Legspreader #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass. Stir and serve.

name: Malibu Rum Rusher
preparation: Combine the Malibu coconut pineapple and mango rum with the orange juice and grenadine in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy; add more ice if required. Pour into a pina-colada glass and serve.

name: Italian Nut
preparation: Shake. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Malibu Seven
preparation: Mix the 7-up and rum together in a cup of ice.

name: Pina Colada #3
preparation: Crush your ice into a blender. Add the Malibu crushed pineapple and coconut as above. Blend until smooth pour into a pina-colada glass and serve.

name: Malibu and Soda
preparation: Mix in a cup with ice.

name: Loco Motion
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum DeKuyper Razzmatazz and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well pour entire contents of the shaker into a highball glass and serve.

name: Malibu Zinger
preparation: Pour Malibu rum and peach schnapps into a hurricane glass three-quarters filled with ice. Slide down 2 drops of grenadine to the bottom. Add equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice leaving a little room at the top. Add a dollop of whipped cream and drizzle grenadine down it. Ask the recipient to stir in the whipped cream before trying.

name: Jamaican Lifesaver
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Caribbean Screwdriver
preparation: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Mix and shake ingredients in a shaker glass with ice. Strain the mixture into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry if you feel so inclined.

name: Parrot Bay Breeze
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass over crushed ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Motherfucker Shot
preparation: Pour the cranberry juice into a shot glass. Add maple syrup vodka and serve.

name: Purple Motherfucker #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing cup one-quarter filled ice. Stir and pour into a shot glass.

name: Mongolian Motherfucker #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a rocks glass or old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Motherfucker
preparation: Pour the two ingredients together in a shot glass (approximately equal amounts or whichever you would rather have most of). Turn a tall glass upside down and place it over the shot glass. Have a straw at the ready. Lift the tall glass up slightly and light the shot glass before placing the glass back down again making sure that as little of the fumes can escape as possible. Then inhale the fumes with your straw from the still upside down glass finishing off by shooting the shot.

name: Cocky Motherfucker
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Fucked Up Motherfucker
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Mongolian Motherfucker
preparation: Pour ingredients in order over ice. Shake and serve.

name: Crocodile
preparation: Pour midori and bacardi over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the rest of the way with the soda and give a brisk stir.

name: Pineapple Midori Colada
preparation: Shake over ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Carrie's Midori Sour
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with Sprite and stir lightly. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge and serve.

name: Whiskey Sour Old Fashioned
preparation: Mix whiskey bitters and cherry juice in a ice-filled cocktail glass and fill the remainder of the glass with sour mix. Garnish with olives or mushrooms and use a stir stick to mix.

name: Midori Margarita
preparation: Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together and pour into a glass filled with crushed ice. Optional: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in a blender for a smooth granita type drink.

name: Midori Sour #3
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: I Like To Drink
preparation: Pour ingredients into a jug. Add one slush puppie and stir. Pour into shot glasses and add sprinkles on top. Chase with a doughnut.

name: Born To Be Wild
preparation: Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add the Tequila Vodka Pisang Ambon Sprite and lime. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cocktail cerry.

name: Chocolate to Die For
preparation: Pour the chocolate vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add cream soda (IBC preferred) and serve.

name: Italian Screwdriver
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a sugar-rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Dances with Wenches
preparation: Pour the Blackbeard's spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Buttery Nipple With A Cherry Kiss
preparation: Layer Bailey's on top of Butterscotch. Then you take the cherry liqueur along with a cherry and place the cherry on top of the spoon while pouring the cherry liqueur into the shot.

name: Horse's Neck with a Twist
preparation: Make a spiral of the whole lemon's peel. Place in a collins glass with one end hanging over the rim. Add ice cubes. Add Scotch whisky and top with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

name: Captain With A Skirt
preparation: Mix Captain Morgan's and white wine in a glass. Add Coke and ice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Black Santa
preparation: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peppermint schnapps and serve.

name: Fernet with Coke
preparation: Place 2 or 3 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Pour Fernet Branca over the ice then holding the glass in a diagonal way slowly pour the coke.

name: Fire Engine with Alarm
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Ball
preparation: Pour one part of all three ingredients into a shaker with ice. Mix well and serve as double shots.

name: Ball Sweat
preparation: Put 1 or 1/2 teaspoon of salt into a shot glass. Pour the tequila in. Then if you have the skills layer the irish cream on top (or mix). Shoot. Only use the cheapest ingredients the worse the better.

name: Noah
preparation: Pour amaretto into an ice-filled glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and lemon-lime soda and serve.

name: Frozen Melon Ball
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared melon ball and lime slice and serve with a short straw.

name: Ball of Fun
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl and stir. Drink the fuck up get fucked up and break the ball of fun. (BSU)

name: Ball Hooter
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short cold glass of beer.

name: Ball Breaker
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a large shot glass. Mix well and serve.

name: Jason Ball
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Ball and Chain
preparation: In shot glass mix 1 part Gold with 1 part Rump add a splash of Jager over the top. Manly shot with a tasty surprise.

name: Palm Beacher
preparation: Pour the dark rum amaretto and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Ball Banger
preparation: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

name: Muddy Water
preparation: Pour the amaretto orange juice and lemon juice in order into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Disco Ball
preparation: Mix together over ice strain into glass.

name: Ball Bag
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Bocci Ball Jiggle Shots
preparation: Stir all ingredients together and pour into 2 oz shot glasses. Refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving.

name: Han Solo
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Build drink in order topping it with the Wild Turkey 101. A couple of extra lemons don't hurt either.

name: Texas Prairie Fire
preparation: Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass top off with lime juice splash in tabasco sauce and shoot.

name: Tequila Stuntman
preparation: Rack up a line of salt using a credit card or licence to form a thin line about 2-3cm long (Depending on preference) snort the salt though a straw into your nostril do the tequilla shot hold your eye open with one hand and squeeze the lemon in the other.

name: Cokello
preparation: Pour into tall glass over ice fill with Coca-Cola and add a wedge of lemon.

name: Juicy Tiger
preparation: Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon and a straw.

name: Pan-Galactic Garble Blaster #4
preparation: Combine the gin rum vodka tequila creme de menthe Galliano and ice in the container of a blender. Cover and blend until slushy. Pour into a glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Stanley Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cocaracha
preparation: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Captain on Acid
preparation: Mix all ingredients except grenadine and pour into a shot glass. Add grenadine and shoot. Shot should be blue on top and red on bottom.

name: Blue Margarita
preparation: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila blue curacao and lime juice with ice strain into the salt-rimmed glass and serve.

name: 4th of July
preparation: Layer in order given.Pour into a shot glass.

name: Porn Star
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'Y3dGt3ODpCku0QSurAtH6meVe6r-5aY-' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Alcoholic Jolly Rancher
preparation: Pour the Everclear into a shot glass. Add blue curacao and finish with DeKuyper watermelon pucker schnapps. Stir with a toothpick and shoot.

name: Dirty Bong Water
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a glass with ice. Mix and enjoy.

name: Hooker
preparation: Pour Alize Gold Passion and Tropicana simultaneously over a few ice cubes in a cocktail glass and serve. Alternatively blend together with ice in a blender for a frozen drink.

name: 3 Dollar Hooker
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Stars Fell on Alabama
preparation: Pour orange juice into highball glass. Add rum and schnapps. Shake well. Add lime juice to mixture. Place lime wedge on edge of glass.

name: Fuzzy Navel #3
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice (to taste) and stir to combine.

name: Fuzzy Peachclari
preparation: Pour vodka then orange juice then peach schnapps. Drink.

name: Fuzzy Nut
preparation: Fill 10oz Shaker with ice then pour at the same time the Malibu and the Peach Schnapps into the shaker so you get 1/2 and 1/2. Shake Vigoursly. Serve into shot glasses.

name: Fuzzy Screw
preparation: Fill glass half with ice add vodka peach schnapps and then orange juice. Stir.

name: Cherry Hooker
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Dirty Hooker
preparation: Pour in equal parts into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Jon Lee Hooker
preparation: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice in a highball glass add 7-up and enjoy.

name: Black Russian #2
preparation: Pour Stoli Kahlua into a highball glass over ice. Top with Coke and serve.

name: White Russian #2
preparation: Serve over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Belgian Blue
preparation: Pour all ingredients into the glass and stir.

name: Russian Qualude #2
preparation: Pour over ice shake vigorously and strain into a martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert and serve.

name: Blue Kisok
preparation: Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.

name: The Big Johnson #2
preparation: Cut a lime into slices and coat in sugar. Pour Ketel One vodka Southern Comfort and White Lightning into a pitcher filled with ice. Pour cranberry juice into the pitcher last and allow to mingle with the spirits. Do not stir since this weakens it. Pour through a strainer into a tall glass and chug. The lime should stay at the bottom of the glass as you chug forcing you to finish the shot in one gulp before you can retrieve the lime and you *want* to get the lime before the air hits your tongue.

name: Big Chill #2
preparation: Pour the dark rum Kahlua coffee cream and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Top with vanilla ice cream and serve.

name: High-Octane White Russian
preparation: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Blushin' Russian #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Big Dumb Russian
preparation: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

name: William's Rainbow
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in vodka then fill up with sprite. Slowly pour the blue curacao on top followed by the grenadine. Serve as is allowing the guest to stir it until purple.

name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
preparation: Sling Malibu RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

name: Smurf Piss
preparation: Serve pre-chilled ingredients in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Pink Bliss
preparation: Pour Smirnoff vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a large squeeze of lemon juice; this un-bitters the Vodka taste if you want it sweeter. Fill to the top with Schweppes pink lemonade and serve. Comes out a transperant pink colour!

name: Mallelieu
preparation: Pour the rum grand marnier and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Grand Mimosa
preparation: Pour grand marnier into a champagne flute. Fill almost to the top with champagne and top off with fresh orange juice.

name: Grand Quetsch
preparation: Stir without ice and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Butter Chocolate Bliss
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Jolly Rancher #3
preparation: Pour ingredients in any order directly into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge for a very green drink. It's that simple!

name: Dancing Dana
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add water to taste if required. Rim a margarita glass with sugar if desired. Pour the blended drink mixture into the margarita glass and serve.

name: Passat #2
preparation: Pour everything into a shaker and shake until frosted. Should turn a blue-grey color. Strain into a glass with or without ice. Serve.

name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess
preparation: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Add the juice mixture to the liquors and stir well.

name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess #2
preparation: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and ruby red grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Fill the glass with the juice mixture and stir well.

name: Killer Kool-Aid (Canada)
preparation: Pour the Stoli Razberi vodka melon liqueur and 7-UP into a chilled cocktail glass over a small amount of ice. Top it off with cranberry juice more if desired and serve.

name: Peach Puff Martini
preparation: Mix the DeKuyper Sour Peach Liqueur and Smirnoff Raspberry Twist vodka as well as a dash of lemon-lime soda (such as Sprite or Sierra Mist) in a martini cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and drop in a maraschino cherry. Use a dash of maraschino cherry syrup in recipe if desired. Serve.

name: Hep Cat
preparation: Stir all ingredients together over cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rasmopolitan Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients except for the raspberries in a cocktail shaker cover and shake. Serve in a martini glass and garnish with 2 or 3 frozen raspberries. This is a luxurious drink that is very easy to prepare.

name: Blackberry Martini
preparation: Add Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry and serve.

name: Czarina #2
preparation: Stir the Stoli raspberry vodka Bailey's irish cream and half-and-half with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with maraschino liqueur and serve.

name: Raspberry Russian
preparation: Pour equal parts raspberry vodka and kahlua into a glass over ice cubes. Fill with milk shake until frothy and serve.

name: Erection
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in a cup with plenty of ice. The colder the better!

name: Berry Chocolate Martini
preparation: Pour Black Haus into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka and white creme de cacao. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with white chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Raspberry Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a cocktail/martini glass and serve.

name: Liquid Nerds
preparation: Add the Stoli raspberry vodka 7-Up and Coca-cola to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Aruba
preparation: Pour the Absolut Raspberri Vodka into an ice filled cocktail glass. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur and Sprite and then the grenadine. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan Heston Bar Style (Indiana)
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a stainless steel cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake very well and strain into a chilled martini / cocktail glass. A sheet of ice should form when the cosmo is strained into the glass.

name: Gieco
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass half-way with ice. Pour the UV Blue raspberry vodka then the Red Bull and watch the transformation from blue to gieco green

name: Go Go
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberry pieces and serve.

name: Key Westtini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Fleur De Lis
preparation: Shake both ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Sherburger
preparation: Fill chilled old fashioned glass halfway with ice. Pour Lemon Lime soda (Sprite and Squirt make slightly variant flavors) then Raspberry Vodka (Bacardi or other) then Orange Juice and stir. Top with a splash or two of coconut rum (Malibu or other) between 1/4 and 1/2 oz. Garnish with a wedge of orange and lime.

name: Mountain Blue
preparation: Add blue curacao schnapps vodka and gatorade together in a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass over ice and serve.

name: Creek Juice
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass add the vodka. Nearly fill with cranberry juice and float Midori on top. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Indigo Girl
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into a frosted martini glass. Add a small wedge of fresh lime on edge of glass and serve.

name: Midori Mimosa
preparation: Pour midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: Slushy
preparation: Mix drink with crushed ice or blend with 2 1/2 scoops of ice. For added enjoyment stick a straw in the middle and drink for a slushy rush.

name: Flyin' Hawaiian
preparation: Pour midori rum and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in sprite and stir lightly.

name: Illusion
preparation: Pour all spirits into a shaker and top with a splash of pineapple juice.

name: Japanese Lagoon
preparation: Shake vodka Midori and lime juice over ice. Strain into a margarita or cocktail glass building over blue curacao. Top with lemonade and serve.

name: Midori Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a champagne saucer. Top with champagne and serve.

name: Midori Mai Tai
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Midori Jello Shots
preparation: 1. Warm the bottle of midori so that it is hot to the touch by first loosening the cap half way then set the entire bottle in a saucepan half full of water on high heat. 2. Bring 1 cup of water to a rolling boil then stir in the jello and gelatin until dissolved. Stir in hot midori. Pour mixture into a flat bottom pan and slice into cubes when cooled or place in small cups.

name: Midori Green Russian
preparation: Pour midori and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream to taste.

name: Alex Chi-Chi
preparation: Shake in an ice filled shaker. Strain and serve.

name: Illusions
preparation: Add all ingredients and fill the rest of the shaker with Orange Juice. Add ice and shake.

name: Blue Balalaika
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Kristi GreenEye
preparation: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Blue Hotty
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Pina Colada glass (can be decorated by dipping the top of the glass in syrup and then in sugar). Also possible to use spoon to achieve layers. Serve.

name: Vulcan Mind Meld
preparation: Pour ingredients into a double-shot glass and drink quickly.

name: Mikey's Breakfast Banger
preparation: Pour the ingredients over ice allow it to chill for a moment and then strain into a red wine glass. Garnish with an orange and serve.

name: Mind Game
preparation: Shake the ricard blue curacao and milk (2% fat) with ice in a shot glass.

name: Mar's Mind Eraser
preparation: Pour the Kahlua into a cocktail glass with some ice. Layer the Stoli Vanil on top. Top with seltzer/soda water and serve.

name: Mansion Mind Eraser
preparation: Pour the kahlua bailey's and rum over ice cubes in a collins glass and fill with 7-up. Serve with two straws.

name: Bend Me Over Slammer
preparation: Pour whisky amaretto and sweet and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a small old-fashioned or rocks glass. Top with club soda to taste. Slam on a hard surface and shoot.

name: Mind Eraser #4
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fuck Me Over Again
preparation: Pour triple sec light rum and tequila into a highball glass over ice. Stir together then add orange juice and ginger ale. Serve.

name: Mind Bender
preparation: Pour the vodka amaretto and Sprite into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice and stir. Add a straw and serve.

name: Batida de Carneval
preparation: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Mind Eraser #3
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and carefully layer in each ingredient; kalhua vodka butterscotch schnapps then 7-up.

name: Handball Cooler
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with club soda and top with orange juice. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Jedi Mind Trick
preparation: Combine all contents (except cherries) in a blender until smooth. Pour into a mug and garnish with cherries.

name: Mind Fuck
preparation: Pour the Kahlua into a small glass filled with ice. Layer the vodka on top and finish with a splash of club soda. Do not stir. Insert a straw into the bottom of the drink and drink through the straw in one.

name: BBC Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Banana Margarita
preparation: Apply lemon juice to the rim of a frosted double-cocktail glass and dip into caster sugar. Fill the glass with crushed ice add the ingredients and blend briefly. Serve with a lemon juice-dipped slice of banana.

name: Banana Split Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: June Bug
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

name: San Francisco
preparation: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the creme to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

name: Funky Monkey
preparation: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

name: Absolut Anti-freeze #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Zulu
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add cola garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry and serve.

name: Banana Cognac
preparation: Pour the Marie Brizard banana liqueur into a cocktail glass. Add the cognac (or substitute brandy) allow to clear and serve.

name: Hawaiian Punch
preparation: Pour over ice (grenadine last) and stir.

name: Alien Urine Sample
preparation: Hand shake or blend with ice the Liqueur with the Sweet + Sour. Strain this mixture from the ice into a pounder glass with the Schnapps Malibu Creme de banane and soda. Float the Blue Curacao before serving.

name: Banana Sunrise
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice shake and strain into a highball glass.

name: My Dear Aunt Ruby
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a citrus slice and serve.

name: Ruby Tuesday
preparation: Pour gin and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine stir and serve.

name: Muscle Relaxer
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Burnso Tropical
preparation: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

name: Ruby Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Rum Relaxer
preparation: Pour first 3 ingredients into a parfait glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Peachy
preparation: Add crushed ice to the bottom of an old-fashioned/rocks glass then pour all of the above ingredients in the same order as above. Decorate with a twisted slice of lemon on a tiny plastic sword with a sweet cherry. Serve.

name: Ruby in the Rough
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Ruby
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Ruby Port Cobbler
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the club soda in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry a slice of orange and a slice of lemon.

name: Ruby Slipper
preparation: Fill a shot glass three-quarters full with whiskey and with grenadine. Fill any large glass with 7-up. Drop the shot glass into the 7-up and drink everything.

name: Ruby Soho
preparation: Shake liquors and sour mix with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sprite. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Peach Bullfrog
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Ruby Runner
preparation: Shake the Malibu brandy banana liqueur and the juices with ice. Strain into a highball glass and add a splash of grenadine and a splash of Bacardi. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Gumbys' Ruby Red
preparation: Mix the Rum Ruby Red and Pineapple Juice stir well and add ice cubes to the top for a delicious drink.

name: Red Ruby
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fruit Blast Martini Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a martini glass and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Hot Blah!
preparation: Dilute the sour mix with water and mix with the vodka in a mixing glass. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add Hot Damn! schnapps and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise
preparation: Combine all ingredients stir and serve.

name: Banana Bird
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Sock
preparation: Add the vodka along with the pisang ambon. Fill with orange juice and stir.

name: Bronsky
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a large brandy snifter and serve.

name: Mello Yellow
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin. Shake 8 to 10 times then strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Russian Monster Tom Collins
preparation: Mix vodka and sour mix (to taste) over ice in a glass. Add grenadine (to taste) and serve.

name: Flaming Russian
preparation: Pour vodka in shot glass carefully layer rum on top. Ignite rum and serve.

name: Yellow Motherfuckers
preparation: It is best to use a large cooler with a spout. The amount of Vodka and Gin you use depends on the size of your cooler. Add the ingredients to your prefered taste.

name: Yellow Cake
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Golden Russian
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Suicidal
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.
