name: Yellow Fingers
preparation: Shake all but the curacao and lemonade very well and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Add lemonade and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Using a thin straw place drops of blue curacao in neat rows across the frothy white surface and serve immediately.

name: Urine Sample #2
preparation: Strain over ice. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Toro
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice filled shaker and shake. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Gateraide
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mellow Yellow
preparation: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Black Bird Cider
preparation: Add the Cider to the liqueur. Serve Cold.

name: Yellow Fever
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Atomic Watermelon
preparation: Mix ingredients in glass over ice and enjoy!

name: Yellow Parakeet
preparation: Fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour.

name: Hilde's Special
preparation: Fill a blender with ice pour in the ingredients and blend it all together. Pour into a hurricane glass with a piece of orange on the glass.

name: Frozen Bird
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Yellow Bellied Sap Sucker
preparation: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up and add the tonic.

name: Novicain
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Bird Feeder
preparation: Combine half a shot of each in a shot glass and serve.

name: Yellow Boxer
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Bird of Paradise Fizz
preparation: Shake ingredients (except soda) well and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda and garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Captain Vita Coco
preparation: Make ice cubes using Vita Coco coconut water. Add to a glass of your favorite rum and serve.

name: Pineapple Banana Refresher
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a slice of banana and serve.

name: Coco Berry
preparation: Muddle the raspberries and chambord in a mixing glass. Add ice rum and creme de cacao. Stir to chill strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Blues
preparation: Pour the dark rum blue curacao coconut cream and pineapple juice into a blender with 1 1/2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a pineapple piece and serve.

name: Coco Cognac
preparation: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice cubes shake and pour in a cocktail glass.

name: Coco Choco
preparation: Shake liquids well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Chamborlada
preparation: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur light rum dark rum pineapple juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur into a the bottom of a large wine glass. Slowly strain the contents of the cocktail shaker on top of the Chambord by means of the back of a teaspoon or otherwise in order to create a second layer. Float a small further amount of Chambord on top and serve.

name: Astronaut
preparation: Pour the vodka light rum and dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and a splash of pineapple juice. Serve with a twist of lime (or lemon) and serve.

name: Coco Cabana
preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

name: Cool Coco
preparation: Mix in highball glass. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

name: Lazy Afternoon
preparation: Pour the dark rum light rum cherry brandy and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple slice and serve.

name: Coco Loco #2
preparation: Saw off the top of the coconut and pour the coconut water into a glass. Add one cup of crushed ice to the coconut and pour in all the other ingredients (including the coconut water). Squeeze in a half lime and drop the shell in. Stir well. Add a straw and a paper umbrella and serve.

name: Fuzzy Charlie
preparation: Pour the dark rum creme de bananes coconut cream and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and top with ginger ale. Garnish with a pineapple spear and serve.

name: Chi Chi
preparation: Pour the vodka pineapple juice and coconut cream into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Coco Martini
preparation: Pour Bacardi Coco Kahlua and brown creme de cacao into a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a cocktail/martini glass. Spiral chocolate syrup from the center to the outer rim. Garnish with a chocolate spiral and serve.

name: Coco Amor
preparation: Pour the Cocoribe amaretto almond liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Loco Lemonade
preparation: Pour in order; tequila grenadine then lemonade into a highball glass with 4 ice cubes. Squeeze the lemon juice from roughly half a lemon over the top and serve.

name: Country and Western Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Add half a cup of crushed ice and blend well. Pour into a red wine glass and serve.

name: Snickers Spiked Coco
preparation: Make the hot coco according the package directions add Bailey's and Frangelico. Top with whipped cream.

name: Coco Channel
preparation: Shake all with ice serve in lowball over ice or neat in a martini glass.

name: Alaskan Iced Tea
preparation: Mix the rum gin vodka blue curacao and sour mix in a mixing glass. Pour into an ice-filled highball glass and top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a twist of lemon or lime and top with a cherry. Serve.

name: Black and Blue Shark
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a small glass shot and enjoy.

name: Blue Eye
preparation: Fill the glass with ice and build ordinary with vodka Battery Sweet & Sour and Blue curacao at the end.

name: Electric Lemonade #2
preparation: Pour the vodka gin rum and blue curacao into a chilled collins glass. Top off with lemonade stir and serve.

name: Blue Nuke
preparation: Pour vodka Bacardi 151 gin blue curacao and blueberry liqueur into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour mix stir well and serve.

name: Slow Fuck
preparation: Pour blue curacao and gin into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with equal parts sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice and serve.

name: Romulan Dream
preparation: Stir and strain into a highball glass.

name: Dundas Valley Ghost
preparation: Fill mixing glass with ice. Pour in ingredients (liqueurs first) shake and strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge or wheel.

name: Milky Way
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker shake and serve with cut apple lemon and pineapple-leaves.

name: Bumble Bee #3
preparation: The crushed ice should be added first followed by the honey. Stir the mixture as you pour the gin on top which should be relatively chilled. Add the squirts of lemon to your liking and place a wedge over the rim if desired.

name: Red Hope
preparation: Blend pour into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Brian Fabulous
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an iced shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Passoa Recovery
preparation: Pour passoa and lemon juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with soda water and serve.

name: Sky Highball
preparation: Pour scotch whisky and pineapple juice into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Sprinkle curacao on top add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Beef Salad
preparation: Add to an ice-filled highball glass and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Chuhai
preparation: Pour the shochu and soda water into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon juice and serve. Add lime or orange juice as an optional extra.

name: Split Beaver
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large glass with lots of ice and enjoy.

name: Head Shrinker
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a highball glass or Tiki mug and serve.

name: Blue Fox Trot
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Captain's Colada
preparation: Combine Captain Morgan's rum cream of coconut and pineapple juice in a blender with crushed ice for 10-15 seconds. Pour into a goblet and garnish with a pineapple spear if desired.

name: Azuluna
preparation: Pour the rum blue curacao pineapple juice and coconut cream into a blender with a cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed and pour into a collins glass.

name: Blue Squid
preparation: Pour the rum blue curacao creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Orange Cocktail
preparation: Stir juices together in a mixing glass strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bastardized Screwdriver
preparation: Ice then rum then orange juice. Mix.

name: Tiger Juice
preparation: Pour the whiskey lemon and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Comfort
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Lemon Cocktail
preparation: Stir orange juice and lemon juice with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ink Street
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Polo Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Squash
preparation: Pour lemon juice and orange juice into a large tumbler over one ice cube. Stir well. Serve with sugar and cold water on the side a drinking straw and a spoon.

name: Phillips Screwdriver
preparation: Place 2 - 3 ice cubes into a glass. Add vodka and sunny delight (more or less to taste) stir and serve.

name: Creamsicle Screwdriver
preparation: Combine vanilla vodka orange juice and some ice cubes in a highball glass and stir.

name: Orange Demon
preparation: Pour the orange juice into a cocktail glass. Mix in the everclear and the cointreau and serve.

name: The Green Mile
preparation: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Beautiful One
preparation: Take glass of ice and add liquor then juice and stir. Add cherries for garnish.

name: Fuzzy Monkey
preparation: Shooter. Shake ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

name: Witch of Venice
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: On the Green
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled. Pour with or without ice in a cocktail/martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Jack in the Green
preparation: In a shot glass fill half way up with absinthe first then jack daniels in the other half and wait for it to settle. Now drink but dont overdo it! Very strong!

name: Martini Dominikanis
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon and serve.

name: Mandarin Dream
preparation: Pour vodka and splash juices in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously so when poured a thin layer of ice crystals is visible. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Ricky Martini
preparation: Shake with ice until frothy. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a jalepeno stuffed olive.

name: Good Old Boy
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass half full of ice.

name: Bearded Boy
preparation: Add all ingredients and stir for 5 minutes allowing alcohol to settle.

name: Bronx Martini
preparation: Mix contents in a martini shaker with ice and serve in a chilled martini glass.

name: Party Boy
preparation: Rub a lemon slice on the edge of a whiskey sour glass. Dip the edge of the glass in sugar. Add pink lemonade and a dash of sour mix. Then add Bacardi triple sec and Absolut Citron. Stir. Lick around the edge of the glass then take the shot.

name: Martina Mandarina
preparation: Pour juice vodka and a splash of grand marnier in a shaker. Add ice shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange peel curl.

name: Clementine Martini
preparation: Add the vodka orange curacao and triple sec to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Float the cranberry juice then the soda water the the ginger ale. Garnish with a clementine wedge (if available) or a lightly flamed orange peel twist and serve.

name: Screwed Driver
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with lemonade and add a dash of cranberry juice.

name: Angela's Cantaloupe Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cran-Razz
preparation: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice then orange vodka.

name: Blue Dragon
preparation: Mix vodka and blue curacao with crushed ice shake or stir and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherries.

name: Grocery Boy
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 ice cubes and blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Colonial Boy
preparation: Pour whiskey bitters and tea into a heat-proof cup. Sweeten to taste and serve.

name: Harry Boy
preparation: Mix with ice and serve cool.

name: Girasole Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Lucky Double
preparation: Slice the lemon half further into four quarters and drop into to a mixing glass. Add triple sec and muddle well. Add absolut mandrin and ice shake well and pour out into an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Detroit Daisy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a green maraschino cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Scotty Boy
preparation: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake always shake and add a splash of soda.

name: Mingtini
preparation: Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake till ice cold. Place a cherry in the bottom of a large martini glass strain contents of shaker into the glass and serve.

name: Orange Tootsie Pop
preparation: Pour orange vodka and Godiva into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and allow to chill. Dip rim of a chilled cocktail glass into orange liqueur and twirl in sugar to coat. Pour contents of shaker into glass garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Rising Skirt
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake well. Pour into a whiskey sour glass with ice and top with an orange slice.

name: Kahluaita
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Absolut Dream
preparation: Pour Absolut Mandrin into a cocktail/martini shaker. Add sweet and sour mix and Chambord raspberry liqueur. Rim a cocktail glass with sugar. Shake and strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Orange Lion
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Orange Cream
preparation: Mix Smirnoff Orange Twist vodka and Vanilla Coke in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice and garnish with a fresh or candied orange slice and serve.

name: The Rude Boy
preparation: Keep rum in freezer for a few hours. Take hot coffee and pour into a beer glass. Add Malibu rum. Fill the rest of the glass with Murphy's Irish Stout. Be carefull not to fuzz. Don't stir. Sprinkle nutmeg over top and serve.

name: Charap Margarita
preparation: Freeze the Minute Maid punch cooler (individual pack) in the freezer until icy. Take it out and blend it with some ice then add the absolut vodka and margarita mix. Pour into a margarita glass and serve.

name: Detroit Fermi
preparation: Combine all ingredients in an old-fashioned or lowball glass; ignite extinguish and serve.

name: Mandrin Cherry Smash
preparation: Cut the lemon half into four quarters. Muddle with the cherry brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and ice and shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blood Orange Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and pour into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of blood orange if available.

name: Metropolis
preparation: Pour the Absolut Mandrin vodka triple sec Rose's lime juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Creamsicle Martini
preparation: Add ingredients shake over ice and pour into a chilled martini glass. Serve.

name: Lawn Boy
preparation: Put the ice in a blender pour the vodka over it toss in the mint and fill with limeade. Blend until smooth adding sugar little by little until it's just right. More vodka may be added during blending as well.

name: No. 4
preparation: In a highball glass filled with ice add tequila then triple sec. Top off with cranberry juice.

name: Sex on the Beach #7
preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir heavily. Serve cold.

name: Tropical Passion
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass(es).

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
preparation: Pour the vodka southern comfort peach schnapps and galliano into a highball glass. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Fire Starter
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Red Headed Slut
preparation: Chill and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'YxYml3ODrPIB0P31vdciHugxChHImPhq' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Fuzzy Comfort
preparation: Carefully pour the rum or vodka then other ingredients. Stir.

name: Red Hot Lover
preparation: Shake briefly pour into an ice-filled hurricane glass and serve.

name: Red Panties
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Red Devil #2
preparation: Pour the vodka into a shot glass; add tabasco sauce. Pour clamato juice into a seperate shot glass. Shoot vodka/tabasco wait 10 seconds and shoot clamato juice.

name: Georgia Peach #2
preparation: In a highball glass filled with ice add southern comfort peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw
preparation: Pour the vodka southern comfort and peach schnapps into a highball glass. Fill mostly with orange juice and serve.

name: Hairy Sunrise
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender except grenadine. Pour into a collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Nicky's Red Devil
preparation: Pour ingredients over an ice cube in a cocktail glass. Stir add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Butterscotch Truffle Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka butterscotch schnapps and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb
preparation: Serve as a shot or on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mutual Orgasm
preparation: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes.

name: Velvet Hammer
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Martini
preparation: Chill cocktail glass. Mix Vodka Godiva and Vanilla Schnapps. Stir do not shake. Place single cherry with stem in chilled cocktail glass. Strain over cherry.

name: Barbara
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate Heaven Martini for 2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake and pour into 2 chilled cocktail glasses and serve.

name: Chocolate Martini #4
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Martini
preparation: Fill mixing glass with ingredients stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Add Hershey's Kiss or Godiva Chocolate Liqueur for a garnish.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Martini
preparation: Chill vodka and creme de cacao. Pour into chilled glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss and fresh raspberry.

name: Chocolate Martini #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a shot glass.

name: Slime Cocktail
preparation: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Licorice Stick
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: German Wake-Up Call
preparation: Stir together equal amounts of orange juice and Tropicana Peach Orchard Punch juice. Add as much Jagermeister as desired stir again and serve.

name: The Frad
preparation: Add ice put in sprite then add pineapple juice followed by the coconut rum and peach schnapps. Serve very cold.

name: Booty Call 101
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: A Joy of Almond
preparation: Pour the kahlua into a chilled rocks glass. Carefully layer the amaretto and creme de almond on top.

name: Fear the Turtle
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into several shot glasses. Make sure it's all equal parts based on how many people are taking it.

name: Dressed Up Like A Dogs Dinner
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Three Wise Men On A Farm
preparation: Line up four shot glasses with a shot of each drink.

name: A Lark's Tropical Heaven
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender blend until combined. Pour into an exotic glass and serve.

name: Just A Moonmint
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briefly and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #3
preparation: Stir ingredients on ice and strain into a martini glass.

name: Inauguratini
preparation: Shake the vodka cranberry juice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Make a small snowball of crushed ice in the palm of your hand. It needs to sit a little higher in the glass than the cranberry mixture. Carefully pour the blue curacao over the top of the ice. Serve with a US flag swizzler.

name: Shakes - Party To Go
preparation: Drink the first 6oz of a fresh samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #6
preparation: Shake vodkas triple sec sweet and sour lime and cranberry juice vigorously in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Mission Accomplished
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec Rose's lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Seadoo
preparation: Add the vodka to a tall glass with lots of ice.Throw in a splash or two of cranberry juice and then fill with the soda.

name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail #5
preparation: Combine the Smirnoff vodka triple sec fresh lime juice and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Rub the rim with orange zest (if desired) and drop it into the glass. Serve.

name: Jenny's Summer Delight
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Malibu Paradise
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum Absolut vodka cranberry and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Absolut Sexy Lemonade Punch
preparation: Pour vodka triple sec 7-up and lemon juice into a 64 ounce container. Slice a lemon add then almost-fill with sweet and sour mix. Add sugar and a touch of grenadine and shake well. Serve into highball glasses. Stir or shake well with each serving to circulate the sugar. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' '54eXQ1ZDrSYQmB9dTEf7PfCsTUk9rqBX' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Absolut Chambulls
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka Red Bull and sparkling wine into a pitcher 1/3 filled with ice. Serve into wine glasses.

name: Absolut Summertime
preparation: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon. *note* A great summer refresher. Shaking and straining the drink makes it frothy. This drink is also good when you need to 'wet your whistle'. A good first drink of the afternoon or evening.

name: Absolut Stress #2
preparation: Mix well. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Absolut Train Wreck
preparation: Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a cup and serve.

name: Georgia Peach
preparation: Pour peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with orange and cranberry juice to taste and serve.

name: Absolut Royal Fuck
preparation: Chill in tumbler shake and serve up in a rocks glass.

name: Absolut 600
preparation: Chop the peach and put into a blender. Blend together with the frozen orangejuice and a few raspberries. Add a few drops grenadine the limejuice and the sugar syrup. Blend until it's smooth. Pour the absolut mandarin into a highball glass. Fill the glass to half with the mix from the blender and fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine. Stir and serve.

name: Absolut Hulk
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with two pineapple leaves and serve.

name: Absolut Lemonade
preparation: Mix alcohol sweet and sour. Add Ice and top off with Sprite.

name: Absolut Anti-freeze
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Absolut Mixer
preparation: Shake together over ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.

name: Absolut Sex
preparation: Shake Absolut Kurant Midori and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice. Strain into a rocks glass with a splash of seven on top.

name: Pink Panther #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Black Magic Shooter
preparation: Shake both ingredients with ice and strain into a shot glass. Slam it and cast your evil spell.

name: Cappucino Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mulatto Russian
preparation: Pour the vodka and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with light cream add chocolate syrup to taste and serve.

name: Mint Russian
preparation: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add creme de menthe top with cream and serve.

name: White Man
preparation: Pour Gentleman Jack whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add 3 ice cubes top with Vanilla Coke and serve.

name: Russian Kelman
preparation: Pour vodka into a 12 oz highball glass. Add pineapple juice and serve.

name: White Elephant
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender and mix until smooth and thick. Serve with a straw and a garnish of shredded coconut.

name: Nutty Russian
preparation: Mix well over ice and serve.

name: Belle Melon
preparation: Shake and pour into cocktail glass.

name: Double Fudge Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a chocolate straw and serve.

name: Jake White Special
preparation: Pour the rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill glass with cream soda. Stir gently and serve.

name: White Cloud
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: White Tornado
preparation: The trick to getting the look of the tornado is to pour the tequila rose slowly on the side of the shooter glass on top of the sambuca.

name: China White #2
preparation: Layer creme de cacao on bottom followed by the Irish Cream. Lastly sprinkle cinnamon over top.

name: White Sangria
preparation: Mix all ingredients except champagne or club soda. Chill well. Add champagne or club soda just before serving. Makes about 20 servings.

name: Liquid Coffee
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pina Colada Punch
preparation: 1. Blend pineapple juice coconut syrup coconut cream and cinnamon in a blender until creamy. Place in refridgerator if desired or continue immediately to next step. 2. Add mixture from previous step to a punch bowl. Add ice-cream and allow to mostly dissolve. Add pineapple soda an ice ring and thin orange slices.

name: Virgin Pina Colada
preparation: Add the pineapple juice coconut cream and crushed ice to a blender; blend at high speed. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Sweet Tight Pussy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Juicy Pussy
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream peach schnapps and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass over 1/4 cup of shaved ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine #3
preparation: Chill over ice and pour.

name: Gorilla Fart
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed above into a shot glass and shoot!

name: Acid Cookie
preparation: Mix liquor togther. Add Cream. Shake Well. Strain & Serve.

name: Bleeding Orgasm
preparation: Cut the pineapple into small chunks and soak them in the vodka and rum for 20-30 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients and you're all good.

name: Doctor Pepper
preparation: Place 1/2 of Draft in a mug. Place 3/4 oz. Amaretto into a shot glass. Float/Layer 1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 on top of the Amaretto. Light the Bacardi as to set it on fire. Quickly drop the shot glass with Amaretto and Bacardi into the Draft Beer and shoot.

name: Flaming Liquid Cocaine Blaster
preparation: Layer all three half shots on top of one another making sure to float the 151 on top. Ignite; drop into a glass filled with red bull and pound it.

name: Hairy Buffalo
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a large cooler punch bowl or garbage can (a new one). Cut larger fruit into pieces and add.

name: Graveyard
preparation: Mix the 5 whites and 2 whiskies in a beer mug in equal amounts. Top up the rest of the mug with half beer and half stout. WARNING: Very strong stuff. Do NOT attempt to drink it if you're not a good drinker. You'll be sending yourself to your own graveyard thus the name of the drink.

name: Four Horsemen
preparation: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.

name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #3
preparation: This drink should be shaken lightly and strained into a 2oz shot glass.

name: ACID
preparation: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

name: Little Green Fucker
preparation: Pour Bailey's into the bottom of the shot glass. Add Midori melon liqueur and float Bacardi 151 on top.

name: Instant Death
preparation: Put in all alcoholic ingredients first water last then salt.

name: Hiroshima Bomber
preparation: Fill your shot glass 3/4 way full with triple sec. Carefully layer the bailey's on top of the triple sec and add some drops of grenadine into the center. If done correctly it will look like an atomic mushroom cloud when the drop hits the bottom of the shot glass.

name: Rocky Point Bomber
preparation: Drop a shot of vodka into a half a highball glass of milk or half and half and shoot.

name: Belfast Bomber
preparation: Build over ice drink with a straw.

name: Brown Bomber
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: From Russia With Love
preparation: Pour over ice.

name: Cherry Bomber
preparation: Mix all parts together and serve cold in a tall glass.

name: Dive Bomber
preparation: Fill shot glass with the amaretto the root beer schnapps next drop the shot glass into mug of beer and drink before it fizzes over the mug.

name: Blue Bomber
preparation: Layer first 2 ingredients in shot glass. Set aside. Pour 7-Up and soda water in a foot glass then drop the shot glass in the foot glass and drink.

name: Pineapple Bomber #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cranberry Bomber
preparation: Pour over ice and fill with cola. Stir and add honey. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Kamikaze Bomber
preparation: Pour the Red Bull into an old fashioned glass splash the grenadine to reddan the Bull. Pour a shot of Jagermeister and drop it into the glass. Consume that beverage kamikaze style.

name: Green Bomber
preparation: Combine melon liqueur gin lime juice and sweet vermouth into a shot glass. Drop the shot into a pint of beer. Drink both the shot and the beer at the same time.

name: Bloody Smurf
preparation: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

name: Bazooka Bomber
preparation: Pour creme de bananes triple sec and grenadine over ice in an old-fashioned glass or tumbler and serve.

name: Mad Bomber
preparation: Pour the gin into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola stir well and serve.

name: Becky's Magic Punch
preparation: Add all ingredients to a large container. Serves about 4-5 drinkers (within reason). You can add different alcohol to it and not taste it but the everclear does a fine job on it's own.

name: The Wedge
preparation: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Orange Whip
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes and stir.

name: Monkey Brain
preparation: Fill a shot glass with apfelkorn almost to the rim. Carefully pour a little bailey's into the glass. The two liquors don't mix if poured correctly and the bailey's will sink to the bottom as a nasty looking blob not unlike a brain.

name: Bronze Monkey
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Three-Legged Monkey
preparation: Shake and strain into rocks glass.

name: Drunk Monkey
preparation: Pour the triple sec banana liqueur and melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cranberry and pineapple juice. Stir well and serve.

name: Brass Fiddle
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps whiskey pineapple juice and orange juice into a blender. Add one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Swirl the grenadine around the edge of a parfait glass. Add mixture from blender. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Whippet
preparation: Made as in a normal vodka and orange with raspberry cordial added last.

name: Dreamy Monkey
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and the remaining 1/2 banana and serve.

name: Chocolate Monkey
preparation: Blend liqueurs with ice-cream milk and syrup. Pour into a parfait glass top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey
preparation: Shake well and pour over ice top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.

name: Monkey La La
preparation: Blend until smooth and frothy.

name: Monkey Pussy
preparation: In a mixing tin combine all the ingredients over ice. Shake well and strain into shot glasses.

name: Cowboy Roy
preparation: Pour vodka rum and orange juice into a very tall glass stir and serve.

name: Bloody Monkey
preparation: Half-fill a highball glass with ice. Pour the grenadine around the inside of the glass and on top of the ice to give that bloody look to it. Next add the vodka (more if you prefer) then the sour apple pucker. Add the ginger ale and then fill with 7-up. Garnish as desired and serve.

name: Cranberry Newt
preparation: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Malibu Pink Panther
preparation: Crush a hand full or two of ice into a blender add the frozen pink lemonade and malibu rum and blend for 30 seconds or until smooth-like consistensy. Add in your desired amount of whipped cream and blend further until smooth. Serve.

name: Betsy Clear
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice. Stir. Garnish with an orange wedge. Enjoy!

name: Fuzzy Astronaut
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Peach Death
preparation: Serve on the rocks.

name: Gin Blossam
preparation: Fill the glass about two thirds full of sprite. Pour in the schnapps then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

name: Travis' Special
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass. Serve with an umbrella.

name: Skip And Go Naked
preparation: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer stir lightly and serve.

name: Liquid Bubble Gum
preparation: Stir all ingredients into a glass.

name: Peach Iced Tea
preparation: Pour iced tea into a mason jar. Add peach schnapps and stir.

name: Bellini Cocktail
preparation: Mix the peach nectar lemon juice and schnapps in a chilled glass. Add half a cup (or more) of crushed ice stir and add the champagne. (Serves 2). May be prepared in a blender to produce a frozen drink.

name: Fruit Shake
preparation: Blend until smooth.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked #2
preparation: Empty a bag of ice into a large cooler. Add the cans of limeade and lemonade then the 2 liter bottle of sprite. Add 1/2 gallon of vodka and 20-24 cans of beer.

name: Banana Grape Smoothie
preparation: Place the bananas and grapes into a blender and mix until it is a smooth liquid. Add the ice and blend until crushed. Add milk mix until smooth and pour into a hurricane glass. Serve.

name: After Party
preparation: Mix all ingredients! More or less vodka and sugar can be used. Mix to your taste!

name: Mojo
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large container. Keep stirred.

name: Gangsta's Charm
preparation: Stir together in a collins glass half-filled with ice and serve.

name: Lucky Charm
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Simple Charm
preparation: Stir liquors and strain in to coctail-glass. Float cream gently on top. Garnish with cinnamon powder.

name: Lucky Lindeman
preparation: Empty one can of tropicana strawberry/orange/banana into a blender and 1/4 gallon vodka. Mix well. Pour half of this into a pitcher and set aside for later use leaving the other half in the blender. Fill the blender with ice and blend until it resembles a slurpy. Drink up and start mixing the other half.

name: Lucky Driver
preparation: Prepare in a blender or shaker serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice and one lemon slice. Use only freshly squeezed juice for best results.

name: Lucky Seven
preparation: Combine the seven liquors straight into a tall glass. Top it with three splashes of cranberry lime and orange juices.

name: Charm City Classic
preparation: First mix the Iced tea and the Lemonade in a separate glass. Add the grand marnier to a second collins glass. Then pour the mixed contents of the Iced Tea-Lemonade into the glass with the Grand Marnier. Stir and drink.

name: Lucky Stud
preparation: Combine with ice in a mixing glass and pour into shot glasses.

name: Feelin' Lucky
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Lucky Stiff
preparation: Pour over ice in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Black Christmas
preparation: Mix black sambuca into a glass filled with 6 ounces of eggnog. Stir and serve.

name: Crocodile Cooler
preparation: Pour over ice and mix well. Garnish with a lime wheel and a straw.

name: Black Gold
preparation: Pour both ingredients in shot glass and enjoy!

name: Wild Bill's Lemonade
preparation: Pour ingredients into a large ice-filled rocks glass. Stir well garnish with two slices of lemon and serve.

name: Black Widow
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice and shake. Strain into a martini glass and serve with a lemon twist.

name: Black Stripe
preparation: Dissolve the molasses in a mug with some boiling water. Add the cinnamon a lemon twist and the remaining water. Float rum on top and ignite. Let the flame burn for a few seconds then stir to extinguish it and sprinkle some nutmeg on top to garnish.

name: Black Apple
preparation: Both chilled fill the mug 2/3 full with Strongbow. Add Guinness Stout after the cider has been poured to form a black layer on top. Serve.

name: Bootlegger Tea
preparation: Pour vodka rum and triple sec over ice in a pint glass. Fill with equal parts of sweet and sour mix and 7-up add grenadine and serve.

name: Black Mozart Sparkler
preparation: Shake ingredients in a shaker and pour into a champagne tulip. Top with dry red sparkling wine. Garnish with a red cherry on a cocktail stick and serve.

name: Black and Amber
preparation: Fill a beer mug / pint glass half full with Abita Amber. Next pour the Guinness over a spoon slowly until the glass is full. The Guinness can also be poured directly in but this wont look as nice.

name: New York Black Haus
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Black Tooth
preparation: Fill a shot glass with a shot of crown royal. Add just enough Coca-Cola to give the shot a black appearance.

name: Pink Floyd
preparation: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a shaker glass over ice. Top with equal parts orange and pinapple juice and a splash of grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Jackhammer #2
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add the spirits and orange juice. Splash with grenadine for taste/color. Shake with ice and pour into old-fashioned glass wihout the ice. Shoot and enjoy.

name: Cherry Lifesaver Shooter
preparation: Add ingedients in shaker tin over ice shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Fizzy Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Pour schnapps and orange juice over 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir gently.

name: Southern Bubbles
preparation: No mixing required.

name: Kir Martini
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass full of ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of lemon.

name: Breeze of Saronno
preparation: Pour the Amaretto di Saronno creme de menthe vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a chilled rocks or old-fashioned glass. Garnish with mint leaves and almond powder and serve.

name: Valencia #2
preparation: Shake the apricot brandy orange juice and bitters with ice and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Champagne Irish Mist
preparation: Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Blushing Bride
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps and grenadine syrup into the bottom of a Champagne flute. Fill with Champagne and serve.

name: Champagne Charlie
preparation: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a half-slice of orange.

name: Arctic Kiss
preparation: Chill vodka over ice if it's not in your freezer. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and fill with champagne.

name: Champagne Polonaise
preparation: Serve in a champagne flute.

name: French 75 (Cognac)
preparation: Combine cognac sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concoction. Garnish with lemon curl.

name: Guavaberry Kir
preparation: Pour the guavaberry liqueur into a chilled wine glass. Add chilled dry white wine to taste and serve.

name: Classic Champagne Cocktail
preparation: Soak one sugar cube in a champagne flute with angostura bitters. Add champagne and cognac. Squeeze in a twist of lemon and discard. Garnish with half a slice of orange.

name: Bellini
preparation: Pour peach puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice.

name: American Flyer
preparation: Shake the rum the juice and the syrup with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled white wine glass and fill with sparkling wine.

name: Campari Champagne
preparation: Pour campari into a champagne flute and fill with champagne. Twist the lemon peel over the drink and serve.

name: Aqua Marina
preparation: Shake vodka green creme de menthe and lemon juice and strain into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: American Glory
preparation: Add ingredients to a frosted ice-filled highball glass.

name: Di Saronno Mimosa
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and serve.

name: Pink Millenium
preparation: Mix vodka cranberry juice and sugar syrup and pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

name: Champibble
preparation: Stir or shake well.

name: Champagne Cocktail
preparation: Place one lump of sugar with bitters in a chilled champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Kir
preparation: Combine ingredients in a large white wine glass. Twist the lemon peel to release the oil and drop it into the glass.

name: A Goodnight Kiss
preparation: Place a drop of angostura bitters on a sugar cube and drop into a champagne flute. Add champagne and splash of campari.

name: Harlem Mugger
preparation: Build ingredients in order over ice in a collins glass.

name: Champagne Celebration
preparation: Add Cointreau Brandy and a sugar cube saturated with Peychaud Bitters to a champagne flute. Fill with your favorite champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Kir Royale
preparation: Pour creme de cassis into a glass and gently pour champagne on top.

name: Saronno Peach Fuzz
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of peach and a cherry and serve.

name: Buck's Fizz
preparation: Add to a frosted wine glass.

name: Strawberry Champagne
preparation: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with two halves of a strawberry and serve.

name: Bombay Bellini
preparation: Pour mango puree into a champagne flute (recommended) or a glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice.

name: Pernod Fizz
preparation: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice and serve.

name: Cherry Champagne
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Champagne Ambon
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: D'Artagnan
preparation: Chill the teaspoon amounts of liquor in a mixing glass and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne add strips of orange peel and serve.

name: French 76
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Thug Passion
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice and serve.

name: Strawberry Kir Royale
preparation: Mix strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let stand for 5-10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Divide into two white wine glasses add champagne and creme de cassis.

name: Feel Like Holiday
preparation: Stir vodka and grenadine with ice. Pour into a champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

name: Blow Blue Bubbles
preparation: Pour blueberry schnapps into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Heaven
preparation: Pour the chilled Hpnotiq liqueur and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add Chambord raspberry liqueur. Garnish with cherries and serve.

name: Champagne Napoleon
preparation: Stir the mandarine napoleon with orange juice and ice briefly and strain into a frosted champagne flute. Add the champagne and serve.

name: Shit on the Grass
preparation: In a shot glass add Creme de Menthe on bottom of glass and then add baileys on top of creme de menthe thus making the effect as what the cocktail is called.

name: Fuzzy Monkey #2
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Abortion #2
preparation: Layer into a shot glass in the following order: peach schnapps irish cream grenadine. Don't swish just shoot. As described above the coagulating of the irish cream combined with the grenadine creates an effect which gives rise to the name Abortion.

name: Peachy Dream
preparation: Line the top of a hurricane glass with sugar. Fill cup with ice and add peach schnapps and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine syrup. Garnish with a sword and cherry and serve.

name: Brain Hemmorage
preparation: This is a great drink to serve on Halloween. First pour the peach schnapps. Then slowly pour the Irish Cream. Do not mix! The Creme will clump together and settle at the bottom of the schnapps. It will have the appearance of an internal organ!! Pour the grenadine over the Creme for a completely disgusting looking yet thoroughly tasty party drink!

name: Peach Cicel
preparation: Add the peach schnapps vanilla schnapps peach sherbet and sliced peach to a blender and blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Lovely Lauren
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender with 1/2 - 1 cup of crushed ice. Blend well pour into a margarita glass and serve.

name: K-Snap
preparation: Stir both ingredients together in a cocktail glass with/without shaven ice as desired and serve.

name: Brain Cocktail
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into a highball glass. Add irish cream to the center. Top with grenadine and serve.

name: Rod on the Rocks
preparation: Pour peach schnapps over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Fill with apple cider stir lightly and serve.

name: Creamy Pflueger
preparation: Combine peach schnapps and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add half-and-half and serve.

name: Twains Orgasm
preparation: Layer in order in a pousse-cafe glass.

name: Sizz Snot
preparation: Pour the two measures of Schnapps into the cocktail glass. With a cocktail stick stir the liquid whilst adding the two or three dashes of Creme de Menthe. Do not mix too hard. Once the Creme de Menthe has started to be added stop stirring. Finally gently pour in the lemonade until the glass is topped up. Add maybe a cocktail cherry for decoration.

name: Foreplay on the Neutral Ground
preparation: Fill glasses with ice. Mix absolut midori pineapple juice and cranberry juice in a decanter. Pour over ice and serve. Makes several.

name: Kiss on the Lips #2
preparation: Stir ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Happily Ever After
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Fuzzyberry
preparation: Mix ingredients together and top with ice.

name: Sex under the Boardwalk
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: The Fuzzy Pissbomb
preparation: Pour all ingredients in rocks glass. (with silver polka dots on it if possible) Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds. Drink it fast.

name: Black River Boogie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a glass and mix well.

name: Bloody Brain
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into a cordial glass and gently float bailey's irish cream on top. Add the grenadine in seperate drops into the glass. Serve.

name: Fuzzy Pissbomb
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir.

name: Fruity Toad
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Equator
preparation: Layer ingredients in the exact order. Grenadine should sit on top for a little bit before sliding down the inside of the shot glass.

name: Fuzzball
preparation: Fill a cup 2/3 with sprite 1/3 with peach schnapps and add ice.

name: Crystal Telekenisis
preparation: Pour the Mountain Dew Baja Blast into a cocktail glass. Add peach schnapps (or Hpnotiq liqueur) stir briefly and serve.

name: Dirty Silk Panties
preparation: Pour vodka & Peach Schnapps into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a large shot glass and top with 2 drops Grenadine.

name: Russian Candy
preparation: Fill a shot glass with vodka and peach schnapps. Add a dash of grenadine (do not stir). Allow grenadine to settle at the bottom of the glass and serve.

name: Frozen Fuzzy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/3 cup of crushed ice. Blend on low for 5 seconds then on high until firm. Pour into a cocktail glass garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.

name: Hurricane Laura
preparation: Stir and pour in shot glasses.

name: Jamaican Hurricane
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Grass Skirt
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin triple sec pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

name: Hurricane Boston
preparation: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass.

name: Hurricane #2
preparation: Pour gin rums amaretto and triple sec into a hurricane glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

name: Hawaiian Volcano #2
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Hurricane Flint
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hurricane Jack
preparation: Shake and strain through ice into a shot glass and serve.

name: Miami Hurricane
preparation: Mix with ice cubes in a hurricane glass.

name: Hurricane Leah
preparation: Pour over ice into a hurricane glass and stir. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Oscar
preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until a redish pink color. Strain over ice in a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Nick's Fruit Punch
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses. Makes 3-5 shooters.

name: Hurricane Ethel
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Iced Tea
preparation: Basically a Long Beach Iced Tea with Myers in place of light rum and pineapple in place of cranberry juice. Best if prepared in a mixing cup with ice shaken and poured (ice and all) into a hurricane glass. To serve in a Collins glass (which is usually somewhat smaller) cut the bottle pours back to 1/2 oz each and mixers back to 1 oz each. To make a flag garnish spear whatever fruit you are using (in this case a split chunk of pineapple) all the way through with a toothpick. Stick a maraschino cherry on the exposed top end of the toothpick then hang the whole thing on the side of the glass.

name: Hurricane Hawaii
preparation: Shake rums passion fruit juice lime juice and grenadine together. Pour into ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Helluva Hurricane
preparation: Pour dark rum light rum juices and grenadine over ice into a pilsner/parfait glass. Add a half spoon of sugar stir slightly and top with high octane 151 rum and cherries/pineapple. Add an optional sugar cube ignite and drink with a straw.

name: Citrus Hurricane
preparation: Mix the Bacardi Ciclon with Minutemaid Limeade. Use lime twist as an optional garnish. Great mixed drink especially come summer time!

name: Kismet Hardy
preparation: Blend ingredients briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet garnish with a cherry and orange slice and serve.

name: Chocolate Hurricane
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
preparation: Pour pernod into a champagne flute fill with champagne and sprinkle with a few drops of lemon juice. Serve.

name: Champagne Blitz
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute stir and serve.

name: Doctor
preparation: Mix it together and shake (not too hard). Pour it into an ordinary cocktail glass.

name: The Captain's Martini
preparation: Combine the gin vermouth and creme de menthe in a shaker with ice shake and serve.

name: Greenback
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Fuzzy Slammers
preparation: Fill half a shot glass with the Bacardi add lemon juice and then add the champagne. Place hand over the top of the glass slam the glass on the bar to release the bubbles and down the shot in one go. This is a great drink to start a party of with the bubbles are amazing.

name: Gone Tomorrow
preparation: Build in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with just the stem of a cherry.

name: White Way Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bubbly Martini
preparation: Stir gin and champagne gently in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with two olives and serve. Note: the quality of the drink is proportional to the quality of the champagne used.

name: Here Today
preparation: Drop the lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass with the gin. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Broadway Martini
preparation: Pour the gin and white creme de menthe into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve.

name: Arthur Tompkins
preparation: Pour gin Grand Marnier and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Peppermint Park
preparation: Pour the gin and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large champagne flute. Top with champagne add a straw and serve.

name: Beach Bum Bob
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Palm Beach Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Miami Beach Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cinnamon Toast #3
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Harley Davidson #3
preparation: Pour alcohol into the shot glass. Occassionally mix with ice then put into a shot glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.

name: Four Horsemen #3
preparation: Pour contents into an old-fashioned glass give a slight stir and serve.

name: Juicy Lucy
preparation: Pour vodka gin and curacao into a tall glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite and serve.

name: Ragnar #3
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass. Fill with ice cubes and add sprite.

name: Goombay Smash #3
preparation: Pour the Bacardi gold rum and Bacardi Coco rum along with the pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake untill well chilled. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and add a splash of sweet and sour mix. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Purple Helmeted Warrior #2
preparation: Pour Chambord vodka and sweet and sour mix into a highball glass over ice. Add Sprite more if desired and serve.

name: Magic Woman
preparation: Pour blue curacao rum and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Blend briefly fill with sprite and add a splash of lemon juice.

name: Electric Tea
preparation: Combine in a pint glass shake and serve with a lemon wedge.

name: Danny's Blue Devil
preparation: Pour all non carbonated ingredients into shaker. Shake hard thrice pour into a highball glass filled with ice top the drink off with a splash of sprite and stir. The drink should taste almost exactly like Cool Aid if you've gotten it right.

name: Pearl Diver #3
preparation: Shake Midori Malibu and vodka with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Place a straw in milk and cover other end with thumb (to capture milk in straw). Place straw with milk about halfway into shot glass and use thumb to release 1 drop of milk in center of shot. This requires some practice but if done properly will form a white pearl floating in the shot. Very tasty!

name: Coral Reef
preparation: Pour vodka tequila and blue curacao over ice and shake. Slowly add sour mix until bright torquoise mix again and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie #3
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Psycho
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice pineapple chunk and maraschino cherry.

name: San Juan Cooler
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum and dry vermouth. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: Little Bastard
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Nawlin's Po-Boy
preparation: Using a hurricane glass filled with ice add as follows: rum grenadine and orange juice. Then fill to the top with Hawaiian Punch. Stir and garnish with cherries lime or orange.

name: Phoenix
preparation: Add a few ice cubes to an old-fashioned glass and add the tequila orange juice blue curacao and grenadine. Stir with a straw. Garnish with a small red blue or orange feather on top of drink if available.

name: Brian Auel
preparation: Add the Southern Comfort pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine syrup and serve.

name: Afterglow
preparation: Mix. Serve over ice.

name: Pussy Foot
preparation: Shake or blend briefly and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with fresh fruit and a cherry. Add a straw and serve.

name: Quikster's Delight
preparation: Pour rum into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with grenadine and serve.

name: Outer Banks Sunset
preparation: Pour in a shot of everclear over ice in a highball glass. Next fill the glass halfway with orange juice. Finish up by filling up the glass with pineapple juice and splashing with grenadine. Serve.

name: Henry's Special
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of broken ice in a double-cocktail glass. Add champagne and serve.

name: Patel's Special
preparation: Pour shots into a cocktail glass. Add cranberry and pineapple juice two squirts of lemon and fill the rest of the glass with ice.

name: PMS Special
preparation: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Danny's Special
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Norling Special
preparation: Pour midori and bacardi limon into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with equal parts 7-up and cranberry juice.

name: Casey Special
preparation: Mix and drink. Slam and jam.

name: Kordulas Special
preparation: Pour in the ingredients. Add a dash of angostura on the cube and place it in the champagne by using a tong.

name: Frog in a Blender
preparation: Blend orange juice blue maui and vodka and pour in glass. Splash grenadine on top but do not stir in.

name: Cranberry Sunrise
preparation: Mix vodka then cranberry juice then orange juice then top with grenadine.

name: Irish Cream Special
preparation: Put ice cubes into the bottom of a brandy snifter. Slowly pour bailey's irish cream over ice. Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add hearshy's chocolate sauce.

name: Bob's Special Punch
preparation: Add them all together in any order you wish just make sure you stir it all together well.

name: Jamaican Sunset #2
preparation: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with orange juice and add a splash of grenadine. Shake or stir.

name: Cole's Special Douche
preparation: Place desired amount of ice in a highball glass. Pour in Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka followed by raspberry lemonade V8 splash. Add two to three splashes of grenadine stir and serve.

name: North Dakota Special
preparation: Add shots to an old-fashioned glass. Fill with coca-cola and serve.

name: Bullfrog
preparation: Shake well in a closed container pour into an open container and stir well.

name: Blue Lagoon Margarita
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila blue curacao 7-Up and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice to taste and shake vigorously. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sex in the Red Zone
preparation: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

name: Killing Light
preparation: Highly dangerous mix - but taste it! You'll be surprised.

name: Desert Shield
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass stir well and serve.

name: Winter Tropic
preparation: Pour vodka into a hurricane glass. Add cranberry juice and margarita mix simultaneously and serve.

name: Maier Special
preparation: Pour the vodka blackberry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Bloody Rain
preparation: Pour 2 oz Vodka into glass add 4 oz Snapple Elements: RAIN energy drink and top it off with a splash of Cranberry juice to give it that bloody water look. Optional: serve in an oriental tea bowl and garnish with a paper parasol for thematic appeal.

name: Sea Breeze
preparation: Pour vodka into an iced highball glass. Fill partially with grapefruit juice and top with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Heilig
preparation: Pour vodka and then blueberry schnapps into a shot glass. Top off with the cranberry juice.

name: Cherry Blast
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Boot Blaster
preparation: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of coca-cola to dirty the drink.

name: Melon Kamikaze
preparation: Mix sour mix triple sec and vodka together with ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice and add 1 oz of melon liqueur.

name: Mai Tai #2
preparation: Pour the white rum orgeat syrup triple sec and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Kamikaze Shooter
preparation: Pour ice cold vodka triple sec and sour mix into a chilled shot glass. Drop a pinch of sugar into the shooter and frost the glass with the remaining.

name: Death Star
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Nuclear Kamikaze
preparation: Mix sour mix triple sec and vodka in shaker with ice. Strain into cocktail glass and add Blue Maui to mixture.

name: Orange Tickle
preparation: In a tall glass fill half with ice and add the Captian followed by the Orange juice. Top the drink with the soda. Drink with straw optional.

name: Fruity Pebbles
preparation: Mix all the ingredients to taste in any kind of container.

name: Welcome Delight
preparation: Pour ingredients into a bowl and mix them together.

name: Javanese Sunrise
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir slowly and serve.

name: Apfel Orange
preparation: Mix the ingredients add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.

name: Jamaican Sunrise
preparation: Pour vodka peach schnapps and orange juice in a glass and be sure to mix them well. Add the cranberry juice and let it sit at the top of the glass.

name: Sex on the Beach #9
preparation: Use a shaker: first put in the ice then add the orange juice ( you should always add the fruit juices before the alcohol! ). Put both the Passoa and the Malibu in and give it a good shake. Poor in a glass and add a cube of ice. The poor a bit of cream on top of the ice cubes ( preferably using a teaspoon or so to keep the cream from mixing with the other stuff ). Put a cherry on top and voila there's your Sex on the Beach.

name: Sex On The Beach #6
preparation: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schnapps. Fill to near top with OJ amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted to taste.

name: Sex On The Beach #5
preparation: Pour vodka over crushed ice in a champagne saucer. Add cranberry juice midori chambord and top off with pineapple juice. Stir gently and serve.

name: Blue Dolphin #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Blue Ninja #2
preparation: Combine in a cocktail shaker with ice shake and strain into a chilled shot glass. Serve.

name: Blue Blazer #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour in Old-fashioned glasses with a spoon in it (to prevent the glass from breaking if the drink is too hot).

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost Baby
preparation: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Barton Special
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Blimey
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Forbidden Smoke
preparation: Blend all ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a piece of edible dry ice.

name: Silver Bullet
preparation: In a mixng glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin and Scotch. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass. Carnish with the lemon twist.

name: Peapicker
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add lemonade a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Belmont
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Frosty Pineapple Crush
preparation: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka pineapple vodka and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass 1/4 filled with crushed ice. Pour the RedRum rum on top. Put a slice of pineapple and a cherry on an umbrella and place on the side of glass as garnish.

name: Orange Crush
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes stir briefly and serve.

name: Poontang
preparation: Mix vodka and triple sec in a hurricane glass. Add tang to taste and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Watching a Sunrise
preparation: Cover the bottom of a highball glass with a thin layer of grenadine then fill the glass with ice. Combine the 42 Degress vodka Southern comfort liqueur and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain over the ice into the highball glass. Garnish with two cherries and serve.

name: Officer Down
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort amaretto and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Float the Bacardi 151 rum on top and serve.

name: Do Me Now
preparation: Pour the 151 peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Add a splash of Sprite and serve cold.

name: Chocolate Pirate
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. Serve in a chilled wine goblet.

name: Chocolate Vice
preparation: Pour the rum bourbon creme de cacao and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Spoon the cream carefully on top and serve.

name: Miami Sunset
preparation: Pour ingredients together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Mix with a stirring stick and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow
preparation: Empty a 16 ounce bottle and add 6 ice cubes to it. Add the Bacardi 151 rum Captain Morgan Original spiced rum Southern Comfort and pineapple juice. Leave enough room at the top for the foam when you shake it up. Shake until ice cubes are pretty much melted and serve. May be served on ice if desired.

name: 414SS Daiquiri
preparation: Add daiquiri mix and the required amount of ice stated on the packet to a blender. Add the Bacardi light rum and then the Bacardi 151. Splash in some more 151 if desired. Blend together for a few seconds and pour into cocktail glasses. Attempt to drink.

name: Look Out Below
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cina Polada
preparation: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.

name: Fierce 151
preparation: Pour 2 shots of Bacardi 151 into a cup full of Gatorade Fierce Grape. Mix well and drink.

name: DewRunRum
preparation: Place two ice cubes into a 16 oz. cup. Add one shot of bacardi 151 proof rum and pour the mountain dew over the top.

name: Space Odyssey
preparation: Fill glass with ice and add shots of bacardi and malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

name: Flatliner #2
preparation: Shake goldschlager and grand marnier well in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail/martini glass top with bacardi 151 rum and serve. (Can ignite rum if desired for optimal effect.)

name: Instant Death #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass and drink fast.

name: Pineapple Fuck-Me-Up
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 into a cocktail glass. Add pineapple juice a splash of triple sec and serve.

name: Miami Meloni
preparation: Pour the white rum melon liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cave In
preparation: Pour the amaretto Bacardi 151 and Southern Comfort into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add cranberry juice to taste and stir again briefly. Add a splash of orange juice and serve.

name: Army Ranger
preparation: Mix the Jagermeister herbal liqueur Bacardi 151 rum and Red Bull energy drink in a mug or tall glass. Float a slice of both lime and lemon on top and serve.

name: Rum Aid
preparation: Shake and strain over ice in a margarita glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Jake-Knife
preparation: Pour jagermeister over ice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with coke shake vigorously and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with rum and ignite if desired. Extinguish and serve.

name: Gorilla Cocktail
preparation: Add ingredients together and serve.

name: CA Area 151
preparation: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

name: Biohazard
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a margarita glass and serve.

name: Miami Cocktail
preparation: Pour the white rum creme de menthe and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pineappleless Pineapple Juice
preparation: Pour southern comfort to the first line of a 16 oz. solo brand plastic cup. Add bacardi 151 rum 7-up orange juice and coca-cola. Swirl briefly around in the cup and serve.

name: Weakness
preparation: Pour all four shots into a low ball glass chill if you care.

name: Orange Fucker
preparation: Mix all three ingredients into a cup and stir well (quick consumption should be possible and is recommended to keep orange juice from reacting with the other ingredients.)

name: Booty Juice
preparation: Fill mixing glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all ingredients. Strain into a rocks glass.

name: Hot Lunch
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.

name: Humper
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker over ice and shake until well chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy. Float a small amount of dark rum on top for a little added flavor.

name: Frappe (Plain)
preparation: Mix together. Blend at full power for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold. If you make fresh coffee mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy add more milk or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

name: Gaelic Coffee
preparation: Blend until smooth and pour into an irish coffee cup. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with green creme de menthe for color.

name: Nudge
preparation: Pour liquors into a coffee mug and fill with coffee.

name: Coffee Liqueur
preparation: Combine coffee sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

name: Millionaire's Coffee
preparation: Pour bailey's irish cream frangelico and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and add coffee. Top with whipped cream and optionally allspice (cinnamon and nutmeg).

name: H.D.
