preparation: Mix the whisky and baileys cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

name: French Bite
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Nagermeister
preparation: Pour kahlua into an irish coffee cup. Add jagermeister fill with coffee and serve with cream on top.

name: Iced Coffee Fillip
preparation: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

name: Tia-Maria
preparation: Boil water sugar and coffee for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

name: Espresso Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice shake vigorously and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.

name: Espresso Cocktail
preparation: Prepare a martini glass with a brown-sugared rim. Shake all ingredients with ice strain into the prepared glass and serve.

name: Bailey's Cup of Coffee
preparation: Mix the hot coffee with Bailey's. Enjoy!

name: Bonaparte
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Karsk
preparation: Put a copper coin in a coffee-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

name: Coffee-Vodka
preparation: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. *Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. **If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

name: Nanc's Iced-Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee over crushed ice or small ice cubes in a blender. Add all other ingredients and blend on high speed until desired consistency.

name: African Hot Punch
preparation: Pour brandy and rum into a bowl filled with the sugar. Set on fire (use extreme caution) and let the sugar dissolve. Add black coffee and stir well.

name: Cafe Royal Frappe
preparation: Mix and pour into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve with short straws.

name: Greek Iced Coffee
preparation: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice and pour into a coffee mug.

name: Brandy Mocha Almond
preparation: Pour into a heatproof cup and sweeten to taste with sugar.

name: Kahlua Coffee
preparation: Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. Let cool and add vanilla and either a pint or fifth of vodka. Drink and enjoy.

name: Sjarsk
preparation: Add the coffee first then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well.

name: Nikki Coffee
preparation: Pour bailey's and butterscotch into a coffee mug. Fill with coffee and stir.

name: Chocolate Orgasm
preparation: Stir.

name: Whiskey Fix
preparation: Shake juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended whiskey and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Apple Brandy Highball
preparation: Pour apple brandy over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel on top and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water if preferred)

name: Remsen Cooler
preparation: Pour two ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass add sugar and stir. Add ice cubes gin and fill with carbonated water. Stir again and garnish with a twist of lemon and a spiral of orange on the rim.

name: Gin Highball
preparation: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel stir and serve.

name: Fraises Fizz
preparation: Combine the gin strawberry liqueur lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Add soda water and garnish with a strawberry and a twist of lemon peel.

name: Dinah Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Whiskey Collins
preparation: Shake blended whiskey juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange lemon and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Cognac Highball
preparation: Pour cognac into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel stir and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water if preferred.)

name: Mississippi Planters Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Commodore Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lady Love Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Whiskey Highball
preparation: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Burgundy Bishop
preparation: Shake rum juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine and stir. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Brandy Highball
preparation: Pour brandy into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water add the twist of lemon peel stir gently and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water if preferred.)

name: Chicago Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Rum Collins
preparation: Shake rum juice of lime and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the slice of lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cablegram
preparation: Stir blended whiskey juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Rum Fizz
preparation: Shake well over ice in a shaker and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda and serve.

name: Apricot Fizz
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda stir well and serve.

name: Japanese Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: The Drunken Elf
preparation: Thoroughly blend all ingredients in an electric blender with two cups of ice. Pour into a frosted glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Shock
preparation: Pour aftershock into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate and serve.

name: Cinnamon Stick
preparation: Pour goldschlager into a glass. Add apple juice mix and serve.

name: Maple Lake Irish Shock
preparation: Bring to the boil; aftershock cinnamon schnapps and apple cider. Stir in the cinnamon sticks stirring frequently. Add apple slices and let cool for 2 minutes. Add the apple pucker and serve.

name: Fireball
preparation: Mix the schnapps southern comfort and tabasco sauce. Pour into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Drool
preparation: Pour aftershock into milk mix until light pink. Drink up.

name: Golden Up
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the Goldschlager and fill with 7-Up. Serve.

name: Water from the River Ganges
preparation: Add 1/4 slice lime to the bottom of a highball glass along with 2 ice cubes. Pour the Stolichnaya vodka orange juice and Coca-cola into the glass in that order and serve.

name: Crackhead Slammer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dr. Gold's
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Double Bubble
preparation: Mix the firewater and pina colada mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cinnamon Caramel Apple
preparation: Pour the shot of Goldschlager in a cocktail glass fill with 1/2 glass of the chilled apple cider and add 1 shot of caramel liqueur. Stir to mix.

name: Degobah Dropkick
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Stein
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Golden Coke
preparation: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.

name: Hot Cinnamon Roll
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Kist from Jim
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam into a collins glass. Fill with Sunkist soda depending on how strong you want it. Stir and serve.

name: Wasabi Bloody Mary
preparation: Combine lime juice and wasabi with a whisk until wasabi dissolves. Pour into a pitcher and add veggie juice worcestershire sauce pepper sauce and salt. Chill. Stir in vodka and serve over ice with a stalk of celery or pickled asparagus. Serves 8.

name: Lemon Slam
preparation: Pour vodka into an ice-filled glass until 80% full. Using a spoon drop sugar on top until it forms a large peak on top of the ice. Pour in lemon juice until the glass is about 90-95% full and using your spoon stir the mixture for about 30 seconds (or until the ingredients are perfectly mixed). Note: Exact measurements are not used due to the fact that certain people prefer different amounts of sugar and lemon juice.

name: Banderas
preparation: Align the shot glasses in the following order: Tomato (red) Tequila (white) and Lemon (green) resembling the Mexican Flag. Quickly gulp one after another: Tomato Tequila and finally finish with the Lemon.

name: Bleeding Nazi
preparation: Add the tomato juice Tabasco Worcestershire and Jager into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge if you like and serve.

name: Bloody Mary #4
preparation: Combine lemon vodka tomato juice and dill (use a dash of dried if no fresh available) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Float a slice of lemon on top and serve.

name: Bloody Dragon
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or highball glass with cracked ice and serve.

name: Mickey Mouse
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Jake's Bloody Mary
preparation: Pour the vodka dry sherry lime juice V8 juice and tomato juice into a beer pilsner over ice and mix well. Season as desired; roughly 3 drops of Tabasco sauce and Worcestershire sauce. Finish with a pinch of celery salt and pepper. Serve with a stick of celery or carrot.

name: Klingon Battlejuice
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass stir well and serve.

name: Bullshot #4
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker or pitcher with several ice cubes and stir. Strain into glass straight up or on the rocks and garnish with a stick of celery.

name: Virgin Mary
preparation: Fill a large wine glass with ice. Add tomato juice then the rest of the ingredients. Stir and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Patti's Irish Bloody Mary
preparation: Rim a coffee mug with celery salt and pour bailey's over ice into it. Fill with bloody mary mix garnish with a pickle spear and filberts and serve.

name: Bite Your Mama Bloody Mary
preparation: Combine all ingredients together with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker and pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pickle spear olives and a lime slice.

name: Runner's Mark
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir and garnish with celery or scallion.

name: Russian Bloody Mary
preparation: Pour chilled vodka into a shot glass and carefully add chilled tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Add tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Eye Opening Bloody Mary
preparation: Add half amount of V8 juice to pitcher. Add all other ingredients except vodka and stir vigorously. Add remaining amount of V8 juice and stir again. Add vodka; stir once more. Pour into ice-filled glasses garnish with celery stalks and serve. (Serves 12-13)

name: Bloody Mary Jolly Style
preparation: Add together in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge a chunk of cheese and an olive.

name: Coffey's Hot Irish Bloody Mary
preparation: Add the V8 juice Worcestershire sauce horseradish celery salt and pepper to a mason jar cover and shake well. Add vodka and shake again. Sample and add additional celery salt pepper or horseradish to taste.

name: Algonquin Bloody Mary
preparation: Add vodka juices and sauce to a shaker with ice adding salt and pepper to taste. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice cubes into a highball glass and add a lime wedge.

name: Don's Bloody Mary
preparation: Put 4 or 5 ice cubes in a large old-fashioned glass and fill 3/4 full with Clamato juice. (Clamato may be mixed 1/2 and 1/2 with any other favorite tomato or veggie juice). Add the vodka Worcestershire Tabasco and Horseradish and stir thoroughly with a spoon or swizzle. Twist the lime slice over the glass edge and stick a scallion in as a casual stirrer and delicious finish to the drink.

name: Dale's Bloody Mary
preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and roll back and forth to gently mix. Strain into a large goblet or pint glass over ice and serve.

name: Bloody Mary #3
preparation: Pour pepper vodka and V-8 juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Float a slice of jalapeno pepper on top and serve.

name: Snakebite #2
preparation: Very carefully layer the vodka on top of the green Chartreuse. Drop in the Tabasco which should sink to the bottom. Slam it.

name: Dirty Rollie Fingers
preparation: Add the vodka and pickle brine (preferably from a pickled egg jar) to a shot glass. Add Tabasco sauce and garnish with an optional slice of pickled jalapeno.

name: Olle Goop
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass and add a few drops of lime juice. Add schweppes russian to taste and serve.

name: Moscow Mule
preparation: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Mountain Stream
preparation: Shake everything (except 7-up) with ice; strain into cocktail glass. Fill with 7-up.

name: Water Your Melon
preparation: Pour the mountain dew into any kind of ordinary glass. Then add the watermelon schnapps and stir.

name: Polar Bear #3
preparation: Pour equal parts of vodka and lime juice into a glass with ice. Add the same combined amount in 7-up or sprite. Mix and serve with a straw.

name: Glacier Mint
preparation: Stir ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves and serve.

name: Elk Creek Water
preparation: Combine in a large container with lots of ice; serve into cups.

name: Limetini
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec and lime juice into a cocktail shaker with a couple of ice cubes. Shake well strain into a martini or cocktail glass and serve.

name: Zoot
preparation: Pour gin and 7-up over ice cubes in a glass and float the jack daniel's on top. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Water Moccasin
preparation: Added ice and ingredients in a shaker. Shake well until top becomes frosted. Then poor in a shooter glass. This will be best yet smoothes shot you'll ever taste.

name: Resaca Water
preparation: Place the vodka rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add pineapple and orange juice and shake. Pour over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry and serve.

name: Polish Professor
preparation: Pour vodka and pineapple juice into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add 7-up stir and serve.

name: Green Vodka
preparation: Mix and drink.

name: Generic Kamikaze
preparation: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice. Fill with sprite.

name: Corsican
preparation: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime. Serve with a straw.

name: Pixie Stick
preparation: Pour gin and midori over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a straw and serve.

name: Russian Seven
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Fill with 7-up garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Rose Water
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Sid's Special
preparation: Place cubes in glass add gin frozen lime juice concentrate and 7-up then stir and enjoy.

name: Mullens Mai Tai
preparation: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

name: Witch's Tit
preparation: Pour the Kahlua into a pousse cafe glass. Carefully float the cream on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon. Place a maraschino cherry in the center and serve.

name: Centenario
preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and fruit.

name: Cul-De-Sac
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Appled Rum Cooler
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum applejack and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: B-69 Flame
preparation: Pour kahlua float baileys and then dark rum. Ignite.

name: Trouble for Tina
preparation: Combine the rum dark creme de cacao white creme de cacao coffee (cooled to room temperature) and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Basic Bill
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mozart Cocktail
preparation: Combine the rum vermouth triple sec and orange bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve with a lemon twist.

name: Mutagen
preparation: Pour the dark rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Add cream to taste. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Dark Pike
preparation: Pour vodka into the milk. Add chocolate flavoring as desired and serve.

name: Landed Gentry
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cardinal
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: King Alphonse
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a pousse cafe glass. Carefully float the cream on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon and serve.

name: Golden Girl
preparation: SHake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with grated orange zest and serve.

name: Almeria
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Her Inner Secret
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass over crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Spark In The Night
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Third Rail
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Mostly Mal
preparation: Combine the rum vermouth triple sec and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass garnished with a cherry.

name: Heart Throb
preparation: Make pousse-cafe in a shot glass and serve.

name: Secret Blue
preparation: Shake ingredient vodka lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.

name: Caribbean Grid Lock
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Midnight Cowboy
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mozart Cocktail
preparation: Pour the anejo rum sweet vermouth triple sec and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Burnt Embers
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ritchie Ritchie
preparation: Pour the rum dark creme de cacao white creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink. Dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Delhis Devils
preparation: Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve on the rocks.

name: Margaret In The Marketplace
preparation: Combine the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Coffee Stick
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur Sambuca and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: White Sands
preparation: Shake and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry and serve.

name: Pain d'Epices
preparation: Chill a martini glass. Pour the rum Pedro Ximenez and Monin pain d'epices (gingerbread) syrup over ice in a mixing glass. By hand squeeze the juice from half an orange into the glass. Stir slowly and at length. Strain into a martini glass and serve.

name: Patats
preparation: Blend amaretto rum and curacao. Pour into a glass with ice add orange juice and splash with grenadine.

name: Horse And Jockey
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaica Hop
preparation: Pour Kahlua white creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dark Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

name: Tobago
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add a twist of lime and serve.

name: Battering Ram
preparation: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

name: Double Brit
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a double shot glass they will mix by themselves. Shoot.

name: Aqueduct
preparation: In a shaker half filled with ice shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Double Standard Sour
preparation: Pour the whiskey gin lemon juice sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Double Southern and Squirt
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Squirt and serve.

name: Double Gold
preparation: Keep goldschlager in freezer. Mix in jigger shot glass. Shot it down and enjoy.

name: Daily Double C
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Double Shot From Hell
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with some ice cubes. Shake and strain into double-shot glasses and serve.

name: Double Pucker
preparation: Pour each ounce in same shot glass. Slam or sip and enjoy.

name: Double Intention
preparation: Blend all the ingredients apart from the Grenadine. Pour that on top of the drink when its in the glass.

name: The Double Team
preparation: Pour the rum first then the Amaretto. Enjoy!

name: Double Muff Diver
preparation: Pour ingredients into highball glass top with ice and serve.

name: Double Fudge Martini #2
preparation: Shake the Absolut vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur espresso coffee and chocolate topping with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. In a fresh shaker shake cream and DeKuyper Buttershots (butterscotch liqueur) until thickened and float on top of the chocolate mix. Garnish with grated chocolate and chocoloate topping and serve.

name: Double Chocolate
preparation: Add both ingredients to shot glass (don't layer). Sprinkle cocoa on top (optional).

name: Moose Hummer
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Vodka Martini
preparation: Shake vodka and vermouth together with several ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Passion Beach
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an ice-filled highball glass and serve with fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

name: Beach Cruiser
preparation: Pour spiced rum pineapple juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Beach Bum's Cooler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice. Add a paper umbrella and serve.

name: Peppermint Beach
preparation: Mix with ice. Serve cold.

name: Green Whale
preparation: Place blue curacao vodka and sugar into a blender. Fill to desired level with pineapple juice and orange juice at a ratio of 1:2 - (ie. 1 oz pineapple 2 oz orange). Shake well and strain into collins glass(es).

name: Hawaiian Punch #2
preparation: Stir together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sunrise #2
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with 3 ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Blue Whale
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker. Strain into a tall glass and serve.

name: Gorilla Smile
preparation: Combine all in a blender with 8-12 oz of ice blend. Garnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

name: Jubilee on the Square
preparation: Pour the Bacardi white rum Malibu coconut rum Midori melon liqueur pineapple juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Wave Runner
preparation: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add sprite stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

name: Creative Native
preparation: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

name: Dr. Bacardi
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with a couple of ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Lipstick Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a small frosted hurricane glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Fuzzy Delight
preparation: Pour Arrow peach schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass. Add Bacardi white rum fill with Sunny Delight california style and serve.

name: Blue Bohemian
preparation: Shake ingredients garnish with an orange twist and a cherry and serve.

name: Blonde Ron
preparation: Just fill ice then pour rum 7up and slash of pineapple.

name: Chocolate Ravage
preparation: Add ice to a blender until roughly one-quarter to one-third full. Add one sheet worth of pop ice to the blender. Add the vodka Captain Morgan rums triple sec sugar and honey. Adjust sugar and honey to taste if desired. Add one tall yoo-hoo bottle to the blender. Blend until puree consistancy pour into cocktail glasses and serve.

name: Go-Go Girl
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum and mango nectar. Top off glass with pineapple juice. Stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Jelly Donut
preparation: Pour the Tropicana kiwi-strawberry juice the Bacardi white rum and the DeKuyper razzmatazz liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Float about 1/2 inch of half-and-half onto the mixture; done by slowly pouring the cream over the back of a spoon so that the cream stays separate from the rest of the drink. Serve.

name: Kermit
preparation: Add ice and shake. Top up with orange juice.

name: White Bat
preparation: Build all ingredients in a tall glass over ice. Stir add a straw and serve.

name: Blood
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a Champagne flute filled with crushed or shaven ice. Add more syrup if necessary to obtain a blood red complexion and serve.

name: Angry Chameleon
preparation: Dissolve kool-aid mixture in rum add mountain dew and serve.

name: Mango Daiquiri #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend for a short time at a high speed. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a cherry and straw. Serve.

name: Chocolate Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Dust with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Drinking Chocolate
preparation: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean (split lengthwise) very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. -- Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. -- For a richer chocolate use 4 oz of milk 4 oz of cream 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Holiday Hangover
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass. Garnish with a candy cane and serve.

name: Luftschlange
preparation: Shake all ingredients. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Trinidad
preparation: Build in a highball glass over ice garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Blind Bat
preparation: Pour the Coca-cola into a tall glass followed by the vodka. Add just a splash of Bacardi rum just for taste. Sit back and enjoy.

name: Red Dwarf
preparation: Mix rum lemon juice orange juice and peach schnapps together with plenty of ice in a shaker. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Add creme de cassis; allowing it to form a layer at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with cherries orange or lemon to taste and serve.

name: English Pirate
preparation: In a large (20 oz or larger) mug or mason jar pour in rum and fill to within 1 inch of top with sweetened iced tea. Add ice and enjoy. Lemon can be added to taste.

name: Mexican Riptide
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Red Headed Stepchild #2
preparation: Pour Bacardi into a collins glass filled with ice. Add Code red mountain dew and serve.

name: Purple Helmeted Warrior
preparation: Mix liquors together with the lime juice in a highball glass. Add 7-up (to taste) and grenadine.

name: Bacardi Vanilla Coke
preparation: Pour the Bacardi vanilla rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Coca-cola and serve.

name: Indian Summer Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
preparation: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Chocolate Beverage
preparation: Boil the milk in the top of a deep double boiler for five minutes. Remove from the fire and add chocolate mixed with the cinnamon a little at a time - beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended heat to the boiling point. Place it over the bottom of double boiler and add eggs whipping constantly until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

name: Banana Rocket
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 1 minute until thick and smooth consistency. Pour into a champagne flute garnish with a strawberry and a straw and serve.

name: Coke Safari
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pearl Diver
preparation: Mix all ingredients together shake and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Matti Nyknen
preparation: Shake the vodka lemon juice and sugar with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Virgin Raspberry Daiquiri
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with raspberries and serve.

name: Dizzy Fizzy Slammers
preparation: Fill half a shot glass with Bacardi rum. Add a squeeze of lemon juice. Top with Champagne and serve (to drink place hand over top slam on bar and down in one).

name: Franko Ra
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Perfect Kiss
preparation: Pour white rum and peachtree schnapps over crushed ice in a margarita glass. Top with sprite and gently place one half-strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

name: Whitney
preparation: Add ingredients chilled for better flavor. Avoid ice cubes to prevent watered down taste. Mix rum first (must be a white rum) add a dark type of wine (blush or red is fine) and finally a touch of lemon juice. Get ready to have fun!

name: Peach Daiquiri #2
preparation: Combine the peaches lime juice rum schnapps brandy vanilla and sugar in the blender until smooth. Slowly add the ice with the blender running and process until smooth. Serve in chilled cocktail glasses.

name: Hot Lemon
preparation: Pour juice and water into a heat-proof cup dissolve sugar and serve.

name: Albus Dumbledore
preparation: Rim cocktail glass with lemon juice and powdered sugar. Add vodka and lemon juice.

name: Pineapple Daiquiri
preparation: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Arch de Triumph
preparation: Pour the brandy lemon juice and sugar into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pisco Sour
preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixer with ice. Shake well (until ice is melted) and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Kahlua Sour
preparation: Mix kahlua and lemon juice in a cocktail glass. Add sugar and serve.

name: Frigid Hairy Virgin
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Frankenstein
preparation: Pour all ingrediants into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Banana Colada #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender except for the ice and blend. Then add ice until the drink begins to thicken then serve.

name: Hairy Bitch
preparation: Pour all ingredients over finely shaven ice in a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Geisha
preparation: Mix first two ingredients: fill with pineapple juice.

name: Machiavelli Pina Colada
preparation: Combine all ingredients togehter in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and empty contents into a pina-colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Green Thing
preparation: Shake well until it is a cream color and is frothing.

name: The Dangerous Dave
preparation: Combine Tequila Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a blender. A quick blast to blend ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until it's like a slurpy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

name: Pearl Harbour
preparation: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and maraschino cherry on a stick. Serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Waste of Time Cocktail
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: International Stinger
preparation: Shake well with ice and pour over ice cubes (on the rocks) in an old-fashioned glass.

name: International Bar Fly
preparation: Place a single ice cube into a champagne flute. Add liquors fill with champagne and serve.

name: International Cocktail
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice strain and serve.

name: International Jack
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Heat Wave
preparation: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a parfait glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with grenadine. Garnish with a fresh slice of peach and serve.

name: Caribbean Dream
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass. Stir add ice and serve.

name: Southern Bahama Mama
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a hurricane glass with ice and stir. Add a maraschino cherry and pineapple rings for garnish and serve.

name: Jamaican Bahama Mama
preparation: Pour the white rum juices and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass. Float spiced rum and grenadine on top and serve.

name: Blue Monkey
preparation: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

name: Caribbean Sunset #2
preparation: Pour vodka rum and both juices into a martini shaker with ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a collins glass over ice. Finish with a splash of grenadine for the sunset effect.

name: Dead Budgie
preparation: Pour the coconut rum banana liqueur orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine around the inside edge of the glass and serve.

name: Bora Bora
preparation: Prepare in a blender or shaker serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Shaker Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bahama Mama #4
preparation: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour with ice into a hurricane glass and serve with an orange slice.

name: Mexicana
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Texas Rose
preparation: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Goombay Smash Bahamas
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with crushed (or cubed) ice. Add ingredients and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry and serve. Frozen pineapple/orange concentrate made into juice can conveniently be used as a substitute for both juices combined.

name: Bulldog's Viagra
preparation: Add Bacardi Gold and Bacardi O to a glass with ice. Add triple sec and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine on top and garnish with a cherry.

name: Almond Grog
preparation: Boil some water and place a sugar cube in a coffee mug. Pour over the amaretto then add the hot water and stir until dissolved. Add milk to taste and serve.

name: Navy Seal
preparation: Serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Original Grog
preparation: Boil the water in a kettle (as you would if making coffee or tea). Place the sugar cube in the mug and pour the Calvados onto the sugar cube (so that it is absorbed into the sugar). Pour the boiling water directly onto the sugar cube filling the mug to the top. Stir until sugar is dissolved then drink when cool enough.

name: Henry Morgan's Grog
preparation: Shake all liquors and cream in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled old fashioned glass and sprinkle the nutmeg on top.

name: Grog #2
preparation: Pour beer vodka and orange juice in a pitcher. Stir well.

name: Rumage
preparation: Pour Bacardi Superior rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass. Add Malibu coconut rum and juices. Stir and serve.

name: Red Rum
preparation: Mix together rum and grenadine in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker shaker. Pour into a highball or collins glass over crushed ice and orange juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange or lime slice and serve.

name: Bacardi Orange
preparation: Add to an ice-filled collins glass. Serve with a slice of orange and straws.

name: Bacardi Gold & Cola
preparation: Fill a tall glass completely with ice cubes. Mix the ingredients into the glass and serve with a slice of lemon put on the glass. It is a very simple drink but never the less it is very delicious - especially in the summertime.

name: American Grog
preparation: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot water. Stir.

name: G-Spot Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with one fresh rasberry and serve.

name: Derby Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: National Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rum apricot brandy pineapple juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaican Crawler
preparation: Pour the white rum melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Float grenadine on top and serve.

name: Jamaican Ten Speed
preparation: Shake and strain over ice.

name: Louisville Cooler
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey orange juice lime juice and powdered sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and serve.

name: Palmetto
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Float myer's rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

name: Jamaican Bum
preparation: Pour the shots into a glass over ice fill with 7-up add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

name: Jamaican Rumshaker
preparation: Shake the Tia Maria and Malibu in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes top with Sprite and serve.

name: Marbella Sunset
preparation: Add the rum pineapple juice and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice and shake well. Slowly strain into a cocktail glass and add the strawberry liqueur (it will sink to the bottom giving pink and orange hues reminiscent of a Marbella sunset!).

name: YoYo Blow Out
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

name: Grizz Killer
preparation: Combine (except 151) over ice in a large rocks glass and float the 151 on top.

name: Ginananas
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Captain Courageous
preparation: Pour the Parrot Bay coconut rum into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add pineapple juice and stir. Float Myer's rum on top and serve.

name: Smooth Pineapple Daiquiri
preparation: Combine limeade and rum in a blender. Add pineapple and ice cream. Blend well. With the blender running add a few pieces of ice. Continue adding ice until the mixture is smooth and thick and the blender is nearly full. Serve in cocktail glasses.

name: Batida de Pina
preparation: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Frozen Coconut
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint add straws and serve.

name: Pineapple Puncher
preparation: Pour Bacardi onto pineapple slices and leave to chill until ready to serve then add your wine and juice and you're ready to go. It'd be best if all the ingredients were already chilled. And leave eating the pineapple to last it tends to ferment the alcohol. Enjoy!

name: Frozen Blue Daiquiri
preparation: Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Frozen Girl Scout
preparation: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

name: Frozen Barcelona
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender with three-quarters of a cup of crushed ice. Pour into a london dock or sherry glass garnish with a light dusting of cinnamon and serve.

name: Jimmy's Heaven
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add a can of Nestea peach iced tea. Stir and serve.

name: Jamaican Dust-Buster
preparation: Mix ingredients in a glass and serve.

name: Heaven on Earth
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Bon Bini
preparation: Pour the rum curacao and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Almost Heaven
preparation: Build in a collins glass over ice.

name: Pine Cone
preparation: Pour southern comfort on the rocks in a tall glass. Add amaretto fill with pineapple juice and stir.

name: Wahoo
preparation: Pour 151 proof rum and amaretto over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top off with pineapple juice (to taste) and serve.

name: Fooz Bizzy
preparation: Put the ingredients in a shot glass and enjoy!

name: Southern Kiss
preparation: Pour all ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Liquid Zanex
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: The Graduate
preparation: Shake over ice strain.

name: Cocaine Cocktail
preparation: All ingredients to a mixing glass with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Come to Me
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Liquid Electroshock
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine #5
preparation: Mix the alcohol in an 8-12oz glass. Cover and shake for about 3 seconds. Mix the juices together in a glass of your choice add ice for character and pour in alcohol. Serve chilled.

name: Liquid Caramel
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream Kahlua coffee liqueur and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake quickly and strain into a highball glass. Top with milk stir well and serve.

name: Liquid Leg Spreader
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Liquid Viagra
preparation: Pour red bull into a shot glass. Add a shot of jagermeister including the shot glass into the red bull. Shoot it down.

name: Liquid Crack
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Liquid Heroine
preparation: Mix rumple minze and jagermeister in an iced shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: Liquid Cocaine #4
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a shot glass. Shoot it all at once.

name: Bacardi Hawaiian Punch
preparation: Pour the Bacardi flavored rums into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and pineapple juice and shake well. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bacardi O Creamsicle
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Bacardi Volcano
preparation: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass then pour in cola and bacardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!

name: Bacardi Champagne Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients (except champagne and water) in a punch bowl cover and chill for 2 hours. Add champagne and water with a little ice. Add 5-10 frozen strawberries. Serve in wine glasses (30 servings).

name: Turkey Trot
preparation: Mix with a stirrer in a pitcher then pour over ice into glasses. A thanksgiving tradition for the truly disfunctional family.

name: Clay
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the peach schnapps and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime and serve.

name: The Head
preparation: Place ice in a glass upto the rim. Add alcohol followed by cranberry juice stir and serve.

name: Wild Wild West
preparation: Take ink pen and stir well!

name: Hairy Berry
preparation: Pour the jagermeister peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with 7-up and serve.

name: Peach Blaster
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Up Kiry
preparation: mix vodka and 7up in a highball glass add a splash of cranberry juice

name: Boozy Maria
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Airhead
preparation: Pour peach Schnapps into shot glass. Add chilled cranberry juice to fill.

name: Sailor's Delight
preparation: Stir together. Serve.

name: Matt's Tropical Punch
preparation: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.

name: Three Wise Men #3
preparation: Pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingredient into a shot glass and drink.

name: Little Green Men
preparation: Start by pouring the 1/2 oz. of gin into your glass. Then add the Jagermeister. Fill the rest of the glass up with standard Blueberry Cocktail mix (as a side note: the Blueberry Cocktail mix is non-alcoholic so it can be found at your local grocery store if your place of liquor purchasing does not have any in stock). Watch as the drink turns an odd green! Toss in a cherry to simulate the red planet. Serve.

name: Duck Fart #2
preparation: Layer ingredients in order as listed above.

name: Three Bees a Buzzing
preparation: Pour Barenjager honey liqueur into a shot glass. Carefully layer the Bailey's irish cream on top. Do the same with the Bacardi 151 and serve.

name: Three Miller Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wooden Floor
preparation: Pour each into shot glass carefully. Drink quickly.

name: Three Day Weekend
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with plenty of ice. Add Jgermeister and rum first. Top off with pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well.

name: Three Planets
preparation: Place first three ingredients neat in an old-fashioned glass. Gently spoon 1 teaspoon of 151 on top of the liquid in the glass and set fire to it preferably with a match (the fumes from a butane lighter will spoil the aroma). Let it burn for about 5-10 seconds and then snuff the flames (a bar coaster works nicely for this). Take the first sip immediately to the get the full effect of the residual half-burned rum fumes; don't burn your lip on the glass. Enjoy.

name: Brain Hammer

Fill a spoon with 151 light the alcohol then carefully drip the burning rum down a long knife so that it lights the rum in the glass. While burning drink entire beverage through a straw without stopping.

You will feel a suction to the hand pop your hand off take the shot and immediately cover the glass again so no oxygen escapes. Make a slight hole in between your index and thumb and inhale as much as u can and hold it. That is the Nitrous Oxide!

Slide straw between fingers keeping seal as tight as possible. Drink beverage through straw. Remove straw after drink is finished. Put glass to nose and remove hand to allow burnt fumes to be inhaled through nose. Definitely a one-a-nighter.

preparation: Combine all bourbons and rye whiskies into a shot glass and serve.

name: Southern Chase
preparation: Mix together and drink.

preparation: Mix together in a tall glass and serve.

preparation: Pour tequila and triple sec into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with squirt garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

preparation: Mix all 3 ingredients into cup until concoction is a brownish/red color and serve.

preparation: Pour the blue curacao peach schynapps and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the Sierra Mist and Squirt (both chilled) stir lightly and serve.

preparation: Pour all ingredients into a frosted collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Nixon
preparation: Add ice to common plastic cup. Fill cup approximatly halfway with the MacMasters. Fill remaining cup with half Squirt and half Mountain Lightning. Serve with straw.

name: Margarita's Cadillac Delight
preparation: Pour jose cuervo tequila and triple sec into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Fill with squirt garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Sharp Hill Sunrise

name: Truck Punch
preparation: Give yourself a break use ice.

name: Black Blood
preparation: Pour the blue curacao jagermeister and Squirt into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Paint Can
preparation: Go to your local paint store and purchase a brand new paint can. Fill the paint can completely with ice. Add the vodka the frozen limeade & the frozen lemonade (do not mix these with water). Finish filling the paint can with Squirt. Place the lid on the paint can very tightly. Wrap a towel around the paint can and shake the can vigorously. Keep shaking the paint can until the towel sticks to it (caused by frost). Open the can and pass it around. You drink it directly out of the paint can...

name: Love Juice

name: Shirley Temple
preparation: Build in a highball glass. Add ginger ale over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Shirley Temple #2
preparation: Combine all of these ingredients into a cocktail shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Pour into an iced tulip glass and garnish with a slice of orange speared through a cocktail sword with a maraschino cherry. Add a coloured straw.

name: Creamsicle #5

name: Eroticolada
preparation: Blend ingredients with crushed ice pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Irish Coffee - Isle Style
preparation: Whip cream lightly just until thickened and set aside. It should still pour but but light enough to float on the coffee. Ideally the cream layer will stay separate but will come off with the coffee as it is drunk. Note that no sweetners or flavors are added to the cream. (If preparing multiple servings you might want to complete one and taste for sugar/whiskey balance before proceeding with the remainder.) Place 1 tablespoon sugar in each pre-warmed mug then fill with coffee to about one inch from the top. Stir to dissolve sugar. Amount of sugar may need to be adjusted depending on taste mug size and type of coffee. One mug at a time: add Jameson's with a quick stir then immediately cover with approx. 1/2 inch of the prepared cream. The idea is to seal in the whiskey before the flavors (and alcohol!) can begin to evaporate. Pouring the cream over a spoon held just above the coffee will help keep the cream and coffee from mixing. For larger mugs 1 1/2 oz. of Jameson's may be needed. Great alone anytime or served with shortbread cookies as a dessert.

name: Malibu Smash
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins glass with ice mix and serve.

name: Uncle Ron's Goombay Smash
preparation: Get a 5 gallon water keg (you can buy one at a retail store). Fill it up 3/4 with ice. Add all liquids. Stir well (with arm for flavor) and serve up.

name: Odin's Juice
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's coconut rum and spiced rum into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice. Add the grenadine and equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Stir gently and serve.

name: Eggnog - Kentucky Style
preparation: Separate eggs. Beat yolks add sugar. Add bourbon slowly while beating. Beat egg whites until stiff. Fold whites into egg yolk mixture then fold whipped cream into mixture. Refrigerate for more than 4 days. Stir frequently to avoid separation. Color will change to a pale Serve w/nutmeg or cinnamon.

name: Aruba Smash
preparation: Pour rum 7-Up lemon juice orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Orange Push-Up

name: Hula Bob
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a tall glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Micheal's Downfall
preparation: Pour the rum and grenadine into a glass over 4 ice cubes. Fill with equal parts orange and cranberry juice.

name: Whiskey Smash
preparation: Muddle the lemon mint water and simply syrup in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add bourbon shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Egg Nog - Country Style
preparation: Mix eggs and sugar together until well blended. SLOWLY add brandy. (If added too fast eggs will break) Add whole milk. Add 1/2 of the heavy cream. In a seperate bowl whip the other 1/2 of the heavy cream until stiff. (soft peak stage will work as well) Fold whipped cream into mixture. Chill and enjoy!

name: Fijian Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Focal Point
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur light rum lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Ogden Style
preparation: About 2-3 cubes of ice mix 3 oz. of Gin 3 oz. of Orange Juice and 2 oz. of Bacardi 151. Mix like Gin N Juice topped off with 151. Does not matter the order then stir. Put it on ice for colder and better taste of alcohol.

name: Listerine Shot
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a shot glass.

name: Rum Sour
preparation: Combine the rum lemon juice and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Fox Trot
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hawaiian Cool
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Radler
preparation: Pour beer into a large mug. Slowly add 7-up or sprite and serve.

name: Turbo Shandy
preparation: Pour half a pint of a strong lager (ie. Stella Artois) into a pint glass. Fill with Smirnoff Ice and serve.

name: Black & Tan
preparation: Fill stien half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

name: Grand Gold Margarita
preparation: Pour the the margarita mix tequila cointreau grand marnier and beer into a blender. For frozen margaritas fill the blender with ice cubes and blend until the ice is crushed. (For margaritas on the rocks use less ice and blend until the ingredients are thoroughly mixed.) The beer will create a frothy texture for the margarita. Dip the rim of the margarita glass in lime juice and then salt the rim with margarita salt.

name: Picon Biere
preparation: Mix amer picon and beer in a pilsner.

name: Oil Spill #2
preparation: Mix whiskey and Jagermeister in a shot glass and then drop into a half glass of beer. Drink the entire mixture before it mixes and try to take it easy afterwards.

name: Boilermaker
preparation: Fill shot glass with whiskey. Drop full shot glass into mug o' beer. Drink immediately enjoy.

name: Diesel
preparation: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness. Drink several of these and watch the room spin around! N.B. Only the cheapest lager and cider from the students union bar should be used.

name: Egg Nog Captain Morgan
preparation: Pour rum into a small highball glass and add egg nog. Stir together top with nutmeg and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper
preparation: Pour beer into a pint glass and add coke. Seperately add amaretto to a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink immediately.

name: Green Weenie
preparation: Take a swig of corona then fill the bottle the rest of the way with margarita mix.

name: Pink Panty Dropper
preparation: First add all 18 cans of beer to a large container. Add bottles of Everclear and tequila and last but not least add the pink lemonade. Place lemon slices in the mixture for extra flavor. Let sit for a few hours then serve.

name: Blue Kool-Aid Punch
preparation: Make a liter of kool-aid mixture as standard. Add the raspberry vodka and raspberry sour puss and stir. Pour into tall ice-filled glasses and serve.

name: Snake Bite
preparation: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over. *Can substitute sweet cider for the dry.

name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper
preparation: 1. Pour amaretto kahlua and root beer schnapps into a shot glass. Float rum on top. 2. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire drop into a beer mug and slam as fast as you can.

name: Sake Bomb #2
preparation: Pour beer into a beer mug then put chopsticks over the top of the mug. Balance the shot of sake on the chopsticks over the beer. When everyone is ready hit the table which separates the chopsticks and drops the shot into the beer. Then chug.

name: Guinness Float
preparation: Put the ice cream in first then add the Guinness carefully. Wait for the head to go down then fill to top. Blend if you want a milkshake.

name: Sake Bomb
preparation: It's real easy. Drop the shot of Sake into a glass of beer and the just slam it.

name: Bootneck
preparation: In a pint tankard mug pour a large double shot of Pussers Rum. Top up by pouring Kronenberg 1664 Lager slowly down the side of tankard until full and serve.

name: Black Velvet
preparation: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Add champagne carefully so it does not mix with stout and serve.

name: Beer and Clamato
preparation: Preferably use a regular beer (blonde) or a light beer. Pour clamato into the glass (3-4 oz for a 12 oz beer) and top with beer. Very pleasant in hot weather or when you want to cut down on alcohol.

name: Deer Hunter
preparation: Add ice to a collins glass. Pour Jagermeister and vodka over the ice (Jagermeister should be chilled of course). Add root beer to fill glass/to taste and then finish it off with a squeeze of a lemon-quarter and serve.

name: Michelada
preparation: Mix ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer mix and serve.

name: Desperado
preparation: Half fill a pint glass with beer. Add the tequila then top off with limeade and serve.

name: Hector Bomb
preparation: Fill a glass with half a bottle of Corona. Pour a shot of tequila. Squeeze a lime wedge into the shot glass and place lime wedge into shot. When you are ready to drink drop the shot into the glass of Corona and chug fast.

name: Tucker Death Mix
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a jug and serve into highball glasses.

name: Half and Half
preparation: Fill 1/2 a pint glass with harp. Slowly fill the remainder of the glass with guinness pouring it slowly over the back side of a spoon as to layer it nicely on top.

name: Dr. Pepper #5
preparation: Mix the Amaretto & Bacardi in one shot glass. Fill the beer mug 1/2 way with beer. Light the Bacardi & Amaretto with a match or lighter. Drop the flaming shot glass into the beer. It immediately begins to foam up. At this point gulp it down (be careful not to swallow the shot glass!).

name: Acid Bomb
preparation: 1. Crack open the bottle of Corona Extra and drop the lemon slice inside. 2. Serve a double-shot of Bacardi Limon with the rim of the shot glass layered with margarita salt. 3. Take the double-shot (holding the double shot in your mouth) and fill the rest of your mouth (with the double shot still inside) with Corona Extra. 4. Have a friend (with the mix of Bacardi and Corona in your mouth) shake your head for a solid 3 seconds on the count of 3 down the mix in one swallow.

name: Snake Bite Black
preparation: Pour 1/2 pint Lager and 1/2 pint Cider into a Pilsner glass then add Black Currant until drink is purple in color.

name: Snakebite And Black
preparation: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the lager and cider one after another.

name: Euthanasia
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a beer mug with/without ice and serve.

name: Belfast Carbomb
preparation: Pour Kahlua coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Top with Bailey's irish cream and Jameson whiskey. Drop the shot glass into a half-pint of Guinness and consume immediately.

name: Stiff Pounder
preparation: Take a 12 oz bottle of beer and drink the neck of the bottle. Pour 1 or more shots of Jgermeister into the neck. Swish it around a little bit and presto instant drunk.

name: Limona Corona
preparation: Open the corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up unplug and drink.

name: Red Draw
preparation: Fill a beer mug with beer top off with a shot or two worth of tomato juice. (Miller light and clamato picante go well.)

name: Root Beer Barrel
preparation: 1. Place a shot glass filled with root beer schnapps into a tumbler three-quarters filled with beer. (Beer should be just short of shot glass rim.) 2. Place hand over top of drink and slam on the bar. Serve immediately.

name: Carbomb
preparation: Combine (proportions of 50/50) Bailey's Irish Cream and Irish Whiskey into one shot glass. Drop the shot into a mug of guinness and chugg until empty.

name: XYZ Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Greek Buck
preparation: Shake brandy and lemon juice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale and float ouzo.

name: New Orleans Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes fill with soda and serve.

name: Chilcano de Pisco
preparation: Pour the Peruvian Pisco into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a spoonful of lemon juice then fill with ginger ale. Serve.

name: New Orleans Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: New York Hot Chocolate
preparation: Brew a pot of strong black coffee. Add the coffee to a warmed coffee mug and add the Vandermint. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and top that with dark chocolate shavings. Serve.

name: Beady Little Eyes
preparation: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except ginger ale. Shake and pour back into glass. Add ginger ale and stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: New Orleans Sazerac
preparation: Place a sugar cube into an old-fashioned glass and saturate with angostura bitters. Add ice cubes pour in liquors and add a twist of lemon peel. Fill with water stir well and serve.

name: New Orleans Salty Dog
preparation: Coat the rim of a highball glass with salt. Mix vodka and grapefruit juice in another glass with ice and pour into glass with salted rim.

name: Brandy Buck
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass adding the spent shell of the lemon quarter.

name: Ginger Rum
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: New York Sour
preparation: Shake blended whiskey juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret red wine on top and serve with a half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: New York Peppermint Patty Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Bacardi Buck
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the spent shell of the lemon quarter.

name: Fast Buck
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemon-quarter shell and serve.

name: New York Motherfucker
preparation: Pour the vodka rum gin and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with cream as desired and serve.

name: Italian Valium
preparation: Mix thoroughly.

name: Blue Marlin
preparation: To ensure outstanding taste measure the ingredients exactly. Pour the ingredients into a shaker in the order that they are listed. Shake thoroughly and pour over ice. To garnish throw a cherry on top of the ice and place an orange slice on the side of the glass.

name: Absinthe Minded Martini
preparation: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice pour gin and absinthe and stir. In your cocktail glass roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Gin Bucket
preparation: For the full effect you should use a large folgers coffee can or a metal bucket. First fill the can half full with ice and add the gin(the whole bottle). Next add the concentrates and cherries. Finally shake the can until it's ready to drink.

name: Breakfast Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a piece of a slice of toast.

name: Duck Fuck
preparation: Find a large shot glass. Fill 80% of the way with Tanqueray Gin. Fill another 15% with Stoli or Absolut Vodka. Fill to the rim with cheap Ice beer (best results w/Busch Ice).

name: Sexy Bitch
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins or tall glass and serve.

name: Rat Fuck
preparation: Add the kool-aid mix to a punch bowl and add one cup of sugar. Add vodka coconut rum spiced rum and gin. Fill remainder of punch bowl with water and stir. Add more sugar if desired and serve into mugs punch cups or old-fashioned glasses.

name: Magic Sam
preparation: In a rock glass 11 3/4 oz. fill with ice. Squirt in a dash of banana and strawberry syrub in any order. (slightly more strawberry in order to give the drink an almost cosmopolitan fuxia colour after shaken later) Pour in approximately less than 1/3 of the glass with vodka of any brand. Next add approximately less than 1/4 of the glass with tanqueray gin. 1/5 of cointreau next and 1/6 0f peachtree (peach shnapps) and the alcoholic content is complete. The remaining space to almost fill the rim involves equal splashes of Orange juice Pineaple juice and melon juice. Shake all with a shaker and then reverse back the whole shaken stuff back into the rock glass. A sliced kiwi tucked over the rim and two tall straws and damn...thats a hell of a MAGIC SAM!!!!!

name: Pink Gin
preparation: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

name: James' Jungle Juice
preparation: Pour Larios gin over 4 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Add Malibu rum and top with fruits of the forest juice. Add creme de cassis on top insert straw and serve.

name: Vampire's Kiss
preparation: Shake with ice strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Crazy Moose
preparation: Pour Canadian Club whisky into shot glasses and top with Maple Syrup. For added flavour stir with a cinammon stick.

name: Bobby's Way
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Scorpion's Tail
preparation: Mix over ice shake and serve.

name: Ass
preparation: Almost-fill a shot glass with Absolut vodka. Top off with a splash of DeKuyper's sour apple pucker and serve.

name: Apple Fucker
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka and DeKuyper Apple Pucker into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Gummy Bear Shooter
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a double shot glass and serve.

name: Merry Christmas
preparation: Pour all ingredients (chilled beforehand) into a large container or punch bowl preferably on top of another similar container filled with ice. Allow to chill. Serve in punch cups or tall glasses.

name: Sex On An Arizona Beach
preparation: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

name: Tropical Orgasm
preparation: Start with 3/4 of a pitcher with pink lemonade. Then add the vodka. Mix till you can barely taste the vodka then add the strawberry daiquiri mix then a splash of rum. (Just a bit do not add too much) Stir and then chill.

name: Red Drink
preparation: Thaw strawberries. Add to a blender with bananas rum and banana liqueur. Top with ice. Blend until smooth and pour into hurricane glasses.

name: Frozen Strawberry Banana Colada
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a glass garnish with a fresh strawberry and serve.

name: Hummingbird #2
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Hilty Dilty
preparation: Shake ingredients together with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Crimson Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Lime Lizard
preparation: Pour vodka into a shot glass and mix in the other ingredients. Count to three and drink.

name: Pomola
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Devil's Sweat
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing tin. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned rocks or lowball glass and serve.

name: Pink n' Tart
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass or stir well in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice.

name: Juniata Juice
preparation: Add the rum to the beer and stir in frozen lime juice concentrate.

name: Voodoo Tea
preparation: Pour rum and curacao into a highball glass. Fill with sweetened tea until black and serve.

name: Vanilla Ale
preparation: Pour the ginger ale and vanilla drops over crushed ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ocean Water
preparation: Pour it all into a glass and stir. The blue curacao is mainly for color so not much is needed and if you want it to be more alcoholic add a bit more of the rum and then some vodka or white rum.

name: Ale Flip
preparation: Heat the lemon juice with 2 ounces of ale the ginger and the sugar in a saucepan over moderate heat until the sugar has dissolved. Beat the egg yolk into the brandy in a bowl. Beat the lemon juice mixture from the saucepan into the bowl with the egg and beat together. Transfer to a beer mug. Add the rest of the ale stir well and serve.

name: Campari and Ale
preparation: Place several ice cubes into a 12 oz highball glass or equivalent. Gently pour in the Campari bitters until one-quarter full. Add the ginger ale until three-quarters full pouring across the side of the glass so as to not affect the Campari on the bottom.

name: Flaming Ale
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice pour in vodka midori and triple-sec. Fill to top with ginger ale and spoon in (do not mix) grenadine.

name: Flaming Ferrari
preparation: Pour the rums into an old-fashioned glass. Seperately pour the blue curacao into a double-shot glass. Ignite the rum mixture (use extreme caution) and suck with a straw; at the same time pour the blue curacao into the glass and finish.

name: Blue Dong
preparation: Mix Cointreau and blue curacao liqueur together in a highball glass and fill up with Sprite soda.

name: Evil Blue Thing
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Jetstream
preparation: Shake the spirits with crushed ice in a shaker and pour in the cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

name: Captain's Hook
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cracked Chandelier
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of both lemon and lime and serve.

name: Vodka Pina Colada
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker and swirl until sugar is dissolved. Sweeten further if needed. Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and strain into a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Pina Colada Royal
preparation: Place the rums crushed pineapple and ice cream in a blender with 1 1/2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until frozen; add more ice if required. Pour into a parfait glass and serve.

name: Pina Colada #4
preparation: Add all of the above ingredients to a blender with plenty of crushed ice and blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish as desired and serve.

name: Malaysian Pina Colada
preparation: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Pour into a pina-colada glass and serve with a straw.

name: Dressed Up Pina Colada
preparation: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum coconut milk and pineapple with 2 cups of crushed ice on high for a few seconds until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Pina Colada Jello Shots
preparation: Add the gelatin/jello to the hot juice and stir until dissolved. Add the rum. Pour into (non-glass) shot glasses or 1-oz portion cups and chill as directed.

name: Puerto Rican Pina Colada
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender. Blend until desired consistancy pour into a Champagne Tulip and serve.

name: Hawaii Mai Tai
preparation: Mix all ingredients together serve chilled. This is the best Mai Tai ever. Authentic recipe from Hawaii. This recipe makes one gallon.

name: Bermuda Mai Tai
preparation: Fill a martini shaker about half full with ice cubes. Pour about a shot of tequila triple sec peach schnapps and light rum. Fill with a roughly equal amount of pineapple juice (to taste) and shake well. Pour into a large glass with crushed ice. Top off with dark rum and stir a little. Garnish and serve.

name: Mai Tai #6
preparation: Pour the rums orgeat and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Mai Tai Mai
preparation: Pour the spiced rum apricot liqueur pineapple juice and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add the soda stir gently and serve.

name: Leamos' Mai Tai
