preparation: Place light rum and triple sec in hurricane glass. Add ice and pour over the orange pineapple and lime juice. Add the grenadine. Then float the dark rum on top and serve.

name: Mai Tai #3
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass with a few ice cubes and serve.

name: Mai Tai #4
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and strain into a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mai Tai Swizzle
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Add the spent lime shell and swizzle briefly. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and mint sprigs.

name: Mai Tai #5
preparation: Combine all ingredients (sugar to taste) in a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Peach Delight
preparation: Pit the peaches and cut into quarters. Add to a blender with the Absolut peach vodka and the sugar. Blend well and serve in appropriate glass or cup.

name: Peach Daiquiri
preparation: Combine peach lime juice sugar and rum in a blender; puree until smooth. Almost fill a large wine glass with crushed ice. Pour peach mixture over garnish with a mint sprig and serve immediately.

name: Nice Melons
preparation: Combine the light rum watermelon pieces lime juice and peach in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well and pour into a hurricane glass. Add a straw and serve.

name: Southern Peach
preparation: Add all with ice shack and strain.

name: Classic Peach Daiquiri
preparation: Combine in blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a large cocktail glass. Optional: add 1/4 canned peach with juice.

name: Peach Nehi
preparation: Shake and strain over ice in a double-shot glass.

name: Peach Brandy Julep
preparation: Strip the leaves from one sprig of mint and muddle them together with the peach liqueur and wedges. Add cognac (or bourbon) and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice and stir until the outside of the glass frosts. Add more crushed ice if needed. Garnish with a second mint sprig and serve.

name: Cherry Comfort
preparation: Pour about 4 oz of your favorite cherry cola into a cup. Add about 1 shot (1 oz) of southern comfort 100 proof. Add ice if desired.

name: Cherry Spritzer
preparation: Pour the cherry juice into the old-fashioned glass filled previously with 3 to 5 ice cubes and add the mineral water. Stir before you serve. You can mix the juice and the mineral water in the fifty-fifty percent relation too but it is faster energy-delivering and even healthier this way.

name: Cherry Pucker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of both lime and lemon and serve.

name: Exploding Cherry
preparation: Pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

name: Sicilian Kiss
preparation: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar.

name: Southern Pride
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass then put in the Peach Schnapps.

name: Southern Blues
preparation: Add ingredients to a small shaker w/ice. Stir strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Evie's Jello Shot Delight
preparation: 1. Stir the boiling water with the jell-o mix in a medium sized bowl until completely dissolved (orange flavor is the best but can be used with any other flavor as well). Let it sit and wait until it is at room temperature. 2. Stir in Southern Comfort peach liqueur (it replaces the additional cold water usually used). 3. When ready pour the liquid into shot glasses or ice cube trays to make little shooters (transfer liquid from medium size bowl into a measuring cup for easier pouring into shot glasses or ice cube trays). 4. Refrigerate 4 hours until firm or overnight just in case.

name: Pop My Cherry
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Blood Clot
preparation: Drop shot glass of s.c. into lowball glass mixed with 7-UP and grenadine. Slam it!!!

name: Green Apple
preparation: Mix all three ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Pineapple Bomb
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Add a splash of 7-up or sprite if desired. Shake until condensated and strain into shot glasses.

name: Watermelon
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Southern Bondage
preparation: Pour ingredients into mixing/cheater tin over ice shake and pour.

name: Mortini
preparation: Pour grenadine and amaretto into a chilled cocktail glass. Add chilled vodka.

name: Purple Jesus #2
preparation: Pour Southern Comfort and blackberry brandy into a shot glass. Add a few drops of peppermint schnapps on top and serve.

name: Doucet Devil
preparation: Put amaretto first then the southern comfort and top this with the creme de banane.

name: ATP
preparation: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass then add the amaretto. Stir.

name: Sammy Slammer
preparation: Combine and drink.

name: Astropop
preparation: Layer all three liqours into shot glass.

name: Alice in Wonderland
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in equal parts in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Red Lobster
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Southern Smile
preparation: Fill jigger with ice. Add all ingredients. Cover shake and pour into shot glasses.

name: Alabama Slammer #3
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Flaming Hurley
preparation: Add one shot of southern comfort and a splash of dr. pepper in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Will Willy Wander
preparation: In a shaker add southern comfort rock and rye creme de fraise amaretto and sour mix. Fill with orange juice. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Wild Cherry
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Kool-Aid (Boulder Style)
preparation: Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.

name: Cherry Blossom
preparation: Add ingredients to a lowball glass and stir vigourously. When ingredients are mixed shoot back.

name: Par 4
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: 57 Chevy #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Watermelon Shooter
preparation: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain and pour into a glass.

name: Shrewsbury Slammer
preparation: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin then strain into a shot glass.

name: Lunchbox
preparation: First pour the orange juice into a highball glass. Add the beer. Take a shot glass pour the amaretto in then southern comfort. Drop the shot glass into the highball glass then chug.

name: 2MC's
preparation: Pour both the Southern Comfort and Tequila Rose into a shot glass in equal parts and shoot.

name: Country Apple
preparation: Combine and chill all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Cherry Gimlet
preparation: Garnish a cocktail glass with 1 to 2 marashino cherries and a few ice cubes. Shake all ingredients with ice to chill and then strain into the glass and serve.

name: Big Easy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Nagle
preparation: Pour Southern Comfort and Goldshlager in equal parts into a shot glass. Add a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Southern Fruity Passion
preparation: Add first the Southern Comfort. Then add the Triple Sec. Finish the shot with some Grenadine. Tip your head back and enjoy this smoothest shot in the south.

name: Jone's Town
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice and shake until ice cold. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: April's Violet
preparation: Pour the gin blue curacao and grenadine into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: An Orgy of Liquors
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an extremely large container or bucket. Mix together and serve at your nearest party.

name: Damn Yankee
preparation: Add Hot Damn to a shot glass. Layer cream on top then add a splash of blue curacao on top to give the red white and blue appearance.

name: 3 Fingers of Ron Burgundy
preparation: Stir ingredients with/without ice in a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Fall of Rome
preparation: Pour vermouth and brandy into a glass add lime and fill with orange juice. Stir add a splash of brandy on top and serve with a straw.

name: Shake That Ass
preparation: Build in a shot glass.

name: Dark Lagoon
preparation: Pour the blue curacao and grenadine into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple-flavored wine to taste and stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: American Flag
preparation: When properly prepared this shot will look red white and blue. First poor in 1/3 grenadine. Then the White Cream de cacao should be poured in over a bar spoon. Finally the Blue curacao can be poured in the same way.

name: Flaming Moz
preparation: 1. Place a short rocks (wide mouthed spirit) glass on the bar. 2. Pour the blue curacao white sambuca and chartreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally balancing on the mouth of the short rock. 3. Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon and rotate (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture into the short rock while alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. 4. Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. 5. Be sure the flames are out. Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink and hold on to the bar.

name: Undertow
preparation: Pour schnapps then curacao into the glass. Do not mix.

name: Duke of Marlboro
preparation: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Hologram
preparation: Place ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: L.A.P.D. Nightshift
preparation: Layer into a shot glass.

name: Out of Africa
preparation: Blend with crushed ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cocktail cherry and serve.

name: Barney on Acid
preparation: Shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Smurf Fart
preparation: In a shaker glass fill with ice add all ingredients shake and pour into a shot glass.

name: Mexican Cherry Bomb
preparation: Layer grenadine then Kahlua then the cream. Shoot.

name: Blood of Christ
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Prince of Norway
preparation: Pour vodka brandy and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sprite garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Blue Thrill
preparation: Fill one shot glass with the Blue Curacao. Fill another shot glass with the lemon juice and serve. To drink first put lemon shot in mouth then put curacao shot in mouth swish around then swallow. Remember yellow before blue!!

name: Mahwah Iced Tea
preparation: Add the whiskey and southern comfort to a highball glass. Fill with iced tea and drop in a couple of ice cubes.

name: Grape Rocket
preparation: Mix ingredients in a large old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Gravedigger
preparation: Fill a shot glass half and half with bacardi 151 and jim beam whiskey in any order you want.

name: Zombie #4
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except the high-proof rum) over ice the pineapple stick and the sugar. Strain and add ice. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry. Float the high-proof rum on top and sprinkle a little sugar over it.

name: Gorilla Fart #3
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Zombie #5
preparation: Strain ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Top with 151 Proof Rum.

name: Zombie #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top add a cherry (if desired) and serve.

name: Acapulco Zombie
preparation: Pour the alcohol in first then finish off the glass with the two juices. Also remember just a little Creme de Menthe not too much!

name: Original Mulekicker
preparation: Add the ice to a 32-oz mason jar. Add liquors and then pineapple juice. Top to the neck with orange juice. Add grenadine garnish with an orange slice and cherries and serve.

name: Orang-A-Tang
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec orange juice sour mix and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large brandy snifter half-filled with ice. Float the Bacardi 151 on top garnish with tropical fruit and serve.

name: Original Terminator
preparation: Half-fill a chilled shot glass with rumple minze and top with black sambuca.

name: Original Sin
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except champagne and fruit) over six crushed ice cubes in a brandy snifter or goblet. Stir contents and add slices of fruit (orange lemon and lime). Top with champagne and serve.

name: Original Singapore Sling
preparation: Combine the gin cherry brandy and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Drop the benedictine and brandy into the centre of the drink and serve.

name: The Original Singapore Sling
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin benedictine and cherry brandy. Stir well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda and stir again.

name: Original Old Fashioned
preparation: Pour the sugar bitters and water into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well until dissolved. Pour over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass and stir in the bourbon whiskey. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: The Original Margarita
preparation: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass and garnish with a lime or lemon slice.

name: Barking Spider
preparation: Serve over ice in a collins glass or blend for a frozen version of this drink.

name: Original Margarita
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass garnish with a lime or lemon slice and serve.

name: Passion Chi-Chi
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer and pour into an ice-filled glass. Good for warm days.

name: Royal Passion
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Finnish Passion
preparation: Shake all ingredients pour into a longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

name: Purple Passion #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Adjust amounts if needed until drink is a purple color and serve.

name: Crimson Passion
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Cuban Lemur
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 rum over ice in a highball glass. Add an equal amount of coca-cola. Squeeze in 2 lime slices and serve.

name: Beach Cooler
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Martha Stewart
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum and Wild Turkey 101 bourbon whiskey into a shot glass. Stir and float grenadine on top. Shoot immediately.

name: Velvet Tongue
preparation: Pour southern comfort and canadian club whisky over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #7
preparation: Pour the grenadine into a shot glass then carefully pour the Bacardi 151 on top; the two should not mix. Light it on fire blow out the flames and shoot.

name: Southern Special
preparation: Combine and mix ingredients over plenty of ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Snow Cap Columbian Monk
preparation: Pour 2 1/2 oz. frangelico into a tall glass and fill with strong coffee. Top with a scoop of ice-cream.

name: Rootbeer Piss
preparation: Fill an iced beer mug halfway with ice cubes. Add Bacardi 151 then Aftershock followed by an entire can of Mug root beer (or until mug is full). Stir briskly with a spoon and serve.

name: On the Rag
preparation: Pour a shot of gin into a brandy snifter. Add the grenadine and ginger ale and serve.

name: Jugtown Classic
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a cup. Add the ginger ale and raspberry soda. Stir and serve.

name: The Jaw
preparation: Mix them all together in a tall glass and serve.

name: Mamie Taylor
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Columbian Nose Bleed
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a tumbler and shake. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Flaming Rasta
preparation: Take a tall shot glass a straw and a lighter. When the drink is poured make sure your 151 is on top. Take your straw and lick it so it is wet. Light the drink (run the lighter over top) put your straw in and drink it fast.

name: Roy Rogers
preparation: Pour the ginger ale lemon-lime soda and grenadine into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Ba-dew-si
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Battery Skydiver
preparation: Mix all ingredients together with an ice cube or two shaking vigorously and pour into a highball glass over 3 - 5 ice cubes. Serve.

name: Red Rooster
preparation: Build drink in a collins glass.

name: Hemingway Hammer
preparation: Combine all ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a cocktail shaker or blender for 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass and serve with a lime wedge.

name: Flamingo Punch
preparation: Build into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon wheel.

name: Hop Toad
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cuba Libre Espana
preparation: Squeeze lime juice directly into a collins glass and add shell. Fill with ice and pour in the sherry rums and cola. Serve with straws.

name: Daiquiri Liqueur
preparation: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the limes (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups of the rum. Close the jar. Store in a cool dark place for 2 days or until rum has absorbed the flavor. Remove the peel and add the sugar. Shake vigorously until the sugar dissolves and add remaining cup of rum. Close jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age

name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cuba Gooding Jr.
preparation: Combine Bacardi Limon and lime juice in a highball glass over ice. Add Coca-cola to taste and stir for 5 seconds. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Bourbonime
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the juice of the lime and fill with coke. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Habana Libre
preparation: Squeeze a lime wedge in a collins glass and drop into the glass. Add grenadine and rums fill with crushed ice and stir well.

name: Kirsch Cuba Libre
preparation: Squeeze lime juice directly into a collins glass. Add spent shell fill with ice and add remaining ingredients. Add straws and serve.

name: Club Cuba
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass filled with ice stir and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Gorilla's Tit
preparation: After mixing each ingredient in order shown light the 151 with a match. Blow out the flames and sip drink quickly with a straw.

name: Cookie Monster #2
preparation: Use a spoon to layer the alcohol and float 151 on the top. Lite on fire let it burn for about 5 seconds then blow it out and suck it up through a straw.

name: Liberace
preparation: Pour in the kahlua layer the milk on top and the bacardi 151 on top of the milk. Ignite let burn for about 10 seconds blow out and shoot.

name: Flaming Gorilla Titties
preparation: Add the kahlua and then add bacardi 151 rum to the shot glass. Place a small sipping straw in the mixture and then light on fire. The straw is so you do not burn your eyebrows off. Once lit suck the shot through the straw till empty. Tastes like chocolate milk. I have made this drink quite often at parties and it goes over very well with everyone. Try it a few times it does take a little practice to get it right.

name: Duck's Ass
preparation: Mix in a tumbler with ice then strain into a shot glass.

name: Jockey's Choice Manhattan
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Manhattan for Rome
preparation: Build the Maker's Mark Bourbon whiskey and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur in an old-fashioned glass over ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Alternatively muddle the cherry with ice before adding the Maker's Mark Bourbon whiskey and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur.

name: Grumpy Old Man
preparation: Pack an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon lime juice and top with ginger ale. Serve with a sip stick no garnish.

name: Jimbull
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old fashioned glass over three ice cubes mix and serve.

name: Whiskey Hot Toddy
preparation: Heat in a heat-resistant glass and fill with hot water. Add a lemon slice speared with a clove and serve.

name: Bourbon Old-Fashioned
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Bourbon Sidecar
preparation: Pour the whiskey triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bourbon and Water
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Angel Piss
preparation: Shake ingredients with a couple ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: A Nap at Charlie's
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail / martini glass garnish with Tang around the rim and serve.

name: Magnolia Maiden
preparation: Shake the bourbon Grand Marnier and simple syrup together with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with soda and serve.

name: Washoe Peel
preparation: Pour all ingredients intoa cocktail shaker. Shake and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Jillionaire
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Manhattan Bella
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Bloody Jim
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey over roughly 3 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-cola until the glass is nearly full then add cherry grenadine. Mix together with a straw and serve.

name: Riprock
preparation: Pour jim beam into a cocktail shaker. Add ice fill with orange juice and shake. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bourble
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jim Frost
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: All American
preparation: Serve with two ice-cubes. You can vary the amount of coca-cola depending on how soft you want your drink to be.

name: Man o' War
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and pour on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Manhattan Cocktail
preparation: Combine the vermouth bourbon whiskey and bitters with 2 - 3 ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir gently don't bruise the spirits and cloud the drink. Place the cherry in a chilled cocktail glass and strain the whiskey mixture over the cherry. Rub the cut edge of the orange peel over the rim of the glass and twist it over the drink to release the oils but don't drop it in. VARIATION: No bitters. Substitute a twist of lime for the cherry and orange. Hold the lime twist in a lighted match over the drink and then drop it in. The heat really zips up the lime flavor.

name: Fearless Redneck
preparation: Pour in above order into a large glass or cup.

name: Apple Manhattan
preparation: Stir the whiskey and liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple and serve.

name: Bourbon Supremo
preparation: Simply pour tonic water over bourbon whiskey and serve as is or with ice. A thirst quencher.

name: Bourbon Crusta
preparation: Place the sugar in a saucer. Rub the rim of a wine goblet with a lemon wedge and dip into the sugar to coat the rim thoroughly; discard lemon. Peel a spiral of orange peel and place inside the glass draped over one side. Fill with crushed ice. Combine the bourbon whiskey Cointreau maraschino and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into the glass and serve.

name: Old Fashioned
preparation: Mix sugar water and angostura bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Drop in a cherry and an orange wedge. Muddle into a paste using a muddler or the back end of a spoon. Pour in bourbon fill with ice cubes and stir.

name: Scarlett's Torch
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Sweet Manhattan #2
preparation: Serve on the rocks.

name: Kentucky Blizzard
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and serve.

name: Brown Fox
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Sazerac
preparation: Pour ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat the glass; discard any excess. Place the sugar peychaud bitters and water into the glass and muddle with the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the bourbon over the ice cubes add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bourbon County Cowboy
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: J. R.'s Godfather
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavors.

name: Stella's Rose
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: American Woman
preparation: Shake everything with ice strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Neon-Geek
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with one cup of crushed ice. Strain into a margarita glass and serve immediately.

name: J. R.'s Revenge
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cajun Comforter
preparation: Pour Southern Comfort and Bourbon over rocks in a 12-ounce glass. Add a dash of tabasco or any non-habeero pepper sauce (dont go overboard). To really impress garnish with a jumbo shrimp.

name: Bouzo
preparation: Stir together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kentucky Cocktail
preparation: Shake both ingredients together with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bourbon a la Kris
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bourbon Sour
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

name: Jimmy Hendrix
preparation: Mix all the ingredients together in a huge vat and stir with a big cauldron stick great for college and frat parties.

name: Agent Orange
preparation: Have a hurricane glass filled with ice. Add ingredients and shake. Garnish with cherry and orange.

name: Just Shoot Me
preparation: Mix over ice and pour into a shot glass.

name: 1964 Car Bomb
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a beer mug filled with Budweiser and serve.

name: Bloody Demon From Hell
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a large glass. Garnish with a radish or a celery stick and serve.

name: Jim Beam's Redneck Friend
preparation: Pour all ingredients in bowl and mix well.

name: Jim Pepper
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda stir lightly and serve.

name: Crazy Ninja
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam Bourbon whiskey into a highball glass. Add the Sierra Mist and a couple of ice cubes and serve.

name: Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
preparation: Pour all liqueurs into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake until frosted. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Stir and serve.

name: Five Star General #2
preparation: Add equal parts of each liquor to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Closed Caskets and Broken Skulls
preparation: Get a huge vat mix all bottles of liquor together (at least 1 liter bottles) then mix with any flavors of kool aid desired. Make sure you get lots of kool-aid mix water and liquors first.

name: Peach Haze
preparation: Chill schnapps vodka and shot glass before mixing. Layer the ingredients starting with schnapps then cranberry juice and then vodka. Enjoy!

name: Snake Piss
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir occasionally.

name: Hole in the Head
preparation: Fill half of a shot glass with Sambuca. Slowly fill the other half with vodka (to get layer effect). Add 3 drops of Tabasco sauce (it should swim in between the two layers) and serve.

name: Crank Head
preparation: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass. Float the irish cream and over it float Bombay Sapphire gin carefully. From the center of the glass drop in a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Head for the Hills
preparation: Pour the vermouth curacao and club soda into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Mexican Martini #2
preparation: Add vodka triple sec and lime juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Banana Foster
preparation: Blend until smooth and pour into a large brandy snifter. Sprinkle cinnamon on top.

name: Screaming Banana Banshee
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: The Game
preparation: Pour light rum into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cranberry juice top with triple sec and serve.

name: Banana Nutbread
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Chocolate-Cherry-Banana Breakfast Smoothie
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend on puree (or the highest setting) until smooth about 30 seconds. Pour into glasses and serve.

name: Banana Sandwich
preparation: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Casa Blanca
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Banana Foster Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except powdered cocoa) in a bender. Blend until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a dusting of powdered cocoa and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail
preparation: Rum the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice strain into the glass and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'lwNWl3ODp4zGhPe0rthKv42d4F6apWp3' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Lime Green Bullfrog
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker and shake until completely cold. Strain into a rock glass filled with ice garnish with a lime wheel and serve.

name: Screaming Banana
preparation: Shake or mix with a straw in a glass full of ice.

name: Banana Tropical
preparation: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend for 3 minutes. If the mix isn't liquid enough (depends on the banana) add another shot of pineapple juice. Decorate with a piece of the banana and a piece of a pineapple.

name: Blue Ninja
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

name: Baywatch
preparation: Shake the vodka the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Oban Water
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur into a shot glass. Add the lemonade and serve.

name: Candy Apple Sour
preparation: Pour vodka orange juice and lemonade into a glass over ice. Fill the rest of the glass with sour apple mix. Stir and serve.

name: Disco Lemonade
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Country Time pink lemonade and splash in some Gatorade fruit punch. Add a small glowstick for garnish and serve with a straw.

name: Frostmark 5 on Ice
preparation: Stir together the absinthe and vodka in a mixing glass and strain into a highball glass half filled with ice. Fill the rest of the way up with Fresca soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Creamy Niall
preparation: Fill bottom of glass with ice and pour vodka over it. Follow this by filling the glass full with cream soda.

name: Piss in the Snow
preparation: Pour mountain dew into a large glass with ice cubes. Add vodka and avalanche schnapps both pre-chilled. Stir and serve.

name: Sledgehammer
preparation: Pour vodka and lime juice over into a collins glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Top with Sunny Delight stir well and serve.

name: Triplesex
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Serve.

name: Anti-Freeze #3
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add water and lemon lime mix stir until dissolved and serve.

name: Slimer
preparation: Mix ingredients listed above in the order stated. The best way to gauge if you've done it correctly is by color. It'll look like what it's called and it will taste like gummi worms.

name: Brain Eraser #3
preparation: Pour first two ingredients over ice fill glass with club soda. Drink through straw.

name: Smirnoff Snapple Spikage
preparation: Add half of glass with ice cubes. Add Vodka. Fill with Snapple. Mix and serve.

name: Blood Orange Blast
preparation: Mix all the liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker and fill to the brim with ice. Shake until cold and then strain into a highball glass. Take the ice from the shaker and put into the glass. Take the blood orange slice and roll it around the edge of the glass and drop it in.

name: Melonade
preparation: Add to an ice filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a green cherry.

name: Fallen Angel
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Bart Simpson #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Cody Spunk
preparation: Pour Smirnoff vodka Amaretto Buttershots and milk into a cup and stir together. Top with cream and enjoy.

name: Lemonberry Twist
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed above into a collins glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Orange Soda Driver
preparation: Add three or four ice cubes to any type of large glass. Add the vodka orange soda and orange juice. Stir and serve.

name: Crank and Vodka
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Slippery Dick #2
preparation: Pour Sprite and orange juice into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add triple sec Smirnoff vodka and peach schnapps. Add a dash of sweet and sour mix if desired and serve.

name: Sparkley Spritz
preparation: Pour ingredients over 4 ice cubes in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Igloo Sue
preparation: Fill glass with ice or snow. Pour in lemonade. Add vodka. Splash in grenadine (it should seep to the bottom).

name: Atlantic Sun
preparation: Shake all the ingredients top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Bloody Murder
preparation: Mix the cayenne pepper in a small amount of vodka until dissolved. Add the remainder of vodka and mix again. Add tomato juice. Slice a habenero pepper and use to mix drink; place as garnish.

name: Vodka and Schweppes
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Blue Hawaii
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake thoroughly. Pour over crushed ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Full Throttle
preparation: Combine with ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Mop Water
preparation: Add all ingredients to a large container with ice. Serve into cups.

name: Rum Eggnog
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Poison Milk
preparation: Mix in a shot glass. Shoot.

name: Malibu Milk Shake
preparation: Add malibu rum sugar and your desired amount of ice to a blender. Fill with milk and blend until smooth with a frothy head. Serve in glasses immediately.

name: Bull's Eye
preparation: Pour brandy and hard cider into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Goats Milk
preparation: Add all ingredients and stir.

name: Chocolate Milk
preparation: Put the milk in the bottom pour the liqueur on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix.

name: Brandy Julep
preparation: Place sugar mint leaves and brandy in a collins glass and fill with finely shaved ice. Stir until mint rises to top being careful not to bruise leaves. Garnish with a slice of pineapple orange or lemon and a cherry.

name: Whiskey Milk Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Milk Shake 43
preparation: Pour licor 43 over ice shake and strain into a highball glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

name: Papaya Milk Splash
preparation: Clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Add to a blender with the milk sugar and ice and blend at medium to high speed for one or two minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Sherry Milk Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Gin Milk Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rum Milk Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
preparation: In a highball glass dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

name: Mother's Milk
preparation: Shake over ice and strain into two shot glasses.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon half-and-half sugar and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Bull's Sweat
preparation: Just mix shake and pour.

name: Separator
preparation: Fill rocks glass with ice add brandy Kahlua and milk. Shake well return to glass. Brandy can be substituted for Cognac.

name: Milk of Amnesia
preparation: Add ice cold champagne to a champagne flute and slowly add chilled chambord until desired raspberry flavor is achieved. Stir gently and serve.

name: Irish Milk Punch
preparation: Pour ingredients into a heat-proof cup sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Brandy Puff
preparation: Shake the brandy and milk in a shaker strain into a wine goblet and add the soda.

name: Island Milk
preparation: Blend the orange juice milk sugar and ice together for 30 seconds. Pour into collins glasses and serve.

name: Night Cap
preparation: Pour the rum into an Irish coffee mug and fill with warm milk. Sweeten to taste. Stir sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Brown Cow
preparation: In a champagne flute with ice add kahlua and top with milk. Stir. Garnish stirrer with nutmeg.

name: Coconut Milk
preparation: Pour a shot of Malibu coconut rum into the bottom of a cordial glass. Top up with milk (the colder the better) stir and serve.

name: Brandy Milk Punch
preparation: Shake brandy milk and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Blue Smurf Piss
preparation: Pour as listed. Strain through Ice.

name: Kryptonite
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: 357 Magnum
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Tiki Rum
preparation: Cut the mango into cubical pieces. Combine all ingredients including the mango in a blender. Blend well and serve into pina colada glasses.

name: Rum Swizzle
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in a mixture of carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill with ice stir and add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Banana Rum Frappe
preparation: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Cancun Rum Runner
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake for a few seconds. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry and serve.

name: Rum Snap
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Goldilocks
preparation: Shake and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Muskmelon
preparation: Combine the dark rum pieces of cantaloupe melon lime juice orange juice and sugar with 1/3 cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend well until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of cantaloupe and serve.

name: Festering Zombie
preparation: Mix the first six ingredients (everything minus the grenadine) into a 1/2 gallon pitcher. Stir. Pour over ice in a high-ball glass. Splash with grenadine. You may alternately use 100 proof Absolut for a little more kick... Enjoy.

name: Rob Zombie
preparation: Pour 1 ounce of Bacardi 151 in shot glass add a splash of pineapple juice to almost fill glass to top squeeze lime wedge in

name: The Finnely
preparation: Mix all ingredients shake and pour over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon lime and orange wedge.

name: Zombie #3
preparation: Shake over ice in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Adam
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: San Salvador
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime and serve.

name: Little Black Devil
preparation: Pour into shot glass and serve.

name: Fruit Tingles
preparation: Place ice cubes in shaker add all other ingredients and shake. Pour into shot glasses to drink.

name: F-69
preparation: Chill ingredients beforehand. Carefully layer the ingredients into a shot glass in order: Rum Kahlua Amaretto Bailey's.

name: Pine-Sol Shooter
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass almost-filled with ice. Stir and strain into a shot glass.

name: Chachi's Pretty Good Shot
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into shot glasses. Serve.

name: Calypso
preparation: Pour directly in the shot glass and mix the ingredients. No need to chill. Serve.

name: Falix
preparation: Pour the bacardi into a shot glass. Add the margarita mix. Top it with the lemon juice and shoot it.

name: Nutty Jamaican
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Purple Orchid
preparation: Put everything into the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour and enjoy!

name: Fuel Injection
preparation: Pour the Bacardi rum into a shot glass; top with Anisette and serve.

name: Raspberry Colada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Bo Jo
preparation: Pour the fruit punch into a shot glass. Add the Midori melon liqueur on top and then follow with the Bacardi white rum and serve.

name: Virgin Colada
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry add a straw and serve.

name: Bumbo
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Canadian Skittle
preparation: Pour over a couple of ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Oregon Special
preparation: Pour the white rum over several ice cubes in a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with sweet and sour mix. Add the orange juice and dash grenadine. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Dr. Canadian
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Pink Creole
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Canadian Rum Punch
preparation: Bring water to a boil then add sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and add rum and lemon juice. Serve with ice.

name: Canadian Manhattan
preparation: Shake well and pour over ice or up in a martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Mariposa
preparation: Pour the rum brandy lemon juice orange juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Canadian Cowgirl
preparation: Pour whisky and yukon jack over ice in a cocktail glass. Add cola garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Apricot Crush
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Canadian Hangover
preparation: Stir ingredients (except cream) together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Canadian Salad
preparation: Add the whiskies brandy Irish Mist juices and sugar to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Rum Daisy
preparation: Combine the rum lemon juice sugar and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Friar's Luck
preparation: Mix the dark rum juice grenadine and Frangelico in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Peaceful Treasure
preparation: Pour the dark rum citrus juices simple syrup and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Varadero Sunrise
preparation: Pour orange juice into a highball glass. Add grenadine carefully so that it will stay at the bottom. Carefully add some ice cubes. Seperately combine and mix the rum and blue curacao and layer the mixture into the highball glass so that it floats or remains on top. Add a straw and serve.

name: Canadian Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Canadian Hillbilly
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Flamingo Squeezer
preparation: Squeeze the juice of the orange into an empty cocktail shaker then add rum cream of coconut and grenadine and shake. Fill pint glass with ice and pour the shaker contents over the ice. Place a tiny plastic pink flamingo on the rim and serve with a straw. For flair combine all the ingredients except the Grenadine and pour over the ice. Put the drops of grenadine on top then right before serving stir it front of your guest.

name: Tropicolada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Acapulco Gold
preparation: Shake and strain into a highball glass with cracked ice.

name: Melon Colada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a pina colada glass with a slice of pineapple cherry and straws.

name: Coconut Monkey
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Great Artius
preparation: Place Kahlua in a sherry glass. Make sure coconut cream is in liqueur form (I used microwave). Mix the juice with the coconut cream before pouring into the Kahlua. Stir and serve.

name: Coffee Colada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry. Add straws and serve.

name: Strawberry Banana Colada
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Shake well. Garnish with a flag (orange and cherry).

name: Waikiki Beach
preparation: Rim a wine goblet with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients strain into the glass and serve.

name: Cherry Rum Shooter
preparation: Pour rum and vodka into a shot glass. Top with cream and serve.

name: Amaretto Colada
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple slice or cherry add straws and serve in a pina colada glass.

name: Boston Cooler
preparation: Stir lemon juice sugar and 2 oz of club soda together in a collins glass. Fill the glass with cracked ice. Add rum. Top with club soda and stir. Garnish with a spiral of orange or lemon peel and serve.

name: Kahlua and Cream
preparation: Pour kahlua into a glass over ice. Add cream and shake.

name: Bartender's Cream Soda
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Cream Sherry Flip
preparation: Combine the sherry egg sugar and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and serve.

name: Standard Cream
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Irish Cream #2
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender for no longer than 2 mins. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Irish Cream BTB
preparation: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recommended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream mix lightly do not overmix. BTB = Better Than Bailey's

name: Coconut Cream Pie
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice shake & strain into cocktail glass.

name: Highland Cream
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Cream Sherry Sangaree
preparation: Add the sugar to a highball glass. Add water and sherry and stir to dissolve sugar. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and add club soda. Float the benedictine on top. Garnish with a lemon twist a dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon and serve.

name: Frozen Rum Runner
preparation: Blend at high speed until smooth. Float 1/4 oz 151 proof rum as an optional extra. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry. Enjoy!

name: Banana Popsicle
preparation: Pour over ice in a shaker adding equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice to the spirits. Shake and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass.

name: Shark Bite #2
preparation: Combine Myers's rum Orange Juice Sour Mix and Ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into Hurricane Glass and add Grenadine. Serve with a straw but do not stir before serving.

name: Starseeker
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Rum Runner Mondays
preparation: Pour both rums and juice over ice and stir. Serve with pineapple wedge for garnish. For a frozen variation blend all ingredients until smooth and serve in margarita glass.

name: Florida Rum Runner
preparation: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

name: Gilligan
preparation: Measure crushed ice into a cocktail shaker with a collins glass. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour the shaker back into the glass and garnish with a wedge of lemon.

name: Kab-z Vanilla
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Vanil rum into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add the Pepsi vanilla cola and lime juice. Stir well. Add the lemon juice and serve.

name: Caribbean Afterburner
preparation: WARNING: Method used below involves igniting spirits and is essential for the desired taste and unique effect. Only perform in an area free from detritus and flammable objects. So don't sit near a curtain or drape. Please. Once poured into a glass [ideally tumbler or rocks style] the spirits should be ignited and briefly poured to a second and identical empty glass set aside beforehand. Instantly extinguish the flaming spirits by putting the original glass rim to rim with the second and forming a seal. Wait 10 seconds after the spirits have been extinguished to let excess heat diminish then crack the seal slightly and inhale the lingering vapors. Immediately afterwards remove the top glass altogether and down the liquid contents in one swift movement.

name: The Real Mexican Motherfucker
preparation: You'll need a pint glass with a shaker lid. Pour liquor into the glass carefully filling glass to the 2/3rds mark with Sprite. Place the shaker lid over the glass shake the glass once quickly and remove the shaker lid drinking the now mixed ingredients in one shot.
Shake all ingredients briefly together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Fiery Balls Of Death
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. Ignite pray for your life and down it.

name: The Real Windex
preparation: Shake vodka and liqueur with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Oregon Coast Crab Shock
preparation: Mix the Everclear and the rum together in a shot glass. Add the Aftershock last to give the shot a nice red color. Serve.

name: Liquid Crack #2
preparation: Stir in a shot glass and serve.

name: Danny's Favorite
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a short glass and shoot.

name: Flaming A-style
preparation: The drink is comprised of half 151 and half Everclear. Its better to mix in a larger cup then pour into shot glasses usually for four.Have the lime on the side sliced and ready to go.When ready take the shot in one hand and a slice of lime in the other. Tilt your head back and pour the drink into your mouth dont swallow bite the lime and then swallow. Take a moment try not to move you'll feel it and your eyes will slowly start to water as your blood warms up. If you really feel up to it set the shot on fire and muff it out right before you pour it into your mouth. Has a great visiualization.

name: Dirtiest Ernie
preparation: Mix the three ingredients in a shot glass and slam.

name: Frozen Real Strawberry Margarita
preparation: Mix the limeade Cointreau and tequila in a mixing glass. Add 2 cups of ice to a blender and add the strawberries and tequila mixture. Blend until smooth (thin with tequila if necessary). Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Crazy Parrot
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Frye's Crazy Lime
preparation: Add Sour Apple Pucker and Triple Sec to a cocktail glass. Add lime or lemon-lime Kool-aid. Stir and serve. Ice optional.

name: Crazy Monkey
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane glass. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

name: Van Vleet
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Crazy Finn
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Watermelon Shirley Temple
preparation: Place all ingredients in a mixer. Mix then strain and pour over crushed ice into glass. Serves 1.

name: Crazy Cow
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Crazy Orgasm
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Gailwarning
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Lovegoat's Crazy Hawaiian Punch
preparation: Add triple sec to highball glass. Fill with Sprite Remix and Pineapple Juice. Stir.

name: Crazy Janie
preparation: Pour orange vodka into a deep stemmed glass with ice. Fill with grapefruit juice add sprite or champagne and stir gently. Spin the glass and drizzle in a few drops of grenadine to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

name: Crazy Jew
preparation: Fill your nice cold beer mug with ice. Mix all liquors then add juices. Shake it up and serve it to your best customers when they ask for something new strong and sweet!

name: Crazy Monkey
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender and pour into a hurricane glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh strawberry.

name: Crazy Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Crazy Juice
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Serve on ice.

name: Devil's Torch
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Flaming Jew
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a beer mug. Ignite and serve.

name: Thunder And Lighting
preparation: Mix in shaker and serve.

name: Keremiki
preparation: Mix and shoot.

name: Sparkplug
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 in the shot glass first then pour Rumplminze on top do not mix.

name: Atomic Plum
preparation: Add all ingredients (except 151 rum) to a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes and shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds. Pour into a large shot glass splash with 151 rum and shoot.

name: Devil's Tail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a champagne flute or 6-oz glass and serve.

name: Afterburner
preparation: Pour both ingredients and let them mix somewhat. (You can stir it to help it out)
Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Dragon's Breath
preparation: Pour in firewater float bacardi 151 proof rum on top and ignite.

name: Fireball Shooter
preparation: Mix the schnapps rum and tabasco in a shooter glass. Stir briefly.

name: Bailey's Comet #2
preparation: Layer in order given splash 151 on top light on fire and sprinkle cinnamon on top to produce sparks instead of just a flame.

name: Jerry's Mom #2
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 rum into a parfait glass and top with a large scoop of ice cream.

name: Oatmeal Cookie Rummy
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Stormcloud
preparation: Build in shot glass. Float Bailey's in amaretto and top with 151. The Bailey's should float in the middle.

name: Afterburn
preparation: Pour the Jagermeister and Malibu coconut rum into a 2-oz shot glass then pour a little Bailey's Irish Cream around the edge so you get tendrils into the mixture. Float a bit of 151 on the top and light. Blow out after a couple of seconds & shoot. Goes down smooth then the 151 burn hits - hence the name Afterburn.

name: Cuban Assassin
preparation: Pour Bacardi 151 rum into a shot glass. Add chartreuse then 5 or 6 dashes of tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Napalm Bomb
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass and shoot.

name: Devil's Piss
preparation: Using a large glass of water add lemonade concentrate to taste (best to make it a little stronger than usual). Add the shots of everclear and mix well.

name: Boston Burn-Out
preparation: In a LARGE shot glass (or small juice glass) add Rootbeer Schnapps Amaretto Butterscotch Schnapps and Bacardi 151 dark. Top off with Bailey's Irish Cream. Add 4 to 6 drops (or more for the daring) of Tabasco on top. Slam do not sip!

name: Devil's Breath
preparation: Layer the limoncello Campari bitters and vodka in that order into a shot glass. Flame the vodka drop in a straw and serve.

name: Satan's Piss
preparation: Pour rum into shot glass. Add tabasco to the top. Serve room temperature.

name: Firestorm
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Devil's Advocate
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well strain over ice cubes in a glass and serve.

name: Flaming Dragon
preparation: Mix together. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction for about 20 secs. Blow out fire (optional). Swallow quickly (take care).

name: 358 Magnum
preparation: Shake ingredients together over ice in a cocktail shaker; strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Thorazine
preparation: Add all three ingredients in order to a shot glass. Best served with top layer on fire. (For effect only)

name: Devil's Delight
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Fire and Ice
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Devil's Blood
preparation: Mix everything in a large bowl with lots of ice. Serve into punch cups or glasses and drink through straws.

name: Stabilizer
preparation: Chill the Rumple Minze until very cold. Then pour over the 151 in a shot glass. They will not layer so don't try it. Then drink the shot quickly don't waste time smelling the shot or sipping it just drink it. Then sit back and enjoy!

name: Devil's Cocktail
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
preparation: Combine ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass.

name: Green Motherfucker
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass.

name: Asia 9.0
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: 352 Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Terminator
preparation: 151 first then Rumple Minze.

name: Buffalo Sweat
preparation: Pour 151 proof rum and tabasco sauce into a stainless shaker over ice shake until completely cold and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Pour a 1/4 cup of orange juice over the bar clean up with the bar rag then squeeze 1 oz. out of bar rag into the drink. Serve to your nastiest customer.

name: Black Bitch
preparation: Layer Bailey's irish cream over black sambuca. Top with bacardi 151 rum.

name: Dr. Pepper Flame
preparation: Pour the Amaretto almond liqueur into a shot glass leaving at least a quarter-inch of space at the top. Slowly pour the Bacardi 151 rum on top. Have a full cup or glass of Dr. Pepper ready. Ignite the 151 rum in the shot glass and drop the flaming shot glass into the Dr. Pepper. Drink immediately.

name: Egg Crusher
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a large brandy snifter dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Mississippi Mud
preparation: Combine the Southern Comfort coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Gumball Hummer
preparation: Combine ingredients in equal parts over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain and serve.

name: Louie Louie
preparation: Stir and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Southern Mint Julep
preparation: Pour into a collins glass and fill with crushed ice. Mix gently and serve.

name: Southern Ginger
preparation: Crush the mint gently in a highball glass. Fill with broken ice add remaining ingredients and mix gently. Add straws and serve.

name: Southern Belle
preparation: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this precedure with the Benedictine.

name: Southern Doctor
preparation: Pour Southern Comfort in mason jar fill with Dr. Pepper chill with ice and throw a party!

name: Southern Hospitality
preparation: Add all ingredients into a sauce pan. Warm mixture on stove until all flavors have steeped together (about 5 min.). Do not let it boil. Remove cinnamon sticks. Serve while still hot.

name: Passionate Affair
preparation: Add the vodka and strawberry schnapps to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Use equal parts of cranberry and orange juice to fill the glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Leviathan
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hale Bopp
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass. Run a slice of lime around lip of glass sugared rim optional. Garnish with lime or lemon wedge and stemless cherry. Amount of lime juice can be varied by taste. Serve.

name: Kiss Off
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Strawberry Kiss
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with half a caster sugar-coated strawberry and serve.

name: Brandy-O
preparation: Pour over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add a stirrer and serve.

name: Crow's Nest (Virgin)
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: April Shower
preparation: Shake over ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Godiva Peppermint Kiss
preparation: Stir over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Sex on the Grass
preparation: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.

name: A Southern Screw
preparation: Pour over ice stir and serve.

name: Sex On My Face
preparation: Mix in tall glass w/ice.

name: 57 Chevy
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

name: Unknown Warrior
preparation: Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.

name: Petite Fleur
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Julius Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jackie O's Rose
preparation: Pour the rum lime juice and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar to taste stir to dissolve and serve.

name: Ultimate Margarita #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake. Serve in salted (optional) margarita glasses.

name: French Sailor
preparation: Mix warm cointreau and vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved.

name: Balalika
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a martini or cocktail glass add a slice of lime peel and serve.

name: Blond Headed Slut
preparation: Chill and serve.

name: Brassy Blond
preparation: Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Agua de Valencia
preparation: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.

name: Bloody Margarita
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rose of the Ritz
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except champagne) well in a blender and pour into a wine glass. Add champagne and serve.

name: Drink of the Gods
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Bite of the Iguana
preparation: Mix ingredients and shake. Strain and pour into shot glass. Share with a friend.

name: Hobble Gobble
preparation: Pour Wild Turkey into a shot glass. Add Bacardi 151 proof rum stir briefly and serve.

name: Buffalo Chip
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Hair of the Dog
preparation: Pour the Tabasco sauce tequila and whiskey into a shot glass. Lay the salt on top and serve.

name: Kickin' Chicken
preparation: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a shot glass and shoot.

name: A Crow Left of the Murder
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve with a straw.

name: Cold War
preparation: In a chilled shot glass add Stolichnaya Vodka 100 Proof. Then add Bacardi 151 Rum & Wild Turkey 100 Proof at the same time & allow them to settle.

name: Fruit of the Loom
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in shaker glass. Shake well and strain into shot glass.

name: Blood of the Innocent
preparation: Pour hawaiian punch into a 12 oz highball glass. Take a gulp/mouthful and fill the rest of the glass with vodka. Alter the proportions if you prefer a stronger bite.

name: The Dukes Of Hazzard Tonic
preparation: Shake and serve.

name: Gorilla's Puke
preparation: Layer ingredients in a normal shot glass. Can be lit and shot through a straw.

name: Pharmacy School
preparation: Pour all three ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and shake until chilled. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Peg
preparation: Add bourbon to a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with coke and add lime juice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Rusty Water
preparation: Fill half glass with ice. Add 2oz Wild Turkey. Fill the rest of glass with 7up. Garnish with lime if preferred.

name: Lemon Lightning
preparation: Add equal parts everclear and lemon juice to a shot glass. Place the shot into the freezer for 30 minutes to completely chill it. Drink it ice cold.

name: Iced Wild Turkey Hill
preparation: Pour Wild Turkey whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Turkey Hill iced tea stir and serve.

name: Cherry Gobbler
preparation: Pour the Wild Turkey bourbon whiskey and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Mello Yellow and serve.

name: Charlie Chaplin
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Hop Skip and Go Naked
preparation: Add liqueurs in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Add 1/2 oz lime juice. Fill with orange juice and float the grenadine.

name: Lady Madonna
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: The Naked Lady
preparation: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: Red Cloud
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Naked Lady
preparation: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: Old Pal Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Smile Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lady Scarlett
preparation: Shake. Garnish with a cherry and lemon-peel.

name: Naked Shake
preparation: Add the vanilla schnapps swiss mocha cream liqueur and a few ounces of half-and-half to an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Stir or shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with a splash of coca-cola and garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Naked Girl Scout
preparation: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

name: Applejack Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Applejack brandy grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lady Godiva
preparation: Shake sugar triple sec lime and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass and fill with brandy.

name: Naked Pretzel
preparation: Pour the vodka melon liqueur creme de cassis and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cocaine Lady
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice shake strain into shot glass. The amount of milk is optional depending on desired potancy of shot.

name: Help Wanted
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Lady Killer
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in shaker strain into a champagne flute or longdrink glass over some ice cubes. Decorate with mint and a cherry.

name: Naked Sunburn
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur Malibu rum and creme de noyaux into a hurricane glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the 7-Up and sour mix. Fill with equal parts of pineapple and cranberry juice to taste and serve.

name: Midnight Cocktail
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy triple sec and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fair and Warmer Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rum sweet vermouth and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dave Matthews
preparation: Shake amaretto rum and juices together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an ice-filled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Suffering Bastard
preparation: Shake all ingredients well and strain into an ice-filled double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with slices of orange and lime and serve.

name: Hawaiian Surfer on Acid
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. It will be a bit frothy on top. Garnish with a cherry and lime wheel and serve.

name: Centauri Sundown
preparation: Pour the vodka and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with sour mix to taste and serve.

name: Cherry Daiquiri
preparation: Blend thoroughly add a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Pour into a goblet and garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: Cable Car
preparation: Combine everything in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mango Martini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cowgirl Quencher
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps into a margarita glass filled with crushed ice. Fill the rest of the glass with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine top with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Pink Star
preparation: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine to achieve a light pink color. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Felix Longwater
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Gummi Berry Juice
preparation: Pour the Maui blue hawaiian schnapps into a chilled cocktail glass. Add 7-up top with coconut rum and serve.

name: Kazkar Kocktail
preparation: Shake the above ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon curl and speared cherry and serve.

name: Bacardi Refresher
preparation: Shake ingredients together with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and orange slice and serve.

name: Shark Bite
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the spiced rum light rum sour and blue curacco. Shake the ingredients well. Strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with three drops of grenadine.

name: Cruzan Confusion
preparation: Stir together in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Belgian Brownie
preparation: Pour the gin cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

name: Blizzard
preparation: Pour the brandy irish cream coffee liqueur rum ice cream and cream into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large brandy snifter dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Face First
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Death From Above
preparation: In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and gin. Now light the drink on fire (be extra careful!) After a few seconds of burning the drink pour in the coke and serve.

name: Bondages' No Problem
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing cup cover cup with a lid and shake. Pour over ice and enjoy.

name: James Bond Martini
preparation: Pour the gin vodka and Lillet blanc into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Angel's Kiss
preparation: Pour ingredients carefully in order given into a pousse cafe glass so that they do not mix.

name: Presidential Margarita
preparation: Pour each ingredent into a large glass and add ice. Rim a margarita glass with lime and salt fill with ice and garnish with a lime slice. Carefully pour contents of large glass into the salted margarita glass leaving salt undisturbed.

name: Bonsai Pipeline
