preparation: In shoot glass add Wild Turkey and melon liqeur. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Light drink and squeeze lime in drink. Blow out and shoot.

name: Panty Remover
preparation: Stir ingrediients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Drunken Superman
preparation: Combine all ingredients except 151 rum in a cocktail shaker and shake briskly. Pour over ice in a margarita glass and add 151 over the top. Add a slice of orange and serve..

name: Purple Yummy
preparation: Mix ingredients until chilled in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with cherries and serve.

name: Mister Christian
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Joe Cassano
preparation: Combine ingredients with 1 oz of crushed ice in a blender. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass top with lemonade (to taste) and serve.

name: Sex On Ice
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice and blend until the drink has reached the desired consistency. Pour unstrained into a cocktail glass and garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Mexican Iceberg
preparation: Mix tequila and yukon jack together with ice cubes in a large tumbler glass. Add triple sec and lime juice (to taste). Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Los Cabos Clout
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a margarita glass. Do not strain.

name: Breath of God #2
preparation: Add the Bacardi silver rum Crown Royal and Wild Turkey whiskeys to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned/lowball glass. Splash cranberry juice on top float the Bacardi 151 on top and serve. There is a routine that you do while taking this shot. 1. Breath in deep 2. Exhale ALL the air out 3. Take the shot 4. Immediately after the last drop is down inhale deep. 5. Hold Breath 6. Slowly let out air through nose. The headrush is phenomonal. If you do not know how to float a liquor well then you may mess this up.

name: Kinky Slinky
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker 1/4 to 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Eat My Pussy
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream rum and vodka into a cocktail glass. Add milk to taste and top with whipped cream. Add a drop of chocolate sauce and serve.

name: Irish Shillelagh
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Are You Tough Enough?
preparation: Using only 100 proof liquors ensure all schnapps are ice cold. Combine and mix all five liquors in a cocktail glass and drink like a shot.

name: Beef On Rye
preparation: Shake the gin whisky and syrup in a shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the lemon.

name: Breath Freshener
preparation: Place the mint leaf in the bottom of the glass. Add the vodka first and fill with the creme de menthe.

name: Electric Watermelon
preparation: Add equal parts vodka rum and melon liqueur in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour mix. Add a splash of 7-up and grenadine.

name: BMW
preparation: Mix and drink.

name: Sid Vicious
preparation: Pour whiskey gin vermouth over ice and stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass add bitters and worcestershire sauce. Garnish with poppy seeds.

name: Bone Crusher
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except Champagne) in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Pour into a tall glass preferably a pint glass or large brandy snifter with ice and float the champagne on top with a squeeze of lemon. Serve.

name: Ming Tran
preparation: Stir together in a cocktail glass. Top with cinnamon and serve.

name: Drop the Hammer on the Turkey
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old fashioned glass with or without ice cubes and serve.

name: Greek Manhatten
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Tropical Peach Martini
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: TNT Cocktail
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dreaming in Antalya
preparation: Mix in a mixing glass with ice cubes and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fuzzy Bastard
preparation: Pour ingredients in order listed above into a Hurricane glass filled with ice.Garnish with an Orange Slice.

name: Lucifer's Lane
preparation: Pour all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into 5 - 7 seperate shot glasses and serve.

name: Snakebite
preparation: Pour two ounces of yukon jack over ice. Add a dash of lime juice and serve.

name: Rattlesnake Shot
preparation: Serve in a shot glass. Adjust amounts to taste if desired.

name: Canadian Hunter
preparation: Mix together in shot glass and discharge into mouth!

name: Y2K Shot
preparation: Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Crystal Virgin
preparation: Chill with ice & strain into shot glasses. Add Cranberry Juice to taste. Tastes just like fruit punch.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #4
preparation: Mix Captain Morgan spiced rum Yukon Jack whisky and Malibu coconut rum together in a whiskey sour glass over ice. Add a splash of lime juice top with ginger ale and serve.

name: Bloody Tampon
preparation: Mix Yukon Jack tequila and vodka (all chilled) in a cocktail glass. Add room temperature V-8 tomato juice without mixing. Strain irish cream on top and then splash with lemon juice to curdle giving drink a cotton-like texture.

name: Texas Rattlesnake
preparation: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first with a BITE at the end.

name: Canadian Pussy
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker with ice. Pour into shot glasses and serve.

name: Yukon Dew Me
preparation: Just mix and drink.

name: Kentucky Wildcat
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and stir gently. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Snakebite #4
preparation: Fill a shot glass three-quarters full with Yukon Jack. Add a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Alaskan Pipeline
preparation: Mix equal parts Yukon Jack and amaretto in a tumbler with ice and shake. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Buzz Inducer
preparation: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

name: Nickel Fever
preparation: Pour the blue curacao Southern Comfort galliano cream and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with ice chips and 8-10 drops of blue curacao and serve.

name: Irish Griep
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

name: Easter Egg
preparation: Pour blue curacao and creme de cacao over ice cubes in an old fashioned glass. Float half and half on top to taste and serve.

name: Cyclone Attack
preparation: Layer both ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jedi Cocktail
preparation: Pour the milk over a single ice cube in a cocktail glass. Add blue curacao and creme de cacao simultaneously. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Limon and Ginger
preparation: Serve pre-chilled or on-the-rocks in a highball glass.

name: Black Zaffa
preparation: Shake Schnapps Melon and Blue over ice. Pour into glass. Add Vermouth then cranberry juice to top. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Erin's Sweater
preparation: Shake and serve over ice cubes in a champagne saucer.

name: Vodka and Bitter Lemon
preparation: Combine vodka lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water and serve.

name: Bluetail Fly
preparation: Pour the blue curacao white creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dolphin's Foam
preparation: Shake vigorously in a shaker with lots of ice. Strain into a glass garnish with a red cherry and serve.

name: Atomic Orange Cream
preparation: Pour the milk and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao and orange juice. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Gorilla Fart #5
preparation: Pour yukon jack into a shot glass. Add the bacardi 151 proof rum.

name: Arctic Bomba
preparation: In a two ounce shot glass pour one ounce of Yukon Jack Canadian whiskey and then top with half ounce of 151 Bacardi rum.

name: Rocket Fuel
preparation: Combine in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Rocket Fuel #2
preparation: Mix champagne non-sparkling white wine vodka gin and juice in a 10 liter punch bowl.

name: Anti-Freeze #4
preparation: Chill w/ ice cubes in shaker. Pour into rocks glass or split into two shots.

name: Jeep Fuel
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jackson Jack
preparation: Pour Yukon Jack into a beer mug filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Candied Sever St. Special
preparation: Fill Collins glass most of the way with ice. Add Yukon Jack and Midori. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

name: SoCo MD: Unleaded
preparation: Pour the Game Fuel and SoCo into the collins glass. Garnish the glass with lime wedge. Serve as is or risk putting it on the rocks. (it weakens the drink)

name: Southern Dew
preparation: Basically put ice in glass add 1 oz. southern comfort then fill glass with mountain dew.

name: Comfortably Numb
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass with/without a couple of ice cubes and serve.

name: B.O.N.U.S.
preparation: Pour southern comfort into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Top off with the mountain dew and serve.

name: Sever St. Special
preparation: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

name: Jack the Ripper
preparation: Level ice to the top in a shaker add crown royal and buttershots then shake. Strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Gandy Dancer
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass.

name: Dr Jack
preparation: Mix in glass over ice.

name: Jack Rose
preparation: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Down Home Dew
preparation: Combine the Southern Comfort and the Mountain Dew in a jug. Pour in the two packs of koolaid. Stir or shake and pour into highball glasses.

name: Columbia Gold
preparation: Blend well with large scoop of ice.

name: Redneck Cocktail
preparation: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time

name: Snakebite Jack
preparation: Fill a pint glass half way with cider add a dash of blackcurrant cordial top it up with lager drink it down a bit (or pour it off) and add a shot of Jack Daniels.

name: Morning Dew
preparation: Pour ingredients into a punch bowl and stir. Add cherries or grenadine.

name: Snowshoe
preparation: Pour peppermint schnapps in shot glass top with Wild Turkey drink it up!

name: Tubboocki
preparation: Just pour and serve.

name: 352 Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Naked on the Bathroom Floor
preparation: Stir together in a short glass and serve.

name: Thanksgiving Cocktail
preparation: Fill Collins glass one-half full of ice add ingredients and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge if desired.

name: Alamo
preparation: Build ingredients with 1 - 2 ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Bull Moose
preparation: Serve in equal parts in a shot glass.

name: Alaskan Oil Spill
preparation: Shake Curacao and Rumple Minze together let chill and pour into a snifter. Layer the Jagermeister on top and drink like a shot.

name: Yaps
preparation: Mix 1 part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.

name: Flaming Buller
preparation: Layer the Yukon Jack and cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass. Add tabasco and light carefully. Quickly blow out and shoot.

name: Harbor Lights
preparation: Add 1/2 shot bailey's irish cream to 1/2 shot butterscotch schnapps then float yukon jack on top. Ignite the yukon jack and sip quickly through a straw.

name: Screaming Viking
preparation: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.

name: Yukon Cornelius
preparation: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

name: Black Jack WV
preparation: Mix all of the ingredients together over ice shake 'til very chilled and strain into two glasses.

name: Buffalo Sweat #69
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass and serve. Should make just over an ounce (one shot glass).

name: Virulent Death
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass and stir.

name: Jackshoe
preparation: Pour the Yukon Jack whisky into a large shot glass to just below the rim. Float the peppermint schapps on the top and serve.

name: Screaming Blue Messiah
preparation: Build in a shot glass.

name: Boomerang Shot
preparation: Fill a shot glass 1/2 way with the yukon jack. top it off with the jagermeister.

name: Nuclear Kool-Aid
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mangotini
preparation: Pour the vodka Cointreau and Snapple mango madness into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brazen Hussy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Shakin' Blue Monday
preparation: Add the whisky blueberry brandy brandy lemon juice and sugar to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry.

name: Lime Vodka Collins
preparation: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add vodka lemon juice and sugar. Top with club soda.

name: Dr. Monkey
preparation: Mix vodka and Dr. Pepper in a glass and garnish with a lemon slice on the side.

name: Vodka Stinger
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hairy Lemon
preparation: Rub salt onto the back of your hand. Bite the lemon drink a good two mouthfuls of vodka and lick the salt.

name: Cranberry Vodka Punch
preparation: Chill ingredients before starting. Add vodka and cranberry juice to a punch bowl with a block of ice. Stir well then add ginger ale and carbonated water. Serve in cups.

name: The Bionic Drink
preparation: First pour the Vodka then fill up with the Grapefruit soda or juice. Then add the lemon juice.

name: Sour Grapple
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. grape flavored vodka and 1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker Schnapps. Fill with lemon/lime soda and stir. Serve with a frozen red grape and green apple wedge on a cocktail stick. Lemon/lime soda may be replaced by soda water for those who prefer a less sweet cocktail.

name: Moonlight
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Vodka Amp
preparation: Add ice to a pitcher. Pour in vodka Amp and top off with sweet and sour mix. Pour into highball glasses and serve.

name: Si Kami Ki
preparation: Mix vodka and cinnamon schnapps in cocktail glass add carbonated water serve with ice.

name: Vodka Grasshopper
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: B&B Collins
preparation: Pour brandy lemon juice sugar syrup and soda water into a frosted glass two-thirds filled with ice. Sprinkle benedictine on top. Serve with straws and garnish with a cherry and slices of orange and lemon.

name: Bourbon Highball
preparation: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water if preferred.)

name: Jock Collins
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: John Collins
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Vodka Sling
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and lemon juice. Add vodka pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Gables Collins
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with a slice of lemon and a pineapple chunk.

name: Scotch Highball
preparation: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Orgasm #6
preparation: Pour the vodka Bailey's irish cream and Kahlua coffee liqueur in that order into a highball glass. Top with a bit of club soda and serve.

name: Homicidal Maniac
preparation: Fill mug with ice add ingredients stir and enjoy. Or for more fun put all ingredients (including the ice) into the blender and make a Frozen Homicidal Maniac!!

name: Peach Fuzz
preparation: Add limeade to a blender half-filled with ice cubes. Pit and slice to medium ripe peaches and add with the vodka to the blender. Blend pour into a margarita glass and serve.

name: African Tinnie
preparation: Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Pussy
preparation: Combine the vodka peach schnapps and grapefruit juice together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a cherry on top.

name: Peach House
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker shake and strain into shot glasses.

name: Peach Blossom
preparation: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with ginger ale stir again gently and serve.

name: Peach Magnifico
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled wine glass. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Heavy Navel
preparation: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a cocktail glass and stir. Top with beer and serve.

name: Dirty Bastard
preparation: Pour vodka brandy and cranberry juice (to taste) into an ice-filled highball glass. Add one squeeze of lime and serve.

name: Jilly
preparation: In a rocks glass pour the vodka over ice. Fill 3/4 with tonic water add a splash of cranberry juice then squeeze the lime wedge in.

name: Ike Turner Cocktail
preparation: Pour the blackberry schnapps and blue curacao over a couple of large ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with Hawaiian punch and serve.

name: Purple Haze #4
preparation: Mix vodka and orange juice togeher in an old-fashioned glass. Add blackberry schnapps ice cubes and serve.

name: Black and Blue #3
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Black and Blue Who Who
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Black and Blue Buck
preparation: Pour the jagermeister over several ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Mountain Dew Pitch Black and serve.

name: Black Tooth #2
preparation: Pour the amaretto into a large beer mug. Gently pour in the pint of Guinness lightly stir and serve.

name: Slut Tits
preparation: Pour blue curacao and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with white cranberry strawberry juice and stir. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Black and White Shot
preparation: Carefully layer the Kahlua coffee liqueur over the Dr. McGillicuddy's Vanilla Schnapps in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Smurf Piss #2
preparation: Pour vodka and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Add lemonade and serve.

name: Greek Lightning
preparation: Pour into a mixing cup with 2 or 3 ice cubes and chill to make a shooter. Strain into a shot glass or test tube.

name: Bloody Smurf Jizz
preparation: Chill the grenadine. Pour the blue curacao into a champagne flute. Add the sprite to taste. Slowly pour the grenadine into the glass in order for it to sink. Add the Bailey's irish cream with a teaspoon slowly in the glass to allow it to float and serve.

name: Bloody Tampon #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Bloody Passion #2
preparation: Pour the Hpnotiq into a tall glass with ice. Add the pineapple juice then follow with a few splashes of grenadine. Stir and serve.

name: Beer 'n Limon
preparation: Pour the beer into a frozen glass mug. Add Bacardi stir and serve.

name: One Cock and Two Balls
preparation: Serve ingredients hot in a mug. Best after a hard day of work when you need a pick-me-up.

name: Kitchenberry
preparation: Pour the apple vodka into a highball glass. Fill with chilled Coke (diet or not) and serve.

name: Kick in the Balls
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with melon balls and serve.

name: Pimp Juice
preparation: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Devotion
preparation: Add ingredients to a glass filled with ice.

name: Salty Balls
preparation: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice and float midori melon liqueur on top.

name: Brass Balls
preparation: Mix the three and chill'em. Then pour and serve.

name: Bushman's Balls
preparation: Pour the banana liqueur into a shot glass. Layer the Cape Velvet cream liqueur on top. Add two drops of Nachtmusiek or other chocolate liqueur on top of the Cape Velvet cream liqueur and serve.

name: Black Sea Urchin
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Christmas Cheer #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Arielle's Fuck 'n Run
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Biffer Balls Punch
preparation: A 6 gallon beverage cooler is needed for mixing and saturation. Add sliced fruit first then add the orange juice pineapple juice and cranberry cocktail followed by the sugar. Then add all of the alcohol (order does not matter). Add the rest of the juice. Top off with a splash of vodka. Stir well.

name: Hawaiian Punch in the Balls
preparation: Mix the Hawaiian punch and Everclear grain alcohol together in a punch bowl. Cyphen some off into a smaller bowl and freeze it put the frozen mix into the punch bowl and serve.

name: Good 'n Plenty
preparation: Cocktail can be served on the rocks or blended until smooth.

name: Fuzzy Balls
preparation: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.

name: Eve's Original Sin
preparation: Mix lemon juice apple vodka Sour Apple Pucker and 99 Apples with ice in a cocktail shaker. Srain into glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with Granny Smith apple slice.

name: Good 'n Plenty
preparation: Pour rum sambuca brandy vodka and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Add orange juice shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Tastes just like the candy.

name: Big Balls
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into shot glasses and serve.

name: Omnipotent
preparation: Combine above ingredients together in a highball glass with a couple of ice cubes. Stir and serve with a slice of apple.

name: Geting
preparation: Start with the ice add the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Brownie
preparation: Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour in the liqueurs and then top with cream. Garnish with chocolate shavings on the top.

name: Eagle Eye
preparation: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

name: Umbrella Man Special
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve with straw and ice cubes put a cocktail umbrella beside the straw in the glass.

name: Black Swedish Virgin
preparation: Mix on the rocks.

name: Irish Ghost
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 20 to 30 seconds. Strain into a cup with some ice if desired and serve.

name: Tropical Binalada
preparation: Combine first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the contents unstrained into a collins glass and top up with club soda.

name: Absolut Splash
preparation: Mix in a highball glass.

name: Scrumdriver
preparation: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

name: Cossak
preparation: Add liqueur after filling glass with preferred amount of milk. Vodka can be excluded for a milder drink.

name: N'awlins Mudslide
preparation: Add ice to an old-fashioned glass and add all three ingredients. Swirl the glass to blend the colors. Prolonged sipping is suitable or drink it like a shot. Savor the flavor!

name: Frozen Mudslide
preparation: Blend alcohol with ice-cream. Serve in a frosted glass.

name: Magic Punch
preparation: Add ingredients to an ice-filled collins glass and shake.

name: Mexican Mudslide
preparation: Combine the kahlua amaretto and ice-cream in a glass. Swirl chocolate into the glass and add whipped cream on top.

name: Thirsty Marine
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Honey Bunny
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Seizure
preparation: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a hurricane glass. Mix through a couple times and serve.

name: Johnny Rev
preparation: Pour vodka and tonic water over a fair amount of ice in a highball glass. Squeeze juices from lime and mandarin slices and garnish. Make sure to use ripe sweet limes to counterbalance the tonic water.

name: San Patricio
preparation: Fill mug 3/4 full with coffee. Add Kahlua Bailey's and cream. Stir and serve.

name: Frozen Grasshopper
preparation: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Diva
preparation: Pour and build in a tall glass or collins glass. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cherry and lime.

name: Mona-Lisa
preparation: Stir ingredients and pour into a highball glass.

name: Coast-Line
preparation: Pour the blue Curacao and the vodka in a highball glass. Top with pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Wild White Slippery Mudslide
preparation: Pour hershey's chocolate syrup around the inside lip of a rocks glass. Fill with ice add ingredients and serve.

name: Frozen Kahlua Mudslide
preparation: Blend everything and pour. Top with cherry.

name: California Gold Rush
preparation: Pour 7-up into a clear glass without ice. Add vodka and goldschlager and stir to mix gold flakes evenly through the drink. Effect: The bubbles of carbon dioxide in the 7-up continuously move the gold flakes around.

name: Buzz Lightyear
preparation: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

name: John Rocker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Arizona Stingers
preparation: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass. Add 2 heaping shots of absolut vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of absolut as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with Arizona Iced Tea w/lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy.

name: Skittle
preparation: Add Absolut Vodka and Banana Liqueur to Collins glass. Fill glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid. Add crushed ice stir and serve. Kool-Aid flavor determines what flavor Skittle you get.

name: Sugar Daddy
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Pajama Jackhammer
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass with shaved ice and serve.

name: Kamakazie Razzberry
preparation: Pour welch's concentrate into pitcher then fill can with vodka and pour into pitcher. Finally fill can with raspberry schnapps and pour into pitcher. Add crushed ice and shake.

name: Tom Collins ala Olsen
preparation: Just mix the ingredients.

name: Moose Fart
preparation: Add with ice in a blender and blend to a thick consistency.

name: Richie 50
preparation: Pour orange juice into a 16-ounce glass half-filled with vodka. Stir add a cherry and serve.

name: Mean Green Machine
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Frozen Mudslide #2
preparation: Add all liquid ingredients into mixer. Add vanilla ice cream and mix. Add more ice cream till desired texture.

name: Wolf (Howlin')
preparation: Pour spirits in a glass. Add some ice and fill up with Sprite. Prefered served with a blue cherry.

name: Pimp Cocktail
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Nurse
preparation: Pour vodka and licor 43 over 2 - 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir and fill with with root beer. Serve with a straw.

name: Breast Milk
preparation: Mix all ingredients in tin with crushed ice. Shake strain and serve.

name: Well Greased Dwarf
preparation: Layer the ingredients in the order they are listed in a pony glass. The sambuca should be chilled first to layer more easily.

name: Godiva Polar Bear
preparation: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Jello Shots
preparation: Heat water to boiling point. Dissolve jello in the water add creme de cacao and chill in plastic shot glasses. Serve when ready.

name: Chokorange
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a shot glass. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Cherry Godet
preparation: Add Godet to shot class pour cherry brandy in the center and let it mix itself around.

name: Green Beaver
preparation: Layer ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Bad News Bear
preparation: Stir ingredients together and serve in a cup.

name: Cherry Bon Bon
preparation: Layer Godet on top of Creme de Noyaux. Serve in a cordial or shot glass.

name: Toolkit
preparation: Mix all ingredients and pour into shot glasses. Slam it.

name: Chocolate Shot #2
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jellyfish
preparation: Pour the creme de cacao and amaretto into a shot glass. Float enough bailey's on top to cover the shot and then drop a few drops of grenadine into it. It looks just like a jellyfish!

name: Polar Bear #4
preparation: I've seen this shot done in two ways. Pour both ingredients into a shaker shake with ice and pour into shot glasses. Pour half a measure of Creme de Cacao into a shot glass layering the Creme de Menthe on top. It does not have to be exact try it a couple times and find the measures that suit your taste buds!

name: Polar Bear Cooler
preparation: Pour into a collins glass filled with broken ice and add a spiral of lemon. Garnish with an orange wedge and cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Russian Bear
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Menta
preparation: Pour ingredients into a chilled shot glass stir and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Candy Cane
preparation: Pour the Godiva milk chocolate liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Rumple Minze on top. Tastes just like a chocolate covered candy cane.

name: Caramilk
preparation: Pour ingredients (in order) into a shot glass then it's bottoms up!

name: Chocolate Honeybee
preparation: Pour Barenjager in a shot glass and top with Godiva.

name: Beaubetween
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps into a shot glass. Add the creme de cacao then layer the tequila rose on top using the back of a spoon and serve.

name: Chocolate Slam
preparation: First add the chocolate syrup smoothly on the bottom of the glass. Mix in the vodka and follow with coca-cola. Serve.

name: Vodka and Apple Juice
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass over three or four ice cubes. Fill with apple juice stir and serve.

name: Linux Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with Coca-cola garnish with lime peel and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #7
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the amaretto top with the Coca-cola and serve.

name: Mallis 97
preparation: Shake ingredients in a glass with a few ice cubes.

name: Jagermilch
preparation: Put both ingredients into a shooter glass and shoot.

name: Kinky Orgasm
preparation: Pour bailey's amaretto and kahlua into a highball glass. Fill with milk add strawberries or vanilla ice-cream if desired and serve.

name: Kahlua and Iced Cream
preparation: Mix in a blender by adding the ice cream first followed by the milk then add the kahlua. Blend until smooth.

name: Bull and Bear
preparation: Pour the bourbon curacao lime juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Coffee Crisp
preparation: Add four ingredients and shake well pour into old-fashioned glass. Do not use ice.

name: Gummi Bear
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve with a straw.

name: Kahlodster
preparation: Pour each shot into a cup filled with ice cubes. Shake three times and serve.

name: Chocolate Boobie
preparation: Place all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Midnight Oil
preparation: Mix in the shot glass. (Ingredients should not be chilled.)

name: RumRunner's RubyRed
preparation: Pour vodka and ruby red grapefruit juice into a large ice-filled glass. Top with tonic water pour into a seperate glass (to mix) and serve.

name: Vodka Sonic
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of soda and tonic to taste and garnish with a wedge of lime. Serve.

name: Volga Volga
preparation: Stir liquors over crushed ice in a small highball glass. Fill with tonic water and serve.

name: Blue Ice Mountain
preparation: Combine the first three ingredient into a high-ball glass. Stir well. Top with club soda.

name: Drawbridge
preparation: Fill a white wine glass with ice and fill most of the way with white wine. Top with carobnated water and a splash of blue curacao. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Caribbean Smoked Torch
preparation: Mix all the ingredients except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter using the 1/2 oz. of 151 lighting it until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke that is what distinguishes this cocktail.

name: Charles's Caribbean
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a collins glass over ice. Garnish with pineapple chunks and a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Nappy Dugout
preparation: Build ingredients over two ice cubes in a highball glass and stir.

name: Blue Eyed Bitch
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Caribbean Queen
preparation: Fill glass with handful of ice and add ingredients. Then mix.

name: Fuzzy Hippo
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice. Transfer to a shaker shake well and pour back into the glass.

name: Caribbean Blue Jello Shots
preparation: Mix the jello mix with the boiling water until powder is fully dissolved and then add the rest of the water and the alcohol. Pour the mixture into either shot glasses or paper cups and chill as per usual.

name: Dreamin' Caribbean Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice combine the Midori Bacardi rum and pineapple juice. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Then strain the contents into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Rinse shaker then fill again with ice. Combine the blue Curacao and Coco Lopez cream of coconut. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Then strain contents into the same glass in three seperate spot pours around the inner wall of the glass. You now have created a cocktail with the appearence of the Caribbean ocean having the patchwork look of rich blue and sea green waters.

name: Caribbean Hot Chocolate
preparation: Combine ingredients in an Irish coffe mug. Stir and top with a puff of whipped cream. Add a dash of chocolate shavings or cinammon for garnish.

name: Caribbean Milkshake
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice cubes and blend well. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Butterscotch Ice Cream
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass using ice cold milk and/or several ice cubes.

name: Peachy Amaretto
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a 12-oz parfait glass filled with finely shaven ice and serve.

name: Ice Cream Hogarth
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blend and blend well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Maple Syrup Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with cracked ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Rhubarb Syrup
preparation: 1. Remove strings from rhubarb wash and cut into 1/2 pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. 2. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean dry bottle and cork tightly. 3. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.

name: Cough Syrup #2
preparation: Pour in Hot Damn then add grape soda and then top off with cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry if you can avoid choking on it.

name: Grandpa's Cough Medicine
preparation: Add vodka rum whisky red wine and cranberry juice to shaker filled about 3/4 full with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into large highball glass with ice top off with ginger ale and stir if needed. (If preferred substitute cranberry juice for another dark juice - cherry grape ect.)

name: Cry Baby Blues
preparation: Serve with shaved ice.

name: Anabolic Steroid #2
preparation: Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass - Cointreau on top and serve.

name: Piggelin
preparation: Mix in a glass one-quarter filled with ice.

name: Green Russian
preparation: Mix both ingredients together and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Emerald Eye
preparation: Add each ingredient to the shot glass. Color should be a bright emerald green.

name: Daphrine Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka curacao and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda to taste and serve.

name: Stigmata
preparation: Pour vodka into an ice-filled highball glass. Add Red Bull then add Chambord raspberry liqueur. Stir briefly and serve.

name: AA Discount
preparation: Mix the vodka with the Tabasco sauce. Add the Red Bull and drink immediately.

name: Calpol
preparation: Pour Smirnoff Ice into a pint glass. Add the vodka. Fill up with Red Bull and serve.

name: Mac Dawg
preparation: Add a 1/2 can of Red Bull and 1 shot of vodka to a glass with some ice. Finally add a splash of grenadine.

name: Burgundy Bomb
preparation: Pour cold red bull into rocks glass. Vombine Merlot and Stoli Raz with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain over the top of the Red Bull so as to mix the wine and vodka with the Red Bull nicely but not kill off the carbonation in the Red Bull.

name: Busted Nut
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
preparation: Shake and strain then pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a flag or a flag and a pineapple wedge if carried by your bar.

name: Killer Kool-Aid #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well add a straw and serve.

name: Canadian Princess
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps melon liqueur and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: Killer Kool-Aid
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Serve unstirred.

name: Nutty Club
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brazilian Bitch
preparation: Build ingredients in order listed in a highball glass Coca-cola on top and serve.

name: Lash
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add vodka and amaretto. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Christian Killer
preparation: Fill a shot glass halfway with Everclear (or a suitable substitute preferrably 150-proof and up). Add Bailey's irish cream and creme de menthe and shoot.

name: Black Cherry Kool-Aid
preparation: Equal parts Amaretto Melon Liquer and Vodka. Splash Southern Comfort. Fill with Cranberry. Shake and serve.

name: Fuzzy Cooter
preparation: Add the shots and fill the rest with ginger ale lemonade and orange juice to taste.

name: Headless Horseman
preparation: Put vodka and bitters into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes fill with ginger ale and stir. Add the orange slice and serve.

name: SherryBear's Lemonade
preparation: Lemonade made from frozen concentrate works best. Don't use Kool-Aid type lemonade. For a twist also try Pink Lemonade.

name: Osiris
preparation: Pour the vodka over crushed ice in a highball glass. Pour in the Pepsi. Squeeze the orange wedge letting the juice drip into the glass. Serve.

name: Blue Lemonade
preparation: Mix into punch bowl and make sure that the koolaid is already pre measurable with sugar already added. Be careful hard to taste alcohol so intoxication sets in quickly!

name: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
preparation: 1. Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. 2. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

name: Pink Lemonade
preparation: Shake and serve on the rocks.

name: California Lemonade
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Glo-Tini
preparation: Shake the Everglo and vodka together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a red wine glass. Float ginger ale on top. Garnish with a lime and serve.

name: Hale Bopper
preparation: Pour the citrus vodka peach schnapps and lemonade into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Fickle Pickle
preparation: Pour the vodka Midori melon liqueur Crown Royal whisky and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sweet and sour mix to taste. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass garnish with a cherry flag and serve.

name: Alien Urine
preparation: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori Malibo and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

name: Cum in Your Panties
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps Chambord raspberry liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Off Your Ass In A Glass
preparation: Add all ingredients to a glass stir and drink straight.

name: Bloody Coochie
preparation: Fill a glass half full of ice. Pour in the ingredients in order. Stir or shake. Serve.

name: Berry Me In The Sand
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a small highball glass and serve.

name: Needle in Your Eye
preparation: Just put it all together in a glass with crushed ice and mix well.

name: Shag by the Shore
preparation: Build the midori and orange into the collins glass filled with ice then pour peach schnapps and cranberry into mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into glass so it floats above orange & midori. Float Blavod vodka on top.

name: Beer Breezer
preparation: Add freezer chilled vodka to frosted glass add tabasco and celery salt top up with very cold very strong lager.

name: Bloody Mariana
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass add a stick of celery and serve.

name: Burn Cocktail
preparation: Fill a shot glass half full with vodka and add several drops of tabasco sauce. Add a half dash of salt and pepper stir and shoot.

name: Ectoplasm
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nasty Pablo
preparation: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into an ice-filled pint glass. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

name: Bloody Pearl Harbor
preparation: Stir well with ice. Adding a few drops of hot sauce for flavor is optional.

name: Bullshot
preparation: Combine vodka and beef boullion with four ice cubes in a mixing glass. Add salt and pepper to taste stir and strain into a chilled wine glass.

name: Bloody Butrum
preparation: Roll all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a pint glass over ice and serve.

name: Bullshot #3
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Sangrita
preparation: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!

name: Dirty Bloody Martini
preparation: Put all ingredients into a shaker except olives and shake until shaker is frosted. Pour into cocktail glass add olives and serve.

name: Bloody Tory
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's whiskey Margarita mix beer lychee juice 2 peeled lychees (without seed) into a cocktail glass with ice cubes. Salt the rim of glass and serve.

name: Shellshock
preparation: Pour clamato juice over salt pepper and lemon. Then add beer slowly as it will fizz up.

name: Bloody Arctic Marina
preparation: Add celery salt lemon juice and Tabasco sauce to a pitcher. Add vodka fill with clamato juice. Place pitcher in freezer for 1 to 2 hours until slushy.

name: Cary Grant
preparation: Fill a tumbler or old-fashioned glass with ice. Squeeze juice of one lime (or less to taste) then pour equal parts of tia maria and vodka. Mix well and garnish with a lime wedge. Originally drank by Cary Grant from whom it took it's name.

name: Blue-on-Blue Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka curacao and angostura into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Cosmonaut
preparation: Mix really well and serve.

name: White Trash
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge. Ingredients can be varied to taste.

name: Fire On Ice
preparation: Pour vodka in a highball glass. Fill balance of glass with cider stir and serve. Add ice cubes if you like.

name: Boswandeling
preparation: Just add all ingredients and add quite a lot of Angostura and try to make sure that the Angostura is mixed through the drink.

name: Big Daddy
preparation: Pour over ice & stir.

name: Pink Elephant Ears
preparation: Mix pink lemonade per instructions on can. Add vodka slices of lime and lots of ice. Mix well.

name: Gipsy
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tovarich Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Vodka Russian
preparation: Combine ingredients in a tall glass with ice cubes and serve.

name: American Leroy
preparation: Mix in a blender and pour into a highball glass.

name: Spooge
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin shake like a wild man and strain into a martini glass.

name: Iron Butterfly
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add kahlua and irish cream and stir. Garnish with 1 - 3 optional filbert nuts.

name: Nutty Belgian
preparation: Serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Tuaca Nutter
preparation: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

name: Kahlua Kiss
preparation: Pour kahlua half-way in a champagne flute filled with crushed ice. Add creme de noyaux top with cream and serve.

name: Nutty Bitch
preparation: Pour first 5 ingredients into a stainless steel container over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with frangelico and serve.

name: Chocolate Black Russian
preparation: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Nutty-Tini
preparation: Pour the vodka amaretto almond liqueur Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Panama Deluxe
preparation: Shake all ingredients together and serve in a tumbler over ice.

name: Russian Roulette
preparation: 1. Fill two or more shot glasses with the kahlua and vodka and place a slice of orange on the top of each glass. 2. Pour sambuca seperately into a wine glass and ignite. Pour onto the shots and allow to burn briefly. Extinguish shoot the drink and chase with a bite of the sambuca-soaked orange slice.

name: Razzleberry
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve in a collins glass.

name: Green Scorpion
preparation: Mix jack daniels vodka and blue curacao with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Top with 7-up to taste and serve.

name: CV Special
preparation: Pour the port into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the sambuca followed by the WKD and serve.

name: Sunflower Highball
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Apple Screw
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add one shot of vodka and one shot of apple schnapps. Top with orange juice and mix well.

name: The Silk Cricket
preparation: Mix all ingredience in a shaker with ice and serve in either Old Fashion glass with ice or Neat in a Martini Glass

name: Pocima
preparation: Pour beer into a punch bowl. Add vodka orange juice and plenty of ice cubes. Stir and serve cold.

name: Green and Mean
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Key Lime Pie #2
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: John Deer
preparation: Pour the lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite soda and serve.

name: Green Pussy #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: La Pussy
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jolly Green Giant
preparation: Mix just like you would a screwdriver except substitute with lime vodka.

name: Virgin Pussy
preparation: Pour both watermelon and cinnamon schnapps into a shot glass. Add sugar and serve.

name: Guttersnipe
preparation: Pour the Finlandia lime vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Cointreau orange liqueur then Kerns guava juice. Squeeze in a lime wedge and serve.

name: Miller's Killer Cocktail
preparation: Fill a glass 3/4 full of ice. Pour cherries and cherry juice over ice. Add lime vodka and sprite. Shake once briskly to mix and get a fizz on top of the drink. Serve.

name: Lime Avenger
preparation: Pour the lime vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew and serve.

name: Wet Pussy
preparation: Pour the chambord irish cream and milk or cream into a shaker with ice. Shake strain and pour into a champagne saucer.

name: Bald Estonian
preparation: Pour the tequila Vana Tallin cream liqueur and vodka into a highball glass. Add the milk and cocoa powder and stir everything together. Serve with a drinkstick.

name: Pink Pussy Slam
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a stainless steel shaker with ice and shake until completely cold. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Pink Flamingo #2
preparation: Add crushed ice vanilla schnapps and grenadine to a hurricane glass. Add a few splashes of orange juice and fill with cream. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Dreamsicle #4
preparation: Pour the schnapps into the orange juice and stir.

name: Vanilla Creamsicle
preparation: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add cold milk stir and serve immediately.

name: Dreamsicle #3
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps then orange juice and at last milk. Stir vigorously until mixed.

name: Golden Star
preparation: Place two scoops of ice-cream in a blender add liquor and blend until milkshake-consistancy.

name: Scooby Snack #2
preparation: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

name: Dr. Feelgood
preparation: Drink or pour out a couple oz of the Dr. Pepper (down to bottom of the buldge of a 20-oz bottle) then top off with Dr. McG's. If your soda isn't cold the drink can be poured over ice but it's better cold and straight up.

name: Piggelin #2
preparation: Mix in a glass one-quarter filled with ice.

name: Moles Juice
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum Southern Comfort and blue curacao into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Add sour mix and pineapple juice according to personal tastes and serve.

name: Japanese Sex
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass with a small scoop of crushed ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Gentle Sun Tan
preparation: Pour amaretto and coconut rum into glass. Add all the juices and shake.

name: Donkey Semmen
preparation: Put 4 ice cubes in shaker. Add ingredients. shake well and serve in a margarita glass. Garnish with lime.

name: Grand Blue
preparation: Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Coconut Pie
preparation: Serve with or without ice.

name: Physcadelic Summer
preparation: Pour the Parfait Amour Malibu rum Cointreau blue curacao and grenadine into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Drizzle grenadine over the top garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.

name: MacLaren F1
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple Heaven
preparation: Pour blue curacao and Malibu into an old-fashioned glass. Add Sprite or 7-up and grenadine to taste. Place a raspberry in the drink and allow to settle to the bottom.

name: Almond Joy #3
preparation: Measure in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Malibu Massage
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker glass over ice. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: 7 Coconuts
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass and serve.

name: Tropical Martini
preparation: Pour Amaretto into a chilled glass then add Malibu Rum. Stir and serve. The ingredients should be well chilled before use.

name: Evil Tongue
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker over ice. Shake and strain.

name: Stoner On Acid
preparation: Shake Malibu Rum and Aliz on ice. Strain into glass. Stir in Jgermeister.

name: Mali P&S
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice and serve.

name: Green Coconut
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Jack Me Off
preparation: Pour the Applejack brandy and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Suntanned Malibu Surfer
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a rocks/old-fashioned glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Melon Sour
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Eskimo Joe's Drink
preparation: Add rum fruits ice juice and yoghurt to a blender. Ensure the orange is peeled and seedless. Cut seeds out of apple. Blend for 1 minute and you're ready for the eskimo.

name: Class Act
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice shake then strain into a rocks glass full of ice. Drinker will have to constantly mix the drink in his glass as the Advocaat will settle.

name: Tropical Kermit Piss
preparation: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

name: Grinch
preparation: Mix ingredients pour over ice and let chill. Shake strain and serve.

name: Tropical Lullaby
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Could be garnished with a piece of pineapple.

name: Malibu Snapper
preparation: Fill one-quarter of a cocktail glass with malibu rum and fill the rest with snapple.

name: Afghan Monkey
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Clarence
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Cotton Candy
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a blender. Blend well pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apple Coconut Sour
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake and pour into an old fashioned glass over cracked ice and serve.

name: Voodoo
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Junior Mint
preparation: Combine all ingredients with ice shake and strain into old-fashioned glass.

name: Kryptonite #2
preparation: Layer ingredients in above order into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Serve.

name: Azzuro
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass and garnish with fruit.

name: Jungle Power
preparation: Add a handful of ice to a glass. Fill the glass with 2/3 of ice tea (peach or lemon) and add 1/3 of Pisang Ambon. Take a slice of lemon and put in at the top of the glas.

name: Blue Punch
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Green Tree Frog
preparation: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink. Allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity so the limes may take effect.

name: Hot Wet and Sticky
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Magic Dew
preparation: Mix equal parts blue maui and mountain dew in a hurricane glass.

name: Little Green Frog
preparation: Prepare lemon-lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients. Pour over ice into hurricane glasses.

name: Phantasmic Explosion
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Veterinary
preparation: Pour alcohol over ice cubes in a tall glass. Add lime juice and sprite or 7-up. Stir well.

name: Torombolo
preparation: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass and add the licor 43. Mix well and serve cold.

name: Pisang Cold
preparation: Combine in a highball glass with two to three ice cubes shake and serve.

name: Purple Honker
preparation: Pour schnapps and Maui into a highball glass and fill the rest with 7-Up.

name: Red Zalo
preparation: Pour pisang ambon lemon squash and ice cubes into a blender and mix. Pour into a tall glass add sprite and strawberry syrup and serve.

name: Spring
preparation: Mix gently and add ice cubes. Serve with a straw.

name: Horny Shamrock
preparation: Pour the hawaiian schnapps triple sec and orange juice (to taste) into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Passionate Toro
preparation: Stir ingredients together on the rocks in a highball glass and serve.

name: Alligator Sperm
preparation: Pour equal parts of Midori melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a shot glass. Top off with a touch of cream and serve.

name: Harley Davidson
preparation: In a mixing tin add baileys irish cream and midori melon liqueur over ice. Stir and strain into a 4 oz. rocks glass top with jagermeister and serve.

name: Brain Hemmorhage #2
preparation: Layer the midori melon liqueur followed by Sambuca then Bailey's irish cream. Add drops of grenadine to give the effect of a bleeding brain and serve.

name: Bob Marley
preparation: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass.

name: Loch Ness Monster
preparation: Layer into a glass in the above order.

name: Shit On Grass
preparation: First add half a shot of Midori Melon Liqueur then pour Kahlua to top it off.

name: Alien Nipple
preparation: Add Butterscotch first layer Irish cream on top and pour in melon liqueur.

name: Barenana Popsicle
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Sexy Alligator
preparation: Pour Midori melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini/cocktail glass. Add amaretto by pouring close to the inner edge of the glass; allow to sink to the bottom. Float jagermeister on top; if needed hold spoon to edge of glass while pouring into the spoon. Serve; might not look nice but tastes a treat.

name: Melon Popper
preparation: Fill a shot glass 1/4 way full with your chosen flavor of Pop Rocks popping candy (preferably strawberry or watermelon). Add Midori melon liqueur and shoot.

name: Nanogram
preparation: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with butterscotch schnapps then sink the Midori slowly and float Baileys on top. Chug.

name: Monsen Miser
preparation: Build the ingredients in a shot glass in the above order and serve.

name: Brain Matter
preparation: Mix Midori & peppermint schnapps in glass layer Bailey's on top.

name: Frog on a Wire
preparation: Pour Amp energy drink into tall slender glass. ignite shot of bacardi 151' and quickly but carefully drop entire shot glass and all into the energy drink so that the flame is extinguished. and then drink quickly. (note: if this procedure is not carried out quickly then the rim of the shot glass may burn the drinkers lip.)

name: Gin Gin Highball
preparation: Build ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Dubonnet Highball
preparation: Pour dubonnet over ice cubes in a collins glass and fill with ginger ale. Add a spiral of lemon peel and serve.

name: Resolute Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apple Buck
preparation: Add to an ice-filled highball glass with the spent shell of the lemon.

name: Irish Whiskey Highball
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Gin Cocktail
preparation: Stir gin and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Americano Highball
preparation: Build campari and sweet vermouth in highball glass and fill with seltzer water. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Big Brothers
preparation: Combine ingredients on-the-rocks (over ice cubes) in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Fino Martini
preparation: In a mixing glas half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Anejo Highball
preparation: Build in a highball glass and fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange slice and serve.

name: Bermuda Highball
preparation: Pour brandy gin and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water if preferred.)

name: Pint of Mad Out Of It
preparation: Start with the Southern Comfort. Pour the bottle of Smirnoff Ice into your selected glass along with the dash of blackcurrent juice. Place crushed ice on top! (note: Ice isn't necessary)

name: Blue Midnight
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass stir well and serve.

name: The Royce
preparation: Fill a 12-16 oz glass or cup full with ice. Add up to 4 oz of Grey Goose vodka and fill the remainder with Smirnoff Ice. Squeeze lime juice into mixture and add lime. Stir and enjoy! Perfect for a refreshing drink at the lake! Be careful - more than two can make it hard to walk talk or boat!

name: Blue Insanity
preparation: Place some ice in a highball glass. Add the UV blue curacao and triple sec. Top with Smirnoff and serve.

name: Mendolsohn
preparation: Pour the Malibu mango rum into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Coca-cola then top it off with Smirnoff Triple Black and serve.

name: Big Kapowski
preparation: Split the 12 oz. bottle of Smirnoff Ice between 3 Pint Glasses. Pour 1 oz. of Blue Curaco into shot glasses for each pint. Take the shot of Blue Curaco and DROP it into the pint of Smirnoff Ice. Drink and enjoy!

name: Hilbert Effect
preparation: Mix all ingredients except for mints in a pitcher then add crushed mints and stir until the mints are completely dissolved.

name: Complete Mess
preparation: Place an equal amount of Smirnoff Ice into three seperate half-pint glasses (from a full bottle of Smirnoff Ice). Add both half a shot of cointreau and half a shot of cassique to each. Mix the ingredients. Fill with coke and add ice. Stir well. Serves 3.

name: Black on Black
preparation: Fill half a pint glass with the Smirnoff Black Ice and then slowly fill the rest of the glass with Guinness. The two should stay seperated. Serve.

name: Green Frothy Monkey
preparation: Shake with ice until frothy and serve in a tall glass with cherry and orange garnish

name: Chocolate Sailor
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled wine glass. Add the cola and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Lime Lighter
preparation: Pour the dark rum triple sec Rose's lime juice and fresh lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Daiquiri Natural
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Key Lime
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry and serve.

name: Key Punch
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime speared with a cherry and serve.

name: Brown Derby
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice or serve straight-up.

name: Red Eyed Sailor
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cup of ice shake and pour into Mason jar. Add grenadine or Dr. Pepper to taste for less of a pirate taste. Pour and roar.

name: Sailor Venus
preparation: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

name: Sailor Moon
preparation: Shake white rum charleston follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with champagne garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Deansgate Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Slippery Sailor
preparation: Mix ingredients and strain into the shot glass or pour the Captain Morgan's over the Bailey's in the shot glass.

name: Sailor Jerry Butter Rum
preparation: Pour the Sailor Jerry spiced rum DeKuyper Buttershots liqueur Smirnoff vanilla vodka and Jones cream soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Olympia
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sailor Mercury
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: S.O.B.
preparation: Drink this just like a shot of tequila. Mix the cognac and cointreau together in the shot glass. Lick between your thumb and forefinger and sprinkle sugar on it. Then lick the sugar drink the shot and suck on the lemon wedge when you're done.

name: Lemon Drop #4
preparation: Fill a shot glass with rum. Dip lemon wedge in sugar bite and hold the juice in your mouth. Shoot the rum and lick your lips.

name: Cherry Lemon Drop
preparation: Combine equal parts of Absolut Citron vodka and sweet and sour mix over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well; add juice of one lemon slice and grenadine then strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle sugar around the rim of the shot glass and serve.

name: Lemon Drop #7
preparation: Fill a mug half way with bacardi then top off with lemon kool-aid or lemonade.

name: Delilah
preparation: Add gin cointreau and lemon juice to an ice-filled shaker. Shake for 30 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Perfect Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Mix the Grey Goose vodka triple sec sugar and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well to make sure sugar is blended. Pour strained liquor into a sugar-rimmed martini glass and garnish with a twisted peel of lemon. NOTE: To create a sugar-rimmed glass take a lemon wedge and rub the drinking surface of the glass so it is barely moist. Dip the edge of the glass into sugar.

name: Smoked Martini
preparation: Pour the scotch and vodka into a pitcher and squeeze in the juice from a slice of lemon. Mix with ice let stand for a few minutes to chill then pour into glasses with ice. Add lemon to taste.

name: Tuaca Lemon Drop
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Tanga
preparation: In blender add Orange Tang Mix Absolut Vodka and ice. Blend until smooth.

name: Hot-T
preparation: Combine in a heat-proof cup and sweeten to taste. Add a slice of orange and serve.

name: Lemon Drop Martini #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes; shake well. Swirl half a lemon around the rim of a margarita glass and dip in sugar. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and serve.

name: German Chocolate
preparation: Pour shot of smirnoff and frangelico into short glass. Heavily coat the lemon slice. Bite the lemon don't swallow the juice. Leave the sugar on your lips and take the shot. Lick the sugar off your lips. Taste like german chocolate w/out any chocolate in the mix.

name: Perfect Lemon Drop
preparation: Mix above ingredients in shaker shake hard and strain into a 2-oz shot glass. Finish off by coating lemon wedge with sugar - bite into it after taking the shot.

name: Lemon Drop #5
preparation: Pour over cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass with sugar around its rim.

name: Lemon Drop #8
preparation: Combine equal parts of each ingredient in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Pink Pussycat
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Pineapple Martini
preparation: Pour into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously for a few seconds; strain into a martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Upside-Down Martini
preparation: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Beaver Shot
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass and serve.

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake #2
preparation: Pour Irish cream vodka DeKuyper Buttershots and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Slowly add a splash of grenadine to the bottom of each shot glass and serve.

name: Don't Touch My Mustache
preparation: Pour all three into a shaker half-filled with ice. Cover shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Enjoy!

name: Frozen Pine
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/4 cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and transfer to a tulip glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Nun on the Rag
preparation: Pour the vanilla vodka into a shot glass. Slowly add the grenadine and serve.

name: Cherry Cheese Cake
preparation: Combine Stoli vodka and grenadine in a shaker with ice. Add a splash of pineapple juice. Shake strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Wallick Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hawaiian Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chelsea Sidecar
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chelsea Hotel
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: White Spider #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

name: Dirty Futo
preparation: Stir together in a cup and serve.

name: 73 Bus
preparation: Mix all three ingredients with ice in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dirty Fetus
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass. Layer the Bailey's on top. Add the drops of grenadine creating tiny red veins in the layers. Serve.

name: Afterbirth
preparation: Mix schnapps and grenadine. Add Bailey's last. Wait until the Bailey's curdles then shoot.

name: Clit Lickin' Cowgirl
preparation: Layer the Bailey's Irish cream over the butterscotch schnapps in a large shot glass. Add a few drops of grenadine and serve.

name: Traffic Light
preparation: Layer Grenadine Galliano and Midori.

name: Cerebellum
preparation: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with vodka. Add the grenadine for color. Finally pour in a little Bailey's. The bailey's will sit in the drink and look like a brain stem and all.

name: Romona Banana
preparation: Shake ingredients strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pouce Coupe Puddle
preparation: Pour in order into a shot glass.

name: Speedy Gonzales
preparation: Pour Bailey's and Amaretto into a shot glass swish and throw it back.

name: Ship's Cat
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass over one small lump of ice and serve.

name: Cheshire Cat
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

name: Golden Eye
preparation: Pour goldschlager schnapps into a glass add a nut then layer the baileys irish cream on top.

name: Brainwave
preparation: Shake rum and amaretto in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and add Irish cream. The cream will clump together at the bottom.

name: Zorro's Revenge
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Eskimo Joe
preparation: Add the bailey's irish cream and then layer the milk creme de menthe and cinnamon schnapps.

name: Cat and Fiddle
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky Cointreau Pernod and Dubonnet Blanc into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Minty Nipples
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream butterscotch liqueur and rumple minze into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 seconds. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Bailey's Hot Shot
preparation: Put Irish Cream in large glass and microwave on HIGH power for half a minute or so. - While that's going rim the shot glasses with sugar - Pour heated Bailey's into shot glasses and serve immediately.

name: Black Cat
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Dong
preparation: Chill and strain together into shot glass.

name: Bailey's and Amaretto
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Johnny Cat
preparation: Place gin or vodka triple sec vermouth grenadine and ice into a shaker. Shake well and pour into a red wine glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.

name: Celtic Kick
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Peppermint Patty (Northern Style)
preparation: Served chilled. Pour equally into a shot glass.

name: German Lemon Bomb
preparation: Stir or if making in bulk put a lid on it and shake.

name: Vicker's Treat
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Detox
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a pitcher. Serve into punch cups and serve.

name: Corbob
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Irish Mint
preparation: Pour the milk first and then the irish cream - the parts are only guesses I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough creme de menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.

name: Drainpipe
preparation: Pour Bailey's and Curacao in a glass stir. Add Coca-Cola slowly. No ice serve with a straw. Blue Curacao may be used if you are out of green.

name: Blind Russian
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add all liqueurs. Add milk. shake.

name: Choco Banana Smash
preparation: Combine the irish cream vanilla extract light cream vanilla ice cream and banana in a blender with one small scoop of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. Add a slice of banana on a cocktail pick and place across the top and serve.

name: Bailey's Banana Vanilla Thrilla
