preparation: Add all liquids in blender with banana and ice cream; blending until smooth. Add ice and sugar and pulse until a smoothie consistency is reached. Garnish with coconut. Makes 2-3 500ml servings. For a fancier garnish use the head of a tropical flower.

name: Irish Chocolate Milk
preparation: Put a few ice cubes into a highball glass. Add shot of Bailey's and the half-shot of Creme de Cacao. Stir together before adding the milk then add the rest.

name: Mooing Irish Pepsi
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Connecticut Bulldog
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Chris' Flaming Skull
preparation: Mix equal parts of Bailey's irish cream butterscotch schnapps and DeKuyper Hot Damn! in a mug. Stir well with a spoon. Heat in the microwave until warm and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Abbot's Dream
preparation: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass.

name: Irish Hot Chocolate
preparation: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate. Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and a cherry.

name: White Ape
preparation: Make hot chocolate add bailey's and ground cinnamon. Float whipped cream on top.

name: Baileyfloat
preparation: Fill glass with ice then add Bailey's and root beer. Stir. Serve in frosted beer mug. Tastes like a root beer float.

name: Mint Chocolate Dream
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream creme de menthe and hot chocolate into a mug. Top with whipped cream and shaved chocolate pieces (optional) and serve.

name: Bailey's Dream Shake
preparation: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day!

name: Leprechaun's Lunch
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream creme de menthe and creme de cacao over two ice cubes in a small (8-oz) highball glass or equivalent. Fill with milk stir and serve.

name: Coffee Fantasy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Bulldog Cooler
preparation: Pour the gin cointreau orange juice and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with water and serve.

name: Black Forest Cake
preparation: Pour the Kahlua into a brandy snifter followed by the cherry brandy. Float the Bailey's irish cream on top by pouring it slowly over the back of the spoon pressed against the inside of the glass. Garnish the glass with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Tummy Blower
preparation: Mix together and drink fast!

name: Bailey's Shake #2
preparation: Blend all ingredients together in a blender until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Moo Moo
preparation: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with a large straw.

name: Irish Cream #1
preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend on lowest setting until frothy or well blended. Serve in wine glasses.

name: New Hampshire Bulldog
preparation: Pour Alize VSOP white lable cognac over ice in a tall collins glass. Add Fanta blueberry soda. Garnish with a slice of tangerine stir and serve.

name: Slippery Eggs
preparation: Stir ingredients well so that the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

name: Bailey's Shake
preparation: Pour all ingredients (bailey's to taste) into a blender and puree for several seconds or until smooth. Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: McShake
preparation: Combine in a blender - chocolate syrup to taste. Blend until desired thickness.

name: Citronade
preparation: Mix lemonade and absolut citron into a collins glass shake or stir add ice and drink.

name: Magic Mountain Dew
preparation: Pour the Absolut Citron vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with mountain dew stir briefly and serve.

name: Absolut Citron Limonata
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: The Betty Ford
preparation: Add grenadine (based on desired sweetness) followed by absolut. Add ice and then sprite (her preferred mixing).

name: Good Fortune
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Fuzzy Bunny
preparation: Mix in a colins glass until powder is dissolved. Serve.

name: Meloncholy Baby
preparation: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Sexual Trance
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain over ice cherry garnish.

name: Snowshot
preparation: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

name: Mogadon
preparation: Pour absolut citron into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up add a splash of fruit juice and stir.

name: Lakeside Lemonade
preparation: Pour the Absolut Citron and triple sec into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with sweet and sour mix and add a splash of lemon-lime soda and splash of cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Electric Lemonade
preparation: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Joy Ride
preparation: Muddle lemon and sugar in a mixing glass. Add ice absolut citron campari and sweet and sour. Shake well and dump into a hurricane glass. Spritz with soda.

name: Tropical Orgasm #3
preparation: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Pour over ice. Garnish with cherry.

name: Loopy Lemonade
preparation: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add absolut citron squeeze two lemon wedges and add three packages of sugar. Fill remainder of glass with 7-up and sweet and sour mix.

name: D & D Lay
preparation: Serve shaken not stirred.

name: Dib Dab
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice add all ingredients. Shake or stir vigorously. Top with lemonade to taste and serve.

name: What She's Having
preparation: Pour in vodka then fill with the orange juice. Add the amaretto which should mostly sink to the bottom. Splash in some grenadine to cloud the center of the drink. Serve without mixing or stirring.

name: Dignified Iced Tea
preparation: Use absolut citron or other citrus flavored vodka. Mix in highball glass and enjoy.

name: Absolutly Screwed Up
preparation: Shake it up it tasts better that way but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

name: Taste of Winter
preparation: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes

name: John Daly
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with equal parts lemonade/iced tea. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Citron and Sprite
preparation: Pour the Absolute Citron into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite and serve.

name: Roxy Special
preparation: Pour vodka's sour mix and lime juice into a shaker and fill with sprite. Shake briskly and strain into a highball glass over ice. Add a lemon slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Tropical Life Saver #2
preparation: Mix together in a tall glass.

name: Absolut Limousine
preparation: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

name: Spice and Ice
preparation: Mix all three on the rocks.

name: Moilanen
preparation: 1. Slice half a lemon into small slices. Extract the juice from the other half. 2. Add ice to a beer mug and pour in the lemon juice. Fill the rest of the glass with vodka and schweppes at a ratio of 1:2 respectively. Blend briefly.

name: Ice House Highball
preparation: Build the vodka and lemonade in a large pint glass filled with ice and top with a dash of creme de menthe. Garnish with an edible orchid flower.

name: Jedamski's Tropical Orgasm
preparation: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice. Coat the rim of the glass with sugar strain shaker contents over ice and add the cherry.

name: Greven
preparation: Pour vodka passoa and orange juice over ice in the glass. Add the blue curacao and the lime. Do not stir.

name: A Fuzzy Thing
preparation: Pour alcohol first then add the juice. A little sour mix is needed but not enough to overpower the juice. Shake before serving and make sure there isn't too much ice in the drink.

name: Forest Funk
preparation: Moisten the rim of the collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

name: Mazerati
preparation: Pour the absolut citron into a highball glass balance with cranberry juice and top with a little 7-up. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Moose Martini
preparation: Shake both ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with juniper berries macerated in vermouth and serve.

name: Boston Cream Pie
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes in equal parts. Shake vigorously. Pour into a margarita or large cocktail glass with a cocoa dipped rim and serve.

name: B-52 #3
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Thingy
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Milky Way #2
preparation: Layer the ingredients in the order listed into a shot glass and serve.

name: Horny Toad
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in order into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Captain Louie
preparation: Mix in order: Rum drop of Vanilla Kahlua drop of Vanilla.

name: Chocolate Russian
preparation: Pour the Van Gogh chocolate vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream to taste and serve.

name: Colorado Pucker
preparation: Fill cup with ice. Pour 1 part Apple Pucker pour 1 part Bacarde Limon pour 2 1/2 parts Red Bull. Stir. Enjoy!

name: Crack Juice
preparation: In a large container fill half way with ice. Pour in all contents and mix well. You are ready to serve.

name: Limey Bellows
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pavlova Supreme
preparation: Pour the vodka and creme de cassis into a red wine glass filled with finely shaven ice and serve.

name: Green Spade #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Otter Pop #2
preparation: Add liquors and sweet and sour mix to a cocktail shaker. Fill with 7-up or sprite and top with grenadine. Shake and strain into a pint glass over ice.

name: Sexy Lemonade
preparation: Pour into a large rocks glass filled with ice. Stir well garnish with two slices of lemon and serve.

name: The Mummy
preparation: Mix vodka triple sec and lemon juice in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice. Top off with club soda. Stir.

name: Splurge
preparation: Start with glass of soda then add other ingredients and stir.

name: Sexy Lemon Slam
preparation: Place a small sugar coated lemon wheel (approx.1/4 in.thick) into the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Pour above listed ingredients into a stainless steel shaker with ice shake until completely cold and pour into the prepared old-fashioned glass. Sip or slam.

name: Amavel on the Rocks
preparation: Add two parts cranberry to one part lemon juice and one part vodka. Serve on the rocks. Mix well. Rim glass with sugar.

name: Air Gunner
preparation: Build in a collins glass.

name: Cold Green Slime
preparation: Pour the Surge and vodka into a collins glass. Add a few ice cubes and stir well. Add the sugar gradually while sitrring carefully and serve.

name: Lemon Splash Martini
preparation: Mix vodka amaretto triple sec and a 1/2 squeeze of lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Citron Splash Martini
preparation: Combine the Absolut Citron Triple sec and juice of 1/3 lemon (~3/4 oz juice) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake. Use the lemon to wet the edge of a chilled martini or cocktail glass and dip the glass in sugar to coat the rim. Strain the mixture into the cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Pink Pillow
preparation: Pour the vodka into a beer mug and add grenadine until pink. Add equal parts of sour mix and ginger ale until full.

name: Cherry Vodka Greyhound
preparation: Pour vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up stir and serve.

name: Camel Concoction
preparation: Mix vodka and Mountain Dew soda in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Add a small splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Cherry Sour
preparation: Pit cherries. Muddle cherries in glass. Add vodka lemon juice and ice. Top with club soda and stir. Garnish with lemon and serve.

name: Ballistic Banana
preparation: Chill ingredients then combine in a cocktail glass.

name: Small Bomb
preparation: Serve on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Vodka Sour
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Love Birds
preparation: Pour the vodka sour mix dark rum and grenadine into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Axel
preparation: Add the vodka and Roncoco liqueur to a a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Pour into a shot glass and top with a bit of grenadine. Drink the shot cover the glass with your hand and with a straw inhale the alcohol vapor that lasts in the shot (with your hand still on it).

name: Black Russian #3
preparation: Stir briefly or until spoon disintegrates.

name: High-Octane Black Russian
preparation: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Apple Pie Shot #3
preparation: Pour ingredients in order listed into a shot glass.

name: Key Lime Cosmo
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime spiral. Serve.

name: Hula Girl
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Key Lime Martini #4
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a martini shaker over ice. Shake well until chilled and pour into a cockail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pure Ecstacy
preparation: Pour bailey's and kahlua into a blender until at most one-third full. Add enough ice to fill the blender. Blend on a low speed continually adding ice until a milkshake-consistancy. Mix in the vodka. Strain into wine glasses and serve.

name: Harrison Ford
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Backfire
preparation: Layer the Kahlua on the bottom then the Baileys then the Vodka.

name: Screaming Orgasm
preparation: Pour first vodka then Bailey's then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first

name: 73 Bus #2
preparation: Pour the gin triple sec and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour straight into a cocktail glass. Unsweetened cranberry juice is best if you don't like sweet drinks.

name: Cosmo Kurant
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge on the rim and serve.

name: Roll Me Over
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a cocktail glass with ice. Serve.

name: Cosmo Katie
preparation: Chill cocktail glass. Pour ingredients with ice into mixer and shake well. Serve straight up with a cherry.

name: Bloody Nightmare
preparation: Pour the vodka lime juice and cranberry juice into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Pink Lemonade #3
preparation: Pour equal parts of vodka and triple sec into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Add splashes of lime juice and grenadine and serve.

name: capital ONE
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with fresh lime wedge and serve.

name: Passionate Cosmo
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with some cracked ice. Shake and pour (incl. ice) into a martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cosmo Killer
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tequila Cosmo
preparation: Shake tequila triple sec fresh lime juice and cranberry juice together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and squeeze a further wedge of lime on top. Discard lime and serve.

name: Fruity Screaming Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Pour orange juice and peach schnapps in a punch bowl. Add the vodka. Pour the bottles of strawberry daiquiri mix in after. Stir a little. Serve.

name: The Better Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Mix ingredients together then freeze drink until slushy (usually 2 hours). Serve in highball glass and enjoy!

name: Not So Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps orange juice and grapefruit juice over crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange or lime and serve.

name: Fuzzy Hard Navel
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned or highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Fuzzy Logic #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Mix equal parts of each ingredient in a highball glass top with ice and serve.

name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Mix Peach Brandy Peach Schnapps and Triple Sec in a highball glass. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

name: Currant Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Grassy Knoll Cocktail
preparation: Mix Monster Energy Drink with Green Apple Vodka. Make sure the Monster is chilled and not put through a martini shaker because it is carbonated and shaking a carbonated beverage may cause undesired foaminess.

name: Apple Shooter
preparation: Shake the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker DeKuyper triple sec and Smirnoff Green Apple Twist together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cup and serve.

name: Ninja Turtle
preparation: Pour the vodka into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with the Hawaiian Punch juice. Add a lime slice and serve.

name: Applebottom Pimp
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff green apple twist into a cocktail glass and add the Pimp juice energy drink.

name: Apple Fairy
preparation: For this recipe make some apple juice ice cubes before you start. Then add 3 apple juice cubes to a cocktail glass. Add absinthe and apple vodka and fill with cider.

name: Appletini #2
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gala Appletini
preparation: In a shaker with ice pour in rum brandy apple syrup squeeze from half of a lemon wedge and 2 dashes of bitters. Shake hard and pour into a frosty martini cocktail glass. Top with a dash of cinnamon and garnish with a Gala apple slice. Now enjoy this perfect autumn apple pie like drink.

name: Cosmobellini
preparation: Pour vodka and cointreau into a shaker. Squeeze in the juice of one wedge of lime. Add peach puree a splash of cranberry juice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass top with prosecco and serve.

name: Creamsicle #4
preparation: Place about 4 ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Pour in Absolut Citron and fill the glass around three-quarters of the way with orange juice. Top off with grenadine stir and serve.

name: Midori Hack
preparation: Shake midori vodka and sweet and sour over ice in a tin. Prepare a large rocks glass by juicing lime garnish into the glass half filled with ice. Strain in the chilled cocktail add a splash of pineapple juice (upto half an ounce) and serve.

name: Inverted Pyramid Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with an orange twist.

name: Vicious Kiss
preparation: Pour into a cordial glass stir gently and serve.

name: Lemon Twist
preparation: Shake the vodka and vermouth with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: The Lunchbox
preparation: Chill and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: H2O Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with colored sugar. Garnish with a lemon slice and serve.

name: New York Lemonade
preparation: Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a frosted rim (lemon and sugar).

name: Melon Martini
preparation: Muddle the melon honey syrup maraschino liqueur and lime juice together in a large mixing glass. Add vodka and ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Aladdin Sane
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake allow to chill for 5 minutes re-shake and pour into a martini glass.

name: Gingervitas
preparation: Pour absolut citron and vermouth into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add ginger ale and serve.

name: Grown-up Lemonade
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec and amaretto over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill glass with desired amount of lemonade. Garnish with lemon slice and serve.

name: Waverunner
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Top with champagne. Squeeze and drop another wedge of lemon into the drink. (the other two should still be in the tin).

name: Kat Hinzman's Fresh Ink
preparation: Add a marachino cherry and some sugar along the rim and you're good to go.

name: Italian Stallion #2
preparation: Pour sambuca into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add Absolut Citron and orange juice and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail/martini glass garnish with a twist of orange peel. (To rim the glass with lemon and sugar is optional.) Serve.

name: Blue Cosmopolitan
preparation: Frost the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Stir absolut citron blue curacao grapefruit juice and sugar syrup in a mixing glass with ice to prevent cloudiness. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost - Hawaiian
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

name: Maxi
preparation: Take a large chilled cocktail glass and smear a lemon wedge around the rim. Coat the rim in sugar. Add a scoop of crushed ice to a cocktail shaker and add all ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain the concoction into a large cocktail glass (the drink should be a little fizzy with a bit of foam on the top). Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Absolut Evergreen
preparation: Mix pour over ice and top with bitter lemon.

name: French Cosmopolitan
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except grenadine) into a shaker shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Pour a drop of grenadine into the middle of the glass and let it fall to bottom. (It will color the stem red.) Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Hurlyburly
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with dried cranberries.

name: The Abba
preparation: Mix absolut citron with sprite add a twist of lime and stir.

name: Boom Shaka Laka
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a margarita glass mix and serve.

name: Thunder Peel
preparation: Shake it all chill and serve.

name: Suntory Cocktail
preparation: Shake strain into an iced cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jack-in-the-Green
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh lime wheel and a small slice of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bitter Evan
preparation: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into an old-fashioned or rocks glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well add Campari and serve.

name: Vodka Salty Dog
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes stir well and serve.

name: Firefly
preparation: Fill a highball glass with cubed ice. Stir in vodka and grapefruit juice. Add the grenadine after stirring and place it in the center of the drink.

name: Die Hard
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Fire Fly
preparation: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a highball glass with ice. Add grenadine stir and serve.

name: Salt Lick
preparation: Pour ingredients into a white wine glass filled with ice cubes and rimmed with salt. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Cranberry Vodka Slush
preparation: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve take out of freezer and scoop and serve with ginger ale if desired.

name: Seabreeze
preparation: Pour vodka over ice into highball glass. Add mixers. May be garnished with a wedge of lime.

name: Italian Greyhound
preparation: Stir the vodka and grapefruit juice together in a highball glass. Float the Campari over a barspoon onto the top and serve.

name: Limelight
preparation: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch
preparation: Mix Kool-Aid juice lemonade sugar and water. Add booze and ice cubes and let cool. Add champagne and ginger ale before serving. Adjust punch to party mood with more vodka.

name: Hunch Punch
preparation: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.

name: Little Beer
preparation: Pour Licor 43 into a shot glass. Layer cream slowly on top so that it resembles the 'head' on a beer.

name: Whoop Juice
preparation: Combine all together. If too strong add more soda. For more kick add more everclear.

name: A Little Green Man From Mars
preparation: Remove the stem from one mint green maraschino cherry and drop into a large shot glass. Pour in the jagermeister and rumple minze and serve.

name: Shark Attack Punch
preparation: Mix in a large container like a coleman cooler.

name: Arnold Palmer
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball or tall glass with ice stir and enjoy.

name: Trashcan Punch
preparation: Slice the fruit. I recommend strawberries oranges lemons and limes. Then mix the punch and everclear together in a clean trashcan with ice. Hawaiian punch is my preference but you can use any sort of fruit punch. Make sure you use ice and have a blast.

name: Mambabajamba
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps and Malibu coconut rum into a large punch bowl or bucket. Pour the pineapple juice in then pour in all the beer. Try using ice if desired maybe some pieces of pineapple. Serve to guests in punch cups or tall glasses.

name: Party Jungle Juice
preparation: Add all the ingredients in a large cooler. (Note: use 2 cans water to 1 can orange juice concentrate first). Make sure all fruit is bite size. Add whole round slices of lime and slices of 4 or more bananas. Let soak for 1-2 days and consume. You may soak the fruit just in the alcohol for a few hours before adding juices if you choose. Throw in bottles of frozen water to chill.

name: French 69
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a punch bowl stir and serve ice cold.

name: Bitchin' Apple Cider
preparation: Combine ingredients and stir.

name: Fish House Punch
preparation: Dissolve sugar in some of the water. Add juice and the rest of the water and stir. Add liquor 2-3 hours before serving and refridgerate. Serve in a punch bowl with ice.

name: Raspberry Sherbet Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients in a large punch bowl and serve.

name: Donkey Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a punchbowl and float orange slices on top.

name: Gordon Freeman
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Ladie's Jungle Juice
preparation: Cut up fruit (use 1 box of fresh strawberries) put into 2 one gallon containers. Add everclear let soak for a few hours add juice to containers. Use ladel to serve into beer cups or mugs then add sprite/7up to fill the cup.

name: PJ
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cooler add fruit and serve. A great party drink.

name: Limoncillo
preparation: Get a empty gallon container. Then put in the 3/4 gallons of water. Put the two cases of crystal light and add the rum. Mix.

name: Melon Breeze
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Pour in the Malibu coconut rum. Fill with pineapple juice top with Midori melon liqueur and serve.

name: Bum Juice
preparation: This is a very simple drink to make and a very cheap drink to make. Pour out (drink) approximately 750ml of the cheap soda (usually orange or lemon-lime soda). Then pour the bottle of cheap rum into the soda bottle. Turn the bottle up and down a few times to mix then open carefully so that it does not explode. Drink right out of the bottle with a friend. For best results drink in a public park.

name: Party Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Champagne Punch
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients and serve in punch cups.

name: Bionic Beaver
preparation: Put a little crushed ice in the bottom of the pitcher then the beer and then the shots. Then top off the pitcher with equal amounts of Orange Juice and 7-Up. Stir.

name: Tropical Hibiscus
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a iced punch bowl. Serve cold.

name: Hard Core Hunch Punch
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a large punch bowl or other container. Add ice to chill and serve.

name: Green Creeper
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice.

name: Napoleon's Mexican Winter
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mug followed by the cream and then the Courvoisier and stir them together. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds and serve.

name: Damage
preparation: Pour advocaat rum and vodka into a shaker with ice. Shake well pour over ice in a highball glass and top with lemonade.

name: Aviator Fuel
preparation: Fill a large cup or glass one-third full with lemonade. Add equal amounts of vodka and sprite and serve.

name: Porch Monkey
preparation: Pour vodka and grapefruit schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade stir well and serve.

name: Strong Badia Melonade
preparation: Pour ingredients into any glass that will hold them (no need to get fancy) stir and enjoy. You can add more Pucker's to desired flavor.

name: Courvoisier Strawberry Lemonade
preparation: Serve in a highball glass and top with the club soda.

name: Atomic Green
preparation: Pour the creme de menthe into a sugar frosted highball glass. Add the vodka and a few ice cubes. Top with lemonade and serve.

name: Hard Case
preparation: Stir strain into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Hard Rootbeer
preparation: Mix desired amount of Captain Morgan (I prefer 2 shots) and one 12 oz IBC Root Beer over ice. Goes down smooth!

name: Strawberry Lemonade
preparation: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

name: Lychee Caipiroska
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Muddle until all ingredients are blended and the ice is crushed. Serve in an old-fashioned glass. no garnish.

name: Raspberry Cordial
preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir until sugar is dissolved. Store in large bottles for 22 days. Pour into gift bottles and seal.

name: Campesina
preparation: Cut the lime into 8 wedges and place in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with granulated white sugar and crush together. Fill with crushed ice add tequila. Serve with two small straws.

name: Viva Villa
preparation: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon juice and dip into salt. Shake all ingredients with ice strain into the salt-rimmed glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Apple Slut
preparation: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.

name: Watermelon Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Cobalt Kiss
preparation: Mix vodka and blue curacao with 7-Up in an old fashioned glass over ice. Add lime juice. Stir. Garnish with twist of lime and serve.

name: Strawberry Cosmopolitan
preparation: Muddle the cointreau and lime juice with all but one half of the strawberries in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and ice shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the reserved strawberry half and serve.

name: Op Smash
preparation: Slice the lemon pieces in half and place into the bottom of a mixing glass. Add syrup and maraschino and muddle well. Add an old-fashioned glass of ice to the mixing glass then pour in the vodka. Shake well for 10 seconds and pour everything out into the old-fashioned glass. Add additional cracked ice where needed and serve.

name: Claret Lemonade
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a wine goblet over ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve.

name: Citrus Twist on Fire
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Cosmalize
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rosy Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Lemon Meringue
preparation: Shake well with ice strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Daydream Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients together well in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Citrus Neon
preparation: Pour the citrus vodka blue curacao Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass top with 7-up and serve.

name: Midtwinkle Martini
preparation: Combine spirits over ice in a cocktail shaker shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a segment or two of peeled clementine or tangelo and serve.

name: Ol' Dirty Bastard
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort Captain Morgan spiced Absolut vodka and Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Chiquita
preparation: Put lots of ice in your shaker. Then pour first the vodka then the creme de banane and lastly the milk over the ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glasses. Makes several shots.

name: Desert Bastard
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Mithering Bastard
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Paul Raspberry
preparation: Pour vodka into a shot glass ice optional. Add milk and a drop or two of grenadine.

name: The Power Of Milk
preparation: Stir sugar and vodka together in a cordial glass. Add milk and serve cold with a straw.

name: Storm Trooper
preparation: Mix ingredients together.

name: Commie Bastard
preparation: Pour the Stolichnaya Red Label vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew Code Red soda and serve.

name: Paisano
preparation: Pour vodka and frangelico into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with milk and shake.

name: Monkey Cum
preparation: Combine the milk and half-banana in a blender for several seconds until only slightly lumpy. Add the vodka and blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass add a straw and serve.

name: Angela's Cabin
preparation: Drop peanut butter into a shot glass. Fill most of the way with vodka leaving room for the milk. Serve with a spoon and chase with the peanut butter.

name: Harvey Cowpuncher
preparation: Mix together.

name: Dying Bastard
preparation: Place all ingredients into a tall glass over ice stir and serve.

name: Creamy Vodkanilla
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Jolly Rancher Jello Shots
preparation: Mix the boiling water with a package of green apple jell-o. Allow the jell-o to dissolve for 1 minute. Add chilled DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps; stir until well combined. Pour into 1-oz disposable shot glasses which can be found at most party and food supply stores. Refridgerate for several hours until jell-o sets. Makes about 20 shot-sized servings.

name: Apple Jolly Rancher
preparation: Chill in tumbler shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

name: Jolly Rancher
preparation: Shake melon liqueur and blueberry schnapps with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour add grenadine for color and stir. Add cherry on top and serve.

name: Giraffe
preparation: Pour midori melon liqueur into a hurricane glass over ice. Add vodka and pineapple juice then float the cranberry juice.

name: Apple Jolly Rancher #2
preparation: Miz one ounce each of Midori Apple Pucker Apple Vodka and Triple sec in a seperate glass and then poor into a highball glass over ice. Top off the glass with 50/50 Sweet and Sour and either Sprite or for an extra kick Smirnoff Apple Malt Beverage.

name: Jolly Rancher #2
preparation: Mix and serve chilled in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Green Jolly Rancher
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Coffee Grasshopper
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Port And Starboard
preparation: Pour carefully into a pousse cafe glass so that the creme de menthe floats on top of the grenadine. Serve without mixing.

name: Grasshopper
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Peppermint Pattie
preparation: Pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Mocha Mint
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Liqiud Mintaero
preparation: Mix creme de cacoa creme de menthe midori kahlua and ice into a shaker. Give a small shake then add milk and shake well to foam up milk.

name: Doc Harris
preparation: Pour the Dr McGillicuddy's Mentholmint schnapps and Coca-cola into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add and stir with a stirring stick and serve.

name: Midnight Mint
preparation: Rim a cocktail (martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into the cocktail glass.

name: Champagne Gem
preparation: Put creme de menthe in the flute first then add champagne and stir slightly. Make sure your champagne is cold.

name: Albert 2000
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked/broken ice. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Dutch Velvet
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except chocolate) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the shaved chocolate and serve.

name: Gingermint
preparation: Pour the Dr McGillicuddy's mint schnapps over 3 or 4 ice cubes in an 8-oz old-fashioned or lowball glass. Add ginger ale more to taste if desired and stir lightly. Serve.

name: Mint Tea
preparation: Pour white creme de menthe over ice in a cocktail glass and add iced tea to taste.

name: Peppermint Cream
preparation: Pour the creme de menthe white creme de cacao Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with milk to taste. Garnish with a piece of kiwi add a straw and serve.

name: Doublemint
preparation: Pour mint schnapps into an Irish coffee cup or glass and fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream add creme de menthe for color and serve.

name: Southampton Slam
preparation: Serve in rocks glass - no ice. Pour both liquors fill with club soda roll once. Serve with straw.

name: Cucaracha #2
preparation: Use a shot-glass and fill to the above proportions. Light the drink on fire. (It helps if you move the lighter in a circular pattern around the top of the drink.) Shoot it through a straw. Be careful!

name: Erinn's Kahlua And Godiva
preparation: Fill any type of glass 1/2 - 3/4 full with ice. Add equal amounts of Chocolate Liqueur and Kahlua - enough to cover the ice.

name: Creamy Snatch
preparation: Fill half the glass with ice. Pour in the buttershots first followed slowly by the kahlua until you're halfway up the glass. (You can allow yourself to be a little more generous with the Buttershots than with the Kahlua). Pour in the half-and-half last and stir until mixed completely. Serve cold.

name: Purple Stealth
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a large soft drink tumbler. Add grape soda.

name: Purple Gecko
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Heidi's Purple Haze
preparation: Mix in any order and serve. This drink can also be served on ice with a full shot of each.

name: Bacio del Muerte
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Drive Away
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Furry Purple Squirrel
preparation: Pour the rums blue curacao grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime with an almond embedded in it. Pour the dash of coconut rum to finish and serve.

name: Purple Haze
preparation: Pour blue Absinthe followed by Strawberry Liquer into glass. Stir with a straw while pouring Sprite. Result should be a cloudy purple drink with the taste of a black jellybean. Best served chilled or over ice.

name: Purple Heart
preparation: Pour both shots into a cordial glass. Add ice stir and serve.

name: Bob Cocktail
preparation: Pour the cherry brandy amaretto banana liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple People Eater #2
preparation: Fill half a shot glass with raspberry schnapps and the other half with Smirnoff vodka. Serve.

name: Down and Dirty Dry Martini
preparation: Shake the gin and olive brine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Rub the rib with a wedge of lemon and drop into glass. Garnish with two cocktail onions and serve.

name: Fifty-Fifty
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cocktail olive.

name: Black Devil
preparation: Stir rum and vermouth with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the black olive and serve.

name: Low Tide Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka dry vermouth and clam juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with a smoked clam. Also add a lemon twist and serve.

name: Charging Rhino
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with twist of lemon.

name: Martini Navratilova
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Great Caesar's Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive.

name: Blue Lady
preparation: Pour vodka vermouth and schnapps into a martini glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Laughing at the Waves
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Dry Manhattan #2
preparation: Stir vermouth and blended whiskey with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with the olive as garnish.

name: Green Fantasy
preparation: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with kiwi fruit slices.

name: Emerald Vodka Martini
preparation: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

name: La Carre
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Caribbean Blues
preparation: Pour ingredients over crushed ice and stir gradually and evenly. Serve immediately.

name: Hot and Dirty Martini
preparation: Pour the pepper vodka dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with a pickled jalapeno pepper and serve.

name: Cool Yule Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Piece of Heaven
preparation: Shake all ingredients together with ice pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Brown Elephant
preparation: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a shaker. Shake and pour into a glass. Lightly dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Cloudberry Dream
preparation: Add ingredients to an ice-filled old-fashioned glass stir and garnish with cranberries.

name: Airhead
preparation: Pour vodka into the bottom of a mixing glass. Add hawaiian punch squeeze in a wedge of lime add sprite ice and shake. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Applegasm
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cup apple schnapps first and enjoy. It tastes like a Granny (green) apple or green apple jolly rancher. It can be made up per shot per glass or per party.

name: Mighty Martian
preparation: Pour all contents into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pelvic Crusher
preparation: Pour the apple pucker and vodka into a highball glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with zima stir gently and serve.

name: Outrage
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Pearl Harbour Jello Shot
preparation: Mix boiling water and jello until jello is dissolved. Add Midori and vodka. Pour into 2-ounce cups. Chill until jello is set.

name: Zadarade
preparation: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add absolut mandrin triple sec and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice and pineapple. Shake and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

name: The Fuzzy Magnum
preparation: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass. Squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

name: Chocolate Orange
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: S2C3
preparation: Pour into tall glass and serve.

name: Grey Goose Driver
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pearl Harbor #2
preparation: Mix and enjoy!

name: Mandarin Crush
preparation: Add absolut mandrin to an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with orange soda.

name: Fuzzy Bull Balls
preparation: Pour the Three Olives orange vodka and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Red Bull. add pineapple juice on top and serve.

name: Absolute Heaven
preparation: Add ingredients and shake over ice. *The taste is very tropical tasting. Be careful you do not taste the alcohol but it's definately there!

name: Nicolalas
preparation: Mix absolut mandrin and passoa in a highball glass. Add ice and fill with orange juice.

name: Don Roberto
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

name: Awesome Chandler
preparation: Pour Absolut Mandrin peach schnapps amaretto Midori melon liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and cranberry juice both to taste. Stir and serve.

name: Pearl Necklace #2
preparation: Pour butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass and add kahlua. Use a dropper to add rum cream drop by drop on the outside edge of the shot to form a ring or Pearl Necklace.

name: Troutie
preparation: Pour the vodka first add grapefruit juice and fill with about 6 ounces of 7-up or Sprite.

name: Jam Doughnut
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass and float the Bailey's Irish Cream on top of the schnapps. Pour the grenadine through the Bailey's Irish Cream so that it sinks into the butterscotch schnapps hence resembling a jam doughnut. Serve.

name: Dixie Pearl
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Pour over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: Mandarin Split
preparation: Shake once and strain into a collins glass.

name: OliFanta
preparation: Pour Fanta into a collins glass. Add Oliphanta orange vodka stir and serve.

name: Pearl Harbour Revisited
preparation: Add a splash of vanilla essence to an otherwise standard scotch and coke.

name: Orange Smasha
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Blend until smooth; add more ice as required. Pour into a highball glass add a straw and serve.

name: Jack's Jam
preparation: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Lyndy
preparation: Shake with ice and serve.

name: Ooo
preparation: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Pearl Necklace
preparation: Mix equal parts tequila rose and bailey's irish cream in a shot glass and shoot.

name: La Bang-Bang
preparation: Muddle lime and lemon wedges with orange wheel in bottom of collins or tall glass. Fill glass with ice then pour Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka over ice and muddled fruit. Add the ginger ale followed by grenadine and stir. Serve.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
preparation: Combine absolut mandrin peach schnapps and juices in a shaker with ice. Pour into a collins glass fill with 7-up and stir. Sink the grenadine and garnish with a twist of lime.

name: French Screwdriver
preparation: Pour the Grey Goose L'Orange vodka into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Fill with Orangina orange soda stir briefly and serve.

name: 2 Step
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a tall glass and serve.

name: Sex on the Sofa
preparation: Pour vodka peach schnapps WKD and Reef into a jug. Add orange juice to taste. Stir well and serve into tall glasses.

name: Punch In The Pants
preparation: Blend ingredients with ice and serve.

name: Bacardi Pink
preparation: Pour Bacardi Limon rum straight into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Minute Maid pink lemonade. Stir with a straw and serve.

name: Puerto Rican Popper
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon and Passoa into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with cranberry juice and stir well. Splash with champagne and serve.

name: Limonaide
preparation: Take a tall or short glass and fill with ice. Mix in the bacardi and the lemonade in equal parts.

name: Limon Spritzer
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a collins glass. Fill with the can of Sprite. Add a piece of lemon and serve.

name: Rummple
preparation: Mix all ingredients with ice pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Boom Boom Shot
preparation: Pour Bacardi Limon rum into a shot glass. Add Sprite (or 7-Up). Place a towel on the table and put one hand on top of the shot glass to seal it so that no liquid or gas from the soda escapes. Quickly slam the glass on the towel so that a lot of bubbles are made and consume so that you catch the bubbles going down your throat.

name: Beakers Blue
preparation: Add ice cubes stir and garnish with cherry.

name: Blonde Moment
preparation: Mix over Ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Bazooka Joe #2
preparation: Pour the Bacardi limon into a collins glass. Add a small 8 oz can or thereabouts of Red Bull. Stir well and serve.

name: Lunar Landing
preparation: Stir ingredients together well in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Anjorska
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Passoa sweet and sour mix and juices into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Beautiful Disaster
preparation: Empty the mickey into a half-empty bottle of sprite. Put the cap on and turn upside down slowly a few times - allowing it to mix. Serve in a collins glass with ice.

name: LimonDew
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Mountain Dew over ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Island Tide
preparation: Pour anejo rum and bacardi limon into a collins glass; with ice if desired. Almost fill with peach juice and add lemon juice. Stir and sink 3 mandarin orange and 2 peach slices to the bottom. Garnish the glass with a lemon slice peach slice or mandarin orange slice if desired and serve.

name: James D
preparation: Combine ingredients. Stir.

name: Limon Squeeze
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon into a highball glass. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up. Garnish with a lime and serve.

name: San Juan Tea
preparation: Shake liquor and sour mix. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Tahitian Treat
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Add liquor juice and then sprite.

name: B.L.T.
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add bacardi limon. Fill with iced tea. Add lemon wedge and serve.

name: Liquid Ecstasy
preparation: Build bacardi midori blue curacao lemon juice and pineapple juice in that order over ice in a highball glass or shake and strain into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to either the highball glass or the rim of the martini glass. Serve with two straws.

name: Chaise Lounge
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon Malibu rum creme de bananes and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bacardi-ade
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with ice cubes and serve.

name: Panty Dropper #2
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir. Garnish with a cherry or two and serve.

name: Bacardi Limon and Pepsi
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pedro Collins
preparation: Pour bacardi limon into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sweet and sour mix and fill with equal parts of club soda and 7-up.

name: Citrus Coke
preparation: Pour half of a can of coke into a tall glass. Add bacardi limon and top off with the remaining coke. Stir and serve.

name: Flaming Citrus Action
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in an ordinary glass.

name: Beach Bum
preparation: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

name: D-Roy
preparation: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

name: Jet Pilot
preparation: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour in the rums followed by the juices. Add the grenadine. Top with a double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preferred.

name: Haywire
preparation: Serve over ice. Regular 7-up and amaretto can be used if cherry 7-Up is not available. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Purple Mask
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jeweler's Hammer
preparation: Add vodka to white grape juice. Alter the concentration of vodka slightly (to taste) and pour over ice.

name: Kelly-K
preparation: Pour the vodka and Campari into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with soda stir well and serve.

name: Sonoma
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Grape Juice Rickey
preparation: Pour into a highball glass filled with broken ice.

name: Purple Cow
preparation: Pour vodka into a shaker. Add grape juice to taste. Shake strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Graffiti
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled glass garnish with a seedless grape and serve.

name: Mormon Surprise
preparation: Add the vodka and grape juice to a collins glass and fill with ginger ale.

name: Bull's Special
preparation: Combine all ingredients with ice shake and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster #3
preparation: Place ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass. Consume as a shot.

name: Halfcast Russian
preparation: Pour the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and vodka into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Layer the cappucino on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon; this should then sink to the bottom leaving a swirling marble effect. Serve.

name: Bit of Russian Honey
preparation: Add ingredients (cream as desired) shake and pour over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Calm Monkey
preparation: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Bailey's Irish cream fill the glass with milk stir and serve.

name: One Night Stand #2
preparation: Fill a shot glass with 1/2 oz. of Kahlua and 1/2 oz. of Vodka. Next combine Bailey's Irish Cream and milk in a rocks glass. Take the shot of Kahlua and vodka and follow immediatly with the chaser of milk and Bailey's!

name: Mocha Mudslide Milkshake
preparation: Place the milk banana sugar and coffee granules in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in a blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

name: Ultimate Blue Frozen Margarita
preparation: Pour ingredient into a blender over the ice in order listed. Blend on high for a few seconds until drink has a consistancy a bit icier than a slurpee. Take lime wedge and run it over the edges of the margarita glass then upturned place the wetted rims into course salt. Pour the now ready margarita into the now salted glasses and serve.

name: Steamboat
preparation: Mix all ingredients strain into glass and enjoy!

name: Pentecostal
preparation: Pour the bourbon into a whiskey sour glass. Add vodka and 7-up stir and serve.

name: Bill Murray and The Ghostbusters
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a beer mug stir lightly and serve.

name: Bourbon and Branch
preparation: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Iced Jim
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a big highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Mint Julep
preparation: Muddle mint leaves powdered sugar and water in a collins glass. Fill the glass with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Dixie Julep
preparation: Combine bourbon and powdered sugar in a collins glass. Fill with ice and stir gently until glass is frosted. Add the three sprigs of mint and serve with a straw.

name: Depressed Goalie
preparation: Fill a mason jar with ice. Pour over the whiskey (Jim Beam). Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.

name: Ice Pick
preparation: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

name: Chapel Hill
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Robicheaux
preparation: Pour bourbon lime and cherry juice into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with cola stir gently and garnish with a cherry. Serve.

name: Fucked Up Shark
preparation: Pour the Jeremiah Weed whiskey into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao triple sec and Southern Comfort peach liqueur and add a can of tonic water. Shake vigorously despite the building pressure. Shake until much of the carbonation from the tonic water subsides and creates a petillent clear teal beverage. Pour over a minimal amount of ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Basin Street
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hot Buttered Jim
preparation: Stir the Jim Beam bourbon whiskey and the hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Jewish Bulldozer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes stir briefly and serve.

name: Bourbon Cooler
preparation: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Bourbon Fix
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar lemon juice and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Mississippi Magic
preparation: Blend briefly in a wine goblet filled with crushed ice and serve with straws.

name: Bourbon Toddy
preparation: Soak one teaspoon or a cube of sugar with bitters in the bottom of a highball glass. Add a few ice cubes and pour in the whiskey and water. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Lynyrd Skynyrd
preparation: PourJim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add orange soda and orange juice and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Jim's Cream
preparation: Pour the Jim Beam Bourbon whiskey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the cream soda stir and serve.

name: Hot Carl #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together with a couple ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Dirty Butt Whore
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Forester
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry if desired.

name: Bourbon and Sprite
preparation: Pour the bourbon into a highball glass with some ice cubes. Fill glass with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Old Fashioned (Sweet)
preparation: Pour bourbon over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add the bitters soda and juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon twist.

name: Angela The Bartender's Hooters
preparation: Add a handful of ice cubes to a highball glass. Pour in Old Charter then add coca-cola (pre-chilled). Add more coke to taste if desired and serve.

name: Carolina Kamikaze
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add more or less blue curacao - you're trying to achieve a Carolina Blue color.

name: Blue Freezie
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Harsh But Fair
preparation: Pour the vodka southern comfort and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Add the lime juice and serve.

name: Fruit Loop
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

name: Blue Helena
preparation: Combine vodka blue curacao lime juice and honey in a shaker with ice. Shake well then pour through a strainer into a cocktail glass containing ice. Makes 1 serving.

name: Kamikaze Wigglers
preparation: Dissolve the jell-o with hot water. Add vodka and triple sec. Pour in plastic shot glasses. Chill until formed and serve.

name: Blue Bay
preparation: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Hose Wallbanger
preparation: Measure ice into a cocktail shaker with a highball glass (one glass worth). Add tequila and orange juice and shake well. Pour everything back into the highball glass and carefully layer Galliano on top.

name: Hillary Wallbanger
preparation: Pour the white wine and orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well float the galliano on top and serve.

name: Flying Tiger
preparation: Fill glass with ice: add galliano creme de menthe and vodka. Top glass off with orange juice.

name: Italian Screw
preparation: Add to a highball glass. Add vodka galliano and fill with pulpless orange juice.

name: Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
preparation: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass and stir. Fill with orange juice. Top with galliano and serve.

name: Hillary Wallbanger
preparation: Measure your ice with a collins glass (full up) and add it to a cocktail shaker. Add a dry white wine and orange juice and shake well. Pour back into glass and carefully layer galliano on top.

name: Tequila Boom
preparation: Before drinking put a napkin on top of the glass and your hand over that. Bang it on the table (so that the gases rise to the top) and shoot.

name: Hot Spot
preparation: Mix vodka and tequila. Pour in tabasco sauce until it's really red.

name: Army Green
preparation: Pour into a shot glass. A chaser may be needed.

name: Tequila BoomBoom
preparation: Throw everything in a glass. Put a towel over the glass slam it on the bar. Before the foam hits the edge off the glass you must have finished it .

name: Nasty Bitch
preparation: Serve chilled tequila and cointreau straight up in a shot glass.

name: Mexican Motherfucker
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Barber Chair Shot
preparation: Pour equal amounts of tequila and margarita mix into separate shot glasses. Lay person back in barber shop chair. Lay towl on chest of that person. Someone is to stand behind that person and pour the shots in to that persons mouth. They close and swish to blend and drink.

name: Tequila Head Slam
preparation: Build the three ingredients in a shot glass in the order listed. Fold a paper bar napkin and place firmly over the top. Slam the shot glass on the table bar etc. Make sure the drink fizzes. Turn the drink up and 'Slam It Into Your Head' before the fizzing subsides or try to be the first to re-slam the empty shot glass to the bar in a 'Group Head Slam'.

name: Rooster Tail
preparation: Lick hand add salt and lick salt. Consume quickly as shots in order; jose cuervo orange juice and tomate juice.

name: T.K.O.
preparation: Just pour off the amount into a shot glass. Shoot and enjoy!

name: Jose Flame-O
preparation: Add tequila to a shot glass and add firewater.

name: T2
preparation: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Tequila Pop
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tall shot glass. Cover the glass with a coaster or hand and slam the glass hard onto the table. Shoot immediately.

name: Dirty Sanchez
preparation: Pour the ingredients in equal parts into a cocktail shaker with some ice. Shake well pour into shot glasses and serve.

name: Popper
preparation: Pour tequila into a shot glass and fill with 7-up. Slam on hard surface and serve immediately.

name: Che Guevara
preparation: Pour in Jose Cuervo Gold then Jgermeister. Top off with Goldschlager.

name: Tequila Slammer
preparation: Lick the back of your hand put salt on the (now) sticky back of your hand lick the salt down a large dose of straight tequila and then bite into the lemon.

name: Tequila Bang Bang
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass. Put your hand on it and be sure its hermetic. Slam it on the table and shoot.

name: Philadelphia Eagle
preparation: Mix all three ingredients together in a double shot glass and serve.

name: Harsh
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Avada Kedavra
preparation: Mix all ingredients. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Purple Fuck
preparation: Sip the sambuca through a straw while somebody else slowly keeps the glass full with the shot of tequila. It turns from very sweet to very nasty.

name: Coat Hanger
preparation: Stir all ingredients in an old-fashioned glass or double shot glass. Place hand over glass poke a straw through fingers and suck it all up.

name: Flaming Meggers
preparation: Place a dash of Tabasco sauce on some body part. Lick the Tabasco off take the shot and bite the Jalepeno then hold on for dear life.

name: Sublime
preparation: Dissolve lime jello in a cup of boiling water. Add another cup (or more to taste) of tequila (for special occasions add slices of lime) and mix well. Chill for 2 hours in a freezer or 4 hours in a fridge. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Dirty Panties
preparation: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top and serve.

name: Boomer
preparation: Blend add ice strain.

name: Hot Carl
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Prickly Pear
preparation: Pour chilled cactus juice schnapps into a chilled shot glass. Float cuervo tequila on top and serve.

name: Kamikaze #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Tabletop Iron Man
preparation: Pour Cuervo Gold into shot glass and serve with lime and salt. Take salt and snort it up your nose take shot squirt lime in your eye. Use a napkin to clean up.

name: Nazi Taco
preparation: Mix ingredients together and pour into a shot glass.

name: Sweaty Mexican
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir and shoot.

name: Zipper
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

name: 6-Shooter
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Morgan's Mountain
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum creme de cacao and cream. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the kahlua into the center of the drink.

name: Mountain Dang
preparation: Fill a glass (ice optional) three-quarters full with mountain dew. Add tang to taste.

name: Tequila Comfort
preparation: Add ingredients.

name: Warp Core Breach
preparation: Pour the goldschlager into a 1 1/2 ounce shot glass. Layer the tequila on top followed by the jack daniels. Shoot.

name: The Bootlegger
preparation: Mix three shots together in a mixing glass pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Gasoline
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Horny Bull #2
preparation: Pour and slug back.

name: Head Banger
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bootlegger
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Bone #2
preparation: Pour in order into a shot glass and serve.

name: John Cooper Deluxe
preparation: Mix 1/2 vodka 1/4 OJ and 1/4 vodka in any glass.

name: Extreme Valentine
preparation: Mix ingredients with ice in a glass. Serve with an orange slice.

name: Iguana #2
preparation: Mix vodka and tequila over ice in a shaker. Add Kahlua. Shake and pour into a shot glass.

name: German Peach
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail glass over ice and serve. Add more Rumple Minze to make it stronger or add seltzer water to make it weaker.

name: German Chocolate Cake #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: German Bight
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Angry German
preparation: Fill rocks glass or shaker glass with ice. Add Amaretto (one part) Black Haus (one part) Jagermeister (one part) Rose's lime (two parts) and dash of salt (for bitterness). Shake. Sift into 3-6 shot glasses. Yell your favorite swear word and drink.

name: German Band
preparation: Stir with plenty of ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Foamy Irishman
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 5 - 10 ice cubes in a blender. Blend until the ice is melted or close to it. The ice will melt soon anyway but leave the drink nice and cold. By the time the ice melts during blending it should have some nice head on it. (Hence the foamy.) Serve in glass of choice and enjoy.

name: Big Comfy Couch
preparation: Stir ingredients with a few ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Star Wars
preparation: Mix equal parts of all ingredients and serve in an old-fashioned glass with/without ice.

name: Southern Raspberry Tart
preparation: Mix the 4 equal parts and pour into short rocks glass.

name: Cactus Bowl
preparation: Blend all ingredients with ice. Serve in margarita glass on rocks. *Can substitute Jose Cuervo's Margarita Mix in place of the Lime Juice

name: Coconut Brandy Bowl
preparation: 1. Slice off the eyes of the coconuts; drain and save the milk. 2. Gouge out the meat of the coconuts; saving as much milk from that as possible. 3. Combine the brandy banana liqueur and all the coconut milk in a blender with the crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for 15 seconds. Serve the drink in the two coconut shells.

name: Norwegian Hunting Mixture Bowl
preparation: 1. Fill a a large clean mixing bowl with approx. 2 gallon pure alcohol and 5 gallon lemonade. 2. Add approx. 10 kg. fresh fruits; lemon grapefruit and oranges. Mix the items together for approx. 2 minutes with a 4 HP outboard-motor with cooling - and exhaust system modified to not interfere with the mixture. 3. Can be served in all kind of glasses but preferably a jar called Norges-glass.

name: Bowl Hugger
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins or tall glass. Stir well add a straw and serve.

name: Alien Fish Bowl
preparation: Put 13 olives and put them in martini glass or other suitable glass. toothpick through 1 at least Mix the gin vodka and olive juice and shake with ice. Pour just the liquid into glass with olives and enjoy

name: Peach Bowl
preparation: Mix in a highball glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Bride's Bowl
preparation: Combine all but champagne in a punch bowl cover and chill for a minimum of two hours. Add champagne and ice when ready to serve. Pour into wine glasses.

name: Sunset Martini Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed martini glass.

name: O & Cream
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and serve in a rocks glass over ice.

name: Super O Martini Cocktail
preparation: Shake and serve in a chillled glass with an orange garnish.

name: O Cosmopolitan
preparation: Serve on the rocks. Garnish with a wedge of orange.

name: Satin Rouge
preparation: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: O My Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with grenadine.

name: O Circle Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain and serve into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Orangesicle
preparation: Blend ingredients and serve in a powdered sugar rimmed glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Rue L'Orange
preparation: Shake strain and serve in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Ooh La La Martini Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain and serve in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Bacardi O Tini
preparation: Shake bacardi O and pineapple juice and pour into a chilled glass. Float raspberry liqueur on top.

name: Sake O Martini
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: O Look Martini Cocktail
preparation: Serve together in a sugar-rimmed glass garnished with a slice of grapefruit.

name: O-n-Coke
preparation: Pour the Bacardi O orange rum into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Coke to taste and serve.

name: O Martini Cocktail
preparation: Serve in a rocks glass over ice or straight up in a martini glass.

name: Cool Paradise
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bacardi Yeah Martini Cocktail
preparation: Serve in a chilled glass garnished with a lime and maraschino cherry.

name: Sophisticate
preparation: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with melon strawberry and sugar-coated orange.

name: Tango Martini Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Squeeze orange juice into the bottom of the glass and garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Holiday Cocktail
preparation: Mix Cointreau Vodka and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice. Strain into glass top with champagne. Garnish with fresh cranberries and/or orange slice.

name: Special Tequini
preparation: In a shaker combine tequila and Cointreau with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

name: Diamond's Tweaked Cosmopolitan Martini
preparation: Put all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until WELL chilled. Serve in chilled martini glass with sugared rim if possible. Garnish if desired with orange wedges/peels.

name: Clint's Cosmopolitan
preparation: Combine all ingredients in an iced cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously then strain into a cocktail glass (sugared rim optional) and garnish with a lime wedge before serving.

name: Screwdriver a la Carla
preparation: Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some ice cubes and stir. Serve well chilled.

name: Screwdriver Boricua
preparation: Mix with ice.

name: Cassis Screwdriver
preparation: Pour vodka orange juice and lemon/lime juice into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake. Strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Add a splash of creme de cassis and of grenadine. Garnish with a lemon/lime wedge and a straw.

name: Red Manhattan
preparation: Stir with ice to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Federal Law
preparation: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add the Absolut Kurant vodka Chambord raspbery liqueur sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir well. Splash tonic water; stir again. Garnish as desired and serve.

name: Berry Buster
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube. A mighty tasty drink that goes down smooth. If it's too sweet try more vodka. If you really want to wow someone double the recipe add one egg white and shake for 15 sec instead of 20 sec.

name: Peekaboo
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a cocktail glass and fill with orange juice.

name: Broken Heart Martini
preparation: Combine the sugar and cocoa powder in a saucer. Dampen the outside rim of a chilled cocktail glass by rubbing the orange piece around it and rim with cocoa powder. Stir together the absolut kurant and godiva with ice in a mixing glass and strain into the prepared glass. Serve.

name: Chambord Kamikaze
preparation: Muddle lime in a shaker. Add ice and all other ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain into a glass.

name: Hpnotizer
preparation: Pour Hpnotiq first followed by the Grey Goose vodka over ice into a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Shake once and enjoy.

name: Gun Barrel
preparation: Add vodka triple sec and cranberry juice to a mixing glass and mix well. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: French Flamingo
