preparation: Shake ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime peel and serve.

name: Cactus Berry
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into large salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass.

name: Fuquay Friday Night
preparation: Add absolut kurant and sprite to a cocktail glass. Mix in the grenadine syrup and add the cherry cola. Serve. Add a dash of lime for a slightly different taste.

name: Monkey Tree
preparation: Rim a frosted cocktail glass with grenadine/caster sugar. Shake ingredients and strain into the glass.

name: Arctic Mouthwash
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

name: Cherry Tree Climber
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a double-cocktail glass.

name: Melon Tree
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Lemon Tree
preparation: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add straws and serve.

name: Orange Tree
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add an orange slice and serve.

name: Smurf Punch
preparation: Put ice in cup and fill it half full with sprite. Add maui filling the glass. Stir.

name: Chihuahua
preparation: Pour tequila over ice. Fill with grapefruit juice.

name: Hot Shot #2
preparation: Mix vodka and peppermint schnapps in a shot glass. Add a dash of tabasco sauce.

name: Clamato Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Heavy Metal #2
preparation: Stir together in a cup and serve.

name: Sharpshooter
preparation: Pour and stir.

name: Stinger Shot
preparation: Tabasco in the bottom of the shot. Pour Vodka and Crme de Mnthe gently on top. Shoot!

name: Shot of Hell
preparation: Pour shot of vodka into shot glass then top off with a generous portion of Tabasco.

name: Hot Tequila
preparation: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Dyer Maker
preparation: Pour Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey and Jagermeister herbal liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sour mix top with grenadine and serve.

name: Merry Widow #2
preparation: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of lemon and drop into glass. Serve.

name: Widow Woods' Nightcap
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Merry Widow Fizz
preparation: Shake ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Trial of the Century
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Merry Widow Cocktail
preparation: Stir maraschino and cherry brandy with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #4
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cup and serve.

name: Blue Grapes
preparation: Combine Absolut Kool-Aid and Sprite in a shaker and shake well. Pour over ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Quick Fox
preparation: Carefully layer each ingredient on top of the previous and serve.

name: Russian Sarin
preparation: Pour vodka and liqueur into a highball glass over one or two ice cubes. Fill with schweppes russian and serve.

name: Milli Vanilli
preparation: Pour the Dr. McGillicuddy's vanilla schnapps and Kahlua coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with cream or milk to taste and serve.

name: Krypto Kami
preparation: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass.

name: Under Current
preparation: Mix everything except Chambord in a mixing tin and pour into glass. Layer Chambord on top with a spoon.

name: Rugburn
preparation: Stir and shake ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Absolut Trifle
preparation: Layer about a third of an ounce of each ingredient in a shot glass in the order listed and serve.

name: Ludvika Walker
preparation: Mix and add some ice.

name: Melty Snowman
preparation: Tastes just like melted ice cream. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Pink Heart
preparation: Pour the chambord and creme de cacao into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with cream or milk.

name: Jacobs Haze
preparation: Mix vodka jagermeister and red bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Adjust amount of milk if desired. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Very Berry Tonic
preparation: Pour vodka and chambord into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water garnish with two fresh raspberries and serve.

name: Purple Fairy Dream
preparation: Pour in vodka cranberry juice and mix. Add the raspberry liqueur blue curacao and cream of coconut and mix again. Fill with 7-up.

name: Dephaekt
preparation: Blend the absolut kurant oregat and frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass add 2 ice cubes fill with the cranberry juice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional - add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.

name: Wobbler
preparation: Pour vodka into a glass one-quarter filled with ice. Fill until two-thirds full with grape juice and fill completely with russian water. Add a touch of grenadine and serve.

name: Kurant Collins
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the absolut kurant lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda.

name: Kurant
preparation: Put some ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour absolut kurant into the glass and fill up with schweppes russian. Serve with a straw.

name: Bleeding Apple
preparation: Add currant vodka and raspberry liqueur to a glass with ice. Fill with apple juice and add a dash of grenadine. Add diced pieces of fruit.

name: Pimp Punch
preparation: Mix and pour over ice.

name: Nickel Alloy
preparation: Pour the Absolut Kurant Cointreau and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with cold 7-up and serve.

name: Nickel
preparation: Pour the Absolut Kurant Midori melon liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with cold 7-up and serve.

name: Springtime
preparation: Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Florida Girl
preparation: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend until a light shade of pink is made then serve up in a pina-colada glass.

name: Girl Scout
preparation: Shake and strain into a small glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Girl Scout Thin Mint Cookie
preparation: Fill a mug with hot chocolate add a shot of creme de menthe stir and enjoy.

name: China Girl
preparation: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

name: Northern Europe Mongrel
preparation: Layer vodka and irish cream in a shot glass. Pour beer to fill.

name: Spicy Buttery Nipple
preparation: Mix Hot Damn and Butterscotch Schnapps in shot glass first then carefully add the irish cream without mixing.

name: Brick
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Stained Blue Dress
preparation: Layer.

name: Cerebro de Los Pollos
preparation: Add the vodka to a shot glass. Color with the mint liqueur. Top with Bailey's irish cream and serve.

name: Lil' Johnson
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Cum In A Hot Tub
preparation: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.

name: After Five #2
preparation: Add the vodka Bailey's irish cream and 7-up to an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pink Mikey
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Chaotic Pink
preparation: Mix cans of lemonade and limeade first then add vodka soda and beer. Mix well in punch bowl or bucket. Rim edges of cups with pink cosmo sugar for added effect.

name: Pink Squirrel
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pink Diamond
preparation: Combine all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Paint a large martini / wide rimmed glass with cold thick fudge from a squeeze bottle. Start at the bottom of a very dry glass and spin the stem while moving the stream of fudge up to the top rim. Strain contents of shaker into painted glass. Then float a swirl of fudge on the top of this and serve.

name: Teresa's Dream Shake
preparation: In shaker mix Kahlua Tequila Rose ice and milk. Shake and pour into frosted beer mug.

name: Buttery Russian
preparation: Mix all ingrediants over ice and stir with straw. Add as much milk as you like.

name: Pink Paradise
preparation: Pour the tequila into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir. Pour the bitters into a brandy snifter and swirl around in order to coat the glass. Discard any excess bitters from the glass then strain the tequila into the glass and serve.

name: Fluffy Pink Slipper
preparation: Simply shake/whisk/blend proportions of ingredients to taste and serve in a tall cordial glass. The more cherry brandy you add the pinker the slipper becomes. Whereas the more you whisk the 'fluffier' it becomes.

name: Pink Polka
preparation: Shake all liquid ingredients with ice pour into Martini glass. Impale cherry with tiny sword and serve.

name: Pink Fingers
preparation: Shake and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of banana and a maraschino cherry.

name: Kahlua Bomb
preparation: Mix all of the ingredients well. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Black Fog
preparation: Pour the Chambord in to a mug of Guinness. Swirl slightly to mix.

name: Hairball
preparation: Fill 1/3 of a collins glass with cider then float the guinness on top to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour bushmill's irish whiskey in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!

name: Guinness Cola
preparation: Pour half a bottle of Guinness into a beer mug add an equal amount of Coca-cola and serve.

name: Black and Brown
preparation: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness. I prefer Henrys for the rootbeer (cold) and the Guinness warm and flat. I have used other beers and for me stouter is better. Porter works. You may vary the 50/50 proportions to taste. One of the most charming traits of this drink is the disgusted looks you get when you order it.

name: Guinness Shandy
preparation: Mix lemonade with Guinness in a pint glass.

name: Miner's Lung
preparation: Place three shots of vodka into a pint size beer glass and fill with guinness stout.

name: Paddy's Caffeine
preparation: Add the tia maria first (before the guinness has settled and before you head it) as otherwise you will mess-up a perfectly well-settled pint.

name: Irish Russian
preparation: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do not add ice.

name: Nemesis
preparation: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice into a highball glass. Top with coke add Guinness and serve.

name: Backfire On The Freeway
preparation: Drop a double shot of 151 into a beer mug of guinness and chug immediately.

name: Christmas Pudding
preparation: In a 6 2/3 Paris Goblet add Southern Comfort and then Drambuie. Top up with Draught Guinness.

name: Trojan Horse
preparation: Mix coke and guinness in a pint glass.

name: Brandy Rickey
preparation: Pour brandy and lime juice into a highball glass. Fill with soda water garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Flaming Yager
preparation: Light the jagermeister on fire and drop it in the glass of guinness. Now pound it quick. There you go!

name: MILF
preparation: Put everything in a mixing cup with ice shake and strain into glass.

name: Midnight Express
preparation: Pour the dark rum Cointreau lime juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Orchard Express
preparation: Shake vodka and triple sec together in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes add Angostura bitters and pour on pressed apple juice. Serve.

name: Kuoyamuli
preparation: Mix ingredients swiftly with a spork in either a irish coffee cup or cappucino mug. Serve hot/warm.

name: Marrakech Express
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a collins glass.

name: Fire Engine
preparation: Pour it in a highball glass w/ice if preferred. Should be served cold.

name: Fire in Heaven
preparation: Fill up shot glass with 151 proof rum. Add a dash of tabasco sauce. Allow a few seconds to settle. Drink fast and stand back.

name: Cold Fire
preparation: Stir together Milk and Schnapps pour into highball glass and serve.

name: Flaming Ring of Fire
preparation: Add the Bacardi 151 and Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball whiskey to a shot glass top with Tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Redneck Prairie Fire
preparation: Pour 1 oz. White Lightning into a shot glass then float 1/8 oz. Louisiana Hot Sauce on top wait a few seconds for it to look like an upside down fire then shoot it down. After about 4 everything just might look upside down.

name: Mexican Prairie Fire
preparation: Pour Cuervo Gold into a shot glasstop with Tabasco Sauce. Shoot the fire!!!!

name: Nipple On Fire
preparation: Pour in order into a shot glass; butterscotch firewater and float the irish cream.

name: Midnight Kiss
preparation: Pour the vodka into a sugar-rimmed champagne flute and fill the rest of the glass with Champagne. Top with the Curacao and serve.

name: Fire and Ice
preparation: Layer the rumple minze on top of the firewater. (as best as possible)

name: Fire in the Hole
preparation: Pour habenero sauce into a shot glass; add everclear. Dash cayenne pepper on top and serve.

name: Dragon's Fire Jello Shots
preparation: Follow the instructions on the package of jello (using twice the amount since there's cherry and strawberry) and add half a cup of both the vodka and the scotch to the mixture. Freeze in plastic cups then serve and try to stand up.

name: Frothy Redhead
preparation: Add in said order. Do not shake soda will mix. Garnish with 2-3 grapes and sprinkle with sugar. Named after a friend who demanded a new drink.

name: Jeff Boxies
preparation: Mix green creme de menthe and kahlua with milk in a coffee mug and serve.

name: Chocolate Milk Shakes
preparation: Place frozen yogurt and milk in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Serve immediately. Variation: Mocha Milk Shakes Prepare as directed above except add 2 to 3 ts. instant coffee crystals to the blender.

name: Fuzzy Melon
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Melon Jones
preparation: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Melon Island
preparation: Combine the vodka pisang ambon passion-fruit liqueur vanilla ice cream and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge slice of lemon and mint sprig and serve.

name: Melon Margarita
preparation: Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass or blend with ice.

name: Mad Melon Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Green Eggs
preparation: Pour the vodka and Irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the milk and green creme de menthe. Shake well pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Have Fun with Your Dildo
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Run for Your Money
preparation: Pour the strawberry schnapps into a shot glass. Add the sour apple pucker and serve.

name: Coke Sucker
preparation: Pour the rum into a beer mug half-filled with ice cubes. Add Kahlua coffee liqueur half-and-half and Coca-Cola. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Mud in a Cup
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker with crushed ice. Shake *briefly* (2-3 seconds) and strain into an Irish coffee mug. Serve hot or cold.

name: Mud and Blood
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a large highball glass and serve.

name: Fudge Slide
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mud Fuck
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Crawdaddy
preparation: Pour vodka and lemonade into a highball glass. Top with the soda garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Siberian Sunrise
preparation: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.

name: Southwest Cooler
preparation: Pour the juices first then top off with the liqueur.

name: White Romanian
preparation: Pour Stoli vodka kahlua and banana liqueur into a highball glass or cup with ice. Top off with milk followed by two slices of thinly cut bananas. Stir and serve.

name: Cheesecake Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bolli Stoli
preparation: Pour Bollinger champagne into a champagne flute. Add Stoli vodka and serve.

name: Wicked Apple
preparation: Pour jagermeister into a highball glass filled with ice. Add vodka and almost fill completely with apple juice. Add just a splash of ginger ale garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Island Girl
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass roll and serve.

name: Jaq'ed Up Screwdriver
preparation: Pour into a large crushed-ice-filled cup and pour back into the collins glass. Use a plastic stirring utensil if desired.

name: EDO Cocktail
preparation: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

name: Hot Rod
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with some ice cubes. Garnish with pineapple and serve.

name: Cocky Carrot
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and stir. Strain over ice into a collins glass. Garnish with an orange wheel and serve.

name: Fuzzy Peach
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Highball Cocktail
preparation: Fill a medium glass most of the way with 4 - 5 ice cubes. Add the whiskey and fill the rest up of the way with ginger ale.

name: Hokkaido Highball
preparation: Pour the Bombay gin and sake into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec swirl and leave briefly to chill before serving.

name: Applejack Highball
preparation: Pour calvados grenadine and orange juice over ice in a collins glass. Stir fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Love in an Elevator
preparation: Pour the gin and green curacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass Fill with soda and serve.

name: White Witch
preparation: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Paralyzer
preparation: Pour tequilla vodka and kahlua over ice in a collins glass. Half-fill with coke and top with light cream or milk. Stir gently with a straw and serve.

name: Espresso Martini #2
preparation: Brew espresso fresh. Pour into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and add other ingredients. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pecan Coffee
preparation: Place all liquors in a cocktail shaker with some ice. Shake for approx. 45secs strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Black Dublinski
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail saucer.

name: Orange Splash
preparation: Layer ingredients in above order into a tall glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Icy Ice
preparation: 1. Stir the juices together in a freezable container and freeze until ice. Crush the ice finely with the lemon zest and mix salt into the crushed ice. 2. Pour the Pepsi into a highball glass and quickly add the ice cream and cover with the crushed ice to prevent it flowing out. Serve.

name: Tall Blonde
preparation: Add all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake well fill into chilled martini glass.

name: Will Rogers
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fruitbooty 69
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir extremely well and serve.

name: Opal Cocktail
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Glass Tower
preparation: Build in a collins glass and fill with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Ice Pick #2
preparation: In a large ice filled glass pour vodka then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

name: Italian Ice #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Bubble Gum
preparation: Layer in order into a shot glass.

name: Calimocho Torreon Special
preparation: Fill the highball glass with ice then half fill it with red wine and half fill it with coca-cola. Enjoy.

name: Kalte Muschi
preparation: Pour the red wine into a 16-oz mug or glass (ie. beer mug) then slowly add Coca-cola (don't use cheap cola) lemon slices and ice cubes.

name: Crown & Coke
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest with coke and serve.

name: Vanilla Coke
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka into a cocktail glass. Top with coke or diet coke add ice cubes if desired and serve.

name: Kremlin
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Daylon's Bedtime
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add triple sec. Add soda to taste. Mix with straw.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip #3
preparation: Chill shake everything well and serve!

name: White Rabbit
preparation: Fill a glass with ice add in the vodka vanilla liqueur and milk. Shake and serve.

name: Taxidermy
preparation: Fill glass with ice pour one ounce of Vanilla Stoli. Top off all but 1/4 of the glass with Mountain Dew. Finish off with a hefty splash of Grenadine syrup and garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry. The amount of grenadine has a large impact on this drink. It is best to not sip the drink since it is lightly carbonated and will go flat. Do not shake or stir!

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #3
preparation: Pour the Godiva into a shot glass top with grenadine and shoot.

name: British Snakebite
preparation: Mix or layer ingredients. Note - the mixture of beer and cider is so effective at making you drunk its illegal to serve Snakebite in pubs and bars in Britain!

name: British Comfort
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort gin lemon juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dirty Moma
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

name: Joey F's Grape Ape
preparation: Shake two parts vodka with one part raspberry liqueur and one part cranberry juice. Chill and serve as shots.

name: Gummy Sharks
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff vanilla vodka into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with Pepsi Blue stir well and serve.

name: Gummy Worm
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass and serve; result should be neon blue.

name: Border Crosser
preparation: Fill a collins glass part way with ice. Add tequila sweet and sour mix and fill the remaining space with coca-cola. Mix and serve with a straw.

name: Hot Spiced Cider #2
preparation: Combine the cider sugar and spices in a large saucepan. Heat slowly to boiling. Boil for 3-5 minutes remove spices and serve hot. Garnish with orange slices lemon slices or rings of unpared red apple with whole cloves forced through peel. 16 servings. If desired chill spiced cider and serve over ice cubes made from apple juice.

name: Barn Burner
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Cider Punch
preparation: Place the cider Drambuie sherry lemon juice and club soda into a large punch bowl and stir well. Add a large block of ice then add the slices of apple. Sprinkle nutmeg across the top and serve. Makes 18 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Crockpot Mulled Cider
preparation: Tie orange peel cinnamon ginger root and allspice in an 8-inch square of 100-percent-cotton cheesecloth. -- Combine apple cider or juice apple brandy (if desired) and honey in a 3 1/2- 4- or 5-quart crockery cooker. Add spice bag. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 5 to 6 hours or on high-heat setting for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. -- Remove and discard spice bag. Ladle cider into cups. -- Makes 8 eight-ounce servings if you didn't use apple brandy 9 if you did.

name: Lemon Lift
preparation: Serve chilled straight or on the rocks.

name: Apple Cider Slider
preparation: Pour over ice. Shake and strain into shooter glass.

name: Hot Mulled Cider
preparation: Dump cider cinnamon sticks and a couple of teaspoons of nutmeg into a pot over very low heat. Wash and slice oranges and stick whole cloves into the rind then float in cider as it warms. Serve when warm.

name: Hot Spiced Cider
preparation: Add allspice clove and cinnamon stick to the apple cider and let simmer for 1 hour (or longer). This may not look like much spice but it really does make a pleasantly spicey cider.

name: Hot Mulled Cider #2
preparation: Combine apple cider/juice brown sugar and nutmeg in a large saucepan. Place cinnamon allspice and cloves in a cheesecloth and tie. Add to cider mixture and bring to the boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove spice bag and discard. Serve mixture in mugs with a clove-studded orange wedge in each.

name: Junior Mint #2
preparation: Gently pour ingredients into a 1.5-oz or 2-oz shot glass. When drinking hold in mouth for a few seconds mixing ingredients with tongue to bring out the flavor. Swallow and feel the warmth of the brandy.

name: Negrita
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Slow Cooker Cider
preparation: Place cinnamon cloves and allspice in a double thickness of cheesecloth: bring up corners of cloth and tie with a string to form a bag. Place cider and brown sugar in a slow cooker: stir until sugar dissolves. Add spice bag. Place orange slices on top. Cover and cook on low for 2-5 hours. Remove spice bag before serving.

name: Rocha-Gil
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Drambuie Cider
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug and serve with a cinnamon stick.

name: Nitro
preparation: Mix together in a shot glass.

name: Irish Monk #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Virgin Bullshot
preparation: Combine the beef bouillon black pepper Worcestershire and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Virgin Clamato Cocktail
preparation: Combine the tomato juice clam juice black pepper Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Tomato Cocktail
preparation: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce lemon juice tomato juice and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

name: Bloody Brew
preparation: Pour vodka beer and tomato juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add salt to taste; stir again. Strain into a highball glass garnish with a dill pickle spear and serve.

name: Hurricane Hugo
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice in large shaker. Add more juice to taste for the lightweights. Shake well and strain into shot glass. This recipe may be doubled or quadrupled. We strongly encourage this.

name: Carolina Piece of Ass
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Field of Green
preparation: Pour sloe gin and amaretto into a glass. Fill half-way with 7-up (optional) and fill completely with orange juice.

name: Hawaiian Punch From Hell
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice shake and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Desperate Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh blackberries and serve.

name: Dirty Hunch Punch
preparation: Cut the fruit (orange pinapple preferably) into desirable size slices. Mix ingredients into something big enough to hold everything (its a lot). An average sized cooler will probably be your best bet here. NO ICE - Fill up a cup of ice then fill with punch and stir. NOTE: Melted ice will water it down if you dont drink it all in one night. This drink is meant to get you there fast. It is very strong so if you cant handle it mix it with some citrus soda (Fresca Sprite) It will make it taste like Orange soda.

name: Dirty Swingers
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into 2 shot glasses and serve.

name: White Spider
preparation: Pour over lots of ice.

name: Dirty Tuaca
preparation: Mix with ice and strain into a short glass.

name: Big Toe
preparation: Stir and strain into a liqueur or cordial glass. Serve with a cherry on a stick.

name: Big Apple
preparation: Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe stir and serve.

name: Drunken Stupor
preparation: Pour the rye whiskey Kahlua coffee liqueur and vodka into a beer mug. Top with Pepsi cola and serve.

name: Big Apple Margarita
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a slice of green apple and serve.

name: The Big Robowski
preparation: Throw the five shots into a glass and add the coke or pepsi. Some ice may be necessary.

name: Milpsi
preparation: Pour milk into a highball glass add the pepsi and drink before seperation occurs.

name: Big Booty Shake
preparation: Blend.

name: Black Dog
preparation: Pour the light rum and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black pitted olive and serve.

name: Smith and Wesson
preparation: Pour vodka kahlua and cream into glass filled with ice then top off with Pepsi.

name: Monkey's Lunch
preparation: Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk. Note: For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of bailey's irish cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim add liquor pour coffee and add some whip.

name: Toblerone
preparation: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.

name: Hot Vanilla
preparation: In a heavy saucepan combine the ingredients and warm over low heat. When small bubbles appear around the sides of the pan remove it from the heat and let the mixture sit at room temperature for 15 to 20 minutes. Place the pan back on the stove and rewarm the mixture whisking it briefly to redistribute the skin that forms on the milk's surface. Remove the vanilla bean half scrape out the seeds with a sharp knife and return the seeds to the milk. Pour the vanilla milk into two 8-ounce mugs and top with sprinklings of cinnamon or canela. Drink hot.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake #2
preparation: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Chocolate Drink
preparation: Melt the bar of chocolate in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat whipping gently (with a whisk i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

name: Lassi - Mango
preparation: Add to a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

name: Cool Cow
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Coconut Banana
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Tarzan's Juicy Cooler
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange speared with a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Hawaiian Island Surfer
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Pink Panther Shake
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender and mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh or frozen berries.

name: Magic Island
preparation: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with in-season fruit and serve with short straws.

name: Dutch Treat
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Fruit Fairy
preparation: Blend briefly in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of banana and a cherry.

name: Grape Flip
preparation: Shake or blend very well serving ice cold in a burgundy glass. If you wish to garnish use grapes.

name: Lassi Raita
preparation: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Add a dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

name: Black Cow
preparation: Pour root beer over ice cream and chocolate syrup in a large tumbler glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw and a long spoon.

name: Lemon Ice-Cream Soda
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add soda and mix gently. Add straws and serve.

name: Microwave Hot Cocoa
preparation: Combine sugar cocoa salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at high (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk stir and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla blend well.

name: Good Morning To You My Love
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a mixer with ice. Serve in a small bowl garnished with strawberries or grapes and a straw.

name: Parisette
preparation: Pour grenadine syrup over ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir fill with cold milk and stir again. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Coconut Kiss
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice garnish with an amarelle cherry and serve.

name: Lassi - Sweet
preparation: Mix ingredients in a blender until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

name: Lassi - Sweet #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Adjust ingredients to taste ensuring the right amount of ice is added.

name: Hot Chocolate
preparation: Combine sugar and cocoa add milk and a dash of salt. Makes 8 servings. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in a coffee mug add boiling water and stir.

name: Yoghurt Cooler
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve. Note: Use lots of ice. To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

name: Banana Milk Shake
preparation: Blend very well preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

name: Hot Chocolate To Die For
preparation: Melt the chocolate butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream. Serve in the smallest coffee mugs you can find to all your friends. Top with freshly whipped cream made from left over cream and a mini-marshmellow.

name: Franziska
preparation: Heat and stir until the honey is dissolved.

name: Lassi
preparation: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Serve cold. Lassi is a south indian drink and one of the easiest things to make. There are many ways of making it but essentially it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water) and you can choose almost any consistency that you like from the thinnest to the thickest.

name: Avocado Milkshake
preparation: Blend on medium for 3 to 5 minutes.

name: Fruit Flip-Flop
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Tropical Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake or build directly in the glass.

name: Hot Chocolate #2
preparation: Mix milk cocoa sugar and coffeemate. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in coffee mug add boiling water and stir.

name: Shirley's Sister
preparation: Pour lemonade and grenadine into a highball glass half-filled with broken ice. Fill with strawberry ice cream and top with chocolate syrup. Garnish with a strawberry add straws and serve.

name: Berry-Berry
preparation: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Babylove
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass and fill with crushed ice. Top with banana slices and serve.

name: Brown Cow #3
preparation: Pour the Coca-Cola into a large cup add 3 scoops of vanilla ice cream and serve.

name: Spanish Chocolate
preparation: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Lynchburg Mine Explosion
preparation: Mix the JD and 7-Up in a glass with ice. Once stirring is still pour the package of Pop-Rocks over the ice. The Pops Rock will start to melt and fly out of the glass one by one as it is consumed.

name: Dew Me
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey Southern Comfort and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with or add to taste the Mountain Dew and serve.

name: Beaver Rub
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bootleg
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Mountain Jack
preparation: Place ice cubes in a scotch glass poor in Jack D and Mountain Dew stir and serve. Use more or less Mountain Dew to your taste.

name: Jackbull
preparation: Mix pour into an old-fashioned glass over three ice cubes and serve.

name: Bittersweet Jack
preparation: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Jack Shit
preparation: Pour Jack Daniels Bailey's and Kahlua over 3 ice cubes in an Irish coffee cup. Fill glass with Nesquik chocolate milk and dash Tullamore Dew on top. Stir and serve.

name: Bessemer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Tennessee Margarita
preparation: Pour ingredients into a large rocks glass filled with ice. Squeeze in a lime wedge and serve.

name: Naple's Old-Fashioned
preparation: Muddle a sugar cube with bitters in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the whiskey and the orange juice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel slices of orange and a maraschino cherry. Add a straw and serve.

name: Kentucky Mango
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Cannibalized Christian
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large cocktail glass. Add more cherry coke if desired. Stir and serve.

name: Orange Climax
preparation: Mix one after the other shake and top with whipped cream.

name: Mountain Berry Punch
preparation: Combine the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey blueberry and raspberry schnapps strawberry liqueur cranberry juice and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a splash of 7-up. Float the cherry brandy on top. Garnish with an orange twist and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Spearmint Lifesaver
preparation: Mix 'em garnish with a slice of lime (optional) and serve.

name: Back Street Banger
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Applejack Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Legends of the Fall
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add all ingredients. Stir and serve.

name: Jackhammer
preparation: Serve over ice.

name: Southern Suicide
preparation: Mix ingredients on the rocks.

name: P & P
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apple Jack (Original)
preparation: Mix in glass on the rocks.

name: Southern Raspberry Tart #2
preparation: Pour liquors fill with sour mix and shake. Then top with 7-Up or Sprite and garnish with a cherry.

name: Apricot Jack
preparation: Pour two shots of Jack Daniels into a whiskey sour glass. Add one shot of Apricot Brandy. Combine with apricot nectar and sweet and sour mix. Top with a lemon cherry or orange slice. Stir and serve.

name: Monk Special
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a short glass and serve.

name: Apple Soda
preparation: Pour vodka Applejack brandy and apple schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well add 7-up and serve.

name: Caramel Apple Shot
preparation: Shake ingredients together in cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Apple Sauce
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend until slushy. Pour into a tall glass; highball hurricane or collins and serve.

name: Apple Slammer
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and present to consumer they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with their palm raise the glass slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

name: Apple Grande
preparation: Chill both ingredients! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

name: Tatanka
preparation: Pour Zubrowka vodka over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add apple juice and a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Piece of Mind
preparation: Pour the vodka and kummel into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Meister Mind Meld
preparation: Pour the coca-cola into a highball glass. Add the amaretto and drop in an ice cube.

name: Kahlua Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Bloody Hell
preparation: Pour the vodka over plenty o' ice cubes in a tall glass. Add the Worcestershire sauce and habanero sauce and stir. (If you can't find Hot Sauce From Hell use 5 dashes of the hottest Habanero sauce you can find or 8-10 dashes of Tabasco as a last resort.) Pour in the V8 juice (tomato juice has no body and does not mix well so don't attempt to substitute it). Give one stir only. Cover the ice generously with salt and then with fresh coursely ground black pepper (like so it sticks in your teeth and you gotta chew it).

name: Virgin Mary
preparation: Pour tomato juice over ice cubes in a large highball glass. Season to taste stir and garnish with celery.

name: Klingon Blood Wine
preparation: Add tabasco sauce to an ice-filled beer mug/glass. Pour in the tequila rum and grenadine and fill with cranberry juice. Shake twice and serve.

name: Karamozov Koffee
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve in a tall glass with iced coffee and with/without cream.

name: JB Black and Pepsi
preparation: Fill a glass with about a 1/5 of ice then pour Jim Beam Black Label until ice is covered. Fill the rest with Pepsi cola and serve.

name: Lager and Black
preparation: Pour Ribena blackcurrant syrup or similar into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add lager (well chilled) and serve.

name: Garnet and Black
preparation: Pour half a pint of Killian's into a pint glass followed by half a pint of Guinness Stout over a spoon in order to keep the two ingredients seperated in the glass. Serve.

name: Red White and Blue
preparation: Carefully layer in order into a shot glass; aftershock goldschlager then schnapps.

name: Xaviera
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add short straws and serve.

name: Buttered Toffee
preparation: Pour amaretto irish cream and Kahlua over ice cubes. Add half-and-half and stir well.

name: Brown Eye Opener
preparation: Mix all five together then chill.

name: Ice Coffee
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug and serve.

name: Hard On
preparation: Pour Kahlua into a cordial glass. Layer banana liqueur next then float the cream on top.

name: Cokahlualicious
preparation: Mix the kahlua and coconut liqueur poor over crushed ice and sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon on the top. Voila! You can also put this in a blender if you so desire.

name: Kahlua Butterball
preparation: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add butterscotch schnapps to taste and fill with milk. Serve.

name: Mexican Mocha
preparation: Combine the espresso black pepper cayenne pepper and chili pepper in the bottom of your coffee mug. Add the alcohol and chocolate. Stir with the cinnamon stick. Add hot water milk/cream optional drink and enjoy!

name: Headcrack
preparation: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

name: Kahlua Fudge Shake
preparation: Just like making a milk shake but add the kahlua and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Black Jew
preparation: Pour the Kahlua and Goldschlager into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over a few ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Chocolate Kiss
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Didaccino
preparation: Combine the Kahlua coffee liqueur chocolate liqueur and milk in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously pour into a coffee mug or glass and serve.

name: Creamy Tan
preparation: Add ice and all the ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Then serve in a large glass.

name: Black and White Cherry
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until the ice is crushed and the entire drink is creamy. Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with whipped cream and cherry and serve.

name: Black and White Soda
preparation: Combine chocolate syrup milk 1 scoop ice cream and vanilla in a tall glass. Stir vigorously with spoon to blend. Fill glass two-thirds full with club soda; stir. Add remaining ice cream; fill glass with club soda. Garnish with whipped cream and cherry.

name: French Dream
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: La Brea Tar Pit
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or lowball glass and serve.

name: Cobra
preparation: Pour ingredients into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel or squeeze and serve.

name: Hot Choco-Mora
preparation: Put Kahlua into a coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings if you have them.

name: B-55
preparation: Layer in order into a shot glass so that the kahlua is at the bottom.

name: Brown Elephant #2
preparation: Add 3 ice cubes to a 10 ounce glass. Add Amarula and Kahlua liqueurs. Top up with milk stir and serve.

name: Slider
preparation: Add Rye kahlua and milk to a high ball glass glass should be full of ice. Stir and enjoy.

name: Sneaky Wesley
preparation: Pour all and mix well.

name: Festrus
preparation: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

name: Reptile
preparation: Add ingredients chilled to a glass in order: whiskey orange juice and mountain dew. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Russian Cider
preparation: Pour vodka into a cocktail shaker. Add Martinelli's cider shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with a touch of extra cider if desired.

name: Goldfinger Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: One Night Stand
preparation: Blend ingredients with shiny mix thingy. Best results when chilled.

name: Golden Kiss Martini
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Hard Mick
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and mountain dew both amounts to personal taste and serve.

name: Dublin Driver
preparation: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.

name: Berlin Martini
preparation: Take a shaker filled with ice. Add 2 oz smirnoff vodka 3 dashes of schnapps a wee splash of black zambuca and shake well keeping your feet firmly planted posture perfect. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry.

name: Dark Mark
preparation: Combine equal amounts of both ingredients. Serve cold to very cold in wine glass or similar elegant presentation. NOTE: Mountain Dew Pitch Black original OR sour (type II) may be used but sour/II gives a better effect.

name: Slap Your Mama
preparation: Shake one part Orange Juice and one part Vodka together. Pour over ice and add one part Mountain Dew then stir slightly.

name: Haus Mix
preparation: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Add Smirnoff vodka and cranberry juice stir and serve.

name: The Kristy #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail glass. Add ice. If frozen drink is preferred use more ice and mix in blender.

name: Bailey Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cranberry Tart
preparation: Pour ice cold cranberry vodka add ice (the more the better). Top with orange juice and stir gently.

name: Mule
preparation: Pour smirnoff vodka into a glass. Fill with ginger beer add ice and squeeze in the lime juice.

name: Pulp Vega
preparation: Crush the cherries in a whiskey sour glass. Mix with vodka tropicana crystal light and margarita mix. Serve.

name: Cotton Candy
preparation: Add Butterscotch Schanapps and Mountain Dew to ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Janne's Summernight
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass add a straw and serve.

name: Pooky and Chooky
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass without ice.

name: Frappe #2
preparation: In a tall glass place a shot of water. Add instant coffee and sugar. The more coffee the more stronger. It's up to you how much sugar you will have. With no sugar we call it sketos (plain or black) with 1 tsp metrios (medium) and with 2 or more glykos (sweet). Blend with one of those small hand mixers. Add a splash of milk or more if wanted. Add lots of ice and fill it up with cold water. Serve.

name: Guinness Punch
preparation: Gently pour a well-chilled Guinness into a small mixing bowl or glass that will hold all of the liquid ingredients. Add the sweetened condensed milk spices and cocoa (if it's wanted). Stir or whisk well and pour the mixture into a pint-sized beer mug or pub glass. Makes 1 drink.

name: Iced Coffee
preparation: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in a coffee mug.

name: Homemade Coquito Bueno
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Store in glass bottles and place in refrigerator.

name: Leave It To Me
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Green Tea Martini
preparation: Combine ingredients in a martini shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Pour into a martini glass rimmed with lime juice and sugar. Garnish with lime slices.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #3
preparation: Mix ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Princess Cocktail
preparation: Sugar rim of glass. Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Shoot to the Moon
preparation: In a tall drink glass fill it up half way with cubed ice. Add liquor. Then add cranberry juice grenadine and soda and mix well.

name: Citrus Tango
preparation: Pour two shots of citrus or lemon vodka into the glass. Add pineapple juice and then half a can of orange soda. Mix well.

name: Padas Battery
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Waking to the Call of the Mockingbird
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cold Comfort Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Merlin's Love Potion
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: Green Iguana Margarita
preparation: Blend and pour into a salted glass.

name: Operation Recoverer
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with in-season fruit and serve with a short straw.

name: Citrus Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Cyber Smoke
preparation: Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.

name: Blueberry Lemonade
preparation: Pour the vodka and blueberry schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice. Sweeten to taste with sugar. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Pink Jacket
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Alfie Cocktail
preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Allison's Purple Nurple
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain into glass.

name: Jamaican Screw
preparation: Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.

name: Limonita
preparation: Pour the Stoli Limonnaya vodka triple sec and lemon juice into a mixing glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with salt and serve.

name: Dancin' Bones
preparation: Pour vermouth gin and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lady Finger
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tijuana Taxi
preparation: Pour tequila curacao and schnapps over ice into large highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Tijuana Carbomb
preparation: Pour bottle of corona in a pint glass. Wait for it to settle then drop in shot of cuervo and chug it down. Enjoy.

name: Orgasmic Fantasy
preparation: Pour vodka into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Add the bailey's kahlua and vanilla extract. Stir and serve.

name: Black Haus Warmer
preparation: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Bailey's irish cream into a mug. Add coffee and top whipped cream. Garnish with coffee beans covered with chocolate powder.

name: Heat of the Heart
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Float some extra Cointreau on top. Garnish with blackberries and a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: White Heart
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sweet Heart
preparation: Pour DeKuyper Razzmatazz raspberry schnapps vodka and sweet and sour mix into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of lemon-lime soda and serve.

name: Little Brother
preparation: Pour all the ingredients into blender. If preferred add an ice cube. Mix thoroughly and pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Bleeding Heart
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Tainted Heart
preparation: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

name: Incredible Heart
preparation: Fill 3/4 of the glass with pink champagne then fill the glass with Hpnotiq.

name: Viking Warmer
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.

name: Bruised Heart
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice stir and strain into shot glass.

name: Alex Trebek
preparation: Mix both shots together in a shot glass reciting ... and now your double jeopardy categories ... then toss back a good one!

name: Raspberry Kamikaze
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a glass. Add ice and serve.

name: Parrothead Martini
preparation: Pour the silver tequila triple sec and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Orange Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Neva Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) tomato juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice and serve.

name: Pepper Manhattan
preparation: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) and sweet vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Peppermint Twist
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps Kahlua coffee liqueur and dark creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Peppermint Patty #2
preparation: Mix both the schnapps and chocolate milk in a cocktail shaker. Ice optional. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Peppermint Mocha
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass add straw and serve.

name: Brown Bear
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: La Vida Loca
preparation: Cut the chili into small pieces. Put one or two teaspoons of chopped chili in the glass. Fill the glass with ice (not all the way up gotta save some space for the vodka). Mix the ice and chili well. Pour vodka and pineapple juice in the glass mix again. Serve with a straw.

name: Absolut Redhead
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Moscow Chill
preparation: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) into a champagne saucer filled with shaved ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper soda garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Hell's Mary
preparation: Add all ingredients (except vodka) to a blender. Blend and add Absolut Peppar vodka. Blend again to stir in vodka. Pour into a whiskey sour glass half-filled with ice. Add a stick of celery and serve.

name: Peppertini
preparation: Pour the Stoli pepper vodka (Pertsovka) and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Hot Spicy Banana
preparation: In a chilled old fashioned glass mix the first three ingredients then place a single ice cube in the drink and splash the peppermint schnapps on the ice cube. Serve.

name: Salt and Pepper Martini
preparation: Combine vermouth and absolut peppar in a mixing glass over ice. Stir strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cooch Behar
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Fucking Hot
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir briefly and serve.

name: Huntsman Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka jamaican rum and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add powdered sugar to sweeten. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Polyjuice Potion
preparation: For this to look like the polyjuice potion in the Harry Potter book you have to layer the whole concoction. First the kahlua to give the base then the vodka (which ever you prefer) then so forth. To simulate that the potion is bubbling add the splash of coke at the top.

name: She's Paying
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: Indian Summer
preparation: Mix all ingredients together and drink as a shot.

name: God's Child
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ohio
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except champagne) in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Arkansas Razorback
preparation: Add all together in a mixing tin with ice Shake to a froth and strain off the ice into the glass. The ice is just to get it cold and the shaking is to make it froth. Don't worry if it doesn't stay frothy.

name: Leah's Last Hope #2
preparation: Add ice mix and serve.

name: Gil's Revenge
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Malibu Tequichi
preparation: Shake with ice and serve in a champagne flute.

name: Mexican Surfer
preparation: Pour the malibu rum into an old-fashioned glass and add tequila and pineapple juice. Add ice and stir.

name: Irish Rickey
preparation: Pour irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Irish Coconut
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice. Strain into an iced highball glass top with soda stir and serve.

name: Irish Pirate
preparation: Combine in a shot glass.

name: Black Irish
preparation: Stir ingredients and let sit for one minute.

name: Balalaika
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Beelzebub
preparation: Usually you mix the Cointreau with the hot chili sauce before you start to mix the drink. It needs to mix well. Then you pour the right amount into a shot glass and add the vodka.(50/50)(The amount of chili sauce can be altered to find the mix that will grow hair on your chest)

name: Meadowlark Lemon
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a tumbler.

name: Orange Mule
preparation: Pour vodka and cointreau into a highball glass over ice. Fill with ginger ale and mix well. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Deanne
preparation: Pour vodka vermouth and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Blue Rox's Martini
preparation: Pour the Grey Goose vodka and Hpnotiq liqueur into a cocktail shaker 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a martini glass. Top with a generous splash of champagne and serve.

name: Bohemian Martini
preparation: Add to martini shaker with cracked ice and shake hard. Strain into glass and garnish with a licorice stick.

name: Chocolate Candy
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Stir pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Granny Smith
preparation: Add all ingredients together with ice.

name: Tokyo Rose
preparation: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Incredible Goose
preparation: Stir in equal amounts in a highball glass over ice and serve.

name: Golden Dream
preparation: Fill shaker glass one third full of ice cubes. Add galliano cream de cacao triple sec orange juice (non pulp) and light cream. Shake vigorously until creamy and strain into a champagne flute or use a blender and blend until creamy. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

name: The Drunk Smurf
preparation: Galliano is poured first into the glass. Red Bull is then followed by Orange Juice (you can use Orange Juice with pulp to add texture). Ensure that the drunk is stirred so that no layering takes place.

name: Fraser
preparation: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Italian Sunrise #2
preparation: Blend until slushy pour and enjoy.

name: Italian Margarita
preparation: Pour into a margarita/coupette glass and stir. Add ice cubes.

name: Merete
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass add the cherry and serve.

name: Italian Soda
preparation: Pour vodka over ice and fill with ginger ale.

name: Banana Italiano
preparation: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Banana Tree
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. Serve in a red wine glass garnished with a slice of banana (with peel).

name: Lust for Life
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Italian Stinger
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add brandy and galliano. Stir and garnish with wedge of lime.

name: Old Rootbeer Float
preparation: Add the Galliano liqueur to the Coke. Carefully drop in the vanilla ice cream being careful so it doesn't overflow too badly. Serve with a straw and spoon.

name: Merete
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry and serve.

name: Roman Riot
preparation: Build in an old-fashioned/rocks glass.

name: Italian Margarita
preparation: Pour into a margarita glass stir and add ice cubes.

name: Blue Shark
preparation: Combine vodka and rum in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Add several dashes of blue curacao and shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Joumbaba
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Skies
preparation: Simply follow the order above pouring directly into the glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the glass.

name: Electric Margarita
preparation: Moisten the rim of cocktail glass with a lime wedge and dip in salt. Combine tequila blue curacao and rose's lime juice in a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Exorcist Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Salty Chihuahua
preparation: Pour tequila over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with grapefruit juice and add a dash of salt.

name: Jojo
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Tequila Seabreeze
preparation: Pour the tequila into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and grapefruit juice. Stir garnish with a lime wedge and serve.!

name: Tequila Grapefruit
preparation: To make this refreshing drink you first fill a collins glass 3/4 with ice cubes. Then add 2 shots of any tequila of choice. Add a splash of lime juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with your favorite grapefruit juice (I use ruby red grapefruit juice cocktail). Stir and enjoy! A great drink for any time but especially good on a hot summer day/ evening.

name: Desert Skies
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: China Blue
preparation: Fill a collins glass almost to the top with ice. Pour all three ingredients over ice stir gently and serve. Can add grapefruit lemon or lime wedge. Can also add a cherries to garnish.

name: Warm and Fuzzy
preparation: Pour southern comfort triple sec and then cherry brandy into a shot glass.

name: Fuzzy Ethan
preparation: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker then shake and pour into glass. Add lime.

name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
preparation: Pour all ingredients over finely shaven ice in a margarita glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Lemon Fizz
preparation: Pour over ice in a collins glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Mango Orange Smoothie
preparation: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Royal Wild Strawberry
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Raspberry Citrus Punch
preparation: 1. Force raspberries through a sieve to remove the seeds. 2. Combine sugar and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil until sugar is dissolved to make a simple syrup. 2. Combine orange juice raspberries pineapple juice grapefruit juice and simple syrup. Chill. When ready to serve add soda water and ginger ale. (Serves 100.)

name: Great Grapes
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Wassail
preparation: 1. Heat the water to boiling. Cut the lemons and oranges (and lime if using) in half and squeeze the juice into a separate bowl to save throw the skins and pulp into the boiling water. Add spices and simmer for one hour. 2. Remove the cinnamon sticks a few cloves allspice and save to one side. Using a slotted spoon or strainer remove the citrus peels and pulp and the remaining spices. Return the cinnamon sticks and saved spices to the water. Add the apple juice or cider and return to heat. 3. When boiling remove from heat and add the citrus juice and sugar. Simmer very lightly for another 10 minutes and serve. Delicious!

name: Hot Buttered Cranberry Punch
preparation: Crush cranberry sauce with a fork. Mix with sugar spices and salt. Add water and pineapple juice. Cover and simmer 2 hours. Ladle into mugs and float a pat of butter in each serving.

name: Lemonade Golden
preparation: Shake lemon juice egg yolk and sugar syrup over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes and carefully fill with water or soda.

name: End Wrench
preparation: Add ice. Tastes remarkably like a screwdriver.

name: Cranberry Juice Cocktail
preparation: Wash the cranberries and put them into a nonreactive saucepan with the water a pinch of salt and if you wish the orange slices. Cook over medium heat until all the berries burst -- about 10 minutes. Pour the fruit and liquid into a cheesecloth-lined sieve. Strain the juice to the saucepan add the sugar and boil for two or three minutes. Taste and add more sugar if it is needed. Cool and chill the juice before serving.

name: Lemonade
preparation: Stir lemon juice and sugar well in a large highball glass. Add ice cubes fill with soda and stir again. Serve.

name: LimLer
preparation: Squeeze the 8 parts of a lime and the brown sugar with a wooden muddler fill up with apple juice and crushed ice.

name: Orange Flip
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender and serve into glasses.

name: Lemon Flip
preparation: Add egg yolk sugar syrup and lemon juice over several ice cubes in a shaker. Shake very well and strain into a highball glass. Add a straw and serve.

name: Lemon Sherbert Punch
preparation: Mix lemonade concentrate in a very large punch bowl. Add soda and frozen fruit. Open sherbet and dump the entire package of it into the punch (it will float on the top). Due to the frozen fruit and sherbet there is really no need for ice until later or unless it it very hot.

name: Limeade
preparation: Add the lime juice and sugar to a large glass and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass and serve.

name: Rosemary
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into a highball glass three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Add lemonade garnish with a slice of lime and a strawberry add straws and serve.

name: Maurizio's Dream
preparation: Chop the lime stir in the cane sugar and ginger. Add the crushed ice and fill up with apple juice.

name: Grapefruit Lemonade
preparation: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler add grenadine syrup and grapefruit juice top up with soda water. Stir a little and serve with a drinking straw.

name: Lemouroudji
preparation: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so add the sugar and the lemon juice. Chill and serve.

name: Raspberry Punch
preparation: Pour pink grapefruit juice and ginger ale into a punch bowl. Add raspberry juice or 12 oz frozen raspberries (stir to un-thaw). Add sherbet and stir until melted.

name: Tea Punch
preparation: Combine and serve with ice.

name: Pineapple Lemonade
preparation: Mix juice and sugar syrup in a large tumbler with several ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold soda water. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Green Leaves
preparation: Place mint leaves into a large highball glass and pour in peppermint syrup. Press with a barspoon. Add a scoop of crushed ice fill with tonic water and stir. Serve.

name: Strawberry Salad
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda water) and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add the soda garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: St. Clements
preparation: Put the two ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice and serve in a highball glass over whole ice cubes with a twist of lemon and a twist of orange.

name: Warm Witch's Blood
preparation: Bring to a boil in a saucepan and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer gently for 15 minutes stirring and muttering appropriate incantations. Serve in ghoulish glasses garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Cranberry Punch
preparation: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into three seperate shot glasses. Savor the scent for a moment and shoot.

name: Pineapple Power
preparation: Place the can of sliced pineapple with juice into a blender jar. Add the water honey and ginger and blend on medium speed until well mixed. Pour into one tall two medium or three small glass.

name: Saint Clemence
preparation: Mix with ice serve. Oranges and lemons say the bells of St Clemence

name: Audrey's Russian
preparation: Mix Bailey's cream and Buttershot Schnapps together well. Serve on the rocks.

name: Irish Float
preparation: Float irish cream on top of the cola.

name: Corey's Oatmeal Cookie
preparation: Pour Bailey's irish cream and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add a couple of dashes of cinnamon. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Dust wth cinnamon and serve.

name: Kerry Cappuccino
preparation: Add bailey's and creme de cacao to a normal cup of cappuccino and serve.

name: Irish Cappuccino
preparation: Add bailey's to a standard cappuccino and serve.

name: Boo Hoo
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Cerebral Hemorrhage
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Kahlua then carefully layer on Bailey's then the peach schnapps. Add a few drops of grenadine for effect.

name: Cherry Kiss #2
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream into a pousse cafe glass. Carefully pour the Chambord over the back of a teaspoon in order to float it on top of the Bailey's. Serve.

name: A Kissed Buttery Nipple
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 4 or 5 cubes of ice. Pour the whole thing into a glass and add cherries.

name: Irish Paddy
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed or a Rocks glass filled with ice.Side garnish with a York Peppermint Paddy or a Fudge Mint Oreo.

name: Monk Cocktail
preparation: Combine the Bailey's irish cream Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and vanilla ice cream in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass add a straw and serve.

name: B-28
preparation: Layer in order in a lowball glass.

name: Orgasm #7
preparation: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Marv Alberts
preparation: Pour bailey's irish cream and southern comfort into a glass and mix in the butterscotch schnapps.

name: Pinglan
preparation: Shake milk irish cream and pisang ambon. Pour into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Cabin Fever
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream and creme de menthe into a coffee mug and stir. Add hot chocolate and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and a maraschino cherry if desired and serve.

name: Sour Pussy
preparation: Mix over ice.

name: Silver Nest
preparation: Pour the orange juice cranberry juice egg and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: The Kruzewski
preparation: Put a couple ice cubes into a coffee mug then add juices and mix a great morning drink.

name: Evil Princess
preparation: Pour over ice stir and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Fruit And Sherbet Punch
preparation: Mix the carbonated soft drink (like 7-Up) with different flavored fruit juices and float the sherbet on top before serving.

name: Fruit Daydream
preparation: Combine all above ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into glasses and serve.

name: Elephant Charger
preparation: Peel and slice the peach chop the banana; add to a blender. Add orange juice milk raspberrries and ice cream and blend well. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Kiddie Cocktail
preparation: Build in a highball glass. Add 7-up or sprite over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: Summer Rain
