preparation: Blend all ingredients (except lemonade) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a highball glass. Add lemonade garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: Malawi Shandy
preparation: Pour equal parts of ginger ale and lemon soda into a beer mug filled with ice. Add a round of orange and top with a dash or two of bitters. Very good on a hot sticky day.

name: Strawberry Dream #2
preparation: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.

name: Babymama
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass on the rocks.

name: Fruity Ball of Fuck
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Girls Night Out
preparation: Pour each of the Archers flavors into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade add a shot of grenadine and serve.

name: Czar's Cup
preparation: Chill all ingredients as well as an 8-oz wine glass prior to serving. Pour vodka and maraschino liqueur into the glass and fill with champagne. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Miss Zoe's Hello Kitty
preparation: Blend strawberry vodka and peach schnapps with crushed ice in a pina-colada glass. Add a crushed strawberry popsicle which should settle at the bottom of the glass. Top with whipped cream and a strawberry and serve.

name: All Night Hunter
preparation: Pour equal amounts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Ladies Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the pineapple stick on top and serve.

name: Nick at Night
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila peach schnapps sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Up All Night
preparation: Pour Red Bull into a Collins Glass. Pour a shot of Jgermeister into a shot glass. When ready to drink drop the shot into the collins glass and drink.

name: All Night Long
preparation: Mix all together in hurricane glass. Shake well. Garnish-orange flag.

name: Tonight's the Night
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: A Night In Old Mandalay
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the light rum anejo rum orange juice and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: This is the Night
preparation: Pour into a double-cocktail glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Kori's Saturday Night Special
preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth. If it gets too thick add some cream. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell
preparation: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

name: A Night At Naughty Nikki's
preparation: Place the skittles or other fruity chewy candy in the bottom of a shot glass then pour 7-up and vodka.

name: Hen Night Zipper-Ripper
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry and serve.

name: Burn's Night Special
preparation: Pour vermouth whisky and benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Long Summer Night
preparation: Pour the southern comfort triple sec and sour mix over ice in a glass. Fill with mountain dew stir and serve.

name: Pinky
preparation: Pour rumple minze into a shot glass add firewater and serve.

name: Stinky Weasel
preparation: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

name: Pinky Colada
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry and serve.

name: Arthur's Day Dream
preparation: Blend briefly with three-quarters glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass then add the soda water. Serve with straws and garnish with a slice of lemon and a sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: Strawberry Dream
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with two halves of a strawberry placed back to back. Add a short straw and serve.

name: Barbados Planter's Punch
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a chilled collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange a slice of banana a maraschino cherry and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Banana Colada
preparation: Blend 4 first ingredients with 1/2 cut cracked ice at high speed in 15-25 seconds. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice.

name: Eye of the Tiger
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle dark rum on top and garnish with an orange slice. Serve with straws.

name: Escape Route
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Strawberry Fields Forever
preparation: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Berryessa Blast
preparation: Pour the gold rum and Southern Comfort into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add guava juice to taste and serve.

name: Bongo Cola
preparation: Pour gold rum coffee liqueur kirsch pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mustique Whammy
preparation: Shake all but champagne and strain into a wine glass. Add the champagne.

name: Castro Cooler
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Drop in a spiral of lime. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve with a straw.

name: Kiss From Rudy
preparation: Pour alcohols into a cocktail glass add juices then grenadine and cream and garnish with a cherry or pineapple wedge.

name: Strawberries And Cream
preparation: Place schnapps half-and-half sugar and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a high speed. Add 2 of the strawberries and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a parfait glass top with the other strawberry and serve with a straw.

name: Banshee Berry
preparation: Pour each of the three ingredients into a shot glass. Stir.

name: Wild Berry Pop-Tart
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shot glass slam it on the table and shoot it followed promptly with a beer.

name: Cloud 99
preparation: Mix the banana peach and strawberry schnapps. Shake and strain into a double shot glass. Add a drop of grenadine and let it sink to the bottom. Add a splash of orange juice and let it swirl. If done properly it will look like a cloudy sunset hence the name.

name: Fire in the Disco
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Ensure the red curry paste is thoroughly dissolved. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mexican Rose
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a double-shot glass.

name: Tickle Me Elmo
preparation: Pour schnapps over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice to taste and then everclear. Mix and serve.

name: Strawberry Margarita
preparation: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps tequila triple sec lemon juice and strawberries with ice strain into the salt-rimmed glass and serve.

name: The Dragon
preparation: Place all ingredients in a glass and mix.

name: Strawberry Bomb
preparation: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!

name: Burning Sun
preparation: Pour over ice in highball glass stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

name: Cherry Popper
preparation: Add the strawberry schnapps to a glass and fill with 7-Up. Drop in a cherry and serve.

name: Babymama Drama
preparation: Mix 99 bananas pineapple juice and Stoli with ice. Strain into test tube float 151.

name: Moose Juice
preparation: Stir nice and easy together in a punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

name: Antwoine
preparation: Layer ingredients in a shot glass (Kahlua at the bottom). Chill and serve as a shot.

name: Mad Cow
preparation: Mix in a shaker one-quarter filled with ice and pour into a liberal shot glass.

name: Dead Lawyer
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hypno Fusion
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Hpnotiq Liquer and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine stir and serve.

name: Red Headed Mexican
preparation: Pour desired amount of sprite over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila splash grenadine and serve.

name: Arkansas Avalanche
preparation: Pour Goldschlager Sprite and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Shirley Temple #3
preparation: Pour Sprite over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add grenadine and serve.

name: Bottlecap
preparation: Combine ingredients. May be served on the rocks or chilled and strained as a shot.

name: Mountain Dew
preparation: Fill a beer glass half-way with beer. Fill the other half with 7-up. (If you have the patience pour a little of one then a little of the other until the glass is full.) Fill a shot glass with melon liqueur. Drop the entire shot glass into the glass of beer. Immediately consume the entire pint of beer with the shot glass still inside.

name: Fresh Melon Martini
preparation: Cut up both melons and add to blender. Blend well and strain. Add Skyy melon vodka to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add about 2-4 oz of the blended melon juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a melon ball for garnish and serve.

name: Scotch Melon Sour
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Banshee
preparation: Pour the white creme de cacao banana liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Bomb
preparation: Dissolve everclear and sugar into a tiny bowl. Pour equal amount into two shot glasses ignite each shot glass for a couple seconds then blow them out. Mix the grenadine and chocolate syrup into a third shot glass. Shoot the first two everclear/sugar shots right away followed by the grenadine/chocolate syrup shot.

name: Citrus Kiss
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Raspberry
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice firstly in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Hermie's Hard Neapolitan
preparation: Pour the strawberry liqueur white creme de cacao and French vanilla coffee creamer into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with milk and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Banana
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice. Garnish with slice of banana.

name: Louisville Lady
preparation: Combine the bourbon whiskey white creme de cacao and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
preparation: In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass.

name: July Passion
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add lemonade garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Raspberry #2
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #2
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a glass.

name: 5 Deadly Venoms
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well (until red-ish). Serve into shot glasses as appropriate.

name: Ariel's Frappe Punch
preparation: Blend all ingredients in blender and serve in Highball glass. Decorate with a Marachino cherry and a grapefruit slice.

name: Lemon Frappe
preparation: Combine first 3 ingredients in blender container; process until smooth. Spoon into pitcher; stir in ginger ale. Serve immediately. Makes 5 cups.

name: Coconut Frappe
preparation: Shake or blend until frothy then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.

name: Cognac Mint Frappe
preparation: Mix and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve with a short straw.

name: Fruit Rum Frappe
preparation: Pour the rum creme de bananes creme de cassis and orange juice into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Orange Frappe
preparation: Mix and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Fruit Frappe
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
preparation: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Banana Strawberry Frappe
preparation: Use a blender or food processor for this recipe. Put all ingredients in blender and turn to puree mode until of desired consistency. (Make only about 2 servings at one time so the blender will not be overfilled.) If using a food processor use the steel knife to process; 8-10 seconds will be sufficient. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Royal Flush
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tumbler over ice strain into a glass and serve.

name: David's Red Robbin
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Blackjack Margarita
preparation: Fill a large margarita glass with ice. Add with tequila triple sec and chambord. Add the lime juice or sour mix. Shake garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Northern Sweet Tea
preparation: Fill Hurricane glass with cubed ice. Pour all four liquors and lemonade to half inch below the rim. Float of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and lemon speared.

name: Sweet Lollishot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with a pineapple-flavored lollipop with a plastic stick where possible.

name: Hand Job
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wild Ass Indian
preparation: Shake.

name: Emerald Jewel Funtini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or into a Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Pirate's Cordial
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Coco-Mocha Alexander
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: Mudslinger
preparation: Add ingredients to a large jug or punch bowl and stir well.

name: Tropical Sunrise
preparation: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum triple sec orange juice and pineapple juice. Stir. Add Grenadine and top with cherry and other fruit.

name: Ginger Spice
preparation: Pour spiced rum over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Calypso Cooler
preparation: Pour the spiced rum peach schnapps dark rum orange juice grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange flag and serve.

name: Thames Water
preparation: Pour the two small bottles (Britvic size) of Orange Juice in first. Top up with Cola the fizzier the better. Stir.

name: Bat Bite
preparation: Pour the spiced rum over ice cubes in a glass. Fill with cranberry juice and add a splash of grenadine. Stir and serve.

name: Cherry Cola
preparation: Combine and stir. Tastes like Cherry Coke.

name: Barbados Punch
preparation: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime slice and a pineapple wedge.

name: Toxic Cream Factory
preparation: Slowly Pour Baileys first then Tequila Rose followed by Kahlua. Shoot quick or slow.

name: Glitter and Trash
preparation: Pour gin into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with sprite. Top up with a splash of vodka.

name: Earthquake #2
preparation: Pour vodka gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.

name: Caribbean Bliss
preparation: Use chilled orange juice but no ice.

name: Comfort Driver
preparation: Pour orange juice over 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Add southern comfort and stir lightly.

name: Japanese Slipper
preparation: Combine equal parts of each ingredient in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Butterfinger
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour Butterscotch Schnapps and Bailey's into the glass. Fill with Milk. Shake. Serve with sip straw.

name: Creamy Grasshopper
preparation: Blend until smooth. Drink should have a thick shake-like consistency.

name: Snowball
preparation: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Elf Tea #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Iced Lemonade Tea
preparation: Mix the sugar and lemonade together in a large bowl. Pour boiling tea over the top let cool and serve.

name: Brian's Belief
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum creme de cacao lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tea and stir well.

name: Gorgeous
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Tea Toddy
preparation: Make tea as you usually do. Mix it with the sugar according to taste. Leave room in the cup for a dash of Baileys. Pour the baileys in according to taste then if you want a dash of Whiskey if you want. Not too much though as the drink won't taste good.

name: Indian Tea
preparation: Gently simmer tea and peel in a small saucepan for 1 - 2 minutes. Add liquors and pour with peel into a cup. Serve.

name: Autumnal Equinox
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Masala Chai
preparation: 1. Bring two cups of water to the boil. Add all the ingredients (except milk and sugar) and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for one minute. 2. Warm milk in a pot. Filter the above tea into cups. Add milk and sugar and serve.

name: Blueberry Tea #2
preparation: Pour amaretto and grand marnier into a glass. Add hot tea and serve immediately.

name: Texas T
preparation: Make tea add tequila and shake.

name: Kurant Tea
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add hot/very warm apple tea and if you like some sugar.

name: Russian Tea
preparation: Make tea in the water and add rest of ingredients. Simmer for at least half an hour and serve.

name: Herbal Flame
preparation: Pour hot damn 100 into the bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with a spoon straw or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

name: Fireside Tea
preparation: Pour tea into a heat-proof goblet and sweeten to taste. Add rum wedge-shaped slice of lemon and a cinnamon stick. Serve.

name: Gunfire
preparation: Pour one cup of strong black tea add rum and stir.

name: Artillery Punch
preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

name: Hot Toddy
preparation: Brew tea and fill a tall glass 3/4 full. Mix in honey. Mix in brandy shots. Add lemon slice and enjoy.

name: Scotch Toddy
preparation: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.

name: Ugandan Ginger Tea
preparation: Set the milk tea and sugar to boil. Wash a thumb-sized piece of fresh ginger. Pound until flat where juice should begin to ooze. Add the ginger to the milk-tea mixture when it begins to boil. Reduce the heat letting it all simmer for 2-3 minutes.

name: Amaretto Tea
preparation: Pour hot tea into a pousse cafe glass using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

name: Cranberry Tea Hot Punch
preparation: Make strong tea with the teabags and boiling water. Add cranberry juice apple cider brown sugar and spices. Stir until the sugar dissolves. Garnish with orange slices and serve.

name: Raspberry Iced Tea
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. This is basically a long island iced tea with raspberry liqueur instead of cola. Quite good.

name: Peachy Tea
preparation: Pour all ingredients into hurricane glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon.

name: Bucket
preparation: Mix in five gallon bucket. If too strong mix to taste.

name: Gila Monster
preparation: Mix all ingredients in shaker top with orange juice.

name: Green Apple #2
preparation: Place all ingredients (minus 7-up) in a shaker with ice and shake until cold. Pour a splash of 7-up into an old-fashioned glass and add the contents of the shaker.

name: Green Dinosaur #4
preparation: Add all ingredients and shake.

name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
preparation: Add all ingredients in collins glass w/ice and stir.

name: Fucked by a Rockstar
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Knockout Punch
preparation: Pour all three together and mix well.

name: Afghanistany Whore
preparation: Just pour to taste and enjoy.

name: Nuclear Waste
preparation: Blend vodka blue curacao and bailey's in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and top up with coke.

name: Baby Jane
preparation: Blend with ice and serve with a cherry on top.

name: The Pickle Barrel
preparation: Pour ingredients together over ice in a tall glass. Pour into a cocktail shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into glass. Garnish with a lemon. Add sugar to taste and serve.

name: Dog Piss
preparation: Dump the ingredients into a container and stir it. It's very simple and very delicious.

name: California Iced Tea
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or an orange slice.

name: Green Fairy #2
preparation: Combine equal measures in a straight shot glass - blended not layered. Serve.

name: Green Monster #2
preparation: Pour 151 rum lime juice and food coloring into a glass with several ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Gables #2
preparation: Pour the gin vermouth and Chartreuse into a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Green Goddamn #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Green Hell #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice and add orange juice. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Green Cow #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together and serve.

name: Amazon Street Lemonade
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add 2 oz vodka and fill the glass with lemonade.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: A Little Dinghy
preparation: Pour the shots into a glass of ice and fill the glass with equal parts orange juice cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge an orange slice and an umbrella.

name: Grape Coconut
preparation: Build over ice into a highball glass.

name: Ocean Drive
preparation: Pour malibu rum and curacao into a cocktail glass. Add by pouring down the side of the glass in order; orange juice pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Mikey Mike
preparation: Mix ingredients in a tumbler and shake thoroughly. Pour over ice in a tall glass.

name: Red Headed Woodpecker
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cranberry juice) together in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add sufficient cranberry juice to turn the drink red and serve.

name: Cadillac Margarita
preparation: Shake 100% blue agava tequila with grand marnier and lime juice and strain into a chilled salt-rimmed cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Top Shelf Margarita
preparation: Fill mixing glass with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake well. Pour into salt rimmed glass. Add lime wedge or wheel.

name: African on Acid
preparation: Pour the watermelon vodka and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake briefly strain into a double-sized shot glass and serve.

name: Barney on Acid Highball
preparation: Build ingredients on ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Captain Morgan on Acid
preparation: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a double shot glass. Add 2-3 drops of grenadine and serve.

name: ACID Pitchshifter
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass rimmed with lemon zest and sugar.

name: Acid Rain
preparation: Drink about a third of the bottle of Snapple Rain and then fill it back up with bacardi. Put the cap back on and shake it up.

name: Acid Water
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Moonshine and Everclear into an old-fashioned or highball glass. Add the 7-up stir briefly and serve.

name: Battery Acid
preparation: Combine equal amounts of green chartreusse Jose Cuervo tequila and Bacardi 151 rum in a shot glass leaving a little room for a few drops of tabasco sauce. Stir then add the tabasco sauce and shoot it fast. NOTE: People who have not experienced chartreuse before or can't take tabasco sauce well may need a chaser or a glass of water.

name: Green Wave
preparation: Pour alcohols into a hurricane glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix. Add ice and serve.

name: Dickel & Dew
preparation: Take a large glass and fill with ice cubes. Add 1 part george dickel tennessee whiskey to 2 parts of mountain dew.

name: 7 on 7
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the Seagrams 7 and the other half with 7-Up or Sprite or any lemon lime soda and serve. Can also be made with Seagrams VO.

name: Don Pedro
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Blue Caboose
preparation: Pour each measure in to the shot glass(Do not mix!!!) and enjoy.

name: Pink Panties
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Whiskey Punjabi
preparation: Mix stir.

name: Black Watch
preparation: Pour all ingrediants into a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Stir well - strain into a highball glass.

name: Evil Spell
preparation: Add crushed ice to a 10-oz glass until 1/3 full. Pour the Sortilege rye whiskey and fresh apple juice. Add a cinnamon stick. Stir and garnish with a slice of apple. Serve.

name: Irish Cream #2
preparation: Put everything into a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

name: Culloden
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a champagne flute stir and serve.

name: Deerslayer
preparation: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the Jgermeister and Windsor stir then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.

name: Dancing Leprechaun
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a glass with ice cubes and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Ballchain Blaster
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the Jameson Irish Whiskey and top it off with Dr. Pepper. Serve

name: Hot Whiskey
preparation: Pour the whiskey into a whiskey sour glass. Add cloves into the fresh lemon and place into the whiskey. Fill with hot water and dissolve in the sugar. Serve immediately.

name: Scotch Mist
preparation: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.

name: Frisky
preparation: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

name: Japanese Slipper #2
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sangria Margarita
preparation: Pour the tequila margarita mix lime juice and triple sec into an average sized blender filled with crushed ice and blend well. Dip rim of a 16-oz. margarita glass in the blender to wet and apply salt if desired. Pour the blender mixture into the glass until 2/3 full add the sangria and serve.

name: OC Margarita
preparation: Pour the tequila orange cognac and triple sec on the rocks in a tall salt-rimmed margarita glass. Add sour mix to taste. Serve.

name: Frozen Margarita #2
preparation: In a blender add the can of limeade. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves 4.

name: Cockteaser
preparation: Pour into chilled shot glass.

name: Mango Margarita #2
preparation: Combine in blender with about half a cup of crushed ice. Grind only to broken/crushed state. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with lime and/or mango slice and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail #3
preparation: Use a large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake ingredients well and pour them through a strainer into a margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.

name: Catalina Margarita
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail or margarita glass.

name: Penalty Shot
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and mix.

name: Chili Margarita
preparation: Cut the pineapple into big half-ring slices/chuncks. Place them in a 1-gallon or more jar along with the whole jalapenos and fill with the tequila. Let age for at least 2 weeks. When properly aged fill a cocktail shaker with ice lemonade lime juice and 1 to 2 oz of the pineapple-jalapeno infused mixture (depending on taste). Shake and pour in a chilled salt rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with slice of lemon lime and a small jalapeno ring. Enjoy this sweet and spicy refreshing margarita!

name: Silk Stocking
preparation: Pour tequila dark creme de cacao heavy cream and Chambord into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gino's Perfect Margarita
preparation: Place salt on a dish and rub rim of a margarita glass with a lime wedge. Dip glass in the salt to coat rim thoroughly. Pour teguila triple sec lime juice sweet and sour orange juice and ice into a blender. Set on high speed until well blended. Pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with a lime and serve. Optionally pour Grand Marnier orange liqueur on top for a float then serve.

name: Chambord Margarita
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour over ice in a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Serve.

name: Golden Margarita
preparation: Shake ingredients vigorously with crushed ice in a shaker glass and pour over crushed ice in a lightly salted margarita glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve with two cocktail straws.

name: Waborita
preparation: In a shaker over ice combine the ingredients pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Cranberry Margarita
preparation: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.

name: Mansion Margarita
preparation: Blend ingredients in a shaker and serve on the rocks in a margarita glass.

name: Cucaracha
preparation: Place equal measures of tequila and kahlua in a glass with ice stir and serve.

name: Margarita Cocktail #4
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a margarita glass (salt rim if desired). Makes 2 servings.

name: Irish Rose
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Tirade
preparation: Takes a 2 oz shot glass. First put in the triple sec then tequila last the spiced rum.

name: Dragon Piss #2
preparation: Pour the tequila and Midori liqueur into a cocktail glass. Top with Mountain Dew and serve.

name: Peach Margarita
preparation: Pour tequila peach schnapps and sweet and sour over ice in a margarita glass. Add grenadine stir slightly and serve.

name: The Perfect Margarita #2
preparation: Rim a large chilled margarita cocktail glass with lime and salt. Place ingredients in a shaker glass with about six ice cubes. Shake vigorously and pour into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Irish Shake
preparation: Blend all the ingredients except the whipped cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a frappe glass (or similar) cover it with the whipped cream and serve.

name: Melon Margarita #2
preparation: Add the tequila melon liqueur orange juice and triple sec to a blender with some crushed ice. Blend until desired consistency. Pour intoa rimmed margarita glass and serve.

name: Snapple and Schnapps
preparation: Fill shaker (or glass) with crushed ice. Pour schnapps in first and top with Snapple. Shake like hell and pour into a frosted (preferably) highball glass.

name: Cherry Raspberry Shake
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into a collins glass add a straw and serve.

name: Fruit Sensation
preparation: Fill glass with ice and add all the ingredients - mix well. Add straw and garnish if required.

name: Peach Cooler
preparation: In a blender combine lemon-lime soda peach halves and lemon juice. Blend until smooth and pour into glasses. Serve topped with the vanilla ice-cream and crushed ice.

name: Peach Cider
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps and apple cider into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

name: Seattle Smog
preparation: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

name: Fuzzy Melonberry
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Fuzzy Pucker
preparation: Pour the peach and raspberry schnapps over ice in a hurricane glass. Add orange juice and layer half-and-half on top. Serve.

name: Tina Baker
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. of peach schnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with Orange Juice. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-Up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.

name: Pootie Tang
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into a highball glass and add Tang. Fill with water stir well and serve.

name: Brief Encounter
preparation: Combine the sherbet peach schnapps and coconut liqueur in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and drizzle with grenadine. Garnish with lemon slices and serve.

name: Kodi Odie
preparation: Stir together in a collins glass. Add ice if desired and serve.

name: Watercolour
preparation: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice to taste. Garnish with a cherry or a pineapple chunk.

name: Orange Blossom Special
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 6 ice cubes in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Brandied Peaches 'n' Cream
preparation: Mix well in a blender until smooth. Serve in a specialty glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or fresh peach wedge.

name: Medusa Punch
preparation: Fill a container (size of an iced-tea pitcher) almost halfway with ice. Fill to slightly above ice with a decent California White Zinfandel. Add one part peach schnapps and a splash of sour mix. Fill the remaining space (should be a little less than a quarter of the pitcher) with cranberry juice. Seal and shake vigourously. Serve in glasses.

name: Pineapple Monyca
preparation: Pour pineapple juice triple sec and schnapps into a collins glass. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Pink Dink
preparation: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour equal amounts of Strawberry & Peach Schnapps into glass until glass is 1/2 full. Pour equal amounts of 7-up & Lemon Sour (The kind in a bar gun is the best)into the glass until almost to the top. Top off with a splash of Gredadine. Stir well with straw or shake.

name: Peach Pussy
preparation: Stir ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Serve with an orange peel twist.

name: C3PO
preparation: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

name: HeadSpinner
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with Sprite or 7-Up and serve.

name: Fuzzy Cola
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cola stir well and serve.

name: 80's Peach Wine Cooler
preparation: Pour the Chablis white wine into a tall wine glass and top with 7-Up. Add peach juice and serve.

name: Just Peachy
preparation: Mix together the peach schnapps and the iced tea and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Fisting in a Mexican Prison
preparation: Shake the tequila cranberry juice and the lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Glaciermeister
preparation: Mix the ice cream milk and jagermeister in a blender until smooth.

name: Savoy Affair
preparation: Rim a double-cocktail glass with lime and caster sugar. Pour ingredients into the sugar-rimmed glass garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Peach Bunny
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Screaming Orgasm
preparation: Add hot coffee first to warm the glass then add remaining ingredients. Serve in Brandy Snifter or Irish Coffee Mug. (May be topped with small amount of whipped cream but personally I think that spoils it) Multiples? Yes please!

name: Wild Irish Buttery Squirrel
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold and pour into a chilled ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Pretty Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Nutcracker #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Brandy Alexandra
preparation: Blend all the ingredients in blender garnished with cinnamon powder.

name: Nutcracker
preparation: Pour above listed ingredients into a blenderBlend until smooth(if too thick add milk..if too thin add ice cream).

name: Moosemilk
preparation: Place ingredients in a blender and mix until even consistency. (Note: usually made in a large batch using above ratios and served punch style at parties.)

name: Old Fashioned Hot Buttered Rum
preparation: 1. Combine sugar brown sugar and butter in a 2-quart saucepan. Cook over low heat stirring occasionally until butter is melted (6-8 min). 2. Combine cooked mixture with ice-cream in a large mixing bowl and beat at medium speed scraping bowl often until smooth (1-2 min). Store refrigerated up to 2 weeks or frozen up to one month. 3. For each serving fill one-quarter of a mug with mixture add one ounce rum and three-quarters of a cup of boiling water. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Pink Panties #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients (except cream) together in a blender adjusting unspecified amounts to your own taste. Pour into a pitcher and serve into margarita glasses topped with a sliced strawberry and whipped cream.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #2
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Creamsicle Margarita
preparation: Blend all ingredients until slushy. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Brandy Alexander
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy creme de cacao and half-and-half. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Velvet Hammer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bitches from Hell
preparation: Layer ingredients into a shot glass in order; jagermeister at the bottom then banana liqueur followed up with half-and-half.

name: Banana Split
preparation: Combine ingredients shake and pour over ice. Garnish with cherries.

name: Candy Cane
preparation: In highball glass filled with ice combine peppermint schnapps white creme de cacao & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with 7-up. Garnish with a small candycane or filbert nuts. Great for the Holidays!

name: Blue Angel
preparation: Pour the brandy blue curacao vanilla liqueur half-and-half and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Bad Mangofucker
preparation: Pour the rum and fruit juice into a blender on top of 6 - 8 ice cubes. Blend the mixture until it is smooth. Then pour the contents into a 16 ounce glass or beer mug and pour peach soda into the glass until full. If you can't get peach-flavored soda then orange or another fruit-flavored soda will do in a pinch. Toss in a straw and enjoy! Makes 1 serving.

name: Bad Hair Day
preparation: 1. Brew your favorite non-flavored coffee. Works well with nice morning blend beans. Meanwhile heat up your milk in a saucepan or nuke it in the microwave. Do NOT boil it. 2. Fill a giant coffee mug half to two-thirds full of the coffee. 3. Foam your milk by whisking it in a large bowl or putting it in a French Press and repeatedly swooshing it until it doubles in volume. Then fill up the rest of the mug with it. 4. Add the vanilla syrup or lliqueur. 5. Squirt on half of the whipped cream. Stir gently until it is at least half melted into the coffee then squirt a whole pile more on top. The sky is the limit here when you're having a bad hair day. 6. Add chocolate sprinkles on top. Enjoy!

name: Bad Habit
preparation: Combine in a shot glass vodka first.

name: Bad Attitude
preparation: Shake all ingredients together with equal parts of each juice and pour into a tall glass.

name: Bohemian Bad Ass
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream whiskey and beer over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Moocow's Brown Cow
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a cinnamon stick and serve.

name: St. Petersburg
preparation: Pour vodka and bitters into mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score peel of orange wedge with tines of fork and drop into drink.

name: Soviet Cocktail
preparation: Mix all ingredients except lemon peel with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and drop into glass.

name: Black Magic
preparation: Mix ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: The Emily Weir
preparation: Whack the liquid ingredients in a glass and give it a stir then add the ice.

name: Desiree
preparation: Serve on the rocks. Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.

name: Golden Shower
preparation: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale in a shaker with ice. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass and top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon slice. Serve.

name: Kretchma
preparation: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Zorbatini
preparation: Serve in a cocktail glass and garnish with a green olive.

name: Pear Martini
preparation: Garnish with a slice of pear and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Midori Martini
preparation: Shake Midori and vodka with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Salisbury Special
preparation: Pour coke into an old-fashioned glass then orange juice then vodka. Stir it about a bit then add cordial. Enjoy.

name: Bloody Rectum
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur Stoli vodka and Rose's grenadine into a shot glass in that order and serve.

name: Hot Throbbing Banana
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a stemless maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Afterburner #3
preparation: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: After Dinner Mint
preparation: Shack vigorously and serve.

name: Douglas Martini
preparation: Pour the vermouth into a cocktail glass. Swirl it around until the glass is coated. Pour out excess vermouth. Place the glass in the freezer until thoroughly chilled. Shake the Stoli vodka with ice for at least 20 seconds. Pour into the chilled cocktail glass garnish with two grapes and serve.

name: Vaitkus
preparation: Shake ingredients pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple Russian Gonzo
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake until chilled strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mocha Blanca Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a chocolate curl and serve.

name: Nifty
preparation: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a martini cocktail glass. Fill with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Cajun Martini
preparation: Garnish with jalapeno pepper.

name: Andy's Ivory
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into two hurricane glasses and serve chilled.

name: Banshee
preparation: Combine ingredients w/ crushed ice in a mixing glass then shake & strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Monkey Doo
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dirty Banana #2
preparation: Fill half a tall glass with shaved or crushed ice. Add the Bailey's banana rum and cream. Serve.

name: Pink Banana
preparation: Pour creme de banane into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the pink lemonade and serve.

name: Maggie's Yellow Skoda
preparation: Chop up the two bananas and place in a blender with the creme de bananes galliano and vanilla ice cream. Blend until frothy and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of banana sit back and enjoy!

name: Fuzzy Banana
preparation: Mix all parts together in a glass or pitcher depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.

name: Banana Banshee
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Neiler
preparation: Stir ingredients into glass with some crushed ice.

name: Cattie Suprise
preparation: Combine the first 3 ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until frothy. Decorate a tall glass internally with swirls of Hershey's Chocolate Syrup and strain the shaker mixture into glass without ice. Top with whipped cream and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Fruity Smash
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass. Garnish with maraschino cherries and serve.

name: Bubblegum Sundae
preparation: Pour creme de bananes peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with 6 oz of crushed ice. Shake vigorously until slushy. Pour all contents into a highball glass. Add the grenadine so that it sinks down the side of the glass and serve.

name: Fluxuation Cocktail
preparation: Pour mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass and stir. Slowly add the blue curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles; as fun to look at as it is tasty to drink.

name: Chocolate Banana
preparation: Pour creme de banane into an ice-filled glass. Add creme de cacao fill with milk and serve.

name: Banana Boat
preparation: Place a banana into a 12-oz glass and add cracked ice. Combine the other ingredients in another glass and pour over the ice. Add the pineapple slice and enjoy.

name: Screwed Banana
preparation: Put ice in highball glass about 1/2 full then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

name: Peach May Cocktail
preparation: Mix together in a hurricane glass.

name: Banana Berry
preparation: Pour creme de banane over ice in a highball glass. Fill to the top with milk and add grenadine.

name: Banana Popsicle
preparation: Pour both liqueurs over ice (can also used blender for a blended drink) top up glass with pineapple and a splash of orange juice. Garnish glass with cherries.

name: Sangria Liqueur - The World's Best
preparation: 1. Mix ingredients together in a large container stir and let sit in a refrigerator for 18-24 hours. Note: A much more delightful sangria is produced when the fruit juice blends with the wine by osmmosis rather than by stirring. 2. Before serving stir again and add sugar or brandy to taste. It should be fairly strong and fairly sweet almost syrupy. Then cut the mixture with some sort of bubbly water orange or lemon flavored if possibly but plain bubbly water is fine until it seems to have a thinner more wine like consistency. Serve immediately.

name: Money Shot
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass; serve.

name: Cocaine Shooter
preparation: Shake with ice and strain. Serve in chilled shot glass.

name: Buzzard's Breath
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass.

name: Raspberry Chocolate Truffle Shot
preparation: Carefully layer Bailey's over Chambord then layer Dark Cream de Cacao and Kahlua in shot glass. Bottoms up!

name: Reality Twist
preparation: Almost fill a shot glass with amaretto. Carefully pour the blue curacao into the middle to create a blue twist.

name: Almond Gravy
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a small old-fashioned glass. Add a few grains of grinded coffee. Mix with a spoon drink a shot.

name: Nutty Slippery Rootbeer Lollipop
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into an old-fashioned glass with ice and serve.

name: Jamaica Shot
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into shot glasses.

name: Foreplay
preparation: Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!

name: Chocolate Almond
preparation: Layer the ingredients in the order listed.

name: Leather and Lace
preparation: Carefully layer into a shot glass.

name: Keith Jackson
preparation: Mix chill strain and shoot.

name: Smarty
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice strain and serve. Tastes like a sweet tart.

name: Panty Burner
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Jabroni Driver Shot
preparation: Add the Cognac brandy and rootbeer schnapps to a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: X
preparation: Mix all ingredients in mixing glass and shake with ice. Strain into glass and shoot.

name: Smooth Dog
preparation: Mix and drink.

name: French Kiss #2
preparation: Layer ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: G4
preparation: Layer irish cream on top of amaretto.

name: Cookie Dough
preparation: Layer Amaretto above Bailey's Irish Cream then add various pinches of Cinnamon. Serve once Cinnamon clumps begin to settle into the liquor.

name: Kris Kringle
preparation: Combine creme de almond and root beer schnapps in a shot glass. Layer the half-and-half on the top.

name: Ruptured Duck
preparation: Pour ingredients into a medium-sized cocktail glass stir gently and serve.

name: Abortion
preparation: Pour the creme de cacao into a shot glass. Layer the amaretto and then the bailey's to create a 3 layer drink. Insert a toothpick to the bottom of the shot glass and dribble some grenadine so it floats in the bottom of the glass.

name: Fuzzy Cherry
preparation: Mix all of the above in a shaker with ice. Shake well over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Flaming Bob Marley
preparation: Divide a tall shot glass into thirds fill the lowest third with grenadine syrup the middle third with creme de menthe and float the 151 in the top third. Wet a thin straw light the 151 by passing a lighter over it plunge the straw to the bottom of the glass into the grenadine syrup and suck. If done rapidly and correctly the straw will not melt and you can observe flames travelling up the inside of it. Stop sucking when the flame is inside the straw.

name: Bonfire
preparation: Layer this drink! Grenadine first Amaretto next and 151 on top. Light the 151 and let it warm for about 3 seconds. Blow (lightly) to put the flame out and take the shot.

name: Cement Kicker
preparation: Fill one shot glass with Bailey's. Fill second shot glass with Lime and 151. To Drink: Pour Bailey's into mouth do not swallow. Pour Lime and 151 into mouth. Shake head back and fourth the shot will turn solid.

name: Atomic Fireball
preparation: Pour the grenadine syrup first then layer the Fireball on top of it. Lastly the 151. Drink and enjoy. Tastes just like candy.

name: Flaming Asshole #2
preparation: Layer in a shot glass in this order; brandy tequila then rum. Ignite. Extinguish within several seconds and serve.

name: Orgasm
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wet Back
preparation: Mix and shoot.

name: Mexican Cappuccino
preparation: In a large coffee mug pour the kahlua and tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill the cup with espresso top with the frothed milk and serve.

name: Nasty Mexican
preparation: Pour the tequila into a shot glass; add the Kahlua coffee liqueur and serve.

name: Cement Mixer #2
preparation: Mix together the two ingredients in a shot glass and serve. It's recommended you also chase with a beer.

name: Douglas Town
preparation: Pour the Kahlua tequila and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Napoleon on the Back
preparation: Serve straight on the rocks.

name: Bali Dream
preparation: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

name: Kavorkien
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. Can be served over ice or up.

name: The District III
preparation: Fill a pint glass with ice cubes. Add one shot each of Bacardi Black Rum and Seagram's Extra Dry Gin. Add a splash of soda water and fill the rest of the glass with sweet & sour mix.

name: Mangan Coffee
preparation: Pour ingredients into an irish coffee cup in the order given.

name: Black Rose #2
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 into a shot glass. Add the Chartreuse and softly pour the Frangelico liqueur on top for a cloudy efffect before serving.

name: Black Gold #2
preparation: Combine equal amounts of Opal Nera black sambuca and Goldschlager in a shot glass and serve.

name: Black Stuff #2
preparation: Pour creme de menthe Scotch whisky Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add tea prepared with a small amount of milk and sugar as one would normally have in their tea. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Black Death #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass as above and serve.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon sloe gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Brown Cow #2
preparation: Fill the glass with the amount of Tia Maria you would like and put an equal amount or a little more of milk. Add two ice cubes and down.

name: Rattlesnake Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kish Wacker
preparation: Mix the ingredients in a blender with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Tastes like a chocolate shake. Add an extra amount of bailey's to taste if desired.

name: Green Eyes
preparation: Pour over crushed ice and stir or blend ingredients together.

name: Belize Rum Punch
preparation: Fill tall glass with ice add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

name: Latin Love
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth consistency. Rim a hurricane glass with grenadine and coconut shavings and pour in the mixture. Serve.

name: Leprechaun's Libation
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender. Continue adding cracked ice and blending until smooth. Serve in a red wine glass.

name: Everybody's Irish Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except green olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the green olive and serve.

name: Hot Irish
preparation: Pour into a heat-proof goblet sweeten with brown sugar (to taste) and serve. OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'BkeXQ1ZDow13jrkPaR_a7l4J06__Onn3' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Shamrock #2
preparation: Pour ingredients in a cocktail glass.

name: Paddy Cocktail
preparation: Shake all three ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dublin Doubler
preparation: Mix irish whiskey irish cream and ice cubes. Shake to chill. Serve with or without the ice it is very good either way.

name: St. Patrick's Day
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Death #4
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake vigorously until chilled. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Buttery Nipple #4
preparation: Pour the Buttershots liqueur into the shot glass first then add the Tequila Rose liqueur and serve.

name: Irish Blackthorn
preparation: Pour the Irish whiskey vermouth pernod and bitters into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Ballylickey Bait
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass muddle the honey and a little water until it dissolves. Add ice cubes and whiskey and fill with sparkling water. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Hell's Kitchen
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Shamrock
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Drunk on Christmas
preparation: Mix and shake irish whiskey midori and apple schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Garnish with several free floating maraschino cherries.

name: Egg Nog #4
preparation: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk stir in rum bourbon vanilla and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog prepare Eggnog as above except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

name: Irish Highball
preparation: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Celtic Twilight
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with cracked ice and serve.

name: Plenty O'Toole
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Manannan Mac Lir
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shooter glass then slam!

name: Creamy Bush
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #4
preparation: Pour all ingredients over into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir together garnish with a slice of fresh lime and serve.

name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
preparation: Shake Irish whiskey anis triple sec and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel top with the olive and serve.

name: Banshe
preparation: Pour over crushed ice in a rocks glass. Lightly stir and serve.

name: Gloom Lifter
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Irish Whiskey Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish the glass with an olive and serve.

name: Irish Ending
preparation: Mix all 3 liquors and shake on ice strain into a martini or margarita glass that has been rimmed with sugar.

name: Rory O'More
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Leprechaun's Coffee
preparation: Shake strain into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve

name: Wild Irish Rose
preparation: Serve in an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Dubliner
preparation: Pour liquor into a mixing glass with ice and stir to chill. Strain into a goblet top with cream and serve.

name: Cherry Popper #4
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pillow Mint
preparation: Pour whiskey into an old-fashioned glass and add kahlua. Splash the mint schnapps stir and serve.

name: Paddy's Girl
preparation: Pour ingredients into a blender filled with crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy and pour into a margarita glass Sprinkle chocolate shavings on top and serve.

name: Jeremy Perkins
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Irish Cream #3
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender until mixed well serve cold. Stores for up to two weeks in the fridge but it's never lasted that long.

name: Aspiration
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add a cocktail olive.

name: Leprechaun
preparation: Pour whiskey over ice in a chilled old-fashioned glass. Top with tonic water and stir gently. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Walker's Revenge
preparation: Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.

name: Fireball #3
preparation: Pour the cinnamon schnapps in shot glass and add the dash of tabasco sauce. Then shoot.

name: Hat Trick
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the dark rum light rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Creamy Kiss
preparation: Mix ingredients in order; cream last stir and serve.

name: Hot and Creamy
preparation: Combine the ice and liquors in a blender until the ice is well crushed. Add half-and-half and serve in an 8-oz margarita glass.

name: Creamy Sam
preparation: Mix equal parts sambuca and cream soda with ice. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Creamy Rum Liqueur
preparation: Dissolve coffee in water. Mix all ingredient's slowly in a blender. Serve chilled. Keeps sealed in the fridge for 2 weeks.

name: Hot Creamy Bush
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a glass.

name: Creamy Frappuccino
preparation: Pour Bailey's irish cream into a bottle of the frappuccino recap and shake well until mixed.

name: Peach Melissa
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach and serve.

name: All Plucked Up
preparation: Add ice orange juice lime juice pineapple juice dark rum and coconut rum to a shaker. Shake until very chilled and blended. Strain out ice as you pour the remaining contents into a cocktail glass (looks great in a martini glass). Add grenadine. Use one slice of orange to decorate glass rim.

name: Hammer and Tongs
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Brutal Hammer
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and slam.

name: Hammer Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Hammer of Thor
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Velvet Hammer #3
preparation: Pour a regular Guinness into a beer pilsner. Wait for head to settle then add vodka and serve.

name: Jeweller's Hammer
preparation: Stir in a shot glass and serve.

name: Brown-eye
preparation: Use any appropriate glass filled with ice cubes and mix 3 parts of your vodka of choice (preferably not cheap vodka use Finlandia Absolut or Grey Goose) with 1 part Coke or follow the amounts above in a highball or old-fashioned glass.

name: Arctic Circle
preparation: Pour the vodka lime juice and ginger ale into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir garnish with crushed mint leaves and serve.

name: Asterix Cocktail
preparation: Pour vodka pisang ambon sprite and lemon juice over two ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Avalon
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka lemon and apple juices Pisang Ambon and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink created by Timo Haimi took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

name: Exotic Finn
preparation: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with sprite and garnish with mint leaves a strawberry a twist of orange and a straw. Ole Skeiedal from Norway took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

name: Frozen Rainforest
preparation: Mix the vodka tropical blue Sourz pineapple juice and lime juice in a shaker and shake. Crush some ice and pour it in to a highball glass then add the mix from the shaker. Garnish with some pineapple and then dash some Monin Blue Curacao Syrup so it runs down through the crushed ice. Serve.

name: Heartbreaker's Special
preparation: Pour vodka into a blender. Add passoa orange juice and pineapple juice. Add crushed ice and flesh of an orange. Blend well pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Frozen Domingo
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until puree-consistency. Pour into a parfait glass garnish with a pineapple slice and serve.

name: Ampiainen
preparation: Add couple of ice cubes to a highball glass. Measure vodka and banana liqueur. Fill with ginger ale and stirr couple of times. Garnish with a red cherry. Add a straw and serve.

name: Baby V.O.X.
preparation: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Baby Doll
preparation: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

name: Baby Becher
preparation: Pour Becherovka vodka and tonic water or Sprite into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves.

name: Nazzy Baby
preparation: In a straight tall pint glass fill 2/3 of it with ice then add liquors. Add a dash of lemonade and fill the rest of the glass with fresh orange juice.

name: Baby Fingers Cocktail
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hornet
preparation: Combine gin and peppermint schnapps over ice add cola and top with a lime slice.

name: Cloudy Sky
preparation: Pour into a highball glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Liquid Panty Remover
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Mango Mixer
preparation: Add 3 ice cubes to a 12-oz highball glass then add the gin mango juice and orange juice. Top the drink off with a dash of lemon juice. Serve.

name: Panty Remover #2
preparation: Freeze the pineapple chunks. Place them into a tall glass add the gin pineapple juice and mountain dew and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Collins
preparation: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir. Add slices of lemon and orange top with the cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Corvette
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Bitter Christina
preparation: Pour Martini & Rossi Dry Vermouth into a highball glass filled with ice. Add sloe gin and Pisang Ambon. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon and serve.

name: Liquid Panty Remover #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Big Stick
preparation: Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass. Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle.

name: Violent Fuck
preparation: Pour curacao and sloe gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and orange juice and blend briefly. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Purple Panty Dropper
preparation: Mix and shake Rumple Minze Blue Curacao and Creme de Noyaux in a chiller and strain into a rocks glass. Carefully drop Bailey's Irish Cream to the bottom. Take as a shot.

name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
preparation: Pour maraschino cherries and their juice into a two-gallon jug. Add vodka and let soak for a few minutes. Add the lemon juice and fill with sprite. Pour mixture into a serving container and strain out cherries. Serve over ice with cherries dropped in.

name: Bloomer Dropper
preparation: Add the vodka peaches and pink lemonade to a blender. Fill the rest of the blender up with ice; blend well. Pour into cocktail glasses and serve.

name: A Dixon Thing
preparation: Mix Slow Gin and Amaretto in glass.

name: Sloe Gin Rickey
preparation: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Panty Hamster
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Liquid Panty Remover #3
preparation: Vigorously shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #4
preparation: Add the southern comfort to the sloe gin and fill with orange juice. Float galliano on top decorate with a cherry and serve.

name: The Colombian
preparation: Layer in a shot glass or just pour straight into glass.

name: Tsunami #2
preparation: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with mountain dew.

name: Maria on the Beach
preparation: Add the ice to a blender. Add rum Kahlua Bailey's and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth. Serve in a Margarita glass rimmed with sugar.

name: Ramcooler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a 10 oz old-fashioned glass fill with crushed ice and shake. Garnish with a red cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Cardicas
preparation: Stir. No garnish.

name: Flower Of Nippon
preparation: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lime and red cherry.

name: Panther Piss
preparation: Stir the rum triple sec and lime juice together in an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite and serve.

name: Pipeline
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ann Sheridan Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Bacardi rum orange curacao and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: White Mess
preparation: In a mixing tin combine all ingredients with ice and shake. Strain into a double shot glass. Can also be made tall (add a little soda water to cut down on the cream)

name: Mongolian Dingbat
preparation: Combine the Bacardi white rum Tia Maria coffee liqueur and ice cream in a blender. Blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Golden Drop Wineries Mango Daiquiri
preparation: Peel and slice the mango from the flesh & stone place mango in the blender with all the ingredients except for the mint leaves. Blend until smooth & creamy. Serve chilled with a garnish of mint leaves.

name: Black Rose Bacardi
preparation: Shake or stir pour it into a coctail glass add some crushed ice and serve.

name: Dominican Goddess
preparation: Mix ruby red grapefruit juice and lemon-lime vintage seltzer water. Add the rum (as much as desired) and shake.

name: Jersey Cherry
preparation: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Lorraine's Delight
preparation: Add everything to a blender with 6-10 ice cubes and blend until thick and frosty. Pour into a frozen margarita glass.

name: Santiago Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Parisian Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour Grand Marnier vodka orange juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pimp Cocktail #2
preparation: Add jagermeister to a highball glass half-filled with ice. Fill with battery and serve.

name: East India Cocktail #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Daiquiri #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Honolulu Cocktail #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Alexander Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Dream Cocktail #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cosmos
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banilla Splash
preparation: Add all ingredients to a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well add a cherry and serve.

name: Grapefruit Splash
preparation: Mix vodka with grapefruit soda to desired strength. Serve with ice in a rocks glass.

name: Creole Lady
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with both a red and green maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Presidente Seco
preparation: Stir and strain into a frosted cocktail glass add an orange twist and serve.

name: Dry Manhattan
preparation: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Tequila Pink
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Presidente
preparation: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Rum Scaffa
preparation: Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Creole
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Attaboy
preparation: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Cuban Manhattan
preparation: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Comfort Manhattan
preparation: Combine the vermouth Southern Comfort and bitters with 2 - 3 ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir gently don't bruise the spirits and cloud the drink. Place a maraschino cherry in a chilled cocktail glass and strain the whiskey mixture over the cherry. Rub the cut edge of a twist of lemon peel over the rim of the glass and twist it over the drink to release the oils. Then drop it in and serve.

name: Hoosier Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: A Furlong Too Late
preparation: Pour rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Dry Rob Roy
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Brown Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hat Trick #2
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum vermouth and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Beachcomber's Gold
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Rum Martini
preparation: Combine rum and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive and serve.

name: Palmetto Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cuban Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Haidin-Haidin
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum vermouth and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Havana Club
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tom and Jerry
preparation: To make the batter: beat egg whites stiff with electric beator. Add sugar gradually. Add cinnamon nutmeg and vanilla. Add in half of the eggs yolks and blend until smooth. In a large mug fill with 1/2 batter 2 shots of [60% rum and 40% brandy]. Balance with boiling hot water. Stir well and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: 187 Cocktail
preparation: Come all ingredients in a blender; add ice untill there is no funnel. Take out the middle of the blenders lid and while still blending add a squirt of whipped cream. Serve with whipped cream on top and a maraschino cherry.

name: Brandy Sour
preparation: Shake brandy juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice top with the cherry and serve.

name: Drunken Parrot
