preparation: Fill blender 2/3 full of ice. Add all other ingredients. Blend to smoothie consistency. Pour into a highball glass and garnish at will. Serve.

name: Whiskey Sour
preparation: Shake blended whiskey juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: Gin Sling
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Tequila Sour
preparation: Shake tequila juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: Scotch Sour
preparation: Shake scotch juice of lime and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: Whiskey Eggnog
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinke nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Coconut Grove
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with slices of pineapple and lemon.

name: Coconut Guitar
preparation: Pour the blue curacao and coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry juice to taste and serve.

name: Coconut Shell
preparation: Drain the coconuts and save the liquid. Scoop out the flesh and place in a blender. Add white rum creme de bananes and milk. Add 3-4 oz. of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Pour back into the coconut shells. Add more milk (if needed) until a nice consistancy.

name: American Flag Pousse Cafe
preparation: Layer in order in a pousse cafe glass.

name: Mary Garden Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cherry Kiss
preparation: Shake all ingredients well and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Dust with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Betsie Temple
preparation: Pour the pineapple juice and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Drizzle a little grenadine on top and throw however many cherries you like on top of that.... tastes like candy.

name: The Talking Cow
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Kicking Cow
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jade
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Continental #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Jungle Frost
preparation: Shake strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Flame Thrower
preparation: Pour grappa and southern comfort into a shot glass. Heat and ignite rum in a spoon and add to the glass. Extinguish flame and serve.

name: Manila Flame
preparation: Pour the Manila dark rum juices passion-fruit nectar and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a pilsner glass and serve.

name: Jungle Juice #4
preparation: Place orange juice and ginger into a blender jar. Break the banana into chunks and add it in. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Jungle Juice #3
preparation: Mix everything except orange juice. Shake well and add the orange juice. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Jungle Juice #5
preparation: Mix the fruit and alcohol together and let set for 4 to 12 hours. Then add the fruit punch sunny d and orange juice concentrate in and let set overnight. Serve in cups.

name: Old Flame
preparation: Shake ingredients well to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: B-52 Flame
preparation: Mix together the Absinth and the Stroh rum. Carefully top the shot with Kahlua and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #6
preparation: Place a 1-oz shot glass filled with amaretto almond liqueur into an old-fashioned glass. Place beer around the shot; fill with cola and chug.

name: Creamsicle #6
preparation: Place ice and vodka in a highball glass. Fill to top with orange soda and serve.

name: Midnight Martini #2
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Mexican Coffee #2
preparation: Pour the tequila and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a coffee mug; fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Randy Andy
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Blonde Headed Slut
preparation: Shake the Grand Marnier peach schnapps and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Candy Corn
preparation: Carefully layer on top of each other to resemble the halloween candy. First the Licor 43 then the orange curacao then finally the cream.

name: Karl Malden
preparation: Pour into a highball glass in order listed. Add a twist of lime if you prefer.

name: Cactus Club VIP
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Patron Tequila squeeze half a lime into the glass. Top with soda water and stir before serving. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Stone Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bolero
preparation: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pink Lady Punch
preparation: Drain cherries reserve liquid. Macerate drained cherries in vodka for at least 24 hours (48 preferrably). Mix all ingredients except sloe gin. Serve over ice cubes in a hurricane topped with a splash of sloe gin. Garnish with cherries.

name: Lady Cello
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar-rimmed highball glass. (Use limoncello and sugar.) Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: White Lady 1910
preparation: Shake vigourously with plenty of ice.

name: Pink Lady
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Lady In Red
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. Let stand for 30 seconds and slam it back.

name: Cocaine Lady #2
preparation: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass. Float coke on top and serve.

name: Creamsicle Dream
preparation: Put all ingredients in glass and stir. Served as a float drink. Can also be mixed in a blender and served as a shake.

name: Mint Chocolate Dream
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps godiva liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a highball glass. Fill with ice cold milk and serve.

name: White Lady
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nina's Special
preparation: Blend together in equal parts in a cocktail glass.

name: Irish Dream
preparation: Combine the hazelnut liqueur irish cream brown creme de cacao and vanilla ice cream in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Pour into a frosted pilsner glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles or shavings and serve.

name: Sidecar
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Boston Sidecar
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Havana Sidecar
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Classic Sidecar
preparation: Take a lemon wedge notch a slice into the middle and use it to moisten the rim of a chilled cocktail glass. Frost the moistened outer rim of the glass with superfine sugar. Shake ingredients together with cracked ice and strain into prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist and serve.

name: Ladies Sidecar
preparation: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fontainebleau Sidecar
preparation: Mix or shake all ingredients except grand marnier with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float grand marnier on top.

name: Blue London Sidecar
preparation: For thirty seconds shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a lime wedge. Enjoy!

name: Green Pussy
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Sooner Spirit
preparation: Mix ingredients in shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into highball or cocktail glass. Add more or less grenadine for color.

name: Hot Penny Rum
preparation: Pour the rum bourbon whiskey creme de cacao and coffe into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Float the cream on top by pouring it over the back of a teaspoon and serve.

name: Kryptonite Kooler
preparation: Mix the rum maui and pineapple juice together. Add ice and enjoy.

name: Orthoniatis
preparation: Pour the kiwi liqueur Bacardi white rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker with 5 ice cubes. Shake well pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Cinco de Mayo
preparation: Shake well with lots of ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with fresh lime wedge if desired.

name: White Lizard
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice and serve.

name: Blinker Cocktail
preparation: Pour the whiskey grapefruit juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Guavaberry Sunset
preparation: Pour the guavaberry liqueur and grapefruit juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Carefully add the grenadine. Garnish with a slice of fruit and a dusting of ground cinnamon and serve.

name: Papa Muminek
preparation: Pour the Canadian whisky advocaat creme de cacao Tia Maria coffee liqueur creme de bananes milk and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and pour entire contents into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Isle of Pines
preparation: Pour over ice cubes in a large highball glass stir and serve.

name: Blinder
preparation: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

name: Papa Smurf
preparation: Mix and chill vodka and kool-aid. Crush blue popsicle and add to mixture. The crushed popsicle should settle at the bottom of drink making it appear as a blue layer at the bottom and a red layer on top.

name: Hot Daring Dylan
preparation: Pour the tequila Kahlua coffee liqueur and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass and stir well. Float the cream on top of the drink by pouring across the back of a teaspoon and serve.

name: Hot Neopolitan
preparation: Pour the liquors into a regular hot chocolate and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Cow
preparation: Beat sugar and butter together until thoroughly creamed and fluffy. Beat in vanilla extract and spices. Chill. For each cup place 1 1/2 teaspoons batter in a preheated mug. Stir well. Fill with hot milk and serve.

name: Hot-Buttered Rum
preparation: Place the sugar butter rum (light or dark) and cloves into a mug. Fill with boiling water and stir.

name: Hot Buttered Comfort
preparation: Stir the Southern Comfort and hot water together in a coffee mug. Float butter on top. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #3
preparation: Combine sugars butter ice cream and spices. Blend until smooth. Place batter in the freezer. Store in freezer for up to one month. For each serving fill one-quarter of a mug w/batter add one ounce rum and three-quarters of a cup of boiling water. (Or to taste)

name: Red Eye a la Cocktail
preparation: Pour refrigerated tomato juice into a large frosted mug. Over tomato juice pour cold beer. Do not stir. Crack egg drop contents into mug. Do not stir. Discard eggshell and serve.

name: La Tigre
preparation: Mix into a glass and drink.

name: La Floridita Daiquiri
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and pour unstrained into a frosted cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Pink Daiquiri
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pink Squirrel #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass and shake or stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Beachcomber #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Love For Toby
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cherried Cream Rum
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cherry Rum
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Southern Bride
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Daiquiri Blossom
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Southern Comfort Sour
preparation: Can be made 'up' or 'on the rocks' Prepare sour glass. Add Southern Comfort and sour mix to mixing glass. Shake well (8-10 times) and strain into glass providing lots of foam. Add flag or butterfly (orange and cherry on a pick) as garnish.

name: Mint Daiquiri
preparation: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Andes Mint
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and slightly thick. Pour into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Add straws and serve.

name: Mount Fuji #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Bogomip
preparation: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

name: Melon Lime Daiquiri
preparation: Muddle the melon sugar syrup maraschino liqueur and lime juice together in a container. Add rum and ice shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh sprigs of mint and serve.

name: Paradise In April
preparation: Mix the ingredients together in a glass half filled with ice.

name: Coconut Colada
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well for 10-15 seconds. Pour into a pina colada glass garnish with a pineapple spear and serve.

name: The Nog
preparation: Pour midori triple sec and rum into a 12-ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice stir and serve.

name: Banana Lifesaver
preparation: Combine cocunut rum and melon liqueur together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Add the sweet and sour mix and pineapple juice to taste. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the banana schnapps and serve.

name: Frozen Brandy And Rum
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Rum Old-Fashioned
preparation: Stir powdered sugar water and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel float 151 proof rum on top and serve.

name: Rum Coke Float
preparation: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream into a hurricane glass add rum and fill with coke. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Pineapple Cocktail
preparation: Pour rum pineapple juice grenadine and lemon juice into a collins glass. Fill with club soda or to taste. Serve with ice.

name: Pino Frio
preparation: Pour white rum two heaped tablespoons of pineapple chunks and sugar into an old-fashioned glass. Blend until smooth add three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly.

name: Pineapple Snap
preparation: Pour Ketel One vodka triple sec and Absolut Mandrin into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add pineapple juice and serve.

name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
preparation: Add to a blender and liquify.

name: Brown Betty Punch
preparation: Add the sugar lemon slices cloves cinnamon stick nutmeg ginger and water to a large nonreactive saucepan set over medium-high heat. Stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Let the mixture reach the boil then turn the heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the brandy and ale and heat but do not allow to boil. Serve in beer mugs with a slice of lemon on each drink. Makes 8 (10-ounce) beer mugs.

name: Somerset Punch
preparation: Combine and mix ingredients in a punch bowl with a large block of ice. Add sliced strawberries and serve in wine glasses.

name: Gorilla Punch
preparation: Above is for a cocktail. Shake with ice and serve in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. To make this recipe in quantity dump 1 qt Everclear 1 pt Blue Curacao 1/2 gal OJ and 1/2 gal pineapple juice in a punchbowl and stir. Do not add fruit or ice. Juices should be chilled prior to mixing. If Everclear is unavailable Bacardi 151 may be substituted. Double these quanities for a proper celebration.

name: St. Charles Punch
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except port) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with port add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Martin's Rum-Orange Punch
preparation: Heat well in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Add twists of orange and lemon peel and drop into glass. Serve.

name: Strawberry Punch
preparation: Combine and mix in a punch bowl with a large block of ice. Add slices strawberries and serve into wine glasses.

name: Algonquin Bar Punch
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with cracked ice. Add an orange slice or a cherry.

name: Parry Punch
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with a fresh peach slice of lime wedge and serve.

name: Glowstick
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Whippersnapper
preparation: Add rum fresca and 1 or 2 ice cubes to a highball glass and serve.

name: Liberty Cocktail
preparation: Press a sugar cube onto a lime wedge in a small highball glass. Add calvados and rum stir well and add ice cubes. Stir again and serve.

name: Grapefruit Teaser
preparation: Combine and stir.

name: Hemingway
preparation: Pour pernod into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Sour Death
preparation: Mix with ice and pour into glass.

name: Stanley Senior
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fruit Chew
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fruit Basket
preparation: Mix appropriate amounts in a pitcher or bowl. Pour into glass filled with ice. Garnish with the fruit of your choice.

name: Fruit Salad Slammer
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Fruit Daiquiri
preparation: Pour the rum creme de cacao and one cup of crushed ice into a blender. Add the fruit liqueur and peeled fruit to your choosing (use the same flavor for both) and blend well. Pour into an exotic glass; hurricane or equivalent and serve.

name: Fruit Salad
preparation: Combine all ingredients pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Platinum Blonde
preparation: Shake and strain into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Mumbai Bombshell
preparation: Pour the cherry brandy Malibu rum cognac and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ash Blonde
preparation: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

name: Blonde Smoothie
preparation: Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.

name: Dizzy Blonde
preparation: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Platina Blonde
preparation: Pour tequila into a cocktail glass fill with cream and stir.

name: Blonde Bimbo
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Parisian Blonde
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Party Slush Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients together and freeze. Serve when slushy; add 7-up if desired.

name: Attempted Suicide
preparation: Cut the cantaloupe melon into small pieces. Mix all alcohol and fruit juice in a large container such as a cooler. Slice the fruit and place in the alcohol and let marinate. Serve in a tall glass with ice and fruit as garnish.

name: Strawberry Mango Margarita #2
preparation: In a food processor pure the mango and strawberries. You should have about 1 1/2 cups of pure. Transfer to a container cover and refrigerate until cold  about 1 hour. In a blender container combine half the pure half the tequila half the triple sec and half the lime juice. Fill the jar to the top with ice cubes cover and blend on high until thick and slushy. Transfer to a pitcher. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Stir to blend pour into margarita glasses and serve immediately.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake
preparation: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Dudi Drop
preparation: Using a knife or equivalent cut the center out of a strawberry. It should resemble a shot glass in some way. The closer you get to the edge of the strawberry the better but try not to cut all the way through the strawberry. If you're upto carving more than one then do that now. For each carved strawberry take the Tequila Rose and pour it in the strawberry filling it to the top. After it's filled take the whipped cream and cover the top of the strawberry. Now drop the strawberry bottom first into your mouth and enjoy the most refreshing juicy strawberry you have ever had.

name: A Midsummernight's Dream
preparation: Mix the strawberries in a blender and pour over ice in a shaker. Add the vodka kirsch and strawberry liqueur to the shaker. Shake well pour into a highball glass and fill up with the russian water.

name: Goofy Juice
preparation: Cut up fruit and soak with everclear overnight. Next morning add all liquids in a trashcan. Pour into a punch bowl with ice and serve to the party. Don't forget to eat the fruit.

name: Strawberry Mango Margarita
preparation: Place ice strawberries tequila triple sec and mango juice in a blender (in order). Blend on ice crush initially and then to frappe. Serve in margarita glasses and enjoy.

name: Hot Butter Scotch Toddy
preparation: Measure the Scotch whisky in a toddy glass. Place brown sugar or honey in a measuring cup or other heatproof small container. Spoon in butter and pour on 2 oz (1/3) of the hot water; stir till butter and sugar are completely dissolved into a syrupy consistency (about 30 secs). Pour on the rest of the water stir briefly then pour the works on top of the Scotch. Stir gently; serve.

name: Vermont Maple Blaster
preparation: Pour vodka into an ice-filled collins glass add vodka and syrup and serve.

name: Hot Brick Toddy
preparation: Add the cinnamon powdered sugar and butter to an Irish coffee cup/mug. Pour a single ounce of boiling water and stir to dissolve thoroughly. Add whiskey. Fill with boiling water stir again and serve.

name: Rum Toddy
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum one ice cube and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Hot Whiskey Toddy
preparation: Place a sugar cube or equivalent into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Hot Brandy Toddy
preparation: Add the sugar to a coffee mug. Fill 2/3 with boiling water. Add brandy and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Puerto Rican Coffee
preparation: Pour rum and coffee into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream and top with kahlua.

name: Toby's Special
preparation: Pour the Jameson and Kahlua into a coffee mug top off with hot fresh brewed coffee finish with a tablespoon of fresh whipped cream.

name: Boston Iced Coffee
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Mint
preparation: Combine schnapps and cocoa in an irish coffee cup. Sweeten to taste. Top with cream sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve. Also known as Snuggler.

name: Cafe Don Juan
preparation: Rim an irish coffee cup with lemon juice and sugar. Pour coffee and liquors into the cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Psycho Joe
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass shake and pour into a coffee mug. Add sugar and cream if desired and serve.

name: Hot African Punch
preparation: Place 4 lbs of sugar in a large pan. Pour 4 bottles of brandy and 2 bottles of Jamaican rum over sugar stir until sugar dissolves. Set the liquid on fire (may be difficult to light) and stir with a long metal spoon. Add 1 gallon of coffee.

name: Kioki Coffee
preparation: Stir and add whipped cream to the top.

name: Galliano Liqueur
preparation: Boil water corn syrup and sugar for 5 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let stand 1 month.

name: Cafe Au Lait - Country Style
preparation: 1. In heavy 1-quart saucepan heat milk and cream just until bubbles appear around the side of pan. (Do not boil.) Pour milk mixture into warmed serving pot or pitcher. 2. Pour about 1 inch of freshly brewed Louisiana coffee. into each of 4 serving cups. Then simultaneously pour coffee and warm milk mixture into each cup to desired level. To make strong coffee use 2 tablespoons ground Louisiana coffee witb chicory for 3/4 C of water.

name: Galliano Toddy
preparation: Pour into a hot cup sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Galliano Daiquiri
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Galliano Milkshake
preparation: Blend until creamy and serve in a hurricane glass. (optional; serve with a twist of lemon)

name: Mocha-Berry
preparation: Pour coffee into an irish coffee cup. Add cocoa mix and chambord mix well and top off with whipped cream.

name: Coffee Flavored Kisses
preparation: Brew the coffee. Mix the Chambord raspberry liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into the coffee. Sweeten with sugar to taste and top with whipped cream.

name: Cherries from Heaven
preparation: Pour the cherry brandy lemon juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Cherry Fizz
preparation: Shake juice of lemon and cherry brandy with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Flash Cola
preparation: Pour the cherry brandy maraschino liqueur and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Black Jack
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass and serve.

name: K-Town Cherry Cola
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Cover and shake; serve immediately.

name: Blackjack #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Dutchie
preparation: Pour creme de banane apricot brandy and cherry brandy into the beer mug. Drop in a few ice cubes and fill mug 3/4 with milk. Slowly pour the ounce of advocaat over the top of the milk covering the surface. Now watch as the advocaat drips around the ice and through the milk. This affect is best when the advocaat has been chilled.

name: Cherry Martinsen
preparation: Pour in the brandy and then the coke. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.

name: Minnesota Slammer
preparation: Layer the cherry brandy peach schnapps and apple schnapps in a large hurricane glass. Add sour mix on top fill the remainder with Sprite and serve.

name: Maiden Head
preparation: Mix chilled ingredients; cherry brandy 7-up and snapple with a stirring stick. Top with whipped cream and a cherry in a white wine glass.

name: Poppin' Tha Cherry
preparation: Pour into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Drop in a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Parisian Pousse Cafe
preparation: Layer the ingredients in order into a pousse-cafe glass and serve.

name: Marvin The Martian
preparation: Pour the cherry-flavored brandy into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the Mountain Dew and serve.

name: Black Forest
preparation: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater then add a cherry.

name: Irish Mist Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Iced Coffee a l'Orange
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Irish Coffee #3
preparation: 1. Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat stirring occationally with a wooden spoon until the sugar has melted. 2. Pour the irish whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. 3. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Boys are Stupid
preparation: Pour all ingredients in equal parts into a margarita glass. Serve unstirred.

name: Irish Lumberjack
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish Cream and Bushmill's Irish Whiskey into an Irish coffee cup. Brew the espresso and pour into the coffee cup. Fill to 3/4 full with half-and-half. Steam the milk and pour into the cup until full. Dust with cinnamon if desired and serve.

name: Duck Fart Coffee
preparation: In a 12 - 16 oz coffee mug or glass add the Bailey's irish cream Crown Royal Canadian whisky Kahlua coffee liqueur and almost fill with brewed coffeee made less than 1 hour beforehand. Top with whipped cream; drizzle creme de cacao on top and serve.

name: Cafe Romano
preparation: Pour the sambuca coffee liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Nutty Morgan
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum and Dekuyper hazelnut liqueur into a coffee mug and add hot coffee or decaf. Top with whipped cream and a cherry on top. Serve.

name: Mozart Kaffee
preparation: Pour mozart and coffee into an irish coffee cup and stir. Top with cream and serve.

name: Irish Cream #4
preparation: Add condensed milk evaporated milk Scotch whiskey vanilla essence and glycerine to a saucepan. Stir well. Dissolve coffee in boiling water. Mix in. Chill. Add cream if desired.

name: Belgian Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Kahlua Coffee #4
preparation: Mix 3 cups water with 4 cups sugar bring to boil and boil for 20 minutes. Set aside add 1 whole vanilla bean split. Let mixture cool. Add 2 oz instant coffee to 1 cup boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Set aside and cool. When above are cool (important) put into a half gallon container and add the vodka. Let age for at least 3 weeks.

name: Bacardi O Coffee
preparation: Add bacardi O and coffee to a cup. Top with irish cream and green creme de menthe.

name: Nickler
preparation: 1. Fill a pony glass (tall shot glass) with the cheapest brandy that you can find. Take a round slice of lemon and place it over the top of the pony glass. 3. Open a packet of sugar (apx 1 tsp) and pour it onto one half of the lemon leaving the other half bare. Take 1 tsp instant coffee and pour it on the other half of the lemon (beside the sugar). 5. Fold the lemon slice in half and bite off the rine. Chew and swallow the lemon combination and chase with the brandy in the shot glass.

name: 3rd World Mocha
preparation: Serve hot in a coffee mug.

name: Sorrento Cafe
preparation: Pour Limoncello and Grand Marnier into coffee cup or glass. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream.

name: Jen's Hot Chocolate Butterscotch
preparation: Add one shot of butterscotch schnapps to the hot chocolate. Top off with bailey's.

name: Jack Sauce
preparation: Pour into a shot glass in order. Top with whipped cream and serve!

name: Slapshot
preparation: Stir well before adding whipped cream.

name: Hot Shot #3
preparation: Layer the Frangelico hazelut liqueur coffee and whipped cream on top of one another (Frangelico on the bottom) in an 8-oz highball glass or equivalent. Sprinkle the crushed hazlenuts on top and serve.

name: Cafe' Joy
preparation: Add the three liquors and then add the coffee. Top with whip cream and toasted coconut.

name: Irish Cup O' Joe
preparation: Pour baileys and chocolate syrup in a coffee mug. Fill with hot coffee stir and enjoy.

name: Cafe Nelson
preparation: Pour coffee and liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top sprinkle with chopped hazelnuts and serve.

name: Chocolate Cloud
preparation: Pour the creme de cacao into a cocktail glass. Carefully layer the blue curacao on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle chocolate shavings across the cream and serve.

name: Funnel Cloud
preparation: Pour beer ginger ale vodka light rum and amaretto in a funnel. Turn the funnel while you drink it.

name: Lithium
preparation: Place the ice cubes in the bottom of a collins glass with the sugar. Add the vodka followed by the milk. Stir and serve.

name: Coffee Coolata
preparation: Mix coffee sugar and milk in a blender and add more of either to taste then add the ice and crush it until no large chunks are present. Add the Kahlua and mix if you'd like that.

name: Chocolate Froth
preparation: Crush the ice cubes in a blender for the amount of time needed to get them into a powder. Add coffee and milk and blend until smooth. Now add the cocoa powder and blend it. Pour into a jug and enjoy...

name: War Cloud
preparation: Shake strain into a cordial or liqueur glass and serve.

name: Texas Pink Cloud
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender add 3 - 4 cups of ice and blend until all ice is chopped fine. Should be the consistentency of a daiquiri or colada. Pour into a pitcher ready to serve.

name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
preparation: Pour the amaretto and blue curacao into a blender. Add vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Pour into a brandy snifter and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cloud Walker
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add a lime slice and serve.

name: Kahlua Coffee #3
preparation: Boil water add coffee and sugar and simmer for 20 min. Remove from heat and add chocolate. Allow to cool then add the vodka (or don't cool if you want some of the alcohol to boil off).

name: Killer Coffee
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish Cream Kahlua coffee liqueur and Stoli Vanil vanilla vodka into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Fill the glass with hot coffee and top with whipped cream. Sweeten with sugar or artificial sweetener if desired and serve. The Killer Coffee can also be made with cold coffee. Use a large glass and add ice.

name: Guapo
preparation: Fill a coffee mug 3/4 full add irish cream kahlua and then butterscotch schnapps.

name: Kahlua Coffee #2
preparation: Simmer water sugar and coffee until the sugar dissolves. Put vanilla bean and bourbon in a gallon jug and add the coffee syrup you just prepared. Cover and let sit for a month.

name: Chip Shot
preparation: Add the Tuaca citrus liqueur and Bailey's irish cream to a small rocks glass. Splash hot coffee on top and serve.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur #2
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender blend well. Bottle and let mellow in refrigerator at least one week befor serving. this has been found to be best after 1-2 weeks. Store in a refrigerator. Liqueur at room temperature by removing from refrigerator 1-2 hours before serving.

name: Xanthor's Pants
preparation: Mix 1 part Scotch with 1 part Bailey's (approximately half of a US coffee mug). Rapidly top off with hot coffee to mix. Stir to combine if necessary.

name: Irish Cream Home Made #2
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well stirred. Consume within two weeks. Some ingredients are perishable. Store in an airtight container so you can shake it before each use. The chocolate settles at the bottom.

name: Cafe Vienna Mix
preparation: Stir ingredients together. Process in a blender until powdered. Use 2 teaspoons to one cup of hot water. Makes about 1 1/2 cups mix.

name: Cafe San Juan
preparation: Pour rum over ice cubes in a small highball glass. Fill with coffee and stir. Add a twist of lemon sugar and serve.

name: Elephant Shake
preparation: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

name: Ovaltine Java
preparation: Add the Ovaltine to hot coffee. Add milk as desired and serve.

name: Mozart Eiskaffee
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass topped with whipped cream and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Malibu Mocha Milkshake
preparation: Add malibu rum and sugar to a hurricane glass. Fill to three-quarters full with milk and whip to blend. Add creme de cacao stir and drop in 3 - 4 ice cubes.

name: Mocha Maria
preparation: Add ingredients to shaker half-filled with ice shake and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Kahlua Mocha Milkshake
preparation: Blend all ingredients together with chocolate syrup to taste. Optional garnish: Try to rim the inside of the glass with chocolate syrup pour the shake and lightly drizzle chocolate sauce on top.

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
preparation: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add syrups and serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Cream Home Made
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a blender or mix in a bowl with a whisk until fully blended.

name: Bonny Prince
preparation: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Delicious Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Coffee Lover's Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with coffee beans and serve.

name: Pousse Cafe a la Francaise
preparation: Pour the chartreuse into a pousse-cafe glass. Carefully float the maraschino liqueur on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Do the same with the cherry brandy and then again with the kummel. Serve.

name: La Belle Quebec
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: La Tamarinda
preparation: Make sun tea with the tamarinds squishing them before putting them into the water. Add the tequila. Add ice if you have some. Serve in cups.

name: Delicias de la Habana
preparation: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. Pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Garnish with a piece of peach a cherry and a piece of celery.

name: Mikhail's Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli coffee vodka (Kafya) and Stoli vanilla vodka (Vanil) into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Root Beer Float
preparation: Pour vodka galliano and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola stir lightly top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Rumba
preparation: Pour liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top and serve.

name: Drambuie Coffee
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Joyful Bull
preparation: Fill mug 2/3 full with coffee. Add tequila kahlua and tia maria. Stir. You may stir in half 'n half instead of topping with whipped cream. Garnish with a cherry or mint.

name: Lord And Lady
preparation: Pour the rum and tia maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Lounge Lizard
preparation: Pour the rum and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with chilled cola garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Trinidad Rum Punch
preparation: Boil water and dissolve the sugar. Add remaining ingredients. Serve hot and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Not Just Juice
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker then pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Fiorenza
preparation: Pour the rum amaretto and cola into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain over ice cubes in a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Hot Mollifier
preparation: Pour the rum Tia Maria and coffee into an Irish coffee glass and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink and serve.

name: Hot Tub
preparation: Pour cranberry juice over ice in a tall glass. Add the Grand Marnier Absolut Champagne and Chambord. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Ginger Float
preparation: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur and irish cream into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale to taste stir briskly and serve.

name: The Big
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Hot Whiskey Punch
preparation: Peel and slice the lemons; place the peel into a large non-reactive saucepan. Add sugar cinnamon sticks cloves and 3 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the water to reach the boil then turn heat down to minimum. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add the whiskey and heat but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled lemon in each. Makes 8 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
preparation: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

name: Orgasm #4
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter Delight
preparation: Pour irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto to taste. Stir and serve.

name: Italian Dream
preparation: Pour the Irish cream amaretto and light cream into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and serve.

name: Italian Coffee (USA)
preparation: Pour coffee amaretto and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top add a teaspoon of amaretto and serve.

name: Cuban Hot Coffee
preparation: Heat liquors in a heat-resistant glass add sugar and fill with coffee. Stir and serve.

name: Cleveland Steamer
preparation: Mix the first amount of Bacardi 151 with vodka and margarita mix. Layer the last amount of Bacardi on top and light on fire before serving.

name: Tiger Tail
preparation: Layer in shot glass.

name: Amaretto Paradise
preparation: Mix over ice. Shake and serve.

name: Paradise
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with the blossom of a white orchid and a cherry on a stick.

name: Paradise Sunset
preparation: Pour 3/4 oz of the grenadine into a pina-colada glass. Blend the orange juice with fresh cream and sugar syrup seperately. Pour into glass. Float 1/4 oz of the grenadine on top. Garnish with orange wheel and mint leaf. Serve.

name: Hustler's Paradise
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Phoenix Paradise
preparation: Combine ingredients with four ice cubes in a blender for 20 - 30 seconds. Pour into a highball glass or gibralter glass and serve.

name: Spanish Fly
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and stir. Serve cold.

name: Dutch Coffee (USA)
preparation: Pour coffee vandermint and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top add amaretto and serve.

name: Delta Sunset
preparation: Mix ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice and serve.

name: Bjorns Moscow Mule
preparation: Pour lemon juice and vodka into a collins glass. Mix together fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Guavaberry Royale
preparation: Pour the guavaberry liqueur into a frozen champagne glass. Top with chilled champagne completely or to taste and serve.

name: Rue Royale
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Coffee Royale
preparation: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the sugar and stir to dissolve. Add the brandy stir again. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon over the top of the drink so that it floats and serve.

name: Miss Belle
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tootsie Roll
preparation: Because of the darkness of this particular shooter layering is not necessary.

name: Mexican Coffee Liqueur
preparation: 1. Heat water in a medium saucepan. When hot add coffee and stir until dissolved. Add sugar and vanilla bean stirring well to combine. Bring to boil stirring constantly. Immediately reduce heat so that a very low boil is maintained for one minute. Remove from heat and cool to lukewarm. 2. Pour vodka and brandy into aging container. Add the cooled coffee mixture and the chocolate extract. Stir well. Cap and let age in a cool dark place for 3 weeks. 3. After initial aging strain liqueur through a cloth-lined wire-mesh strainer over a large bowl. Repeat until desired clairity is reached. Stir in food coloring. Bottle cap and let age an additional 1-3 months.

name: Hyper-Active Apple
preparation: In an irish coffee cup pour chilled caramel then slowly pour one shot of chilled apple schnapps over caramel. Slowly add steamed milk pour espresso through steamed milk exceedingly slowly and top with whipped cream or foam. It should come out to be a 4 layer happily alcoholic latte.

name: Insomniac
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into a poco grande glass. Sprinkle some optional nutmeg or cinnamon on top.

name: The Feckin Bolox
preparation: Add galliano to a shot glass layer the bailey's on top and then the cointreau. Ignite the cointreau and drink from the bottom of the glass with a straw.

name: Pousse Cafe
preparation: Layer in a cordial glass.

name: Pousse Cafe Standish
preparation: Pour the grenadine into a pousse-cafe glass. Carefully float the white creme de menthe on top by pouring slowly over the back of a teaspoon. Do the same with the galliano and then again with the kummel and then lastly with the brandy.

name: Fluffy Dog
preparation: Mix both ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass or serve over ice.

name: Melon Pousse Cafe
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients in a cordial glass.

name: Upper Cut
preparation: Just like an irish coffey. Wait till it has cooled a bit. Drink all in one move.

name: Aqualung
preparation: Brew espresso mix in shots of kahlua and syrup.

name: Kahlua Cognac
preparation: Serve in a brandy snifter.

name: Casino Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquors into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Float the cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Fucking Monkey
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Toledo Punch
preparation: Pour the soda lemon juice cognac mint and fruits into a large punch bowl. Slowly dissolve in the sugar to taste. Add the champagne brandy claret and wine and top with 3 liters of water. Add a block of ice. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Jamaican Yo Yo
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Gran'ma Bailey
preparation: Take equal parts of Grand Marnier and Bailey's Irish Cream shake with or without ice and pour into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Irish Flag
preparation: In a cordial glass or shot glass pour carefully in the order given so that each ingredient floats on the preceding one.

name: Oatmeal Cookie
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: B-52 #2
preparation: Pour the Grand Marnier Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Paris Opera
preparation: Pour into a pilsner three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Hitler's Chocolate Cake
preparation: Pour the Frangelico and Absolut Citron in equal parts into a shot glass. Dip a lemon wedge into some Malibu rum and then into some sugar. Shoot the drink and then suck on the lemon wedge.

name: Campari Milkshake
preparation: Pour cold milk in a pot. Slowly add orange juice. Finally add campari. Stir really well. Put ice cubes in glass and pour in the milk-shake. Garnish with a slice of orange. Serve with a straw. After making this drink try alternating the amount of Campari to taste.

name: Creamsicle #8
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass with an orange and cherry garnish and serve.

name: Charleston Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Mandarine Napoleon and cherry brandy into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with lemonade to taste and serve.

name: Snuggler
preparation: Pour peppermint schnapps and cocoa into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Multiple Orgasm
preparation: Build over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

name: Purple Devil
preparation: Shake liquors with ice. Strain or pour over ice in a highball glass. Almost fill with cranberry juice and add a splash of 7-up.

name: Blue Sky
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Aperol Schuhmann
preparation: Shake with ice. Serve in a longdrink glass.

name: Arcturian Sunrise
preparation: Pour blue curacao blackberry liqueur and grenadine into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add sparkling white wine stir well and serve.

name: Neon Neutron
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cactus Cola
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Picon Limon
preparation: Stir amer picon creme de cassis and lime juice with cracked ice and strain into a large chilled wine glass (should hold 16 ounces). Fill with soda water garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Midnight Liaison
preparation: Pour the blue curacao parfait amour and lastly the lemonade into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Drop in the grenadine at the side of the glass so that it sinks to the bottom and serve.

name: Campari Orange
preparation: Mix over ice in highball glass.

name: Malaria Killer
preparation: Pour campari into highball glass over ice add the tonic water and stir with a spoon. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Blue Sapphire
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Mandarin Sunrise
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Campari and Bitter Lemon
preparation: Pour the Campari over ice in a highball glass. Add bitter lemon garnish with a lemon peel and serve.

name: Camp Grenada
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the 7-up garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Ginger Swing
preparation: Pour curacao over ice in a highball glass then fill the rest of the way up with ginger ale.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
preparation: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries and serve.

name: Campola
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Moonlight Serenade
preparation: Combine in a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Orgasm #3
preparation: Build over ice garnish with a strawberry or maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Tinyee's Orange Smoothie
preparation: Put crushed ice into blender about 2 cups. Add Cointreau. Add fruits lemon juice and orange juice. Blend. With machine on pour one half of the soda and reserve for serving. Once blended pour into glass three-quarters of the way and add remaining soda.

name: Picon Punch
preparation: Shake the amer picon lemon juice and grenadine well with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Coffee Alexander
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Party Starter
preparation: Pour the Cointreau lemon juice lime juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Breakfast at Lucas's
preparation: Serve in a coffee mug. An excellent way to drink jack. Using decaf changes the flavor for the better with the whiskey.

name: Cafe Caen
preparation: Heat liquors in a heat-resistant glass. Pour in the hot coffee stir and top with cream. Add sugar and serve.

name: Talos Coffee
preparation: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

name: Black Lady
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cider Cup
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan; bring to the boil stirring occasionally. Allow to cool. When cool strain and chill for several hours. Re-heat one hour before serving and serve lukewarm.

name: Picadilly Punch
preparation: Peel lemons and stud with cloves. Simmer lemons in a pan along with the other ingredients. Ignite some cognac and pour into the pan. Extinguish with the rest of the cognac. Serves about 10.

name: Hot Cider
preparation: Stud the oranges with cloves. (Push the pointy end into them until the flower part is flush with the peel.) I use about 10 per orange. You may want to peel the top layer of skin off the orange if you don't want to ingest the dyes they put on them to make them orange. Put the cider into a large saucepan and add the oranges and some cinnamon sticks (one or two will do). Heat for hours (you can just leave it on all day for a party). It gets better with age. Just pour in more cider when it starts getting low.

name: Gluehwein
preparation: Boil sugar and spices in water leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Irish Kiss
preparation: Pour the irish mist into a shot glass. Add a splash of green creme de menthe.

name: Irish Dawg
preparation: Put vodka in first. then add the bailey's and cream. Lightly stir and serve.

name: Absolut Wet Spot
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream and DeKuyper Buttershots into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briefly and strain into a shot glass. Add Absolut vodka and serve.

name: Cream Cordial
preparation: In blender container combine all ingredients blend until smooth. Serve over ice if desired. Store tightly covered in refrigerator for up to one month. Stir before using. *The Coffee Liqueur can be substituted for Almond Mint or Orange Liqueur.

name: Mandarine Summertime
preparation: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Add a touch of grenadine two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Hell Frozen Over
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.

name: Niagara Falls
preparation: Build all ingredients (except ginger ale) in a cocktail or champagne glass. Add ginger ale and serve.

name: Prawn Salad
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Tangerine Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add a short straw and serve.

name: Haitian Gold
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: Mandarine Bourbon
preparation: Stir and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Slick Rick
preparation: Shake strain into a cordial or liqueur glass and serve.

name: Conga Line
preparation: Shake and serve.

name: Orange Bomb
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Agent Provocateur
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime or cherry.

name: Mandarine Imperiale
preparation: Shake mandarine egg white lemon juice and syrup well and strain into a wine glass. Pour in the champagne.

name: Gamble
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a wine goblet.

name: Naked Waiter
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Bingo
preparation: Build in highball glass with lots of ice. Garnish with slice of orange and cocktail cherry.

name: Mandarine Passion
preparation: Pour mandarine napoleon and gin into a highball glass and fill with passion fruit juice. Add two cubes of ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Napotonic
preparation: Pour mandarine napoleon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water and garnish with orange peels.

name: Lutteur
preparation: Pour into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Seville Highball
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Add a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Mandarin Daiquiri
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Ten Pin Gin
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a squeeze of a lime peel strip and discard. Garnish with slices of orange and lime and serve.

name: Greazy Deigo
preparation: Empty zima into a glass. Add the bacardi followed by the kool-aid. Mix until a light froth is achieved and serve.

name: Mist and Cola
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Texas Sunset
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except grenadine) briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into a collins glass sprinkle grenadine on top and serve unstirred.

name: Connie Cola
preparation: Pour the vodka and DeKuyper Cheri-Beri Pucker schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Add cola preferably chilled and serve.

name: Caribbean Fly
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a blender (except the Angostura) pour into a highball glass and stir with a cinnamon stick. Leave refrigerated for an hour or longer. Pour into another glass topped with ice and add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish if desired. A jug makes 4-5 servings dependent on the shape of the jug... so multiply accordingly on the amount of thirsty guests you have. (1.5 fl oz = 30 ml or 1 standard pour).

name: Hot Mess
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients into a shot glass in this order: Goldschlager bottom Bacardi 151 middle Caramel top. For the Caramel heat in a microwave to the point where its almost liquid. And add to the shot. Light the shot on fire blow out flames and serve.

name: Vanilla Coke
preparation: Pour southern comfort and vanilla liqueur over ice in a collins glass. Fill with coke and serve.

name: Candy Cane Cola
preparation: Pour peppermint schnapps into a highball glass top with coca-cola and serve.

name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
preparation: Pour shots over ice add coke and strain into a collins glass.

name: Golden Apple
preparation: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Hashi Bashi
preparation: Pour gin and campari over a couple of ice cubes. Fill up with schweppes russian.

name: Golden Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: London Fog
preparation: Shake gin and pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

name: Bronx Golden Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the orange slice and serve.

name: Hairy Murry
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hairy Armpit
preparation: Pour ouzo over three ice cubes in a highball glass and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well and serve.

name: Jessica's Juice
preparation: Stir together in a cup and serve.

name: Golden Sunset
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Fuzzless Navel
preparation: Pour peach nectar and orange juice into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Hairy Jerry
preparation: Pour dark rum into an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with papaya juice stir and serve.

name: Green Eyed Monster
preparation: Use a punch bowl. Pour all the Everclear in then pour the Mountain Dew and pineapple juice in to when you think it's just right. It's always better to have it too strong than too weak.

name: Palm Breeze
preparation: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal amounts of orange juice and blue hawaiian punch and serve.

name: Flying Goose
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glasses.

name: Goose & Hen
preparation: Combine equal parts Grey Goose vodka and Hennessy cognac in a shot glass and serve.

name: Lost for Words
preparation: Drop a cherry into a shot glass. Add the cranberry and cherry juice then add the vodka. Place the lid from the cherry jar over the shot glass and shake. Drink making sure you eat the cherry last as it gives the sensation of Lost Words.

name: Exotic Summernight
preparation: Mix vodka and juices pour over ice in a glass and layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: A Short Southern Screw
preparation: Fill a shot glass half full of Southern Comfort then fill the rest of the way with the Stoli (preferrably stored in freezer) leaving a small amount of room at the top. Then splash a bit of the Grey Goose to top it off. Sit and enjoy!

name: Passionate Mist
preparation: Add 1.5 ounces of Passion Fruit Rum into glass. Fill glass with Sierra Mist. Stir and serve.

name: Mean Green Love Making Machine
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker shake and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mean Machine
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Ghetto Booty
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Ghetto Peach
preparation: Add Hennessy and Peach Schnapps fill with orange juice and cranberry.

name: Royal Romance
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Ghetto Margarita
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a short glass and serve.

name: Caribbean Romance
preparation: Pour the rum amaretto orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and float grenadine on top. Garnish with slices of orange lemon or lime and serve.

name: Brendan's Punch of Happiness
preparation: Pour ingredients into large pot stir serve. As punch disappears continue to add more rum.

name: Flatlander's Folly
preparation: Pour the grapefruit juice and Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Golden Nugget #2
preparation: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

name: Russian Denim
preparation: Pour the orange juice cranberry juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the egg yolk. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda stir well and serve.

name: Crow's Nest #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: The Sabino Special
preparation: Pour the Midori Malibu Schnapps and orange juice into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and add the grenadine. Garnish with orange wedges and cherries as seen fit.

name: Spooky Juice
preparation: Stir together with ice.

name: College Dropout
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Heste Pis
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with 3 - 4 ice cubes and serve.

name: Gold Driver
preparation: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour jose cuervo gold tequila into the glass until about half full (or more to taste). Top off with the orange juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink and serve.

name: Flamingo Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Park Lane
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gin Burch
preparation: Combine gin and grenadine in shaker tin. Give a few hard shakes. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add orange juice and serve.

name: Texas Fizz
preparation: Shake gin orange juice and grenadine and strain into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add champagne garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Monkey Gland #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fairy Belle Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pit Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Angel Face
preparation: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bermuda Rose
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wembly Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Duck Sauce
preparation: Combine gin and orange juice in a small old-fashioned glass. Add a splash of both grenadine and ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Royal Smile Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Arctic Summer
preparation: Add ingredients to an ice-filled highball glass. Serve with a cherry and lemon slice.

name: Jamaica Hop
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Angel's Wing
preparation: Pour ingredients carefully in order given into a pousse cafe glass so that they do not mix. Serve without mixing.

name: Capri
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Peppermint Stick
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Being Bobby Brown
preparation: In an ice filled cocktail glass throw in the Wild Turkey and top it off with Coca-cola. Sprinkle powdered sugar around the rim of the glass. Mix and serve.

name: Brown Eyed Pucker
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker into a tall glass. Add the Bacardi 151 rum then add the Pepsi (alternatively use Dr. Pepper). Stir and serve.

name: Brown Pelican
preparation: Combine in a mixing glass stir gently and pour over ice cubes in a highball glass.

name: Ma Bonnie Wee Hen
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Brown Town Busta
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Silverado
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: On the Town
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Campari Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka and Campari into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Don Roberto Old-Fashioned
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with semi-crushed ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Oil Spill
preparation: Carefully layer jagermeister on top of the goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookie
preparation: Pour the Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps into the bottom of a 1.5-oz shot glass. Add the DeKuyper Buttershots butterscotch liqueur float the Bailey's Irish cream on top and serve.

name: Golden Nipple
preparation: Add goldschlager and butterscotch schnapps to a 1 1/2 oz. shot glass. Fill with bailey's irish cream and serve.

name: Gingerbread Man
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.
Add to a shot glass and shoot.

name: Gold Furnace
preparation: Put Goldschlager in a shot glass and add a couple of dashes of tabasco.

name: Golden Comfort
preparation: Mix then pour into shot glass.

name: Czech Collaborator
preparation: Mix both liquors well and pour into a shot glass.

name: Golden Haze
preparation: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Carrot Cake #3
preparation: Pour ingredients into a whiskey sour glass with ice stir slightly and serve.

name: The Seminole
preparation: First pour Goldschlager into a shot glass then add grenadine.

name: Maple K.I.S.S.
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass. Tastes like cinnamon syrup.

name: Shot-o-Happiness
preparation: Combine 1 oz. Goldschlager 1 oz. razmatazz splash of pineapple juice splash of sweet-n-sour with ice in a shaker tin. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.

name: Classic Oatmeal Cookie
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Monday Night Hit
preparation: Pour goldschlager than jagermeister than amaretto into a shot glass and serve.

name: Gold Rush
preparation: Pour equal parts of Goldschlager and Red Bull into a shot glass and serve.

name: Heavy Metal
preparation: Combine in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: Golden Furnace
preparation: Pour goldschlager into a shot glass. Add a splash of tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.

name: Goldschlager Lemondrop
preparation: Shake with ice serve straight up.

name: Leprechaun's Gold
preparation: Pour half a shot of irish cream into a shot glass and fill the remaining part with goldschlager.

name: Spider's Web
preparation: Put alcohol in shot glass drop strawberry into glass then try and make cream float on top.

name: Kalashnikov Shot
preparation: Almost fill a shot glass with vodka then place a lemon slice across the top of the glass so that it covers half of the diameter. Fill the rest of the shot glass with absinthe pouring so that is passes through the slice of lemon. Add sugar and cinnamon (cinnamon is optional) to the lemon and finally ignite it. When the flame extinguishes itself take the shot and eat the lemon.

name: Hot Apple Pie #4
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Mussolini
preparation: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).

name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch #2
preparation: Shake all three ingredients quickly with ice. Strain into a shot glass or increase proportions and strain into several.

name: Kurant Shot
preparation: Pour absolut kurant into a glass and fill up with sprite and ice.

name: Great Balls of Fire
preparation: Layer brandy then goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Gold Bomb
preparation: Place a shot glass filled with Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps into the bottom of a wide glass Fill the outer glass with Red Bull until it flows into the shot glass. Allow to mix for 20 seconds and then drink as fast as possible.

name: Goldschlager Stinger
preparation: Pour Goldschlger into a shot glass. Add Sambuca and serve.

name: Goldtooth Nazi
preparation: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Royal Butt
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Purple Lobster
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Strain into a rocks/shot glass and serve.

name: Catfish
preparation: Serve it chilled up.

name: ButterCrown
preparation: Add both ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Donkey Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients together with a few ice cubes in a mixing glass; stir. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Red Royal Shot
preparation: Pour crown royal into a shot glass add amaretto and serve.

name: Sit On My Face Mary Jane
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into the shot glass and shake until mixed together.

name: King's Gold
preparation: Pour the Goldschlager into a whiskey sour glass followed by the Crown Royal. Serve.

name: Crown the King
preparation: Pour a can of Budweiser B-to-the-EPour into a pint glass. Drop in a shot of Crown Royal Canadian whisky and shoot.

name: Joe Cocker
preparation: Put all ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Royal Peach
preparation: Shake well with ice and pour into a shot glass.

name: Royal Bitch
preparation: Pour frangelico into a shot glass carefully layer the crown royal on top and serve.

name: Red Royal
preparation: Pour 3/4 oz. Crown Royal in shot glass. Add 1/4 oz. Amaretto. Serve

name: Royal Flush #2
preparation: Mix crown and peachtree schnapps together in a shot glass and add juices. Mix again and serve.

name: Modified Duck Fart
preparation: Carefully layer each liquor in the order listed (from top to bottom) into a shot glass. Shoot.

name: CoonDogg
preparation: Mix together then strain through ice.

name: Bart Simpson
preparation: Chill and serve in large shot glass.

name: Bitch Blaster
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal and Peachtree schnapps into a shot glass. Fill a plastic cup or old-fashioned glass with sufficient Red Bull (and with/without ice) then drop the shot into it and serve.

name: Royal Scandal
preparation: Add liquors and mixers into a shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass over ice and serve.

name: Dick Wells
preparation: Fill shot glass 2/3 full with Bailey's and then top it off with Crown Royal.

name: Hpno Chronic
preparation: Layer ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Crown and Choke
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal whisky into a shot glass. Pour the Bong Water into a seperate shot glass. Shoot the Crown and chase with the Bong Water.

name: Weekend On The Beach
preparation: Mix the crown royal apple and peach schnapps and sweet and sour mix with ice cubes in a shaker and shake until well blended. Strain into a shot glass. Makes one serving.

name: Finger Me Good
preparation: Mix equal parts Crown Royal and pre-chilled butterscotch schnapps in a shot glass and serve.

name: Brandy Old-Fashioned
preparation: Muddle the sugar with the bitters and the water in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the brandy and some ice cubes. Stir garnish with a lemon peel and serve.

name: Rum Punch (Alcoholic)
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Serve in four seperate tall glasses.

name: Sweet Manhattan
preparation: Stir well in an ice-filled mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Andy's Manhatten
preparation: Pour Canadian rye whiskey Cointreau sweet vermouth and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Stir ingredients together to chill. Strain over fresh ice in a cocktail glass add an orange twist and serve.

name: James Bond
preparation: Saturate a sugar cube or teaspoon of sugar in a champagne flute with angostura bitters. Add vodka fill with champagne and serve.

name: Lime Rickey
preparation: Build all ingredients in a collins glass and top with soda. Garnish with a spiral of lime peel and serve.

name: Sazerac Cocktail
preparation: Chill an old-fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice stirring to chill. In the old-fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the rye whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the lemon twist.

name: Manhattan Perfect
preparation: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Crystal Cranberry
preparation: Fill glass half full with ice and add the vodka. Put in the cranberry and orange juice next then float the other liquors. Add grenadine to color mix and garnish with a straw and a lemon.

name: Grapeschlager
preparation: Pour goldschlager over ice then add the grape soda. Stir slightly and enjoy.

name: Golden Delicious #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Liquid Kryptonite
