preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Gingerbread Man #2
preparation: Mix the ingredients with ice in a shaker and pour into a highball glass.

name: Golden Almonds
preparation: Stir ingredients together with some ice cubes in a collins glass and serve.

name: Cinnamon Cream
preparation: Stir.

name: Carrot Cake
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Place a tsp. (float) of Goldschlager in glass. Fill rest of glass with Irish Cream and Coffee Liqueur. Shake. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Moxitizer
preparation: Add the shots to a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Moxie energy drink and serve.

name: Early Burn
preparation: Pour orange juice in about 3/4 way up and add 2-3 shots of Goldschlager.

name: Merlin's Treat
preparation: Shake juice and syrup and strain into an ice-filled wine goblet. Add the ginger ale garnish with fruit in-season and sprinkle with grated nutmeg. Serve with straws.

name: Spring Cooler Punch
preparation: 1. Boil the sugar with the cups of water in a large saucepan for 3 minutes. Allow to cool. 2. Mash the bananas in a blender and combine with the can of water orange juice lemonade pineapple juice and bananas in a large bowl. Add sugar syrup; blend well. 3. Freeze the mixture for at least 24 hours. Remove from freezer 1 hour before serving. Using a fork break frozen punch into smaller pieces. Add ginger ale. Continue blending until slushy. Serve in punch cup's. (50 servings.)

name: Spiced Peach Punch
preparation: Combine peach nectar orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly stirring constantly until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

name: Mock Daisy Crusta
preparation: Rim a wine glass with lime/caster sugar add a spiral of lime and fill with crushed ice. Stir lime juice and syrups together and strain into the glass. Add the soda and sprinkle the grenadine on top.

name: Apello
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mandate
preparation: Add to an ice filled wine goblet.

name: Long Distance Runner
preparation: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a large highball glass fill with crushed ice and serve.

name: Spring Fever
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice.

name: Glow Job
preparation: Pour on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Kiba
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Monster Slime Juice
preparation: Mix orange juice concentrate and kool-aid and add water. Stir and watch it turn green.

name: Alternate Root
preparation: Mix Schnapps and juice in glass of ice. Place in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in chilled glass.

name: Fruit Fantasy
preparation: Blend until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Pour into a pina colada glass and garnish with fruit. Serve with straws.

name: Passion Cooler
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a spiral of orange peel and a slice of banana.

name: Hot Summer Breeze
preparation: Soak several slices of habanero pepper in the bottle of vodka for 3 months before using. It will give you that feeling of a summer hot breeze.

name: Alligator
preparation: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.

name: Innocent Passion
preparation: Add syrup and juices to a collins glass. Fill with chilled club soda. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a long straw.

name: Ugly Virgin
preparation: Shake juices and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade garnish with a slice of Ugli fruit add straws and serve.

name: Southern Salutation
preparation: Add 2 oz. of Southern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.

name: Blue Ed
preparation: Fill 16oz glass with Ice. Add liquor. Fill with sour.

name: Pullen Cherry Bomb
preparation: Fill Glass or Mason jar as we do it Halfway with ice. Fill Southern Comfort to half way mark. Top off with Mountian Dew Code Red.

name: Buttery So-Co
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps and Southern Comfort peach liqueur into a highball glass with a little ice. Top with Coca-cola to taste and serve.

name: Dr. SoCo
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with Dr. Pepper and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #3
preparation: Pour gin liqueurs and whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: The Army John
preparation: Pour the southern comfort into a shaker glass and add orange juice and triple sec. Squeeze the juice of one wedge of lime into the glass and toss in the spent shell. Shake vigorously strain into highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Comfy Cream Soda
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cream soda stir well and serve.

name: Angel Highball
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Southern Blast
preparation: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of all-citrus fruit juice even OJ.

name: Southern Tango
preparation: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Southern Bell
preparation: Fill the glass with ice and pour in Southern Comfort. Fill with Root Beer.

name: Slow Comfortable Screw on a Dogbox
preparation: Mix all ingredients in mason jar add ice and enjoy.

name: Pauligno
preparation: Fill up a highball glass with ice cubes. Pour the Southern Comfort and fill the rest of the glass with 7-up. Serve.

name: Wooly Mitten
preparation: Place cocoa powder into a mug half-fill with hot water and stir. Pour in the southern comfort peppermint schnapps and bailey's. Stir add more hot water and top with whipped cream.

name: Fucking Arnold
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and place above ingredients. Shake and fill a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon and enjoy the original Arnold Palmer with a twist of the south!

name: Jenny Great
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Bible Belt
preparation: Mix all ingredients pour over ice and serve.

name: Cucci
preparation: Add ice to glass drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

name: Curious Comfort
preparation: Add Blue Curacao Southern Comfort and half of the pineapple juice over ice and shake. Add remainder of pineapple juice to taste.

name: Honolulu Cooler
preparation: Pack a tall glass with crushed ice add lime juice and southern comfort. Fill with pineapple juice and stir.

name: Big Bear
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Jo-Jo Cool-Aid
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add southern comfort and amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Prom Night Virgin
preparation: Mix well and serve in a collins glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Slam Dunk
preparation: Start with a rocks glass filled with ice. Add southern comfort. For the mix add 1 can of cranberry juice with half a can of orange concentrate into a pitcher. Use this mix to fill the glass.

name: Southern Frost
preparation: Mix together over ice.

name: Futurity
preparation: Pour the gin and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the angostura bitters and serve.

name: Pink Flamingo
preparation: Mix all ingredients shake and serve in a tall glass.

name: Sloeberry Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sloe Vermouth
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Octapussy
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a cocktail glass.

name: Moulin Rouge Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blackthorn
preparation: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hopeless Case
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Morticia
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Mcclelland Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Manhandler
preparation: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Slow Painful Movement
preparation: Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass. Dribble the chocolate syrup into a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)

name: Eclipse
preparation: Shake and strain the sloe gin and gin into a cordial glass containing the cherry. Gently sink the grenadine until just covering the cherry. Garnish with half a slice of orange and serve.

name: Johnnie Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lover's Cocktail
preparation: Combine the sloe gin egg white lemon juice and raspberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Big Red Cocktail
preparation: Pour the sweet vermouth dry vermouth sloe gin and orange bitters into an old-fashioned glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice. Stir well garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Ping-Pong Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Union Jack Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Moll Flanders Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin sloe gin dry vermouth and Angostura bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fuck Me Up
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice shake and strain into shooter glass. Shoot drink!

name: Bazooka
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass and garnish with two halves of a cherry.

name: Start Me Up
preparation: Mix everything in a container (bottle glass etc.) then it is ready for consumption.

name: Jack Me Up
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Banana Slip
preparation: Layer in a cordial glass.

name: Equity's Darling
preparation: Put the ingredients in the glass and mix it up!

name: Bananarama
preparation: Pour the creme de bananes Cointreau bitters and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fluffy F
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Chocolate Banana Fudgsicle
preparation: Stir the McGuinness Creme de Bananes liqueur and the chocolate milk together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with banana slice and serve.

name: Jim Rogers
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with coke and lace with grenadine to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional) and serve.

name: ApriJim Nectar
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a fresh lime and a mint sprig and serve.

name: Brisky Jim
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey into a large collins glass fill with Lipton Brisk iced tea stir and serve.

name: Japanese Jim
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.

name: Jim Barqs
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Grape Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry at the bottom and serve.

name: Grape Juice
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Grape Ape #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cuntrat Supreme
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: GatorBeam
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sunbeam
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except grenadine) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add grenadine and serve unstirred.

name: Mikey's Grape Drink
preparation: Pour the vodka into an empty mixing glass and add cran-grape juice and lemon-lime soda. Stir then pour into a collins glass with ice cubes and serve.

name: Grape Ape
preparation: Mix ingredients as above in a tall glass.

name: Commodore Highball
preparation: Pour Jim Beam bourbon whiskey over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add Coca-cola squeeze in the lemon wedges and serve.

name: Arizona Jim
preparation: Pour Jim Beam whiskey over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Arizona iced tea and serve.

name: Jim and the Doctor
preparation: Stir both ingredients together in a collins glass and serve.

name: Irish C-4
preparation: Pour Jim Beam and Jameson into a beer mug than fill with one can of guinness stout. Float bailey's and irish mist on top stir and serve.

name: Kentucky Wilddog
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and stir gently. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Derailer
preparation: Add all alcohols to a large vat then add juices. Add the sprite just before serving.

name: Hawaiian Volcano
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Black Orgasm
preparation: Just pour stir and enjoy.

name: All Jacked Up
preparation: Chill in a mixing tin and pour.

name: Jim Cox
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: The Canadian Gulp
preparation: Pour the amaretto into the jar. Follow it up by pouring a chilled beer (Canadian if possible). Then top it off with the Coke.

name: Apple Jim
preparation: Blend ingredients together in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Lara Croft
preparation: Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Jim's Nuts
preparation: Add equal parts jim beam and amaretto on the rocks. Stir.

name: Dalton
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes.

name: Blue Zero
preparation: Stir ingredients together with crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Butch's Pink Panties
preparation: Blend all ingredients with ice thoroughly and consume. Put a pair of pink panties on and go out and mow the grass.

name: Transmission Overhaul
preparation: Mix all the ingredients in a large container. Shake or stir well. Server chilled or over ice. This will sneak up on you.

name: Watermelon Shot
preparation: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into a shot glass.

name: 3 Strikes You're Out
preparation: Pour each liquor into a seperate shot glass. Take down each shot in quick succession.

name: Auburn Headbanger
preparation: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. Enjoy!

name: Gorilla Fart #2
preparation: Just add the 2 ingredients and shoot it.

name: Body Bag
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into a shot glass and fill with an equal amount of goldschlager. Serve.

name: Liquid Heroin #3
preparation: Shake everything together and strain into shot glass.

name: Dizzy Damage
preparation: Chill ingredients in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Screaming Nazi #2
preparation: Mix it up and serve.

name: Raspberry Release
preparation: Pour ingredients into a brandy snifter. Stir and serve.

name: Wet Crotch
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Creme
preparation: Keep a shot of Absolut Razberi vodka in your mouth and squirt Hershey's chocolate syrup in. Shake head vigorously and swallow.

name: Cotton Candy #2
preparation: Pour the Phillips Butter Ripple schnapps into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk add a touch of grenadine and serve.

name: Caramel Candy Apple
preparation: Chill ingredients and cocktail glass. Combine ingredients in glass adding triple sec last.

name: Candy Cane Shot
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice shake and serve in a 2-oz shot glass. Don't put too much grenadine or it will kill the taste. It's only there for color.

name: Mandi Candy
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Candy Corn #2
preparation: Start with the vodka 100 proof is important then sweet and sour etc. right in order. It naturally sets up a base for the grenadine to float through. The grenadine dash should top off the shot glass and filter down leaving no grenadine on top. Tapping the shot while steadying the top of the glass helps this.

name: Chocolate Almond Cream
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Carmel Candy Apple
preparation: All ingredients should be freezer cold. Pour equal parts of the schnapps and stir in the triple sec.

name: Twinkle My Lights
preparation: Mix in shaker over ice strain into glass(es).

name: Candy Corona
preparation: Add the shot of grenadine to a regular bottle of Corona lager and serve.

name: Captain's Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a small (8 oz) highball or old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Fuzzy Screw Shot
preparation: Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka. Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter. Pour the triple sec in the remaining quarter. Stir and shoot.

name: No Clue
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec and Dr. Pepper into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: The Breakfast Drink
preparation: The amount of ingredients can vary depending upon the size of the punch bowl.

name: Jim the Ripper
preparation: Combine whiskey rum vodka and tequila into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Blue Pucker Bomb
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Raspberry Pucker schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Red Bull energy drink and shake well. Strain into a highball glass or old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: A Very Berry Surprise
preparation: Thoroughly mix all ingredients in a blender to make a smoothie. Serve in a classic margarita glass. Garnish with either cherry raspberries strawberries or all!

name: Final Exam Relief
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay coconut rum amaretto almond liqueur and triple sec into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and fill up the rest of the glass with equal portions of pineapple juice and Sprite. Top with a little grenadine and some cherries if desired and serve.

name: Lesbian Lover
preparation: Pour zima into a frozen pilsner. Add a shot of coconut rum and enjoy.

name: Parrot Bay Pinada
preparation: Combine in a tall glass over ice and stir well.

name: Deep-7
preparation: Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7-up. Stir and serve.

name: Hpnotiq and 7
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Christini Martini
preparation: Build ingredients in a champagne flute and serve.

name: Chambord and Cognac
preparation: Heat both ingredients gently. Pour into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Lemon Celebration
preparation: Shake gently with ice (the champagne will fizz). Strain into a martini glass.

name: Smooth Sailing
preparation: Serve over ice. Drizzle cherry brandy over the top of the other ingredients. Garnish with lime and a cherry.

name: Filthy Bitch
preparation: Mix drink ingredients together shake for 5 seconds serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Best enjoyed while bubbles are still fizzing.

name: Bitch Slammer
preparation: Prepare the drink by pouring the vodka into a bottle of sweet sparkling wine. The sparkling wine effectively masks the strong alcohol flavor of the vodka. Serve as per usual (ie. wine glasses).

name: Bitch Slap #3
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bitch on the Rag
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream into a large shot glass. Add the creme de bananes and top with Grand Marnier. Drizzle the grenadine through to the bottom using the long end of a bar spoon. Serve.

name: Bitch Slap #2
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Hot Bitch
preparation: Add all the alcoholic measures into the glass without stirring then add the dash of tabasco and serve.

name: Classy Bitch
preparation: Pour the gin vodka triple sec and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Bitch Slap
preparation: Mix vodka 7-up gin everclear and rum together over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and serve.

name: Boogie Monster
preparation: When taking the shot shove/ jam glowsticks up your nose.

name: Mike's Special
preparation: Shake all ingredients together and serve in a glass.

name: Cherry Choking
preparation: Pour the vodka into a shot glass. Add the coke and then a few drops of fresh lemon juice and serve.

name: Arkansas Rattler
preparation: Add Tequila to shot glass and then put Hot Damn on top of it in the glass.

name: Pit Bull On Crack #2
preparation: Mix all three ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Serve in a shot glass.

name: Flat Tire
preparation: Shake tequila and sambuca over ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Death Row
preparation: Pour the tequila and tabasco into a shot glass. Place salt on your hand lick it bite a lime wedge count to 3 and slam the drink.

name: Hot Jose
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and enjoy.

name: Mexican Titty
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Thorny Mexican
preparation: Add Tequila Rose and follow with tequila.

name: Midwest Stop Light
preparation: Pour the liquors into seperate shot glasses and line them up red yellow and green. Go through and drink each shot in order in quick succession.

name: Dirty Sanchez Shot
preparation: Cover the rim of a shot glass in chocolate syrup so that when the drinker takes the shot they end up with a chocolate mustache. Fill shot with tequila.

name: Butter Ripple Fantasy
preparation: Pour Phillip's Butter Ripple schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with root beer and serve.

name: French Revolution
preparation: Pour the brandy and framboise into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a champagne flute. Add the champagne and serve.

name: French Watermelon Matini
preparation: Add the vodka Chambord raspberry liqueur and Rose's watermelon cocktail infusion to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: French Kiss
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a speared cherry or raspberry and serve.

name: French Tickler
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Chase Manhattan
preparation: Pour the gin orange juice and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Poinsettia
preparation: Mix the champagne and cranberry juice then float the Grand Marnier on top.

name: Mach 1
preparation: Add to a shot glass and serve.

name: Fred's Slo-Drop
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Moneyshot
preparation: Carefully layer ingredients on top of one another in a shot glass in order; gin bottom advocaat middle cherry brandy top.

name: Dragon Sweat #2
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Areola
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Patriotic Blow
preparation: Layer the blue curacao and whipped cream over gin in a shot glass.

name: Monaco
preparation: Pour grenadine syrup into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the beer and 7-up and stir well.

name: Seven and Seven
preparation: Put a few cubes of ice into an old-fashioned glass. Pour a shot of Seagram 7 into the glass then pour the 7-up into the glass. Shake or stir briskly.

name: Bottle Cap
preparation: Mix the Sour Puss and rootbeer schnapps together in a shot glass. Mix the 7-Up and margarita mix together in a highball glass. Drop the shot glass into the highball glass and serve.

name: Pied Piper
preparation: Blend ingredients together with ice and serve in a hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Y2K Shot #2
preparation: Mix shot over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glass.

name: Monte's Sex Potion
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum Chambord raspberry liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sacrilicious
preparation: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

name: Far East
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a speared cocktail cherry and serve with two straws.

name: Dr. Jim
preparation: Stir together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Tan Nipple
preparation: Pour equal amounts of DeKuyper Buttershots butterscotch schnapps Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream into a highball glass with/without ice. Add milk; more if desired and serve.

name: Berry Cherry Chocolate
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a large shot glass.

name: 8th Birthday
preparation: Add all ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker shake and pour into a martini glass.

name: Mr. T Whiskey
preparation: Put the frozen lemonade into a pitcher then pour the beers over the lemonade then pour the whiskey into the lemonade container and pour into the pitcher. Mix and add ice as necessary before serving.

name: Boston Freeze
preparation: Pour dark rum cranberry juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker with one cup of crushed ice. Shake well until smooth. Pour all contents of the shaker into a wine glass. Garnish with 3 cranberries on a toothpick or a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mr. New Yorker
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mr. Jones Pucker
preparation: Get a cup that fits the ingredients and then add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps. Add a can or bottle of Jones Soda Co. Green Apple Soda stir and add ice. Serve.

name: Mr. Beefy
preparation: Stir together in a punch bowl and serve.

name: Brain Freeze #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until creamy or thick as desired. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Mr. Manhattan Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin orange juice lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 4 sprigs of mint and serve.

name: Mr. Jetson
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a pre-chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mr. Gerbik
preparation: Stir the gin together with the Dr. Pepper in a highball glass. Carefully layer the Bacardi 151 rum on top ignite and serve.

name: Flaming Mr. Fish
preparation: Add the vodka and white sambuca to a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with raspberry lemonade stir gently and serve.

name: Rye and Ginger
preparation: Mix in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Godfather
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. *Bourbon may be substituted for scotch if preferred.

name: Ginein's Raspberry Surprise
preparation: Combine the vodka rum raspberry liqueur triple sec peach schnapps and cranberry liqueur in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Garnish with a strawberry and orange slice.

name: Dr. Jagerschlager
preparation: Mix equal parts jagermeister Dr. Mcgillicuddy's and goldschlager in a shot glass and serve.

name: Raspberry Swirl
preparation: Mix vodka amaretto and ice cream in a blender and pour into a hurricane glass. Gently pour in chambord; swirl with a straw or stirring stick to produce the desired effect and serve.

name: Dr. Shocker
preparation: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass add Aftershock. Stir once.

name: Dr. Dente
preparation: Pour the Presidente brandy into a beer mug over ice. Add the Dr. Pepper stir lightly and serve.

name: Sweetheart
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Mojo's Suntan Lotion
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir. Pour into a white wine glass and serve.

name: Code Red
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps and Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Code Red to taste and serve.

name: Cutty Cobbler
preparation: Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large wine glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple a slice of orange and a sprig of mint.

name: Cutty Collins
preparation: Combine the Cutty Sark whisky lemon juice and sugar in a highball glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda and stir again briefly. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Thunder
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Autumn Gold Punch
preparation: Combine nectar orange and lemon juices and cider. Refrigerate until well chilled - at least 2 hours. Garnish with cherries.

name: Autumn In New York
preparation: Pour both the Remy Martin cognac and Zima into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake gently strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Thunder King
preparation: Just mix it and shake it.

name: Daytona Rolling Thunder
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort triple sec bourbon whiskey and peach schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well and strain into a frosted glass mug with a few ice cubes. Fill with orange and pineapple juice to taste and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange centered on the rim. Add a straw and serve.

name: Thunder Quake
preparation: Swill the Congac around the glass then add the cider and float the brandy over the top.

name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck
preparation: Chill shake and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Autumn Punch
preparation: Combine first 6 ingredients in a saucepan; bring to a boil reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Strain and discard spices. Chill. Combine chilled mixture with remaining juices and ginger ale. Serve over crushed ice. Yield: 7-1/2 quarts.

name: Slow Finnish
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Blueberry Martini
preparation: Combine the Smirnoff blueberry vodka triple sec and blueberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with Sprite garnish with fresh blueberries and serve.

name: Blueberry Daiquiri
preparation: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Blueberry Martini
preparation: Pour the gin Chambord raspberry liqueur and blue curacao into a chilled cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Blueberry Rumba
preparation: Shake liquors syrup and juice in a shaker and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Blueberry Kami
preparation: Shake in shaker with ice. Pour the shots.

name: Alabama Riot
preparation: Pour fruit punch and ice into a glass add southern comfort peppermint schnapps and vodka. Stir. Finish with lime juice.

name: Bongs Anfield Slammer
preparation: Mix together with the most alcoholic drinks last in order.

name: Slacker's Slammer
preparation: Add Vodka Root Beer Schnapps and Root Beer to a glass. Place one scoop of ice-cream on the top and serve.

name: Blue Slammer
preparation: Put drop of lemon in first then add Blue Curacao and Sambuca. Then slowly add vodka. Sit down shoot back and enjoy!

name: Pepper Slammer
preparation: Add southern comfort to an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with dr pepper and serve.

name: Queen Soda
preparation: Stir and serve in a highball glass with three or four ice cubes.

name: Zima Blaster
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

name: Raspberry Tiki Twist Punch
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb #5
preparation: Pour Red bull into a beer mug. Pour the cherry vodka seperately into a shot glass drop into the beer mug and chug.

name: Dreamsicle #5
preparation: Combine creme de noyaux orange juice and half-and-half with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Oliver's Green Diamond
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur and cold Surge into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Stir well. Top with a bit of vodka; optional. Serve.

name: Fancy Panties
preparation: Stir the pink lemonade and vodka in a glass filled with ice. Add Brut champagne or sparkling wine until full and serve.

name: Kiss Class
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and garnish with a speared cherry.

name: Brazy's Pink Lemonade
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass filled with ice.

name: Tom Sweeney
preparation: Add ingredients to a chilled martini glass. Shake well. Garnish with a black raspberry.

name: Fancy Scotch
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch triple sec sugar and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: PEZ
preparation: Mix ingredients together over ice in a tumbler. Shake well and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Adjust sour mix ratio to taste.

name: Fancy Gin
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Blue Bombsicle
preparation: Pour ingredients into a glass over ice and stir. Garnish with raspberries and serve.

name: Back Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice.

name: Fuzzy Worm
preparation: Fill in order into shot glass.

name: Fuzzy Napalm
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps first. Top with orange and then alcohol. Shoot before it mixes.

name: Scottie Was Beamed Up
preparation: Pour tequila and galliano into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bee Bite
preparation: Layer: Kahlua Banana Liquer and then Vodka

name: Big O
preparation: Float one shot of Irish Cream (NOT Baileys) on top of one shot of Kahlua in a double shot glass. Drink. Slow down...they sneak up on you.

name: Grainslide
preparation: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Lemon Joe
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Limon rum and Absolut Citron vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Voodoo Lady
preparation: Pour triple sec cognac and lemon juice over ice. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chambord Frost
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Apple Car
preparation: Shake well over ice in a shaker. Strain into a sour glass garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Applecar
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chambord Sour
preparation: Blend with ice.

name: Fuzzy Chambord Slammer
preparation: Add raspberry liqueur to shot glass then add peach schnapps and fill with 7-up. Place a folded napkin over the shot glass raise it up and slam it back onto the bar or table. Drink quickly.

name: Blanche
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cubins Cracker
preparation: Add Schnapps Southern Comfort Juice and Ice to shaker. Shake briefly and pour unstrained into the collins glass. Gently pour Curacao down the side of the glass to allow it to sink to the bottom. Then add Raspberry Cordial over a spoon to allow it to float on top. Serve with straws and a slice of Orange.

name: Overcast Friday
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Add a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Peach Melba Freeze
preparation: Combine the peach schnapps black-raspberry liqueur hazelnut liqueur vanilla ice cream light cream and raspberry jam in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pourinto a parfait glass garnish with a peach slice and serve.

name: Malted Milk Ball Freeze
preparation: Put into a blender and blenderize until creamy.

name: Friday
preparation: Prepare mango fruit with rum and syrup in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a large highball glass and fill with crushed ice. Squeeze in a lime wedge and serve.

name: London Freeze
preparation: Shake ice cream and gin in a cocktail shaker until sufficiently mixed. Pour into a collins glass and add carbonated water. Stir well.

name: Friday Night Special
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Bitter Hitter
preparation: Place all the fruits in a blender and puree add blue curacao and Cointreau then pulse until combined. Add water and ice and pulse until combined. Serve in tall glass with rim dipped in sugar and lemon juice and a slice of orange on side.

name: Purple Slurpee
preparation: Pour the blue Curacao and the creme de banane in a tall glass. Blend ice soda and grenadine and mix in the glass. Change amounts of ice and soda to liking.

name: Karma Chameleon
preparation: Pour vodka peach schnapps sprite and lastly grenadine to taste. Mix well. Serve over ice.

name: Dreamy Chameleon
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. This smooth twist of the original Chameleon is reminiscent of that summertime treat the frozen orange creamsicle.

name: Blue Incan
preparation: Place some mint leaves in the bottom of a highball glass. Bruise them with a muddle. Add ice and pour in the blue curacao and cranberry juice. Top off with club soda as desired stir and serve.

name: Malibu Dreams
preparation: Combine the malibu and grenadine. Fill with 7-up or lemon-lime soda.

name: The Cherry Magician
preparation: This is to make one quart. Follow the directions on the package to determine the appropriate amount of Kool-Aid mix. Mix all of the ingredients in a bowl/pitcher without ice. Serve in a glass with ice.

name: The Cherry Bomb
preparation: Put the cherry into the shot glass. Add the Cinnamon Schnapps (be careful it is real strong). Then add the Rum and top of with the Vodka. More Vodka can be used. Slam it.

name: The Crown Cherry
preparation: Mix all together in glass with ice.

name: Over the Rainbow
preparation: Combine all ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of peach and serve.

name: Mocha Mint Cappuccino
preparation: Pour chocolate syrup creme de menthe creme de cacao and irish cream to an irish coffee cup. Add the espresso and then the steamed milk. Stir well.

name: Lake Quinault Summer Margarita
preparation: Mix first four ingrediants shake well with ice (tequila sweet sour triple sec fresh squeezed lime juice). Pour into a salted glass with ice and pour Grand Marnier over drink. Serve.

name: Dixie Smooth
preparation: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour mixture into collins glass.

name: J. R.'s Godchild
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the boubon amaretto and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Easter Bunny
preparation: Shake creme de cacao and vodka with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Float chocolate syrup and cherry brandy.

name: Cherry Chocolate Milk Royal
preparation: In a large milkshake-shape glass (16-oz+) pour the vodka cherry juice 3 cherries chocolate syrup and cold milk. Stir the mixture carefully with a chopstick being careful not to spill until the syrup has dissolved. Add a flexible straw. Top with whipped cream from a can. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and one of the cherries and serve immediately.

name: Freddie's Naughty Neopolitan
preparation: Layer in a shot glass. First kahlua then white creme de cacao and finally baja rosa tequila.

name: Neopolitan
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass chill and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Neopolitan #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with a few ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Martian Hard On
preparation: Layer in order.

name: The Cum Shot
preparation: Simply pour the Vodka and Schnapps into the shot glass. To Drink: Take the stem off of the kumquat. If you prefer cut the kumquat in half. Now plonk the fruit into your mouth and start chewin' - Don't swallow! -- When you figure the time is right (you'll know - when all the fruit juices have exploded in your mouth) throw back the shot chaser that you mixed in the beginning.

name: Mad Pirate
preparation: Blend butterscotch schnapps and Baileys together in a shot glass. Add Tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Asian Cum Shot
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff Watermelon Twist vodka and Sunny Delight into a highball glass over a few ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Cum Shot #3
preparation: Mix the vodka and Malibu and pour into a double-shot glass. Using a straw that has half and half in it (by holding your finger on one end) slowly drip a few drops into the shot. The effect is disgusting and amazing. Serve.

name: Felix's Feast
preparation: Mix the milk with baileys and ice then pour into a whiskey sour glass.

name: Buttery Nipple #3
preparation: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Carefully add Bailey's to surface. Do not mix.

name: Brisky Joe
preparation: Stir the Lipton iced tea and Everclear together in a large shot glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Kokomo Joe
preparation: Combine ingredients with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Jupiter Milk
preparation: Stir Bailey's and curacao in bottom of glass then layer Pernod on top.

name: Joe Blow
preparation: Add vodka to fresca in a glass.

name: Bazooka Joe #3
preparation: Fill a shot glass with 1/2 DeKuyper Grape Pucker schnapps and 1/2 Bacardi Limon. Fill a lowball or old-fashioned glass with enough red bull to reach top of shot glass when dropped in then drop the shot glass in and drink.

name: Bazooka #2
preparation: Pour about 5-6 oz from a small can of Red Bull into a large cocktail glass. Gently add one ounce of sambuca contained in a shot glass into the cocktail glass of Red Bull.

name: Joe Collins
preparation: Pour scotch and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola and stir lightly. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Birky's Bubblegum
preparation: Pour the blue curacao banana liqueur irish cream and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sloppy Joe
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Lady Evelyn
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hocus Pocus
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute filled with finely shaven ice and serve.

name: Perfect Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Crooked Sister
preparation: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Wonder Bra
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: North Polar
preparation: Mix and serve over ice with a slice of orange.

name: Barrier Reef
preparation: Blend ingredients together in a blender. Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Bubblin' Dublin
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: After Five
preparation: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted) slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon but this time right side up slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled.

name: Blow My Skull Off (Almost)
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass or cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well to combine and chill. Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Back in the Old Days 1963
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a shot glass stir and drink.

name: Mindbender
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Turkeyball
preparation: Combine 1 oz. Wild Turkey 3/4 oz. Amaretto and a splash of Pineapple Juice with ice in a shaker tin. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Dick Tracy
preparation: Shake and strain up into a large shot glass or small highball glass and serve.

name: Blow Job #3
preparation: Float the whiskey on top of the irish cream in a shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Shoot without using your hands.

name: Wild Peppertini
preparation: Combine chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.

name: Burnt Turkey
preparation: Pour Wild Turkey 101 into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Hot Damn shake well and strain into a shot glass.

name: Fuzzy Blue Gobbler
preparation: Start at the top and work your way down.

name: Wild Black Betty
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Butterscotch Bomb
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Slippery Nuts Shooter
preparation: Pour equal parts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Exxon Valdez
preparation: Layer the sambuca on the schnapps in a shot glass and serve.

name: Buttersweet Symphony
preparation: Almost fill a shot glass with butterscotch schnapps. Top with Angostura bitters forming a very thin layer across the top and serve.

name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a mixing glass with a few ice cubes. Stir well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Green Apple and Butter Jello Shots
preparation: Dissolve the jello in the boiling water. Add the DeKuyper Buttershots and stir. Pour into small cups and refrigerate.

name: Lolly Gobble Bliss Bomb
preparation: Add in order to a shot glass and serve.

name: Actual Buttery Nipple
preparation: Pour Buttershots into shot glass. Add Grenadine (will float to bottom). Top with Irish Cream of choice. Shot glass will actually look like a nipple. Great jelly feel to finish.

name: Luftwaffe
preparation: Put 1/3 chocolate syrup then 1/3 jagermeister and then 1/3 butterscotch of the glass.

name: Butterball
preparation: Add Amaretto first and then layer Butterscotch schnapps on top don't mix. Add whipped cream if desired.

name: Apple Jacks
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old fashioned glass and serve.

name: Damn Good
preparation: Layer carefully in cordial or shot glass. First buttershots then green creme de menthe and bailey's irish cream on top. Lastly drop the grenadine through the bailey's. It will settle to the bottom creating a cool effect.

name: Slippery Rootbeer Lollipop
preparation: Pour equal amounts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Butterballs
preparation: Use a double shot glass. Pour the Butterscotch Schnapps first then the coffee liqueur.

name: Dragon Piss
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Guillotine
preparation: Fill a shot glass about 4/5 of the way full with butterscotch schnapps. Float a layer of bailey's irish cream on the schnapps and then a layer of aftershock on the bailey's.

name: Carmel Nana
preparation: Pour DeKuyper Buttershots into a shot glass. Add 99 Bananas stir and serve.

name: Caramel Apple
preparation: Chill in shaker.

name: Carmel Sour Apple Shooter
preparation: Pour equal parts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until sufficiently chilled pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pierced Nipple #2
preparation: Pour the Buttershots and Bailey's into a double-shot glass. Float Goldschlager on top and serve.

name: Island Trader
preparation: Build ingredients in order listed in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pacific Wet Dream
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice and serve.

name: Fucked Up Greek
preparation: Combine both ingredients according to taste in a cocktail shaker. Shake and pour into a shot glass; serve.

name: Clit Lickin' Cowgirl #2
preparation: Layer the Bailey's Irish cream over the peppermint schnapps in a shot glass and serve.

name: Cherry Bomb Shot #2
preparation: First take the shot glass and fill it with 2/3 of an oz of Cranberry juice then pour the Golden Grain into the remaining space until the glass is full and then slam it down.

name: Orgasm #2
preparation: Pour the two evenly into a 1-ounce shot glass and serve.

name: Sky Pilot
preparation: Add together and serve.

name: Mint Chip
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Sweet and Hot
preparation: Heat in a heat-resistant glass add a twist of lemon peel and a clove and serve.

name: Apple Cobbler
preparation: Combine ingredients in shot glass. Shoot!

name: Hot and Bothered
preparation: Pour Buttershots Bailey's and Godiva in a mug of hot cocoa stir and serve.

name: Cinnamon Toast
preparation: Rim an old-fashioned glass with sugar and cinnamon. Add hot cider and rum and serve.

name: French Toast #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Booty Call
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Donkey Love Juice
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Black Raspberry Liquer and Pineapple Juice into a shaker with ice. Shake until thouroughly mixed and chilled then strain into a shot glass and let the patron enjoy!

name: Juicy Fruit #3
preparation: Shake all ingredients and ice in a shaker or mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: The Sheedy
preparation: Add grab glass and shoot back.

name: Fuzzy Noggin
preparation: Pour coconut rum and peach schnapps over ice in glass and fill remaining with pineapple juice. Use as much ice as you like as it will determine how much pineapple juice is used. I use no more than half the glass with ice. You can also blend everything including ice together to make a smooth frothy version of this drink. It tends to make it a bit more acidic but is a viable option.

name: Moldy Green Comforter
preparation: Add the items in the shot class in any order. The idea is for the Creme de Menthe to cluster at the top resembling mold.

name: Cartwheel
preparation: Pour shot of tuaca into a shot glass. Thoroughly drench the lime in bitters then coat in powdered sugar. Drink shot bite into lime experience a veritable explosion of flavor.

name: After Dinner Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: Applecake
preparation: Shake well and use it as a shot.

name: After Eight
preparation: Carefully layer the tia maria creme-de-menthe and bailey's irish cream in that order into a sherry glass ensuring they don't mix.

name: After Supper Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cactus Bite
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Snake Bite Bites Back
preparation: Pour lager and cider (otherwise known as a Snake Bite) into a pint glass and stir. Seperately prepare a Double Pernod and Black (Pernod and Creme de Cassis blackcurrant liqueur) in a 3 oz tall shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and serve.

name: Lighthouse
preparation: Pour kahlua into a shot glass. With a spoon slowly pour irish cream into the shot glass on top of the kahlua. Pour the 151 rum again with the spoon slowly on top of the irish cream and light on fire. Blow flame out before drinking.

name: Snake Bite Black GTI
preparation: Pour vodka into a pint glass. Add both cider and lager and fill with blackcurrant squash. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Mindspaff
preparation: Pour equal measures of each spirit into a shot glass and down in one.

name: English Pumpkin Pie
preparation: Pour the green ginger wine into a beer mug. Add the bottle of pumpkin ale and serve.

name: Fruity as Fuck
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Raz and Stolichnaya raspberry vodka (Stoli Razberi) followed by the orange juice and Red Bull into a highball glass. Splash with cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of orange with a cherry on a pick and serve.

name: Fuck Me Like An Animal
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Duck Shit Inn
preparation: Layer in cordial glass.

name: Fuck Me Sideways
preparation: Pour the lemon vodka peach schnapps and triple sec into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the juices and stir vigorously. Top with extra grapefruit juice if desired and serve.

name: White Flag
preparation: Gently float bailey's irish cream on top of frangelico in a shot glass. Shoot.

name: Cluster Fuck
preparation: Pour the tennessee whiskey kentucky bourbon tequila rum and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the butterscotch and apple schnapps and serve.

name: Brazilian Monk
preparation: Pour into a collins glass and blend briefly. Garnish with a mint leaf and cherry and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Camel Piss
preparation: Pour the beer tequila dark rum and ouzo into a highball glass. Top with mountain dew to taste and serve.

name: Lube Job
preparation: It is best to use a tall shot glass. Fill it halfway with the irish cream: fill it the rest of the way with vodka and shoot it.

name: Apple Blow Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Blow Job #2
preparation: Stir together the Smirnoff Raspberry Twist vodka and Sprite lemon-lime soda in a highball glass. Serve straight up.

name: Screaming Orgasm II
preparation: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: The Italian Job
preparation: Whisk with a fork until all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.

name: A.B.C.
preparation: Layered in a shot glass.

name: Pink Cement
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Tiger Tail #2
preparation: Layer ingredients into a shot glass; Bailey's at bottom brandy on the top. Shoot.

name: Squished Smurf
preparation: Glass: Shot 1) Layer Peach Schnapps then Bailey's. 2) Slowly dribble Blue Curacao over top so that it curtles around the Bailey's. 3) Drop Grenadine in different areas of the shooter glass so that it swirls around the already 'disgusting' mixture. Voila!

name: Leaky Buttery Nipple
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps and Kona coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass over ice. Top with a quick splash of cream stir and serve.

name: Christmas Nipple
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a coffee mug and serve.

name: Redhead's Nipple
preparation: Pour the vanilla schnapps into a shot glass. Carefully layer the irish cream on top and serve.

name: Gorilla Sweat
preparation: Mix all ingredients (except cinnamon stick) and heat gently until butter is melted. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Giraffe snot
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except passion-fruit) in a blender. Blend well and stop. Add passion-fruit blend again quickly in order to keep seeds intact. Pour into cocktail glasses and serve.

name: Gorilla Snot #2
preparation: Layer the creme de banane over the melon liqueur. Then drop the advocaat into the middle of the creme de banane. The advocaat should hang in the middle if poured correctly.

name: Manilla Gorilla
preparation: Combine the vanilla vodka banana liqueur and cream in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Shake gently. Serve in highball or shot glasses.

name: Gorilla Milk
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka and dark creme de cacao. Fill with milk shake and serve.

name: Whiskey Orange The Jesperian Way
preparation: Mix together in a whiskey sour glass.

name: The Icelandic Way
preparation: Mix a normal glass of vodka and fanta lemon drink down to half and fill up with equal parts of beer and coke.

name: Jager Shake
preparation: Pour all 3 liquors into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: B52-Slovak
preparation: Fill in Kahlua then slowly put Baileys on top. Take a tea-spoon reverse in the glass and slowly put the Absinth on top (in Slovakia typically 70% is green 80% is red). Take a straw and cut it in the middle so that it is 50% inside and 50% outside of the glass. DO NOT PUT THE STRAW IN THE GLASS. TRANSPORT THE GLASS WITH CARE. Set the Absinth on fire. Take your hair out of your face remove your glasses! Take the straw in your mouth and then head down and straw INTO THE STILL BURNING DRINK. Drink fast enough in one go - otherwise the straw is set on fire and you will just burn your lips or even your eyebrows! Europe wide: 112 is emergency (fire and ambulance) on all mobile and fixd-line networks! OO.ready(function() { OO.Player.create('ooyalaplayer' 'BoeXQ1ZDrpmx5zvCPrNaCLBxm7HB67ct' { adSetCode: '96afabaaeee543b5ae6cb7dd570f6816' }); });

name: Babygirl
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with cracked ice. Top with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Attitude
preparation: Stir. Garnish with a lemon & lime slice.

name: Cherry Popper #3
preparation: Pour Crown Royal Canadian whisky over ice (preferably 3-4 cubes) add Cherry Coca-Cola stir lightly and serve.

name: Stiletto Manhattan
preparation: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice pour crown royal amaretto and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

name: Chronic
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Of Darkness
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Horse and Rider
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Crapple Juice
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Italian Crown
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Allow the ice to melt for a few moments. Stir and serve.

name: Royal Cheap Fuck
preparation: Pour Whiskey Pukers and Strawberry Juice in a shaker and get it good and mixed up. Pour into cocktail glass and squeeze a cold fresh lime over it. There you go. A setup for a good cheap royal washington.

name: Chicago Apple Cider
preparation: Stir the Canadian Mist whisky and Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add apple juice to taste and serve.

name: Felony
preparation: Pour ingredients on the rocks.

name: Royal Laundry
preparation: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker and rest until ice cold. Serve in a martini glass.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
preparation: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Tropical Whiskey Punch
preparation: Muddle all ingredients except the whiskey in a bar glass. Add whiskey shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a pineapple and lemon wedge a cherry and serve.

name: Canadian Funky Electric Cider
preparation: Place 3/4 oz. of Crown Royal into an old-fashioned glass. Add 2.5 oz. of warmed Canadian Apple Cider. Add crushed ice if preferred.

name: Lifestyle
preparation: Pour the whisky into an old-fashioned glass. Add the Rockstar energy drink and finally the cola and serve.

name: Joe's Killer Bee
preparation: Mix all ingredients then top with 151 proof rum.

name: Killer Bee
preparation: Pour both liquors into a shot glass.

name: Bumble Bee #2
preparation: Both liquors should be chilled. Pour the 1 oz of Jagermeister into glass. Add 1 oz of Barenjager it will float on top. Enjoy!

name: Honey Bee Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rum honey and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bee
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir well and garnish with a cherry.

name: Queen Bee
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bee Stinger
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Virgin Mudslide
preparation: Place ice cream cold coffee milk chocolate syrup and hazel nut syrup in blender blend until smooth. Add heavy cream blend until well mixed. Chill parfait or martini glasses. While holding only the stemms or bases of the glasses rim the insede of the glasses with chocolate syrup. Place a swirl of ready whip on top with a marchiano cherry and chocolate sprinkles and cinamon for garnish. TIP: Shaved chocolate will make the presentation more dramatic perfect for a romantic evening.

name: Red Nuts
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Mackinnon Spice
preparation: Pour into a rocks or old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Slippery Strawberry Bald Beaver
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Irish Rootbeer
preparation: Fill a shot glass half with Kahlua half with amaretto and a splash of Bacardi 151 rum. Drop it into a pint of Guinness and serve.

name: Heliuva Rootbeer
preparation: Pour into a glass and serve.

name: French Tickler #2
preparation: Shaken or straight up both are great but you must be prepared for a drink that will tickle the back of your throat and warm your belly.

name: Caitian Tongue Tickler
preparation: Add the pineapple chunks to a highball glass. Pour in grenadine fill with wine and serve.

name: Tiatip
preparation: Chill Tia Maria and Baileys Irish Cream to 20 degrees. In a shot glass fill half way with Tia Maria then very carefully add Bailey Irish cream on top to float. Do not allow them to mix. Keep them seperated. There's your shot. Enjoy!

name: Whistling Gypsy
preparation: Layer tia maria bailey's irish cream and stoli vodka in that order in a doubleshot glass.

name: Lewd Lewinsky
preparation: Layer in order.

name: Pot O' Gold
preparation: Blend over ice. Sip or chug.

name: Cinnamon Apple Shooter
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Jerry's Mom
preparation: Pour everclear into an old-fashioned glass top with ice cream and serve.

name: Flaming Fruit Trees
preparation: Light on fire for five seconds blow out and suck through a straw.

name: Extreme Suicide
preparation: Pour the grain alcohol into a shot glass. Add Goldschlager on top and serve.

name: Mighty Mouse
preparation: Fill a 2-oz shot glass halfway with Hot Damn. Fill remaining half with Jager leaving a little room to top off with Everclear. Igniting optional.

name: Hell No
preparation: Pour and stir each ingredient into a mixing glass with ice stirring continuously. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Flaming Mouth Wash
preparation: Place the mint leaf in a shot glass. Pour the liquors into the glass stir and serve.

name: Flaming Open Wound
preparation: Pour the grain alcohol into a shot glass and drop the tabasco sauce on top. Ignite extinguish and shoot.

name: Hell's Sunrise
preparation: Pour orange juice into a shot glass. Add Hot Damn! and Everclear stir briefly and serve.

name: Easy Does It
preparation: Bailey's first. Pour Kahlua. Float Everlear. Bottoms up!

name: Demon Drop
preparation: Add the everclear first and then the orange juice so that it settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.

name: Raging Indian
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Catasmashed
preparation: Stir in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Evershock
preparation: Stir ingredients together in equal parts in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Crossbones
preparation: Chill the jagermeister and rumplemintz in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a shot glass. Top with everclear and serve.

name: Hawaiian Clear
preparation: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in desired glass.

name: Face Raper
preparation: Mix evenly in a shot glass and serve cold.

name: Mustache Ride
preparation: Add the schnapps to a shot glass. Top with Everclear and lastly the chocolate milk. Shoot.

name: Dragon Sweat
preparation: Pour ingredients into shot glass and serve.

name: Schnapp Pop
preparation: Fill glass with ice add schnapps and fill with club soda. Turn over once to mix. Serve with straw.

name: Dragon's Blood
preparation: In a twelve ounce glass mix all ingredients and serve.

name: Cherry Popper #2
preparation: Pour irish cream and tequila rose into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: B-54
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Flagstaff
preparation: Layer the kahlua  bailey's grand marnier and finally 151 on top in a shot glass. Serve.

name: Lemon Grass
preparation: Add crushed ice to the highball class then add the cointreau. Fill with lemonade. Add a 1/2 shot of blue curacao to make it turn green. Serve with a slice of lemon.

name: Hybris
preparation: Build in a highball glass on ice. Decorate with lime.

name: Tampico
preparation: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

name: Abelito
preparation: Combine equal parts of vodka and club soda in a highball glass. Add a splash of lime juice and cranberry juice and serve.

name: Melon Patch
preparation: Stir the melon liqueur triple sec and vodka together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Kwantini
preparation: Mix vodka schnapps and cranberry juice in shaker and strain into cocktail glass. Fill with club soda and sprinkle shaved ice over top. Serve.

name: Alhambra Royale
preparation: Fill a mug with hot chocolate almost to the brim. Twist an orange peel over the mug and add it to the chocolate. Using a ladle warm the cognac over hot water ignite and while still flaming pour into the mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Casino Royale
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Pompey Royale
preparation: Dissolve sugar in juices and add to a champagne saucer with champagne and syrup.

name: White Lion Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Green Opal
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Amsterdam
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Smurf on the Rag
preparation: Mix Peach Schnapps and Blue Curacao in a shot glass and top with whipped cream and four or five drops of grenadine.

name: Harbor Light
preparation: Make kahlua triple sec and cognac pousse-cafe style in a cordial glass. Ignite rum in a teaspoon and float on top. Extinguish and serve.

name: Cinn's Stop Light
preparation: Layer each ingredient on top of each other. Melon first then grenadine then baileys. Use back of tablespoon to layer evenly.

name: Light Sangria With Pineapple
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the apple juice. Add pineapple (you can also add the liquid from the pineapple tin). Peel and cut the apple. Mix all the ingredients except the ale and the ice which you add before serving.

name: Traffic Light Cooler
preparation: In a pilsner glass filled with ice cubes first pour the melon liqueur then the tequila to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

name: Light Green Panties
preparation: Shake the vodka green menthe and baileys over ice in a mixing tin. Strain into a sherry glass. Carefully pour a drop of grenadine down the inside of the glass.

name: Light and Dark
preparation: Add rums sour mix and ice to a shaker and shake. Pour into a whiskey sour glass or 10 oz. goblet. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Milwaukee Stop Light
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Bold Gold Monkey
preparation: Combine all in a shaker with adequate ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Silver Spider
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blind Melon
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Red Headed Leg Spreader
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Murder in the Forest
preparation: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a shaker shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes if desired. Slowly add a dash of grenadine garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Loch Ness Mystery
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Caribbean Murder
preparation: Pour the Redrum Malibu rum and Bacardi Limon rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Black Murder
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Island Murder
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass add an umbrella and sword shaped tooth pick and serve.

name: Emerald Martini
preparation: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

name: Roselyn Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Dirty Dick's Downfall
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin vermouth and campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Claridge Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Knickerbocker Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Baron Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon wedge and serve.

name: Sphinx Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Paisley Martini
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Licorice Vyos
preparation: Chill both Jagermeister and Coke. Pour a shot of Jagermeister into chilled glass then pour Coke over it. Drink through licorice straw or eat licorice on the side.

name: Rubbermeister
preparation: Pour coke into a highball glass add jagermeister and serve.

name: Chocolate Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Bob Dylan
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender mix until smooth. Be careful surge is carbonated it will foam up. Enjoy!

name: Chuck Yeager
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into a highball glass roughly half-filled with ice cubes. Fill with the pineapple juice. Stir well with a spoon or shake.

name: My Own Worst Enemy
preparation: Layer Brenjger then Jgermeister into shot glass. Drop shot into half filled glass of Rockstar and shoot.

name: London Fog #2
preparation: Frappe in a highball glass.

name: Jager Tonic
preparation: Add jagermeister to a highball glass with three ice cubes. Fill with tonic water and garnish with an orange slice.

name: The Lindy
preparation: Put the 2 shots of jaigermister into the bottom of a tall beer mug and pour in the surge.

name: Bloody Viking
preparation: Pour 3/4 of a mug of Newcastle and 1 shot of Jagermeister. Drop the shot into the mug and chug the mixture.

name: Dirk Diggler
preparation: Add Jgermeister and fill rest of glass with Thomas Kemper Root Beer. Mix and enjoy!

name: Milky Nooky
preparation: Shake and serve in a highball glass.

name: Monstermeister
preparation: Pour the Monster energy drink and Jagermeister into a shaker with ice shake briefly. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Kick Yer Ass Sas
preparation: Pour shots and soda over ice in a mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

name: Green Tea
preparation: Mix chartreuse and sour mix on top of ice in a collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and if you like garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

name: Neon Fairy
preparation: Filter herbs out of Absinth and pour Absinth into glass. Add baker's (superfine) sugar and stir until dissolved. Absinthe will take on a cloudy green color. Add Sprite and sweet and sour mix. Sit back relax and enjoy.

name: Jager Vacation
preparation: Add all three ingredients in a shaker or blender and mix with ice.

name: Adam's Apple
preparation: Pour galliano into a tall glass. Fill with apple juice add ice as desired and serve.

name: Jagasm
preparation: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add jager and rootbeer schnapps then fill with Pepsi and serve.

name: Jaygo
preparation: Stir ingredients together well in a tall glass or cup and serve.

name: Black Nazi
preparation: Mix the Jagermeister and Mountain Dew Pitch Black over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Bruja Mexicana
preparation: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

name: Jagerade
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes; stir and serve.

name: Jager and Dew
preparation: Pour the Mountain Dew into a pint glass (half full) then add in a shot of Jagermeister. You can drink slowly with ice or chug without. Taste of drink will not change with time like some of the other similar ones (Jagermeister and Red Bull).

name: Bleeding Snatch
preparation: Add ingredients together in highball glass stir with cinnamon stick and enjoy your very own bleeding snatch.

name: My Wife's Snatch
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Wet Snatch
preparation: Add blue raspberry to ice add vanilla pineapple and coconut then blend. Add tequila and blend again. Add whipped cream on top if desired.

name: Pink Penocha
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl. Keep chilled and stir frequently.

name: Comfortable Fuzz
preparation: Put the schnapps and Southern Comfort in a glass with some ice cubes and fill the rest of the glass with equal amounts of orange juice and cranberry juice.

name: Coco-Cognac
preparation: Pour cognac and creme de cacao into an 8 oz. pina colada glass over ice. Top with milk or cream. Garnish with a cherry and shaved chocolate/cocoa powder.

name: Karlsson's Dream
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker shake well and strain into a highball glass.

name: Cookies 'n' Cream
preparation: Add the creme de cacao and vanilla schnapps and then fill with milk.

name: Phantom
preparation: Pour licor 43 into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add absolut vodka fill with milk and mix.

name: Slemmig Slyna
preparation: Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.

name: Butterfly
preparation: Shake well in a shaker with two ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass add a short straw and serve.

name: Polish Butterfly
preparation: Pour Polish vodka and blue curacao into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Bellini Martini
preparation: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)
