name: Banana Apple Slushie
preparation: Mix all the ingredents together in a blender until blended and thick. Add a slice of an apple to the top of your drink mix some chocolate syrup to the side and a tinge of sugar to perfect the taste.

name: Absolute Monster
preparation: Combine the Absolut vanilla vodka Monster energy drink and ice cubes in a blender. Blend until slushy pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Shark's Nipple
preparation: Pour rum in over the ice fill approximately to halfway with Mt. Dew fill with cranberry juice then mix again.

name: Chambrite
preparation: Pour chambord and vodka into a glass. Fill with sprite.

name: Green Goddess
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur Scotch dry vermouth and lemon-lime osda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Arizona Sunset
preparation: 1. Add ice to a tall-stem cocktail glass. Slowly pour cream de noyaux over ice until some settles on the bottom. 2. Add tequila triple sec lime juice & orange juice into a shaker with ice and shake thoroughly. 3. Pour over ice. 3. Garnish with straw and lime slice or orange & cherry.

name: Hawaiian Sunset
preparation: Place ice cubes into the glass. Shake vodka orange juice and cranberry juice in a shaker. Pour into glass. Top off with soda water. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice (optional).

name: Zool
preparation: Pour peach schnapps into a shot glass and add vodka. Add amaretto until vodka turns to a light brown and serve.

name: Missle Pop
preparation: Pour vodka pineapple juice and fruit punch into an ice-filled glass. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Hula Hoop
preparation: Pour gin orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Georgian Sunrise
preparation: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

name: Gold Mine
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and add lemonade. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Gold Margarita
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Gold Record
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

name: Gorilla's Fart
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a separate glass with ice then pour it into the shot glass. Drink straight up.

name: Gold Standard
preparation: Shake and serve in a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Gold Margarita #2
preparation: Build in a lowball or margarita glass and serve.

name: frog man
preparation: You just mix 1/3 vodka with 1/3 orange juice and 1/3 mountain dew in a beer mug.

name: Chain Lightning
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Southern Gin Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Octopus
preparation: Pour Absolut Rumpleminze and Bacardi 151 into a shot glass. Using a stir stick drip in 8 drops of Bailey's Irish Cream one at a time to form the tentacles of the Octopus. Serve.

name: Hennyville Slugger
preparation: Pour the cognac into a highball glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with sprite. Squeeze 1/2 of a medium size lemon into the drink and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

name: Red Headed Pimp
preparation: Mix ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Perplexed Pimp
preparation: Pour the cognac raspberry schnapps lemonade and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain over crushed ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Pimp Ride
preparation: Pour the Pimp Juice into a shot glass top with Absolut vodka and shoot.

name: Tiger Woods
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice add the vodka lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Pimp Juice #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Gorky Park
preparation: Pour vodka cherry brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pimp Juice #3
preparation: Pour all four ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice and shake well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Pimp & Hoe
preparation: Pour the liquor into a cocktail glass. Add the orange and lemon juice stir briefly and serve.

name: A Pimp Named Slickback
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a goblet with a sugared rim. Hold up to light and swirl contemplatively.

name: Hallo Police
preparation: Pour the vodka and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Jays Wicked Boxer Droppers
preparation: Add beer to pitcher stir in undiluted frozen cranberry/raspberry juice 7-UP and vodka to taste. May add a little more or less of any ingredient to adjust to personal preference.

name: Bar Slut
preparation: Add vodka to a mason jar filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and Red Bull and splash 7-up on top. Stir and enjoy!

name: Lanette
preparation: Pour vodka ice and cranberry juice into a cocktail glass. Fill with orange juice.

name: Tahitian Tea
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add 1/2 oz of each liquor. Fill with 3 oz of each juice. Shake. Serve in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices (if you have the patience).

name: Russian Mountain Dew
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass with 3 or 4 ice cubes and serve.

name: Eenytini
preparation: Pour blue curacao gin and 7-up/sprite into a shaker tin filled with ice swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into a cocktail glass. Repeat this with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

name: The Hollywood
preparation: Mix with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Mountain Sunrise
preparation: Shake and serve over crushed ice.

name: Cranberry Kiss
preparation: Make by the glass for a few guests or in a shaker or pitcher for a large party. Serve in a cocktail glass garnishing the glass rim with a half slice of fresh lime.

name: Mexican's Revenge
preparation: Shake and pour over ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with straws.

name: Mang Tini
preparation: Fill a mixing glass with ice add Malibu mango rum sugar (or Splenda) 7-Up water and lime wedges. Muddle ingredients and strain into a shot glass or serve in sugar rimmed martini glass. (Add vodka for more kick if desired)

name: Purple Mexican
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into highball glass. Shoot.

name: Wrathwilde's Ultimate Margarita
preparation: Easy to measure using a clear Pyrex Measuring Cup - Mix ingredients in blender with 6 Standard ice cubes until ice is melted. Serve on the Rocks salt the rim if you must but this recipe is excellent without it.

name: Fuzzy Rita
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Pina Rita
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed margarita glass with shaved ice. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

name: Flamingo Rita
preparation: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Blend until frothy. Pour into a tall glass with a flamingo stirring stick or straw and serve.

name: Killer Rita
preparation: Rim a margarita glass with salt (optional). Fill with ice. Add ingredients into cocktail shaker and mix. Pour over ice and garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Passionate Rita
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: En Sann En
preparation: Fill long drinks glass with ice-cubes add vodka and sour-mix. Top with coca-cola stir.

name: Kamikaze Kool
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Simultaneously pour in the vodka and grand marnier. Add lime juice. Stir with a straw and serve.

name: Mofo Cocktail
preparation: Layer ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bomb Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a chilled glass and serve.

name: Georgia Tea
preparation: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.

name: Peachbreeze
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins Glass filled with ice.

name: McRita Cocktail
preparation: Combine the tequila triple sec sour mix and Rose's lime juice with half a cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend well and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and salt and serve.

name: Fruit Margarita
preparation: Add the tequila triple sec sour mix and fruit (choose one fruit) to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Gee String
preparation: Shoot the first four shots in order listed suck the lemon then chase it with a beer!

name: Fraustadt
preparation: Fill the boston shaker with all the ingredients and a lot of ice cubes then shake untill your hand goes cold. Pour up in a highball glass and put a lemon slice on the edge.

name: Do Be Careful
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Queen of Hearts
preparation: Add the melon liqueur and the amaretto to a highball glass first. Then add the blue curaco and cranberry juice.

name: Killer Hunch Punch
preparation: Pour liquor into a large cooler. Then cut up and add the fruit (canned and fresh). Let the fruit sit in the liquor for 30-45 min. Then add lots of ice and the Hawaiian punch. Add the orange juice and sprite to taste. Serve in punch cups.

name: M.V.P.
preparation: Pour vodka midori and malibu into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

name: Cool Aid
preparation: Mix all together with ice shake and cheat. Drink up...

name: Killer Shots
preparation: Combine equal parts of each ingredient together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Killer Koolaid
preparation: Pour your shot of everclear into a rocks glass and fill the rest of glass with (FP) pucker.

name: Shark Attack
preparation: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

name: Bird Bomb
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass half-way with ice. Add the Absolut vodka and DeKuyper Cheri-Beri Pucker. Fill with lemonade and serve.

name: Lemonade Bomb
preparation: Follow the instructions on the can of lemonade concentrate but substitute the vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.

name: Old-Fashioned Cocktail
preparation: Combine the sugar cube bitters and 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Muddle well add blended whiskey and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel and ice cubes. Add slices of orange and lemon and top with the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Rusty Nail
preparation: Pour the scotch and drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Limoncello Liqueur
preparation: Soak skin of 7 lemons in alcohol for 2 days. Strain. Boil water and sugar and chill. Mix with alcohol. Store in the fridge.

name: Italian Limoncello
preparation: 1. Wash the lemons with a vegetable brush and hot water to remove any reside of pesticides or wax. Carefully zest the lemons with a zester or vegetable peeler so there is no white pith on the peel. In a 1-gallon glass jar add one fifth vodka and the lemon zest. Cover the jar and let sit at room temperature for at least 10 days and up to 40 days in a cool dark place. 3. In a large saucepan combine the sugar and water and cook until thickened appx. 5 to 7 minutes. Let the syrup cool before adding it to the limoncello mixture. Add the additional fifth of vodka. Allow to rest for another 10 to 40 days. 4. After the rest period strain and bottle discarding the lemon zest. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.

name: Blue Watch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Eve's Apple Daiquiri
preparation: Combine the rum sour mix and apple juice concentrate with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a round wine glass. Garnish with an apple wedge or a slice of lime and serve.

name: Bronx Silver Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: San Remo
preparation: Pour into a wine glass garnish with slices of grapefruit and mandarin and serve.

name: Fuzzy Bullet
preparation: Just mix it and drink it.

name: Silver Bullet #2
preparation: Pour scotch into an iced glass and coat sides. Empty scotch out pour in vodka.

name: Silver Bronx
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: San Diego Seabreeze
preparation: Build all ingredients in a collins glass cover shake and serve.

name: Free Silver
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: The Captains Silver Sunrise
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice: Capt. Morgan Silver - Parrot Bay - orange juice - cranberry juice.

name: HO-Tini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Vaughn Purple Haze
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass and add razzmatazz. Fill with cranberry juice mix and serve.

name: Cran-Collins
preparation: Put three cubes of ice in a glass. Pour in Vodka Cranberry Juice and Collins Mix. Stir and enjoy.

name: Temptress
preparation: Toss some ice cubes into a glass. Pour in a shot of grenadine and a shot of vodka. Fill with gingerale or Sprite and enjoy.

name: Jungle Boogie
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: I Love You
preparation: Pour in order into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Chicks Dig It
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled glass and shake or serve up in a cocktail glass.

name: Red Rock
preparation: Mix vodka and schnapps in the bottom of a glass. Add ice and pour in the can of dr. pepper.

name: Naked Navel
preparation: Both vodka and schnapps should be kept in the freezer prior to making. Pour vodka into a shot glass and add the schnapps forming a ball in the bottom of the glass.

name: Shut the Hell Up
preparation: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown Everclear & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & shut the hell up.

name: Keep it Up
preparation: Pour champagne cognac and orange juice into a champagne flute. Add one sugar cube saturated in angostura bitters and a twist of orange. Serve with a muddler.

name: Don't Worry About It
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Pep Up
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with 7-up stir gently and serve.

name: Peche Mignon
preparation: Pour the vodka and schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add peach juice and shake until cold (don't use too many cubes). Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Slaber
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Verdi
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach and a mint sprig and serve.

name: Grimaldi
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Neo-Tokyo
preparation: Use a bamboo skewer to elaborately connect an Orange twist wrapped around a lime wedge barely touching the Marachino cherry which covers the point. Pull half of the lime-skin away from the fruit and use the lime vertically (like a paperclip) to perch the entire crane-like garnish on the edge of a chilled cocktail glass. Combine sake Stoli Zen Pucker sours and ice into a shaker. Shake and strain into the glass in front of the customer. Pour Blue Curaao into the glass and allow the drink to settle into two layers. Slowly add the grenadine. Do not stir! Encourage the customer to squeeze the lime into the glass for a more well-balanced flavour. If left un-stirred the drink will remain in layers as the customer imbibes. (When stirred it turns an unsettling violet-black.) Use a Bamboo skewer (approx. 5).

name: Dreamcatcher
preparation: Build over ice pour the shot of vodka in first and then layer the shooter of blue curacao on top of that. Splash the gin over the curaco and add the lime cordial after this fill the glass up with 7-up and squeeze some lime juice in there. Drop the grenadine in last to keep it deep purple at the bottom just don't stir it this makes for a stronger drink.

name: Pink Clyt
preparation: Shake in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour into an old-fashioned glass garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Dewn' Razz
preparation: Fill the glass with ice add the shot of Razz top off with Mountain Dew.

name: Dirty Volcano
preparation: Shake the vodka and rums and strain into a rocks glass. Add sweet & sour mix fill with cranberry juice and serve. A splash of amaretto or triple sec is a great addition to this drink.

name: Horny Bayman
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass. This drink is strong!

name: Oki Sun
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until frothy. Serve.

name: Stockholm 75
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the vodka sugar and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

name: Champagne Jello Shots
preparation: Add the Jello and boiling water and stir until powder is dissolved. Allow to cool to room temperature. Slowly add the champagne and stir in. Pour into an ice cube tray and refridgerate until set. To serve dip trays in hot water for 5 seconds then run a knife around the outside of the shot. Place in a large bowl and serve with tongs.

name: Bellini #2
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Flirtini
preparation: Muddle the pineapple pieces and cointreau in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and pineapple juice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and top with champagne. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Champagne Martini
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Electric Storm
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a shot glass and slam it.

name: Electric Koolaid Slush
preparation: Mix all the above ingredients together except the sprite. Put in freezer safe containers with a good sealing lid. Make at least 24 hours in advance to give it time to freeze. It won't ever freeze solid because of the alcohol but will get nice and slushy. To serve: Fill half your cup with slush and top off with sprite/7-up.

name: Electric Relaxation
preparation: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in the triple sec and pineapple juice and serve.

name: Electric Marcucci
preparation: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

name: Mike's Eggnog Wonderful
preparation: Pour eggnog into a coffee mug. Stir in amaretto and float kahlua on top. Add a small shot of whipped cream then sprinkle a couple of pinches of nutmeg on top.

name: Malibu Lagoon Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large punch bowl. Before serving add ice. If desired add orange and lemon slices as a garnish.

name: Cum Scorcher
preparation: In a shot glass put butterscotch schnapps vodka and kahlua in that order. Slowly add the irish cream. *A little extra irish cream may be used to allow the drink to stand and the mix to get scorched.

name: Aphrodite's Love Potion
preparation: Pour brandy angostura and pineapple juice into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Poison Apple
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

name: Shittin' Blue
preparation: Mix in this order: blueberry schnapps blue caracoa vodka. Carefully drop in the blue syrup. Drink down and enjoy!

name: Orgasm #11
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Sandbar Sleeper
preparation: Fill shaker with ice add ingredients chill strain.

name: Photon Torpedo
preparation: Mix the aftershock with vodka in a shot glass.

name: G Bomb
preparation: Chill both ingredients by placing the bottles in the freezer for at least 1 hour. You should also chill the shot glasses you will be using the same way. Pour both ingredients into a chilled shot glass and enjoy.

name: Estonian Forest-Fire
preparation: Add vodka to a shot glass. Drop in the tabasco sauce and chase with the kiwi.

name: Canada Dream
preparation: Shake all liquid ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes. Serve with straw.

name: Five Aces
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into shot glasses. Garnish with twists of lime.

name: Afterburner #2
preparation: Pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass. (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking

name: Liquid Skittles
preparation: Mix Gatorade Lemon-Lime energy drink and cherry limeade together in a cocktail glass. Stir continuously as you add the Malibu mango rum and serve.

name: Paraflu Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka and lemon juice (to taste) into a cocktail glass filled with ice. Slowly pour the blue curacao to the bottom of the glass and serve.

name: Hypnotic Martini #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Casablanca #2
preparation: Shake fairly well with enough ice and serve.

name: Amaretto Sourball
preparation: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blenheim
preparation: Pour the vodka Tia Maria coffee liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pink Limon
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Cherry Coke
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Blue Cowboy
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bumpy Grapefruit
preparation: Stir both ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Crystal Slipper Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Greyhound
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin if preferred.)

name: Blue Riband
preparation: Pour the gin white curacao and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Abilene
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Chi-Town
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cup and serve.

name: Beast Juice
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Korean Karbomb
preparation: Pour the vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add equal amounts of orange juice and Red Bull stir and serve.

name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
preparation: Combine pineapple juice raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes in a shaker. Shake well strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hidden Grapefruit
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Oxymoron
preparation: Maintain the vodka and juice at room temperature. Mix in an old-fashioned glass and add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

name: Grapefruit Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Hokkaido Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bloody Dutchman
preparation: Stir the grenadine strawberry daiquiri mix and Everclear together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Von Dutch and serve.

name: Dancing Dutchman
preparation: Mix fruit juices together in one bowl place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl and float cherries in the bowl if desired.

name: Devon Gin
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice and serve.

name: Woody Woodpecker
preparation: Shake cachaca and juice with ice and pour into a collins glass. Add galliano and serve.

name: Irish Orgasm
preparation: Mix ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Root Beer
preparation: Pour vodka into a large ice-filled glass. Fill with pepsi (do not substitute coke) swirl a splash of galliano on top and serve.

name: California Root Beer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: The Constable Shuffle
preparation: Put everything into a pint glass with one ice cube and serve.

name: Root Beer Float #2
preparation: Pour the vodka tequila galliano and kahlua into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of cream top with coke and serve.

name: Urine Sample
preparation: Just pour it in.

name: Brazilian Mango
preparation: Add small slices of mango to a hurricane glass. Pour the cachaca banana liqueur and mango juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into the glass. Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur. Garnish with a sliced banana and a cherry and serve.

name: Batida Morango
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: Batida de Banana
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Lambada
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour over crushed ice in a fancy glass.

name: Batida de Maracuja
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Batida Abacaxi
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: Copacabana
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass. Fill with crushed ice and serve.

name: Batida Mango
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender. Blend well pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: Batida de Brazil
preparation: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Italian Colada
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry and serve.

name: Zico
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Chocolate-Mint Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice then pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with chocolate stick and mint sprig.

name: Cucacaracha
preparation: Using a jigger glass (3oz shot glass) mix 1/3 of each part then top with club soda. Cover and shake lightly.

name: Cranberry Iced Tea
preparation: In a pticher combine cranberry cocktail ginger ale and tea. Serve over ice garnish each glass with orange and lemon slices.

name: Flying Squirrel
preparation: Pour tequila and triple sec into a highball glass one-third filled with crushed ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: New Moon
preparation: Pour the gin triple sec and Rose's lime juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with tonic water or add to taste. Stir again gently. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Passion Punch
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Player's Passion
preparation: Pour pre-chilled ingredients in order into a champagne saucer. Stir and serve.

name: Angel's Lips
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Florida Sling
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Florida Special
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Florida Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Florida Daiquiri
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Big Chill #1
preparation: Pour the rum coconut cream and juices into a cocktail shaker with one cup of ice (8 oz). Shake well Strain into a pilsner glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Florida Iced Tea
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.Garnish with an Orange slice.

name: Brandy Vermouth Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apricot Kiss
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy Scotch whisky and sweet vermouth into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir gently and serve.

name: Celtic
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Witch Hunt
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Jock-In-A-Box
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes.

name: Hot Scotch Nightcap
preparation: Pour into a heat-proof cup and serve.

name: Scotch Old-Fashioned
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the scotch. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Blackjack
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Hoots Mon
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Caleigh
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Beal's Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stone Fence
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add scotch and bitters and fill with carbonated water. Stir and serve.

name: Scotch Daisy
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the Scotch lemon juice sugar and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Perfect Rob Roy
preparation: Combine the scotch sweet vermouth and dry vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry or a lemon twist.

name: Ortensia
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Kiltlifter
preparation: Shake gently and pour over ice in old-fashioned glass.

name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Aggravation
preparation: Fill a rocks glass with ice then add Scotch and Kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.

name: Scotch Bishop Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: McDuff
preparation: Combine the scotch triple sec and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Black Tartan
preparation: Straight: Float all ingredients. -- On the Rocks: Shake w/ice and strain over ice.

name: Blood and Sand Cocktail
preparation: Shake over ice cubes strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Butter Nut Scotch
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Graceland
preparation: Pour the vermouth whisky and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Maeek
preparation: Combine in a glass add orange peel and serve.

name: Whisky Mac
preparation: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

name: Bonny Doon
preparation: Pour Scotch whisky vermouth and benedictine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Balmoral
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Celtic Mix Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Joyce of Hillhouse
preparation: Pour the vermouth whisky and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hot Mon
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Squeeze in the juice from a twist of lemon peel place the peel on top and serve.

name: Hoot Mon Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky vermouth and benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Choker
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cameron's Kick
preparation: Pour both whiskies the lemon juice and the orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Warm Woolly Sheep
preparation: Mix scotch and drambuie then top with warm milk.

name: Southern Comfort Manhattan
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort sweet vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Artillery
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rob Roy
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Scotch Flip
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the Scotch egg sugar and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Sammy Special
preparation: Put all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. (More ice = more froth.) Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glass and enjoy.

name: Phillip Island Firewater
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Boston Gold
preparation: Pour the vodka and banana liqueur into a highball glass with/without ice. Stir well. Add orange juice to taste and stir again. Serve.

name: Bananaball
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Substitute Orange juice for some Pineapple juice for a different taste.

name: Mulch Muncher
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into cocktail glass.

name: Cramit
preparation: Fill and stir they love the name.

name: Godmother
preparation: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Breast Caresser
preparation: Pour the brandy madeira and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Netherland
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Lemon Lady
preparation: Shake without ice and pour into a frosted champagne saucer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon slice and serve.

name: Baja Side Car
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes.

name: Cherry Ripe
preparation: Pour vodka cherry brandy and brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Grand Marnier
preparation: Mix to dissolve sugar.

name: Fondling Fool
preparation: Pour the brandy madeira wine and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: City Slicker
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Count Stroganoff
preparation: Pour the vodka creme de cacao and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and serve.

name: Robin's Nest
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kamora Mocha Mint
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into shot glasses.

name: Watermelon Crawl # 2
preparation: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with mountain dew.

name: Polkagris
preparation: Mix ingredients in a highball glass. Add one or two ice cubes and cherries. Serve with a thick red and white striped straw.

name: Moose Juice #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a jug or pitcher and serve.

name: Chubbie Moose
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's into a chilled mug and mix with A&W root beer. Add ice stir and serve.

name: Moose Piss
preparation: Mix ingredients together with a ladle in a clean five-gallon pail. Serve with or without a little ice.

name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wedding Bells Cocktail
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Anniversary Punch
preparation: A tasty punch! Put the frozen strawberries lime peel and lime juice into a pan and simmer over low heat for about 10 minutes. Pour the result over a block of ice in a punch bowl. Chill the wine and champagne and add before serving. Makes approximately 40 servings.

name: Wedding Bell Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet gin cherry brandy orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wedding Bell Punch
preparation: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the bourbon rum creme de cacao champagne red wine vermouth club soda and ginger ale. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange slices and strawberries. Makes 32 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Hoss's Holdup
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sex in the Desert
preparation: Shake and serve on the rocks.

name: Acapulcoco
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Suffragette City
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Neutered Purple Squirrel
preparation: Pour the light rum dark rum blue curacao grenadine and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass with a small amount of crushed ice. Add the club soda. Garnish with an almond-embedded slice of lime and serve.

name: Purple Squirrel
preparation: Mix everything but club soda and shake well in a tumbler. Add the club soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an almond embedded in it. Additional ingredients for variations: creme de almond coconut milk.

name: Rumless Rickey
preparation: Add lime juice grenadine and bitters to an old-fashioned glass with three to four large ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Stir garnish with a long twist of lime and serve.

name: Phuck Suck
preparation: Pour rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add lime juice and fill with cranberry juice to taste. Add splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Fireman's Sour
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum lime juice and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda. Stir well. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Green Mirage
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gale At Sea
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Southern Harmony
preparation: Build over ice and serve with a smile.

name: Red Vodkatini
preparation: Mix vodka vermouth and creme de cassis and pour over a scoop of crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Minttini
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Bee's Kiss
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dit Kicker
preparation: Pour the fruit punch into a glass. Add the vodka and schnapps. The correct amount of lemon juice all depends on personal preference. A couple of splashes is a good mix to start with.

name: Kung Fu Kicker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Malibu Barbie #2
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the rest of the glass with pink lemonade stir and serve with a straw.

name: Coconut Fusion
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass 2/3 with ice. Add ingredients stir and serve.

name: Cran-Ram
preparation: Combine rum and cranberry juice first. Add a splash of sunny delight. May drink with crushed ice if preferred.

name: Malibu Fizz
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add Malibu then cranberry and top with Fresca. Serve with lime garnish.

name: Butt Naked Kiwi
preparation: Fill a resealable 32. oz container with one can of Mountain Dew. Add the 2 shots of everclear then the second can of Mountain Dew. Add the sprees and shake until they turn white. Strain the mixture into the serving pitcher. Keep the sprees and eat them later.

name: Sip And Go Naked
preparation: Mix all ingrediants together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic but packs a wallop.

name: Fruitopia
preparation: Pour ingredients shake with ice and serve with a straw. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Arizona Aztec
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila Bacardi Limon rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Stir well. Fill with Coca-cola stir again and serve.

name: La Bomba
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except grenadine) with ice 3 times. Pour into sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add grenadine and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Carry's Caribe
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender at high speed until smooth. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Arizona Buttkicker
preparation: Pour both ingredients over crushed ice in a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Boardwalk Breeze
preparation: Shake and strain ingredients into a hurricane glass.

name: Georgia Pie
preparation: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Arizona PowWow
preparation: Mix the three alcohols together and pour into shot glasses leaving enough room to add a little club soda. Best if drunk with a lime lemon or an orange wedge.

name: Tropical Bliss
preparation: Pour Malibu rum and Smirnoff Orange Twist vodka into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill glass 3/4 full with equal amounts of orange juice and pineapple juice; fill rest of way with milk; shake and serve.

name: Titty Twister-Rita
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a blender over crushed ice. Blend until you see the top of the mix stop moving. Pour into a margarita glass and garnish with a lemon or lime slice. Makes 1-2 servings.

name: Lemon Icetini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Lemon Mint
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Neon Loki
preparation: Stir the apple pucker and Absolut citron together in a shot glass. Top with lemonade and serve.

name: Lemon Slap
preparation: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Cranberry Kiss #2
preparation: Pour the rum peppermint schnapps collins mix and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Kiwi Lemon
preparation: Mix in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.

name: Fuzzy Eddie
preparation: Pour the Malibu and Bacardi and top it off with the orange juice over ice.

name: AJ's Bubbling Brew
preparation: Carefully pour the Rum Tequila Southern Comfort and Peppermint Schnapps into the glass light on fire and quickly add the beer. After adding the beer stir the mixture and watch it bubble forth.

name: Acapulco Clam Digger
preparation: Mix over cracked ice in an lowball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon. Note: you can substitute Clamato juice (6 oz.) for the tomato juice and the clam juice.

name: Cloudy Day
preparation: Drink the neck of the bottle of Corona. Fill in with tequila and then add lime wedge. Turn bottle over to mix the ingredients making sure to keep your thumb on the opening as not to spill.

name: Caribbean Boilermaker
preparation: Pour the Corona into an 18 oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

name: La Mamila
preparation: Empty the beers into a large container add the lemons tabasco and the salt and mix in. Add the tequila and clamato then swirl.

name: Wisconsin Lunchbucket
preparation: Combine the beer and orange juice in a large beer mug. Drop in a shot of amaretto with shot glass and slam.

name: Kryptonite Shot
preparation: Pour the orange juice and beer into a pint glass. Seperately add the lime vodka to a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink.

name: Baha Fog
preparation: Open a corona and fill it to the top with tequila. Squeeze a 1/4 lime on top. Chug immediately.

name: Shandy
preparation: Fill a glass half full of beer (lighter beer works better). Fill the rest with Ginger Ale or 7-Up (preference).

name: Acapulco Dream Cream
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Dust with cinnamon and serve.

name: Evil Corona
preparation: Pour (drink) the first 2 oz. of corona and add 2 oz. of Absolut Citron. Cap top of bottle and turn upside down for about 5 seconds. Serve with a lime wedge.

name: Pond Water
preparation: Pour beer into a beer mug. Top with coke and serve.

name: Jamaican Beer
preparation: Pour vermouths gin and whisky into a glass. Add the beer and finish with a drop of both blue curacao and vodka.

name: Ersh (Russian)
preparation: Pour the vodka over the beer.

name: Amer Biere
preparation: Pour amer picon and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill the mug with beer and stir.

name: Beer Top
preparation: Fill glass with Beer and top it off with some 7-up. You can add more or less 7-up to suit your taste. If you make it 50/50 it is known as a Shandy. Great on a hot Summer day or the night after a lot of drinking.

name: Creme de Spooge
preparation: Mix half a beer with half of a cream soda.

name: Jagerbeer Bomb
preparation: Pour the beer into a glass then drop the shot of jagermeister into it (shot glass optional)

name: Red Corona
preparation: Drink your Corona a little bit past the neck. Add 1 Shot Vodka 1 Tablespoon of Grenadine 1 Slice of Lime Put your thumb over the top flip(not shake) once to mix enjoy.

name: Clam Eye
preparation: Shake Clamato (keep at room temperature). Pour Clamato into Pilsner glass or oversized beer mug. Pour beer generously down the inside of the glass until full. Be careful of foaming head. Add celery salt tabasco sauce and/or worchestershire sauce for flavouring.

name: Mexican Hillbilly
preparation: Pour a mug of corona and drop in a shot of jack daniels.

name: Flaming D
preparation: Pour amaretto and whiskey in a shot glass. Top with everclear. Light shot on fire and drop into glass of beer.

name: Headhunter
preparation: Mix liquors (except beer) in a tall tumbler. Stir in the juices and shake with ice. Slowly add the beer and stir to blend. Serve in a tall glass or a 1/2 coconut shell with the meat intact.

name: Michelada Regular
preparation: Add lemon juice to 4 ice cubes in a beer mug. Add salt and stir to blend. Add tequila and again stir to blend. Fill with corona and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #3
preparation: Fill a shot glass with amaretto and gin. Drop shot glass into half a glass of beer. Then slam. It tastes just like Dr. Pepper.

name: Buccaneer
preparation: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently.

name: Solaris
preparation: Measure the parts so the glass is 2/3 full. The sugar teaspoonfull should be skimmed and stirred a little.

name: 20/20 Lemon
preparation: Pour MD 20/20 (try any flavor) into a cup. Add Bacardi limon rum and serve.

name: Bubble Bomb
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: FDU Spanish
preparation: Pour Hpnotiq into a shot glass. Add an equal amount of Bacardi Limon rum stir and serve.

name: Fainting Goat
preparation: Combine all of the rums into a tumbler with ice. Add enough cranberry to turn the drink a light red color. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass. Shoot.

name: Dreamsicle Jello Shots
preparation: Mix hot water and jello. Add liqueur. Pour into 2 ounce glasses or cups. Serve after the jello has set.

name: Joel's Pet Monkey
preparation: Mix in a shot glass in order above.

name: Jamaican Cabdriver
preparation: Put ice into a glass. Add orange juice and coconut rum. Lastly add cranberry juice to taste and stir well.

name: Malibu Peach
preparation: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Add orange juice stir and serve.

name: Rococo
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Adrenaline Rush
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall glass stir and serve.

name: O Thing
preparation: Pour the can of Amp energy drink into a tall glass. Add the Bacardi O rum (more or less acccording to taste) and serve.

name: Pierced Navel
preparation: Shake with ice and enjoy.

name: Orange Soda
preparation: Pour Bacardi O over ice in a highball glass. Add cranberry juice and top off with soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the glass and serve.

name: Frozen O
preparation: Combine Kool-Aid orange mix sugar and Bacardi O orange rum in a blender with ice. Blend until smooth and frosty pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Pervert
preparation: Shake everything with ice and pour into collins glasses.

name: O & Cranberry
preparation: Stir together in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Chicago View
preparation: Shake with ice and serve over ice.

name: O & Tonic
preparation: Serve in a tall glass with ice.

name: Schwartzy
preparation: Serve in a tall glass.

name: Bacardi Remix
preparation: Pour a glass of sprite remix into a large highball glass or any other good useful cup then add Bacardi O. Stir add a twist or piece of orange for flavor and serve.

name: Kick In The Glass
preparation: Pour the Bacardi O in a large glass add a splash of cranberry juice then fill with orange juice. To top it off add a generous scoop of vanilla ice cream. Let the ice cream melt a little bit and enjoy.

name: Asian Sensation
preparation: Pour all the alcohol and fill the rest of the glass with equal amounts of pineapple juice orange juice and sprite with grenadine to taste and color and then add ice.

name: Super Slice
preparation: Pour Bacardi O into a highball glass. Fill with Orange Slice and serve.

name: Stardust
preparation: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.

name: Iced Pineapple Sunrise
preparation: Add the ice to a hurricane glass. Pour the other ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into the hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple. Serve.

name: Citron My Face
preparation: Mix over ice and strain.

name: Malibu Thong Bikini
preparation: Combine the Malibu coconut rum and Absolut Citron vodka with the pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glasses. Serve with whipped cream and a cherry on the very top of each shot.

name: Getaway Car
preparation: Mix in a shot glass.

name: Jogeir
preparation: Mix lime vodka absolut citron and juice together and put it in a shot glass. Add galliano right before serving. Shoot it.

name: Jen's Red
preparation: Pour vodka and triple sec simultaneously. Add sour mix grenadine and sprite. Shake and serve in a shot glass.

name: Surrey Slider
preparation: Pour rum peach schnapps and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Orange Fizz
preparation: Add the gin lemon juice triple sec simple syrup and orange bitters to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a sour glass. Fill with soda and top with orange juice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Tropical Hooter
preparation: Mix and pour into shotglass.

name: Crapton
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Percival's Sister
preparation: Mix thoroughly in a collins glass without ice and serve.

name: Passionate Sunset
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Breda Blackout
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Santa Monica Pier
preparation: In a tall glass with ice pour the Alize and Triple Sec stir and enjoy.

name: Lani
preparation: Pour passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water stir and serve.

name: Bot Cocktail
preparation: The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. However the really slick way is much more impressive: Add cranberry juice lime juice triple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

name: Turk's Blood
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Mike's Cosmopolitan
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Mass Confusion
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass or old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Agent Orange #3
preparation: Stir in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Hateraid
preparation: Pour Absolut Mandrin and Absolut Citron over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add sweet and sour mix and a packet of Sweet 'n Low artificial sweetener. Shake and pour into shot glasses.

name: Letter Bomb #2
preparation: Pour the Red Bull into an old fashioned glass. Pour Amaretto into a shot glass. Add shot glass to old fashioned glass and drink immediately.

name: Vodka Passion
preparation: Mix both liquids over ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Cherry Bomb #2
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add the vodka. Fill with unsweetened cherry juice.

name: Sabra
preparation: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

name: Absolutly Screwed
preparation: Mix OJ and Mandrin then enjoy.

name: Small Bomb #2
preparation: Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto add shots of melon add shots of everclear add rest of glass with pineapple juice stir then pour into glass with ice.

name: Bitter Experience
preparation: Add to a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Serve with short straws.

name: YIP!
preparation: Fill glass with Tequila then club soda then squeze a slice of lemon toss in and add one ice cube stir drink enjoy.

name: Beergarita
preparation: Mix all ingredients except the lager in a blender with ice. Pour into a large pilsner/pint glass then add the Corona (which should be chilled) over the top. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Cabo Wabo
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo gold tequila Grand Marnier sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour into a margarita glass and add the lime juice.

name: Mexican Sexy Lemonade
preparation: Pour jose cuervo triple sec and 7-up into a large ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour and add sugar. Drop in a slice of lemon stir well and serve.

name: Bloody Matador
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until slushy. Strain into a cocktail glass or two and serve.

name: Marcelita
preparation: Assemble all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled margarita glass with a blend of salt and sugar (colored salt optional) on the rim of the glass. Garnish with fresh cranberries and lemon peel and serve.

name: Matador Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until slushy adding more ice if required. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gayley Avenue Margarita
preparation: In a blender pour in ice first then the sweet and sour mix followed by the strawberry margarita mix followed by the tequila and triple sec. Blend until you have a nice mix pour into chilled glass or mug top with the cherry.

name: Maria Theresa
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a glass over ice.

name: Green Apple Bomb
preparation: Pour the Absolut Mandrin and peach schnapps over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add Jones green apple soda to taste and serve.

name: Gin Flurrie
preparation: Blend Tanqueray Gin Rose's Lime Juice and 15 ice cubes until it is slurry and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Purple Nurple #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Void Water
preparation: Put ice in bottom of cup. Pour the triple sec rum and blue curacao over the ice Fill rest of the way with sprite or 7up

name: Purple Midnight
preparation: In a highball glass with ice pour tequila then blue curaco... it shoudl look kinda like windex at this point. Add the juice and you're good to go. If all amounts are done properly the drink should be a dark purple with a small blue ring at the bottom. Suggest garnishing with lemon.

name: Frozen Orange Dream
preparation: In blender place about 8 ice cubes 2 oz. Grand Marnierand about 1/4 cup vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add a drop or two of orange food coloring for stronger color. Pour into a Hurricane glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Simpson Bronco
preparation: Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain.

name: Black Haus Orange Coffee
preparation: Combine Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Smirnoff orange twist vodka in a glass mug. Top with hot coffee and whipped cream and serve.

name: Brandy Benedictine Cream
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Coffee Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a small wine or port glass. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Kiev Sundae
preparation: Blend the Stoli cinnamon vodka white creme de cacao Bailey's irish cream and ice cream with cracked ice in a blender for about 10 seconds until texture is thick and smooth. Pour into a large chilled wine goblet and float Stoli raspberry vodka on top. Add a dollop of whipped cream and serve with a teaspoon.

name: Wicked Tasty Treat
preparation: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass in amaretto and then into powdered sugar. Shake all alcohol and cream with ice and strain into the rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and whipped cream (optional)

name: Nermish
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sloppy Grumper
preparation: Pour jagermeister and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum into a wine goblet. Add orange juice more if desired and shoot.

name: Parrot Perch
preparation: Pour liquor juice and syrup into a blender. Add a sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Fruit Smoothie
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend at low speed. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with raspberries and serve.

name: Cast Away
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add juices add crushed ice until full and serve.

name: Paradise Cola
preparation: Put ice into the bottom of any 20-oz. glass. Mix in the creme de cacao the Parrot Bay and the creme de banana. Fill with a can of Pepsi or whichever cola suits you. Stir thoroughly and enjoy!

name: Puckered Parrot
preparation: Fill tall glass with ice add Parrot Bay and Sour Apple Pucker. Fill rest with Mountain Dew. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Erika's Sweet Dream
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice; add triple sec and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum. Add all juices. Place stir stick straw and slice of favorite fruit (slice of pineapple slice of orange) on rim of glass and serve.

name: Strawberry Tropicolada
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a pina colada glass and serve.

name: Pissing Parrot
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum and cranberry schnapps over ice in a beer pilsner. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Ship's Doctor
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice. Garnish with a thermometer.

name: Perfect Parrot
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Down to Earth
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Captain's Orange
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay over ice in a highball glass and add in the pineapple orange juice. Stir and serve.

name: Easy Creamsicle
preparation: Shake ingredients with crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain or pour completely into a highball glass and serve.

name: Island Doctor
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum and Dr. Pepper together over ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Captain Heron
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan Parrot Bay into a highball glass until half-full. Fill the other half with Blue Heron Wine (Michigan). Add a squirt of lime and serve.

name: Trogg's Nog
preparation: Pour liquor over ice fill with eggnog and stir.

name: Winter Breeze
preparation: Pour liquors into a beer mug and fill with milk. Stir and serve.

name: Mozart Mint
preparation: Serve on the rocks in a tall glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Mozart Milkshake
preparation: Shake or blend ingredients and pour into a tall glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate add a straw and serve.

name: Lick out a Sheep
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass. Pour over finely shaven or crushed ice in a champagne flute or equivalent. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Jeremiah
preparation: Mix all ingredients except milk in a mixing glass. Add ice then fill the glass with milk. Shake vigorously pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Banana Cream
preparation: Shake the creme de cacao banana liqueur Bailey's irish cream and milk together in a cocktail shaker. Take a cocktail glass and swirl chocolate syrup in the glass and add ice. Pour the mixture from the cocktail shaker into the glass top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Mistletoe
preparation: Combine creme de almond white creme de cacao swiss mocha cream and grenadine in an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with half-and-half and top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Hot Anal Sex
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Mozart Esprit
preparation: Pour sprite over three or four ice cubes in a highball glass. Add black mozart chocolate liqueur and garnish with a slice of lemon. Add a straw and serve.

name: Mocha Flip
preparation: Shake well and strain into a wine glass three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Godiva Cream
preparation: Pour the Godiva liqueur over ice in a wine glass. Add Bailey's and the vanilla extract. Top with the cream mix and serve.

name: Fifth Avenue
preparation: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

name: Mozart 142
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass half-filled with ice and serve.

name: Mozart Cola
preparation: Pour liquids into a hurricane glass and add a scoop of ice cream on top. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings add straws and serve.

name: Caramel Nut
preparation: Combine creme de cacao caramel liqueur and vanilla ice-cream in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute garnish with whipped cream and chopped nuts and serve.

name: Honey Nuts
preparation: Shake the advocaat Kahlua coffee liqueur Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and honey in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with strawberries and/or cocoa and serve.

name: Dracona
preparation: Pour Adocaat and orange fruit juice straight into the glass there will be a little curdling but dont worry. Add the ice cubes into the glass then Sambuca  slide creme de menthe down the side. A yellow green yellow formation should occur then add lemonade.

name: Fluffy Duck
preparation: Pour the creme de cacao into a chilled margarita glass one-quarter filled with crushed ice. Add the advocaat and slowly fill with 7-up or soda. Stir and serve.

name: Snowball #2
preparation: Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.

name: Cherry Blossom #2
preparation: Moisten rim of a cocktail glass with cherry brandy and rub rim in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into the sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Blossom
preparation: Garnish with a cherry on the rim of the glass.

name: Magnolia Blossom
preparation: Pour the gin cream and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Apple Blossom
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass almost-filled with ice. Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Granny Apple Blossom
preparation: Mix apple schnapps gold tequila and daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to the top with 7-up.

name: Orange Blossom
preparation: Combine the gin orange juice and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Peach Blossom Martini
preparation: Pour the Stoli peach vodka (Persik) Dubonnet Rouge and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach and serve.

name: Multiple Orgasm #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a blender with crushed ice and mix until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and top with a cherry. Tastes like a chocolate shake but with a kick.

name: Bleeding Orgasm #2
preparation: Firstly it is reccomended that you hold a shot (1-oz) of absinthe in your mouth for around 30 seconds then swallow. After the shot of absinthe drink the concoction through a straw (serve at room temperature strictly neither too warm nor too cold). Follow up with a double shot (2-oz) of sambuca for that sweet aftertaste. Finally relax + watch the room go funny.

name: Jaffa
preparation: Shake ingredients together and pour.

name: Blood Clot #2
preparation: Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy throw the shot back place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!

name: Bang em' Back
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a shot glass. Make several. Then Bang em' Back.

name: Hakkespett
preparation: Layer cointreau and chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it. Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside shoot the entire contents put two fingers in your mouth inhale sharply and deeply and then try to say: Hakkespett! (In English: Woodpecker!) Good luck!

name: Orange Protestant Jell-O
preparation: Follow instructions on box but substitute in Triple Sec for half of your water.

name: Painting Pink
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Butter Cookie
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Blue Richie
preparation: Stir the vanilla vodka blueberry juice and apple juice together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 2 - 3 fresh blueberries.

name: Allen Oakdale
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nilla Wafer
preparation: Layer over ice in the following order: vodka vanilla liqueur caramel liqueur. Fill slowly with ginger ale.

name: Rampant Rabbit
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with two pineapple leaves placed down the side of the glass so that they look like rabbit's ears.

name: Green Ranger
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Twisted Sunset
preparation: Measure vodka and rum and pour into highball glass over ice. Fill to top with Orange Juice. Stir to mix. Add splash of grenadine to glass so that it sinks to bottom and slowly mixes and rises to top of glass to give that sunset effect.

name: Vanilla Pig
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass. Add ice if desired and serve.

name: Strap-O-Nilla Juice
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass and shake well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Ivan's Holiday
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff vanilla vodka Smirnoff green apple vodka Monin cinnamon syrup and apple juice into a highball glass filled up with ice. Put a shaker on the glass and shake it well. Squeeze a wedge of lime in it and serve.

name: Jason Voorhies
preparation: Layer whipped cream first then the vodka then the root beer. When done layering try and center the club soda into the root beer without upsetting the liquors.

name: The Black Death
preparation: Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!

name: Liquid Valium
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice pour liquors and fill with equal parts orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with an orange and cherry garnish.

name: Fruity Vodka Beverage
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.

name: Hulk
preparation: Pour the Hpnotiq liqueur and Hennessy cognac into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-UP stir well and serve.

name: Hypnocrite
preparation: Pour the Hpnotiq into an 8-oz highball glass. Fill the rest with Sprite and serve.

name: Russian Rose
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rye Club Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour over shaved ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Cocopolitan
preparation: Combine in a shaker all the ingredients and shake. Chill a cocktail glass pour and serve with a twist of lime.

name: Death by Chocolate
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Death by Shot
preparation: Pour white tequila into a shot glass and lay drops of Tabasco sauce on top. Do not mix and allow the Tabasco sauce to settle. For decoration place red pepper in glass. Eat the pepper as quickly as possible immediately followed by shot.

name: Buttertini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Edible Panties
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass. Stir and serve with or without straw.

name: Slippery Virgin
preparation: Pour into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled steemed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Slippery Tasty Bald Beaver
preparation: Pour equal parts into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold. Pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Siberian Slider
preparation: Mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

name: Cappucini
preparation: Make the espresso and place in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur and Bailey's irish cream. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Cum in a Blender
preparation: Pour the milk into a blender with some crushed ice. Add the white chocolate liqueur Kahlua coffee liqueur whiskey Pepsi and banana. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass and serve.

name: Stuffy in a Suit
preparation: Combine the vodka Lillet Cointreau orange bitters and egg white in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Bartender In A Cup
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

name: Apple Pie In A Glass
preparation: Mix in blender pour into 2 glasses and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Christmas in a Glass
preparation: Add the midori and Galliano to the glass then fill most of the way up with lemonade. Stir. Add the splash of Grenadine and serve with the red and green in layers.

name: Christmas in a Cup
preparation: Add Dr. Pepper and spiced rum stir then put Aftershock in and let it mix by itself.

name: Nutz in a Blender
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Amaretto Chi-City
preparation: Mix Amaretto di Saronno in equal parts with E&J or if u choose a bit more E&J. Mix to your taste with sweet and sour mix in a shaker. Add ice and shake well. Pour into your favorite glass and watch for the hook - its real slow and tasty.

name: Christmas in a Cup
preparation: Add Dr. Pepper and spiced rum stir then put Aftershock in and let it mix by itself.

name: Grand-Ma In A Wheelchair
preparation: Add ice. Shake it. Strain it. Shoot it.

name: Sugar 'n Sinz
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a straw and serve.

name: Dark and Veiny
preparation: Layer in order; butterscotch first irish cream jagermeister vodka into a shot glass and serve.

name: Skip And Go Naked #2
preparation: Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.

name: Apple and Cinnamon Joy
preparation: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Dribble Goldschlager into schnapps. Stir twice.

name: Cinnamon Toast
preparation: Rim an irish coffee cup or glass with sugar and cinnamon. Add hot cider and rum and serve.

name: Captain Crunch
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice shake and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Crispy Crunch
preparation: Shake ingredients together strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Cinnamon Rose
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Deez Nutz #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake. Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Screaming Slippery Bald Beaver
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until ice cold. Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with ice and serve.

name: Nutty Ginger
preparation: Add the amaretto and frangelico to a cocktail glass. Fill with ginger ale and add ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Italian Stallion
preparation: Place the ingredients in the order above into a shot glass and shoot.

name: Candy Apple #2
preparation: Pour Amaretto and Butterscotch in a glass with ice. Fill with apple juice.

name: Insult Man Shooter
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Grumpier Old Man
preparation: Pack a rocks or old-fashioned glass with ice. Add old grand dad bourbon (high proof bourbon similar to wild turkey) lime juice and top with sour mix. Serve with a sip stick no garnish.

name: Pac Man
preparation: Add grenadine lemon juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale and slide an orange slice down the side of the glass.

name: Man Boobs
