preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Man Overboard
preparation: Dissolve sugar shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Elephant Man
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey tequila and Bacardi 151 rum into a shot glass in that order. Ignite the 151 rum (use extreme caution) add a straw and shoot.

name: Screaming Orgasm #3
preparation: Pour ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: A Tropical Dream
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) together over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Float grenadine on top and serve.

name: Machetazo
preparation: Poor the Guinness into a large beer mug. Drop two shot glasses filled with kahlua and rum respectively into the guinness and down in one fell swoop.

name: African Breeze
preparation: Cover rim of glass with brown sugar. Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour cointreau over ice followed by amarula cream. Add garnish.

name: Blue Lesbian
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with blue Fruitopia fruit juice stir and add a dash of blue curacao. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve with a swizzler stick.

name: Fruity Pebble #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Shark's Bite
preparation: Mix together the Southern Comfort and the Cranberry Juice and stir. then add the Lime Juice (be careful not to get too much lime). Serve cold! You can substitute lemon juice for the lime juice if needed.

name: Drambuie Espresso Martini
preparation: Combine all three ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Espresso-tini
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake it up and serve in frozen martini or cocktail glasses. Line the rim with cinnamon and cocoa. Throw in a coffee bean for good luck and serve.

name: Impatient Virgin
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Mozartus
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of star-fruit.

name: Apricot Sour
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Barnum
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Brandied Apricot
preparation: Pour the brandy apricot brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh apricot and serve.

name: Alize Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Kool First Aid
preparation: Add kool aid to a double shot glass and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

name: Count Currey
preparation: Pour gin and sugar together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a champagne flute. Fill with champagne and serve.

name: GSM
preparation: Stir it all together and serve.

name: Venom
preparation: Pour gin into a malt shaker or similar. Stir in the cocoa and sugar mix together and shake. Pour into a champagne flute glass and serve.

name: First Avenue
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: First 99 Problems
preparation: Fill glass halfway with ice pour Grand Marnier both rums and pineapple juice. Add sweetened lime juice a few drops of grenadine stir and top it off with a lemon slice.

name: Red Gin
preparation: Combine the gin and cherry heering in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Carl Josef
preparation: Stir kirschwasser and cherry liqueur together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Frooty Biznitch
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry and serve.

name: Nikki Delight
preparation: Pour ingredients over 4 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass and stir briefly.

name: Eat My Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive and serve.

name: Johnny's Love Juice
preparation: Pour the vodka rum gin triple sec cranberry juice orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Float the amaretto on top. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Creamsicle Jr.
preparation: Put vodka in shot glass. Next add orange juice. Top with whipped cream and shoot.

name: Crispy Creme
preparation: Place ice in the glass till the glass is almost full. Pour the Caramel Vodka on top of the ice then pour the ginger ale to finish.

name: Grape Soda
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice then build the drink starting with the blue curacao. After you pour the cranberry juice you'll want to give it a good shake and then fill with a splash of soda.

name: Cream Soda
preparation: Pour the Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

name: Creme Dream
preparation: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Brandy and Soda
preparation: Pour the brandy and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Almond Joy Dark
preparation: Pour liquors over ice. Fill with pineapple. Add grenadine to color. Shake. Garnish with pineapple flag.

name: Tuve Nightmare
preparation: Mix the Vodka with the wine. Drop the fruit from a height of at least 3 feet. Pour the sprite and the Ginger Ale with the rest. Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon into the punch. Enjoy!

name: Dark Side of the Force
preparation: Empty the 4 cans of frozen lemonade into a large container and pour in the Everclear beer and Red Bull. Mix until all the lemonade has dissolved. Add blackcurrent syrup to taste (this will turn the mixture a dark purple colour). Serve on ice or chilled.

name: Dark Blood
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Bald Taco
preparation: Combine in a cocktail glass.

name: Jim the Destroyer
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Bayou Backwater
preparation: Pour southern comfort and lemonade into a 12 oz glass. Stir. Add ice if desired.

name: Naval Destroyer
preparation: Thaw limeade concentrate and put in pitcher. Pour Bacardi rum into the empty limeade can until full then transfer to pitcher. Add 3 beers to pitcher and serve over ice in glasses.

name: Buttermint
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Fozen Leprechaun
preparation: Put 3 cups ice in blender. Add mint chocolate baileys creme de menthe and vanilla vodka. Blend ingedients for 15 seconds. Pour in hurricane glass. Garnish rim of glass with Peppermint Patti.

name: Dark Side
preparation: Combine the coconut liqueur and Bacardi white rum in a shot glass stirring to mix. Add just enough syrup to dissolve in it. The syrup should make the drink creamy but liquid enough to go down smoothly.

name: Back Row Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients in above order into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Aragorn
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Loch Ness Demon
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Fruit Fusion
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur peach schnapps Smirnoff vodka Bacardi rum Gordon's dry gin and Malibu rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake well. Strain into a collinsl glass 1/4 filled with crushed ice. Add a dash of cranberry juice garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Panama City Gin 'n' Juice
preparation: Fill a collins glass 3/4 full with ice. Slowly add the lime juice  then bulid with gin. Slowly fill with 7-Up leaving green and clear layers intact until just before drinking. Garnish with a twist of lime on a bamboo skewer and serve.

name: Thal On The Rocks
preparation: Take a highball glass put in 3 to 4 ice cubes add 1 cl of creme de cassis (not cooled) then 4 cl of preferably Absolut Vodka along with 2 cl of Gordon's Dry. Fill in the glass with equal parts of bitter lemon and tonic water pour and squeeze in one fourth of a lime. Garnish with a pair of cherrys one in one outside the glass.

name: Nicky's Dry Jello
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Stir garnish with 2 slices of lemon and serve.

name: Hate
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a shaker and strain into a 12 oz highball glass. Serve.

name: Rheingold
preparation: Stir together in a mixing glass. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Status Quo
preparation: Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!

name: Early Morning Sulk
preparation: Place 3 ice-cubes in a highball glass. Add gin peach schnapps and vodka. Top-up the glass with Coca-cola and stir ingredients slowly together with a swizzle stick. Garnish with a slice of orange. Add a straw and serve.

name: Eating Ass
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Liquid Asphault
preparation: Layer jagermeister on top of sambuca and serve in a shot glass.

name: Tie Dye
preparation: Pour sambuca into a shot glass. Drop tequila rose into the center of the glass and serve.

name: Schwimmer
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in mixer chill then serve in shot glass.

name: Purple Haze
preparation: Pour Sambucca into a shot glass then pour Chambord very slowly.

name: Rick
preparation: Pour sambuca into a shot glass and slowly add orange juice. Serve.

name: Migraine
preparation: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Brainteaser
preparation: Layered Erin Cream first then sambuca and then advocaat (should sit in middle of other two). To drink: use a straw to suck up advocaat then shoot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

name: Banana Punch #2
preparation: Boil water and sugar for 5 minutes. Cool and add the remaining ingredients except ginger ale. Freeze. Remove from freezer 2 to 3 hours before serving. Mix with ginger ale. Float assorted fruit in punch bowl. Vodka could also be added.

name: Banana Split #2
preparation: Combine the 99 Bananas banana schnapps Kahlua coffee liqueur and Godiva chocolate liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Shake well and pour into a shot glass. Drop a cherry into the glass consume the liquid and eat the cherry.

name: Flaming B-52
preparation: First pour the coffee liqueur into the shot glass; next slowly pour in the Irish cream over the back of a spoon and allow it to settle on top of the coffee liqueur; finally (again slowly) pour the Grand Marnier over the back of a spoon into the glass. Add the dash of 151 light it with a match and while the shot is still flaming quickly place a straw to the bottom of the glass and drink quickly.

name: The King Of Denmark
preparation: Mix the two things together and serve. It is possible but not necessary to set the drink on fire as it is usually done with sambuca. In any case don't add any ice.

name: Touch of Zam
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Add a slice of orange and serve.

name: Black Licorice
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Samson Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Opal Nera black sambuca blackberry brandy amaretto and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Karma Killer
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec and peach brandy into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the fruit juices stir well and serve.

name: Liquid Nitrogen
preparation: Pour sambuca and ouzo over four ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir if desired and serve.

name: Mint-Chip Backdraft
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass in above order. Allow to settle a bit; the cream liqueur will rise slightly in the glass. Shoot when ready.

name: BearCat Special
preparation: Put both in shot glass mix and down.

name: Santa Shot
preparation: Taste like a candycane layer these in the order listed to get a red green and white(clear) shot.

name: Half Breed
preparation: Float the Stroh rum on top of peppermint liqueur in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Vulcan Mind-Probe
preparation: Mix and serve straight up in a shot glass.

name: Leatherneck
preparation: Pour 1/4 to one inch tabasco sauce into a shot glass. Pour rum over the top and shoot.

name: Taiwan Duck Fart
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: T-52
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Maple Leaf
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky Irish Mist creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Plead The 5th
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice cubes in a shot glass. Shake strain and serve.

name: Mariachi
preparation: Build all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass and serve with a chilli pepper or jalapeno pepper wedged onto the rim of the glass.

name: Hot Young Lady
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker no ice. Shake well and pour into collins glasses.

name: Hot Scott
preparation: Pour together to ensure a good mix.

name: Peppermint Hot Chocolate
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps into an Irish coffee cup/mug add the hot chocolate and stir. Top with whipped cream garnish with some peppermint candy and serve.

name: Hot Chocolate Almond
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps amaretto and hot chocolate into a coffee mug and stir. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
preparation: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture stirring it with a whisk and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes stirring often until it is thick glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate
preparation: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.

name: Hairy Muff
preparation: Stir all ingredients together with crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Kickstand
preparation: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a highball glass and layer kahlua and irish cream.

name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter
preparation: Pour kahlua and irish cream into a heatproof cup with hot chocolate. Add amaretto to taste. Stir and serve.

name: Muff Rider
preparation: Pour the sake white rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with lemon soda and serve.

name: Buried Treasure
preparation: Pour the amaretto kahlua coffee liqueur and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream and serve.

name: Deep-Sea Diver
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Hot Pussy #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Shocking Chocolate
preparation: Heat the hot chocolate and add the cinnamon schnapps.

name: Straight Jacket
preparation: Add Aftershock then Passoa. Fill with orange juice and ice to taste.

name: Hardcore Gatorade
preparation: Mix together the Gatorade Fierce with Aftershock red cinnamon liqueur in a 12 or 16 ounce cup. Serve.

name: Dog Biscuit
preparation: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper #3
preparation: Pour the Devil Springs vodka into a shot glass and seperately pour the Coca-Cola into an old-fashioned glass. Ignite the vodka in the shot glass and drop the glass into the old-fashioned glass of Coca-Cola. Down it all.

name: Bloody Virgin
preparation: Fill cup with Dr. Pepper first and then slowly pour the Fire Water; then pour the Gordons Vodka to make your drink have a different taste. Tastes wonderful!

name: KoolShock
preparation: Place a few ice cubes into the glass add the aftershock then the kool-aid. Stir to mix. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Hot Southern Night
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add firewater and Southern Comfort fill with cola and serve.

name: Bubbly Butt Pirate
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice add 1 shot butterscotch and 1 shot Captain Morgan's fill with cola.

name: Spiced Cherry
preparation: Pour spiced rum into a glass fill with cherry coke and stir.

name: Skin and Bones
preparation: Pour rum into an old-fashioned glass and add coke (in the same fashion as a rum and coke). Add a squeeze of lime juice and serve.

name: Rampage
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled 3/4 with ice. Garnish with a cherry and a thin slice of lemon and serve.

name: Captain's Coffee
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum Kahlua coffee liqueur and herbal bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sienna
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall wine glass and serve.

name: Captain MyOrgan
preparation: Pour the rum into an old-fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola or add to taste and serve.

name: Captain Morgan's Steamy Applecolada Dream
preparation: Start with hot or steamed apple cider. Add equal parts apple pucker schnapps spiced rum and coconut rum(parrot bay). Stir.

name: Flaming Blue Jesus
preparation: Layer with 151 proof rum on top. Light on fire - burn for 5 seconds - blow it out and drink.

name: Captain My Organ
preparation: Pour the rums into a cocktail glass packed with ice. Fill with cola and garnish with lime. Serve.

name: Dewing the Captain
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over crushed ice. Add Mountain Dew.

name: Captains Pie
preparation: Pour the ginger ale and cranapple juice together into a glass. Add the rum and serve.

name: Captain Al
preparation: Pour the amaretto spiced rum cranberry juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes.

name: Selena Jo
preparation: Put the crushed ice in glass first then add the Captain Morgan then add the Amaretto then top off with Coke.

name: Benji
preparation: Stir everything together well.

name: Conquistador
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dew the Dancin Captain
preparation: Add rum to glass then fill with root beer and Mountain Dew.

name: Jolly Homo
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with four maraschino cherries and serve.

name: The Boiling Panther
preparation: Pour shots into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with dr. pepper or mountain dew mix and serve.

name: Fuka
preparation: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

name: Captain Crisp
preparation: Add the rums to a cocktail with 2 ice cubes and fill the glass with the Fresca and Juice Juice in equal parts and serve.

name: Old 7's
preparation: Stir ingredients together over crushed ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: American Beauty
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy vermouth creme de menthe orange juice and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully float the port on top.

name: Flaming Scab
preparation: Ignite a shot of 151 rum and place into a mug of beer. Serve.

name: Orgasm #8
preparation: Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Misty Loch
preparation: Pour the drambuie gin and bailey's irish cream into a shaker with ice. Shake strain into a brandy snifter and add two small dashes of kahlua.

name: Paintball
preparation: Pour in order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Mint Smooth
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip #2
preparation: Build over ice in a double old-fashioned glass.

name: Chilly Chocolate Mint
preparation: Pour the dark rum peppermint schnapps coconut cream chocolate syrup and heavy cream into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour as much of the mixture as you can into a hurricane glass leaving a little room at the top. Top with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Black Death Wish
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 20 seconds strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Jef's Juice
preparation: Stir together equal amounts of each of the ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cancun Current
preparation: Pour the 151 Mailbu and pineapple juice into a mixer full of ice shake and strain into a rocks glass. Tilt the rocks glass and pour the Chambord onto the glass. The Chambord will sink to the bottom giving you a golden top layer and a purple bottom layer. Serve.

name: Tiki Torch
preparation: Fill glass halfway with tang. Add vodka until you can begin to taste the vodka and serve to taste.

name: Lost Surfer
preparation: Fill shaker half full with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake well strain into shot glass.

name: Cotton Candy #4
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum and peach schnapps into a cocktail glass. Fill with pink lemonade or add to taste and serve.

name: Hot Pussy
preparation: Pour all amounts over ice in shaker shake then strain into shot glass!

name: Kon Tiki
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Cibola
preparation: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

name: Mistea
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a glass mug. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Mist Iced Tea
preparation: Add the Canadian Mist whisky and lemon juice to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the iced tea splash lemon-lime soda and serve.

name: Log Cabin
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with orange soda and serve.

name: Purgavie
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Canadian Car Bomb
preparation: Pour beer into a glass drop the shot of whiskey into the glass and chug.

name: Rubber Chicken
preparation: Pour rye whiskey into an ice-filled mason jar. Add equal parts of limeade and ginger ale and serve.

name: Spritsor
preparation: Add ice then whisky fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

name: Canada Drink
preparation: Pour the Kirschwasser Canadian whisky and lemon juice into a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Formula 420
preparation: Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in order listed. Stir lightly.

name: Dorado
preparation: Add Seagrams 7 whisky and grenadine syrup to a highball glass filled with ice. Almost fill the glass with orange juice leaving just enough room to add the pina colada mix. Stir and serve.

name: Foaming Pepsi
preparation: Fill a cup 3/4 of the way with Pepsi or Diet Pepsi. Add in the whiskey until it's about an inch from the top. Stir for 5 seconds. Add in 3-4 spoonfuls of milk. Stir until it starts getting foamy at the top. The foam should rise a bit.

name: Iced Velvet
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour black velvet canadian whisky over the top. Fill with iced tea. Stir with a straw.

name: Tiger Paw
preparation: Add vodka lemon juice ice and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

name: Comforting Tiger
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine the Brandy Southern Comfort and Vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: M&M
preparation: Serve straight up in a shot glass.

name: Strawberry and Coffee Cream Soda
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except soda) with half a glassful of crushed ice. Add the soda and garnish with a slice of banana between two halves of a strawberry. Add straws and serve.

name: Miss Money Penny
preparation: Shake all ingredients with lots of ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a frozen cocktail/martini glass. Flame orange zest onto the surface and use orange peel as garnish.

name: New York Flip
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Connoisseur's Treat
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Vanderbilt
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hennessy Martini
preparation: Pour Hennessy cognac into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add a squeeze of a lemon wedge and stir together. Strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Last Goodbye
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Beautiful
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Missile Stopper
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: French Orgasm
preparation: Pour the cognac into a brandy glass. Add irish cream and serve unstirred.

name: Hennessy and Apple
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Alhambra
preparation: Make the cocoa in an irish coffee cup and add the cognac.

name: Kama Sutra
preparation: Shake Well With Ice And Strain Into Chilled Martini Glass

name: G-Drink
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Hennessy Alexander
preparation: Combine the 3 liquids in a mixing glass over ice cubes Shake and strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a dash of nutmeg and serve.

name: Cigar Lover's Martini
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir to chill. Strain into a chilled martini glass garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Cocoa Chanel
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Cognac Zoom
preparation: Dissolve honey in water and allow to cool. Shake with cognac and cream and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Chandos Club
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: French Connection
preparation: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice stir and serve.

name: Alize Emerald
preparation: Combine both ingredients in equal parts in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frenchie
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

name: Alexandra #2
preparation: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Fraise de Champagne
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Crunk Juice
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cup or glass stir slightly and serve.

name: Is Paris Burning
preparation: Stirred not shaken. Rocks acceptable. Fresh raspberry optional.

name: Screaming Orgasm (San Francisco Style)
preparation: Combine and stir ingredients add ice and serve.

name: King of Krunk's Juice
preparation: Mix together and drink. A sweet but tasty drink.

name: Arago
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Cran-Henny
preparation: Pour hennessy cognac into an old fashioned glass with cranberry juice and ice. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Applicious Quencher
preparation: Mix ingredients together over ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour into a cocktail shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into the glass garnish with a lime and serve.

name: Island Breeze
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Ocean Breeze #2
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka then add the juices in equal parts. Float blue Curacao on top. Garnish it with an orange wheel on the glass and serve.

name: Flaming Giraffe
preparation: Pour kahlua first into a double shot glass. Add one ounce of butterscotch schnapps. Float 151 proof rum on top and set on fire. Blow out before drinking.

name: Lui Lui
preparation: Mix with ice. Strain into shot glass.

name: Lunch Bucket
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a pint glass and serve.

name: Dr. Pepper #4
preparation: Pour beer into beer stein add coke. In a shot glass mix the three other ingredients. Pour contents of shot glass into beer stein and chug it all down. Tastes just like a Dr. Pepper.

name: Cherry Vanilla Dr. Pepper
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Backdraft #2
preparation: Add the rum and amaretto to a wine glass and ignite the liquid. Cover the wine glass with the palm of your hand. Lift your hand off of the rim just a little on one side. Suck out the fumes without exhaling take the shot and then exhale.

name: Jai Ma Kali
preparation: Mix everything and say Jai Ma Kali.

name: Erik the Red
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Hennessy Apple and Red
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Beauty and the Beast
preparation: Pour jagermeister into a shot glass. Add tequila rose but do not shake or stir. Serve immediately.

name: Great Pumpkin Punch
preparation: Serve in a hollowed out pumpkin with floating pumpkin chunks.

name: Pumpkin Eater
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a blender and blend well. Serve in a house glass and garnish with a orange wedge and cherry.

name: Black Mexican
preparation: Chill ingredients.

name: Drummer Shot
preparation: Mix ingredients in shot glass and prepare to be tough.

name: HoneyBee
preparation: Mix ingredients pour into glass and enjoy.

name: Dirty Orgasm
preparation: Layer in order.

name: Freddy Kruger
preparation: Make it an ample size shot!

name: Ace Ventura
preparation: Take a large chilled cocktail glass and fill it 1/4 full with ice and top to 3/4 full with sprite. Add the vodka rum and tequila. Fill the glass with the flavored sambucas in layers. Garnish with an umbrella and serve with a bendable straw.

name: Bailey's Comet
preparation: Shake and Strain the Butterscotch Bailey's and Goldschlager into a cocktail glass. Float the Sambuca then sprinkle Cinnamon or Nutmeg into drink (Before you flame the drink). Just before presentation flame the drink. As the Sambuca burns the cinnamon will sparkle. A dazzling effect if the bartender or server is walking with the drink while it's burning (give the comet a tail).

name: Black Magic Cream
preparation: Layer ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Lumberjack
preparation: Pour into shot glass no particular order. Add small dash of hot sauce.

name: Go Girl!
preparation: Mix ingredients together on ice.

name: Peachy Grace
preparation: Combine the rum triple sec and 1/2 a peach (cut into quarters) in a blender. Blend and pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour mix and serve.

name: Skunk Teas
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large pitcher with ice. Stir and serve in tall glasses.

name: Surfer on Ecstasy
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Cancer
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Razzmatazz liqueur then the Everclear. Top off with both Kool-aid mixes; do not stir. Wait until Kool-Aid mixes to a black color. Serve.

name: Bangkok Monkeyshocker
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pleasant Surprise
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a tall shot glass and serve.

name: Pedialite
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Asthma Attack
preparation: Shake and serve.

name: Bring the Pain
preparation: Pour over ice into glass and feel the tasty pain.

name: Lover's Kiss #3
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Fairy From Hell
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Lover's Kiss
preparation: Pour the amaretto cherry brandy brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Gin by Me
preparation: Add all three ingredients to a cocktail shaker with some ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries and serve.

name: Fizzy Gimlet
preparation: Pour the Plymouth gin and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with Sprite garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Big Pine Puss
preparation: Make shot in mixing glass with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Red Beard
preparation: Mix on ice and serve.

name: Spiced Apple
preparation: In a shot glass pour in apple brandy first then Goldschlager then Captain Morgan's.

name: Kryptonite #3
preparation: Chill all four mixers in freezer until ice cold. Then mix them all in a small glass and stir with/without ice. Serve.

name: Hillinator
preparation: Mix the captain morgans mountain dew and sugar in one glass. Pour the fire water into a shot glass. Take the shot then follow it with the mixed drink. Make sure to drink the mixed drink quickly.

name: Choad Shot
preparation: Pour the Captian Morgan spiced rum into a shot glass. Slowly add pina colada mix let it settle to the bottom. Serve.

name: M&M's Shot
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Lake Bottom
preparation: Pour the Sake and the rum. Top off with the Baileys. Let Bailey's settle to the bottom.

name: Big Red
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Jennifer's Orgasm
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker over ice shake well and strain into shot glasses. Take an entire shot in one swallow.

name: Captain's Treasure
preparation: Pour ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Fuzzy Iron Worker
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a double-shot glass and serve.

name: Captain's Bomb
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Buttershots over the Captain Morgan spiced rum in a shot glass and serve.

name: Butt Pirate
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Jack Voigt
preparation: Put in any order into a shot glass preferably captain morgan's first.

name: Pink Lemonade #2
preparation: Add ice vodka sour mix cranberry and lime juice to a shaker. Shake and strain into a highball glass with a garnish of lemon.

name: Brandy Cooler
preparation: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Port Wine Sangaree
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the water and port in the bottom of a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice; add the soda. Float the brandy on top and garnish with a lemon twist. Dust with nutmeg then with cinnamon and serve.

name: Brandy Plush
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Dust with freshly grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Lil Naue
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a red wine glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Brandy Swizzle
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the lime juice sugar brandy and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: King's Peg
preparation: Pour the brandy and champagne into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Brandy Punch Cocktail
preparation: Add to a goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and some fruit.

name: Brandy Collins
preparation: Shake juice of lemon brandy and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Brandy Gump
preparation: Pour brandy lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brandy Fizz
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

name: Brandy Eggnog
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Lumumba
preparation: Stir ingredients together briefly in a highball glass and serve.

name: Brandy Sangaree
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top sprinkle lightly with nutmeg and serve.

name: Barqs & Brandy
preparation: Pour a good Brandy into large glass filled with cubed ice. Hold glass at slight angle while filling up glass with Barqs. Stir lightly. Test before squeezing small lemon slice. Best in Collins or HighBall glasses. Needs to be Barq's or another strong root beer (not A&W or Hensen's). Barq's is also one of few root beer's with caffeine giving you the perfect kick.

name: Brandy Fix
preparation: Combine juice of lemon powdered sugar and water in a highball glass. Stir fill with shaved ice and add brandy. Stir again add the lemon slice and serve with a straw.

name: American Rose
preparation: Shake ingredients (except champagne) and strain into a chilled white wine glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with a peach slice.

name: Old Fashioned Manhattan
preparation: Pour the whiskey sweet vermouth bitters and sugar into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir well. Top with club soda and stir again gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Piscola
preparation: Pour pisco over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with coca-cola or other soft drink stir and serve.

name: Georgia Mint Julep
preparation: Build in a collins glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Brandy Water Press
preparation: Pour the brandy over ice cubes in a collins glass and fill almost to the top with water. Top off with the tonic water and serve.

name: Devil In Miss Jones
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass with ice.

name: Charles Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: French 125
preparation: Pour brandy and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Discovery Bay
preparation: Add brandy Cointreau lemon sherbet and ginger ale to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale and serve.

name: Jamaica Granito
preparation: Pour the brandy and triple sec into a collins glass. Add the lemon sherbet. Fill with club soda dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Adrienne's Dream
preparation: Add everything except soda and mint to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into collins glass over ice and top with club soda. Serve with a mint sprig as garnish.

name: Champagne Cooler
preparation: Pour the brandy and triple sec into a large wine glass. Fill with champagne or simply add to taste. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Horse's Neck
preparation: Place the lemon peel spiral in a highball glass and drape one end of it over the rim of the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the brandy ginger ale and bitters into the glass. Stir well.

name: Marryat's Mint Julep
preparation: Add ingredients to a collins glass and fill with crushed ice. Mix gently rum rim with a piece of fresh pineapple and serve.

name: Machu Picchu
preparation: 1. Fill a 12-oz highball glass half way up with orange juice. Pour some grenadine syrup carefully... it should go straight to the bottom not mixing with the orange juice. 2. Gently place two ice cubes on the highball glass and then in a mixing glass mix the pisco with a mint liqueur. Pour the pisco/mint mixture very slowly over the ice cubes so that it floats without mixing with the orange and/or grenadine. 3. You should get a beautifull red-orange-green cocktail. When serving instruct your guests to drink it from a straw pulling it up as they drink in order to get the three different flavours.

name: Patsy Mix
preparation: Pour brandy into a glass over ice. Add babycham pear cider and serve.

name: New Old Fashioned
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes or cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and drop in a maraschino cherry before serving.

name: Chicago Cocktail
preparation: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon and dip in powdered sugar. Pour the brandy bitters and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Pour into the prepared glass and serve.

name: Kika
preparation: Shake ingredients together and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Creamsicle #3
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice give it a few good shakes and strain into a cocktail glass with a sugar rim. More potent than the original. Enjoy!

name: George's Jungle
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Full Moon Fever
preparation: Add the three rums and the midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Chili Marnier
preparation: Muddle (crush) the chili pepper lime wedges and sugar in a chilled old fashioned glass. Add Grand Marnier. Add ice cubes to just over the top of the liquid stir until sugar dissolves and serve. Can substitute 1 oz lime juice and plain sugar for the brown sugar.

name: Lion Tamer
preparation: Mix southern comfort and lime juice into a martini glass. Top off with a pinch of powdered sugar. Add a large ice cube. Serve.

name: Lachler
preparation: Pour into a whiskey sour glass in the order listed and serve.

name: Bubble Comfort
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort into a highball glass; add the orange soda and the root beer. Stir lightly. Add more Southern Comfort for strength if desired and serve.

name: Peachy Comfort
preparation: Pour southern comfort and peach schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch #2
preparation: Mix Kool-Aid juice lemonaid sugar and water. Add ice cubes and let cool. Add ginger ale before serving.

name: Champagne Punch #2
preparation: Mix sugar brandy and 5 bottles champagne in a punch bowl. Then stir in orange lemon and lime sliced thin into rounds pineapple chunks and ice. Stir until well mixed. To complete garnish with strawberries and pour a final bottle of champagne theatrically over the top.

name: Sauternes House Punch
preparation: Dissolve sugar in wine and combine all ingredients in a large jug with ample ice to cool. Add in-season fruit slices or pieces.

name: Apple Brandy Cooler
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a chilled collins glass. Float the dark rum on top. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Passion Punch #2
preparation: Add all ingredients (except grenadine) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour a small amount of grenadine into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Pour the contents of the shaker into the glass. Garnish with a cherry or orange slice and serve.

name: Down Home Punch #2
preparation: Combine ingredients. Serve with ice.

name: Alabama
preparation: Put everything into shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Black Flag
preparation: Dissolve honey and molasses in a mixing glass with the boiling water. Stir until they are well dissolved then add rum and some crushed ice and stir again. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Fuck in the Graveyard
preparation: Shake well serve cold.

name: Christmas In The Tropics
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay coconut rum into a cup then pour in the eggnog after. Stir it around a bit to mix it together and serve.

name: Death in the Afternoon
preparation: Pour the pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.

name: Diamond Head
preparation: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ball Or Head
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Great Head
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Melonoma
preparation: Shake ice vodka and melon liqueur. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Doyles' Deliberation
preparation: Pour vodka and melon liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Get Laid
preparation: Mix raspberry liqueur vodka and pineapple juice in the mixer shake strain pour into glass then add splash of cranberry juice.

name: The Other Half
preparation: Carefully layer the triple sec amaretto and rum into a shot glass. Turn off the lights ignite the rum (use caution) to warm rim of glass and carefully blow out the flame. Serve immediately.

name: Venus on the Rocks
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass with five ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Jesus is Here
preparation: Pour the vodka and then the russian. Stir gently. Drink.

name: Bloody Shame
preparation: Pour V8 into an old-fashioned glass add tabasco sauce and stir with a celery stalk. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Hypnotiq Slice
preparation: Stir or shake ingredients together with ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: M16
preparation: Mix the Malibu and Hynotiq. Add just enough Bacardi 151 to light. Blow or stamp out with your hand and shoot.

name: Spanish Melonball
preparation: Shake midori malibu and pineapple juice and strain into a highball glass. Add orange juice.

name: Japanese Sex Slick Style
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum and Midori melon liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice and serve.

name: 80's Wine Cooler
preparation: First mix lemon lime grapefruit and pineapple juice together in a mixing glass. Pour the Chablis white wine into a tall wine glass and top with 7-Up. Add the juice mixture and serve.

name: Fruit Milkshake
preparation: Pour the orange juice grapefruit juice milk sugar and vanilla extract into a blender with 2 oz of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a highball glass add a straw and serve.

name: Black Haus Icicle
preparation: Pour the Black Haus blackberry schnapps into a shot glass. Add Smirnoff vodka followed by Cointreau and serve.

name: Peach Up #2
preparation: In a high ball glass mix the Absolut Apeach vodka  Sprite or 7 up and add a splash of cranberry juice.

name: Orange Peach Plus
preparation: Pour the Absolut peach vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Island Fruit 7-Up and a splash of Canada Dry ginger ale. Stir and serve.

name: Kristini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into martini glass.

name: Pea Soup
preparation: Pour the Absolut Apeach into a highball glass with the mango juice and Midori. Stir well and serve.

name: KY Special
preparation: Fill the glass two-thirds with ice. Pour orange juice and Sprite over ice then peach vodka. Add 2-3 drops of purple food coloring. Stir and serve.

name: Fizzy Peach
preparation: Put some ice into a glass. Add vodka fill with tonic water.

name: Golden Tang
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Cayman Climax
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur Malibu coconut rum and pineapple juice into a collins glass. Top with grenadine little enough not to be able to taste it distinctly. Stir slightly.

name: Rock and Rye Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cider and Orange Cooler
preparation: Fill tall glasses half full of hard cider and add a large scoop of orange ice. Serve at once. Variations. Substitute lemon pineapple or any kind of fruit ice for orange ice

name: Damiana Golden
preparation: Shake or stir. Enjoy.

name: Dumpster Juice
preparation: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Jones Juice
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice to the top. Nearly fill with vodka of your choice. Top off with under a shot of mountain dew for flavor. Serve.

name: Goat Herder
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add a cherry and serve.

name: Safari Juice
preparation: Pour cointreau and midori melon liqueur into a mixing glass and add orange juice. Stir rapidly three to four times and pour into a cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time. Garnish with tropical fruits and serve.

name: Orange Crisis
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice and pour into shot glasses.

name: MLK
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Breathalizer
preparation: Mix together and serve.

name: Eady Rider
preparation: Blend the rum and ice cream together in a shot glass or mixing glass and serve.

name: Jump Shot
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into four seperate one-ounce shot glasses.

name: D-Dive
preparation: Fill a pint glass with Bacardi and cola Drop a shot of Di Saronno into the glass and serve.

name: Banana Boomer Shooter
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Rum a'la Olof
preparation: Pour rum and lemon juice into mixing glass and mix. Add cocoa powder and coffee and mix again. Pour into a shot glass top with cream and serve.

name: Hot Chicana
preparation: Pour the Bacardi rum DeKuyper Hot Damn cinnamon schnapps and Tabasco sauce into shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: The Tony Kelly
preparation: Mix. Shoot.

name: Twin Sisters
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

name: Texas Apple Delight
preparation: Nothing special just mix.

name: Texas Bar Punch
preparation: Pour the port ginger ale and soda into a large punch bowl and stir well. Add one large block of ice. Add lemon and orange slices and serve. Makes 20 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Texas Lightning Bolt
preparation: Add ingredients to a shot glass and serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Cooler
preparation: Pour the whiskey and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Wine Cooler
preparation: Mix wine and lemon-lime soda. Pour over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Rochdale Cowboy
preparation: Combine whiskey Southern Comfort fruit juices sugar and bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bishop Cocktail
preparation: Shake juice of lemon juice of orange and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes fill with burgundy and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

name: Whiskey Sling
preparation: Pour whiskey lemon juice sugar and water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Cowpoke
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice and garnish with a cherry.

name: Whiskey Fizz
preparation: Shake whiskey juice and syrup and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with lemon-lime soda and serve.

name: Faux Scrumpy
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Sand Dance
preparation: Pour whiskey brandy and cranberry juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: King Cole Cocktail
preparation: Muddle orange slice pineapple slice and powdered sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Add blended whiskey and 2 ice cubes stir well and serve.

name: Whiskey Sangaree
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the water and whiskey in a highball glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and add club soda. Float tawny port on top. Garnish with a lemon twist and dust with nutmeg and cinnamon. Serve.

name: Scotch Cooler
preparation: Pour scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Dr. Swerve
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Presbyterian
preparation: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and ginger ale and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Lone Tree Cooler
preparation: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill with ice add gin and vermouth and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over the rim of the glass.

name: Ward Eight
preparation: Shake blended whiskey juice of lemon grenadine and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice top with the cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Harvard Cooler
preparation: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Whiskey Rickey
preparation: Pour blended whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Swizzle
preparation: Pour the whiskey bitters lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until the glass is frosted. Shake the contents of the cocktail shaker and strain into the collins glass. Add club soda add a swizzle stick and serve.

name: Gin Cooler
preparation: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

name: Klondike
preparation: Pour bailey's irish cream into a cocktail glass filled with ice cubes. Add yukon jack stir and serve.

name: Horse Feathers
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Cabin 21
preparation: Pour the Wisers' Special Blend or comparable Canadian whisky. Top with preferably black sambuca. Finish with gin and serve.

name: Ershammar Dream
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake.

name: Kingston
preparation: Shake ingredients together with crushed or shaved ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Crimson Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Float port on top and serve.

name: Brandy Squirt
preparation: Pour brandy sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a stick of pineapple and strawberries and serve.

name: Highland Cooler
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky Angostura bitters orange juice and sugar into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Hellola
preparation: Pour the Stoli Razberi vodka into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lemonade and float the schnapps. Add a squeeze of lemon and a cherry and serve.

name: Puss and Lips
preparation: Muddle lime wedges in a glass and fill with ice. Add all other ingredients cover and shake vigorously. Add a straw and serve.

name: Lauren's Razzle Dazzle
preparation: Pour the Stoli and Chambord into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with club soda top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

name: Life Is Good
preparation: Pour Stoli Razberi and Sprite into a highball glass. Add a splash of cranberry juice and Red Bull energy drink stir and serve.

name: Love Juice #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Sir Francis
preparation: First pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade top with grenadine shake & serve.

name: Buddy Rich
preparation: Build the Stoli raspberry vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur Chambord raspberry liqueur and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with half-and-half and serve.

name: Night Light
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pit Stop
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Kung Fu
preparation: Pour jagermeister and pisang ambon over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Nazi Cola
preparation: Combine jagermeister and rumple minze over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Prince of Wales (Singapore) Jagerbomb
preparation: Pour the desired amount of Jagermeister into a durable shot glass as short as possible. mix the Cola and ginger beer together in a pint glass. Bomb the shot into the pint glass and chug. Note: Serve quickly before the initial strong carbonation of the ginger beer fades. Additionally make sure the base of your pint glass is thick as a quickly bombed in shot glass can blast right through the base of some pint glasses. Great for a laugh but terrible for business.

name: Das Ruhige Sturm
preparation: Mix the 2 half gallons of each in a large enough container chill in the freezer for a maximum of 1 hour.

name: Bacardi Rootbeer Float
preparation: Combine and mix together the rum and root beer in a beer mug. Add ice if desired and serve.

name: Harley Oil
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Tootsie Roll Float
preparation: Pour all over ice mix and strain off ice.

name: Rootbeer Floatie
preparation: Float cream on top rootbeer schnapps in a shot glass and serve.

name: Reggae Ambassador
preparation: Fill one-quarter of a blender (half-filled with ice) with vodka. Almost fill completely with pine-orange-banana fruit juice. Add fresh strawberries and sugar blend and pour into glasses. Serve with an orange slice.

name: Rainbow Brew
preparation: Pour slowly into a hurricane glass in order.

name: Bungalow
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cactus Bat
preparation: Pour the batida de coco into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cactus fruit juice stir and serve.

name: Girl From Mars
preparation: Place the Archers peach schnapps vodka and strawberry puree in a glass and shake well. Add several cubes of ice and then add half-and-half until near the top. Slowly pour the grenadine syrup around the edge of the glass (it should produce some odd red colors around the glass hence the name); serve.

name: Schnapp Bomb
preparation: Pour a whole bottle of Archers peach schnapps into a medium sized saucepan. Heat until hot but do not boil. Gradually add the sugar until saturation point (about 1 - 1.5 Kgs). Serve in shot glasses and knock back in one go whilst still hot.

name: Fuzzy Tounge
preparation: Add the vodka schnapps and rum to a cocktail shaker. Add some crushed ice and shake well for about 10 seconds. Open the shaker and add the mango and cranberry juice. Shake until a frost forms. Add some crushed ice to a hi-ball glass put a straw in and pour the drink in.

name: Bacardi Geezer
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a pint glass and serve.

name: Olympic
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Atomic Lokade
preparation: Pour lemonade vodka blue curacao and triple sec into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add sugar to taste.

name: 8-Ounce Twista
preparation: Mix 2 ounces of each ingredient in a cocktail shaker/stirrer very well. Pour into a highball glass with 3-4 ice cubes and serve. Ensure all juices are 100% pure and not concentrated or sweetened.

name: Blue Champagne
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Bonehead
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add lemonade to taste stir again and serve.

name: Popped Cherry
preparation: Serve over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry.

name: Absinthe Drip
preparation: Add absinthe and one large cube of ice to an old-fashioned glass. Place an absinthe spoon across the top of the glass with the sugar on it and pour drops of water onto the spoon. The water will drop through the holes in the absinthe spoon.

name: Sombrero
preparation: Pour brandy into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Absinthe Suissesse
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Key Largo Kooler
preparation: Mix juices and alcohol in a mixing tin flash blend and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.

name: Death of a Virgin
preparation: Pour vodka schnapps and lime juice into a glass. Add orange juice until the glass is half-filled and fill completely with 7-up. Stir well and serve.

name: Peachy Colada
preparation: Pour the spiced rum peach schnapps coconut cream and pineapple juice into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until slushy pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Rum Cobbler
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in club soda in an old-fashioned glass. Fill almost completely with crushed ice and add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry an orange and a lemon slice. Serve.

name: Hpnotize
preparation: Build over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Boozie
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: West Indian Punch
preparation: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a collins glass. Fill with crushed ice sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Freaking Shot
preparation: Mix equal parts of each and place in shot glass...

name: The Fucking Shit
preparation: Pour vodka over ice in a large glass. Add cranberry juice frozen pink lemonade concentrate and mix.

name: Dark Lord
preparation: Mix all ingredients with ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

name: Mass Confusion #2
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Cover and shake once and serve.

name: Mister Pibb
preparation: Almost fill a 12-oz highball glass with ice. Add the whisky amaretto and cola last. Serve.

name: Squirrel
preparation: Stir.

name: Alexander The Great
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Frozen Velvet Hammer
preparation: Mix all ingredients in the blender. Suck through a straw until comotose.

name: Nutty Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Angel's Tip #2
preparation: Layer in a cordial glass cream on top. Spear a cherry with a cocktail pick rest across the top of the glass and serve.

name: Nutdriver
preparation: Pour ingredients into the glass. Add ice and stir.

name: Absolut Nut
preparation: Stir over ice strain into a double sized shot glass or serve on the rocks.

name: Opaque Bloom
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake until chilled and serve immediately in sherry or shot glasses.

name: Chai Kurdi
preparation: The Kurds like this sweet aromatic tea. The cubes of sugar are dissolved in the mouth as the tea is drunk the sweeter the better. 1. Put the tea and cinnamon in a tea pot and pour in the boiling water. Allow to steep for 5 minutes. Serve hot with sugar cubes. Serves 4.

name: Cardamomspiced Coffee
preparation: Using amounts specified brew coffee in a drip-style coffee maker or percolator. Pour into 4 cups. To each serving add a dash of ground cardamom and about 2 tablespoons of the condensed milk; stir to blend.

name: Chai II
preparation: Combine the water tea cardamon cinnamon stick cloves 1 tsp of the sugarand the black peppercorns if desired in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 5 min. Add the milk and the rest of the sugar. Add the ginger 1-2 min after that or when the mixture returns to a simmer. Wait for 15-30 seconds then strain the tea into 2 cups. Variation: to make Chai II without milk and sugar combine the water tea cardamon cinnamon stick cloves and black peppercorns if desired in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 5 min. Add the ginger wait 15-30 seconds then strain the tea into 2 cups.

name: Pink Cotton Candy
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Slammin' Sammy
preparation: Add amaretto and triple sec to ice-filled glass. Pour in orange juice and top off with apple-cranberry juice to taste. Stir.

name: Maui Breeze
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear a cherry and an orchid and serve.

name: Green Orange
preparation: Pour vodka Grand Marnier and orange juice into a collins glass filled with ice. Top with Midori melon liqueur. Garnish with an orange and lime wheel aside each other on the edge of the glass.

name: Purple Hooter #2
preparation: Pour raspberry liqueur and vodka over ice in a cocktail shaker. Add pineapple juice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cardiac Arrest
preparation: Stir ingredients well in a wine goblet and serve.

name: Big Red
preparation: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

name: Slurpee From Hell
preparation: Make frozen orange juice concentrate according to instructions on can. Keep frozen and blend Everclear into the juice. Serve.

name: Mom's Punch
preparation: Pour ginger ale and hawaiian punch into punch bowl add the southern comfort to taste and add the frozen orange juice. When ready to serve mix well and garnish with fresh pineapple and orange slices.

name: Royal Hawaiian
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a small cocktail glass and serve.

name: Port and Brandy
preparation: Pour the port and brandy into a brandy snifter. Stir well and serve.

name: Brandy Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bob Dandy
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Six Chicks
preparation: Ensure all ingredients have been chilled thoroughly. Pour the brandy and lemon juice into a double shot glass and stir together. Pour the Merlot and tonic water into a cocktail glass and stir these together. Add the contents from the shot glass to the Merlot and tonic and serve.

name: Dry Brandy Manhattan
preparation: Pour the brandy and dry vermouth into an old-fashioned or rocks glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir garnish with 2 olives and serve.

name: Gluhwein
preparation: Simmer gently for 30 seconds and strain into a heat-proof goblet.

name: Brandy Stinger
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Brandy Alexander #2
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy creme de cacao and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Holiday Brandy Alexander
preparation: Pour the brandy creme de cacao and eggnog into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Sol Y Sombra
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a brandy snifter and serve. NOTE: The English translation of the name of this drink is Sun and Shade and after sampling this drink you'll understand why.

name: Brandy Manhattan
preparation: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add Cherry juice and cherry then bitters. Add brandy then sweet vermouth. Add water stir. Enjoy!

name: Tumbleweed
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then pour into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Brandy Cassis
preparation: Pour the brandy lemon juice and creme de cassis into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Brandy Blazer
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass dissolve the sugar in brandy. Add the orange slice. Tilt the glass and carefully ignite the drink with a match. Stir with a long spoon until the flame is extinguished. Strain into a punch cup and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Stinger
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: B&B
preparation: Float brandy on top of benedictine in a cordial glass without mixing and serve.

name: Brandy Toddy
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add brandy and one ice cube and stir. Add twist of lemon peel on top and serve.

name: No Worries
preparation: Pour the brandy over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add Dr. Pepper and serve.

name: Between The Sheets
preparation: Pour cognac rum and triple sec into an ice-filled rocks glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix and serve.

name: Negus
preparation: Heat ingredients (with lemon thinly sliced into rings and a heaped teaspoon of sugar). Strain into a heat-proof goblet when hot.

name: Rocky's Dilemma
preparation: Combine both the vodka and Grand Marnier in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Latham's Rule
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Peach Passion
preparation: Pour vodka into a mixer/glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the triple sec schnapps and pink lemonade. Stir and pour into a highball glass.

name: Fuzzy Irishman
preparation: Pour raspberry first butterscotch next and irish cream last. Need not be layered but pour in order given. Top 'O the Mornin' to you!

name: Gary's Poison
preparation: Pour in rum add triple sec orange juice and pineapple juice and serve.

name: Smartie
preparation: Put 1/2 oz. of Grape Schnapps and 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur into a shot glass.

name: Hot Lesbian
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a large cocktail glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Bee's Knees
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pink Fix
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into a lowball glass. Garnish to taste.

name: Schumann's Gimlet
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hawaiian Shooter
preparation: Mix with ice and strain into a tall shot glass.

name: Dirty Diaper
preparation: Pour equal parts of all ingredients into a shaker filled with ice and chill shake and strain.

name: Slippery Todd
preparation: Pour banana schnapps and vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add orange tangerine juice and serve.

name: Creamy Screwdriver
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Pink California Sunshine
preparation: Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the orange juice and creme de cassis.

name: Irish Lady
preparation: Almost fill a champagne flute with champagne. Add midori and orange juice and serve.

name: Kerry-Jo
preparation: Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly drizzle in cherry brandy.

name: Russian Brunch
preparation: Mix vodka and orange juice in a blender with ice and pour into a large container. Add champagne stir and serve.

name: Disappointed Lady
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Father Sherman
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Apple River
preparation: Combine the brandy creme de cacao ice cream and crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with half an apple ring and serve.

name: Bud Herrmann Brandy
preparation: Build in a highball glass and serve.

name: Best Year
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice.

name: Fizzy Watermelon
preparation: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes in the order of appearance do not stir soda water will float at the top of the glass giving a two toned appearance Garnish with 2 cherries on a sword resting on the top of the glass.

name: Pick-Me-Up
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.

name: Fucked Up New Year
preparation: Pour vodka into an old-fashioned glass until one-quarter full. Pour Welches strawberry breeze into the glass until one inch from the top. Add coke to top off stir and serve.

name: Daytona 501
preparation: Measure a full highball glass of crushed ice into cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake. Pour mixture into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Apple Judy
preparation: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

name: Neon Voodoo
preparation: Combine the vodka apple juice and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes and blend on high for about 10 seconds. Add more vodka if desired.

name: Nerds #2
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add apple pucker and watermelon pucker. Fill glass rest of the way with pepsi. Don't use coca-cola.

name: Liquid Cheese Cake
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Garnish with a strawberry wedge.

name: Chocolate Valentine
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Wiper Fluid
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cider Bite
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass w/out ice and serve.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake Jello Shot
preparation: Mix the jello and the boiling water then the vodka pour and set!

name: Mad Hatter
preparation: Shake and strain serving straight up in a shot glass.

name: Energy Shot
preparation: Pour the vodka and the energy drink into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a shot glasses for serving.

name: Skyy Bomb
preparation: Drop a shot of Skyy vodka into half a pint of Skyy Blue and chug.

name: Dick Lick
preparation: Pour ingredients into a double-shot glass and shoot.

name: Ski Shooter
preparation: Put ice in a shaker then the vodka followed by the amaretto and the sweet and sour. Cover and shake like crazy. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Flip Juice
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.

name: Scarlett Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Purple Rain Shot
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into chilled shot glass.

name: Cold Duck Punch
preparation: Mix all liquids in a large punch bowl. Float the sherbet on top.

name: Cold Hearted Threesome
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Cold Shower
preparation: Use 1 part of creme de menthe with 4 parts club soda; serve in a tall glass and stir.

name: Cold Comfort Coffee
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine glass filled with crushed ice. Sweeten to taste.

name: Black Stripe Cold
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a mixing glass and stir well to dissolve the honey and molasses. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Cold Kiss
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Sip And Get Funky
preparation: Mix ingredients and slam it.

name: Kill the Cold Smoothie
preparation: Take a one-inch slice of ginger and juice one-quarter of a lemon and add both to hot water. Add cardamom if desired.

name: Funky Chicken
preparation: Mix in shot glass. Serve.

name: Cold Blood
preparation: Drain the maraschino cherries and set aside the cherry juice. Place the drained cherries in a small bowl and add 3 ounces of Absolut Lemon-flavored vodka. Cover bowl and refridgerate for 72 hours. When marinated drain the vodka from the cherries and set aside as a reserve. Reserve the cherries also. To make one drink: Fill a hurricane glass one third full of crushed ice. Pour two teaspoons of reserved vodka over the crushed ice. Add 6 ounces of Zima. Fill the glass until 1 inch from the top with blue raspberry Kool-Aid. Add 4 reserved marinated cherries.

name: Blue Dolphin
