preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Cooter Cork
preparation: Layer ingredients in a tall shot glass in this order: Grenadine Chambord Aftershock and Absolut Kurant. Drink should have varying layers of red.

name: Blackberry Lane
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Buried Under An Avalanche
preparation: In shot glass drop in one small ice cube. Pour in Ouzo and then Rumple Minze.

name: Jessica's Cocoa Bitch
preparation: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a cocktail shaker over ice and shake. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Spank the Monkey
preparation: In a double shot glass add .75oz of 99 Bananas with .75oz of Smirnoff Vanilla then SPANK the monkey with .5oz of Bacardi. If the glass is clear the drink will actually look  banana yellow. Now it is time to get in touch with your inner primate take the shot and be prepared to go ape sh*t!

name: Blueberry Breeze
preparation: Mix equal parts of schnapps and vodka serve as shots.

name: Bay Blue
preparation: Pour the vodka the schnapps and the 7-up in a highball glass. Then add in slowly the cranberry juice. Float the blue curacao on top. If done right you'll have a nice multi-coloured drink.

name: Purple Jesus #3
preparation: Mix one part Wild Irish Rose with two parts Faygo Grape Pop over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Blue-Woo
preparation: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

name: The Eclipse
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a glass.

name: Kim-Berry
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hymen Ripper
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Skipper's Ripper
preparation: Add rum whiskey and grenadine to glass. Fill the rest of the way with Coke. Stir once to mix.

name: Maui Eruption
preparation: Pour the Maui schnapps and Malibu rum into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice stir well and serve.

name: Poland
preparation: Pour raspberry syrup in a shooter. Fill the rest of the shooter with Vodka very slowly so it will not get mixed with the syrup. (It should look like a White and Red flag). Drink straight up!

name: Lemon Shot
preparation: Mix galliano and absolut citron in a shot glass lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour rum over the wedge and glass. Ignite rum and allow to burn for a moment. Extinguish shoot quickly and suck on the lemon. If it is done correctly this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

name: Flaming Lemon
preparation: Squeeze half a lemon into a mixing glass and add the Absolut Citron. Mix them together and pour into a shot glass. Spoon the Everclear over the surface of the mixture light on fire and serve.

name: Butterbeer
preparation: Stir the butterscotch schnapps and cream soda together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Buttermint Delight
preparation: Combine the DeKuyper Buttershots and mint chocolate-chip ice cream in a blender. Add crushed ice if desired. Blend until smooth. Strain over ice cubes in a collins glass add a straw and serve.

name: Buttermilk
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a highball glass. Add milk to taste. Stir well and serve.

name: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
preparation: Combine all ingredients pour over ice and enjoy.

name: Butterscotch Dream
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with whipped cream and caramel.

name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
preparation: Mix ingredients in coffee mug and top with whipped cream.

name: Candy Apple
preparation: Pour one glass of sparkling cider. Add butterscotch schnapps to taste and serve.

name: Aggie Banana
preparation: Place bananas in an uncovered plastic bowl to freeze. Allow frost to form on them. Blend ice cream milk and frozen bananas until smooth. Add Schnapps blend and pour.

name: LeFreak
preparation: Fill 1/2 highball glass with ice and add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

name: Long Tall Cowboy
preparation: Pour the schnapps Bailey's and milk into a cocktail shaker over the ice. Shake then strain into a long frosted glass and serve.

name: Monk's Butt
preparation: Pour frangelico butterscotch schnapps and creme de cacao over ice. Add milk (or cream) if desired and stir.

name: Hair Raiser
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hairy Blue Balls
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: Freakin' Willy
preparation: Pour southern comfort over ice into a 3oz cocktail glass. Add amaretto and fill with lime juice. If desired rim the glass with sugar for extra flavouring.

name: Urban Jungle
preparation: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an aperitif glass and serve.

name: Cookie Tosser
preparation: Throw all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Cookie Monster
preparation: Mix and stir and pour over ice.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
preparation: Pour equal parts of each ingredient into a shot glass. Suck on a lemon and shoot.

name: Mr G
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Bubbly Red Sex
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps and grenadine into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add tonic water to taste and serve.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #2
preparation: Drop the cherries and some ice into a highball glass. Pour the Cabo Wabo anejo tequila Captain Morgan Private Stock dark rum Minute Maid limeade and 99 Oranges orange schnapps into the glass. Add a splash of maraschino cherry juice on top and serve.

name: Jack Hammer
preparation: Pour the vodka irish cream and peppermint schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with milk to taste and serve.

name: Aprishot
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Polynesian Cocktail
preparation: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka cherry brandy and juice of lime with ice strain into the sugar-rimmed glass and serve.

name: Blue Hooter
preparation: Mix equal parts of DeKuyper's Island Blue Pucker and Dekuyper's Watermelon Pucker in a shot glass and serve.

name: Tropical Suicide
preparation: Pour Bacardi rum into a collins glass. Add Malibu rum Jose Cuervo tequila pineapple juice cranberry juice and orange juice. Stir add a few ice cubes and serve.

name: Absent Friend
preparation: Shake well and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Dimetapp
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass vodka first and serve.

name: Krunk Kitty
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Flageln
preparation: Pour the vodka into the glass first then pour the red bull slowly into it. Add ice.

name: Cherry Bomb #3
preparation: Place cherries (drained) mixed with everclear into a sealable cannister for approx. 2 1/2 months. Serve by the shot. *To drown out flavor of everclear put one cherry in shot glass and fill with sprite or 7up. Take cherry and soda into mouth at same time chew cherry and swallow all together. Enjoy!

name: Cherry Bomb #9
preparation: Stir the whisky and the wine together in a sour glass. Top with cola and serve.

name: Marshall
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass with/without ice and stir. Sip or shoot.

name: Broo-ha-ha
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: L.S.E.
preparation: Make the jello with 2 cups of boiling water. Mix in the 5 Hour energy drink and raspberry Stoli. Put in plastic shot cups and let sit overnight in the refrigerator.

name: Neon Green Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a chilled shot glass and serve.

name: Nightmare
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Citron Neon
preparation: Pour the vodka melon liqueur blue curacao and lime juice into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Neon Ghost
preparation: Shake it with ice and serve it in a cocktail glass

name: Foxy Shot
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff Green Apple Twist vodka into a shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well. and pour into a 2-oz shot glass. Splash some Amaretto Di Saronno into the shot glass just enough to swirl into the shot and serve.

name: Appleschlager
preparation: Pour equal parts Goldschlager and apple vodka directly into a glass of your choice (brand of vodka also of your choice although good quality vodka is recommended) make sure they have mixed thoroughly and drink. Ice is optional; the drink is better cold.

name: Sour Lollishot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with an apple-flavored lollipop with a plastic stick where possible.

name: Grape Rape
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a white grape.

name: Alize Bleu Bling Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients together with a few ice cubes and serve straight up with a twist of lemon in a cocktail glass.

name: Anti-Freeze #2
preparation: Pour the hot chocolate mix into a 9 ounce glass mug. Add the schnapps and boiling water. Stir Well. Top with a swirl of whipped cream. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a peppermint stick.

name: Irish Anti-freeze
preparation: Combine all ingredients in blender with crushed ice (frozen strawberries also can be added but optional). Blend and pour into sugar lined glasses. Top with umbrellas.

name: Fishbone
preparation: Fill glass with ice add liquor orange juice and sour mix. Shake well. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Cable Guide
preparation: Mix in a pitcher or individually: Pour 1 part vodka 1 part mango juice and top with 2 parts Fresca. Pour over ice in a tall/large glass.

name: Valentine
preparation: Shake banana liqueur vodka and cranberry juice with ice cubes and strain into a red wine glass.

name: Danny Q's Aruba Rum Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice. Shake vigorously and serve with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Muppet
preparation: Pour equal parts tequila and 7-up into a shot glass. Place palm over the glass hit it on the table (to stir) and shoot.

name: Fart in the Ocean
preparation: Add almond-flavored tequila and chilled 7-up to a glass. Drop one sweet prune in each glass. Add ice if you wish.

name: Heavy G
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mug or glass with a salted rim. Fill with ice and 7-up/sprite.

name: Bam Bam
preparation: Add the tequila to a shot glass; top with 7-Up and serve.

name: Black Silk Panties
preparation: Pour the Baja Rosa into a shot glass. Drizzle the black sambuca on top allow them to mix and serve.

name: Silk Stockings
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Bloody Leech
preparation: Place the crushed popsicle into the bottom of a tall glass. Add vodka (to taste) and kool-aid. Stir gently and serve.

name: Bullfrog (The Party Mix)
preparation: Pour the soda (lemon-lime ginger ale sprite) into a large punch bowl and add the vodka. Mix and pour in the grain alcohol. Using a knife cut the lemons and limes and squeeze the juice into the bowl. (Store-bought lime and lemon juice can be substituted.)

name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

name: Kentucky B And B
preparation: Pour the bourbon and benedictine into a brandy snifter.

name: Kentucky Gentleman Top Hat
preparation: Mix the bourbon amaretto and hazelnut liqueur into a tall glass and top off with the soda. Serve.

name: Bullfrog #4
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a punch bowl and serve.

name: Flagella
preparation: Pour the jello and vodka into a double-shot glass and stir. Add Mountain Dew soda stir again and serve. (NOTE: Not all the jello will dissolve.)

name: Bullfrog #2
preparation: Prepare thawed limeade concentrate as directed on container. Mix one part vodka and one part limeade and serve mixture into cocktail glasses.

name: Gangbuster Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a suitable glass.

name: Buffalo Sweat #3
preparation: Rim a shot glass with hot sauce and place some at the bottom of the glass. Fill with equal parts of Jack Daniel's and 151 rum and shoot.

name: Milnd's
preparation: Pour the mountain dew and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Stir add the grenadine (without stirring) and serve.

name: Beef Curtains
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a champagne tulip glass and serve.

name: Maiden's Dream
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with/without ice and serve.

name: Panther Sweat
preparation: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice and strain into a whiskey-sour glass. Add crushed salt to the rim of the glass if desired.

name: Hot Egg Nogg
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except milk) until smooth and pour into a heat-proof goblet. Add boiling milk sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Bombay Punch
preparation: Add to punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Serve with sliced fruit.

name: Scorpion
preparation: Fill a 12 oz wine glass with ice add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients shake and pour back into glass. Garnish stirrer straw cherry-pineapple parasol and mint.

name: All Killer with No Filler
preparation: Place beer lager and Tequila into a cocktail shaker and shake for 10-15 seconds. Then pour into a pre-chilled beer glass. Then add the whipped cream on the top and volla!

name: Montana
preparation: Stir all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Soul Taker
preparation: Mix the the parts together and stir briefly.

name: Magic's Tornado
preparation: Shake well with ice and serve in a highball glass with a slice of green lemon.

name: Montana Smoothie
preparation: Pour Black Velvet brand whiskey into glass top with schnapps. Do not chill or add ice.

name: Tornado
preparation: Mix everything except cola sugar and ice in a glass. Stir in the sugar add ice cubes and pour in coca-cola. Stir three times.

name: Tony Montana
preparation: First make a simple syrup. Do this by taking 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water and boiling them in a pot. Let the mixture cool and then pour it into a vessel with a spout for easy pouring. This mixture should last you a while. Next muddle the mint leaves key lime wedges and simple syrup (1 oz.)in a glass. What you are trying to do is get the oils from the limes and the flavor of the mint leaves to mix with the simple syrup. Then add your 1 1/2 oz. of Light Rum preferably Bacardi Superior. Follow that by adding ice to your glass (cracked ice if you have it). At this point shake or stir the mixture. Lastly add Coca-Cola to the glass and that should bring you to the top of the glass. Give it a quick stir and you're good to go! Note: This recipe was designed to be served in a 9oz. rocks glass. Adjust accordingly to accommodate a larger glass. There's your Tony Montana...essentially a Mojito (which is a classic Cuban drink) with a little Coke. Enough said. Enjoy!

name: CRS
preparation: Pour the alcohol into a mixing glass with ice and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the splashes of 7-up and sour mix and serve.

name: The Marvin
preparation: Add all liquors and sour mix to a large cocktail glass filled with ice stir and serve.

name: Green-Eyed Bi
preparation: Pour the kiwi liqueur into a shot glass. Add the vodka and drop in the green gummi fish and there's your green-eyed bi!

name: Hara Kiwi
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of kiwi and a cherry and servev.

name: Kiwi Sparkle
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Magic Star
preparation: Shake in a cocktail glass. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a crystalized fruit star-shape.

name: Champagne de Mars
preparation: Pour into a wine glass.

name: William Wallace
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Marzo Madness
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the rum and top with lemon juice. Serve.

name: Omeed's Mom
preparation: Mix the Stoli Vanil into the pomegranate juice in an old-fashioned glass stirring well. Carefully layer Bacardi 151 on top and serve flaming.

name: Bon Voyage
preparation: Pour tequila and gin over ice in a cocktail glass. Add a dash of lemon juice and blue curacao and stir lightly. Serve with a straw.

name: Shetty Classic
preparation: Pour Ricard Bacardi rum and Absolut vodka into a bowl filled with sugar. Set on fire (use extreme caution) and let the sugar dissolve. Allow the drink to cool and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Melon Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fretful Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Alexander's Big Brother
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Blue Jacket
preparation: Pour the gin blue curacao and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Yin Martini
preparation: Stir to chill in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with oriental fruit or litchi nut.

name: Yang Martini
preparation: Pour into a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with olives and serve.

name: Meiner
preparation: Pour the gin into a cocktail glass almost fill with orange juice and stir briefly. Add a slice of orange and pour the campari gently onto the slice.

name: The Miki
preparation: Pour the campari into a highball glass with ice. Add the grapefruit juice then the soda. Stir once.

name: Tropical Dawn
preparation: Shake and strain gin and orange juice into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle campari bitters on top add a short straw and serve.

name: Heather Blush
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky and strawberry liqueur into a champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine or champagne. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Maiden's Prayer #2
preparation: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a chilled wine or cocktail glass. Serve with a lemon twist.

name: Maiden's Kiss
preparation: Stir and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Maiden-No-More
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bushranger #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients with cracked ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gonad
preparation: Layer ingredients above one another in a shot glass by pouring over the back of a spoon pressed against the inside of the glass or otherwise and serve.

name: Brandy Rainbow
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gator Bite
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Vary the Tabasco and cayenne to taste.

name: Froth Blower Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orchid Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin violet liqueur and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jeff Tracy
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Kiss in the Jaguar
preparation: Shake Jagermeister and Dark Creme de Cacao with ice strain into a rocks glass and dribble in the Baileys. Slam as a shot.

name: Damn-The-Weather Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fare Thee Well
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Trinity Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: La Stephanique
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lone Tree Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jet Black
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Martunia
preparation: Shake all three ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an edible flower and serve.

name: Homestead Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Rose Cocktail
preparation: Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vermouth gin brandy lemon juice and grenadine with ice strain into the sugar-rimmed glass and serve.

name: Jack Rose Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: English Rose Cocktail
preparation: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Gin Sour
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Alaska
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jewel of the Nile
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Montreal Club Bouncer
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Aftershock
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a glass and stir.

name: Green Zone
preparation: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.

name: Cool Hot Damn
preparation: Pour a shot each (in different glasses). Down Hot Damn chase with Schnapps.

name: Hot Damn
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Power Drill
preparation: Almost fill a shot glass with equal parts of orange juice and vodka. Add a splash of beer and serve.

name: Oaxaca Jim
preparation: Combine the gin orange juice grapefruit juice and bitters in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

name: Bent Nail
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Captain Cook
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cuban Island
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Park Avenue
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Perfect Manhattan
preparation: Swirl with ice to chill pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Lemony Summer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Horny Bull #3
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Jenny's Concoction
preparation: Pour the vodka and anisette into a glass and top it off with orange juice.

name: Elk's Own Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the pineapple slice and serve.

name: Amaretto Sunset
preparation: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly just 5 shakes. Strain out ice serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange. It should taste orangey almondy appley all together. An Autumn drink. You may alternately wish to serve it with an almond or two instead of the orange slice. Should be just a drop below room temp. For fireplace drink eliminate ice warm cider for 30 seconds in microwave.

name: Everlasting Sunset
preparation: Add Everclear to a shot glass followed by the orange juice.. then pineapple juice. Make sure the cherry 7-up has been in the refridgerator or on ice still in the can. Pour that in last for a fizzy cherry pop to the shot.. take a stirring stick and give it a small stir then shoot and enjoy!

name: Sunset Shooter
preparation: Pour vodka sloe gin and sweet and sour mix into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake for 10 seconds pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Sunset Punch
preparation: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the champagne maraschino liqueur Cointreau cherry brandy brandy and cold tea. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange slices and maraschino cherries.

name: Glaucoma
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into glass.

name: The Teddy Toolman
preparation: Pour 2 oz of vodka into glass then add the gummi bears. Pour in orange juice and serve.

name: Kamora Quencher
preparation: Add Kamora to a highball glass with ice fill with carbonated water and squeeze & drop in the lime wedge.

name: Apple and Starfruit Juice
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender for 2 minutes and serve.

name: Pucker-7
preparation: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

name: Norm the Niner
preparation: Pour the apple-flavored ingredients into a white wine glass half-filled with ice. Stir well. Top with 7-Up or Sprite stir lightly and serve.

name: Knacky
preparation: Pour apfelkorn into a highball glass. Add peach juice and fill with iced tea.

name: Magic Pixie
preparation: Fill a 10-oz highball glass with ice. Add the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and Jacquins peach schnapps. Fill the remainder of the glass with an even amount of Sprite and Ocean Spray cranberry juice. Serve.

name: Apple Colada
preparation: Blend schnapps cream of coconut half-and-half and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Caramel Apple
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker and Buttershots into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-up and serve.

name: Feni Highball
preparation: Pour the Kazkar Feni apple liqueur into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the fresh lime juice and fill with 7-Up. Stir garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge and serve.

name: Green Meanie
preparation: Fill the bottom of a highball glass with a shot of sour apple pucker and fill with lemon-lime soda.

name: All Puckered Out
preparation: Add ice and a shot of pucker to the highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime and toss it in the glass. Stir.

name: Applejack Collins
preparation: Pour the Applejack brandy lemon juice sugar and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled collins glass. Top with soda water to taste and serve.

name: Apple Fizz
preparation: Pour the apple brandy apple juice and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with soda water garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Apple Sunrise
preparation: Pour each ingredient in order into a collins glass. Stir gently and serve.

name: Apple Blow
preparation: Pour the brandy lemon juice egg white sugar and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain over a few ice cubes in a collins glass. Add club soda and serve.

name: Applejack Sour
preparation: Pour the brandy lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Top with soda water garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Normandy Cooler
preparation: Pour into a collins glass with ice. Add a spiral of lemon and serve.

name: Ambrosia
preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients (except champagne). Pour contents into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne stir lightly and serve.

name: Apricot Brandy Rickey
preparation: Pour apricot brandy and lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda stir and serve.

name: Orchard Orange
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Norman Porto Flip
preparation: Shake well and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Apple Rum Rickey
preparation: Pour applejack and rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Squeeze lime and drop in glass. Stir and serve.

name: French 68
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute slowly fill with champagne and serve.

name: Apple Brandy Sour
preparation: Shake apple brandy powdered sugar and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: Apricot Breeze
preparation: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add Vodka and apricot nectar to glass then fill with tonic. Stir.

name: Apricot Punch
preparation: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided. If you wish for a little different taste substitute orange juice with apple juice and oranges with apples.

name: Apricot Anise Collins
preparation: Shake gin brandy anisette and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir lightly. Decorate with the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Apricot Smoothie
preparation: Mix all ingredients over ice. 7-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired. For a little different taste use apple juice instead of orange juice.

name: Apricot Lady
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum apricot brandy triple sec lemon juice and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Apricot Cooler
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass. Add a lemon spiral to finish.

name: Apricot Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orgasm #12
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: M3
preparation: Add the Malibu mango rum to an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice and then the soda/punch. Stir well and serve.

name: Mango Margarita
preparation: Shake the tequila mango liqueur and lime juice with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mango Mosa
preparation: Pour the mango liqueur and mango juice into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne garnish with a slice of star-fruit and serve.

name: Champagne & Mango
preparation: Mix champagne and mango juice together add cubed mango and ice.

name: Fresh Mint Liqueur
preparation: Wash leaves in cold water several times. Shake or pat dry gently. Snip each leaf in half or thirds. Discard stems. Measure cut mint leaves packing lightly. Combine mint leaves and vodka in aging container. Cap and let stand in a cool place for 2 weeks shaking occasionally. -- After initial aging strain leaves from liqueur discard leaves. In a saucepan combine sugar and water. Bring to a boil stirring constantly. Let cool. Add cooled syrup to liqueur base stirring to combine. Add glycerine and food color pour into aging container for secondary aging of 1-3 more months.

name: Mint Russki
preparation: Place twisted or crushed fresh mint leaves into a medium sized cocktail glass. Add frozen vodka and ice if desired. Stir briefly.

name: Creme de Menthe
preparation: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

name: Fall Spice Cordial
preparation: Bring brown sugar white sugar and apple juice to a boil over medium-high heat. Add cinnamon ginger nutmeg cloves allspice and orange peel. Boil for 4 minutes and remove from heat. Let stand until just warm. Transfer to a clean 1 qt aging vessel. Add vanilla brandy and vodka. Cover tightly and let stand for 1-4 weeks. Filter out solids before bottling.

name: Angelica Liqueur
preparation: Combine all herbs nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool dark place for one month.

name: Orange Bitters
preparation: 1. Chop the orange peel finely and mix it with the herbs and alcohol. Let it stand for 15-20 days in a sealed jar agitating it every day. 2. Pour off spirits through a cloth and seal again. 3. Put the strained off seeds and peel in a saucepan crush it cover with boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into another jar cover and let stand for 2 days. Strain this off and add it to the spirits. Add caramel coloring filter again and let it rest until it settles perfectly clear.

name: Saurian Brandy
preparation: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
preparation: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool dark place for 2 weeks shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

name: Almond Shrub
preparation: Put into gallon or half-gallon jar the spirits thin lemon peel orange juice and sugar. Now take the essence of bitter almonds (you can use any amount you please) and add it to the glass of milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into the jar. Cover put in a warm place (65-70 degrees fahrenheit) and keep it there until the milk has curdled. This takes from one to three hours. Then filter through filter paper and bottle. Rest it for two weeks before drinking it.

name: Rum Shrub
preparation: 1. Pare oranges very thinly and place the rinds into a gallon jar. Add their juice one pint of cold water and close the jar. Stand for three days stirring occasionally. 2. Strain into an enamel dish add two - three pounds of sugar and bring to the boil. Add pint of orange juice and strain again. Add rum and bottle.

name: Shrub
preparation: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. *Before squeezing the lemons peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice cover and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle

name: Grand Orange-Cognac Liqueur
preparation: Place zest and sugar in a small bowl. Mash and mix together with the back of a wooden spoon or a pestle. Continue mashing until sugar is absorbed into the orange zest and is no longer distinct. Place into aging container. Add cognac. Stir cap and let age in a cool dark place 2 to 3 months shaking monthly. After initial aging pour through fine mesh strainer placed over medium bowl. Rinse out aging container. Pour glycerine into aging container and place cloth bag inside strainer. Pour liqueur through cloth bag. Stir with a wooden spoon to combine. Cap and age 3 more months before serving.

name: Wassail #2
preparation: Simmer the nonalcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).

name: Plum Liqueur
preparation: 1. Wash plums and pat dry cut in half or smaller and pit. Place in an aging container pour sugar over and stir. Add vodka and brandy stirring to partly dissolve sugar. Cap container and place in a cool dark place for 2 months stir occasionally. 2. Place a strainer over a large bowl and strain liqueur. Press the liquid from the plums with the back of a wooden spoon and discard plum pulp. Re-strain liqueur through cloth until clear and bottle as desired. 3. Plum liqueur is ready for drinking or cooking however for best results age for another month.

name: Pineapple Liqueur
preparation: 1. Crush pineapple pieces very finely and add with the sugar to pineapple juice in a pan. Leave to stand overnight. 2. Drain syrup and strain pineapple pieces through a cheese cloth or in a food processor. Mix juice with rum and vodka and add lemon juice to taste. Pour into a 0.7 litre bottle and fill with pineapple juice or water. Leave for one week.

name: Berry Rum Rickey
preparation: Shake the first 5 ingredients and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top glass with a small dash of soda. garnish with berries and serve.

name: Grand Master
preparation: Pour the scotch schnapps and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Johnny Puke
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Scotch And Water
preparation: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: City Rickey
preparation: Pour gin lime juice and cointreau into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of cranberry juice and soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime and serve.

name: Stone Rickey
preparation: Pour gin lime juice orange juice and simple syrup into a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Fill with club soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Coffee Egg Nog
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a collins glass sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Surprise Browst
preparation: Shake all but the grenadine and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Sprinkle grenadine on top. Serve unstirred with straws a muddler and garnished with a cherry.

name: Scotch Fix
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar lemon juice and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

name: Tartan Swizzle
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine lime juice sugar Scotch and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain mixture in shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Aberdeen Angus
preparation: Stir all but the drambuie into a coffee mug. Warm the drambuie ignite it and pour the burning liqueur into the mug. Stir rapidly and drink.

name: Morning Glory Fizz #2
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Hell Bender
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass and serve.

name: C60
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Troya
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple two cherries and a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Trouser Rouser
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry and serve.

name: Ceasefire
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Killeberg
preparation: Pour whiskey into a beer mug. Then fill the glass with 50/50 beer and wine.

name: Slippery Surprise
preparation: Shake with three-quarters of a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of fruit add straws and serve.

name: Sporran Cooler
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass with a spiral of lemon peel and serve.

name: Highland Sling
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar water lemon juice and scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Dickie Ward
preparation: Pour the scotch bitters and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Mamie Gilroy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Dundee Dream
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Add the ginger ale garnish with a cherry and orange slice and serve.

name: Canal Street Daisy
preparation: Pour the whisky orange juice and lemon juice into a collins glass and stir. Add club soda to taste. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Cocoboodo
preparation: Shake with ice chips.

name: Pat Quinn
preparation: Pour the orange pop into a highball glass. Add the scotch whiskey stir and serve.

name: Scotch Rickey
preparation: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.

name: Blastula
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a champagne flute.

name: Butterscotch Milk Punch
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Hell Hole
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass and serve.

name: Hot Jamaican
preparation: Heat gently in a saucepan pour unstrained into a heat-proof goblet and serve.

name: Shanghai Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jamaica Kiss
preparation: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of tia maria and a shot of jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Hot Benefactor
preparation: Heat sugar syrup in a saucepan with a little water. Stir until the sugar dissolves. Add jamaican rum and red wine (dry is better) and heat until it simmers. Add syrup to saucepan with a little hot water and stir until sugar is dissolved. Pre-warm a mug and pour the mixture in. Add a lemon slice and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Jamaica Sunday
preparation: Dissolve honey in rum and pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Rum Bana
preparation: Frappe in a champagne flute.

name: Brooklynite
preparation: Pour the rum honey and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cubano
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled shaker shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Jackalope
preparation: Combine amaretto Jamaican rum Kahlua and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a sour glass. Add dark creme de cacao to the top of the drink.

name: Doctor Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pomegranate Soda
preparation: Pour the lemon juice and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Rigori
preparation: Blend all ingredients together by stirring in an old-fashioned glass Add ice and serve.

name: Pineapple Wine Cooler
preparation: Shake everything except soda with ice; strain into a collins glass. Add 2 oz. of soda and garnish with a pineapple spear if desired.

name: Alhoa Bubbly
preparation: Pour the last 3 ingredients in a tall glass and stir well. Add crushed ice and the white wine. Add some more club soda and stir again. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Beer Rose
preparation: Stir ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dusty Rose
preparation: Shake ingredients pour into a small cocktail glass and serve.

name: TLA
preparation: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom amaretto in the middle and a splash of lime juice on top.

name: Big Apple And Sprite
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice stir and enjoy!

name: Leche de Monja
preparation: Place whole eggs in shell (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.

name: Grand Royal Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and stir.

name: Jericho's Breeze
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice until frothy. Strain into a stemmed wine goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Aquarium Jello
preparation: Use a new or well-cleaned goldfish bowl. Mix gelatin according to package directions substituting curacao for water in whatever ratio you prefer. Place the hard candies in the bowl. When gelatin is cool but not yet setting up pour it slowly into the bowl and be careful not to disturb the candies or the color will run. Cool until half-set then add foliage and fish placing them with strands of spaghetti. Refrigerate until serving-time.

name: Good Morning!
preparation: Combine vanilla ice-cream sugar ice and espresso in a blender and blend until smooth. Add bailey's irish cream and tia maria then stir. Pour into a coffee mug and serve.

name: Carribean Catholic
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. If possible shake chocolate powder (Cadbury's) over a match/lighter on top and serve.

name: Alien Orgasm
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Alexandra
preparation: Mix in a shaker add some ice and shake very well.

name: Depth Charge
preparation: Pour the Vodka Pernod Malibu & Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass add the lemonade and pineapple juice and top up with coke.

name: Beige Russian
preparation: Pour the vodka Tia Maria and chocolate milk into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dark Indulgence
preparation: Blend all ingredients. Pour into poco grande glass.

name: Pink Forest
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Emerald Forest
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fire and Ice
preparation: Use a whisky glass for this. Cut the green chillies into half from tip to tail to split it open and place them upright in the glass all around. Top up the glass with ice cubes. Add the 2 tbs lime juice over the ice. Pour the vodka over the ice and serve.

name: Sloe Tequila
preparation: Combine ingredients with a half-cup of crushed ice in blender. Blend at low speed and pour into old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and twist of cucumber peel.

name: Penthouse
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and shoot. Chase with a lime wedge.

name: Charro Negro
preparation: Rub rim of glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Put 4 ice cubes into the glass add Tequila and juice of half a lemon. Add some more salt if you like and fill the glass with Coca-Cola. Stir gently.

name: Sloppy Pussy
preparation: Pour Everclear red gatorade and a fruit punch over ice in a large pitcher. Stir pour into hurricane glasses and serve.

name: Hot Nils
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a punch bowl with/without ice and serve. Serves 4.

name: Screaming Purple Jesus
preparation: Mix together and serve over ice.

name: Cajun Water
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec grenadine and bitters into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with champagne stir and serve.

name: Desert Water #2
preparation: Combine over ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water
preparation: Place all drinks into a glass and add ice-cream at the end.

name: Fiery Hot Anus
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 rum into a freshly opened bottle of Corona lager. Fill to the brim with Tabasco sauce. Serve cold lime optional.

name: Jack Ass
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's tennessee whiskey into a shot glass. Top with 151 proof rum and serve.

name: Crowbar
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain over ice.

name: Columbus Cocktail
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Add a slice of lime and serve.

name: Tricontinental
preparation: Slowly pour ingredients pousse-cafe (layered) in order; rum liqueur syrup into a champagne flute filled with crushed ice.

name: Gege
preparation: Shake ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry and serve.

name: Island Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Chilled Orgasm
preparation: Place the ice cream in a blender and add the Bailey's milk and rum. Top with ice and blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bumpo
preparation: Add to heatproof cup and allow the sugar to dissolve. Dust with nutmeg.

name: Breakfast
preparation: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Garden Fresh
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mulata
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Hustler
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Satan's Spawn
preparation: Add the Tabasco first then the Firewater.

name: Curled Satan's Whiskers
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Zippy's Revenge
preparation: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and Amaretto. Shake well to dissolve the sugar into the Kool-Aid. Serve cold.

name: Dr. Dye's Revenge
preparation: Combine all ingredients over ice in this order: liquors cranberry juice ginger ale aour mix orange juice and bitters. Cover and shake well. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Montezuma's Revenge
preparation: Drop a shot glass filled with the Jose Cuervo tequila into a regular beer and serve.

name: Christmas Elf's Revenge
preparation: Crush the ginger root and add the ginger syrup apple juice sambuca and schnapps. Shake well and strain into a pina colada glass which should be about half full of crushed ice. Add the goldschlager then sprinkle the cinnamon powder over the top. Serve with a slice of apple floating on the top and a straw.

name: Satan's Whiskers
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Amber's Revenge
preparation: Mix scotch rum and tequila over ice in a highball glass then fill with root beer.

name: Cornholio's Revenge
preparation: Pour the malibu rum banana liqueur and cherry brandy. Add the ice and sprite. Add lime wedge and serve.

name: Rasta's Revenge
preparation: Pour gin rum port orange juice lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Zhivago's Revenge
preparation: Carefully layer into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Pudwacker
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Dust with cocoa powder.

name: Sleigh Ride
preparation: Float the ingredients in order by pouring over the bottom of a spoon.

name: Whitecap Margarita
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Pear Margarita
preparation: In blender combine with ice and garnish with a lime wedge or wheel.

name: Prado
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Gringo Punch
preparation: Combine cognac and Mountain Dew and stir. Then add tequila and water. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Mexican Roots
preparation: Pour tequila and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Melonrita
preparation: Salt the rim of a margarita glass and add crushed ice. Pour all ingredients into the glass stir and serve.

name: Maraca
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Citrus Cactus
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Firebird
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: El Caribe (Caribbean Martini)
preparation: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum Cointreau and blue Curacao in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Elmer Fuddpucker
preparation: The mixture is one large can (12 oz) of frozen limeade that same can filled with any cheap vodka and three cans of light beer.

name: Titanic Uplift
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with three melon balls add a straw and serve.

name: Midori Sunrise
preparation: Mix one part of midori (or equivalent melon liqueur) with one part orange juice. Add a splash of grenadine syrup and serve.

name: Tequila Surprise
preparation: Pour Cuervo tequila over crushed ice in a margarita glass. Add Malibu rum Tropicana orange juice and Del Monte pineapple juice. Stir briefly then drizzle the Chambord raspberry liqueur around the edge and into the center of the drink. Garnish by placing a wedge of lime and a wedge of pineapple on the edge of the glass with a raspberry dangling inbetween into the drink.

name: Perfect Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Pagoda
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Metropolitan
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Farthingale
preparation: Pour the sweet vermouth dry vermouth gin and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Farmer's Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brandy Crusta
preparation: Slice a lemon in half. Rub the rim of a collins glass with the lemon and dip into sugar to coat the edge. Pare the circumference of each lemon half's peel and add to the glass. Shake brandy lemon juice orange curacao and bitters in a shaker with crushed ice and strain into the collins glass. Add an orange slice.

name: Nineteenth Hole
preparation: Stir the gin dry vermouth sweet vermouth and bitters with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Teacher's Pet
preparation: Pour the whiskey vermouth and bitters into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Gentleman's Club
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Madeira M'Dear
preparation: Pour the Madeira wine brandy and vermouth into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Aperol '86
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with strawberry.

name: True Trixie
preparation: Pour the Campari dry vermouth and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Emerald Cocktail #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a green maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Apple Cart
preparation: Pour the apple brandy Cointreau and lemon juice into an old-fashioned (preferably chilled) glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Prairie Dog
preparation: Build ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: 6am Sunrise
preparation: Pour the mountain dew and gin into an ice-filled highball glass. Stir add the grenadine (without stirring) and serve.

name: Bill Leaves Town
preparation: Pour whiskey vermouth and grenadine into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cuff and Buttons
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: David Bareface
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Opening Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ladies Cocktail #2
preparation: Stir well with ice. Strain into glass. Serve with a piece of pineapple on top.

name: Mardee Mine
preparation: Combine the rum and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Rosarita Highball
preparation: Shake the tequila cassis and lime juice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with ginger ale garnish with a slice of cucumber and serve.

name: Tequila Bom-Bom
preparation: Place a coaster on top pound on table twice guzzle it!

name: Massacre
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Tequila Mockingbird
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tequila Matador
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Tequonic
preparation: Pour tequila over ice cubes into old-fashioned glass. Add fruit juice fill with tonic water and stir.

name: TNT #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Amer Picon Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: New Yorker
preparation: Pour bourbon over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Squeeze a lime wedge into the drink and drop into glass. Add grenadine stir well and serve.

name: Saxon Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Blue Train
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Tequila Cooler
preparation: Pour tequila and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir garnish with a wedge of lemon and serve.

name: Burning Nazi
preparation: Keep bottles chilled or mix over ice and strain into shot glass.

name: Oil Slick
preparation: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Screaming Nazi
preparation: Add ingredents with ice and shake.

name: Ying Yang
preparation: Serve with alcohol pre-chilled. Can be served as a drink or a double shot.

name: Nazi Helmet
preparation: Combine in a shot glass.

name: Blitzkrieg
preparation: Place the liquors in seperate shot glasses. This is a series of shots; first shoot the Rumple Minze then Jgermeister then Goldschlger. Do them fast and they are very smooth. Afterwards you will initially just taste the cinnamon of the Goldschlger but then the Rumple Minze's peppermint flavor seems to make a return and it tastes like you just ate a mint.

name: Flaming Gay Morgan
preparation: Pour the spiced rum cherry liqueur and tonic water into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry. If desired float the Bacardi 151 on top of the drink and ignite (use extreme caution). Extinguish before serving.

name: Lime Tonic
preparation: Pour Rose's lime juice and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Pat Cocktail
preparation: Fill a glass with ice. Pour equal parts of each ingredient into the glass and serve with a straw.

name: Zinger
preparation: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the Schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would. *Add 1 shot Strawberry Schnapps for an alternate taste.

name: Cherry Zinger
preparation: Place a single maraschino cherry into a shot glass. Add the mango rum and cherry brandy then serve.

name: Big Dipper
preparation: Pour the Pusser's rum brandy lime juice sugar and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Skinny Dip
preparation: In a blender throw in: 8 scoops of sherbet 1 can of Fresca and 2 shots of Vodka. Blend until you reach desired thickness.

name: Carpano Highball
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Add a twist of orange and serve.

name: Hurricanes by the Gallon
preparation: Pour the Rums Gin and Amaretto into a 1 gallon Iced Tea Jar with a spigot. Add the frozen juices and the correct amount of water as directed on the can (I believe it's 3 cans of water per can of juice concentrate). Mix well and then add the Grenadine the amount you add depends on your taste a cup I think is too much I prefer about 3/4 a cup so it's a salmon color I don't like it too pink. Serve over ice....watch out because they do hit you like a Hurricane.

name: Goony Goo Goo
preparation: Shake over ice in martini tumbler pour in small rocks glass above recipe makes 2 shots-multiply as needed.

name: Drunk Watermelon
preparation: Cut a hole in the top of the watermelon and pour all of the vodka in the watermelon. Put the watermelon (hole upwards) in the fridge for one day before eating.

name: Liquid Watermelon
preparation: Pour grenadine into a margarita or cocktail glass. Place some ice cubes in a cocktail shaker and add the vodka watermelon schnapps Midori melon liqueur and sour mix to the shaker. Shake well pour into the margarita / cocktail glass and serve.

name: Watermelon
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Watermelon Slice
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine then vodka rum gin and triple sec. Fill with half orange juice and half cranberry juice. Float with midori. Drink should be presented as is but stirred before drinking.

name: Watermelon #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Bianca Pop
preparation: Pour coconut rum first then add amaretto.

name: Dumbfuck
preparation: Put in shot glass and stir.

name: Melon Fever
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur triple sec and cream in order into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Silver Jubilee
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Amaretto Spritzer
preparation: Take glass full of ice and add 3 oz. Amaretto. Fill with 7-up or sprite. Add a cherry for apperance. Mix. Yum Yum!

name: Brasier d'Ange
preparation: Carefully layer into a cordial glass in the order given.

name: Shiny Nail
preparation: Stir with ice. Pour into glass.

name: Hot Lesbian Sex
preparation: Add equal parts of both brandys and the peach schnapps in a shot glass top with 151 set fire to it and serve.

name: Limon Sunrise
preparation: Pour the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and orange juice into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Slowly add grenadine stir gently and serve.

name: Ice-Cream Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Pisco-Rita
preparation: Add frozen limeade concentrate pisco and triple sec to a blender. Fill with ice and blend on high speed (keep topping with water until full). When done serve in a margarita glass rimmed with salt.

name: Barbarella
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Cointreau Caress
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with grated dark chocolate sprinkled over the top and serve.

name: Fluorescent Dream
preparation: Pour into a glass half filled with ice. Stir well.

name: Duval
preparation: Pour the Cointreau and Sambuca into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stevie Wonder
preparation: Pour in the order given and enjoy.

name: Sour Apple
preparation: Fill glass with ice and garnish with an orange half and a cherry. Drink can be made without lime juice for those with who prefer sweeter.

name: Gator Piss
preparation: Pour midori and rum over ice and top off with sweet and sour mix.

name: Green Iguana
preparation: Mix tequila midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix in a blender. Add ice. Serve in a margarita/coupette glass.

name: Mel's Summersault
preparation: Pour the vodka creme de cassis and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add grapefruit juice and shake well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Feel This
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Next add absolut sloe gin pineapple juice southern comfort and last midori. Add pineapple and cherry garnish.

name: Tropical Lust
preparation: Fill glass with ice add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice then add southern comfort and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

name: Derby Fizz
preparation: Combine all ingredients except water with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes in a chilled collins glass. Fill with sparkling water and stir gently.

name: Orgeat Lemonade
preparation: Mix together the lemon juice and orgeat syrup in a tumbler with 2 or 3 small ice cubes. Fill with soda water stir and serve.

name: Absinthe Flip
preparation: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.
1) Pour in the first shot of melon liqueur (Midori) 2) Pour in one shot of Everclear 3) Pour in one can of 7-up (or less if desired) 4) Top off with the final shot of melon liqueur (Midori)

name: Santa Fe
preparation: In a highball glass full of ice pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Poliuke
preparation: Mix everything into glass with ice.

name: Creamy Soda
preparation: Add ice to highball glass. Add coconut rum and banana liquor. Fill glass with 7-Up top with grendine. Garnish with cherry.

name: Rainbow Julep
preparation: Muddle one of the mint sprigs with apricot brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add bourbon and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Swirl with a barspoon until the outer glass frosts. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve.

name: Rainbow Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Hefty Smurf
preparation: Fill lower half of glass with ice cubes. Add rum and curacao. Fill glass with pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Blackpool Tower
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish cream apricot brandy and gin into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tower Topped
preparation: Pour whiskey Grand Marnier and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Neon Tea
preparation: Shake all ingredients and pour into beer mugs filled with ice. Top with a cherry.

name: Rail Splitter
preparation: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice to taste in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Five Hundred Proof
preparation: Shake and strain into a pilsner filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Hula Shake
preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a frosted collins glass garnished with a pineapple wheel and maraschino cherry.

name: Bitchin Orange
preparation: Pour the amaretto into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the sour mix and top with orange soda. Add a splash of grenadine and a cherry for garnish and serve.

name: Wild Buttery Squirrel
preparation: Pour into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold pour into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Wild Beaver
preparation: Combine all ingredients in equal parts in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a 12 oz glass (or thereabouts) and serve.

name: Thug Heaven
preparation: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

name: Heaven and Hell
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Lime Chu-Hai
preparation: Pour the shochu and lime juice over ice. Stir and fill the glass with soda water.

name: Chilly Willy
preparation: Pour into shaker. Fill with orange and pineapple juice. Shake well.

name: King of Noble
preparation: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and garnish with an orange slice.

name: King of Denmark
preparation: Stir the pernod and black and add several big ice cubes.

name: King Burro
preparation: Combine the coffee liqueur light rum coconut cream milk and banana in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass garnish with a slice of banana and serve.

name: King of Poland
preparation: Pour the scotch add lemon juice add crushed ice then top off with the vodka. Serve in a highball glass drink as a shot.

name: Silver King Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: King Alfonse
preparation: Serve pousse cafe in a cordial glass.

name: Atomic Jager Bomb
preparation: Fill a glass with roughly 4 - 6oz. of Sparks alcoholic energy drink. Drop in a shot of Jagermeister and shoot.

name: Jager Monster Shot
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Purple Nipple
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Gestapo
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Jag and Red
preparation: Pour a 8 oz can of Red Bull into a highball glass. Add jagermeister and serve.

name: Chuck Wagon
preparation: Pour jager into a shot glass add the drops of tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Flaming Nazi
preparation: Make sure the hot damn and the jagermeister are both cold before serving.

name: Monster Squad
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cup with ice and serve.

name: Buttmeister
preparation: Pour ingredients into mixing glass swirl and strain into shot glass.

name: Dirty Oatmeal
preparation: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top.

name: Lay Down and Shut Up
preparation: Shake over ice strain and pour into a shot glass.

name: Homewrecker
preparation: Shake pour over cracked ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jager Drop
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Stir. Pour into shot glasses for serving.

name: The Terminator
preparation: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy.

name: Jager Volcano
preparation: Fill glass with a shot of jagermeister top off with the same amount of cherry juice. Serve.

name: Bald Slut
preparation: Mix ingredients together with ice and serve in a rocks glass with or without ice.

name: Negropolitan
preparation: Layer the Jagermeister on top of the sambuca in a shot glass and serve.

name: Gumball Shot
preparation: Pour equal parts Jagermeister herbal liqueur and blue Curacao into a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Add a medium splash of Red Bull energy drink. Shake briefly; strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Rambo Shot
preparation: Chill both liquors and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Murky Water #2
preparation: Very simple shot pour and serve. Tastes fruity and delicous. Great for anyone looking for a yag bomb but without the horrible taste.

name: Blumpkin Shot
preparation: Just pour all the liquor into a shaker and shake shake shake it up. Then pour into a shot glass ... top it with whipped cream. Please read the origin of this shot in order to understand the ingredients.

name: Blue Monster
preparation: Combine in a shot glass and serve.

name: Dirty Monkey #2
preparation: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Morir Sonando
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Pascal
preparation: Pour licor 43 and midori into a cocktail glass. Fill with milk add ice and serve.

name: Volcano
preparation: Pour liquors into a champagne flute and fill with ice-cold champagne. Add a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Scooter
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brandy Mexi
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker. Shake it for 10 seconds and pour it out into a highball glass filled with ice cubes then serve.

name: Blue Blarney
preparation: Mix all ingredents and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Porch Crawlers
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Nuclear Zima
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Chuck Pucker
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a tall glass. Stir and serve.

name: Pucker
preparation: Pour whiskey generously over ice in a whiskey sour glass. Add unsweetened grapefruit juice 7-up (optional) and serve.

name: Cocky Apple Pucker Fucker
preparation: Pour all ingrdients (except sloe gin) into a cocktail shaker with a little ice. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Pour sloe gin on top slowly. Squeeze slice of lemon or lime over top. Serve with straw.

name: Aqua Fodie
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of Gin followed by 1 oz. of Blue Curacao. Fill glass with Orange Juice garnish with Orange and Cherry and serve.

name: Creeping Death
preparation: Shake well.

name: Church Lady Martini
preparation: Pour the gin vermouth and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon lime and orange peels and serve.

name: Blue Marlin
preparation: Build ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Bacardi Smoothie
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice to make a smoothie-like consistancy. Pour into a pina-colada glass garnish as desired and serve.

name: Grand Fashion
preparation: Muddle a teaspoon of sugar cherry and orange in a chilled martini glass. Add ice bacardi barrel aged rum and rouge aperitif wine. Shake well. Garnish with a blood orange wheel.

name: Blue Parrot
preparation: Pour the Maui blue hawaiian schnapps and Parrot Bay coconut rum over some ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice or to taste and serve.

name: Queen Charlie
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with fruit and serve with a straw.

name: Hot Lemonade
preparation: Squeeze the juice of the lemon into a 10-oz. glass. Add maple syrup and a dash of cayenne pepper. Fill with ice water. Stir. Drink.

name: Eldorado
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Floaty
preparation: First pour in the pear soda. Then take the fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly.

name: Olsen Driver
preparation: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

name: Refreshing Apple Lemonade
preparation: 1. Combine 4 cups of water with 4 cups of sugar in a saucepan. Bring to the boil and continue boiling for 10 minutes. 2. Combine the made syrup with the juices. Serve over ice or serve hot with a cinnamon stick for stirring.

name: Canadian Pride
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add the ginger ale and garnish with a slice of grapefruit.

name: Shot in the Pot
preparation: Add to shot glass and shoot.

name: St. Squiggle's Divorce
preparation: Just pour the glass 9/10's Coca-Cola and add 1/10 Jolt Cola and guzzle.

name: Mosstrooper
preparation: Almost fill a glass half-filled with ice with root beer. Add a little 7-up and stir with a straw.

name: Bourbon Collins
