preparation: Pour ingredients into a frosted collins glass two-thirds filled with ice. Serve with straws and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Remmsen Cooler
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass with a spiral of lemon peel and serve.

name: Orangeade
preparation: Pour lemon juice orange juice and sugar syrup into a large tumbler or highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold soda water. Serve with a drinking straw.

name: Gin Crusta
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass rimmed with lemon juice and sugar. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

name: Bourbon Sloe Gin Fizz
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey sloe gin and lemon juice over cracked ice in a chilled collins glass. Stir gently. Add 3 ice cubes and fill with soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Danish Gin Fizz
preparation: Pour the gin cherry heering kirsch lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Gently stir in the soda/sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime.

name: Tod's Cooler
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Add a spiral of lemon peel and serve.

name: Gin Cassis Fizz
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the centre of the drink.

name: Mackenzie
preparation: Throw a few rocks into a collins glass. Squeeze in a segment of lime (about 1/2 oz). Pour the Bombay Sapphire gin into the glass and add the cranberry juice. Top up with orange juice and throw in the other segment of lime. Pain free and delicious.

name: FrazzleBerry
preparation: Pour the raspberry vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger beer add a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Asian Fetish
preparation: Pour gin into a tall glass filled with ice. Add grenadine and fill to the top with sweet and sour mix and 7-Up. Top with a generous dash of Chambord liqueur garnish with a cherry stir and serve.

name: Brahma Bull
preparation: Mix the Red Bull with the Bombay Sapphire gin. Serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Ginadine Fizz
preparation: Pour the gin grenadine and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour (incl. ice) into a collins glass. Top with 7-Up add a cherry and serve.

name: Lady Marmalade
preparation: In a wine glass mix gin and cointreau. Top up with lemonade then float cherry advocaat on the top. Garnish with a citrus wheel.

name: Hairspray
preparation: Use a clean highball glass fill with ice cubes add Bombay Sapphire Gin and top off with some Sprite. A twist of lemon or lime adds color. For the advanced bartender a curl of orange peel gives this drink a final salon touch.

name: Sangria Liqueur - Sweet
preparation: Melt the sugar in a couple of cups of hot water. I do this so I don't end up with a lot of undissolved sugar in the end. Cut apples into small chunks (1 or so)the apples absorb the wine the most so I tend to use a lot of apples. Peel the citrus fruits (lemons and limes are difficult to peel) and break into wedges. Mix the wine sugar fruit and Fresca and put in the fridge for a few hours. I tend to take out the lemons and limes before serving because they get slimy and no one wants to munch on them anyway. Serve in an iced tea glass with a straw and one of those cocktail swords so your guests can get at the fruit without getting their fingers sticky.

name: Absinthe Liqueur (Original)
preparation: Crush all ingredients in mortar and peste (or in a plastic bag with a rolling pin if you dont have one) except the Wormwood Angelica root and Hyssop. Put all ingredients into the bacardi 151 (you will need to put it all into a larger bottle so it fits) and let it sit (still in a cool dark place) for 4-7 days. Strain out into a bottle and enjoy. Letting it sit for 4 days will do the trick 7 days will make it slightly more potent but it will be much more bitter. Using a weaker alcohol will work but it will turn brown instead of the usual green colour.

name: Sangria Liqueur
preparation: Mix all together and put in the refrigerator till cold. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste.

name: Amaretto Liqueur
preparation: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container combine apricot halves almond extract grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

name: Medd
preparation: 1. Spread the yeast on a piece of bread. 2. Boil the water honey and sugar. Stand in an earthenware pot. Skim off any scum. Add lemon juice cloves and ginger. Leave to cool. When just warm float the bread and yeast on the top. Cover with a clean cloth. Leave for about 6-8 days. 3. Strain and bottle. Corks should be loose to start with. Leave for at least 5-6 months.

name: Sima
preparation: Boil water sugars beer and the yellow part of the lemon's peel. Let the mixture cool down. Peel the white part of the lemon's peel carefully and cut the fruit part of the lemon into small pieces then add to sima. Dissolve the yeast in a bit of the sima and add to sima. Put 5-6 raisins and 1 tablespoon sugar in every bottle you're making. Pour the sima into the bottles and close the bottles carefully. Leave sima in a cold place for a couple of days. Sima is ready when the raisins float. It will keep well in a cold place for 1-2 weeks.

name: Sangria Liqueur Classic
preparation: Cut orance and half (1/2 into thin slices) and juice the other half of the orange. Cut the lemon into thin slices and combine with orange juice wine sugar brandy and contreau. Chill. To serve add ice and club soda stir gently.

name: Absinthe Liqueur #2
preparation: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water add ice enjoy.

name: Kotikalja
preparation: Put rye malt and sugar in a bucket. Boil water and pour it in the bucket. Let the mixture cool down and drain filter it. Dissolve yeast in a bit of kotikalja and add it to kotikalja. Leave the bucket until next day in room temperature (20 C). Cool down the drink. Kotikalja stays drinkable 3-4 days stored in closed bucket or bottles in a cold place.

name: Honey Liquor
preparation: Dissolve honey in hot water. The water should not be hotter than 45 degrees celsius. Let the mixture cool down then add spirit of wine (alcohol). You may exchange the spirit of wine with spirits like whisky brandy or a similar strong liquor to get a lighter liquor.

name: Absinthe Liqueur
preparation: Steep wormwood in vodka for 48 hours. Remove add the rest and steep for one week. Age.

name: Classic Brooklyn Egg Cream
preparation: Pour the milk into a 12 oz. chilled glass. Spritz in the seltzer until a white head reaches the top of the glass. Spoon in the syrup with a twist of the wrist!

name: Corner Store Egg Cream
preparation: Put chocolate syrup in bottom of a 12 ounce glass. Add milk and stir. Slowly add seltzer stirring quickly but no more than necessary to get a good head going.

name: Clearly Vodkanadian
preparation: Mix one bottle Clearly Canadian flavored sparkling water with vodka in a 16 oz. collins glass.

name: Wine Punch
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

name: Mulled Red Wine
preparation: Heat in a small saucepan and strain into a heatproof cup. Do not boil.

name: Port Wine Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Red Wine Cooler
preparation: Pour the wine lemon-lime soda and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Bobby Cocktail
preparation: Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Alexander Young
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Black River
preparation: Mix the alcohol in a glass with ice. Pour sprite and soda water simultaneously into the glass. Add the drops of lime and serve with a slice of lime on the side.

name: Virgin Flamingo Cocktail
preparation: Pour the cranberry juice pineapple juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Top with the club soda and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Virgin Whore
preparation: Mix vodka lime juice kool-aid coloring and cranberry juice in a shot glass. Slowly add apple juice around the side add tequila and serve.

name: Virgin Manhattan
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain; either into a chilled cocktail glass or on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mango Bellini
preparation: Fill a champagne flute one-third full with mango juice. Top with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of mango.

name: Quagmyre
preparation: Pour ingredients into a brandy snifter. Shake until clear and serve.

name: Campari Shakerato
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Due Campari
preparation: Shake lemon juice and campari well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with prosecco and serve.

name: Nalgaa
preparation: Pour cherry liqueur over four ice cubes in a highball glass and add the campari. Fill with 7-up or sprite and serve.

name: King Kenneth
preparation: Pour the Campari peach schnapps orange juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass and top with tonic water. Stir well garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Camp Lawless
preparation: Pour rum and juice into a highball glass filled with broken ice. Sprinkle the campari and galliano on top. Serve unstirred with straws and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

name: Cherry Fluster
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Double strain the mixture into a Champagne glass then top with Champagne and garnish with the strawberry. Serve.

name: Itchy Ass
preparation: Pour the shot of Blackhouse blackberry schnapps into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Zima. Serve unstirred.

name: Sky Captain
preparation: Mix Hpnotiq liqueur Hennessy cognac and Blue Curacao liqueur in a mixer. Strain into a highball glass with ice (can be ground or whole cubes whichever you want). Pour in Sprite soda if you use whole ice cubes. Stir drink and enjoy.

name: Fuzzy Ass
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar.

name: Andy's Drink
preparation: Pour the Hennessy cognac over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with Vanilla Coke stir lightly and serve.

name: Gang Related
preparation: Pour all three ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Works best if you add Hennessey first then the Alize and Hpnotiq in any order after that. Stir and enjoy!

name: Bloody Passion
preparation: Build in a highball glass.

name: Aloha Fruit Punch
preparation: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill thoroughly.

name: Picnic Fruit Punch
preparation: Combine the juices in a large container and refrigerate. When ready to serve stir in the ginger ale and orange slices. (Serves 4.)

name: Cognac and Soda
preparation: Pour cognac over ice in a highball glass fill with club soda and serve.

name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
preparation: In large saucepan beat together eggs sugar and salt if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat stirring constantly until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled several hours or overnight. Just before serving pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls cinnamon sticks extracts of flavorings flavored brandy or liqueur fruit juice or nectar ground nutmeg maraschino cherries orange slices peppermint sticks or candy canes plain brandy run or whiskey sherbet or ice-cream whipping cream whipped. Serve immediately.

name: Plank Walker
preparation: Pour ingredients into a rocks glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Classic Cocktail
preparation: Prepare an old-fashioned glass by rubbing a slice of lemon around the rim and dipping it into powdered sugar. Pour the brandy curacao maraschino liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into the prepared glass and serve.

name: Johnniebull
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass over three ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Nan's Special
preparation: Mix the vodka 7-up and soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.

name: Gin Bucket #2
preparation: Fill a large bowl or bucket halfway with ice. Pour the 1.75 liters of gin over the ice. Add the 4 liters of Sprite while stirring to ensure a good mix and temperature of the concoction. Add the 2 bottles of lime concentrate. Slice the 3 limes into eight pieces or smaller as desired and squeeze pieces over the mixture while adding them and stir together.

name: Miss Kitty
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine gin lemon juice pineapple juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Orange Kitty
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in an old-fashioned/lowball glass and serve.

name: Nut Sauce
preparation: Pour the Smirnoff watermelon vodka into a cocktail glass. Add the raspberry sparkling water. Serve with a piece of watermelon and 2 raspberries inside the glass.

name: Whiskey Daisy
preparation: Slice the lemon quarter in half and muddle with the lime syrup and chartreuse in a mixing glass. Add whiskey shake well with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lemon and lime wedge a cherry and serve.

name: Vodka Daisy
preparation: Combine vodka lemon juice sugar and grenadine in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Malibu Dew
preparation: Pour rum into a highball glass. Fill with mountain dew stir briefly and serve.

name: Pineapple Drink
preparation: Pour rum over pineapple chunks in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Top with sprite stir and serve.

name: Beetlejuice
preparation: In a tall mixing glass with ice pour the vodka on the bottom. Then fill the glass 3/4 full with sour mix. Pour in the rest of the ingredients one at a time. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry.

name: Champagne Pineapple Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except champagne) into a large jug and mix until sugar dissolves. Chill for at least 2 hours and pour into wine glasses until two-thirds full. Top each glass with champagne garnish with pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Runty
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass or if you can't find one any 8 - 12 oz cup or container. Mix and serve with a straw.

name: Boredom Kills
preparation: Pour the vodka into a whiskey sour glass with 2 ice cubes. Fill the glass about half-way with Sprite and the rest of the way with the original red Hawaiian Punch. Stir and serve.

name: White Jamaican
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice and pour in the ingredients. Speed shake and serve.

name: Out of the Blue
preparation: Combine ingredients with 1-2 cups of crushed ice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass add a straw and serve.

name: Blue In The Face
preparation: Fill glass half full with ice. Add liquors. Add sugar and tonic to taste. Stir.

name: James the Evil Leprechaun
preparation: Combine Irish Whiskey's into a shot glass serve and drink.

name: Hawaii Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Roadrunner Punch
preparation: Mix equal parts of each liquor in a tall glass. Top with fruit punch (berry flavored recommended) and serve with ice.

name: Marvin Hagler
preparation: Combine cognac tuaca and pineapple juice with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain and serve.

name: Jenny Bomb
preparation: Pour the Red Bull into a highball glass. Mix the jagermeister and Hennessy in a shot glass. Drop the shot into the Red Bull and chug.

name: Beautiful #2
preparation: Just mix them together.

name: Green Hulk
preparation: Pour Hpnotiq and cognac into a shot glass watch as it turns green and serve.

name: Honnessey
preparation: To make 1 shot mix Hennessey and approximate 1 tbsp. of Sweet Clover Honey (gourmet honey is preferred) in following ratio though this can vary slightly depending on taste. Squeeze the juice from 1/4 of a fresh lemon and mix drink to even. Serve at room temperature as a deliciously mellow and refined drink.

name: Mango Tango
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Sky Blue Fallout
preparation: Mix all ingredients except 7-Up in a mixing glass. Pour into a hurricane glass and add the 7-Up. Stir lightly with a straw and serve.

name: Holiday Cheer
preparation: Mix champagne and frozen cranberry juice (undiluted). Slice lime and garnish each wine glass. Serve with breakfast to start the day right. Note: Mix right before serving to retain the bubbles. You may use non-alcoholic champagne.

name: Scarlet Fever
preparation: Mix together and shake pour into a draft glass. Add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

name: Hong Kong Smog
preparation: Pour Tanqueray gin and Midori melon liqueur into a shaker half-filled with ice. Stir or shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a melon ball and serve.

name: Pearasite
preparation: Pour the gin tonic water and pear syrup into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Garlic Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients (minus olives) with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add garlic-stuffed olives.

name: Jerald
preparation: Stir together in a cup and serve.

name: Nelson Special
preparation: Pour gin into a cocktail glass with ice cubes and fill one-quarter full with cranberry juice. Fill with tonic water. Blend briefly with a small stick and drop in a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Gin-berry
preparation: Muddle the raspberries in the base of a whiskey sour glass with creme de mure and creme de framboise then add crushed ice filling the glass. Add rest of ingredients and stir until the drink is a blood red color and serve.

name: Falling Sky
preparation: Stir together in a brandy snifter and serve.

name: AT&T
preparation: Pour vodka and gin over ice add tonic water and stir.

name: Black Leather Whip
preparation: Add all ingredients in mixing tin with ice and shake til' VERY chilled. Pour into shot glass and serve with a lime.

name: Flatliner #3
preparation: Pour the tequila over the chartreuse in a 2-oz shot glass. Add desired amount of tabasco sauce and serve. (1-2 drops for the weak 3-4 for the mid-strength 4-7 for the adventurous 7+ for the herculean efforts.)

name: No Regrets
preparation: Pour the irish cream into a shot glass add the gold tequila and shoot.

name: Big Unit
preparation: With tequila already in glass pour Blue Curacao down the side so that it underlays the tequila. Do not mix!

name: KahBula
preparation: Layer tequila over bailey's over kahlua.

name: Gimlet #2
preparation: Fill the glass to 2/3 with ice cubes. Shake the gin and lime and pour into the glass.

name: Ice Chest Lemonade
preparation: Microwave the limes and lemons for about 10 - 15 seconds in order to release the juice. Cut in half. Pour the ice into an ice chest. Add lemonade or limeade sugar and squeeze in the juice from all the lemons and limes. Add vodka to taste. Grab the handles and shake.

name: Ecto Cooler
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large (1/2 gallon) pitcher. Shake and enjoy!

name: Wild Thing #2
preparation: Place all ingredients into blender with ice and blend until slushy. Adjust amount of ice to achieve proper consistency. Rim of glass can be salted if desired.

name: JimPop's Margarita
preparation: Lightly rub the rim of a cocktail glass with some lime juice dip glass rim in the salt. Mix all ingredients with ice strain into fresh ice in the salt-rimmed glass and enjoy!

name: Panther
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Ice Bet
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a brandy snifter stir and serve.

name: Silver Stallion Fizz
preparation: Shake gin and vanilla ice-cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve

name: Sweet Mexican
preparation: Chill in a shaker the tequila and triple sec and strain in shot glass then add a splash of grenadine.

name: Indigo Blues
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: 5-Ball
preparation: Prepare kool-aid as normal except add double the amount of sugar. When done add one fifth of the volume of triple sec and serve chilled.

name: Green Fairy Blood
preparation: Mix ingredients in above order over a sugar cube on an absinthe spoon light the cube and when the flame dies immediately stir in the sugar until it dissolves; serve.

name: Viking Blood
preparation: Pour aquavit and tia maria over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sprite or 7-up stir and serve.

name: Bull's Blood
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Diablo's Blood
preparation: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.

name: Nelson's Blood
preparation: Pour the champagne and port into a champagne flute. Stir well and serve.

name: Dr. Peppermint
preparation: Mix together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Golden Rye Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda) well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda add a cocktail cherry and serve.

name: Imagination
preparation: Pour rye whiskey into a highball glass. Add the desired amount of ice. Fill to the top with ginger ale and add a splash of lime. Stir until well mixed.

name: Paul's Manhattan
preparation: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass strain into collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Rye Sling
preparation: Shake rye whiskey cherry heering sugar syrup and lemon juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes fill with soda garnish with a cocktail cherry and serve.

name: Pink Coral
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into a large goblet. Garnish with tropical fruit slices/pieces if available and serve.

name: Rum Punch
preparation: Open frozen juice and put concentrate in a one gallon pitcher. Do not add water. Add entire liter of dark rum then add coconut rum. Mix until frozen juice concentrate dissolves into rum and add entire 2-liter of Tahitian Treat. Pour into hurricane glasses and serve.

name: Coral Punch
preparation: Mix.

name: Bacardi Orgasm
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Green Monster Party Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients (in any order) in a large tub which can hold several gallons. Stir so that the sherbert is completely dissolved. With the exception of the kool-aid and sherbert as much or little of the other ingredients may be used.

name: Malibu Juice
preparation: Pour the malibu rum into a glass and fill with fruit juice; orange pineapple or banana.

name: Coon Dawg Punch
preparation: Put in juice first then add everclear. Add as many wedges of fruit as you'd like and preferably soak them in everclear for about an hour beforehand (for added flavor). Fruit wedges make an excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.

name: A Splash of Mexico
preparation: Pour the corona lager into a highball glass. Fill with V8 Splash or vary amount to taste and serve.

name: Aggie Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients and stir. Best served over ice and in a clear glass.

name: Adam Bomb
preparation: 1. Add ice to a blender (or to a glass if you prefer on the rocks). 2. Add the fruit and fruit juice depending on personal preference then add the rum vodka tequila and triple sec. Blend until smooth. 3. Rim a glass with sugar or salt and pour in the mixture. Garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

name: Millennium Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Beefeater gin cherry brandy orange juice and ginger ale into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Yeoman's Passion
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with slices of lime and lemon and serve.

name: Winky
preparation: Pour wink soda over gin in a glass add ice if desired and serve.

name: Fruity Carebare
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fruity Slut
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Conn's Fruity Beverage
preparation: Combine crushed ice tequilla and rum in a blender. Add grenadine orange juice and lemon juice. Add margarita mix to taste for flavor. Blend for a little while then pour into hurricane glasses.

name: Curielle
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a slightly chilled red wine glass. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Fulminator
preparation: Cut lemons into wedges and mix all ingredients in large container.

name: Bombeirinho
preparation: Pour the cachaca into a shot glass unchilled. Add the grenadine drops and serve.

name: Melzinho
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a pousse cafe glass with ice.

name: Pepe
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Dawa
preparation: Put lime and sugar into a whisky tumbler. Crush limes slightly add ice and pour in the vodka. At this point you twist a dawa stick into some honey and add the stick to the drink. A wooden honey stick or other type of stick twisted in honey will work. Muddle limes with dawa or honey stick. The more you crush the limes into the mixture and stir the sweeter the taste.

name: Destroyer
preparation: Add frozen limeade concentrate in blender; fill the same can with vodka and add to blender; fill can with Half and Half and add to blender along with 6 ice cubes. Blend pulse until ice is crushed. Pour into any type of glass.

name: Cheaterita
preparation: Combine tequila limeade and ice in a highball glass. Squeeze lime juice from the slice into mixture and then drop the rind in the glass as well. Stir and serve.

name: Favorite Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: A Few Of My Favorite Things
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Buddy's Favorite
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve without ice.

name: Baduizm
preparation: Shake with ice strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Amor de Cosmos
preparation: Shake rye grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

name: Egg Nog
preparation: Beat yolks until light in color. Slowly add bourbon cognac while beating at slow speed. Chill 3 hrs. Add salt to whites beat to peaks. Whip s cream until stiff. Fold whipped cream into yolk mixture then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. Serve with nutmeg sprinkled on top. For thinner mixture add 1 or 2 cups of milk. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl.

name: Mulled Port
preparation: Peel and slice the oranges and place the peel in a large nonreactive saucepan. Add cloves mace nutmeg allspice cinnamon stick sugar and 2 cups of water. Set over a medium-high heat and stir frequently to dissolve the sugar. Allow the reach the boil and turn down to medium heat. Simmer for 10 minutes. Strain the mixture and return to the pan. Add port and heat but do not boil. Serve in Irish coffee glasses with a slice of peeled orange in each. Makes 6 (6-ounce) Irish coffee glasses.

name: Egg Nog - Cooked
preparation: Here's an egg nog recipe using cooked eggs so no one has to be paranoid about salmonella. Mix granulated sugar 2 Tbl. of water and lemon juice in a med. sized sauce pan. Let boil cook 5 min until it turns dark amber. Remove from heat and slowly stir in remaining 1/4 c. of water. Beat eggs and milk together in a bowl. Stir into sugar mixture cook over med.-low heat for about 10 to 12 minutes. (It should thicken enough to stick to spoon) Poor into a clean bowl (punch bowl or something) stir in vanilla nutmeg and salt. Refigerate covered until cold. Before serving beat together cream liquer adn 10x sugar until soft peaks form. Pour chilled eggnog into a serving bowl fold in whipped cream with a whisk.

name: Egg Nog #5
preparation: In an electric mixer beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac while beating at a slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream intothe yolk mixture then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve in punch bowl. If desired add one or two cups of milk to the yolk mixture for a thinner eggnog.

name: Pisco Sour with Egg Whites and Sugar
preparation: Blend together egg whites and white sugar in blender for 15 seconds. Add Pisco and lime juice and blend for 15 seconds. Put crushed ice into shaker and add Pisco sour mix to about 2/3 full. Shake and strain into small glasses. Garnish with a sprinkle of brown sugar. You can also garnish with a drizzle of browned melted butter. Repeat shaker process with rest of mix only adding more crushed ice as needed. Makes about 16 servings - enough for 8 people 2 servings each.

name: Grandma's Swingin' Eggnog
preparation: Beat yolks until light. Add sugar and mix well. Add milk and rum. Mix well then chill for at least 3 hours. One hour before serving whip cream and stir into chilled mixture. Return to refrigerator for an hour. Serve in punch cups and dust with nutmeg. Serves 20

name: Monastery Cocktail
preparation: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the sugar; stir to dissolve. Add the benedictine and stir again. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon to float on top and serve.

name: Absinthe Olde-style
preparation: Pour the Absente liqueur (legal to import) granulated sugar and 20 drops (approx 1/2 tsp) liquid wormwood extract (available from many health food stores -- Herb Pharm is a good choice) into a shaker with ice. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blood-Orange Margarita
preparation: Make 4-oz of blood orange simple syrup by combining the sugar and blood orange juice in a small sauce pan; simmer over low heat until thick and syrupy. Allow to cool. Add the above made syrup tequila triple sec and sour mix to a pitcher and stir. Pour 6-oz amounts into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Pour each amount over ice in a margarita glass; garnish as desired and serve.

name: Shark's Tooth
preparation: It's very EASY. Pour the rum in over the ice then batida & cointreau. Serve.

name: Whiskey to Go
preparation: Pour whiskey gin lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Kiwi Cooler
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender. Serve in chilled glasses garnished with kiwi fruit slices.

name: Cranberry Juice (homemade)
preparation: Produces 5c juice very rapidly from a small packet of berries. Cranberries keep virtually forever in the freezer. After extracting the juice you will have the pulp which needs only sugar and a few seconds' boiling to become a flavorful coarse-textured cranberry sauce. The cost of the combined products is very low. Rich in Vit C; medicinal value. Wash berries and put into a saucepan with water orange slices and salt. Turn berries opt orange slices and liquid into a cheese-cloth-lined sieve. Strain the juice without pressing and reserve the berry and orange pulp to make HOME-STYLE CRANBERRY SAUCE. Return juice to pot with sugar and boil 2-3 mins. Taste add more sugar if needed. Cool and chill

name: Scurvy #2
preparation: Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: German Mouthwash
preparation: Pour both ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Incredible Chak
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve. Adjust amounts to taste if desired.

name: Iceberg #2
preparation: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Layer the blue curacao on top and the cream on top of that. Serve.

name: Gator Booger
preparation: Mix in a tall glass with ice (or a frosted mug) and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Karlsson
preparation: Shake well and pour into a glass. Substitute banana liqueur for pisang ambon if needed.

name: Charley Town Beatdown
preparation: Stir Crown Royal whisky and butterscotch schnapps together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Jeri's Hat Trick
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Seaweed
preparation: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

name: Emerald City
preparation: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Poor Man's Mommosa
preparation: Pour beer into a highball glass. Add orange juice to taste and serve.

name: Boston Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Golden Slipper
preparation: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

name: Clover Club Royal
preparation: Shake well and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Pink Elephant
preparation: Pour grenadine into a brandy snifter and swirl so that it coats most of the surface of the glass. Pour out the grenadine briskly and add gin.

name: Royal Clover Club Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Clover Club Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bachelor's Bait
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: USD Sunset
preparation: This drink can be made with ice but it looks a lot better without it. I recommend just using chilled soda. Add rum first then soda then a few dashes of grenadine. Don't stir.

name: Golden Shower #2
preparation: Combine the three ingredients in a single shot glass stir and serve.

name: Jell-o Jiggler Shots
preparation: Mix jell-o and unflavored gellatin in a bowl. Add the boiling water. Wait a few minutes to cool and add vodka. Pour into a pan and refrigerate until solidified. Cut into squares and enjoy!

name: Pink Flamingo #3
preparation: Combine lemonade sprite grenadine simple syrup and ice in a blender (should end up looking like a pink slush). Pour into a pina-colada glass. Add the rums and serve.

name: Mango Jello Shots
preparation: Follow the directions on the jello box with 1 exception. Mix the rum and mango nectar together and substitute this mixture for the cup of cold water indicated in the recipe. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Spiced Cherry Jello
preparation: Boil one cup of water. Add the package of cherry jello. Stir for 2 minutes. Then pour in the cup of spiced rum. Stir until mixed. Pour into a pan and refrigerate.

name: Green Eyed Jello Shots
preparation: You can do this in 2-oz plastic cups. Combine hot water and jello until dissolved. Mix together cold water pineapple juice Seagrams 102 proof Vodka into the jello mix and stir. Slowly add the wine cooler in to mix. Place one pineapple chunk in each 2oz plastic cup and fill each one with the jello mix. Place lids on them and put in fridge until set or over night. ENJOY!

name: Alaskan Oil Slick
preparation: Layer blue curacao on bottom peppermint schnapps in the middle and Jager on top.

name: Oil Spill #3
preparation: Pour the schnapps and curacao into a shot glass. Carefully layer Jagermeister on top of drink and serve.

name: Oil Slick #2
preparation: Pour the creme de menthe into a shot glass. Using a teaspoon carefully float the black sambuca on top. Shoot.

name: Smurf Cocktail
preparation: Take the vodka in first then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.

name: Apple Rouge
preparation: Pour both the Dubonnet wine and the Applejack brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jersey Lightning
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bentley
preparation: Stir apple brandy and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Block and Fall
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jack's Apple
preparation: Put apple brandy cider and honey in a small saucepan and heat stirring until the honey dissolves. Pour immediately into a pre-warmed mug. Sprinkle ground cinammon and nutmeg on top. Garnish with a slice of baked apple.

name: Jack-In-The-Box
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lugger
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apple Toddy
preparation: Place the baked apple sugar and applejack into a glass or mug. Fill the glass two-thirds full with boiling water and grate a little nutmeg on top.

name: Le 333
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne flute three-quarters filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon a cherry and a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Special Rough Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Honeymoon Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Marilyn Monroe
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve with two cherries on a stick.

name: Calvados Cream
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Applejack Manhattan
preparation: Pour the Applejack brandy vermouth and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: A. J.
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Saucy Sue Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ante
preparation: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Friar Tuck #2
preparation: Pour the Frangelico brandy lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Applejack Daisy
preparation: Pour Applejack brandy lime juice grenadine and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Soother Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apollo 1
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass

name: Deauville Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lack Affection
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple or twist of peel and serve.

name: Jack Rose
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Duke of Cornwall
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Diki-Diki
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fallen Leaves
preparation: Stir together in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Much Fuss for the Conquering Hero
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy juices and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frisco Cocktail
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Blessed Event
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Depth Bomb
preparation: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glassh half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Apple Dubonnet
preparation: Pour the apple brandy and Dubonnet into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Scrappy Snack
preparation: Shake up with ice pour into shot glass.

name: Mango Chimp
preparation: Pour mango juice and milk into a highball glass. Stir add rum and serve.

name: Malibu Jane
preparation: In a mason jar pour in the coconut rum. Add milk three teaspoons of cocoa powder and let stand for one minute.

name: Iced Tea and Malibu
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Junior Mints
preparation: Start with the milk fill the shot glass 1/4 of the way through then add the Malibu Rumpleminze (It is important not to overdo the Rumpleminze. Err on the side of less than 1/4 if anything.) and top it off with Frangelico. This will taste like the chocolate minty goodness we grew up with.

name: Ice Shot
preparation: Chill the ingredients then mix in a highball glass and sprinkle some ground cinnamon on top if desired.

name: Scooby Doo
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Duck
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Soho Twist
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet add a spiral of lemon short straws and serve.

name: Wild Island
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Cinnamon Road
preparation: Shake with ice. Serve with a slice of dried apple.

name: Turkey Feather
preparation: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add a slice of orange and serve.

name: California Rattle Snake
preparation: Mix equal parts of Southern Comfort Malibu Rum an Amaretto in a mixing tin over ice. Add a splash or sour mix grenadine and 7-up. Shake well. Can be served over ice or as a shot.

name: Fury
preparation: In a whiskey glass with ice add equal parts vodka and spiced rum a splash of sour mix then top off with orange juice.

name: Malibu Summer Splash
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Green and Horny
preparation: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Horny Schoolgirl
preparation: Pour ingredients over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Horny Kermit
preparation: Pour Midori melon liqueur and Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a shot glass and stir. Layer the Irish cream on top and serve.

name: Horny Girlscout
preparation: Chill ingredients. Add the coffee liqueur to a shot glass first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.

name: Mohican
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with a straight line of grated chocolate.

name: Pisang Pistace
preparation: Shake well with five or six ice cubes and serve in a cocktail glass with two ice cubes.

name: Mounds
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice add rum creme de cacao and fill with cream.

name: Almond Joy #2
preparation: Fill mixing glass with ice add Malibu amaretto creme de cacao and cream. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Chocolate Squirrel
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over iceshake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Iceberg In Radioactive Water #2
preparation: Add ice-cream last. Enjoy!

name: Iraqi Car Bomb
preparation: Pour 3/4 pint of Dos Equis Amber into a beer mug. Drop one shot in shot glass of Aftershock into the beer mug then chug until glass is empty.

name: One Exciting Night
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Riley's Sparrow
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Metal
preparation: Pour over ice cubes in a whiskey sour glass. Stir and serve.

name: Yuppidoo
preparation: Shake all on ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: African Lullaby
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup crushed ice. Pour into a beer pilsner garnish with a red cherry and serve.

name: Grandes Smoothie
preparation: Put ice cream banana strawberries and strawberry syrup in a blender. Blend until consistency of a smoothie. Add vodka and blend again. Serve in regular drinking glass.

name: Nightwalker
preparation: Put high-quality instant coffee into a blender and dissolve it using a minimal amount of boiling water. Add whole milk and vanilla ice cream (with chocolate chips where possible). Blend it all together. Add Amarula and stir well. Pour into a hurricane glass and freeze it for about 15-20 minutes. Garnish with whipped cream on top.

name: Bottom Bouncer
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
preparation: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: The Whole Maryann
preparation: Layer over ice and serve.

name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
preparation: Juice cantaloupe pour juice into blender add banana and liquify.

name: Apple Berry Smoothie
preparation: Combine berries and sliced apples in a blender blend and pour into suitable glasses.

name: Rollercoaster
preparation: Pour into a cocktail glass glass with ice shake vigourously and serve.

name: South Beach Fusion
preparation: Wet rim of margarita glass. Dip thoroughly in sea salt. Pour in chilled mango juice. Pour in rum & then mix. Garnish with kiwi wedge. Place palm tree leaf standing upright in glass. [decoration do not eat.]

name: Five Green Brothers
preparation: Pour the Bacardi 151 blue curacao and Malibu rum into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with mountain dew to taste. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Cara Sposa
preparation: Rim a double-cocktail glass with lemon and sugar. Blend orange curacao kahlua and cream with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Aperol Sour
preparation: Shake well over ice in a shaker. Strain into a sour glass and serve.

name: Simply Exquisite
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass.

name: Tangerine Dream
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

name: Beautiful Side Ride
preparation: Pour the cognac Grand Marnier and triple sec into a highball glass in that order. Add sweet and sour mix and Sprite (or 7-Up) lemon-lime soda both to taste. Serve.

name: Side Kick
preparation: Shake all ingredients with lot's of ice.

name: Port Side
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: South Coast Cocktail
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice. Stir gently and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Menage A Trois
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Egg Nog - Kahlua
preparation: Mix kahlua with eggnog in a wine glass and then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Charger
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Entwistle's Error
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Viva Villa #2
preparation: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime wedge and dip into sugar in a saucer or flat bowl; discard lime. Pour the tequila and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Moon Quake Shake
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jonesey
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum and creme de cacao. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sue Riding High
preparation: Pour the dark rum dark creme de cacao and hot chocolate (room temperature) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cream into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Angel's Tip
preparation: Layer in a cordial glass cream on top.

name: Jack Roberts' Treat
preparation: Pour the hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Add the brandy and creme de cacao and stir. Float the cream on top and serve.

name: Communicator
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Anna's Banana
preparation: Peel and slice the banana; add to blender. Add vodka lime juice and honey (or substitute almond syrup). Add cracked ice and blend on medium speed for 15 seconds. Pour into a chilled white wine glass garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Anna's Tropical Getaway
preparation: Pour Malibu rum over ice in a collins glass. Add Captain Morgan's spiced rum and fill with orange soda. Stir ingredients together garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Shanghai
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dr. Rum
preparation: Build ingredients in above order in a shot glass and slam.

name: Dr. Beer
preparation: Slowly pour the beer into the mug as to not make a head. Pour the Dr. Pepper in over a black & tan spoon (concave side of spoon down). Serve.

name: Caribbean Punch
preparation: Mix in shaker top with grated nutmeg.

name: Squire Racine
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a coffee mug stir and serve.

name: White Tiger's Milk
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher and whisk. Chill and serve dusted with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Port Milk Punch
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Lake Chatuge
preparation: Pour the rum and cranberry juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Apple Comfort
preparation: Add ingredients to a heatproof cup.

name: Frozen Southern Comfort
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass.

name: Comfortable Brother
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Southern Dream
preparation: Pour southern comfort into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Carefully drop the schnapps on top.

name: Fiestafied
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort peach liqueur over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur and lime syrup. Top with lemonade stir and serve.

name: Watermelon Shooter #5
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass 1/4 of the way full with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into a rocks glass.

name: Creamy Comfort
preparation: Pour over ice.

name: Viscous Robert
preparation: Pour bitters over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and swirl in a dash of southern comfort. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel an umbrella and serve.

name: Passionate Kiss
preparation: Pour liquors into a mixing glass over ice. Fill with pineapple juice stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Decorate with a flag and serve.

name: Bubblegum Shaker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Comfort Dry Manhattan
preparation: Combine Vermouth Southern Comfort and ice in a glass and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Southern Sparkler
preparation: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).

name: Sneaky Pete
preparation: Pour kahlua over ice. Add milk and rye whiskey stir and serve.

name: Johnny on the Beach
preparation: Mix over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Johnny K8
preparation: Pour the first 3 ingredients into a shaker and shake. Pour over ice and top up with tonic. Layer with blue curacao.

name: Johnny Bravo
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka peach schnapps DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and blue curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and serve.

name: Golden Daze
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: More Sunshine
preparation: Stir the gin and creme de cassis together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice stir again and serve.

name: The Bronx Ain't So Sweet
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hula Hula
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: D.O.M. Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Jamaica Fever
preparation: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker and pour into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add a pineapple chunk and a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Rock-and-Rye Toddy
preparation: Pour rock and rye and bitters into a coffee mug. Add lemon slice boiling water and cinnamon stick. Stir sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Dot's Hot Spot
preparation: Heat gently in a small saucepan strain into a heat-proof cup and serve.

name: Chai Toddy
preparation: Stir all ingredients in a mug and serve steaming hot. Garnish with a peppermint stick.

name: Red Mouth
preparation: Heat in a heat-resistant glass or cup.

name: Red Rudolph
preparation: Heat and pour into an irish coffee cup. Top with whipped cream garnish with a tall cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Danish Toddy
preparation: Pour into a heat-proof cup and serve immediately.

name: Canadian Cocoa
preparation: Heat milk in a small saucepan. When simmering add remaining ingredients. Allow syrup to dissolve and pour into a heat-proof glass.

name: Jean Gabin
preparation: Heat rum calvados and syrup in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Fill with hot milk sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Dreamy Winter
preparation: Pour hot chocolate into a heatproof cup. Add irish cream to taste. Stir and serve.

name: Hot Scotch
preparation: Pour butterscotch schnapps (buttershots) into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Hot Gin
preparation: Pour into a heat-proof goblet and serve.

name: Goldie
preparation: Heat in a heat-resistant glass add orange peel and serve.

name: Vruica Rakia
preparation: Heat in a small saucepan dissolving sugar. Serve in a heat-proof cup when hot.

name: Hot Frenchman
preparation: Heat well in a heat-resistant glass or cup. Stir add twists of lemon and orange peel and serve.

name: Gin Toddy
preparation: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: French Daiquiri
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Charles's Daiquiri
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Rum
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Panama
preparation: Shake ingredients well and serve over ice.

name: Jo Jo Superspy
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake briskly. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Colonial Rummer
preparation: Add crushed ice halfway up the glass. Add liquor ingredients. Stir with swizzle stick. Garnish with fruit. Relax and sip.

name: Jo Jo
preparation: Stir with a butter knife.

name: Heat Wave #2
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec and soda water into an Irish coffee cup or mug. Add a drop of lemon juice and fill with hot water. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a stick of cinnamon and serve.

name: Myrtle Bank Punch
preparation: Pour the dark rum grenadine lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with cherry brandy. Garnish with slice of lime and serve.

name: Aunt Frances' Lemonade
preparation: Squeeze the juice from 4 of the lemons limes and oranges; pour into a gallon container. Thinly slice the remaining fruit and set aside for garnish. Add water and sugar to juices; mix well. Store in the refrigerator. Serve on ice with fruit slices.

name: Aunt B's Snakebite
preparation: Measure ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake until Frothy. Pour and enjoy.

name: Chinese Cocktail #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Angel's Tit
preparation: Pour ingredients into glass in order given carefully so each layer floats on top of the previous one with mixing. Chill for 1/2 hour before serving.

name: Angel's Fall
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Peach Treat
preparation: Shake brandy and orange juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Top with chilled champagne add the peach slice and serve.

name: Visitor's Treat
preparation: Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fruits of the Desert
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Cabana Club
preparation: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Country Club Cooler
preparation: Pour grenadine and carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and dry vermouth. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Jockey Club
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Breakfast Rum
preparation: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients shake and pour back into glass.

name: Rum Dubonnet
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Club Tropix
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice add malibu and blue curacao and a splash of triple sec. Fill remainder of glass with equal parts of pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

name: Blue Grass Cocktail
preparation: Pour the bourbon pineapple juice lemon juice and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Club Paradise
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender at low speed until smooth. Pour into a snifter and garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg and a slice of banana.

name: Canadian Breeze
preparation: Pour the whisky pineapple juice lemon juice and maraschino liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Club Med
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass.

name: Dubonnet Manhattan
preparation: Pour whiskey Dubonnet Rouge and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Whiskey Manhattan
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Plaza Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Eastern Manhattan
preparation: Stir with ice to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: The Irresistible Manhattan
preparation: Combine the ingredients in a small pitcher and add 1 tsp of juice from your jar of maraschino cherries. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry or slice of orange.

name: Astrids Adoration
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Layer cherry syrup on top.

name: Excalibur
preparation: Mix ingredients in a blender and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with redcurrants chocolate flakes and a mint leaf.

name: Lady L
preparation: Shake with 7-up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice. Color the top with a splash of cherry syrup and add a cherry for garnish.

name: Australian Virgin
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and serve with a cherry.

name: Godiva's Bush
preparation: Shake the white and dark Godiva and the Bushmills cream with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Get a clean martini glass and a drop of the maraschino syrup to the bottom. Strain the cold mixture from the shaker into cocktail glass.

name: Mr. P
preparation: In a cocktail glass add cherry flavouring cherry juice vodka and fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew and garnish with a piece of pineapple.

name: Gay Mountie
preparation: Pour the Canadian whisky over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Add the sweet vermouth amaretto and Yukon Jack. Top with a cherry stir and serve.

name: Riley
preparation: Shake first six ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a dash of raspberry syrup garnish with a lime slice and serve.

name: Lebanese Snow
preparation: Blend ingredients in a blender with one cup of ice until smooth. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Punch a la Washington Hotel
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: Fruit a La La
preparation: Put all together in blender and blend until smooth.

name: Gull's Wing
preparation: Pour tequila creme de bananes and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Bourbon a la Creme
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey and brown creme de cacao over the vanilla bean in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a glass without ice and chill in the refrigerator for at least one hour. Pour into a white wine glass stir well and serve.

name: Do the Pink the Pink Elephant
preparation: Over ice in hurricane glass add vodka and gin. Add soda to taste (less if you want a sweeter drink) then top up with cream soda. Mix gently with stirrer or the bottom will stomp you. (which is where the elephant comes in.)

name: The Valentine
preparation: Mix ingredients in a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Old Groaner's Wife
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky amaretto and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Red Horn
preparation: Mix together or float redrum on top. Serve cold in a beer pilsner.

name: Mexican Wife Beater
preparation: Pour the lemon juice gold tequila and triple into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a beer glass. Fill glass with Stella Artois lager and serve.

name: Regatta
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Bob's Moscow Mule
preparation: Using a chilled cooper mug fill with ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.

name: Moscow Bobsled
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Twisted Cola Blast
preparation: 4 oz XS Energy Drink - Cola 1/2 oz Electric Lemon Concentrate 1 shot Vodka

name: Kentucky Mule
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add bourbon fill with ginger beer and a splash of lime juice. Stir and drink!

name: Schoko Royal
preparation: Mix well in a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Pour into a cocktail glass sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: MagFest Mule
preparation: Mix equal amounts of each ingredient and pour into test tube chill before serving.

name: Peachy Keen
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail shaker 1/4-filled with crushed ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bambus
preparation: Pour ingredients into a red wine glass and serve.

name: Vernal Equinox
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Lady's Punsch
preparation: Pour red wine and blue curacao in a punsch glass and fill up with boiling water. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Broken Spur Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Balanchine's Belle
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet wine and the dry vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Jumanji
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker add ice and shake well. Pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish with fresh fruit.

name: Devil Cocktail
preparation: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bitter Sweet
preparation: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of orange and serve.

name: Chowning's Tavern Wine Cooler
preparation: This makes a colorful as well as refreshing drink if the liquids are not mixed together. Pour the lemonade over crushed ice then add the red wine. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a maraschino cherry. Good for hot days.

name: Lamasina
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a red wine glass and serve.

name: Appetizer
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet and orange juice into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Apothecary
preparation: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Duchess
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wicked Willy
preparation: Pour into a frosted wine glass and serve.

name: Bittersweet Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth and the orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Dawn Chorus

The drink of choice by the New Zealand firefighters when off duty. 1 drink = wow. 2 drinks = jesus christ!! 3 drinks = I'll fight any one. 4 drinks = someone call the paramedics.

name: Absinthe Czech Ritual
preparation: Pour 3/4 of a full shot of absinthe in a sundae glass. put a brown sugar cube on a spoon with holes in it and rest it on the rim of the sundae glass. Pour the remaining 1/4 of the shot of absinthe onto the brown sugar cube light the brown sugar on fire (put the flame under the spoon). Let the flame burn for a minute while the brown sugar drips into the glass and caramelizes. stir the caramelized sugar into the glass. Add the water to the glass stir again. and serve.

name: Lusty Leopard Martini
preparation: Thoroughly chill a martini glass then apply small leopard spots randomly around the inside of the glass using chocolate shell syrup then returning the glass to the freezer to keep cold. (This can be done hours in advance for parties.) In a cocktail shaker filled with ice combine the vodka Malibu rum mango nectar and candy syrup. Shake well until the shaker is too cold to hold. Strain the contents into the prepared glass with spots. What you now have created is a martini with the appearance of leopard hide having the look of deep tawny orange and dark brown spots. Serve and enjoy.

name: Hot Afternoon
preparation: Add ingredients to a shot glass and drink.

name: Wookie
preparation: Mix schnapps and amaretto in a shot glass. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Green Legunes
preparation: Take shot glass and pour in this order: 1) Peach Schnapps 2) Baileys 3) At last pour few drops of Creme De Menthe on the layer of baileys.

name: Flaming Orchard
preparation: 1. Place a 1-oz shot glass on a saucer then fill the glass with equal amount of peach schnapps and Midori melon liqueur. Across the rim of the glass place a slice of lime and sprinkle with caster sugar. Pour sambuca over the lime so it flows onto the saucer. Ignite the lime and the liquor on the saucer. 2. To drink either wait till the flame goes out or blow it out if you could. Drink from the shot glass pour the liquor on the saucer into the glass drink then suck on the lime.

name: Jello-Shot Supreme
preparation: Bring water to a boil. Mix with a large package of black cherry jello. Then add peachtree schnapps mix well. Pour into small plastic shots or 2 oz. containers. Chill and enjoy.

name: Peach Tart
preparation: Shake and serve in a shot glass.

name: Peach Picnic
preparation: Pour into a shot glass.

name: Tachyon

name: Gala Margarita

name: Circus Peanut Margarita
preparation: Mix well in a blender with ice and serve in a highball glass that has been rimmed with jimmies. Garnish with a day-glo orange circus peanut.

name: Ten More Minutes
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with/without ice as desired. Blend until smooth. Coat the rim of an old-fashioned glass with sugar and garnish with a slice of citrus fruit. Pour mixture from blender into glass and serve. Should serve two or three.

name: Juan More
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-full of th ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dreamsicle Delight
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice stir well and serve.

name: Sax With T.
preparation: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.

name: Crash Landing
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Brooklyn
preparation: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Puerto Rican on Crack in Brooklyn
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass mix and serve.

name: Georgia Skank
preparation: Serve in a frosted and/or on the rocks in a highball glass. Pour liquor over the ice and fill with Sour. Add a splash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry.

name: Alligator Piss
preparation: Shake strain into glass.

name: Low Lattitude Lust
preparation: In a mixing tin combine the vodka southern comfort and pineapple juice. Add the cherry juice from a jar of maraschino cherries. Shake well and pour over crushed or cubed ice.

name: Ozone
preparation: Add amaretto a splash of beer and sweet and sour mix to an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Top with sprite stir lightly and serve.

name: Hawaiian Fire Water
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass 1/2 of the way with ice. Then add the gin triple sec peach schnapps and finally fill the remaining space with any tropical flavor sparkling water (IE: Tropical Lime Tangerine Lime Citrus . . . ). Gently stir. Finally add a dash of grenadine. The grenadine will sink to the bottom and add a cool color to the drink. ENJOY!!

name: Pink Pleasures
preparation: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend with 2 cups of ice. Serve in a martini glass with a sugared rim and a lemon twist.

name: 12 Gauge Shottie
preparation: Drink the Corona lager down to the neck (where the bottle curves inwards). Fill up the neck with Bacardi Limon rum. Put your finger over the bottle and shake. Enjoy.

name: Red Beer
preparation: Add tomato juice to a regular pint of lager and serve.

name: Egg Nog - Williamsburg
preparation: Separate the eggs (yolk and white) Set the white aside. Mix yolks well gradually adding the cream milk and sugar. Get back to the egg white - WHIP IT (whip it good!) until soft peaks form. Fold the white into the rest. Gradually add the alcohol. Either add nutmeg right away or sprinkle on top later. AGE for at least 2 hours in refridgerator uncovered.

name: Breakfast Eggnog
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Egg Nog #2
preparation: Separate 6 eggs. Beat yolks well. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Clean/degrease beaters and bowl. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Beat in 1/2 cup sugar. Fold in yolks to whites. Gently stir in 1 pt heavy cream 1 pt milk 1 pt bourbon and 1 oz rum. Serve as is or well chilled. Double recipe to fill a punch bowl.

name: Holiday Egg Nogg
preparation: Mix ingredients in a punch bowl until sugar dissolves. Chill for five hours mix and sprinkle with grated nutmeg. Serve.

name: Eggnog - Spiked
preparation: Separate the eggs. In an electric mixer beat the egg yolks with the sugar until thick and lemon colored. Slowly add the bourbon and cognac while beating at slow speed. Chill several hours. Add the salt to the egg whites and beat until almost stiff or until the beaten whites form a peak that bends slightly. Whip the cream until stiff. Fold the whipped cream into the yolk mixture then fold in the beaten egg whites. Chill one hour. When ready to serve sprinkle the top with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Montezuma
preparation: Blend ingredients briefly with half a cup of crushed ice in a blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Sherry Eggnog
preparation: Shake sherry powdered sugar and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Kanaan
preparation: Prepare in a blender with a little ice pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Golden Blizzard
preparation: Add the shots of goldschlager and peppermint schnapps to a mason jar then fill with eggnog.

name: Schlag-n-nog
preparation: Add the egg nog and Goldschlager together in a bowl. Add nutmeg if desired.

name: Healthy Eggnog
preparation: Whip egg substitute and sugar together combine with the two kinds of milk vanilla and rum. Mix well. Chill overnight. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Serves 4-6.

name: Snowboard
preparation: Mix everything togeather in the glass and make sure that the ice is crushed. The best is if the ice is like slush. You can also serve the drink with a slice of kiwi.

name: Butterscotch Eggnog
preparation: Pour the schnapps into a cocktail glass. Add eggnog sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Maker's Mark Bourbon Eggnog
preparation: Separate eggs and beat yolks until creamy. Whip sugar into yolks. Beat whites until they stand in peaks adding 1/2 cup additional sugar if desired. Beat yolks and Maker's Mark together add whites. Beat cream. Add cream and milk to mixture. Add nutmeg to taste and garnish each cup with nutmeg. Makes 2 1/2 gallons.

name: Egg Nog - Healthy
preparation: Whip egg substitute and sugar together combine with the two kinds of milk vanilla and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

name: Egg Nog #3
preparation: Separate eggs and refrigerate the whites. Beat ylks until light in color. Gradually beat in sugar then slowly beat in 1 cup of rum. Let stand covered for atleast 1 hr. Add rest of liquor cream and peack brandy beating constantly. Refrigerate covered for 3 hours. Beat egg whites until stiff fold in. Serve sprinkled with nutmeg. Serve in a punch bowl or another medium sized bowl.

name: Ambassador's Punch
preparation: Whisk together the eggnog brandy rum and creme de cacao together in a large punch bowl. Add a large block of ice. Grate a little nutmeg over the top of each drink when serving. Makes 8 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Egg Nog - Katie's
preparation: Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon yellow then beat in 1 cup sugar. Add slowly the rye rum and peach liquer. Beat until smooth. Add the milk and half-and-half. Beat the egg whites until stiff but not dry gradually adding 1/2 cup of confectioners sugar. Fold the egg whites into the batter. Just before serving whip the cream and fold it into the other ingredients. Garnish with ground nutmeg. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl.

name: Banana Eggnog
preparation: Beat together banana egg and sugar until well blended and smooth. Add milk and maple syrup and beat until combined. Pour into chilled glasses. This has a very delicate banana flavor.

name: Jagnog
preparation: Mix in a punchbowl or make individual drinks.

name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog
