preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Good Morning Eggnog
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Dance With A Dream Cocktail
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fontainebleau Special
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Caribbean
preparation: Fill a glass with crushed ice add rum and triple sec. Add juice and stir.

name: Ginger NoHenry
preparation: Stir ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Holy Doodle
preparation: Add ingredients stir and serve.

name: Matty's Magic Mixture
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mug and stir until fizzy.

name: Banana in Beer
preparation: Fill a beer mug with beer peel a banana and throw it into the beer mug. Voila banana in beer. While you're at it you might as well throw in an ice cube just to make it look better.

name: Banana Slush Punch
preparation: 1. Blend the bananas with 2 cups of water in a blender. Set aside. 2. Pour remaining water kool-aid sugar and fruit juices (all except for the ginger ale) into a large punch bowl. Add the banana-mash and freeze for at least 24 hours. 3. Before serving add the ginger ale and chip the frosted mixture until slushy. Leave for 1 - 3 hours to thaw.

name: Flirting with the Sandpiper
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Morning with the Leprechauns
preparation: Pour the Bailey's irish whiskey cherry brandy and coffee into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Lying with the Tigress
preparation: Pour the vermouth rum sweetened lime juice and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Clousseau
preparation: Mix vodka and kahlua in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Copperhead
preparation: Combine in an ice cube-filled collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Frisky Steve
preparation: Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.

name: Flashback
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dawn's Early Light
preparation: Fill a pint glass 3/4 with lager and gently fill to the top with the stout. Serve.

name: Blinding Light
preparation: Pour into shot glass and stir with spoon before quickly downing the whole thing.

name: Fahrenheit 5000
preparation: Cover bottom of shot glass with tabasco sauce and then fill with half firewater and half absolut peppar.

name: Hot Pecker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Pyro
preparation: Mix and pour into a shot glass. Ignite extinguish and serve.

name: Mogul Masher
preparation: Mix hot chocolate as per usual (in a 12 oz. glass or larger) and add liquors. Top with whipped cream.

name: Stiletto
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes stir and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for blended whiskey if preferred.)

name: Moon Drops
preparation: Pour into a wine glass and serve with two melon balls.

name: Full House
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps Kahlua coffee liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a 10-12 oz highball glass. Fill with 7-up. Stir and serve.

name: Moon River
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Add the curacao streaked across the top.

name: Fenarie
preparation: Add Amaretto and top with Rose's Green Apple Mix. Add one scoop of sherbet preferably lime sherbet.

name: Mom's Apple Pie
preparation: Pour apple schnapps over ice in a brandy snifter and float hot damn on top.

name: Italian Sombrero
preparation: Shake amaretto and cream well pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Almond Cooler
preparation: Blend all except ice for 10-15 seconds. Add the ice cubes and blend for another 10 seconds to break up the ice cubes slightly. Serve in a Poco Grande or Hurricane glass garnished with a slice of orange and a Marichino cherry.

name: Jay Leno
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Irish Pride
preparation: Layer in a highball glass and mix.

name: Bronx Cheer
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and add the soda. Stir gently and garnish with some fresh raspberries and an orange peel.

name: Austrian Hussar
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy into a highball glass. Fill with tonic water garnish with a twist or spiral of lemon peel and serve.

name: Indycar
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Winter Wine
preparation: Heat in a small saucepan and pour into heat-proof cups just before boiling. Add a slice of lemon to each cup and serve.

name: R.B. Winter
preparation: Pour southern comfort and amaretto into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with apple juice and shake briefly. Add a splash of lime juice and serve.

name: Gail's Winter Storm
preparation: Mix ingredients in a tall glass over ice stir and enjoy.

name: Creamsicle
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes stir and serve.

name: Melvin
preparation: Pour equal portions (1/3 oz for a shot or 1 oz each for a real sized drink) into a shaker with ice and shake for about 10 seconds. Strain into a shotglass or rocks glass (depending on size) and serve. Drink when served. Easiest way to order in a bar is to say Amaretto Crown Royal Southern Comfort equal parts chilled

name: Closure
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake gently strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Chip
preparation: Half fill a shaker with ice. Add liqueurs and top with milk. Shake and pour over ice.

name: Nog De Cacao
preparation: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cocoa and serve.

name: Cricket
preparation: Combine ingredients in an ice-filled shaker. Shake well strain into old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Jaffa #2
preparation: Combine creme de cacao and Triple Sec in a cocktail glass. Stir well and drop in the piece of choclate. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Coconut Dream
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Slamdancer
preparation: Pour the creme de cacao Kahlua peppermint schnapps and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orgasm #5
preparation: Pour the vodka amaretto Kahlua coffee liqueur and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Ferrari
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass and serve.

name: Manhasset
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Italian Samurai
preparation: Fill glass halfway with ice. Add ingredients. Stir.

name: Bresnan
preparation: Pour vermouth cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lime Fizz
preparation: Pour the Rose's lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda water and serve.

name: Cherry Sling
preparation: Pour brandy and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Tartantula
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the Scotch vermouth and Benedictine. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Seething Jealousy
preparation: Pour the vermouth whisky cherry brandy and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Gael
preparation: Blend briefly in a double-cocktail glass with a tablespoon of crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Green Mist
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi fruit and a mint.

name: Bellamy Scotch Sour
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky orange juice lemon juice honey and angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass garnish with ginger and serve.

name: Aquarius
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky cherry brandy and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Soviet Holiday
preparation: Pour vodka baja rosa and Malibu into a whiskey sour glass. Stir top with fruit punch and serve.

name: Rusty Screw
preparation: Combine scotch and grand marnier in a brandy snifter. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fubar Kool-Aid
preparation: Mix in shaker over cracked ice pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

name: Blue Raspberry Lemonade Kool-aid
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a 5- gallon water cooler putting the water in last and making sure not to go over the 5-gallon mark with the water. Now this will sound weird but is a very effective way to mix this because mixing it by hand just won't work at all. You need a power drill and a dry wall mud mixer. Most of you will have a power drill but if not you can pick both the drill and dry wall mud mixer up at any home improvement store preferably Lowe's as this is where this ideal was born. You will find the dry wall mud mixer in the paint department and you don't need a really big one just one long enough to reach the bottom of the water cooler. Place the dry wall mud mixer in the drill and slowly push in the trigger on the drill. If you go to fast you'll make a mess. Mix for a few minutes then do a taste test. If you think you need more flavor drop in another package of kool-aid and mix up again. Once you are satisfied with the taste put the top on the water cooler get some ice in a cup and drink up!

name: Harm's Way
preparation: Shake all of the ingredients except the grenadine and strain into a collins glass full of ice. Dribble the grenadine over the top give it all a half-stir and enjoy.

name: Vista Way Margarita
preparation: Drambuie splash first burn the liquor with fresh lime. Add ice then add Tres generaciones tequila Gaetano triple sec and stir. Serve in a margarita 10 oz. glass with salt on the rim and serve.

name: Appian Way
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Dandy Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of both lemon and orange peel and serve.

name: Rye Whiskey Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Asskicker
preparation: Pour the four ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake very well. Pour the shaken mixture into a cocktail glass over ice. Serve with a cherry and a orange slice.

name: Tuna on Rye
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Empire Glory
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Byrrh Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Duck Cocktail
preparation: Mix ingredients to taste in a highball glass.

name: Hunter Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Admiral
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Fancy Free
preparation: Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and powdered sugar. Pour the rye whiskey maraschino liqueur orange bitters and Angostura bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into the sugar-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Boulevard
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Firecracker #2
preparation: Pour a 3/4 pint of Bud Light. Pour the 151 into a shot glass with the amaretto layered on top. Light shot on fire sprinkle cinnamon over shot drop still burning shot into beer and serve.

name: Fog Cutter
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.

name: Alexander
preparation: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass.

name: A Splash of Nash
preparation: Drop a shot glass containing banana and melon liqueurs in into a 9 oz highball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Shoot.

name: Blue Temptation
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel a maraschino cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Pimm's Royal
preparation: Pour pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with champagne garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Alaine Cocktail
preparation: Combine the Bacardi Limon rum amaretto and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Viagra Shot
preparation: Blend add ice and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Silver Fizz
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender half-filled with ice. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Silver Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Drew Special
preparation: Pour Sparks Plus into glass and drop in a shot of Jagermeister.

name: Newtron Bomb
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into an old-fashioned glass. Add ginger ale to taste and serve.

name: Dr. Jager
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a cocktail glass; stir and serve.

name: Bloody Jager
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Shagger
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Reservoir Dog
preparation: Mix jagermeister and irish cream over ice cubes strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Spicey Scot
preparation: Add equal parts of liqeuer to hot chocolate or cocoa and top with whipped cream and shave chocolate cinnamon or nutmeg.

name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
preparation: 1. Combine milk chocolate (chopped bittersweet or semi-sweet ) orange peel espresso (instant coffee) and nutmeg in a heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts increase heat and bring just to a boil stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk until frothy. 2. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. 3. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving bring just to boil remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

name: Godchild
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Passion Margarita
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with coarse salt. Garnish with a lime wheel and serve.

name: Doc's Lemonade
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass (lemonade to taste) stir and serve.

name: Cherry Spitfire
preparation: Mix the ingredients and top with the 151 Proof Rum. If it's too strong add 7-Up or Sprite.

name: Fruit Hippy
preparation: Pour the liquor. Fill with juice to taste.

name: Mexican Flag #2
preparation: Line up 3 shot glasses; pour the tequila into the first the grenadine into the second and the last 2 ingredients into the third. Shoot in that order.

name: Moranguito
preparation: Pour the absinthe into a shot glass add the tequila then add the grenadine syrup.

name: The Juice
preparation: Pour into a five gallon pitcher the canister of lemonade water everclear and mix. Serve on ice.

name: Cindy's Cycle
preparation: Mix tequila melon liqueur sweet and sour and grenadine in a tall glass. Blend with ice and serve.

name: Time Killer
preparation: Pour the tequila and beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and stir. Sprinkle the salt on top garnish with lemon wedge and serve.

name: Alamo Splash
preparation: Mix with cracked ice and strain into collins glass.

name: High Voltage
preparation: Shake strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kameleon
preparation: Firstly build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

name: Blister
preparation: Shake and strain into glass.

name: Blackberry Tequila
preparation: Pour tequila creme de cassis and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour contents into a highball glass and serve.

name: Hot Poker
preparation: 1) Pour the 0.5 oz of Absolut Vodka into a shot glass. 2) Top off with the 0.5 oz of Tabasco sauce. 3) Light. 4) Cover with hand to extinguish. 5) Consume.

name: Crater Face
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Red Face
preparation: Pour tequila cranberry liqueur and cranberry juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Marcos
preparation: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in a highball glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice cubes. Pour the tequila and the grapefruit juice into the glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Ethiopian Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients in a punch bowl serve with plenty of ice and garnish with orange slices.

name: The Drink Without A Name
preparation: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Stoned
preparation: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour in jagermeister and pear liqueur. Top with lemon mix and Battery energy drink. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Glo-meister
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Cold Smoke
preparation: Pour the SoBe Lizard Blizzard juice into hurricane glass. Add the Jagermeister; serve unstirred.

name: Dewmeister
preparation: Pour the Mountain Dew in a glass then mix in the Jagermeister. A lot of the Jager will sink to the bottom causing a dark to green effect. Serve over ice.

name: Pink Lover
preparation: Mix the frozen lemonade and vodka first. Then add cherry juice and triple sec. Garnish with a candy cane.

name: Lazy Lover
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.

name: Psycho's Lover
preparation: In a highball glass pour 4 oz. of Bacardi Razz and fill with orange soda.

name: Perfect Margarita #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled salt-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: Buenos Noches
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass full of ice cubes.

name: Short Bus
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass stir and serve.

name: D.O.A.
preparation: Pour liqour in order listed and layer. Serve and shoot

name: Retribution
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Cancun Slammer
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and cover the glass with top of one's hand. Slam shot down on counter top and shoot.

name: Smiler
preparation: Pour tequila lemon juice sugar and port into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Doctor Dawson
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the tequila lemon juice sugar bitters and egg. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

name: Cream Sherry Cobbler
preparation: Add the sugar to an old-fashioned glass. Pour in the club soda and stir to dissolve. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full then add sherry and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry a slice of orange and a slice of lemon and serve.

name: ApriJose Nectar
preparation: Combine ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a fresh lime slice and a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Las Vegas
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve with straws.

name: Hairless Chiahuahua
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Rearbuster
preparation: Pour tequila and kahlua into a highball glass with ice and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and umbrella stir and serve with a straw.

name: Sally Fudpucker
preparation: Pour the tequila and pink grapefuit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon float the galliano on top of the drink and serve.

name: Aztec Surfboard
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Ethnic Sugar
preparation: Mix all ingredients together except for the surge and stir. Fill the rest up with surge and enjoy.

name: Executive Sunrise
preparation: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the creme de cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Peach Panuchi
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Aztec
preparation: Pour ingredients into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Bo's Space Roo
preparation: Pour the tequila into a collins glass. Add the Fanta orange soda into the glass tipped as to not bruise the tequila. Add desired amount of ice. Rim the collins glass with salt beforehand if desired.

name: Bar Bandit
preparation: Add to an ice-filled highball glass and garnish with a cherry and slice of lime.

name: Hpnotiq Margarita
preparation: Pour the Hpnotiq triple sec Jose Cuervo gold tequila and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill to the top with sweet and sour mix and serve.

name: Broken Nose
preparation: Pour the tequila and grenadine into a highball glass. Add advocaat but don't mix properly. Dilute to desired strength with lemonade and serve.

name: Punch in the Stomach
preparation: Fill a collins glass halfway with ice. Add tequila then fill the rest with half sprite half hawaiian punch give it a stir garnish with pineapple slice and enjoy!

name: Border Patrol
preparation: Combine all ingredients except cinnamon in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Sprinkle the top with cinnamon and serve.

name: Guava Gibbons
preparation: Mix Malibu rum and guava juice together in a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Add fresca to taste and serve.

name: Tequila Suave
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Fashion Victim
preparation: Shake all but the Sprite in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over a glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Sprite to taste and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Liquid Jello
preparation: Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.

name: Rosebud
preparation: Shake vodka lime juice and triple in a shaker half-filled with ice and strain over grapefruit juice in an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Lunchbox Lemonade
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass filled with ice cubes (or pre-chill ingredients) stir well and serve.

name: Fun Loving
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: A Tender Touch
preparation: First pour the Rumple Minze into a chilled shot glass. Now carefully add the Tabasco using a spoon. The idea is to form a even layer of Tabasco on the Rumple Minze without actually mixing them. Add the tequila on top and shoot.

name: Love Me Tender
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Add an orange twist and serve.

name: Rosarita
preparation: Layer each ingredient in turn over the back of a spoon in an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with ice. Serve.

name: Charlie's Revenge
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Wild Thing
preparation: Pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Freddy Kreuger
preparation: Pour scotch and tequila into a large shot glass. Add hot sauce morton salt and shoot.

name: Deceiver
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir briefly and serve.

name: Zultry Zoe
preparation: Pour tequila galliano and Mexican hot chocolate (cooled to room temperature) into an Irish coffee cup or glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Sherry Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Quick's Killaritas
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a pitcher. Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass.

name: Bloody O.J.
preparation: Pour ingredients over two crushed ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and decorate with a bloody glove if available.

name: Chicken Drop
preparation: Mix all three in shaker with ice. Pour cold.

name: Moon Inn Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black grape and lime twist and serve.

name: Caribbean Harvest
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: High Moon
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and a half-slice of lemon and serve.

name: Tequila Canyon
preparation: Pour first 3 ingredients over ice into collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juices. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve with a straw.

name: Cherry Screwdriver
preparation: Stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Senegali Sunshine
preparation: Use a thick-skinned california orange peeling the rind very close to the edge. Avoid the white pulp and chop the rind finely. Combine the other ingredients in a blender with the rind and blend until smooth and thick. Pour into 4oz glasses and garnish with orange slices and fresh strawberries.

name: Pacific Dawg
preparation: Use white grape-peach juice from Welch's if you can find it. Mix a 32oz bottle with a 750ml bottle of each rum and serve chilled or over ice. Delicious and gets the job done. Enjoy!

name: Poor Man's Margarita
preparation: Combine all wet ingredients. Squeeze them lime wedge then drop in the glass. Add the pinch of salt

name: Fight Night
preparation: Pour Cognac in first then squeeze the two lime slices in the glass pour the Squirt in then splash the grenadine on top.

name: Cinco de Rob-o
preparation: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila triple sec and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale and stir well.

name: Paralyzer #3
preparation: Mix all ingredients in order as listed in what you would think is a big enough container. Stir well. Can be served chilled on the rocks or as is. Very potent.

name: Colditz
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the cola and serve.

name: Juliet
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry. Serve.

name: Olive in an Olive
preparation: Pour equal parts tequila and sweet vermouth into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the curacao and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and drop in an olive.

name: Strawberry Bandit
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except champagne) briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass. Add champagne garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Aztec Gold
preparation: Ice a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigourously for 12- 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel on the rim. Look for the star shaped film on the surface of the drink!

name: Corcovado
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail glass and fill with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Serve with short straws.

name: Mexican Chocolate
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve with short straws.

name: Mexican Iced Tea
preparation: Pour the tequila and Corono lager into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir gently garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Tequila Exotica
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with fruit add a straw and serve.

name: Myrtle Sunrise
preparation: Shake strawberry liqueur and mango rum in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Add orange soda.

name: Fremango
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bikini Bottom
preparation: Blend all ingredients except for the orange slice with a handful of crushed ice and pour into glass. Place orange slice on the rim.

name: Mancran Cocktail
preparation: Shake or stir with ice cubes. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Southern Blues #2
preparation: Mix Schnapps and Southern Comfort together chill and serve cold. Tastes like Kool Aid.

name: Barrow Blues
preparation: Pour the blue curacao light rum anejo rum pineapple juice and coconut cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nuclear Waste #2
preparation: Shake well and serve in a highball glass.

name: Headless Californian
preparation: Pour vodka into a collins glass and add ice. Dash with bitters. Fill with equal parts ginger ale and orange juice. Decorate with slice of orange and serve.

name: Dutch Disaster
preparation: Layer ingredients in order into a shot glass; Tia Maria coffee liqueur at the bottom Sauza tequila on top. Serve to shoot.

name: Dutch Turbo
preparation: Mix on the rocks. Pour it all over cubed ice. Put a wedge pineapple on the glass. Serve it the way they want it.

name: Green Summer
preparation: Take an ordinary glass and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or coco ribe will work nicely. Then pour in cold/chilled mountain dew and stir. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.

name: High Octane Green Summer
preparation: Pour coconut rum over 3 ice cubes. Add chilled MDX and enjoy!

name: Cool Operator
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender half-filled with ice. Blend until thick. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a melon wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cool Cucumber
preparation: Put a few ice-cubes in a longdrink glass and put a little lemon juice in it. Then cut a cucumber in two halves and cut off a part. Get the seeds out and put it in the glass as well. Shake in a well cooled down bottle of champagne and let the glass stand in the refrigerator for a while. Then it's ready to drink.

name: Cool Carlos
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except curacao) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and float curacao on top. Garnish with pineapple and orange slices and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Sour Patch Kid
preparation: Combine vodka blue curacao grenadine sweet and sour mix and juice from lime juice into a shaker filled with ice. Shake ingredients thoroughly and pour drink and as much ice as desired into a cocktail glass. Enjoy! If you like more sour you can add additional lime juice.

name: Too Cool for School
preparation: Serve ingredients above in a cocktail glass shake beforehand. Or double amounts and serve in a tall glass.

name: Vampire Juice
preparation: Pour coconut rum curacao and bacardi into a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Bloody Vampire
preparation: Pour the spiced rum and Kool-Aid into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a highball glass (incl. ice) and serve.

name: Feliz Navidad
preparation: Mix equal parts gin rumple minze and tequila over ice and shake. Pour into old fashioned glass and serve. Preferably use well liquor as this shot is meant to celebrate yet punish.

name: Floradora
preparation: Build the gin lime juice and raspberry liqueur in a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale garnish with a wedge of lime and an edible flower and serve.

name: Orange Buck
preparation: Shake gin orange juice and lime juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Red Baron
preparation: Carefully layer or float schnapps on top of rumple minze in a shot glass.

name: American Death
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass in the following order; aftershock gold rush rumple minze. Serve.

name: Gold Baron
preparation: Float goldschlager on top of rumple minze and enjoy.

name: BonBon
preparation: Shake & Strain.

name: Rumple Shock
preparation: Pour aftershock into a shot glass. Add rumple minze and serve.

name: Knockout Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and shoot.

name: French Pirate
preparation: Pour orange curacao into a champagne flute add dark rum and fill with champagne (preferably brut).

name: Pirate Margarita
preparation: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Chumbawumba
preparation: Pour a basic snake bite of half cider and lager in a pint glass. Then add to the top a shot of whiskey and vodka. Stir and then drink!

name: Lager and Lime
preparation: Pour the beer in first then add the lime juice. Because the lime juice is heavier than the beer don't let it sit for a long time. For best results use bar lime (out of the nozzle) instead of real lime juice.

name: Juicy Guiness Premier
preparation: Mix in the shots of blue curacao taboo and vodka. Add the guinness to the spirits up to 3cm below the rim of the pint glass. Allow the guinness to settle before adding the carling premier. Allow to settle again before consuming.

name: Beeraquirilla
preparation: Pour into a blender in this order: ice - beer - tequila - rum - daquari mix - margarita mix. Blend until frothy then pour.

name: Dogs Bollocks
preparation: Pour in the vodka first and then proceed to pour the beer on top.

name: Campari Beer
preparation: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

name: Snow White
preparation: Place Sprite/7-Up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.

name: Verno
preparation: Pour into a beer pilsner and serve.

name: Glam Trash
preparation: Fill 3/4 of a shot glass with chilled goldschlager then add 1/4 glass of bud light. Splash grenadine on top for color. Allow the beer to suspend the gold flakes in the glass. Serve immediately.

name: Memachau
preparation: Pour the lager into a beer mug or pint glass. Add kahlua and stir.

name: Flaming Huscroft
preparation: Throw all in a glass and ignite. When flame goes down chug but make sure you have a chaser or you're in trouble.

name: Gin Dog
preparation: Pour over ice in a pint glass and serve.

name: Bin Laden #2
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Flaming Asswipe
preparation: Layer Benedictine Jagermeister then absinthe in a shot glass. Light shot on fire blow it out and slam!

name: Hell's Fairy Bitch
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Abbie's French Kiss
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Serve in a cordial glass or shot glass.

name: Hell
preparation: Starting by pouring the sambuca into an old fashioned glass setting a snifter above it in 60 degrees angle. Pour the chocolate liquer into the snifter above it absinthe lighting it up rolling the glass letting it to hit up the pouring from the snifter into the old fashioned covering it to choke the flames. Serve with a straw.

name: Conqueror
preparation: Build over ice in the glass. Stir well.

name: Cold Porridge
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Marijuana Milkshake
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with some ice. Shake and strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Bavarian Alps #2
preparation: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brain Candy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass. Add a few ice cubes stir well and serve.

name: Steel Vomit
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir and shoot.

name: Angel Delight
preparation: put all ingredients in cocktail shaker shake and pour into martini glass decorate with strawberry

name: Rouge Martini
preparation: Combine the gin and chambord in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Pimpslap
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and consume in one.

name: The Classy Gentlemen
preparation: Mix all three into a double shot glass jagermeister last in equal parts. For added effect require a necktie for all classy gents. This one will put you to bed early.

name: Ninotchka Cocktail
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bacardi Confetti Punch
preparation: In large container mix all but the soda. Chill for 2 hours stirring occasionally. When ready to serve pour over ice in punch bowl add chilled club soda and stir gently. Makes 8 servings.

name: A Sunny Delight
preparation: Using shot glasses or a cannery style mason jar pour the vodka and the triple sec together. Squeeze the lemon lightly and place it on the rim. Fill the glass with sunny delight then add a shot of club soda.

name: Bellinski
preparation: Puree ripe peaches by forcing them through a sieve and spoon into a large chilled wine goblet. Sweeten to taste with maraschino liqueur. Add vodka fill with chilled champagne and serve.

name: Barbados Fondue
preparation: Muddle the lime mango and coconut with the sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add a scoop of ice then the vodka and guava juice. Shake vigorously pour into a chilled tumbler and garnish with half a strawberry. For the peach-infused vodka: Pour your chosen spirit into a four-cup airtight or screw-top container (reserve the empty bottle). Add 3 sliced peaches seal the lid tightly and store in a dark cool dry place for 3-5 days. Gently shake the mixture now and then and check how the flavor is developing. The longer you leave it the stronger it will become. If it becomes too strong dilute it with unflavored spirits until you reach your preferred intensity. When you're done strain the liquid into the original bottle and store in a freezer ready to drink.

name: Georgia Promenade
preparation: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Pour in the Stoli peach vodka lemonade and cranberry juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Pamir Peach
preparation: Pour the Stoli peach vodka (Persik). Amaretto Di Saronno orange juice and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes and serve.

name: Apeach Martini
preparation: Add the first three ingredients into an iced shaker. Shake to the rhythm of your favorite summertime tune. Strain into a cocktail glass and sink the grenadine to the bottom. Gently stir the grenadine up to give the drink a peach color and serve.

name: Gagliardo
preparation: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo Pavia Italy.

name: Strawberry Fetish
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade and soda) and strain into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Add lemonade and soda garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Passionate Strap
preparation: Combine all ingredients together with crushed ice in a blender and blend well. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with an open strawberry pressed onto the edge of the glass and serve.

name: Banana Split #4
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a parfait glass over ice and serve.

name: Boye Sparkle
preparation: Pour champagne into a champagne flute. Add strawberry liqueur and mango juice garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Berrynice
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry on the glass and with another summer berry held on with a toothpick.

name: Cordial Cherry
preparation: Pour amaretto and Coquila liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a wine glass and add Tequila Rose cream liqueur. Sprinkle dark chocolate shavings on top for garnish/ flavor.

name: Scubaronzo
preparation: Pour the coconut rum over ice in a glass. Add the vodka and cranberry juice stir. Add a slice of lime and serve.

name: French Port
preparation: Stir port and cognac in a glass with about three ice cubes. Perfect if your port is too sweet or you aren't up for just cognac.

name: Nicky's Kingpin
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Belfast Bomb
preparation: Pour the Bailey's Irish cream into a shot glass. Add the Hennessy cognac brandy. Drop the shot glass into a half-pint of Guinness lager and chug.

name: Exotic
preparation: Shake the chilled ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain into glass.

name: Flugel
preparation: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!

name: Niagra
preparation: Pour vodka and blue curacao over ice in a highball glass. Top with Red Bull until pale green and serve.

name: Mack Attack
preparation: Fill a shot glass approximately three-quarters full with green chartreuse and the remainder with black sambuca. Add a couple of drops of Tabasco branded pepper sauce and shoot.

name: Zack Attack
preparation: Pour ingredients over lots of ice in a blue-tinted collins glass. Garnish with blueberries and serve.

name: Poor Man's Jungle Juice
preparation: Mix about half of each bottle with 1 gal of fruit punch then add more to adjust taste and how strong it is.

name: Jesus Juice #2
preparation: Be sure to use name brand liquor and juices cheap ingredients can make this sour. Serve cold.

name: Joel
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a Boston fill with ice and shake. Double strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Paris Hilton Cocktail
preparation: Pour vodka over ice cubes or crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Add a splash of UV orange vodka top with mountain dew and serve.

name: Leon Trotsky
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a large shot glass and serve.

name: Flaming Bloody Rectum
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur Stoli vodka and Rose's grenadine into a shot glass in that order. Add a dash of Tabasco sauce or Habanero pepper sauce and serve.

name: Jade Isle
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) in a shaker cup. Strain into a hurricane glass 1/2 filled with chipped ice. Garnish with a cherry and a long straw.

name: Limon Collins
preparation: Stir the Stoli Limonnaya vodka and lemon juice together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Limongrad
preparation: Pour the lemon vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: White Lightning
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a blender. Vary the amount of vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember it must have at least 2 oz. of vodka in order to be called white lightning. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Pink Iguana
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a martini cocktail glass with a thin disk of lime floating in drink and serve.

name: Beach Sunday
preparation: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

name: Larry's Potion
preparation: Pour the Stoli Persik peach vodka and Ketel One into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add Coca-cola orange juice and cranberry juice. Add a splash of lime garnish with 2 lime slices and serve.

name: Fatass
preparation: Pour Stoli raspberry vodka and Bacardi Limon into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Oompa Loompa
preparation: Pour Bacardi Razz raspberry-flavored rum and Stoli Razberi raspberry-flavored vodka into a shot glass in equal parts and serve.

name: Bloodbath
preparation: Strain the Chambord over ice in a wine glass with the red wine. Add cranberry juice to taste and serve.

name: Apples and Oranges
preparation: Stir ingredients together gently in a highball glass and serve.

name: TGV
preparation: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last to a nice blue-green color.

name: Cane Toad
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Add a swizzle stick and serve.

name: Kick in the Nuts
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Got Kicked in the Jimmy
preparation: Combine whiskey's and vodka in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: Get Faced
preparation: Pour contents on ice pour into shaker give one hard shake then pour back into glass serve chilled

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon creme de cacao and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Champagne Punch #3
preparation: Mix well with ice cubes. Add fruit in season. Surround bowl with ice and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Paradise #2
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan and Malibu rum into an ice-filled beer pilsner. Fill the rest of the way with the pine-orange-banana juice and serve. Blend the above together with a banana in a blender for another great tasting drink.

name: Crooked Golf Cart
preparation: Fill glass to top with ice. Pour cranberry juice to about the halfway point. Then pour in amaretto and continue to fill glass to top with cranberry juice. Throw a splash of rum in at the top and stir lightly. Make sure and drink over the lime it adds an awesome flavor!

name: Cherry Coke #2
preparation: Pour the Crown Royal whisky into a shaker filled with a half a cup of ice. Add grenadine and shake thoroughly. Strain into a shot glass and add a splash off coke. Serve.

name: Smurf Juice
preparation: Add all ingredients to a gallon jug mix well and fill the rest with water. Serve in hurricane glasses.

name: Passion Pussy
preparation: Pour the La Grande Passion liqueur grenadine and heavy cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Barney
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Green Cow
preparation: Blend the two ingredients together in roughly equal parts.

name: Dr. Blue
preparation: Put ice in glass if not chilled already. Then add the Blue Maui and fill with the Dr. Pepper.

name: Malayan Gold
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Chapman
preparation: Take the pisang ambon in the glas and then the milk. Then shake it. Enjoy!

name: Swiss Alps
preparation: Shake ingredients together with ice strain and pour into a cocktail glass. For more desired effect: place in chilled glass for silky delicately warm touch with hint of eroticism.

name: Sober Tony
preparation: Pour Bacardi O into glass then fill with 1 can (12 oz.) Mountain Dew chilled. Serve.

name: Pete's Dragon
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large punch bowl and chill. Add fruit slices 30 minutes before serving and enjoy!

name: Flaming Angry Dragon
preparation: Mix together the vodka and Hqnotiq liqueur in a double-shot glass. Layer grenadine over the mixture and the Bailey's over that. Add a splash of Everclear over that and light the shot on fire. Extinguish and serve.

name: Green Dragon
preparation: This is a simple method to get drunk and high in one shot. Take some high quality cannabis leaves hash and put it in a bottle of at least 100 proof liquor. The higher % alcohol and more pot you use the more drunk and high you will be. The thc absorbs into the alcoholic beverage. Shake daily and let it sit for a couple of weeks (go at least 2 weeks or more) then collect the leaves and material out of the beverage with a strainer or cheese cloth. after it's done sitting. Pour it into another bottle or w/e under a cheese cloth just be sure to strain the plant matter out. Keep in mind that if you use 16 grams in a 16 oz bottle thats 1 gram for every 16 oz of liquid. If you do 32 grams in a 16 oz bottle that's 2 grams for every 1 oz. Also remember that the longer you let it sit and the more you shake it the more the thc bonds with the alcohol.

name: T-Bone's Ultimate Bloody Mary
preparation: In a mixing glass 1/2 full of ice combine everything but the vodka and shake 8-10 times. Fill highball glass with ice add vodka then fresh-made Bloody Mary mix on top. Garnish with any or all of the following: celery stalk lime wedge green olives cocktail shrimp cocktail onions. (If you plan on making quite a few of these you may want to keep on hand a shaker full of the dry ingredients combined and a jar of the wet ingredients -- minus the tomato juice -- combined.)

name: June Sparkle
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Ultimate Bloody Mary
preparation: Pour vodka V-8 Worcestershire sauce Tabasco salt black pepper and squeeze lemon wedge into glass; shake. Serve over rocks. Garnish with 4 - 5 olives on a toothpick 1 banana pepper 1 pod pickled okra 1 celery stalk and sprinkle with approx. 1/8 tsp Tony's.

name: Jamaican Party Punch
preparation: Mix all ingredients in large punch bowl or cooler. Works best in five gallon water jug. Fruit can be added as well. Serve over ice.

name: Vi's Jamaican Punch
preparation: Peel and core a pineapple. Take half and chop finely; thinly slice the other half. Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the chopped pineapple light rum anejo rum dark rum pineapple juice orange juice nutmeg cinnamon mace allspice and club soda. Stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with pineapple slices. Makes 35 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Champagne Rum Punch
preparation: Combine the rums wines and juices in a large punch bowl and stir well. Add one large block of ice and garnish with orange slices. Makes 30 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Jamaican Punch
preparation: Fill old fashioned glass with crushed ice. Add one ounce Myer's Jamaican Rum. Fill glass with approximately 3 ounce's of Minute Maid Fruit Punch. Serve with a straw.

name: Aruba Rum Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass and stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Gin Smash
preparation: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir add the orange slice and the cherry and serve.

name: Whiskey Peach Smash
preparation: Muddle all ingredients except whiskey in a bar glass. Add whiskey and shake with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass garnish with a sprig of mint and a peach slice and serve.

name: Brandy Smash
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass muddle the mint sprigs lightly with the sugar and club soda. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Caribbean Barefooted
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a parfait glass filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Kato
preparation: Pour the tea into a hurricane glass over ice. Add the Malibu mango rum stir and serve.

name: Monkey Bite
preparation: Add the Malibu to a 3-oz shot glass with the Red Bull and shoot.

name: Mali-boo
preparation: Pour malibu over ice add one half can of peach fresca.

name: Utar
preparation: Mix in glass and serve.

name: Boston's Green Monster - Mc
preparation: Mix well over ice

name: Murky Water
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Firecrotch
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Rim with lime and serve.

name: Thumb Press
preparation: Add the vodka 151 and Midori forming a nice green shooter. Then tilt in some grenadine to give it some red flare at the bottom -- burn it down!

name: Ankle Breaker
preparation: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Torridora Cocktail
preparation: Shake light rum brandy and cream with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151 proof rum on top and serve.

name: Eat Hot Death
preparation: Find a glass big enough mix find a room with a soft floor and consume very fast. Great initiation drink.

name: Naughty Angel
preparation: Stir.

name: Breath Stealer
preparation: Add chartreuse and Yukon Jack to 151.

name: Emerald Star
preparation: Shake ingredients strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Topher Special
preparation: Fill bottom of glass with tang then add Vodka Stir till most of the tang is dissolved. Fill to 3/4 full with Mountain Dew. Stir again. Fill rest of way.

name: Booger's Booze
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Dew-Driver
preparation: Fill glass w/ice add vodka and mountain dew to taste and serve.

name: Rontini
preparation: Pour together over ice in a glass and serve.

name: Closed Coffin
preparation: Stir in a shot glass and serve.

name: French Green Dragon
preparation: Pour the cognac and green chartreuse into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Midori Champagne
preparation: Stir together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Strain into a champagne glass and serve.

name: Snow Snake
preparation: Larger glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

name: Snow Melt
preparation: Pour Vodka and Amaretto into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate.Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and cherry.

name: Phoebe Snow
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet brandy and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Death Dream
preparation: Mix absinthe with the aftershock then add the pernod and drink straight down stick to 1 to 2 any more in one session and your likely to wake up and not remember a thing.

name: Fairy's Kiss
preparation: Combine absinthe with cola in a glass filled with ice easily the best way to drink absinthe.

name: Absinthe Cocktail
preparation: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Leo the Lion
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: H-Bomb #2
preparation: Fill a highball glass filled with ice cubes half way with Red Bull then fill the other half with Hpnotiq liqueur. Serve.

name: Green Meanie
preparation: Best way to mix this is in a 16 ounce glass. Add your three ingredients 2-3 ice cubes and fill the rest up with lemonade (great for fraternity parties with the 16 oz plastic cups). If you like your drink a little stiffer replace one ounce of lemonade with 1 ounce of Bacardi rum. To make a gallon (for punch) just add 8 ounces of each ingredient (not including rum) and the rest of the gallon is Lemonade.

name: Chucktown Crunk Juice
preparation: Serve in a tall glass without ice.

name: Peppermint Patty
preparation: Keep a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth and squirt chocolate syrup in. Shake head vigorously and swallow.

name: Christmas Cheer
preparation: Stir it up and shoot it down. HO! HO! HO! Tastes like christmas with a pine tree twist.

name: Edward's Purple Medicine
preparation: Pour either ingredient into a shot glass first then slowly pour in the other mixing half and half. Admire the effects then consume.

name: Blue Diamond
preparation: Pour 3/4 shots of each into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Green Ferrit
preparation: Fill 3/4 of a pint glass with cider. Add the blue curacao and fill the glass with cider.

name: Devon Air
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Green Apple Cider
preparation: Add the cider to the liqueur. Serve cold.

name: Schnider
preparation: Pour schnapps in a pint glass top up with cider and serve.

name: Ciderific
preparation: Heat in a small saucepan and strain into a heat-proof glass when hot. Add half a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Baked Apple
preparation: Pour the liqueur into a glass add the cider and serve cold.

name: Purple Nasty
preparation: Pour a couple of centimetres of blackcurrant squash (undiluted) into a pint glass. Add strongbow cider until two-thirds full and fill completely with carling lager.

name: Ask The Barman
preparation: Pour each ingredient slowly down the side of a shot glass in order they will settle nicely layered. Shoot.

name: Marijuana Milkshake
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass (without allowing any curdling) and shoot.

name: Green Hornet Shot
preparation: Layer the McGuinness melon liqueur and Phillips butterscotch schnapps in a shot glass. Add a splash of ginger ale and serve.

name: Red Headed Stepchild
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a chilled whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Cadalac Margarita
preparation: Combine first 3 ingredient into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Platinum Grand Margarita
preparation: Salt the rim of a margarita glass and pour in freshly squeezed lime juice. Add margarita mix tequila grand marnier cointreau triple sec irish mist and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into the margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry if desired.

name: Tequilini
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

name: Casa Noble Margarita
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir.

name: MargaFeni
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Le Margarita des Artistes
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker without ice. Shake well to froth. Strain into a chilled and salted cocktail glass or small margarita glass and serve.

name: Purple Margarita
preparation: Serve on the rocks in a margarita glass. Add salt to taste.

name: Almond Casa Noble
preparation: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice except almond then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

name: Tangerine Margarita
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a salted rim. Serve.

name: Cosmoquila
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain.

name: Mont Blanc
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender for 20 seconds. Pour into a wine glass and serve.

name: B & P
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Great Idea
preparation: Dissolve syrup in juices add champagne and serve.

name: No Problem
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass.

name: My Place or No Place
preparation: Pour the gin creme de cassis and Rose's lime juice into a parfait glass filled with shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Ginger Syllabub
preparation: 1. Put the sherry sugar spices and lemon juice into a large mixing bowl and stir until well-blended. Leave to soak for at least half an hour. 2. Beat the cream until it is stiff. Fold in the chopped ginger. Chill thoroughly. 3. Before serving divide into four serving bowls and top with crumbs of crystallized ginger and a shake of nutmeg.

name: Stout and Black
preparation: Pour Ribena blackcurrant syrup or similar into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add stout and serve.

name: White Out
preparation: Build over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Black Berry Chocolate
preparation: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Bailey's irish cream into a mug. Add hot chocolate and whipped cream garnish with shaved dark chocolate and serve.

name: Sixteen and a Half
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Fuzzy Nuts
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Monk's Martini
preparation: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pancake
preparation: Pour the frangelico into a shot glass. Place a slice of lemon over the glass pour some sugar over the lemon then cover with a dash of Grand Marnier (so the sugar becomes sticky and partially dissolves). Drink then bite the lemon.

name: Frog Nuts
preparation: Put in a cooler and shake it.

name: Hollywood Nuts
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Woodward Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Boyd of the Loch
preparation: Pour vermouth and Scotch into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Piper At Arms
preparation: Combine the scotch and vermouth in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Dirty Sock
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir briefly and serve.

name: L'aird Of Summer Isle
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Algonquin
preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Beadlestone Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Circular Incision
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Americana
preparation: Stir the whiskey the bitters and the sugar in a collins glass until the sugar is dissolved. Fill up with champagne and garnish with a slice of peach.

name: Rock and Rye Cooler
preparation: Shake vodka rock and rye and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: The Admiral's Passion
preparation: Add the Passoa first mix the Sprite & juice separately. Add 3 cubes of ice to top it off. Serve cold.

name: Love Game
preparation: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add batida de coco and then slowly add the passoa. Slowly add the grenadine so it goes under the batida. You should get three layers: red white red. Serve orange juice but let the customer mix it because the colors will mix.

name: Padas Passoa
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well and serve.

name: J-Pop Idol
preparation: Pour the Alize Bleu liqueur down the side of an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Allow it to sit before adding the Gekkaikan sake. Add Sunny Delight orange juice stir and serve.

name: Lizzy Sour
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel and serve.

name: Hazelnut Martini
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Better Than Sex
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur Haagen Dazs cream liqueur Grand Marnier and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Float the cream on top and serve.

name: Nutty Irishman #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Nutty Bartender
preparation: Pour the Merlot and Pinot Grigio and ginger ale (or sprite) into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add Stolichnaya vodka Amaretto Di Saronno liqueur and Alize cognac. Shake gently. Pour into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top off with Grand Marnier orange liqueur and serve.

name: Chilly Irishman
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with 4 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into parfait glasses garnish with clover leafs and serve.

name: The Squat
preparation: Mix ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass. Enjoy!

name: Nutty Angel
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Operator
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add half a slice of lime.

name: Smooth Operator
preparation: Combine all ingredients except 7-Up in blender. Divide into 2 jars. Top with 7-Up stir well.

name: Smooth Sailin'
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl. Freeze in small airtight containers. To serve remove from freezer and let thaw about 10 minutes. Scrape or scoop into stemmed glasses. Serve with straws if desired. Makes 14 six-ounce drinks.

name: Afternoon
preparation: Build into a suiting glass with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

name: One Long Distance Operator
preparation: Pour the Bacardi rum Smirnoff vodka and peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Add Sprite then cranberry juice last. Top with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Two Turtles
preparation: Pour whisky Cointreau and B & B benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Socrates
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Grampa Doogin
preparation: Layer Yukon Jack on the bottom of an old-fashioned glass add the blueberry then the orange juice. Top with cranberry juice.

name: Whisky Martini
preparation: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass with chipped ice.

name: First Degree Burn
preparation: Add the Fireball whiskey to the cranberry juice in a cup. Stir and serve.

name: Gault's Gumption
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky peach schnapps and sweet vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: David Caradine
preparation: Mix in the order: cacao menthe whiskey milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon tilt the glass and pour very gently etc. I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can when pouring the cream/milk rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.

name: Mountie
preparation: Pour whisky and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cowboy's Comet
preparation: Pour rye whiskey over ice then add cola southern comfort and lime.

name: Branding Iron
preparation: Pour the Seagram's VO Canadian whisky into a rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the peach schnapps stir and serve.

name: Major Bradbury
preparation: Pour whisky Grand Marnier and vermouths into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well before straining into a cocktail glass for serving.

name: Quebec Cocktail
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky vermouth Amer Picon and maraschino into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Butter Cream
preparation: Mix butterscotch shnapps with Bailey's irish cream then pour milk over the mixture. Add crushed ice. Let it sit for just a minute to mix well.

name: Cider Cup #2
preparation: blend

name: Champagne Cup #2
preparation: Combine in a large deep bowl surrounded with ice and leave for 1 hour. Stir before serving in champagne glasses.

name: Reisen
preparation: Mix in a small old-fashioned or lowball glass.

name: Danger
preparation: Pour chilled beer and vodka into a beer glass and serve.

name: Stanley's Super Secret Lemonade
preparation: 1 12 oz. can of frozen lemonade concentrate Substitute 1 can (12 oz.) of beer 1/2 can (6 oz. or more to taste) of vodka finsih the mix with water per directions on can.

name: Atomic Submarine
preparation: Fill a beer glass with vodka and fill a shot glass with beer. Drop the shot of beer into the glass of vodka and chug.

name: Russian Boilermaker
preparation: Pour cold beer into a large glass and drop a whole shot glass full of vodka into the beer. Down immediately.

name: Southfork Coffee
preparation: Pour the coffee bourbon and creme de cacao into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Stir well then float the cream on top and serve.

name: Frangelico and Chocolate
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a mug of hot chocolate stir briefly and serve.

name: Nut Buster
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Bust Your Black Nut
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Kamora Coffee Nut
preparation: Add Kamora to your cup of hot coffee. Float a puff of whipped cream on top sprinkle with chopped hazelnuts.

name: Lychee Nut Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Chop Nut
preparation: Shake well and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice.

name: Apple Of My Eye
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and serve in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Corpse Reviver #3
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve with a glass of ice water.

name: Corpse Reviver
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Stinger #2
preparation: Shake with ice strain serve in cocktail glass.

name: Delmonico #2
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Farmer Giles
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin dry vermouth sweet vermouth and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Rosalind Russell
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Everglade
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Flaming Kevin
preparation: Just mix and stir.

name: Danish Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

name: Charlie Shaker
preparation: Add aquavit and Charleston Follies and stir it with ice. Add lime and tonic water. Fresh up with slice of lemon and red cocktail berry.

name: Bloody Beer
preparation: Add equal parts of Beer and Clamato Juice and the two dashes of Tabasco mix them up. Sprinkle with pepper (optional) and serve!

name: The Kristy
preparation: Put all together in a glass and stir. May put ice cubes in after mixed or put in blender to make frozen drink.

name: Mexican Sunset #2
preparation: Pour 16 oz of Corona into a Pilsner glass fill the remaining space with OJ until the color resembles a dusty sunset drink chilled.

name: Cranbeery
preparation: Combine ingredients in a beer mug.

name: Shimmers
preparation: Pour the st. hallvard over ice (on the rocks) in an old-fashioned glass then add aquavit. Add a lemon twist and serve.

name: Guinness Top
preparation: Pull just under 1 pint of Guinness. Pour out some cola into a glass then pour back & foward into another glass repeatedly until flat. Slowly dribble into the Guinness by pouring down the side of glass.

name: Top Banana
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Rebel Rouser
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: East Wing Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Old Country Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka madeira wine and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Mayfair
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Oueureum
preparation: Shake everything with ice; strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel and a cherry.

name: Green Martini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

name: Wysoosler
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin green chartreuse and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Spring Feeling Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Caledonia
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Angie's Sweet Pussy
preparation: Add ingredients to a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Swirl and strain into a large shot glass and serve.

name: Sweet Dream
preparation: Blend all ingredients together in a medium-sized cocktail glass. Top with a dollop of whipped cream sprinkle with chocolate and coconut shavings and serve.

name: Santiago
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: Marionette
preparation: Pour the rum cherry heering apricot brandy and sake into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with cracked ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Hong Kong Fizz
preparation: Dissolve sugar shake and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add soda straws and a muddler and serve.

name: King of Kingston
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hong Kong
preparation: Fill boston shaker with ice. Add bitters sake red vermouth and campari. Stir ingredients until chilled. Strain into a martini glass and flame with either lemon or orange. Garnish with a twist of lemon or orange. Serve.

name: King Cole Cocktail
preparation: Muddle the orange slice pineapple slice and powdered sugar in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the Scotch whisky 2 ice cubes and stir.

name: King Kamehameha
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a margarita glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with one slice of banana and one slice of kiwi and serve.

name: Caribbean Milk
preparation: Shake the milk with the Vanilla add to the shaker the other ingredients and shake well.

name: Firecracker
preparation: Pour ingredients into a Rocks Glass filled with ice.

name: Bahama Breeze
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with 2-3 ice cubes. Pour over ice cubes in a tall glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry and serve.

name: Papaya Sling
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water and pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Flaming Nerd
preparation: Simply pour the ingredients into a double shot shot glass and serve.

name: Borinquen
preparation: Combine ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: The Shadow Knows
preparation: Layer Bailey's over sambuca. Top with Bacardi.

name: Concorde
preparation: Layer ingredients in above order in a shot glass. Light the Bacardi 151 Rum on fire and serve. Drink with a straw or put out the flame before consumption. Either way proceed with caution.

name: Aid Paradise
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass with several ice cubes and serve.

name: Cherry Paradise
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum and Everclear into a cup. Add Cherry Coke and serve.

name: Evening in Paris
preparation: Pour the pineapple juice orange juice lemon juice peach vodka and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 30 seconds. Pour unstrained into a large glass (hurricane or otherwise) and add 7-UP. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Celtic War Party
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a pint glass and serve.

name: Party Death
preparation: Add chilled soda's to a collins glass and add chilled lemon vodka.

name: Tree Shaker
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add short straws and serve.

name: Cherry Tree
preparation: Mix and serve with crushed ice.

name: Christmas Tree Water
preparation: Place one part dry gin into a cocktail glass. Do not bruise the gin! Carefully add two parts sprite. Do not bruise the sprite. Optionally add a dash of cayan pepper for added flavor. Add 3 tablespoons of dry ice for that mystical yet strangely psycho effect.

name: Apricot Tree
