preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: April Rain
preparation: Pour Vodka Vermouth and Rose's lime juice into shaker over ice. Shake with care not to bruise. Strain into chilled cocktail (martini) glass. Garnish with lime peel (zest).

name: Kick Start
preparation: Find someone that you hate order them a Kick Start. Mix 1 oz. of 151 with 3 oz. of very cold orange juice. Mix well. Pour into glass. Hand glass to victim. Be ready to dodge a reversal of fortune.

name: Little Leprechaun
preparation: Pour the Irish whiskey into a shot glass. Add the Goldschlager cinnamon schnapps then the creme de menthe and serve.

name: Roni
preparation: Mix ingredients in a beer mug and serve.

name: Orange Warthog
preparation: Add kool-aid powder (sweetened) southern comfort and coke to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Snowplow
preparation: Mix hot chocolate to taste add booze top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Big Hug
preparation: Pour the irish cream into an Irish coffee cup or glass filled 3/4 with hot chocolate. Add creme de cacao. Add whipped cream and garnish with shaved chocolate on top.

name: Jamaican Juice
preparation: Add 3 ice cubes to a mason jar. Using the exact amounts as above pour the rum and juice into the masor jar and mix.

name: STP
preparation: Add whisky and vodka to glass of ice. Stir in maple syrup. Wait 2 minutes and enjoy.

name: Warsaw Waffle
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass. Stir until syrup is dissolved.

name: The Hague
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Dew
preparation: Combine the two ingredients in a tall glass with/without ice.

name: The Ray-Ray
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in a shot of Tanqueray Gin. Fill the remainder of the glass with Dr. Brown's Cel-Ray Soda. Stir. Garnish with a small sprig of celery if desired.

name: Dick Hard
preparation: Mix all three liquors then fill with sprite. Garnish with lime and serve.

name: Hard Goya
preparation: Mix both alcohols together in a tallg lass. Slowly pour the peach nectar in. Stir and add the lime juice. Serve.

name: Hard Icey Nipple
preparation: Pour the jagermeister Ice 101 peppermint schnapps and chocolate milk into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Bellatrix Ball
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Midnight Lemonade
preparation: Combine berry tattoo schnapps and lemonade in a collins glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of 7-up and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: 151 Ways to Die
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shot glass and then drink. No order is necessary. If you wish you may use a spoon to float each alcohol atop another but this drink is not to be pretty it is to get drunk.

name: Dirty Crane
preparation: Serve over ice.

name: Anisette Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Typhoon
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill glass with chilled champagne stir lightly and serve.

name: Narragansett
preparation: Combine the bourbon vermouth and anisette in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Lady's Cocktail
preparation: Pour whiskey anisette and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cafe de Paris
preparation: Shake ingredients over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Creme de Cafe
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Jelly Bean
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Parrot Cocktail
preparation: Stir and strain into a wine glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with red green and yellow cherries on a stick.

name: Yolanda
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Blowjob
preparation: Layer in a shot glass; Irish cream on top and serve.

name: Mandeville
preparation: Combine the rums anisette lemon juice and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the cola and stir well.

name: General Lee
preparation: Combine the lime juice club soda and sugar into a collins glass. Stir then add ice cubes anisette and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

name: Yellow Parrot
preparation: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fare Thee Well Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rolls-Royce
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dixie Dew
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Smoky Martini
preparation: Stir both ingredients together with ice to chill. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bloody Pussy
preparation: Pour half shot of peach schnapps half shot of tequila rose then a dash of grenadine and let it ooze through the shot.

name: Optimus Prime
preparation: Fill glass with ice to top. The ingredients need to be in order to create the layered effect. do not mix. Add 1/2 oz Absolut Raspberri 1/2 oz Dekuyper Watermelon Pucker1/2 oz Peachtree and a splash of Grenadine. Fill to top with ice again if any ice has dissipated during making of drink.Carefully pour in Sierra mist sour mix and last GENTLY drizzle the 1/4 oz of Blue Curacao on top. If done correctly drink will remain red on the bottom and blue on the top. Separated. Add straw and enjoy!

name: Coney Island Baby
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps and brown creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes slowly fill with soda water and serve.

name: Cherry Trouble
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add cherry vodka. Fill the rest with tang. Stir.

name: Berry Bananza
preparation: Combine ingredients in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Sex on Ya Mamy
preparation: Pour in the vodka and peach. Pour a splash (or roughly 1/2 oz.) of Sour Mix or Lemon juice. Pour in the Cranberry (to fill or roughly 3 oz.) & stir. ....No Garnish.

name: Bobby Sherman
preparation: Pour vodka over ice and allow to sit for one full minute. Add soda. Do not stir!

name: Sneeky Sucker
preparation: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

name: Bat Chain Puller
preparation: Pour the cherry vodka into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper and orange juice stir and serve.

name: Kim's Cherry
preparation: Add a few cubes of ice to a collins glass. Add the cherry vodka and triple sec and fill with lemon-lime soda (7-Up Sprite etc). Stir gently and serve.

name: Champion's Bubblin' Cherry
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Tiki Lemonade
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice into a collins glass and top with soda to taste. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Lexington Lemonade
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with two cherries.

name: Georgian Redneck
preparation: Serve on the rocks in a tumbler. Pour shot of Jack over the ice fill glass with 7-Up add peach schnapps.

name: The A-Rock
preparation: Pour bacardi spiced rum jack daniel's and southern comfort in that order into a shot glass and serve.

name: Amnesia #2
preparation: Mix the shots together completely then pour soda in slowly enough to not cause fizzing. Enjoy the drink.

name: Jackhammer #3
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Serve.

name: Booster Blaster
preparation: Add Jack Daniel's Southern Comfort and Yukon Jack to your glass with ice. Fill with cola and enjoy.

name: Ario Bomb
preparation: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

name: Pure White Evil
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a pitcher.

name: Evil Slider
preparation: Mix well and serve.

name: Less Than Jake On The Rocks
preparation: Pour in order and stir.

name: Atomic Cherries
preparation: Drain the liquid from a standard tub carton or bottle of maraschino cherries. Fill back up with Everclear and let soak for a month. Use for garnishing cocktails.

name: Silent Sam Mix
preparation: Add all ingredients to a punch bowl. The more ice tea the sweeter the drink. Serve into punch cups or equivalent.

name: Daniel Island Cosmopolitan
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with slices of lime and cracked ice. Shake hard and well then strain into a chilled martini glass. The pulp from the lime slices will act as the garnish. Serve.

name: Bacardi Daug
preparation: Pour the Hennessy cognac into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Bacardi Silver rum top with the Coca-cola stir briefly and serve.

name: Captain Jack Sparrow #3
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Glicktail
preparation: Stir with ice and add more ginger ale (or club soda) to taste. Stir well.

name: Eskay Slammer
preparation: Pour the Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey into a highball glass. Add the ice cold root beer a small scoop of vanilla ice cream and serve.

name: Vanilla Vargas
preparation: Pour liquors in order into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Top with pepsi stir well with a barspoon and serve.

name: Jack in the Summer
preparation: Fill glass 1/3 of the way with strawberries. Pour 1 part Jack Daniel's over strawberries. Fill with cola stir.

name: Tropical Breeze
preparation: Pour raspberry and watermelon schnapps into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with mountain dew and serve.

name: Ma Wee Hen
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ma' Bonnie Wee Hen
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ma Wee Hen
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Captain Jack
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Ludwig And The Gang
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice.

name: Portuguese Daisy
preparation: Pour the port brandy lemon juice sugar and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Canadian Daisy
preparation: Pour the whisky lemon juice and raspberry syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with sparkling water. Float the brandy on top. Garnish with a few raspberries and serve.

name: Strongarm
preparation: Pour whiskey Cointreau and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Brandy Daisy
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy lemon juice sugar and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Bourbon Daisy
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon lemon juice grenadine and sugar. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: The Death Blaster
preparation: Mix the alcohol generously top off with very little sprite to make the flakes flow

name: Hurts You Right Here
preparation: Mix together in a double shot glass. Shoot.

name: Frigid Alaskan Nipple
preparation: Mix everything in a shaker full of ice pour into shot glass.

name: Alaskan Orange
preparation: Blend briefly with a half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a goblet with grated orange zest chocolate and nutmeg.

name: Captain's Table
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin Campari grenadine and orange juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Captain's Cocktail
preparation: Shake rums juice and sugar together in a shaker. Strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice and sprinkle the port over one half of the surface. Drink from the port side.

name: Ganggreen
preparation: Take a highball glass or anything that will hold 12 oz. of soda and pour the soda in the glass. Next take one shot of the captain morgan's spiced rum and add it to the mountain dew. Finally add one shot of the johnnie walker red label to the mix. Stir it and enjoy.

name: Captain Bucci
preparation: Pour the rum over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with the Canada Dry ginger ale and serve.

name: Fucked Up Float
preparation: Mix together kahlua schnapps vodka ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

name: Pirate's Treasure
preparation: Combine ingredients in glass.

name: Pirate Float
preparation: Add all ingredients in order into a highball glass. Stir if desired.

name: Frangelico Float
preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Easy Rootbeer Float
preparation: Pour rootbeer schnapps and vanilla flavored schnapps into a cup. Pour in a can of rootbeer. Add ice or ice-cream if desired and serve.

name: Jackoff
preparation: Mix liquids together starting with the liquor into a blender. Add the cup of ice and blend until it is like a smoothie. Serve.

name: Elixir de Menthe
preparation: Allow the mint sprigs to infuse for 2-3 minutes in a saucepan with the boiling water. Add the honey and stir well. Allow to cool. Once cooled filter the mixture into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Iguana
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the lime slice and serve.

name: Blue Iguana
preparation: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a frozen mug.

name: Bubble Cream Martini
preparation: Combine vodka and butterscotch liqueur in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake for 30 seconds and pour into a martini or any other glass. Pour cream soda into glass stir and serve.

name: Polar-Roller
preparation: Funnel the cointreau armagnac and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml) roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard stein or british pint) and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle and serve.

name: Vokter Pepper
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add Dr. Pepper and serve.

name: Ogre Drink
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a beer mug.

name: Kiwi-Berry Boat Drink
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker until ice cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a lemon twist and serve.

name: Lee's Drink
preparation: Fill a glass 1/4 with coffee. Pour tia maria frangelico and amaretto slowly add whipped cream on top and a cherry if desired. When drinking stir gently if you like your coffee light. Drink from the bottom with a straw if you like it strong.

name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountain Drink
preparation: Shake all ingredients except coke. Pour over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

name: The Drink
preparation: Rinse glass with sherry discard sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).

name: Root Beer Fizz
preparation: Combine the gin lemon juice and sugar in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer stir well and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Double Root Beer Trouble
preparation: Served on the rocks. Rye poured first root beer schnapps second. Cola poured last as filler.

name: Ginger Beer Shandy
preparation: Pour the ginger beer into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Carefully add the ale or lager and serve.

name: Bayou Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a water jug. Shake vigorously. Serve over ice.

name: Buttered Brandy
preparation: Pour the brandy bourbon whiskey butterscotch schnapps and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add water if desired and serve.

name: Mule's Hind Leg
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Leg Spreader #3
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add all but the Pepsi. Shake vigorously. Fill a highball glass with ice and pour strained mixture into glass. Add the Pepsi and stir. Serve.

name: Black Haus Basket
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a large or double-shot glass and serve.

name: Black Haus Twist
preparation: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Smirnoff citrus twist vodka into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Add cranberry juice stir and serve.

name: Blackdriver Haus
preparation: Pre-chill the Black Haus blackberry schnapps. Pour into a highball glass over ice and add orange juice. Garnish with an orange wheel and serve.

name: Black Haus Mitten
preparation: Combine Black Haus blackberry schnapps and GoldSchlager in a glass mug. Stir top with hot coffee and whipped cream and serve.

name: Monte-Sano
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir in sugar. Pour over crushed ice in a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Hairy Jerry
preparation: Add dark rum to an ice-filled glass. Fill to the top with papaya juice.

name: Bloody Sharkbite
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.

name: Rumka
preparation: Mix equal parts of vodka and rum pour over ice in a shot glass and serve.

name: Nixon
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-Up stir and serve.

name: Buzzer's Red Cream Soda
preparation: Place two handfuls of crushed ice into a blender. (At least 5 cup size.) Add all other ingredients in the order given (alcohol first). Blend until ice crystals are thoroughly mixed and drink turns red.

name: Mexicali Crunk Juice
preparation: Add all ingredients to a punch bowl with ice. Serve into cups when chilled.

name: Crime of Passion
preparation: Beat or blend briefly. Pour into a wine glass and add soda. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Funky Garlic
preparation: Chill all ingredients prior to serving. Pour into a highball glass and stir well.

name: Uncle Sam
preparation: Pour or layer the three (preferably chilled) liquors into a shot glass.

name: Sloughdriver
preparation: Fill the glass with ice. Add 2 shots of Blavod black vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Sprinkle shredded orange peel on top.

name: Dirty Mop
preparation: Shake with ice.

name: Blackula
preparation: Pour Blavod Vodka in hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Add jalepeno pickle for spicy taste.

name: Sugar Kick
preparation: Combine in a glass. Add ice shake well and serve with a cherry a lemon (dipped in sugar) and a straw.

name: Eric's Bloody Bull
preparation: In a small pitcher or bowl combine tomato juice bouillon vodka Worcestershire sauce hot sauce celery salt lime juice and lemon juice and stir to blend well. Divide the mixture between two highball glasses containing ice and garnish with black pepper and celery.

name: Bloat Mary
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Bullshot #2
preparation: Dissolve boullion cube in water. Mix in vodka and Tabasco. Garnish with celery.

name: Bull Breaker
preparation: Use a large glass add ice add JD add tequila add water then insert straw and serve.

name: Bone
preparation: Pour the Jagermeister and coconut rum into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with an energy drink and serve.

name: Kurt Cobain
preparation: Take a double-shot of Jagermeister followed immediately after by shot gunning the Red Bull (you'd do this the same way you shotgun a beer).

name: Modest Mouse
preparation: Serve in a shot glass.

name: Squirting Orgasm
preparation: Pour all ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass. Stir and serve.

name: Bloody Maria
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Citrus Smack
preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add rum triple sec and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.

name: Kinky Russian
preparation: Pour the coffee liqueur and the coconut rum over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with half and half cream stir and serve.

name: The Perfect Ten
preparation: First add the alcohol then the rest is 50/50 of the lemon juice and the sprite. Don't put any ice in it!!!

name: Sour Kiss
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin. Stir over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Cocktail glass should be sugar rimmed and garnished with a lemon.

name: Amnesia
preparation: Combine both the watermelon and grape-flavored schnapps Bacardi limon orange juice and pineapple juice in an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: High Speed
preparation: Pour the Seagrams gin and Bacardi Limon rum into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Add the Red Bull stir and serve.

name: Hi-Speed
preparation: Add gin and lemon rum to a plastic beer cup. Fill with Red Bull. Add a few ice cubes.

name: Jumping Bean
preparation: Pour tequila and sambuca into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with coffee beans and serve.

name: Arthur Tompkins
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin Grand Marnier and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Snoop Dogg
preparation: Pour orange juice over chilled Tanqueray. Stir gently. Sip while rollin down the street smoking endo.

name: Carl Johan
preparation: Mix first 3 ingredients. Top with Schweppes. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Jessica Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Dirty Virgin
preparation: Shake both ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Nicky's Primo
preparation: Pour the Tanqueray gin and Hpnotiq liqueur into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with slices of lemon. Add a little sugar to sweeten only if desired. Stir and serve.

name: Gaawanger
preparation: Mix over ice in a highball glass and fill the rest of the glass with equal parts pineapple juice and ginger ale.

name: Gin Citric
preparation: In tall glass add Gin fresh squeezed lime juice lemon juice and grenadine. Fill glass with ice then fresh orange juice enjoy.

name: Lark
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a cherry slices of orange and lemon and serve.

name: Joan Mir
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled mixing glass stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry and serve.

name: Artists' Special
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bunny Bonzana
preparation: Pour the tequila apple brandy triple sec lemon juice and maple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Jack Honey Slushee
preparation: Mix the first four ingredients together and store in a freezable container. Place in freezer for 24 hours until frozen to slush consistency. Make sure you use strong rum (140+) or it will freeze solid. Serve in a pina colada or old fashioned glass. Add a dash of bitters and some freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Drunken Bunny
preparation: Blend first three ingredients together in a cocktail glass. The color should turn bright turquoise. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Fast Honey
preparation: Pour the Go Fast! into an old-fashioned or highball glass. Seperately pour the Barenjager into a shot glass. Drop the shot into the Go Fast! and serve.

name: Great Gatsby
preparation: Combine gin and vodka in a martini glass. Splash with sweet vermouth and add fresh lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Chunnel Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Grand Marnier gin vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jack Smasher
preparation: Stir over ice and serve.

name: Moninger's Madness
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass (the larger the better) and stir. Use ice if desired.

name: Kahlua Madness
preparation: Pour kahlua into an old-fashioned glass. Add vodka and tonic water. Drink from the bottom with two straws.

name: Banana Split #3
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice but be careful to not build up too much pressure from the cream soda. Mix then pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish as desired. Drink slowly.

name: Razberi Sunsplash
preparation: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add juice and grenadine and shake well. Garnish with a flag and serve.

name: Screwed Parrot
preparation: Pour Parrot Bay over Ice then add OJ.....amounts can vary depending on the strength wanted.

name: Ekatherina Andreevna
preparation: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

name: Queen's Park Swizzle
preparation: Squeeze lime juice into a highball glass. Add the shell fill with crushed ice and add the mint. Pour in the rum angostura bitters and sugar syrup. Swizzle until glass frosts. Add the soda garnish with a sprig of mint and serve with a straw.

name: Park Paradise
preparation: Pour whisky vermouth maraschino and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mexican Trailer Park
preparation: Fill fill shaker 1/2 full with ice; add tequila rum creme de banana and grenadine. Fill rest of shaker with three parts pineapple 1 part OJ and shake like mad. Serve in margarita glass.

name: Antoine's Lullaby
preparation: Pour dark rum port orange curacao and lemon juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Amenie Mama
preparation: Pour into shot glass. Stir.

name: Obama Mama
preparation: Shake rums and Baileys in iced shaker pour into politically correct glass and top with whipped cream

name: Bermuda Bouquet
preparation: Pour the gin apricot brandy triple sec grenadine sugar and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Black-Eyed Susan
preparation: Chill all ingredients. Just before serving combine in a punch bowl. Unmold ice ring and float in bowl. Serve in tall glasses. Makes 10 large servings.

name: Brimstone
preparation: Shake with cracked ice.

name: B & B Stinger
preparation: Pour the benedictine and white creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Juicy Lucy #2
preparation: Mix all above pour over ice and enjoy.

name: Freezer Burn
preparation: Chill the Smirnoff bottle on ice or in a refrigerator beforehand. Keep Hot Damn! at room temperature. Pour the Smirnoff vodka into a shot glass and the Hot Damn! cinnamon schnapps into a seperate shot glass. Shoot the shot of vodka and chase with the schnapps. Hence the name Freezer burn.

name: Bitters Highball
preparation: Sprinkle dashes of angostura bitters over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hispaniola
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice and a cherry. Stir.

name: Aloha
preparation: Shake with ice cubes and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Tropicana Hurricane
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with crushed ice add the light dark and coconut rum and fill with Tropicana Twister. Stir and serve with orange and cherry garnish.

name: Chocolate Banana Sherbet
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and freeze overnight. Before serving break up the frozen mixture and blend until smooth with 2 tbsp. of cold water. Serve with a spoon in a frosted goblet and serve.

name: Four Roses Cocktail
preparation: Shake well in cracked ice strain into cocktail glasses serve with twists of lemon peel. Serves four.

name: Four Jokers
preparation: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass with/without ice as desired. Stir lightly and serve.

name: BBC #2
preparation: Put all ingredients in blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a glass 3/4 full with ice cubes.

name: Bounty Bar Margarita
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice. Blend well and pour into a margarita glass Drizzle extra chocolate syrup over it and serve. Should taste like a bounty bar.

name: Milk Tooth
preparation: Pour jack daniels creme de cacao blackcurrant cordial and sweet and sour into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an iced collins glass. Add pineapple juice place shaker over the glass and give one hard shake; up and down. Remove shaker and serve.

name: Dirty C
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour the Three Olives Wild Berry into the collins glass. Mix in equal parts of both Mountain Dew and Cranberry Juice. Enjoy

name: Bleeding Weasel
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Freson
preparation: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Bleeding Bacardi
preparation: Add the Bacardi first. Then slowly pour in the cordial. Drink when they start to separate.

name: Summertime Soda
preparation: Dissolve sugar in juices in a highball glass three-quarters filled with ice. Add soda top with ice cream and garnish with fruit. Add straws and serve.

name: Big Johnson
preparation: Pour the vodka Jack Daniel's Country Cocktails (Downhome Punch flavor) 7-Up and sweetened lime juice into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Pour grenadine around the side of the glass for effect and serve.

name: Ice Palace
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

name: Parma Nova
preparation: Pour all the ingredents into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake then strain into a frosted margarita glass and serve.

name: Madame Rene
preparation: Pour whiskey rum orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Puffer
preparation: Pour the rum orange juice and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost fillled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Orange Daiquiri
preparation: Dissolve sugar shake and strain into a frosted champagne saucer. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Susan Littler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Red Headed Schoolgirl
preparation: Add Crown then Cream Soda to shot glass and drink.

name: The Shearer Special
preparation: Mix fifth of a gallon of bacardi to a splash of cranberry juice.

name: We Attack at Dawn
preparation: Pour in vodka and absinthe into shot glass mix and then float everclear as much as possible. Ignite. Flame will go out by itself and then take the shot.

name: Tequila Twilight
preparation: Fill the glass 1/3 full of tequila and then the rest with the cranberry juice leaving enough room for the shot of grape juice.

name: Raspberry Deluxe
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice mix raspberry vodka chambord and grenadine pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Add ginger ale. Stir and garnish with a cherry

name: Golden Shnoozberry
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Pour Wild Turkey and Schnapps over ice. Squeeze lime wedge in drink and drop in. Fill with 7-up. Enjoy.

name: Black Rose
preparation: Pour grenadine bitters and whiskey into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with ice. Stir garnish with flamed lemon peel and serve.

name: Death By Jager
preparation: Pour 1 oz of everclear in the shot glass and then cover with 1 oz of jager. Shoot and enjoy.

name: Blonde's Death
preparation: Mix in the glass. Serve cool!

name: Bulls Eye
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass with a slice of tomato on the side and serve.

name: Ugly
preparation: Fill beer glass 3/4 full of beer slowly pour tomato juice down the side so it settles on the bottom. Shake salt in the palm of your hand. Throw salt into the glass and wait until the top foams up. Chug the drink and then scream UGLY!

name: Tomboy
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a beer mug stir and serve.

name: Spudgun
preparation: Mix it together and hurl it down.

name: Glad Eye
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mexican Red Hot
preparation: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Ariane Special
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Hoo Doo
preparation: Mix southern Comfort finlandia vodka orange juice and lime juice over ice. Top with a splash of peppermint schnapps and sprite.

name: Red Eyed Hell
preparation: Mix together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Midnight Sun
preparation: Pour the vodka Cointreau apricot brandy grenadine and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer or small wine glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Seduction on the Rocks
preparation: Pour Butterscotch schnapps and orange juice into glass then add lemon-lime soda. Add one to two ice cubes before serving.

name: Carmel Coke
preparation: Fill a rocks glass w/ ice. Add the coca-cola and then the schnapps. Serve.

name: Nagel Nectar
preparation: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Cowboy Killer
preparation: Pour tequila bailey's irish cream and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail glass. Add ice and half-and-half. Pour into a shaker shake to mix and pour back into the glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Caramel J
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Pour the mixture into a large cocktail glass and decorate with chocolate and caramel sauce swirls. Garnish with fresh fruit and a flower and serve.

name: Bounty Bar
preparation: Pour the vodka into a shot glass and add the Bailey's slowly so it sits on top of the vodka and it creates a layer. Leave just a little room at the top and squeeze a little bit of the chocolate so it runs through the drink serve.

name: Exxtaacy
preparation: Mix in a shaker with ice. Then strain into glasses.

name: Nelson's Nightcap
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

name: Charles's Nightcap
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: GordBuster from Hell
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into an old-fashioned or highball glass and serve.

name: Hershey Squirts
preparation: Make cocoa in the traditional method and add whiskey liberally.

name: Sneak Attack
preparation: Add 2 shots (add more if too weak) of vodka and fill until almost full. Add a splash of cream soda to fill. Stir and drink away.

name: Carmel Apple Funtini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Shake until ice cold and pour into a chilled stemmed or rocks glass with ice.

name: New Dawn
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into the glass then the creme de bananes over it(using one of many common layering techniques). Serve as is.

name: Gangreen
preparation: Mix all ingredients in shaker tin filled with ice. Chill. Strain into shot glass.

name: Jager Shaker
preparation: Mix ingredients with ice in a shaker strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Gin Cup
preparation: Place the mint sprigs and sugar syrup in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Stir about to bruise the mint slightly. Fill the glass with chopped / shaved ice. Add the lemon juice and gin and stir until a frost begins to form. Decorate with extra mint sprigs and serve.

name: Peppermint Penguin
preparation: Combine the green creme de menthe chocolate mint liqueur cookies and cream with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a chocolate cookie and a cherry and serve.

name: Godiva Peppermint Patty
preparation: Pour hot chocolate into a brandy snifter. Add peppermint schnapps (rumple minze) and godiva then stir. Top with whipped cream.

name: My Antonella
preparation: In a highball glass combine gin and chambord over ice. Stir add two italian green olives and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Nail Puller
preparation: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

name: After Glo
preparation: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

name: Big Zacs Morning After
preparation: Combine ingredients in a pint glass with plenty of ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Scope
preparation: Put double of creme de menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to the top with ginger ale tonic or soda water.

name: Iceberg
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a blender blend and pour into a frozen highball glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

name: Rafu Eighteen
preparation: Pour vodka and pisang ambon into a glass. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and sprite. Squeeze in a twist or two of lemon and serve.

name: After Dinner Mint #2
preparation: Combine the peppermint schnapps creme de menthe and gin together in a highball glass. Add a splash of Listerine stir and serve.

name: Morning After
preparation: Stir the whisky schnapps and rum together in a large glass Fill with Mountain Dew lime soda and serve.

name: Liquid After-Eight
preparation: Pour the creme de menthe into a highball glass. Fill the glass with cold chocolate-milk.

name: Cowboy Cocktail
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lactating Cowboy
preparation: Layer in a shot glass; milk on top and serve.

name: Muddy River
preparation: Shake ingredients well and pour into a rocks glass.

name: Pure Pink
preparation: Put all ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake strain and serve in martini glass. Should make about two glasses of pure alcohol. No juice or mix needed.

name: Killer Kyle
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass frosted with sugar and serve.

name: Filipino Avocada Milkshake
preparation: 1. Place avocado ice sugar milk lemon juice and ice cream into a blender. Puree until smooth.

name: Green Milkshake
preparation: Pour grenadine onto the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Finally pour the contents of the shaker into a highball glass.

name: Pistachio Cream
preparation: Blend ingredients briefly at low speed. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: Nutty Nipple
preparation: Pour the Father O'Leary's Velvet and Butterscotch Cream liqueurs and the cream over ice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Add half a part of Frangelico hazelnut liqueur. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Nutty Russian
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka amaretto and Frangelico. Fill with milk. Stir and serve.

name: Diabolique
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Mary's Dream
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec orange juice and orange bitters into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Longaberger Lemonade
preparation: Combine ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice.

name: AsiaToo
preparation: Pour all ingredients except grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and serve.

name: Picasso 1
preparation: Combine ingredients in order in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass with ice cubes. Top with schweppes russian. Garnish with a slice of lime a mint leaf and a straw.

name: Cransoma
preparation: Pour DeKuyper wild strawberry liqueur Finlandia cranberry vodka Soho liqueur and apple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass. Fill with Schweppes Russian. Garnish with a stick of cucumber a maraschino cherry a slice of lemon and pineapple leaves.

name: Barn Door #2
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Door County Cherry Cheesecake
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into shot glasses. (Optional garnish of Whipped cream and a Teddy-Graham on top.) Yields 3 or 4 shots depending on shot glass size and ice melt.

name: Jared's Concoction
preparation: Shake all ingredients well in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a 12 oz beer pilsner and chug.

name: Cumulus
preparation: Shake intensely with ice. Serve in a frosted glass and sprinkle with powdered coffee or nutmeg.

name: Rusty Mist
preparation: Pour drambuie over two ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add irish mist and serve.

name: Sweet Science
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lemon Highlander
preparation: Pour into a scotch glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: High Road
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Loch Lomond
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch drambuie and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Old Moorhen's Shredded Sporran
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Barbican
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Early Christmas
preparation: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Affirmative Action
preparation: Fill glass about 1/4 with chilled orange juice. Add Vodka at a 2:1 ratio with cognac and add to highball glass with Orange Juice. Optional squeeze of lemon.

name: Ice Breaker
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass garnish with a fruit flag and serve.

name: Harlem World Seven
preparation: Mix over ice cubes pour into a suitable glass and consume immediately. NOTE: It might taste funny because of the prune juice but you should get an effect out of it.

name: Springbok
preparation: Layer the amarula gently onto the creme de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

name: Dirty Irish Whiskey
preparation: Mix in a mixing cup with ice and shake. Pour through a strainer and drink.

name: Black Cactus
preparation: Pour Tequila and blackberry brandy together. Add club soda. Drink like a shooter.

name: Poison
preparation: Mix vodka and parfait d'amour in a highball glass. Fill with bitter lemon and serve.

name: Charlie's Angel #2
preparation: Pour the white creme de menthe into a highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top. Stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

name: Blue Angel #3
preparation: Pour the sparkling wine or champagne over two ice cubes in a champagne saucer. Add blue curacao and serve.

name: Fallen Angel #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: Elmer Fuddpucker #2
preparation: Mix beer soda and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemonade container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.

name: Dirty Mexican
preparation: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Add Hellman's mayonaise so that it begins to dissolve. Shoot before it is completely dissolved.

name: Windex Punch
preparation: In a large vat add the Everclear Sprite extract (orange or yellow it doesn't matter) and Kool-Aid (there are several different flavors of blue colored Kool Aid. Feel free to experiment!) At this point you will still be able to taste the everclear quite easily. Begin adding (DUMPING!) sugar to taste. Once it gets halfway drinkable begin adding tons of ice. It will become easier to drink the colder it gets. Plus after one or two glasses you won't care about the taste anyway!

name: Lavendar Lushmaker
preparation: Combine ingredients and pour over ice. Serve with straw and fresh flowers for garnish.

name: High Quality H2O
preparation: Add ingredients in a collins glass over ice.

name: Green Spade
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cup or highball glass and serve.

name: Cha Cha Unocha
preparation: Build ingredients in order in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Yellow Peril
preparation: Pour all 4 ingredients into a brandy snifter and swirl. This is powerful stuff - named after English traffic wardens! After two you'll sleep like a dream.

name: Yellow Strawberry
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except banana slice) with ice and strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass. Garnish with the banana slice and serve.

name: Yellow Jacket
preparation: Yellow Jacket Shake:  oz 99 Bananas  oz Peach Schnapps and a splash of pineapple juice. strain into an old-fashioned glass or similar. Sink Razzmatazz Float Jagermeister

name: Ashy Larry
preparation: Add pink lemonade to the Everclear. Then add the watermelon Smirnoff. Top with whipped cream and take it to the head.

name: Buffalo Tea
preparation: Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach juice and iced tea. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Decorate with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Melonade #2
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the lemonade and top with grenadine. Garnish with a lemon or a cherry and serve.

name: Cerebral Hemorage
preparation: Pour strawberry schnapps into a double shot glass then add the bailey's. It will lump together (bailey's that is) to look like a brain in a red fluid. Finally add grenadine until it oozes from the brain and you're set.

name: Liquid Herpes
preparation: Pour the rum goldschlager and milk into a highball glass. Stir ingredients. Pour tobasco sauce in after toasting and before drinking. Do not stir the tobasco sauce. Serve with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Chocoquito
preparation: Combine all ingredient in a osterizer. Put on a glass bottle and then in the refrigerator. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Palmera
preparation: Shake and strain over one large ice cube in a wine glass.

name: An Arif
preparation: Combine everything together in order it is listed you may add Kool-Aid mix if desired but make sure to add the lemon juice last. It is called an Arif because it will tend to block your nuts from getting off if you have too many of these.

name: Santa Cruz Fix
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with in-season fruit add short straws and a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Folke West
preparation: Pour Martinique rum over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add brown creme de cacao and serve.

name: Maragato
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: The Dorothy
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Tamarindotini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker with a lot of ice. Shake until shaker is frozen and strain into martini glass. You can add a rim of chili powder mixed with sugar if desired.

name: Bamm Passion
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with several ice cubes. Shake once pour into a large cocktail or hurricane glass and serve with a slice of lime.

name: Red Apple
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bourbon Satin
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey white creme de cacao and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Midori Alexander
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mandarin Apple Smoothie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in tall stylish glasses.

name: Metropolitan
preparation: Shake the Skyy vodka cranberry juice and orange juice in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the cranberries and serve.

name: Mandarin
preparation: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass garnished with a slice of orange speared with a cherry.

name: Big Apple Cinnatini
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Caramel Apple
preparation: Stir ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: Craptini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Temple
preparation: In a hurricane glass filled with ice add Blackhuas and Grenadine then fill with 7-Up and Ginger Ale.

name: Blackberry 7
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Club Haus
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Crackhouse
preparation: Put both ingredients in a shaker and shake over ice.

name: Haus Special
preparation: Serve cold with or without ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Russian Banana
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Lil' Pimp-in
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps into a shot glass. Layer the 151 on top ignite and serve.

name: Kaytee Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth sherry and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chrysanthemum Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth and benedictine into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the Pernod garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Scope #2
preparation: Place ice in a tin then pour 1/2 oz. of Midori melon liqueur and 1/2 oz. of Rumple Minze. Shake and then strain into a rocks glass.

name: Carpet Licker
preparation: Pour the Chardonnay Midori melon liqueur Southern Comfort and Dr. Pepper into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with hundreds and thousands.

name: Apple Jell-o Shots
preparation: Mix the boiling water with the single package of sour apple jell-o. Stir for 2 minutes until all dissolved. Add 2 cups of DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker schnapps and mix well. Pour into small cups with lids and let set overnight. Serve preferably at parties.

name: April's Apple
preparation: Pour the Apple Pucker into glass add Grenadine then fill glass with Lemonade. Can be served on ice.

name: Gingeronno
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Flaming Engineer
preparation: Pour the Molson Canadian beer into a 20-oz glass. Add the amaretto almond liqueur and Canadian Club whisky. Fill with orange juice and serve.

name: Carmel Apple
preparation: Mix equal parts of freezer cold schnapps.

name: Green Tang
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker; strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Santa's Little Helper
preparation: Pour apple juice into a cocktail shaker. Add Goldschlager apple schnapps and butterscotch schnapps. Shake and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with an apple slice or cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Blue Wave
preparation: Add liquors to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass top with 7-up stir briefly and serve.

name: Cranapple Cocktail
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bertiebreezer
preparation: Pour the Apfelkorn and Bacardi Breezer over 3 ice cubes in a whiskey sour glass stir and serve.

name: Dubonnet Kiss
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini or cocktail glass. Add a thin slice of Red Delicious apple and serve.

name: Liquid Bakewell Tart
preparation: Pour the amaretto Di Saronno into a collins (highball) glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Newcastle Brown Ale. Stir and serve.

name: Dougle Do Me Now
preparation: Mix DeKuyper Hot Damn! and Apple Pucker in equal parts in a shot glass. Throw it back.

name: Quick Puck
preparation: Pour gatorade into a highball glass. Add DeKuyper sour apple pucker stir and serve.

name: Carnival Apple
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass or shaker tin with some ice. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Groti
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Grapple
preparation: Place all ingredients into a blender jar. Cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Apple Spritzer
preparation: Pour the apple juice into the old-fashioned glass filled previously with 3 to 5 ice cubes and add the soda. Stir before you serve. You can mix the juice and the soda in the fifty-fifty percent relation too but it is faster energy-delivering and even healthier my way.

name: Il Magnifico
preparation: Throw some ice into a blender. Add the ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve immediately.

name: Miss Tina
preparation: Stir ingredients together over crushed ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bighorn
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass on the rocks and serve.

name: Orange 43
preparation: Pour over ice and stir to mix.

name: Beevo Special
preparation: Pour the vodka and DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the can of Mountain Dew (any flavor original preferably) stir and serve.

name: Oz Dust
preparation: Pour both schnapps' and vodka into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until bruised. Strain into a Champagne saucer or martini cocktail glass. Top off with 7-up or Sprite.

name: Mulled Wine
preparation: Simmer water with sugar cloves cinnamon sticks and peel of one lemon in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Pour in the wine heat to a coffee temperature (do not boil) and add brandy.

name: Christmas Punch
preparation: Make all juices according to package directions. Combine and put in a 1 1/2 gallon pitcher/container. Put water sugar cinnamon sticks and cloves in small sauce pan and simmer for 30 minutes. Add spice syrup to juices. May be served hot or cold.

name: Chatham Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin ginger brandy lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger and serve.

name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Pink Cream Fizz
preparation: Combine the gin lemon juice sugar cream and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda and stir well.

name: Major Tom
preparation: Pour vodka Cointreau (or triple sec) Kirsch and grapefruit juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gin Cobbler
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Tom and Jerry Punch
preparation: Beat egg whites to a stiff froth. Separately beat egg yolks until light in color gradually add the powdered sugar and spices. Fold yolk mixture into whites. Divide mixture between four 8 oz. mugs. Add 1/2 shot brandy and 1 shot rum to each mug fill with hot beverage(coffee can also try water or milk). Stir well and top with nutmeg.

name: Maraschino Collins
preparation: Pour the vodka fresh lemon juice and sweetened maraschino juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a tall glass (12-16 oz) half-filled with crushed ice. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry. Add a teaspoon of sugar optional. Serve.

name: Cinnamon Bun
preparation: Sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon on a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with water. Then turn the glass upside down onto the plate to rim the glass with the cinnamon and sugar mixture. Turn the glass over. Add the hot cider and rum.

name: Cranberry-Apple Cider
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a 4-quart Dutch oven. Warm over high heat until the mixture comes to a boil. Remove from the heat and serve. Makes 2 quarts or eight 8-oz servings

name: Not-for-Granny Smith Apple Punch
preparation: Add all ingredients to a large container (60-oz +) and stir well. Chill before serving.

name: Bailey's Co-Op
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Lumpy Lime
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Back Street Romeo
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

name: April's Summertime Punch
preparation: Pour the cherry vodka lime vodka and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Anaconda
preparation: Pour liquors on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass. Top with whipped cream sprinkle with cayenne pepper and serve.

name: Three-Miler Cocktail
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Butterflies Cocktail
preparation: Pour the applejack gin lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Silent Broadsider
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dusty Dog
preparation: Pour vodka creme de cassis lemon juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Top with ginger ale and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Absolut Salty Dog
preparation: Build in a salt rimmed highball glass and fill with grapefruit juice.

name: Red Dog
preparation: Pour vodka and whiskey into a cocktail shaker. Add orange and cranberry juice and shake vigorously. Pour over ice in a frozen or chilled collins glass or tumbler. Slowly add the ginger ale garnish with a maraschino cherry or orange wedge and serve.

name: Nebraska Bull Dog
preparation: Pour coconut rum and Dr. Pepper into a tall shot glass stir and serve.

name: Dirty Dog
preparation: Put ingredients into a mixing cup or blender shake then pour into a mason jar. Enjoy!

name: Avalanche #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except chocolate syrup) in a blender. Blend for 15 seconds. Add chocolate syrup and blend for an additional 20 seconds until smooth or desired texture is reached. Pour into hurricane glasses garnish as desired and serve.

name: Rolling Rock and Roll
preparation: Drop a shot glass filled with R&R (Rich & Rare) canadian whisky into a pint glass filled with Rolling Rock pale lager and serve.

name: Rock Shandy Twist
preparation: Pour the orange and lemon into a pint glass with ice. Finish with adding the undiluted lime juice to taste. Enjoy!

name: Poor Man's Pie
preparation: Mix equal parts into shot glasses.

name: Taco-Mancer
preparation: Put ingredients in jar (make sure it's a quart one!) espresso first then schnapps finally Dr. Pepper. Swirl smell enjoy!

name: Crown Jewel
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass in order top to bottom (floating chambord on top). Garnish with lime and serve. To make shots instead place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.

name: Gremlin Fixer
preparation: Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve.

name: Pike's Peak Cooler
preparation: Shake the egg sugar and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass with cracked ice. Fill with cider and stir. Insert a spiral of orange or lemon peel (or both) and dangle over the rim of glass.

name: Coffee Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Grappa Strega
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Cream Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Royal Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Green Hornet
preparation: Chill ingredients pour lemon juice over pisco in a lowball glass and top off with tonic water. Serve with a slice of lime.

name: Blackhawk
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a perfectly ripe whole blackberry and a half-slice of lime and serve.

name: Salty Dog (Vodka)
preparation: In a shaker add Smirnoff No.21 Vodka and grapefruit juice. Stir and serve over ice in salt-rimmed glass.

name: Brandy Sling
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar water lemon juice and brandy. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Iron Bar Sling
preparation: Shake strain into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Bourbon Sling
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the sugar water lemon juice and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Western Sling
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a cherry and slice of orange add a twist of lemon add straws and serve.

name: Slippery Dickel
preparation: Shake ingredients with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Sydney Sling
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint slices of lime lemon orange and a cherry speared with an umbrella. Add straws and serve.

name: Oscar Cocktail
preparation: Add ingredients to a snifter filled with ice. Garnish with an orange wedge and a stemmed cherry.

name: Gardenia
preparation: Shake and strain into a saucer. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Singapore Sling (Raffles Hotel)
preparation: Mix all in a shaker and pour in glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

name: Horn of Plenty
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute and garnish with a half-slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Freddie Bartholomew
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass about three-quarters full of ginger ale and add about a half-inch of chilled Rose's lime juice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Green Horn
preparation: Blend everything except coconut rum in a bar blender. Pour into a cocktail glass and add coconut rum.

name: Colby's Delight
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an apple slice and serve.

name: Joy Juice
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Dirty Snowball
preparation: Pour irish cream and peppermint schnapps over ice in a medium rocks or old-fashioned glass. Top with milk stir and serve.

name: Pink Gin #2
preparation: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into a shot glass.

name: North Mymms Mirage
preparation: Mix the blackcurrant and the lemonade together. Add the gin and pimms together stirring well but do not shake. Garnish with fruit pieces. Mix a batch and serve liberally.

name: Pimm's No. 1
preparation: Pour Pimm's over ice cubes in a large highball glass. Fill with 7-up add twists of lemon and cucumber peel and serve.

name: Pimm's Punch
preparation: Place a slice of lemon half a strawberry and mint leaves in the bottom of a highball glass. Pour alcohol in. Fill glass upto top with ice and pour lemonade over. Stir and serve.

name: Cheat's Pimm's
preparation: Mix. Pour into tall glass. Add ice-cold 7-Up or ginger ale. Garnish with one slice each of orange lemon and cucumber. Serve.

name: Vodka Bitter Lemon
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass add bitter lemon to taste and serve.

name: Bitter Bison
preparation: Pour vodka vermouth and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Manila Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes and serve.

name: Montreal Gin Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Green Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Jack n' Off ll
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bison Tonic
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice cubes in a collins glass and serve.

name: Tanzanian Tonic
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour over ice in 4oz glasses and add a dash of dark rum to each. Garnish with halves orange slices and stemmed maraschino cherries.

name: Hpno Tonic
preparation: Layer ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jack n' Off
preparation: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Cherry garnish

name: Mickey's Fin
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Desert Breeze
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Orange Oasis
preparation: Shake brandy gin and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Mike Davis
preparation: Pour the gin into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Combine the grenadine sugar and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into the collins glass. Add club soda stir gently and serve.

name: Blue Star
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Emerald Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Foggy Day
preparation: Pour gin and pernod into an aperitif glass fill with cold water add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Whiskey All In
preparation: Pour the whiskey sugar lemon juice and hot water into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Stir well garnish with a lemon twist and a whole clove and serve.

name: Napoleon
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: C.R. Sun Tan Lotion
preparation: Fill a collins glass with ice add ingredients and stir. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: The Sri Thug
preparation: Pour Everclear into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add mountain dew enough to mask the taste of everclear or to personal preference. Then twist a slice of lime into the glass. Add or discard shell and serve.

name: Fernet Branca Cocktail
preparation: Stir with ice to chill and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Gypsy Cocktail
preparation: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Purple Shroud
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass and shake. Add more sloe gin or blue curacao if desired. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Albemarle Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda.

name: Champagne Tropicale
preparation: Pour the mango puree into a mixing glass then slowly add the champagne whilst stirring gently. Float the maraschino on top and serve.

name: Billy Hamilton
preparation: Pour the brandy orange curacao and creme de cacao into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Billy Bishop
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass 2/3 full with ice. Pour in the English gin and Cointreau. Put a splash of rye whiskey on top. Finish by filling the glass with orange juice.

name: Champagne Cornucopia
preparation: Pour the cranberry juice into a large red wine glass and set aside. Combine sherbet vodka and peach schnapps in a cocktail shaker. Shake until smooth. Pour over cranberry juice to product a swirl effect. Layer champagne on top. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Tartan Champagne Punch
preparation: Stir the Drambuie and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the brandy maraschino liqueur Champagne and club soda. Stir well. Add one large block of ice and garnish with peeled orange slices.

name: Champagne Cup
preparation: Pour the white curacao and cognac into a white wine glass. Add an ice cube and fill with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Fruit Juice Cup
preparation: Add all ingredients with slices of orange and lemon to a punch bowl. Add sufficient ice to chill and serve in wine glasses. Add white rum if desired.

name: Boatman's Cup
preparation: Mix and chill all but fruit and lemonade in a punch bowl for 2 - 3 hours. Add remaining ingredients when serving.

name: Pamoyo
preparation: Combine equal parts of gin sprite and grape juice in a large container. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Norwegian Iceberg
preparation: Pour vodka and sprite into an ice-filled beer mug. Add blue maui; until iceberg color and serve.

name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 1
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Formula 1
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Maxi-Pad
preparation: Stir all ingredients together over cracked ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Mail Man's Daughter
preparation: Pour the Southern Comfort and peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and lemon-lime soda. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Rockin' Killer Koolaid
preparation: Add all liquors to a shaker with ice and shake. Pour into a hurricane glass over grenadine (to taste). Add orange juice pineapple juice and sprite (to taste). Garnish with a candied cherry and serve.

name: Papaya Driver
preparation: Pour rum into a collins glass. Add papaya juice and serve.

name: Di Amore Dream
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Banana Di Amore
preparation: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a red wine glass. Garnish with orange and banana slices.

name: Pine Needle
preparation: Pour ingredients in the order listed into an ice-filled highball glass. Vary to taste.

name: Amber Amour
preparation: Pour amaretto and sour mix over ice in a collins glass. Top with club soda and garnish with a cherry.

name: Mountain Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Los Angeles Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Palmer Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stiletto #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Prince Rupert
preparation: Pour the whiskey and anisette into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Atlas
preparation: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain and serve.

name: Fox River Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fancy Whiskey
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Molehill Lounger
preparation: Pour whiskey and creme de cacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Menday's Peril
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Jersey Gentleman
preparation: Pour blended whiskey Pernod and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Crusta
preparation: Rub the rim of a wine goblet with a lemon wedge and dip into sugar to coat; discard lemon. Peel a spiral of orange peel from an orange and drape one end over the rim of the glass. Fill the glass with crushed ice. Combine the whiskey Cointreau maraschino and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into the wine goblet and serve.

name: Twin Hills
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Boston Sour
preparation: Shake juice of lemon powdered sugar blended whiskey and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon top with the cherry and serve.

name: T.L.C.
preparation: Pour the whiskey Cointreau Ricard Dubonnet and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon twist and serve.

name: Roger Swims a Mile
preparation: Pour the Drambuie whiskey and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Frisco Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Bourbon Cobbler
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with the cherry orange and lemon slices.

name: Sherman Tank
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Oriental Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bay Horse
preparation: Pour the whiskey Pernod creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with nutmeg and serve.

name: T.N.T. Cocktail
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Deck
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lawhill Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hearty Susan
preparation: Pour the whiskey and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled wiht ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Whiskey Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: French 95
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into an ice-filled goblet. Top with champagne and serve.

name: Debutante's Dream
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tempter Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Button Hook Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tahitian Sunset
preparation: Crush your ice and place in glass. Pour over vodka midori and malibu. Almost fill glass with equal amounts of juice and lemonade gently pour cointreau over top. Pour a small amount of raspberry cordial down side of glass to float half way down glass.. And ENJOY.

name: Witch's Brew
preparation: Shake all the ingrediants together and serve in a chilled glass.

name: Eerie Witch's Brew
preparation: Step 1. In a 1 to 2 quart pan bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil uncovered about 2 minutes set aside. -- Step 2.
