With a vegetable peeler pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture (Step 1.). Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. -- Step 3. Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture (Step 2.) the 3 cups cranberry juice apple concentrate limeade grapes and water. If made ahead cover and chill up to 2 hours. -- Step 4. Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. -- Step 5. Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.

name: Booda's Black Brew
preparation: Hurricane Glass Fill with Ice 1oz. Malibu Rum or Parrots Bay Coocnut Rum 3/4oz. Blue Curacao 3/4oz. Chambord 1/2oz. Grenadine Fill with Cranberry Top and Shake

name: Hair of the Dog
preparation: The original recipe said to shake the ingredients togeather with the ice cubes but I usually stir the whisky and the honey with a spoon until they're mixed and then add the cream and add the Ice Cubes. It workes just fine. I've tried this drink with Burbon and Tennessee whiskey instead of Scotch and it is really great! It becomes a totally different drink. I've also tried to add ~1 oz cold coffee and I liked it.

name: Hair Dryer
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a margarita glass and serve.

name: Chris Anders Shot
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Pink Police
preparation: Pour one can of beer into a pitcher. Add one can of frozen pink lemonade. Add vodka (in place of the water) stir and serve.

name: Champagne Passion
preparation: Pour passion fruit puree into a champagne saucer and stir in the simple syrup (to taste). Slowly add the champagne whilst stirring gently. Float the alize on top and serve.

name: Bloody Maru
preparation: Pour sake Worcestershire sauce Tabasco sauce horseradish salt and pepper into a old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add tomato juice to taste. Stir again and serve.

name: Cynar Cocktail
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in an aperitif or cordial glass and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.

name: Fiddlers Toast
preparation: Pour champagne grand marnier and juices into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add a slice of orange and float a curacao-soaked sugar cube on top. Serve with short straws.

name: Japanese Cobbler
preparation: Muddle a skinless pineapple wedge one piece of orange and one piece of lemon with maraschino liqueur in the bottom of a bar glass. Add the sake and shake with ice. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice and top with a splash of soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint the remaining fruit wedges and serve.

name: Mount Tullamore's Dew
preparation: Pour the Tullamore Dew irish whiskey into a collins glass over ice cubes than fill the glass with Mountan dew. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Champagne Hula
preparation: Pour the Whaler's Pineapple Paradise rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the Grand Marnier orange liqueur pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well and strain into a champagne glass. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a strawberry slice on the rim and serve.

name: Haiku Cocktail
preparation: Stir both ingredients together with cracked ice in a mixing glass. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion and serve.

name: Fizzgig
preparation: Stir everything in a champagne glass. (Make sure the champagne is chilled first). Garnish with a lemon twist if desired.

name: Fuji Apple
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Maggie May
preparation: Pour into a frosted champagne flute.

name: Genoa
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Tropical Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple Plague
preparation: Mix zinfandel with chambord and add 7-up. Serve on ice.

name: Ginza Strip
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Kabuki
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a salt-rimmed old-fashioned glass. Stir. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Canton
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add an orange twist a cherry and serve.

name: Bellini #3
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a blender with ice; blend well. Pour into a Champagne flute and serve.

name: Amsterdamned
preparation: Add all the ingredients except the champagne to a cocktail shaker with some crushed ice. Shake well. Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the mixture garnish it with some mint leaves and serve.

name: Champagne Bleu
preparation: Serve in a chilled Champagne flute.

name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
preparation: Serve without ice. The juice should be at room temperature.

name: Fuji Devil Dog
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) and pour over ice in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine for color. Decorate with a cherry and serve.

name: Macaroni
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in an aperitif glass. Fill with water and serve.

name: The Cornell
preparation: In a highball glass add Vodka Watermelon Schnapps and Sour Mix. Fill the rest of the glass with ice and shake well. Finish with a splash of Club Soda.

name: Outhouse Slammer
preparation: Pour the beer and Coca-cola into a pint glass. Fill a shot glass with everclear and ignite (carefully). Drop the burning shot of everclear into the beer-coke mixture and chug.

name: False Whiskey Sour
preparation: We always use equal parts beer whiskey and frozen lemonade. Thaw and pour the lemonade concentrate into a pitcher then fill up the cans with the whiskey and mix into the pitcher. Gently fill the cans with the beer avoiding too much foam and mix into the pitcher. Add the ice and stir.

name: Licorice Mist
preparation: Combine the sambuca coconut liqueur and cream with one cup of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Use a black licorice stick ends cut off as a straw and serve.

name: Leather Whip
preparation: Pour Jagermister into glass then add the Baileys Irish creme

name: Licorice Twist
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Whip Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Floyd Collins
preparation: Pour the vodka coconut rum and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add soda. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Blue Milk
preparation: Chill all ingredients beforehand mix and serve ice cold in a beer glass for one(fill with dairy to the top) or mix and then split into two glasses over ice cubes. Half and half or whole milk both accepted variations.

name: Cafe Pucci
preparation: Warm liquors in a heat-proof cup stir in sugar and add espresso. Stir again top with cream and serve.

name: Buttock Clencher
preparation: Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade and garnish with a cherry and pineapple chunk on stick.

name: Spicy Delirious Fire
preparation: Slice the jalapeos and add the sauces into a beer mug. Add 3 ice cubes. Pour on the Absolut Peppar vodka and the Don Julio tequila. Fill mug half-way with beer or to taste. Garnish with clamato. Stir with a large spoon and serve.

name: Alebrije
preparation: First mix some orange juice and pinapple juice in equal parts and color it with some grenadine (as sweet as you want). This is conga mix. Fill the glass with ice add the five licours and mix them fill the glass with some conga mix and enjoy.

name: Pink Lady #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a parfait glass and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis
preparation: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir again and serve.

name: Champagne Spray Punch
preparation: Dissolve honey in lime and cranberry juice in a punch bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix. Add sufficient ice to chill and garnish with three or four lime slices. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Cassis Orange
preparation: Pour the creme de cassis into a parfait glass over ice. Add orange juice and give it a quick stir so that it is blended but also ensure the top is more orange and the bottom more red.

name: Green K
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into four seperate sugar-rimmed cocktail glasses.

name: Sloehand Jackson
preparation: Pour the sloe gin gin vodka orange juice lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Pucker Sucker
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Provencal
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a sprig of thyme.

name: Salt-and-Pepper Highball
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rimmed ice-filled highball glass.

name: Mark Twain Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Alexander's Sister
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin creme de menthe and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Sister Starseeker
preparation: Pour the rum lemon juice grenadine and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Ritz Cocktail
preparation: Shake cognac cointreau and orange juice over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute carefully fill with champagne and serve.

name: Ritz Bar Fizz
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry and serve.

name: Ritz Fizz
preparation: Pour blue curacao amaretto and lemon juice into a champagne flute filled with champagne. Stir add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Ritz Old-Fashioned
preparation: Rim an old-fashioned glass with lemon juice and caster sugar. Place a teaspoon-sized sugar cube into the glass and saturate with angostura bitters. Fill the glass three-quarters of the way with broken ice shake other ingredients (except soda) and strain into the glass. Top with a small amount of soda water if desired. Add two cherries on a stick garnish with half slices of orange and lemon and serve.

name: Grand Pear
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Lost Bikini
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Mexican Bliss
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with half a slice of orange.

name: Hobart
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add straws and serve.

name: 80's Orange Wine Cooler
preparation: Pour the Chablis white wine into a tall wine glass and top with 7-Up. Add mandarin juice and serve.

name: Abracadabra
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Canario
preparation: Dissolve sugar shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: London Bus
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute add a cherry and serve.

name: Hotel California
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add champagne straws and serve.

name: Munchausen
preparation: Shake all but lemonade and strain into a collins glass half-filled with broken ice. Add the lemonade and serve with straws.

name: Mojambo Punch
preparation: Mix in a large container. Chill with bags of ice. Add sugar (to taste) if desired.

name: Smartees
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a pitcher and serve into highball glasses.

name: Simpson Solution
preparation: Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!

name: J.R.'s Wonderpunch
preparation: About 4 hours before punch is to be served combine fruit of choice in a bowl with everclear. Stir. About 1 hour before punch is to be ready add some Sunny Delight. When you are ready put the fruit/everclear/SD mix into a large cooler and add rest of handle of Everclear. Then add all of the ingredients and stir. Variations on final taste can be added with the sugar and raspberry lemonade mix. Calculations make it roughly 1 complete shot of everclear per cup. Serve it up in those fancy red or blue solos.

name: Fuzzy F**ker
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass. Serve over ice.

name: Cranberry Lemon Punch
preparation: Heat water and sugar to boiling stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved; cool. Prepare tea using 2 teaspoons loose tea or 2 tea bags and 1 cup boiling water; cool. Refrigerate all ingredients. Just before serving mix in large punch bowl. To make ice ringarrange thin citrus slices and cranberries in 6 cup ring mold. Pour water into mold to partially cover fruit. Freeze. When frozenadd water to fill mold 3/4 full. Freeze. Unmold and float fruit side up in punch bowl. Makes about 30 servings 1/2 cup each.

name: Noidish Pancake
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Fedberg's Woodstock
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes stir and serve. Substitute the Faxe Kondi for Sprite if necessary.

name: Drunken Madness
preparation: Mix vodka schnapps orange juice and grenadine together then fill with carbonated water. Top it off with an Orange Slice for decoration! Stir serve and enjoy.

name: Passion Mimosa
preparation: Pour passion fruit juice into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne decorate with a strawberry and serve.

name: Chocolate Barkchip
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Stir and serve.

name: Blue Shizzle
preparation: Add Everclear vodka and Tampico orange punch in mixer with ice. Shake well. Pour into highball glass until 3/4 full. Add Sprite to taste and splash with Blue Curacao.

name: Herbie Hancock
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass and serve.

name: Twisted Screw
preparation: Pour the vodka into a glass add orange juice and fill with tropicana. Add a splash of raspberry sparkling water if desired.

name: College Hulk Punch
preparation: Add half bowl of ice to a punch bowl. Add the Bacardi 151 and Blue Curacao and mix with the ice. Add the sweet and sour mix. Add orange juice until smooth to the taste and a really green cool color like the incredible hulk.

name: El Condor Pasa
preparation: Add ingredients in the order given with the exception of the grenadine. Stir well. Add a splash of grenadine creating the illusion of a sunset; add lime wedge for garnish.

name: Wiggle Worm
preparation: Pour vodka in first. Put cherry in last. Add ice if needed. Mix well and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Ante Meridiem
preparation: Blend ingredients in a bar blender and pour into glasses half filled with crushed ice.

name: McGorgan
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve. Add more orange juice to taste if desired.

name: Biekert
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan rum over crushed ice in a highball glass. Add the orange juice stir and serve.

name: Blue Devil
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Jersey Devil
preparation: Put cranberry juice in a punch bowl. Add apple cider/juice and apple juice brandy to taste. Slice apple in 3/16th.

name: Little Black Devil
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Devil Juice
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Little White Lie
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

name: Dog House Dew
preparation: Pour vodka into any cup or glass. Fill with mountain dew. Add a few splashes of lemon juice. Add a few ice cubes (optional but recommended). Stir.

name: SD Special
preparation: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir. Add 5 ice cubes and serve.

name: Greenham's Grotto
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Green Beetle
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Brown and Beige
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Adam and Eve
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Space
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Shrek
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker with ice. The order doesn't matter. Pour into a shot glass (preferably a 3 ounce glass/cup) with a strainer. Be careful not too put too much sprite or pineapple juice just enough of both to fill the shot glass or glasses.

name: Jimtini
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocoa-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: BC Snowball
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a frosty champagne flute and serve.

name: Orangutan Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum banana liqueur half-and-half orange juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Miss Pastore
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka Campari bitters Angostura bitters orange juice superfine sugar and lemon juice into a highball glass rimmed with sugar and lemon. Stir vigorously and serve.

name: V & D Bedbanger
preparation: Mix vodka and passion fruit juice in a old fashioned glass Drambuie on top. Decorate with a wild Orchid or Rose.

name: Indifferent Miss
preparation: Pour the rum lime juice and simple syrup into a highball glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with club soda stir gently and serve.

name: Hudson Bay
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mongolian
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nookie
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Infidelity
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice and shake well. Strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Big Titty Ho on a Motorcycle
preparation: Add about 4 ice cubes to an old fashioned glass. Add the amaretto tequila and whiskey sour mix then Pepsi. Garnish with an umbrella and serve.

name: Neuralizer
preparation: Mix in a highball glass and add ice if desired.

name: Preakness Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Lennart
preparation: Pour pear brandy and lime juice over ice in a glass. Fill with sprite.

name: Ground Zero
preparation: Mix the ingredients together in equal parts and serve.

name: Blue PolarBear
preparation: Shake schnapps and vodka together until well-mixed. Add crushed ice shake lightly then pour to shot glasses.

name: Green Beret
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shaker over ice. Shake well. Pour into a shot glass.

name: Glasnost
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bavorak
preparation: Fill glass with tonic pour Fernet over spoon and add a straw.

name: Italia
preparation: Mix ingredients in pairs; grenadine with cherry brandy anisette with creme de cacao and chartreuse with curacao. Make pousse-cafe in a cordial glass. Colors should resemble that of the italian flag.

name: Fernet Con Coca
preparation: Put some ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the fernet and then fill with coke. No mixing required.

name: Boo Punch
preparation: Combine Orange Kool-Aid and Vodka. Add some Jagermeister and it will look and taste scary.

name: Irish Cactus
preparation: Pour irish cream and tequila over ice and stir.

name: Forest Dream
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime wheel and serve.

name: Jamaican Jambaylaya
preparation: Pour rum over ice. Fill to the top with fruit punch.

name: Wildfire
preparation: Put the tabasco sauce in a shot glass. This is the firestarter. The tequila shot is the propellant which spreads the fire. The peppermint schnapps shot brings the fire under control and finally the beer puts out the last of the flames.

name: Peppermint Depth Charge
preparation: Pour schnapps over beer in a beer pilsner.

name: Flaming Cocaine
preparation: Chill the shot glass until a frost has developed on it. All ingredients should be chilled. Add the aftershock and several small crystals then add the vodka and finally the cranberry juice.

name: Perroquet
preparation: Pour pernod and mint syrup over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water stir well and serve.

name: Muddy Puddle
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large punch bowl with plenty of ice. Stir vigorously and serve into cups.

name: Irish Spring
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Plush
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Irish Redhead
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Mona Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka bourbon whiskey rum sweet and sour mix and Rose's lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kinda Tasty
preparation: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

name: Alcoholic Icy-Pole
preparation: Mix ingredients pour into an icy-pole template and freeze. Serve on a hot day.

name: Alcoholic Sherbert Delight
preparation: Combine the ingredients starting with the orange juice in a highball glass. Serve.

name: Blue Banana
preparation: Pour creme de banana in a glass. Pour blue curacao on top of it creating two layers. Pound it.

name: ChaTiffany Especial
preparation: Fill a glass halfway with Smirnoff vodka and split the remaining three ingredients equally over ice or chill in freezer. Can also be made as shot.

name: Green Tide
preparation: Pour Dole pine-orange banana juice into a hurricane glass filled with ice until slightly over half full. Add Midori melon liqueur lemon juice vodka and Hiram Walker blue curacao. Stir and serve.

name: Maviagator Cocktail
preparation: Add ice to glass - Pour 1 oz Captain Morgan then add 3 oz Baileys Irsh Cream for correct infusion. Important to pour the Captain first.

name: Formula 3
preparation: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.

name: 3 for a Dollar Special
preparation: Boil the sugar and water in a bowl. Chill for 20 minutes. Add the chopped mangos along vodka triple sec and two limes to a blender with 40 ice cubes. Blend add the water and sugar mixture and blend again. Serve in your glass of choice.

name: Purple Wind
preparation: Pour chambord into a shot glass. Warm sake on stove pour into the shot glass and serve.

name: Jon Jon
preparation: Almost fill a pint glass with ice and pour your liquors (except 151). The Red Bull and orange juice should definatly be poured to taste. Not many people like Red Bull in drinks and prefer more OJ than RB. If your ok with Red Bull it should be poured in equal amount with the OJ. Pour everything into a cocktail shaker and shake well then pour back into the glass. Pour a small amount of 151 on the top (optional) and do not mix. Serve with a straw.

name: Jammie Dodger
preparation: Pour creme de framboise into a shot glass and layer surface with double cream poured over a spoon. Must be served at room temperature and drunk slowly and smoothly in one go.

name: Stagger Lee
preparation: Add ice to pitcher follow with Everclear the Tbird and finally wine coole

name: Road Runner
preparation: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice for 15 seconds and pour into a champagne flute with a nutmeg/sugar mixture. Garnish with nutmeg and serve.

name: The Big Johnson
preparation: Pour the lime juice vodka jack daniel's and 7-up (in order) over ice in a large glass. Add a dash of grenadine by pouring around the side of the glass.

name: The Big Banana
preparation: Over ice in a 20 oz glass; pour booze in first and top with pineapple juice giving it a two layered look with the brown amaretto on bottom. Add two straws two cherries and serve.

name: Blushin' Russian
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne flute.

name: Kinky
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Robyn
preparation: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Add schweppes until half-filled and fill with fruit soda. Top with lime juice and serve.

name: 17 Twist
preparation: Out of a 20 oz bottle of Mountain Dew empty enough of it so that the bottle's contents are directly below the first bump line from the top. Fill to the top with Smirnoff raspberry twist vodka. Mix lightly and enjoy.

name: Ambrosia Martini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Doggystyle
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Orange Bloom
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Aruba Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin white curacao egg white lemon juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Go for Broke Cocktail
preparation: Pour vermouth gin Cointreau and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pain Pain Go Away
preparation: Pour tabasco sauce into a large container add whiskey cream and mix well. Pour into appropriate glasses drink and chase with ginger ale and lemon peel. (Drink the mixture take a swig of ginger ale and bite the lemon peel.)

name: Japanese Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lime peel and serve.

name: Jojo and Alex Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except grenadine) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Gently pour grenadine across the top. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Glitch
preparation: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored which is lovely.

name: Liberty Blue Champagne
preparation: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain into a sugar rimmed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

name: Breakfast Sherbert
preparation: 1. In a food processor combine all ingredients; process until smooth. Pour the mixture into a medium bowl; cover with plastic wrap and freeze 3 to 4 hours until firm. 2. Remove from the freezer and let stand 15 minutes. With an electric mixer beat until smooth. Cover and freeze 3 to 4 hours longer until firm.

name: Bud Bomb Breakfast
preparation: Fill a chilled beer mug about 3/4 full with lager top off with the V8 spicy vegetable juice and serve.

name: Banana Breakfast Drink
preparation: Place bananas milk honey and vanilla in a blender. Cover. Blend until smooth and frothy. Serve immediately.

name: Chocolate Instant Breakfast
preparation: -----CHOCOLATE SAUCE----- 2.00 ts Cornstarch 0.50 c Cocoa 2.00 c -Cold water 8.00 ts Artificial sweetener granul. 2.00 ts Vanilla CHOCOLATE SAUCE Combine cornstarch and cocoa. Whisk into cold water in a saucepan until there are no dry bits. Cook stirring frequently until mixture comes to a boil. Stir 1 minute until mixture thickens. Remove from heat stir in sweetener (aspartame is OK) and vanilla and allow to cool. Store in clean jar in refrigerator up to 6 weeks. Makes 12 servings about 2 1/4 cups. 3 tb serving 12 calories 2 grams carbohydrate 1 gram protein 1++ extra choice (free exchange). MOCHA SAUCE Substitute 2 cups strong coffee for water. INSTANT BREAKFAST Combine milk egg banana sauce and vanilla in a blender. Blend at high speed 1 min or until frothy.

name: Breakfast Cocoa
preparation: Mix cocoa sugar and salt; add water. Cook and stir 3 minutes. STir in milk; heat to boiling point do not boil. Beat with rotary beater just before serving.

name: Black Wolf
preparation: Add chartreuse first and then sambuca. Top with tabasco.

name: Crying Game
preparation: Pour the whiskey vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a mixing glass and stir. Heat the Bailey's irish cream tequila and rum over a medium flame in a saucepan. Pour into a heat-proof cup. Add the contents of the mixing glass. Add tomato juice and stir well. Top with grenadine. Garnish with a celery stalk and a green onion and serve.

name: The Crying Game
preparation: Mix JD and Vodka together with Kahlua. Heat over medium flame Bailey's Tequila and Rum. Mix all together with tomato juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a stalk of celery and green onion. Enjoy!

name: Nuthugger
preparation: Pour in liquors add lime juice and fill with beer. Serve unstirred.

name: Tropical Itching
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange a cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Acapulcos Malibu
preparation: Fill the glass with ice. Add rum and mango juice. Stir.

name: Yum-Yum
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Brain Blender
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and serve in a wine goblet with fruit and straws.

name: Tropical Punch
preparation: Combine and mix in a punch bowl. Add fruits and sufficient ice to chill. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Kathy's Concoction
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum Bailey's Irish cream Kahlua coffee liqueur and amaretto to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add cream or milk. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish as desired and serve.

name: Magic Trick
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Cracklin' Rosie
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry on a stick and serve.

name: Green Hope
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and garnish with red cherries.

name: Luxury
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cupid's Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: L.A. Sunrise
preparation: Pour the vodka creme de bananes orange juice and pineapple juice into a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Float rum on top. Garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry and serve.

name: Royal Hawaiian Punch
preparation: In a shaker; over ice pour 3 parts Crown Royal 2 parts Watermellon pucker 2 parts grenadine then 2 parts Sprite. Lightly shake pour into shot glass and serve chilled.

name: Green Mamba
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Add the Midori melon liqueur then equal amounts of sweet and sour mix and club soda. Top with Bacardi 151 and serve.

name: Canteloupe Dizzy
preparation: Pour club soda into a parfait glass with ice cubes. Pour vodka melon liquer and peach schnapps into a shaker and shake well. Strain into the club soda and stir. Garnish with cherry/orange/pineapple.

name: Bloody Urine
preparation: Pour the liquor into a collins glass with 3 ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew and lime juice and lastly the Tropicana and serve.

name: Love Hotel
preparation: Pour the sake and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the grenadine. Stir very lightly and serve.

name: Cherry Tuesday
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass.

name: May Blossum Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Queen Charlotte
preparation: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda stir and serve.

name: Peachy Yogurt Cooler
preparation: Place milk yogurt and peach in the blender. Cover and blend on high speed about 30 seconds or until smooth. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Peachy Hanes
preparation: Place the peach nectar into the bottom of a beer mug. Slowly stir in the ginger beer and serve.

name: Scotch Cobbler
preparation: Pour scotch brandy and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice top with the mint sprig and serve.

name: Brandied Port
preparation: Pour brandy port lemon juice and maraschino into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Port Wine Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Whiskey Cobbler
preparation: Muddle a skinless pineapple wedge one slice of orange and one wedge of lemon with orange curacao and water in the bottom of a bar glass. Add whiskey and ice and shake well. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with remaining fruit and serve.

name: Port Cobbler
preparation: Pour ingredients into a wine glass filled with broken ice. Mix garnish with fruit and serve with straws.

name: Champagne Cobbler
preparation: Muddle the fruit and maraschino in the bottom of a bar glass. Add ice and champagne stir gently and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Grandmom's Slipper
preparation: Pour the bailey's irish cream into a shot glass. Pour the salmiac vodka in but don't let them mix into gray: there should be creamish white and also deep black visible in the drink slightly mixed.

name: Red Mosquito
preparation: Combine vodka and hot damn in a shot glass stir and serve.

name: Bird of Paradise Cooler
preparation: Pour the gin lemon juice grenadine superfine sugar and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda/sparkling water. Stir well and serve.

name: Green Puma
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a glass stir and serve.

name: Shark Tank
preparation: Mix vodka and lemonade in a large glass. Drop in grenadine last but do not stir. Best served over ice through a straw.

name: Green Goddamn
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cube. Serve with a long straw.

name: Greenland
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Top with fresh orange juice to taste. Garnish with an orange slice a cherry and a mint leaf. Add straws and serve.

name: Odwits
preparation: Mix tequila vodka and southern comfort in a highball glass. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

name: Milano Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin galliano and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Scotch Bird Flyer
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Tweetie Bird
preparation: Pour all ingredients in mixer with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Cornell Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Perfect Lady
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach.

name: Chanticleer
preparation: Pour the gin lemon juice and raspberry syrup and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Barcelona Fizz
preparation: Shake the sherry gin lemon juice and syrup in a shaker. Strain into a frosted highball glass half filled with ice then add chilled soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry and serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Blackout
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a shot glass.

name: Banana Pineapple Milkshake
preparation: Combine all ingredients in container of electric blender; process until frothy. Serve shake immediately. Yield: about 4 1/2 cups.

name: Berry Deadly
preparation: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

name: 80's Berry Wine Cooler
preparation: Mix together the blackberry raspberry strawberry and blueberry juice together in a mixing glass. Pour the Chablis white wine into a tall wine glass and top with 7-Up. Add the juice mixture and serve.

name: Belgian Berry
preparation: Combine Black Haus and Bailey's irish cream over ice in a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Garnish with fresh berries and serve.

name: Cognac Flip
preparation: Shake well all ingredients in a shaker. Strain into cocktail glass and grate some nutmeg on top.

name: Choco Colada
preparation: Shake liquids well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Cafe Cabana
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Lake Breeze
preparation: Pour the coconut liqueur cranberry juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Lazy Luau
preparation: Mix everything except the oranges and cherries in a blender with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Veteran
preparation: Pour rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Foggy Afternoon
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: French Afternoon
preparation: Served on ice in a rocks glass. May be served with a little whipped cream on top.

name: Lazy Daze
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade and float cream on top. Garnish with a cherry and mint sprig and serve.

name: Love in the Afternoon
preparation: Blend ingredients in a pina colada glass until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a strawberry add straws and serve.

name: Lazy Daze
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixer shake and serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass (chilled glass another option/ both chilled glass and ice best option). Garnish with lemon and lime wedge. For 'sweet tooths' you can garnish the glass rim with sugar.

name: Gradeal Special
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Biscayne Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin light rum forbidden fruit liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Greenbrier Creek
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur into a frosted (note: important) brandy snifter glass. Add the gin and mix well. Drizzle the hot melted chocolate over the drink being sure to let it slightly drip onto the side of the glass. Do not mix. Serve.

name: Bocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Long River Tea
preparation: Add all ingredients (except Coke) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Coke stir lightly and serve.

name: Burning Pine Needles
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher or punch bowl mix well and serve to guests.

name: Orangutan
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice cubes in a tall glass and serve.

name: Rare Beef
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: The Skunk Pussy
preparation: Add alcohol to a brandy snifter then add ice with the 7-up.

name: Bubble Gum #2
preparation: Build all ingredients in an old-fashioned or rocks glass. Fill mostly with milk top with grenadine and serve.

name: Sour Melon Skittle
preparation: Stir over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Brian's Beaver Juice
preparation: Add the beer and rum to a pint glass. Fill with spicy clamato juice. Sprinkle clamato rimmer on top and serve.

name: Beaver Tail
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Head On
preparation: Stir together the Malibu and 151 in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add other ingredients stir and serve.

name: Avocado Daiquiri
preparation: Crush ice in blender. Add rum lime juice and 1/4 medium avocado in blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed and smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Owen Moore
preparation: Combine the rum creme de cacao and heavy cream in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the curacao into the center of the drink and serve.

name: Commonwealth
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Canadian Cherry
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Moisten rim of glass with cherry brandy and serve.

name: Screamin Hudson
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky Drambuie and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Canadian Black
preparation: Shake and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Lemon Sherry Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange slice and serve.

name: Fleet Street
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mott Street Manhattan
preparation: Mix all liquid ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lychee nut and serve.

name: Ink Drop
preparation: Mix chilled Captain Morgan Tattoo rum with your favorite energy drink in a shot glass.

name: One Ball Left
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the soda and serve.

name: Good Old Days
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute add a cherry and serve.

name: Red Rasputin
preparation: Stir add ice and serve.

name: Basic But Good Punch
preparation: Add the gallon of sherbert to a large punch bowl pour in 7-up and serve.

name: Mid-Night Passion
preparation: Mix 1 packet Black Cherry jello with 1 cup boiling water. Mix until sugar dissolved. Mix 1 cup Vodka (or more to taste) and chill in freezer for 2 hours or fridge for 4..

name: H-Bomb
preparation: Dump out six ounces of beer add alcohol fill up the rest of the beer can with water mix and let settle.

name: Maureen's Dream
preparation: Pour the vermouth and anisette into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Bali Punch
preparation: Shake rums juices and syrup and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the orangeade and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Martini Clementine
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Sour Apple Pucker Tanqueray gin Malibu coconut rum Belvedere vodka and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Adjust orange to taste if desired. Serve.

name: Pisang Garuda
preparation: Add pisang ambon and rum to a margarita glass with ice cubes. Fill with bitter lemon. Garnish with an orange slice and serve with two straws.

name: Colonial Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Harry Potter
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Serve

name: Harry Titty
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Mexican Skirt
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass. Add the shot of the tequila and serve.

name: Jennifer's Junebug
preparation: Pour the vodka coconut rum Midori melon liqueur banana liqueur pineapple juice and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Grinch's Christmas
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Orange Cream
preparation: In a large saucepan combine orange juice cinnamon and vanilla over medium-high heat. Bring mixture to a boil and reduce to low heat. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove cinnamon sticks. Stir in ice cream. Cook over low heat stirring constantly until heated through. Do not allow mixture to boil. Serve with mini marshmallows if desired. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

name: Orange Cream Drink
preparation: In a blender combine orange juice apple juice honey vanilla milk powder banana and ice cubes. Blend on high speed for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

name: Nuclear Meltdown
preparation: Build on ice. No garnish.

name: Metropolis #2
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of ruby grapefruit and serve.

name: The Lawnmower
preparation: Take ingredients and blend on high for 5 minutes or until wheatgrass is completely blended. This drink is very very very powerful. Be careful.

name: La Rosa
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky Chambord raspberry liqueur and Ocean Spray cranberry juice cocktail into a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add a small squeeze of fresh lime juice and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 2
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hot Georgia Peach
preparation: Chill and pour into a shot glass. Serve.

name: Artic Red
preparation: First smash the limes and sugar to bottom of the glass. Then add vodka and soda. Mix the drink with a spoon. Add ice cubes and lemon.

name: Mudwrestle
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker. Serve in an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Frisky Witch
preparation: Pour into glass stir and enjoy.

name: Abrupt Realization
preparation: Pour into glass stir and enjoy.

name: German Rusty Nail
preparation: Mix all 3 ingredients together in a shot glass and drink quickly (try not to smell it!!!)

name: Call of the Snowfields (Lumikenttien Kutsu)
preparation: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top.

name: Fear the Flava
preparation: First add a good load of ice cubes to a punch bowl. Add the blackcurrant squash and then the Fanta stir it. Then add the vodka and whiskey stir it. Then add the cider and stir the punch. Finally add the beer and stir for the last time. Serve this punch in highball glasses out of the bowl.

name: Canyon Quake
preparation: Pour the Irish cream brandy amaretto and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake very well. Strain into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Fu** Me Like A Beast
preparation: Combine all ingredients except 151 shake well with ice pour into highball glass and top it off with bacardi 151.

name: Absolut Hunk
preparation: Pour the Absolut Vanilia vodka over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Add the gomme syrup fresh lime juice and a splash of pineapple juice. Shake or stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: The Incredible Hulk
preparation: Combine the Hpnotiq with the cognac in a highball glass over ice. Admire the transformation and enjoy. Chill both ingredients beforehand for best results.

name: Pink Panther
preparation: Mix strawberry-kiwi crystal light add your favorite brand of vodka and serve over ice.

name: Bertrand's Black Magic
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail glass stir well and serve.

name: Macaroon
preparation: Pour the vodka chocolate liqueur and amaretto into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Mrs. Santa Claus
preparation: Pour the Firewater into a shot glass. Top with the Tequila Rose liqueur and serve.

name: Southern Rose
preparation: Pour tequila rose and southern comfort in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Hot Pink Pussy
preparation: Chill ingredients before using. Pour Tequila Rose into shot glass and float Firewater schnapps on top.

name: Dirty Condom
preparation: Fill shot glass with vanilla schnapps and top it with a splash of Tequila rose.

name: Duke Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients except champagne in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a flute and fill with chilled champagne. Stir before serving.

name: Chapala
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Green Ambulance
preparation: Fill the shot glass 2/3 with vodka and 1/3 with childrens style cool lime cordial. Serve.

name: Lethal Weapon
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option use two cans of mountain dew if the drink seems too strong for you.

name: Hawaiian Barbie
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Dole pineapple juice and tonic water and stir. Place a chunk of pineapple on the top and serve with a straw.

name: Barnaby's Buffalo Blizzard
preparation: Blend ingredients (except cream) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve with a cherry.

name: Hairy Wookie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend well until smooth and pour into a pitcher. Serve in glasses of choice.

name: Graveyard (light)
preparation: Mix the 5 whites in equal amounts in a beer mug. fill up the rest of the space with half beer and half stout. WARNING: Strong stuff! Do NOT try to drink this if you can't drink very well.

name: Acid Rain Punch
preparation: Pour into 5 gallon cooler the vodka tequila rum and everclear with the Gatorade and Sprite. Alternate alcohol/non-alcohol for better mixing. Dissolve the 4 cans of concentrate in a seperate pitcher with water until liquid. Add to the cooler and stir well. Chill all the ingredients before you put them in and then chill the cooler until the party. For extra flavor add as much Kool-Aid and sugar as you like.

name: Peppermint Fireball
preparation: Mix the rum vodka and whiskey together in a cocktail shaker. Add the peppermint extract/essence to taste. Strain into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Indian Flag
preparation: First pour Creme de Menthe into a shooter glass. Secondly add the peach schnapps and at last pour in the Cognac.

name: Mitosis
preparation: Fill a whiskey sour glass up about halfway with ice. Pour the cognac and the sweet and sour mix into the glass. Top with the ginger ale. Serve stirred with a straw.

name: Ski Slope
preparation: Mix in any order serve in glass with ice.

name: Tattooed Smurf
preparation: Pour sprite over ice add schnapps and stir.

name: Mad Scientist
preparation: Add both blueberry and raspberry schnapps to a shot glass and slowly top off with grenadine. Dribble a small amount of bailey's irish cream on top and serve.

name: The Mad Hungarian
preparation: Serve on the rocks.

name: Blue Dinosaurs
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a punch bowl and stir. Chill in refrigerator. Add sugar and fruit if desired. Chill over night if adding fruit. Serve in punch cups.

name: Shazam Shooter
preparation: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake to chill. Strain out ice and pour into glass.

name: The Bomb
preparation: Mix over ice in a shaker cup strain and shoot.

name: Ginger Messiah
preparation: Shake the vodka rum (dark or spiced) and orange juice with ice in a cocktail shaker. Pour into a collins glass Top up with ginger beer stir and serve.

name: Roy Rodgers' Corpse
preparation: Pour citrus punch and cola into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Mix ingredients with a spoon then add the whiskey. Mix again then add apricot juice and stir very well since it likes to settle on bottom of glass. Instructions may vary to your liking.

name: Melon Roy
preparation: Add Midori melon liqueur to a regular bottle or can of premium lager poured into a pint glass. Stir and serve.

name: Cranberry Kiss
preparation: Combine ingredients in a small highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Clear Cell
preparation: Pour the lemon vodka lemon rum tequila and gin into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Clear Lemonade
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add shaved ice and serve.

name: Betsy Ross
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hudson
preparation: Pour together and stir as required.

name: Bubble gum #3
preparation: All ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Champagne Lemon
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Gloomy Day Smoothie
preparation: Place mango banana orange juice and yogurt in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in clear glasses and drink with a bendy straw!

name: Dudley's Damnation
preparation: Take a good sized cooler any with a drain plug will do and pour in a 12 pack of Zima. Then pour in your sprite along with the limeade. Then pour the vodka in with the rest of it. Stir until the limeade has dissolved totally and there you go. Makes roughly 5 gallons.

name: Rose and Thistle
preparation: Slice the banana and add it to a blender with 6 ice cubes. Add the strawberries and milk and blend well. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Banana Strawberry Smoothie
preparation: In a blender blend the milk yogurt banana honey and strawberries until smooth.

name: Banana Smoothie #6
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in tall stylish glasses.

name: Banana Berry Smoothie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in tall stylish glasses.

name: Banana Smoothie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in tall stylish glasses.

name: Banana Orange Smoothie
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Serve in tall stylish glasses.

name: Yummy Bidnis
preparation: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir.

name: Cinnamoncranberry Iced Tea
preparation: Mix the tea and juices together and pour over ice in a tall glass. Add sugar and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Adelaide MOJO
preparation: Mix all spirits and liquers in a jug. Add the beer and orange juice then top up with lemonade and ice and serve in 9 oz glasses.

name: Simple But Sweet
preparation: Pour vodka in rocks glass. Half fill with apricot nectar.

name: Morley's Driver
preparation: Pour the rum cherry brandy creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee glass and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon to float on top and serve.

name: Seven Dials Cocktail
preparation: Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Citron and Seven
preparation: Pour one part citrus vodka into a tall glass. Add 2 parts (twice the amount) of 7-Up and add lots of ice. Garnish with pieces of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Seven Veils
preparation: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

name: Sun City
preparation: Shake liquors and juices and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add spent shell of a lime quarter; lemonade straws and serve.

name: Black and Green
preparation: 1. Pour the Harp ale into a pint glass. Add food colouring to bring the Harp ale to a nicely Irish green. Slowly add the Guinness (pour over a teaspoon so that the Harp ale and the Guinness don't mix). 2. Leave a moment to settle (with the finished product you should see the two have seperated with green Harp Ale on the bottom and Guinness on the top). 3. Take a moment to idolise your new creation (take photographs if nescesary). Yell HAIL TO ST. PATRICK OUR SAVIOUR 4. Down the creation and start over.

name: Dragon's Breath
preparation: Fill a shot glass 2/3 full with the blackberry liquor pour the absinthe over the back of a spoon with the spoon just touching the top of the liquor in order to create a layer of the absinthe on top of the liquor. Serve.

name: Drunksimus Maximus
preparation: Stir both ingredients together in a large shot glass or old-fashioned glass. Shoot.

name: BlackBurst
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jelly Bean #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Bruce Leroy
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass and shoot.

name: Jagerberry
preparation: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Drop the shot into another glass containing a shot of blackberry brandy and drink quickly.

name: Vermouth Cassis #2
preparation: Pour vermouth and creme de cassis into an old-fashioned glass. Add three or four ice cubes fill with soda and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis Tall
preparation: Pour the vermouth and creme de cassis into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: I.B.U.
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne and serve.

name: Blushing Geisha
preparation: Muddle the strawberries and sugar with a dash of lemon juice in the bottom of a mixing tin half-filled with ice cubes. Add sake and vodka. Shake well and pour entire contents into an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Blushing Barmaid
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Jimmy's Special
preparation: Put the cognac in a glass and after that the champagne.

name: Bonaparte Velvet
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve with straws.

name: Will to Live
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: King's Ruin
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Palais Royal
preparation: Pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

name: Kongepjolter
preparation: Pour the cognac into the mug and mix in the champagne.

name: Martian Sex Monster
preparation: Blend the galliano cognac and ice cream briefly in a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle the melon liqueur on top and serve with straws.

name: Iron Hindu
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cardamom) with plenty of ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Guavaberry Colada
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1/4 cup crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with a dash of pineapple juice. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg and a pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Vaina
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Serve in a red wine glass and sprinkle powdered cinnamon on top.

name: Alfonso
preparation: In a wine glass add the bitters to the sugar. Then add the dubonnet and a tsp. of ice. Fill the glass with champagne stir gently and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: L'Aunisien
preparation: Serve in a champagne flute.

name: Atheist's Best
preparation: Take two glasses. Fill one with champagne and mix the other glass with the specified amounts of the other ingredients. Mix the contents of both glasses. You end up with two glasses of the drink.

name: Old Glory
preparation: Layer the drinks in above order into a shot glass. Red/white/blue like old glory. Shoot.

name: Morning Glory Cocktail
preparation: Combine the vodka creme de cacao and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and serve.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
preparation: Add scotch lemon juice sugar egg and bitters to a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a collins glass half-filled with ice. Add the soda water and serve with a slice of orange and a muddler.

name: Blue Glory
preparation: Pour the peppermint schnapps blue curacao and lemon-lime soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Americano
preparation: Pour over ice into an collins glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists. You may fill with some club soda.

name: Spritzer
preparation: Pour wine in a balloon wine glass add soda and serve.

name: Sancho Panza
preparation: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

name: Harlem Cocktail
preparation: Shake gin pineapple juice and maraschino liqueur with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Buck's Peter
preparation: Pour the cranberry juice Malibu coconut rum Canada Dry cranberry soda and Crown Royal Canadian Whisky into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Champerno
preparation: Pour into a wine glass.

name: Ginger-bang Champagne
preparation: Muddle fresh ginger in the bottom of a bar glass. Add chilled champagne and simple syrup stir gently and immediately strain into champagne flute. Serve.

name: Kretchma Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kashmir
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fluffy Pink Angel
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and shoot.

name: Strawberry Bolle
preparation: Sprinkle strawberries with sugar add one bottle cider. Chill for several hours. To serve pour into large bowl with ice add the rest of the wine. Serve in small wine glasses.

name: Holiday Crush
preparation: Grab yourself an 8 oz. Glass. Drop 4 ice cubes in. Pour about an ounce of Gingerbread flavored Coffee creamer in your glass along with 5 oz of Fresh Milk. Visit your liquor cabinent. Pour a half shot of Smirnoff No.21 Vodka into the glass then pour a shot of arrow peppermint schnapps in as well. Top off with an estimated 2.7 to 3 oz. of Baileys Irish Creme. Stir well. Serve chilled.

name: Doc Holiday
preparation: Pour whiskey into a collins glass. Add surge and sweeten to taste. Add orange juice to taste and serve.

name: Feel The Burn
preparation: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

name: Hpnotiq Champagne
preparation: Pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Add the Hpnotiq liqueur and serve.

name: Sexy Martini
preparation: Pour the vodka and the chambord and the hypnotiq in a shaker and shake well before pouring in a martini glass then add a splash of champagne and enjoy.

name: Champagne Supernova
preparation: Pour liquors into shot glass. Chambord will sink to bottom and Hypnotiq will mix with 151 to make a green over red layer effect. Light shot with match. Drop flaming shot into glass of champagne (shot will be extinguished). Chug.

name: Dallas Stars
preparation: Layer in a shot glass.

name: Mint Melt-Away
preparation: Pour chocolate syrup into mouth and hold. Pour creme de menthe into a shot glass and take it swishing it with the chocolate syrup in your mouth.

name: Bohannon on the Rocks
preparation: Add all ingredients and stir. Drink with rehydrated space food.

name: Series 7
preparation: Pour over ice shake strain and serve like a cosmopolitan.

name: Sensei on the Rocks
preparation: With ice cubes in the the glass add the Kahlua and Malibu and stir them together. Add the splash of Jack and fill the rest up with milk. Stir and serve.

name: Fatkid On The Rocks
preparation: Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.

name: Benka on the Rocks
preparation: Pour the whiskey and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass. Fill with chilled ginger ale and serve.

name: Little Eva
preparation: Pour the Burgundy wine triple sec and lime (or lemon) juice over ice in a white wine glass. Stir and add the soda. Stir again gently and serve.

name: Snake In The Grass
preparation: Shake with lots of ice strain into glass.

name: Gin Aloha
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Boston Punch
preparation: Dissolve sugar and combine ingredients in a punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Add thin wedges of apple. Serve in wine glasses. (16 servings.)

name: Kill Me Now
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass.

name: Ice Breaker #2
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: El Mahon
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Monet Carribean Frost
preparation: Add rums and vanilla to an ice-filled brandy snifter. Add a splash of cola and fill with orange juice. Pour mixture into blender and half blend so it isn't too thick. Pour back into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Garbo Cocktail
preparation: Combine the gin lemon juice and Swedish punsch in a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well pour into a chilled martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Loaded Doctor
preparation: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Amaretto Stinger
preparation: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tequila Stinger
preparation: Pour tequila and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fallen Angel
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Mango Mint
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

name: Apocalypse
preparation: Combine alcohol in a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

name: Grendel
preparation: Shake ingredients (minus lemonade) with ice and pour into a pint glass. Top with lemonade.

name: Green Gulf
preparation: Shake with ice. Add creme de menthe.

name: Tomorrow We Sail
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute add a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Far Gone
preparation: Layer Crown Royal on top of caramel liqueur then dribble grenadine and Midori in center.

name: Hey Bitch Come Here
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Harley Davidson #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Blue Bruiser Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite add curacao and serve.

name: Magic Spritzer
preparation: Stir ingredients over crushed ice in a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.

name: Eben's Magic Juice (Orange)
preparation: Add the vodka to orange soda and add orange kool aid mix (make sure it is unsweetened). Pour a small amount of sugar into the mixture and stir (carefully. it is carbonated!). Taste and add sugar if needed. Enjoy!

name: Purple Magic
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice until very cold. Strain into either one large or two small martini glasses. Can substitute triple sec for curacao.

name: Magic Flute
preparation: Shake ingredients well in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass glass over three or four ice cubes and serve.

name: Phi Psycho Psycho
preparation: Mix in a large punch bowl.

name: Psycho Citrus
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except orange juice) over ice in a collins glass. Fill with orange juice stir and serve.

name: Between The Cheeks
preparation: Pour the Bacardi dark rum brandy triple sec and Rose's lime juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and serve.

name: MacArthur Cocktail
preparation: Shake the rums triple sec and egg white together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Liquid Angel Dust
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a 1.5-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Iced Comfort
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Combustible Edison
preparation: In a shaker full of cracked ice combine Campari and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Heat brandy in a chaffing dish. When warm ignite the brandy and pour in a flaming stream into the cocktail glass.

name: Grapefruit Nog
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Blue Edisonian
preparation: Put all ingredients into a shaker filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Sunrise #2
preparation: Pour Redrum and fruit punch into a shaker with ice shake then pour into a tall glass; float grenadine on top and serve with a straw and pineapple slice/piece for garnish.

name: Raspberry Beret #2
preparation: Blend all the ingredients with 8 ice cubes (like a mudslide). Pour in a glass rimmed with red-coloured sugar top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

name: Raspberry Remix
preparation: Pour vodka over a few ice cubes in a collins glass. Add Sprite Remix stir gently and serve.

name: Amortentia
preparation: Mix all ingredients. Pour over a little bit of ice in a highball glass.

name: Natalie's
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Menstrual Cycle
preparation: Pour the sour lemonade into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the sloe gin (see how pretty they bleed together) then add the vodka. Stir and serve.

name: Goodbye Sigh
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Add a cherry and serve.

name: Bluebeard
preparation: Stir and strain into a brandy snifter glass.

name: Black Eye
preparation: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tropic Heat
preparation: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass garnish with fruit.

name: Duke's a Champ
preparation: Pour vodka and blackberry brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Boot Hill
preparation: Combine whiskey Applejack brandy lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kanapeas Kick
preparation: Pour the Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the orange vodka and sweet and sour mix. Splash with Coca-cola and serve.

name: Spew
preparation: Add 2oz. of Captain Morgan and the 3oz. of orange juice and stir until smooth. Then add the red Bull and Sprite; Enjoy!!

name: Jamaican Green Sunrise
preparation: Start with the ice cubes. Pour rum and orange juice. Carefully add blue curacao making sure it falls to the bottom. Layer pineapple vodka on top.

name: Delta Cocktail
preparation: Pour the scotch whisky Southern Comfort lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh slice of peach and serve.

name: Silver Sunset
preparation: Combine the vodka apricot brandy Campari both juices and the egg white in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Royal Silver
preparation: Rim a wine glass with grenadine and caster sugar. Shake all ingredients (except champagne) and strain into the glass. Add champagne and serve.

name: Belmont Stakes
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Crimson Death
preparation: Pour vodka over ice then add raspberry and fill with Jolt cola.

name: Quaker's Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ragamuffin
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Roman Candle
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: Bayard Fizz
preparation: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Knickerbocker Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a small slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Pink Poontang
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a mixing tin and strain into a large shot glass.

name: Bedroom Farce
preparation: Pour the rum bourbon whiskey galliano and hot chocolate into an irish coffee cup or glass. Spoon the cream carefully so that it floats on top of the drink. Garnish with grated chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Joy-To-The-World
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Black Sabbath
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Chill Out Shock
preparation: First pour the chilled schnapps and then carefully layer the hot espresso on top of it. Insert a straw into the glass and place it on the connection point between the two layers and drink it from there.

name: Flaming Daniel
preparation: Combine ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Stir ignite and serve.

name: Pink Ranger
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker chill and strain into a shot glass.

name: Army Special
preparation: Pour Vodka Gin and Rose's lime juice into glass and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

name: Black Army
preparation: Pour gently i'ts important to get 2 layers. Use a shot glass. You can use 2 cl of each if 3 is too much for you.

name: Virgin Barefoot and Pregnant
preparation: Quickly blend and serve. Garnish with a cherry and fresh mint leaves.

name: The Mexican Pineapple
preparation: Pour vodka gin rum and Tequila onto two ice cubes in glass. Mix well. Add Daiquiri mix (or strawberry syrup) and Pineapple Soda. Mix ingredients well with two ice-cubes in glass and enjoy.

name: Sweaty Shooter
preparation: Pour rum into a shot glass. Top with tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Turbo
preparation: Shake. Strain into ice filled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a straw.

name: White Splash
preparation: Add the cola slowly to the pina colada mix.

name: Ola Homey!
preparation: Blend 1 cup of ice in a blender with the pina colada mix and rum. Set aside. Blend the raspberry vodka with 1 cup of ice. Rim a pina colada glass with sugar. Pour both mixtures one at a time into the glass. Top with a maraschino cherry. For an added effect add a drop of red food clouring to the vodka portion before combining.

name: Chocolate Peppermint Frappe
preparation: Place peppermint candies in blender or food processor. Whirl until pulverized. Add frozen yogurt milk and chocolate syrup. Whirl until smooth. Serve at once. Garnish with peppermint candy sticks if you wish.

name: Brandied Apricot Frappe
preparation: Mix ingredients and add to a double cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a cherry serve with straws.

name: Cafe Savoy
preparation: Fill mug almost to top with coffee. Add milk if desired then triple sec and brandy. Stir.

name: All White Frappe
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: Bomb on Bus
preparation: In a shot glass mix Irish Cream and Irish Whiskey. Pour beer into a mug drop in the shot and serve.

name: Delicious hot Party Punch
preparation: In the bottom of a 28-cup or larger percolator place the fruit juices. In the basket place the remaining ingredients. Perk as you would coffee and it is ready to serve.

name: Amaretto Shake
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled champagne saucer garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

name: Picon Whiskey
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

name: Linstead Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kentucky Colonel
preparation: Stir bourbon and benedictine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Peach Blow Fizz
