preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Burgundy Bubbler
preparation: Pour both ingredients over ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with slices of lemon lime and orange and serve.

name: Satin Sheet
preparation: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass stir and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth use a sugar frosted rim.

name: Vesuvio
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Sevilla Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Kiwi Casa
preparation: Stir the rum and kiwi juice together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes. Add soda garnish with a fresh slice of kiwi and serve.

name: Roadkill
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass and serve.

name: Red Dragons Breath
preparation: Mix in a shot glass and serve.

name: Damned If You Do
preparation: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

name: Ru's Snap Shot
preparation: Place pop rocks candy into the bottom of a shot glass. Add cinnamon schnapps stir and serve immediately.

name: Cryonic Shock
preparation: Mix the Blue Curacao Whisky Rum Brandy Ouzo Lemon and Lime juices in a blender. Pulse mixture for 2-3 seconds. Add the 8 ice cubes. Pulse for about 20-30 seconds or until desired consistency of ice is achieved.

name: Brush Fire
preparation: Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.

name: Jawbreaker aka Fireball
preparation: Pour Red Cinnamon Schnapps into a shot glass then add Tabasco Sauce.

name: Root Canal
preparation: Combine peppermint and root beer schnapps in a hurricane glass with ice. Fill with dr pepper or root beer and stir. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Rum Bubble
preparation: Combine liquors over ice in a collins glass and stir. Add club soda stir again gently and serve.

name: Dr. Dewar's
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice stir again and serve.

name: Cinnamon Apple Juice
preparation: Place red hots in the percolator basket of a coffeemaker. Pour apple juice in and percolate. This is a delicious hot drink for serving in the winter.

name: Tomato Tang
preparation: Place all ingredients in a blender cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Bannockburn
preparation: Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Green Nazi
preparation: Stir together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Soviet Sunset
preparation: Pour vodka triple sec and lime juice over ice. Fill to top with club soda. Stir.

name: Citronella Cooler
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Lightning Lemonade
preparation: Take a glass and fill it with ice and 3/4 lemonade. Then pour in the three shots and stir. Garnish with a lemon if desired.

name: Galapagos
preparation: Combine bitters pineapple juice pina colada mix melon liqueur lemon vodka and strega in a tall glass. Add whipped cream and serve with pineapple chunks dessicated coconut and cherries on top.

name: Chilli Vodka
preparation: Mix the vodka green chilli (seedless) and lemon cordial in a cocktail mixer and pour it over ice. Now add fresh lemon juice a pinch of salt and club soda. Stir it with a twizel stick and serve.

name: Green and Gold Bloody
preparation: Pour tomato juice in jug. Add all liquid ingredients first. Make sure you mix horseradish into the juice well. Add seasoning on top of juice then stir. Serve with vodka in an old-fashioned with/without ice.

name: Bloody Morning
preparation: Fill collins glass with ice add vodka worcestershire tabasco horseradish and celery salt. Fill with tomato juice. Shake well and garnish with celery stalk lemon and lime wedges. Salt & pepper to taste.

name: Alley Shooter
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice and mix together. Strain into a glass and shoot it.

name: Russian Mothers Milk
preparation: Russian Mothers Milk (in a large shot glass). 1.5-3 oz Stoli or Absolut Vodka (go big like russky) 1 oz DeKuyper Butterscotch Schnapps 1/2 oz Bailey's Irish Cream Pour in vodka. Pour the butterscotch schnapps slowly on the slide of the shot glass as if to layer. Then carefully layer or float the Irish Cream on top and serve. Throw the entire shot into your mouth without swallowing swish around from cheek to cheek several times and then down the hatch.

name: Retro Girl Bloody Mary
preparation: Half fill your glass with ice add 2 shots of peppar vodka and the worcestershire and tabasco sauce. Add Big Tom tomato juice and shake with cocktail shaker. Pour back into glass. Pour shot of sherry into the top of the glass add salt pepper and celery. Squeeze slice of lime into drink and then drop in. All done!!! Oh and with such a glamourous drink its only right you drink it with fancy straws and cocktail garnishes!!

name: Mitchell's Bloody Mary
preparation: 1) Fill a highball glass 2/3 with ice. 2) Twist lime over ice and drop in glass. 3) Add 1 dash black pepper 1 dash cayenne pepper 1 pinch celery salt 1 pinch Horseradish. 4) Add 1.5 oz vodka 1 oz stout beer 2 oz Mott's Clamato 3.5 oz tomato juice or V8. 5) Spear 2 black olives to the middle of celery stick sink celery stick and stir. 7) Eat olives when visible and eat celery stick to finish drink.

name: Green Kryptonite
preparation: Salt rim of glass. Shake Vodka and Melon Liqueur with ice. Strain into glass. Squeeze 1/2 of a lime into mixture.

name: Red Heinney
preparation: In a chilled beer mug (or tall glass) add 2 - 3 oz of Tomato Juice 1/4 tsp of salt 1/4 lime (squeezed) and stir. Slowly add one bottle of Heineken beer. May foam a bit. Lightly stir and serve. This is a very smooth drink and goes down quickly. You may substitute V8 Juice for the Tomato Juice as well as the amount of salt. Enjoy!

name: Simon Sez Seazar
preparation: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a celery stalk.

name: Hottness
preparation: Pour the Skyy spiced vodka and Vernors ginger ale into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a straw and serve.

name: Snakebite #5
preparation: Pour the green chartreuse into a shot glass add a dash of tabasco sauce and serve. Add more tabasco sauce for a more venimous bite.

name: Desperation Cocktail
preparation: Using a lime juicer squeeze the juice of two whole limes into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the dry vermouth and top off with ginger ale. Stir until all ingredients are mixed. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.

name: Gulf Stream
preparation: Pour the blue curacao champagne white rum brandy lemonade and lime juice over finely shaven ice in a sugar-rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: IAS-Special
preparation: mix aquavit and banana liqueur insert dash with lime fill up with 7-up Served with ice cubes strawberry

name: Fire in the Sky
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur into a cocktail glass. Carefully layer the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur on top. Do the same with the Tia Maria coffee liqueur strawberry liqueur and finally the cream. Add shaved ice. Fill a straw with grenadine and after placing the straw on the base of the glass release. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and serve.

name: Pierce Clit
preparation: Pour at least half a shot of each ingredient into a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Platelets
preparation: Just mix together in a glass and enjoy!

name: Russian Iceberg
preparation: Lean an ice-filled tumbler to a 45 degree angle and pour creme de menthe down the side of the glass to fill bottom. Repeat with rumple minze and vodka as to layer the liquors like an iceberg. Do not stir. Place a straw through the middle of the drink and serve immediately.

name: Polish Trainwreck
preparation: Put half shot of brandy in a pint glass. Fill glass half way with birch beer. Serve shot of Baileys on the side. Drop in glass like an Irish Car Bomb and enjoy!

name: Professor Chaos
preparation: Combine ingredients in a pitcher.

name: Vodka Green Tea Sprizter
preparation: Mix drink in order of ingredients and rim with the slice of lime.

name: Katinka
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Clara
preparation: The beer is first. The 7-Up is second. The ice is last but it is only needed if the other ingredients aren't cold.

name: Rum Cooler
preparation: Pour rum and soda into a collins glass almost-filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Citrus Rum Cooler
preparation: Add the spiced rum Malibu coconut rum orange juice lemon juice lime juice and sugar to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Flame Blazer
preparation: Pour the extra dry vermouth 1-oz only of vodka Campari bitters and 1-oz only of orange juice into a cocktail shaker with 5 ice cubes. Shake for 10 seconds. Add the remaining 3-oz of orange juice 1-oz only of cranberry juice lemon cordial and stir. Strain into a jug. Add the absinthe and ignite. Allow the flame to extinguish by itself. Take the ice leftover from the cocktail shaker place in a plastic bag and crush with a blunt object like a hammer handle. Place back into the cocktail shaker add the Midori melon liqueur the remaining 1-oz of vodka and the remaining 1-oz of cranberry juice. Shake for 15 seconds. Fill a highball glass half-way with the entire contents of the cocktail shaker. Add the mixture from the jug and top with grenadine. Stir garnish with a lemon slice and serve with a straw.

name: Two Lesbians for Flavour
preparation: 1/ place 2 scoops of ice in a blender. 2/ add creme de menthe in blender. 3/ add creme de cacao. 4/ scoop cream into blender followed by milk. 5/ blend on highest setting until like a milkshake. 6/ get hurricane glass and line the bottom with chocolate topping (before adding contents of jug) tip the glass on its side slightly with rim of glass facing down and twist the glass so as to swirl the chocolate topping. 7/ quickly pour the contents of blender into the glass and drop a few drops of iced magic to det on top. 8/ garnish with 2 pineapple leaves and a cherry with a mint leaf poking out the top.

name: DeRosier's 19th Hole
preparation: Pour the anejo rum bourbon whiskey creme de cacao Drambuie and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon on top of the drink so that it floats and serve.

name: Dusty Bill
preparation: Combine whisky Applejack brandy brandy lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Royal Bill
preparation: Pour chilled poire william into a champagne flute and fill with champagne. Garnish with a half-slice of orange and serve.

name: Louisiana Lullaby
preparation: Stir the rum Dubonnet and Grand Marnier together with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a sliver of lemon and serve.

name: Bill Violator
preparation: Add all ingredients in equal parts to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Trilby Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Adonis Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ladyluv
preparation: Pour whiskey rums and creme de cacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Triad
preparation: Pour the rum vermouth amaretto and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Maestro
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum sherry and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice and top with the ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: DeRosier
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Damn-Your-Eyes
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum dubonnet and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Dark Horse
preparation: Pour the rum Kahlua vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca-cola. Garnish with a lemon slice and serve.

name: Her Name In Lights
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Get Her Done
preparation: Mix ingredients in equal parts over ice in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Her Period
preparation: Mix vodka rum and grenadine with the Rose's lime juice. Pour into a tall highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill with Sprite. Add a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Secret Place
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Secret Soviet
preparation: Stir vodka and vermouth in shaker filler with ice. Strain into chilled martini glass. Add olive and dash of black pepper.

name: Cassidy Mist
preparation: Pour the Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey and triple sec into an old-fashioned glass with 2 - 3 ice cubes. Top with Sierra Mist lemon-lime soda to taste and serve.

name: Cafe Henry The Third
preparation: Rim a cup with sugar syrup and cinnamon sugar. Pour coffee and liquors and sweeten to taste. Float cream on top and serve.

name: Russian Funk
preparation: Blend vodka lime and sugar in a highball glass. Fill with soda water and serve.

name: Glacier Mist
preparation: Build into a cocktail glass over ice.

name: Midnight Martini
preparation: Stir the gin and vermouth together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a black olive and serve.

name: Burnt Martini
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail glass stir and serve.

name: Limey Cocktail
preparation: Blend ingredients together with 3-oz of crushed ice in a blender for 10-20 seconds. Strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sliver of lime and serve.

name: Cuban Special
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Irish Martini
preparation: Pour the Irish whiskey into a chilled cocktail glass. Swirl around the glass in order to coat; drain excess. Pour the vodka and vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Black Bison
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Liquid Machete
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Janosik's Letisko
preparation: Put 2 slovak units (1 slovak unit = 005l = 1.7 US ounches) of the hard spirit Borovicka in a typical 05l beer glass (that is what Pilsner is served in Pilsen!). Add one can of Semtex Forte (with CO2). Stir well. Can be consumed like a soft drink.. but hell...

name: Midori Madness
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except sweet and sour mix) in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour entire contents into a hurricane glass top with sour mix and serve.

name: Bluecheese Martini
preparation: Place all ingredients in a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with olives and serve.

name: Chuck Diesel
preparation: First take a chilled 12-16 oz glass and fill with ice. Add the gin vodka and lime juice. Shake. Top off with sprite and garnish with lemons. Stir slightly and serve.

name: J. R.'s Dallas Martini
preparation: Splash the vermouth into chilled 10-oz martini glass swirl and spill. Half-fill a cocktail shaker with cracked ice add vodka and shake vigorously. Strain into glass. Garnish with several extra large green olives stuffed with aged Roquefort cheese one will not be enough.

name: Pork Chop on Toast
preparation: Shake russian and cherry vodka and strain into a glass half-filled with broken ice. Add tonic water garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Geneva Convention
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Corniche
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sugar dipped strawberry.

name: Red Square
preparation: Mix vodka sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce in a shot glass.

name: Tete d'Armee
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except curacao) and strain into a cocktail glass. Add curacao garnish with a cherry and serve unstirred.

name: Gator Wizz
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in a tall glass stir and serve.

name: Jimmy Page
preparation: Stir together in a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Bucatini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker over shaven ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve.

name: Blavod Martini
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into martini glass. Add cherry.

name: Asphalt Road
preparation: Mix and shoot straight away.

name: Antoines Tarred Image
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cioccolatino
preparation: Pour both ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Carl
preparation: Make sure that the soup is nice and hot. When it is hot enough let it cool to 96 degrees. At this point you put a pint of vodka in the soup and stir for 1 minute. When it is done you will know it.

name: Golden Trailer Martini
preparation: Shake the Skyy vodka and Goldschlager in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Black Forest Cake
preparation: Layer ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Hollywood
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and strain.

name: Skydiver
preparation: Fill glass with ice add Skyy vodka add orange juice preferable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Blue Dog
preparation: Combine both while cold.

name: Donivan Flowers' Rocks
preparation: Put each of the ingredients into a punch bowl. Mix and with a straw shoot.

name: Ikonoclast
preparation: Pour the Ikon vodka and creme de cacao into a cocktail or martini shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a chilled cocktail or martini glass. Top with three swirls of whipped cream and a cranberry rolled in sugar and serve.

name: Volga Boatsman
preparation: Pour the vodka into a cup. Add collins mix stir then squeeze the lime into the mixture. Add an ice cube and serve.

name: Gansett Juice
preparation: Mix a can of Blue Ox which is 8.5 oz. with 2 to 3 oz. of Vodka. Make sure you stir the drink so the caffine and vodka mix. The drink is served in a cocktail glass with ice.

name: Tanker
preparation: Pour a full can of Keystone Light into a beer mug. Add Grey Goose vodka (or any vodka that you might have) and serve.

name: Goose Egg
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dripping Wet Pink
preparation: Combine the vodka creme de cacao ice cubes cherries and juice in a sherry glass. Stir top with milk stir again and serve.

name: Greek Hunch Punch
preparation: Get fresh fruit (apples oranges strawberrys pears) as well as canned fruit with juice (pineapples and peaches). Cut your fruit up and let it soak in a big cooler with the liquor for about 45 minutes. Add in the Hawaiian Punch and lots of ice and taste. Then add add Sprite and orange juice to your liking. If made properly then you should not be able to taste any alcohol.

name: A Clockwork Tangerine
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a beef pilsner. Stir together and serve.

name: Beer Buster
preparation: Pour Smirnoff vodka into a highball glass and fill with beer or ale. Add dashes of Tabasco sauce stir lightly and serve.

name: Grizzy Adams
preparation: Stir the vodka and the 7-Up Plus in a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Kamikazini
preparation: Add the vodka and the iced tea to a cocktail shaker. After shaking fill the drink in a cocktail glass. Serve with three green olives on a toothpick.

name: Scanex
preparation: Shake and serve.

name: Aranov
preparation: Mix vodka and juice in a pitcher or similarly large container.

name: Roaring 40's
preparation: Pour Licor 43 over ice in a cocktail shaker. Stir add 42 Below vodka and shake firmly until cold settles in. Pour double strained through a tea strainer into a martini cocktail glass (should be a smokey colour the colour of white horses on a stormy sea). Garnish with a floated twist of dried vanilla bean and serve.

name: Banana Dream
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Much better if mixed with a blender but a stir stick will do.

name: Allietini
preparation: Rim cocktail glass with sugar and set aside. Add Ketel One and Chambord to a mixer with ice shake vigorously and pour into glass. Garnish with small lemon peel if desired. Drink by sipping on sugar. Rotate glass with each sip so that sugar is always obtained with drink. You should have finished the sugar when you've finished the drink.

name: The Usual
preparation: Stir.

name: Pompanski
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve with a short straw.

name: Albysjon
preparation: Pour vodka sprite fanta and kiwi juice into a glass over ice and stir well. For best results add kiwi juice concentrate last.

name: Mexican Stand-Off
preparation: Carefully layer into a shot glass in the above order.

name: Highspeed
preparation: Pour all alcohols into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a highball glass. Add energy drink and serve.

name: Finlandia Coffee
preparation: Pour vodka and lapponia lakka into an irish coffee cup. Fill with hot coffee and float fresh cream or whipped cream on top.

name: Peltikatto
preparation: Squeeze juice from a fresh lemon. Mix with koskenkorva vodka.

name: Jonestown Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into punch bowl. Add ice. Stir.

name: Naughty Nick
preparation: Fill a glass with cubed ice. Add McCormick's vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy.

name: Prince's Smile
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Andalusian Smile
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: On the Square
preparation: Pour the apricot brandy gin and Calvados brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Malibu Wave
preparation: Shake all but the lime with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

name: Tidal Wave
preparation: Pour gin vodka rum and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add orange and pineapple juices a dash of grenadine and float 151 rum on top. Garnish with a piece of fresh cut pineapple. The wave will sweep you away!

name: Ron Ponche
preparation: Put first five ingredients in large pot (or double boiler perferred). Mix with mixer thoroughly in pot before heat. Cook on medium to low heat stirring constantly.( this is the hard part this cooking process takes about 45 to 1 hour.) This is a Panamian version of egg nog. Cook until it becomes thick. Be patient. It will thicken like gravy. Remove from heat. Add the 1 cup of water and the rum (this depends on how stout you like your egg nog. Scoop the liquid into decorated mason jar. Very important... Make sure you strain the liquid BEFORE you put into the jars. Refriderate and this makes a wonderful Ron Ponche for friends and family. Sip this Ron Ponche like you would any baileys or liqueur.

name: Jelly Bean #3
preparation: Pour equal amounts of each into a shot glass and serve.

name: Angry Pirate
preparation: Pour the peach schnapps coconut rum Maui Blue Hawaiian schnapps Melloni and pineapple juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with chilled 7-Up garnish with lime and serve.

name: Hangover
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a large glass. Shaken not stirred.

name: Mighty Christy's Hangover
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a pitcher and mix thoroughly. Lightly garnish with lemon and peaches. Add 4 large ice cubes before serving.

name: English Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee gin triple sec and kahlua into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top add a teaspoon of triple sec and serve.

name: Home Grown English
preparation: Mix the spirits together. Add fruit let mellow for an hour. Put ice cubes and splash of bitters in bottom of a punch bowl and add the juices. Add the spirits and fruit.

name: English Bolo
preparation: Muddle a stick of cinnamon with lemon juice and sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Add sherry stir and serve.

name: Bloodthirsty Pirate
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a collins glass and serve.

name: English Highball
preparation: Pour brandy gin and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water or ginger ale. Add the twist of lemon peel stir and serve.

name: Dizzy Dame
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a speared cherry add short straws and serve.

name: Dizzy Nights
preparation: Chill ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass and serve.

name: Sonny Gets Kissed
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Eden Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add a short straw and serve.

name: Coctel Algeria
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Beach Haus
preparation: Pour Black Haus blackberry schnapps and Captain Morgan rum into a wine globlet with ice. Top with pineapple juice garnish with a pineapple spear and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Time of the month
preparation: Mix the alcohol in a mixing glass with ice. Fill a clear glass 1/4 full with the mixture add 2 parts orange juice 1 part pineapple juice and pour 2 count of grenadine to finish. DO NOT MIX ONCE GRENADINE IS ADDED!!! It should settle out on the bottom. Serve cold :-)

name: Dixie Stinger
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Rum Stinger
preparation: Pour over ice in a small highball glass stir and serve.

name: Green Stinger
preparation: Build in a lowball glass.

name: Stella's Stinger
preparation: Pour tequila Pernod and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Naughtios Anemos
preparation: Stir together on the rocks in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Fruit Fly
preparation: Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit and cinnamon with 4 ice cubes in a blender. Add whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1/2 minutes at high setting.

name: Fly Swatter
preparation: Pour into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add a sprig of mint straws and serve.

name: Tropical Heat
preparation: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

name: Beat The Heat Lemonade
preparation: Add lemon juice syrup and cayenne pepper into a collins glass. Fill with ice water. Stir. Best kind of glass for this drink: Collins.

name: Copenheering
preparation: Chill the glass then fill it with crushed ice. Mix the cherry brandy and the vodka together and pour into the glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Red Russian
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass strain into an aperitif glass and serve.

name: Darkwood Sling
preparation: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use but I prefer Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

name: Destefano
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir until well mixed and serve.

name: Daytona Daydream
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Casablanca
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Add grenadine garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve unstirred.

name: Bye Bye Bahamas
preparation: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Bahamas Bacardi
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Nichols' Flaming Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Kahlua condensed milk cream soda and rum into a cocktail shaker with cubed ice and shake. Strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. If desired layer Bacardi 151 on top and ignite. Enjoy fireshow extinguish and drink.

name: Skylab
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Blackberry Punch
preparation: Pour the rum blackberry liqueur sugar and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Penguino
preparation: Add light rum and cointreau to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with tonic water and serve with a cherry.

name: Swamp Water
preparation: Add ice to a 12oz cup add vodka and brandy. Add equal parts of sweet & sour and 7-UP.

name: Bacchus
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Serve with a twist of lime.

name: The G.O.A.T.
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cup and pour into three shot glasses. The shots are ratios; the more the better.

name: Oklahoma Cooler
preparation: Pour the melon deoria Skyy vodka and cranberry juice into a cocktail glass. Add the 7-up and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Hazy Skyy
preparation: Pour the vodka Frangelico and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass (chilled). Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Limestone Cocktail
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add collins mix and stir well. Add lime juice to taste and serve.

name: Ponche de Pina
preparation: 1. Peel pineapples chop and shread. Add water and let stand overnight. 2. Add pineapple to a large saucepan with spices sugar and coconut milk. Boil for 5 minutes and strain into a large pitcher. Add rum and serve hot.

name: Mint Highball
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Astroturf
preparation: Mix creme de menthe creme de cacao and milk in glass. When ready to serve squirt in chocolate syrup and mix until it turns a grass-like green/brown color.

name: Aussie Mozzie
preparation: Pour the orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add green creme de menthe and serve.

name: Iced Fritter
preparation: Stir the Tia Maria coffee liqueur and chocolate milk together with 3 ice cubes in a highball or other tall glass. Serve.

name: The Two
preparation: Just simply pour into a shot glass or any glass of small size will work. Pour the ingredients in any order that you wish.

name: Country Cream
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine glass. Add straws and serve.

name: Joe's Orange Highball
preparation: Add the Kamora to a 12-oz serving of Bacardi Silver O3 and serve.

name: Maradona
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Boca Chica
preparation: Shake and strain. Serve with a cherry or orange slice.

name: Frozen Berkeley
preparation: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Arawak Cup
preparation: Pour the dark rum passion-fruit syrup pineapple juice lime juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple stick and serve.

name: Calm Voyage
preparation: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Tropical Champagne
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute carefully fill with champagne and serve.

name: Mexican Turkey
preparation: Pour the Corona into a beer mug (or other favorite Hispanic Import) and then drop the wild turkey shot into it and drink.

name: Royal Turkey
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except 7-up) and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add 7-up garnish with fruit slices add straws and serve.

name: Peach Up
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Santa Maria
preparation: Combine all ingredients except orange in shaker with ice. Shake gently and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Maria Mia
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a twist of lemon slice of banana and a cherry.

name: Black Maria
preparation: Combine and stir all ingredients in a brandy snifter. Add cracked ice and serve.

name: Liquid Candy
preparation: Place barenjager in bottom and baileys on top in a shot glass. Do not mix.

name: The Bathroom Floor
preparation: add ingredients to a 16 oz draft glass allow to mix then chug and enjoy the bathroom floor.

name: Brown and Red Weekend
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend well; serve in glasses of choice.

name: Green Day
preparation: Fill a 2-oz shot glass half-way with citrus vodka then add the lemon-lime soda of choice filling up the remaining portion of the shot glass. Shoot.

name: Incredible Cocktail
preparation: Stir strain into a brandy snifter and serve.

name: Green Lean
preparation: Mix with shot glasses its as simple as 2-2-2 shake twice and serve

name: Incredible Orange
preparation: Pour in order into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Flavor Five
preparation: In any order put all amounts into a shaker with ice and shake for about 5-10 secs. Serve in a whiskey sour glass.

name: Mach 6
preparation: Blend ingredients in a highball glass until smooth. Add three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Echo Hemoraging Tumor
preparation: Pour irish cream in shot glass followed by the blue curacao and finally the strawberry schnapps.

name: Cranberry Blast
preparation: Pour all ingredients over cubed or crushed ice stir well and serve!

name: Hina Blast
preparation: Heat wine add raisins and boil. Mix coca-cola tequila orange juice and add to boiled wine with raisins. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour champagne over the bananas. Mix everything together and store in a glass jar. Place in a fridge for 8 hours. Served chilled with fresh cherries.

name: Mexican Thunderstorm
preparation: Put Tequila and Goldschlger in the bottom of the glass (order doesn't matter) then the Sambuca on top. In theory what should happen is the Sambuca being a heavier liquor than the other two will force it's way to the bottom of the shot glass causing the Tequila and Goldschlger to billow (like clouds) against a dark sky (the Sambuca) to the top with the flecks of gold from the Goldschlger looking like lightning bolts. And the Tequila of course makes it Mexican. It's a powerful shot but the cinnamon flavour of the Goldschlger really cuts the liquorice flavour of the Sambuca and makes it taste pretty good. But I'd still say it's an aquired taste and it is pretty strong and a few of them will definetley get you tipsy. Still it's a cool shot and my personal favourite :)

name: Dirty Donkey
preparation: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Mayan Chocolate
preparation: Add liquor with one cube of ice. swirl around before drinking each time. This is a drink that is meant to be sipped on.

name: Doc Hollyblock
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: C4
preparation: Layer ingredients in equal parts in a shot glass; Rumple Minze bottom then Hot Damn! then Jagermeister and finally Midori on top. Serve.

name: Nuclear Slush
preparation: Fill a blender about 3/4 with crushed ice and add liqueurs. Mix and add the sour mix until the mixture funnels in the blender. The final result should be thick. Add more ice if necessary. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Closed Casket
preparation: Pour 151 last and light.

name: Jones
preparation: Stir together in a collins glass and serve.

name: Buck Jones
preparation: Pour rum sherry and juice of lime in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve.

name: Mundo Fine
preparation: Shake or mix all ingredients and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass (or any glass large enough). Garnish with an orange slice a lemon slice and a cherry if so desired.

name: Fine and Dandy
preparation: Combine the whisky Dubonnet Cointreau and bitters in an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Sweating Colombian
preparation: Shake vodka Kahlua and Goldschlager with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass fill with light cream and serve.

name: Mint Condition
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve with a straw.

name: Now and Later
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass and serve.

name: Good Action
preparation: Stir over ice in a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Good Coffee
preparation: Mix in a coffee mug.

name: Boris's Good Night Cup
preparation: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass and serve.

name: Jesus Juice
preparation: Get a beer glass and fill a 1/4 of it with the whisky. Add vodka until half full then the Fosters beer until 3/4 full. Add the cider 'til glass is almost full. Add a hint of blackcurrant squash. Serve.

name: Purple Jesus
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: FU2
preparation: Layer from top to bottom.

name: Five Before Flying
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey Southern Comfort creme de bananes brandy creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink and serve.

name: General Cocktail
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Satin Angel
preparation: Add a splash of Coca-Cola to the Frangelico over Ice and fill add the cream.

name: Charlie's Angel
preparation: Pour ingredients (except soda) into the beaker of a cocktail shaker. Mix gently and pour into a glass half-filled with ice. Squeeze and drop one fresh lime wedge into the glass. Top with soda and serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Super Smoothie
preparation: Chunk up the two bananas and put them in the bottom of a blender. Place the two large wedges of pineapple strawberries and ice on top. Add rum if desired. Puree until smooth (a little water or fruit juice might be required). Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

name: Blackberry Smoothie
preparation: Combine the vanilla ice cream and blackberry brandy in a blender. Blend until smooth pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Grape-Lemon-Pineapple Smoothie
preparation: Place ingredients into a blender and liquify.

name: Milk Stiffy
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Topaz
preparation: Cobine ingredients in a shaker 2/3 filled with ice. Shake well and then strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Velvet Kilt
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice until chilled and strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or small butterscotch candy.

name: Cherry Martini
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry at the bottom and serve.

name: Jamaican Spirit
preparation: Put the vodka tequila gin and triple sec into a shaker with lots of ice. Mix well then pour into a cocktail glass. Pour the orange juice and the jamaican rum. (the rum goes last) Decorate the glass with a slice of orange and a tiny umbrella. Serve.

name: Jimmy Conway
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a large shot glass stir and serve.

name: Flaming Duck Quiff
preparation: Blend the Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey grenadine and Kahlua coffee liqueur together with the ice. Pour into a whiskey sour glass; layer the melted caramel on top then add the 151. Ignite and serve.

name: Duck Soup
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Hillbilly Kool Aid
preparation: Chill all ingredients. Pour all ingredients into big enough cup stir and enjoy.

name: Fuzzy Asshole
preparation: Fill coffee mug half full with coffee. Fill the other half full of peach schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

name: Minty Asshole
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

name: G Spot #2
preparation: Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice. Pour one shot of Midori into the glass. Squeeze the lime so that the juice goes into the glass and add 3 mint leaves crushing them a little bit. And a pinch of sugar. Pour in the cloudy apple juice and then add schweppes slowly (so that it goes to the bottom). Garnish with a lime wedge and/or suger rim around the glass.

name: G Spot
preparation: Add ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake pour into shot glasses enjoy!!!

name: Za Za
preparation: Pour a dash of angostura bitters into the bottom of the glass. Add gin and dubonnet. Stir.

name: Burning Cherry
preparation: Combine the George Dickel Jack Daniels and Jim Beam into a 2 ounce shot glass. Splash in the grenadine. Give a quick stir-spin with a straw or stir rod. Slam fast and hard. Exhale.

name: Ginemade
preparation: Add the gin to the lemonade in a pitcher. Serve into glasses or cups.

name: Partymeister
preparation: Pour gin into a collins glass. Add malibu rum and top with rose's lime juice (to taste). Fill with lemonade add ice and serve with a straw.

name: Iron Curtain
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Burning Demon Piss
preparation: Pour the Jose Cuervo tequila Southern Comfort peach liqueur Captain Morgan spiced rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a beer mug. Add hot sauce and an extremely hot cup of coffee then top with Bacardi and serve.

name: Bloody Chicken
preparation: Pour Wild Turkey into shot glass. Fill the rest up with the Tequila. Finally add the drop of Tabasco Sauce. Make sure you have a chaser for this one.

name: Cotton Farmer
preparation: Mix in shaker with plenty of ice. Strain into shot glasses and take as a shooter.

name: Nypaver's Black Sherbert
preparation: Pour Captain Morgan's Tattoo orange rum and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour contents into a highball glass. Top with root beer stir lightly and serve.

name: Andes Candies
preparation: Add the Ice 101 to a tall glass. Fill to the top with chocolate milk. Mix very thoroughly and keep drink as cold as possible until finished. Tastes exactly like Andes Candies.

name: Kentucky Kernel
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Serve.

name: Magnum
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender with three cups of ice. Blend pour into cocktail glasses and serve.

name: Jimmy Tudeski
preparation: Combine whiskies (Bourbon and Scotch) with dry gin in a shot glass stir lightly and serve.

name: Old Yeller
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Dorm Room Citrus Punch
preparation: In a 10 gallon storage tub place cut up citrus fruit and vodka. Let sit over night. Then pour in the hawaiian pinch juice and Sprite. Enjoy. Although seeing as this is made for dorm rooms any of the ingredients can be replaced for whatever is available.

name: Aftershock Surprise
preparation: Add Aftershock and sambuca to a pint glass almost filled with Carlsberg and serve.

name: Laura's Surprise
preparation: Add banana strawberries pineapple ice and captain morgan's into a blender and mix until slushy. Pour into a glass top with a cherry and an orange slice on the side of the glass.

name: Bloody Bruiser
preparation: Chill ingredients and layer in following order into a shot glass: Aftershock cinnamon schnapps Blue Curacao liqueur Jagermeister liqueur. Serve immediately.

name: Ferrari
preparation: Pour the Rose's grenadine syrup at the bottom of a shot glass. On it carefully put the hot coffee on top of it then Stroh 80 rum on top of the coffee. Serve.

name: Frozen Steve-O
preparation: Place ingredients into electric blender blend until smooth.

name: October 27th
preparation: Pour the rums Rose's grenadine and Coca-cola into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Exit the Brain
preparation: Fill the glass with cubed ice to the top. Start with the passion juice then add the rum  and finally the grenadine. Top it off with the red bull.

name: Boozer Bob
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Fox And Hounds
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fox Poison
preparation: Begin with vodka then blue curacao. After that add the lime liqueur. Mix in the grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with sprite and put in some ice cubes.

name: Beer Cooler
preparation: Add both ingredients to a beer mug and serve.

name: Irish Depth Charge
preparation: 1. Pour a double shot of vodka into a double shot glass. Holding a pint glass upside-down over the shot glass press the shot glass firmly to the bottom of the pint glass. Flip over. 2. Fill the pint glass 1/2 full of Bass Ale. Pour Guinness over a spoon until pint glass is full. Remove the double shot glass carefully from the drink and serve.

name: Cynar Biere
preparation: Pour the Cynar and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill with beer stir and serve.

name: Flaming Boilermaker
preparation: Pour the whiskey into a shot glass. Whiskey won't burn on it's own so heat it in a microwave for 5 - 10 seconds (just before alcohol starts boiling). Ignite the shot of whiskey drop it into a pint of beer and serve.

name: Eggnotini
preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker 1/2 full with ice add ingredients shake shake shake until cold and frothy. Pour into a well chilled martini / cocktail glass. Top with a dusting of nutmeg and serve.

name: Bite Me
preparation: Pour the rum root beer and soda into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Love Bite
preparation: Pour the cherry liqueur into a cocktail glass. Layer the parfait amour on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon. Top with cream and serve.

name: Zenmeister
preparation: Mix together and enjoy.

name: Deer Killer
preparation: Mix all drinks in a blender You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the hot melting butter (or the schnapps) right before you drink. Makes enough for at least 10 people.

name: Michelada Cubana
preparation: Pour Tabasco and lime over ice in a beer mug. Slowly add Tecate beer. Once foam has subsided quickly pour the Clamato. No need to stir if done right.

name: Paco Mix
preparation: In a beer mug add ice lemon and salt then add the beer stir a bit add the tabasco sauce and the worcestershire sauce. Finally add the tequila and vodka.

name: Death Mix
preparation: Just run the coke syrup down the side of the glass (the dark stuff not the soda). Any size glass will do. Then fill the rest with grenadine. Do not skull it because it is very very strong. Look at it in the light - it should be very dark.

name: Death Mix
preparation: Mix the gin vodka Red Bull and club soda together in a large container. Add lemon juice and cola if needed (to taste). Serve into appropriate cups/glasses.

name: Mexican Bomb
preparation: Pour a shot of tequila and amaretto in seperate shot glasses. Place a very thin layer of Bacardi 151 on top of both shots light. Shoot the tequila first then carefully drop the amaretto into a mug of beer. Chug.

name: Cherry Corona
preparation: Pour the maraschino cherry juice into a bottle of Corona Extra lager shake gently before drinking.

name: Banana Slices in Beer
preparation: Slip the sliced banana gently into a hurricane glass then fill with beer. Mmmmm.

name: Mock Beer
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Greek Tycoon
preparation: Add the tanqueray malacca gin followed by the metaxa brandy and serve.

name: London Buck
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Jean Lafitte
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Pernod Demon
preparation: Coat the lemon wedge with sugar and douse with tabasco sauce. Suck the lemon and shoot the pernod.

name: Rum Sazerac
preparation: Soak one sugar cube in angostura bitters - in an old-fashioned glass and crush with a pestle. Add ice cubes pour in rum add a few dashed of pernod and fill with water. Serve.

name: Kaiser's Jest
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Add straws and serve.

name: Irish Trespasser
preparation: Place a squirt of honey in bottom of shot glass. Add other ingredients and pound it.

name: Patagonian Black Bush
preparation: Pour genever into a shot glass. Add fernet branca and a dash of sour mix.

name: Pickled Placenta
preparation: Layer ingredients into a shot glass in this order: Bailey's Dubonnet gin.

name: Honolulu Shooter
preparation: Shake strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Devastating Body Rocker
preparation: Pour in shot glass.

name: Bloody Sleigh Ride
preparation: Pour together into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pineapples 'n' Cream
preparation: Give all ingredients 5 or 6 good shakes in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a highball glass (without straining). Serve.

name: Pellston Hottie
preparation: Mix the gin and DeKuyper Hot Damn! together in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Guajira
preparation: Shake all the ingredients (except syrup) together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour over the strawberry syrup in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel and serve.

name: Eucalyptus Martini
preparation: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Double-strain into a cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with 4 eucalyptus leaves and serve.

name: Chaos Calmer
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into a goblet. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Corogin
preparation: Pour gin and Rose's lime cordial into a beer mug (frosted preferred). Add Corona lager. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Peacock's Tail
preparation: Pour chartreuse into a frosted champagne flute. Fill half-way with crushed ice and slightly damp down with the flat end of a barspoon. Add semi-frozen grenadine to form a layer and fill with lemon sherbet. Sprinkle strega on top garnish with a mint leaf and cherry and serve with a straw.

name: K-V-S Kaboom
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl or ice chest. Slice fruit and add into mixture. More cranberry juice may be added if you are a bunch of light-weights. Stir vigorously with a paddle.

name: Apeachy Procaccini
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: White Christmas
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
preparation: Mix together in a double shot glass (alcohol first!) then float the pepper on top.

name: Nestle
preparation: Combine in a shot glass and serve.

name: Inferno
preparation: Add tabasco sauce into the bottom of a shot glass pour equal parts absolut peppar and everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

name: Brontosaurus
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass add the lemonade and garnish with a celery stick.

name: Golden Shower
preparation: Stir rum and banana liqueur with ice. Fill with sprite and serve.

name: Strawberry Banana Drink
preparation: Whirl in the blender with 2 ice cubes.

name: Lonely Night
preparation: Add the coffee liqueur irish cream hazelnut liqueur and vanilla ice cream to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Pink N' Wet
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in metal shaker. Fill with juices and Shake. Pour mix over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a Flag

name: Lime Time
preparation: Pour the beer into a pint glass. Add the lime juice and the hooch. Stir with a spoon.

name: Gangsta Colada
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass with/without crushed ice and serve.

name: Cherry Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Porto Flip
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Flaming Soda
preparation: Serve over rocks if desired.

name: Puerto Rican Punch
preparation: Serve straight up in a hurricane glass. Float the grenadine on top.

name: AWOL
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Serve with a wedge of orange on the rim.

name: Island Toy
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: French Fry
preparation: Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur triple sec lime juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Mambo's Dream
preparation: Pour the dark rum banana liqueur juices and triple sec into a highball glass filled with crushed or shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Hooch
preparation: Poor fruit punch into a large cooler or bucket. Slice apples and peaches (you dont have to add apples and peaches you can add just apples or just peaches. I reccommend both.) Dump apples and peaches into cooler or bucket. Pour the fifth of pure-grain into the bucket and mix! Serve in cups.

name: Nijinski Blini
preparation: Pour all ingredients over some crushed ice in a champagne flute. Stir gently and serve.

name: Peach Punch
preparation: Add wine liqueur brandy sugar cloves and chopped fruit to a large 40-litre bowl. Mix until the sugar dissolves and let rest for 12 hours. Serve with added sugar or brandy if desired.

name: Blended Comfort
preparation: Skin a peach quarter and add to a blender. Add Southern Comfort bourbon vermouth and juices. Blend on low for 10 - 15 seconds. Strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of both peach and orange and serve.

name: Peach Melba
preparation: Combine ingredients in a blender at low speed. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with raspberries.

name: Mig Cocktail
preparation: Fill a glass with ice and add the ingredients. Works well with any fruit juice.

name: Penguin's Surprise
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: My Busted Cherry
preparation: 1. Drain juice out of the cherry jar and fill with rum. Let set overnight in a refridgerator. 2. In a blender mix six (roughly) cherries ice cream milk rum from the cherry jar and chocolate syrup (to taste). Blend until smooth. Add more milk or ice cream as needed.

name: Green Apple Margarita
preparation: Blend all ingredients in blender. Dip your glass edge in salt. Pour in margarita! MMM

name: Fuzzy Watermelon
preparation: Cut a hole into one end of the watermelon and pour in the peach schnapps. Place the watermelon into the refrigerator for at least 6 hours. Alternatively cut the watermelon into small pieces and place them into a dish. Pour the peach schnapps over the watermelon evenly and refrigerate for a few hours.

name: Bruce Doucet
preparation: Combine schnapps and rum in a highball glass over ice and stir. Add Five-Alive then rim glass with sugar. NOTE: You DO rim the glass after mixing the drink. It is important to place a good amount of sugar in a small scotch glass or similar recipient. Mix the drink over ice and dump into the sugar. Next use a spoon to eat the mixture. Your glass of course has been rimmed. After you've finished the drink lick the sugar off the glass.

name: Big Squeeze
preparation: Pour the vodka and berry punch into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: RumRunner's Easy Margarita
preparation: Whisk all ingredients in a pitcher and serve over ice in margarita glasses. Alternatively substitute ice for water and combine in a blender for frozen margarita mix.

name: Firery Kiss
preparation: Coat rim of shot glass with Honey then por Red Cinnamon Schnapps(HOT DAMN)

name: Jet Fuel
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Firebomb
preparation: Pour the firewater into the Red Bull energy drink (or Monster) and serve.

name: Afterlanche
preparation: Layer liquors in a shot glass.

name: Jagershock
preparation: Chill the two ingredients then pour into a chilled shot glass (the order you put them in does not matter).

name: Armour Cocktail
preparation: Pour the sherry and vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Xeres Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jerez Cocktail
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Brazil Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Balm Cocktail
preparation: Mix all ingredients with the orange slices and shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Mexican Cherry
preparation: Pour into a shot glass.

name: Prince of Wales
preparation: Place a sugar cube into a small highball glass and saturate with angostura bitters. Add a single ice cube pour in cognac and add an orange wedge and stemmed cherry. Fill with champagne and gradually pour in the benedictine.

name: Orange Scorpion
preparation: Pour above ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Torpedo
preparation: Mix the liquors and garnish with a cherry cucumber slice and twist of lemon peel. NOTE: From the musical Follow the Boys.

name: Goober
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: High Rise
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with finely shaven ice and serve.

name: Chocolate Sin
preparation: Carefully melt the chocolate over very low heat or in the top of a double boiler over simmering water. Add the spices and the milk and stir to mix well. Heat until very hot but not boiling. Serve with dollop of whipped cream or float some marshmallows on top.

name: Ronin Grasshopper
preparation: Stir in an old-fashioned glass and serve. Give to a captive double agent to get information out of them. (Reference in the 1998 movie Ronin.)

name: Queen Elizabeth
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Liver Transplant
preparation: Pour over ice. Stir dont shake.

name: Green Spider
preparation: Add the bacardi 151 to a shot glass then add creme de menthe.

name: Bikini Line
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

name: Crimson Tide #2
preparation: Pour ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes stir slightly and serve.

name: Cuban Sunset
preparation: Pour all ingredients except the grenadine into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Layer grenadine on top.

name: Cuban Cherry
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Cuban Immigrant
preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Tongue Tangler
preparation: Pour bailey's irish cream and brandy into a glass. Add heavy cream. Stir well and serve.

name: Velvet Presley
preparation: Pour bourbon over ice add chocolate milk until creamy and serve.

name: Monk on Coke
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Orchard Downs
preparation: Pour dry gin into an old-fashioned glass and fill with apple cider or apple juice. Add grenadine (optional) to taste.

name: Mudskipper
preparation: Pour gin and ginger ale over ice in a collins glass. Add chocolate syrup and let settle in the bottom. Stir very lightly. Drink should appear dark brown on the bottom and gradate to clear on top.

name: Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer
preparation: Mix the light rum lemon juice and grenadine. Add the ice cubes and fill to your own taste with Cranberry juice. Add a wedge of lemon on your glass and voila! Enjoy!

name: Dog's Nose
preparation: Pour the gin into a beer pilsner. Add the ale and serve.

name: Battery Charger
preparation: Pour 1/3 of a shot of each type of Aftershock (Red Green and Blue) slowly into a shot glass so that the colors remain separate (but it doesn't really matter if they mix together) then down it in one.

name: Judge Jr.
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Kirsch and Cassis
preparation: Pour the creme de cassis and kirsch into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over 2 ice cubes in a wine glass. Add soda water to taste and serve.

name: Green Cookie Monster
preparation: Pour ingredients in a shot glass in the order listed.

name: Mumsicle
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum bourbon and bitters. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Bourbon Black Hawk
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon and sloe gin. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Tequila Old-Fashioned
preparation: Mix sugar bitters and 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila ice cubes and carbonated water. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

name: Magnolia Milk Punch
preparation: Combine ice cream bourbon and vanilla in a blender and process until smooth. Pour into two glasses and sprinkle with freshly grated nutmeg. Serve.

name: Golden Nail
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a small highball glass and serve.

name: Junk It All
preparation: Mix the cherry jell-o with boiling water; add vodka and gin. Pour into paper shot cups and refrigerate for 3 hours before serving.

name: Redneck
preparation: Bruise the mint in the bottom of the jar or preferred glassware. Add the bourbon lemon juice watermelon juice and sugar. Stir and top off with ice. Lime juice maybe substituted for the lemon. The sugar should be to taste.

name: Zizi Coin-Coin
preparation: Pour 5 cl of Cointreau on ice add 2 cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice stir gently and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

name: Charles Bronson
preparation: Combine all whiskeys together in a 24 oz. mug glass with about 4-5 ice cubes. Fill the glass with any brand of birch beer and serve.

name: Late Mistral
preparation: Pour into an aperitif glass over ice cubes and fill with cold water. Stir add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Old Sunkist
preparation: Pour both ingredients over 4 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Tomate
preparation: Pour ricard over ice cubes in an aperitif glass. Add grenadine fill with water and stir.

name: Sazerac #2
preparation: In a spare glass mix the bourbon the sugar syrup and the two kinds of bitters. Make a twist of lemon peel by peeling it from a lemon with a sharp vegetable peeler. Rub firmly around the rim of a well-iced old-fashioned glass. Put the Pernod in the glass and swirl it around to coat the bottom. Add the contents of the other glass along with one ice cube. Serve.

name: Ricard Tomate
preparation: Pour ricard and grenadine into a highball glass. Add water and ice and serve.

name: Bouzo
preparation: Pour in the bourbon then pour in the ouzo and serve.

name: Anthrax
preparation: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Shoot
preparation: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Tidbit
preparation: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: A Berry Breakfast Drink
preparation: Place the orange juice pineapple juice yogurt blueberries strawberries and bananas into a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. The berry drink will be very thick. Serve immediately.

name: Delicious Blueberry Smoothie
preparation: Place the apple juice iced tea powder blueberries banana and lemon juice into a blender pitcher. Blend on high until smooth.

name: Tropical Fruit Smoothie
preparation: 1. Combine undrained can of pineapples yogurt banana and ice cubes in a blender. Blend while adding orange juice until fruit is pureed and it is the desired consistency.

name: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
preparation: In a blender blend the vanilla yogurt pineapple juice banana mango milk and cream of coconut until smooth.

name: Banana yogurt Frosted
preparation: Place banana in blender and blend until smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Blend 30 seconds. Pour into medium-sized shake glass and serve. Makes 2 servings.

name: Slimer #2
preparation: Add liquor first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.

name: Indy Melonade
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry and serve.

name: Doh
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice. (NOTE: if you can't purchase Tahiti Treat use pineapple juice.)

name: Tropial Twist
preparation: Add the malibu coconut rum triple sec and pineapple juice to a shaker half filled with ice. shake well. strain contents of shaker into a high ball glass filled with ice. drizzle midori over the top of the cocktail to sink the midori in a rain like effect. Garnish with the slice of pineapple.

name: Fuzzy Goose
preparation: Pour all four liquors into a collins glass then fill with ice. Next mix equal parts orange juice and sweet and sour until full. Tastes like candy.

name: Melon Spritz
preparation: Pour the spiced rum melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with soda stir again gently and serve.

name: Strega Sun Witch
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Dirty's Liquid Lovin'
preparation: Mix Malibu Creme de Cacao White and Milk. Shake like crazy. Strain into glass add a pinch of powdered sugar on top for garnish. Enjoy!

name: Milk Punch
preparation: Shake liquors and milk with cracked ice and sugar syrup and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Coconut Cocktail
preparation: Place all ingredients in the food processor bowl or blender. Process until smooth. Serve in an ice-filled glass.

name: Mulled Claret
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to the boil stirring occasionally. Pour into a mug and serve.

name: In the Sack
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Harry's Harveys Punch
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a large goblet. Garnish with a mint sprig and orange slice and serve.

name: Cabernet Cobbler
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water in a large wine glass. Add cracked ice and pour the Cabernet Sauvignon wine. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Claret Cobbler
preparation: Pour ingredients into a wine goblet filled with broken or crushed ice. Mix with a barspoon garnish with fruit and add straws. Serve.

name: Blackberry Cola
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Poca-Hola
preparation: Funnel the punt e mes campari vermouth and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml) roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard stein or british pint) and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle and serve.

name: Seaside-Summerbliss
preparation: Red wine first then the cider.

name: Kalimotxo
preparation: Best served cold in a highball glass but without ice.

name: Sherry Cobbler
preparation: Pour into a wine goblet filled with broken ice and mix. Garnish with in-season fruit add straws and serve.

name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
preparation: In a large wine glass dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with strawberry lime and pineapple wedges.

name: Pendennis
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in a few drops of water in an old-fashioned glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Brandy Punch
preparation: Combine all but ginger ale in a punch bowl with sufficient ice to chill. Add ginger ale when ready to serve and pour out into wine glasses.

name: Summer Fling
preparation: Fill shaker with ice and add liqour and juices shake vigorously and pour 3/4 of a pint glass filled with ice. Top with Squirt and stir.

name: Bitch's Skim Milk
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. As chilled pour into shot glasses and shoot.

name: Chicago Catcus Juice
preparation: Pour 1oz of bacardi O 1/2 of banana lliquer 3/4 oz of midori with 1/2 oz of OJ Pineapple and cranberry. shake and serve over Ice. Garnish with and Orange and cherry flag.

name: Bacardi-O Crayon
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Golden Sunrise
preparation: Pour amaretto rum and liqueurs into a mixing glass with/without ice. Top as desired with equal amounts of orange and pineapple juice and shake well. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Red Kryptonite
preparation: In tall glass pour 2 - 3 shots vodka over cubed ice then add 2 shots sweet and sour mix then add 2 shots lemonade or orange juice (lemonade is preferred) then add 2 shots of spirite or 7-Up add a splash to 1/2 shot lemon-lime grenadine for sweetness top with 1 shot cranberry juice and optional 1/4 cup or less crushed/blended strawberries or cherries for added flaveor. You can add more or less of cranberry strawberry or cherry for a mixed flavor.

name: Captain Nelson's Select Grain
preparation: Pour equal parts of each liquor into a double shot glass and serve.

name: Klukwan
preparation: Mix Bacardi Razz with Sprite over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Drunken Rumsfeld
preparation: Pour the Bacardi Razz rum into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Rockstar energy drink stir and serve.

name: Frozen Forest Berries
preparation: Mix all the ingredients in a blender with ice til it becomes slushy. Pour into garnished with sugar margarita glass

name: Jenni's Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a pina-colada glass adding juices and nectar for last. Do not stir. Squeeze in the juice from lime wedge. Drizzle grenadine on top. Garnish with orange slice pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Kula-for-Shula
preparation: Combine the Bacardi 151 rum vodka and Gatorade Citrus Cooler together over ice in a collins glass and stir. Finish with a splash of amaretto almond liqueur and serve.

name: Rob Love
preparation: Pour the vodka curacao and vermouth over ice cubes in a glass. Add desired amount of lemon juice and half as much in sprite. Add a few drops of syrup stir and serve.

name: Son Of Adam
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Nightie Lifter
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: La Jolla
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Canadian Blackberry
preparation: Pour the whisky brandy juices and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass 1/4 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Painter's Delight
preparation: Pour gin curacao pernod and lemon juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with soda water stir and serve.

name: Bookmaker's Luck
preparation: Pour the vodka rum lime juice (to taste) and orange juice (to taste) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale add creme de bananes on top stir once and serve.

name: Canadian Cider
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a Irish coffee mug and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Orange Flamingo
preparation: Fill a highball glass four-fifths with orange soda. Add grenadine and top with whipped cream.

name: Flying Flamingo
preparation: Throw all ingredients into a blender and mix at medium speed drink before ice melts.

name: God's Great Creation
preparation: Pour whiskey and peach schnapps over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.

name: 209 East Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Strawberry Cream
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry half add straws and serve.

name: Valentined
preparation: 1.Add ingredients into working blender accordingly through list 2.Blend and pour into glassware 3. Garnish with Strawberry on glass rim chocolate syrup swirl on surface and straw and is ready to serve.

name: Tenderberry
preparation: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Add the ginger ale garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Strawberry Cascade
preparation: Blend all but the kahlua briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle the kahlua on top and garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry half. Add straws and serve.

name: Pink Planet
preparation: Rim a wine glass with strawberry liqueur and caster sugar. Blend all ingredients (except champagne) briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into the glass and add champagne. Garnish with a strawberry-half and serve with short straws.

name: Mexican Strawberry
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry.

name: El Grito
preparation: Add ingredients to a punch bowl with sufficient crushed ice to slush. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Strawberry Knockout
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except whipped cream) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Top with whipped cream garnish with a strawberry add straws and serve.

name: Jennifer's Kiss
preparation: Place one hulled whole strawberry in the bottom of a 12 ounce wine goblet. Add 4ounces of Kern's strawberry nectar. Fill with Rosso Spumante.

name: Bourbon Flip
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon egg sugar and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandy Flip
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the brandy egg sugar and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Ferocious Flip
preparation: Pour the brandy port egg sugar and cream into a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and serve.

name: Hot Irish #2
preparation: Add cloves to the lemon. Pour into a heat-proof goblet sweeten with white sugar (to taste) and serve.

name: Stout Sangaree
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the water in the bottom of a beer mug. Carefully pour the stout to give a half-inch head. Float the port on top. Garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon and serve.

name: Warsaw Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Wile E Coyote
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass.

name: Allegheny
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Barbarian
preparation: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

name: Johnson Cocktail
