preparation: Pour the blackberry brandy and rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Top with chilled Sprite stir briefly and serve.

name: Almond Vanilla Tea Shake
preparation: Mix the tea and ice cream together in a blender for 15-20 seconds or until smooth. Pour the mixture into a tall glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with sliced almonds if desired.

name: DC
preparation: Put tequila in a double shot glass then add the baileys. Slam then repeat.

name: Pepsi-Clear
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Balls of Fire
preparation: Add 2 main ingredients and 2/3 ice chunks - stir (or shake in a flask) - fill highball to top with fizzy waters and then gradually pour it down the inside of your neck.

name: Red Orange
preparation: Shake vodka cinzano orancio and orange zest in a jigger with ice. Pour into a martini / cocktail glass and serve.

name: Volga Boatman
preparation: Combine the orange juice vodka and kirsch in a mixing glass add ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Barbary Coast
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dolt Bolt
preparation: Pour into shot glass.

name: Nicky Finn
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

name: Finn Roses
preparation: Stir and serve.

name: Atomic Bomb
preparation: Fill a small glass with bear and put in a pint. Fill pint with Loitens linje.

name: Redcoat
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Delaware Morning Breath
preparation: Add all ingredients to a large container with plenty of ice. Add pieces of fruit (lemons and oranges) stir well and serve in punch cups or glasses.

name: Assassin
preparation: Pour whiskey tequila and peppermint schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass fill with chilled Coca-cola and serve.

name: Pink Cello
preparation: Pour limoncello and vodka over ice in a collins glass and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Peterborough Parallax
preparation: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake for about 20 seconds. Pour over a very-crushed amount of ice in a glass of your own choice.

name: IED (Improvised Explosive Device)
preparation: Combine Jagermeister (smoke) Goldschlager (fragmentation) and Jose Cuervo tequila (because we had 1 Mexican in the platoon) in a highball or old-fashioned glass. After all ingredients have been combined drop some lit Bacardi 151 rum into the glass and shoot. After a couple of seconds when the intital shock has wore off you yell BAM!!

name: Brandied Egg Sour
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes crack the egg and add the rest of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apricto Mint Julep
preparation: Peel pit and slice apricots. Puree in a food processor or blender with lime juice sugar substitute and 1 mint leaf. Add 2 ice cubes or crushed ice. Process on and off to blend. Pour into serving glass. Garnish with remaining mint leaf.

name: Forty 9th Parallel
preparation: Pour the Yukon Jack whisky Newfoundland Screech dark rum and Forty Creek whisky into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top off glass with Canada Dry ginger ale and serve.

name: P.S.U. Victory Dance
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a blender. Pour contents into a beer mug filled with cracked ice. Note: Add crushed ice to the blending process for a Frozen Victory Dance.

name: Penis Colarous
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour entire contents into a highball glass and serve.

name: Kahlua Cobweb
preparation: Add the ice cream to a highball glass. Pour the Bundaberg rum and Kahlua coffee liqueur. Top with coke and serve.

name: Canecutter
preparation: Ice first then add Bundaberg Rum Kahlua and fill with Coca Cola.

name: Force 12
preparation: Pour the Lamb's Navy dark rum Smirnoff vodka pineapple juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices and a maraschino cherry.

name: Pedra (Stone)
preparation: Add the following to a shot glass in equal parts in order; tequila vodka black rum bailey's irish cream grenadine syrup. Mix until pink and slowly pour absinthe over the back of a spoon. Ignite (use caution) extinguish and drink.

name: Earls Court
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice. Serve with short straws.

name: Hammerhead
preparation: Stir the black sambuca and amber rum together in a cocktail glass over crushed or shaven ice. Add Coca-cola to taste and serve.

name: Jamaican Reindeer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with half a cup of ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon and serve.

name: Lorelee
preparation: Add ice to jar add rum and finish with cream soda. Nothing else is required! Except adult supervision. Lorelee

name: Ego's Tang
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mon Amour
preparation: Add all the ingredients into a shaker glass full of ice cube. shake vigorously and fine strain into a large martini glass use a half strawberry as garnish on the side of the glass!

name: Spanish Gentlemen
preparation: Pour grain alcohol into a cup. Add espresso sweetened to taste. Add Ron Barcelo Imperial rum mix with a spoon and serve.

name: Tropical Pear Fizz
preparation: Pour first four ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake until chilled and well blended. Pour into glass and add 7-up. Stir to mix.

name: Telegraph
preparation: In a shaker with ice combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

name: Centipede
preparation: Combine vodka and rum in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with grapefruit soda and stir gently.

name: Firestarter
preparation: Mix the redrum vodka and schnapps in the glass then add the coke. Should the glass have room add a few ice cubes then serve.

name: Crow's Nest
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Embryo Cocktail
preparation: Pour the half-and-half into the middle of the peppermint schnapps in a chilled cocktail glass. Drop in the grenadine and serve.

name: Shindig
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Junior Mint Iced
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend and pour into a brandy snifter. Serve.

name: Melloer Yello
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Rip Griffin
preparation: Pour peppermint schapps over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with orange juice stir and garnish with a cherry.

name: Kooch
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion and serve.

name: Peppermint Bomb
preparation: Use a shot glass and fill half with southern comfort 151 proof and the other half with everclear.

name: The Loch Ness Monster
preparation: Mix it all up and beware!!! You can very the top off ingredient such as monster sweet and sour sprite gatorade. DON'T BE SCARED JUST TRY IT YOU'LL LOVE IT!!!

name: Gookies
preparation: Blend well more the better. Top with lemonade to suit own taste.

name: Warrior Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy Pernod and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Parisian Blond Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a drop or two of vanilla extract on top of the cream and serve.

name: Pousse Rapier
preparation: In a sugar rimmed champagne glass pour the creme d'Armagnac then fill with champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Crush de Valencia
preparation: Muddle 1/3 orange and 2 wedges of lime (skin on). Add mango liqueur malibu and cointreau & a good scoop of ice. Shake vigorously. Rim a wide mouth thin glassed spirit glass with brown sugar. Pour shaker contents into glass. Top with ruby red grapefruit juice. Sprinkle with brown sugar.

name: Passat
preparation: Pour into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.

name: Urbinos
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Headcrush
preparation: Fill the glass with tequila and add tabasco sauce. Carefully layer the whipped cream on top and add some salt to taste.

name: Prairie Chicken
preparation: Open an egg without breaking the yolk and pour into a red wine glass. Pour gin on top add salt and pepper to taste and serve.

name: School Bus
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: Irish Charlie
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Tannersworth
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Vendome
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Cherry Cobbler
preparation: Pour into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon a cherry and a mint sprig. Serve with a short straw.

name: California Dream
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the tequila sweet vermouth and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Olive Martini
preparation: Pour the dry gin sweet vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stirrup Cup
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Daiquiri Liberal
preparation: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Bastard
preparation: Place all ingredients in glass over ice and shake. Serve with straw and lemon wedge if desired.

name: Santorini Sundown
preparation: Shake and strain the drink into a well chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

name: Jumper Cable
preparation: Pour rum over ice fill with jolt cola and stir.

name: Paradise Quencher
preparation: Pour the rum fruit juices and apricot liqueur into a blender. Add one cup of crushed ice. Blend well and pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a fruit flag and serve.

name: Krook's Quencher
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry and serve.

name: Green Quencher
preparation: In tall glass mix midori lime juice sweet and sour and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.

name: Mustang Ranch Freebie
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute filled with shaven ice and serve.

name: Belgian Waffle
preparation: Pour Blue Moon ale into a beer mug filling it half way. Fill the other half with Guinness stout pouring it over a spoon and serve.

name: Georgio
preparation: Frappe in a parfait glass and garnish with mint leaves whipped cream and a light dusting of cocoa.

name: Cream Samba
preparation: Combine all ingredients with some crushed ice in a blender. Blend for 2 minuets. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with dessicated coconut and fruit identical to the flavor of the ice-cream.

name: James The Second Comes First
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: First Nighter
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Purple Problem Solver
preparation: Add vodka rum midori curacao schnapps and sweet and sour to an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice add grenadine until purple and serve.

name: Once Upon a Time
preparation: Shake everything with crushed ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lillet Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Lillet and gin into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Once-Upon-A-Time
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Frodka
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Drunken Grandma
preparation: Combine the Grand Marnier and iced tea in a tall glass. Add ice and/or lemon wedge to drink for extra flavor. The iced tea washes out most of the liquor flavor... so add as much Grand Marnier as you wish.

name: Kai's Drunken Love
preparation: Stir ingredients together and serve in a tall glass.

name: Brandied Ginger
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of preserved ginger. Sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Pussyfoot
preparation: Combine the juices grenadine and egg in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Kinky Sex
preparation: Pour the whiskey Southern Comfort ginger ale and lime juice into a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Add a slice of lime to the rim of the glass and serve.

name: Carmina Burana
preparation: Crush the two pieces of candy until they are pulverised. Pour the vodka into the shot glass before adding the powder. Stir it until the candy has dissolved in the liquor.

name: Commie
preparation: Mix all together in shot glass until slightly red. Add more hot sauce if necessary and serve immediately.

name: Lollishot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with a cherry-flavored lollipop with a plastic stick where possible.

name: Vicious Sid
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Bone Fish Shot
preparation: Chill the Malibu. Shake with ice in a stainless steel shaker. Pour 1/3 to 1/2 can of Red Bull into a highball glass. Add Malibu by straining into the glass and serve.

name: Porky Bone
preparation: Let maple syrup collect at the bottom of a highball glass and lightly mix the other ingredients with a few ice cubes over the top.

name: Jackknife
preparation: Pour the Yukon Jack into an old-fashioned glass filled with cracked or cubed ice. Fill with canned pineapple juice stir well and serve.

name: Porch Climber
preparation: Pour over ice in a large cooler.

name: Kentucky Tavern Barstool
preparation: Mix the liquors into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with cola and serve.

name: Buzz Bomb
preparation: Pour the vodka cognac benedictine Cointreau and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with champagne either completely or to personal taste. Serve.

name: Ready Steady
preparation: Shake strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Cubano Coffee
preparation: Warm up rum creme cacao sugar and coffee. Float the double fresh cream floating on top. Optionally sprinkle some grated chocolate on top of the cream.

name: Lost Cherry
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Pompeii
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail saucer. Sprinkle with almond flakes and serve.

name: Black Lemon
preparation: Pour ingredients over two or three ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Mozart Sonatine
preparation: Pour the chocolate liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add grand marnier garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Amade
preparation: Shake with three or four ice cubes in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Sweet Temptation
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shaker or blender and pour into a cocktail glass. Gently beat some cream and pour on top.

name: Black Banana
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a blender and pour into a martini glass. Float a small amount of whipped cream over the back of the spoon into the middle of the drink garnish with a mint leaf and serve.

name: Talbot's Dream
preparation: Add godiva and bailey's to a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well pour into champagne saucer(s) and serve.

name: Melon Tonic
preparation: Add vodka melon liqueur and lemon juice over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake 3-4 times then add tonic water or club soda and shake once. Strain into cocktail glass or pour over ice into a highball glass.

name: Carl Oehl
preparation: Fill a chilled glass old-fashioned with ice then add vodka (5 O'Clock/Hawkeye recommended) lemon and lime juice. Top of with tonic water stir garnish with lemon and serve.

name: French Foam
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Add a dusting of lemon or orange sherbet on top and serve.

name: Arctic Fish
preparation: Fill a glass with ice and candy fish add vodka grape soda and orange juice. Do not stir but serve well chilled.

name: Arctic Punch
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a large punch bowl and freeze until ready to serve.

name: Le Perroquet
preparation: Pour campari gin and orange juice into a champagne flute. Top with champagne garnish with a twist of lemon and orange peel and serve.

name: Dave's Unleaded
preparation: Stir with lots of ice in a punch bowl. Serve when chilled.

name: Crotch Shot
preparation: Mix equal parts of ingredients shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Home Alone
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Columbia Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Foggy Morning
preparation: Serve on ice - peach juice to taste.

name: Morning Energy
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Northern Lights
preparation: Pour the Absolut vodka raspberry liqueur and orange-pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Screaming Multiple Climax
preparation: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice shaken and poured into Hurricane glass but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

name: Marc Feldini
preparation: Pour vodka and sake into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a rind sliver of cucumber and serve.

name: Dr. Zhivago
preparation: Pour the vodka into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Dr. Pepper and serve.

name: Dr. Kevorkian
preparation: Stir well and enjoy!

name: Moonlight Drive
preparation: Pour alcohol into a shaker and add juices. Shake and pour into a punch cup with ice. Add a cherry and a lemon twist and serve.

name: Liquid Uranium
preparation: Stir ingredients together with 3 - 5 ice cubes in a collins glass and serve.

name: Greasy Swede
preparation: Mix together and serve. Do not chill or add ice.

name: Gazette
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Whisky Melba
preparation: Muddle a small piece of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

name: Nicky's Lemonade
preparation: Pour the Ballantine's Scotch whisky into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the honey and sugar. Add the juice from one whole lemon saving a slice or two for garnish. Stir and serve.

name: Brandy Cobbler
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Tripwire
preparation: In 5 gal. jug mix thoroughly all of vodka with all of lemons lemonade and water which should be previously combined. Make sure water is ice cold if not ice or refridgeration may be required.

name: Model United Nations
preparation: Stir ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass with/without ice as desired and serve.

name: Pink Fuzzy Pussy
preparation: Shake juice rums and schnapps with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add ice cubes. Add grenadine slowly and allow to settle. Stir before drinking.

name: Reve Satin
preparation: Shake strain into a cordial or liqueur glass and serve.

name: Cadiz
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Polonaise
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Bavarian Alps
preparation: Shake together all ingredients and serve in a frosted glass.

name: Soapy Tits
preparation: Pour Goldshlager Rumple Minze and Aftershock into mug. Fill with sprite.

name: Gummies
preparation: Place gummy worms/bears/etc into large tupperware bowl and soak with vodka and schnapps for 4 to 5 days in room temperature. After a few days of soaking simply take cupfuls of gummies and drink the left over juice. Both are delicious.

name: Cherry Cheesecake
preparation: Add schnapps then layer cranberry juice on top. May take a few practice shots to find the right amounts of each.

name: Lightning Rod
preparation: Pour both ingredients over a few ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Honey-Dew-Me
preparation: Serve as a chilled shot.

name: Dorm Room Special
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with lots of ice (most of blender). Serve in tall glasses.

name: Carmine
preparation: Pour Campari into a shot glass until half-full. Fill to the top with margarita mix and serve.

name: Flaming Banana
preparation: Add banana liqueur then sambuca to a shot glass. Light sambuca on fire blow out and shoot.

name: Cherry Toozie
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass. Serve with a fresh maraschino cherry and a slice of fresh banana.

name: Deez Nutz
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Loose Caboose
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice and shake well. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Sneaky Apple
preparation: Fill three quarters of the glass with ice and pour in the Smirnoff. Fill with juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of apple or drop in a few pomagranate seeds and a cherry.

name: Starla's Waver
preparation: Get a large glass (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. Serve.

name: Monkey's Heaven
preparation: Pour liqueur in glass then milk and stir.

name: Rangers Rocker
preparation: Pour ingredients into mason jar. Stir and serve.

name: Richie Family
preparation: Mix vodka whiskey and bailey's irish cream together in a beer pilsner. Add coffee and sugar blend and serve.

name: Purple Wolf
preparation: Mix in a one-gallon jug shake vent place in fridge.

name: Louisiana Well Water
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Carbonated Apple Juice
preparation: Combine the concentrate water honey and yeast. Sanitize enough plastic soda pop bottles and caps in a weak bleach solution. (About 1 teaspoon unscented household bleach to 1/2 gallon of water.) Rinse the bottles and caps well with tap water to remove the bleach solution. Sanitize your spoon funnel and anything else that contacts the soda pop solution. Pour juice solution into the bottles leaving about 1/2 inch of air space in each bottle. Cap the bottles and place in warm place (basic room temperature) for several days. Squeeze the bottles daily to check for carbonation. When the bottles are nearly rock hard place them in the refrigerator. Enjoy!

name: Intimate Encounter
preparation: Pour the coconut rum Bailey's irish cream amaretto almond liqueur and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add milk to taste. Stir slightly and serve.

name: Bourbonella
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jona's Special
preparation: Chill all ingredients. Add vodka then Battery then Sprite. Add a twist of lemon and stir.

name: Nappy Rash
preparation: Pour the rye whiskey spiced rum peach schnapps and grapefruit juice into a blender. Add the iced tea powder mix and 1/4 of an orange (including peel and rind). Blend very well. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Backyard Dawg
preparation: Add all liquors and grenadine to a shaker with crushed ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into a tall glass with cubed ice. Add the ginger ale and garnish with a cherry.

name: Courage Cocktail
preparation: Pour the amaretto Southern Comfort Malibu rum and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add juices. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Black Cherry Margarita
preparation: Blend everything. Serve in margarita glass with a lime wheel. Or shake with half the ice for a cocktail.

name: Black Cherry
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Shake top with a cherry and serve.

name: Electric Fuzzy
preparation: Combine. Add ice. Stir.

name: Snowballs
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed completely. Pour into a collins glass and serve into two highball glasses or one very tall glass.

name: Hepler's Peachade
preparation: Fill a tall glass almost completely with lemonade. Immediately before consumption add the peach schnapps.

name: Goldfish
preparation: Mix peach schnapps with plain or citrus vodka. Add mandarin oranges.

name: Caribbean Splash
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice. Blend well and pour into two seperate wine glasses and serve.

name: Kak in the Eye
preparation: Pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur vanilla schnapps amaretto almond liqueur vodka DeKuyper Hot Damn! schnapps apple juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Dust with cinnamon and sugar and serve.

name: Captain Nemo
preparation: Combine vodka clamato juice horseradish lime juice celery salt Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with cracked black pepper garnish with a squid and serve.

name: Tomato Lassi
preparation: Place the yogurt tomato juice water and salt in a blender; blend thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add celery salt/seed and stir thoroughly.

name: Bloody Biker
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until well blended. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve. This will cure the serious rider of whatever malady the night before has put upon them. Prepare to sweat.

name: Faith Hope and Garrity
preparation: Pour the irish whiskey v8 juice barbecue sauce and lemon juice into a highball glass and stir. Fill with beer and serve.

name: Hell Mary
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker fill with V8 juice and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste. Serve in a collins glass filled with ice and garnish with celery and a lemon wedge.

name: Beer Margarita
preparation: In a large pitcher mix the Corona and limeade mixture (follow the directions on the frozen limeade except substitute one can of water with one can of vodka - cheap is fine). Serve in frosted mugs with ice.

name: Lynchburg Beer
preparation: Pour Jack Daniel's over ice in a highball glass. Add Root Beer and serve.

name: Green Monster
preparation: Pour vodka over four ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add pickled pepper and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

name: Nasty Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur Wild turkey whiskey brown creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Flaming Layrnx
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Tangaze
preparation: Mix vodka with alize and tang. Stir serve with shaved ice and serve.

name: Mountain Cider High
preparation: Add the vodka cider and mountain dew to a glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Heidi's Comet
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass and stir well. Add a cinnamon stick and serve.

name: Anal Sex
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a white wine glass half filled with ice.

name: Jinx
preparation: Pour bailey's blueberry schnapps irish cream and vodka into a punch bowl. Add grape juice then sprite. Stir up and have fun.

name: Blue Solute
preparation: Mix ingredients in a highball glass stir and serve.

name: Shattered Dreams
preparation: Shake all ingredients except the 7-Up and pour over ice into the glass. Add a splash of 7-up and stir carefully: don't kill the carbonation. Add the vodka if you wish to make the drink a little stronger but you'll never taste the difference either way.

name: Lime Passion
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add soda garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Outrigger
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Hozark Cherry Cheesecake
preparation: Mix equal parts of your favorite vanilla and cherry schnapps/liqueurs. Ice it down and serve as shots or a mixed drink or any way you want.

name: Island Donkey
preparation: Add chocolate liqueur and rum in glass drizzle with Goldschlager. Can be served over ice or straight up. Makes a great shooter too!

name: Gail's Summer Storm
preparation: Mix ingredients in a tall glass over ice stir and enjoy.

name: Moog Patrol Swisher
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum Safari liqueur Cointreau blue curacao and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Fill with chilled pineapple juice and serve.

name: High Class
preparation: Add ice cubes to a glass and coat them evenly with the sweet vermouth. Swirl the vermouth around then pour out the excess. Sift sugar onto the vermouth-coated cubes. Add approximately two shots of amaretto. Garnish with a swirled lemon peel and serve. For contrast try adding a few drops of lemon juice to the drink.

name: The Grinch
preparation: Mix in a pitcher and serve!!!

name: Grinch #2
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and pour in the four alcohols. Add the sweet and sour and the same amount with a touch more of 7-up. Float the blue curacao on top to finish.

name: Baby's Bottom
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ladder
preparation: Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Bartman
preparation: Add rum and Mountain Dew to glass. Then add enough Maui to make the drink bright green.

name: Fruit Explosion
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend well. Pour over finely shaven ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of banana and serve.

name: Explosion
preparation: Pour the vodka Cointreau and lime juice into a pint glass. Fill with a strong sweet pear cider or add to taste.

name: Harry Alligator
preparation: Layer ingredients in order listed above. Squeeze a wedge of lemon over layered ingredients. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

name: Purple Purple Popsicle
preparation: Pour in 2 shots of chilled vodka. Add 2 shots chilled grape juice. Fill the rest of the glass with ginger ale. Shake or stir (stirring preferred) and serve.

name: Purple Popsicle
preparation: Blend everything until frothy serve in hurricane glasses.

name: Sexy Martini
preparation: Pour 2 shots of vodka preferrably Grey Goose or Belvedere then add 1 shot of chambord then add 1 shot of hypnotiq and shake don't stir. Once shaken pour into a cocktail glass and pour a splash of champagne preferrably brut.

name: Dubonnet Fizz
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.

name: Gladys Delight
preparation: Pour the vermouth grenadine and ginger ale into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Creme de Gin Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stormy Weather
preparation: Pour over ice cubes in a small highball glass stir and serve.

name: Marlene Dietrich
preparation: Shake ingredients well with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Squeeze in a piece of lemon and orange and serve.

name: Brandied Madeira
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fu-Cha
preparation: Put in large container (fu-cha bottle) with ice and shake vigorously. Drink rapidly. Buckets on hand would be advisable.

name: Cheef
preparation: Take a pint of freshly poured cold Carling and drink (neck) half of it in one. Pause for thought. Then with out stopping pour in the entire bottle of Reef and drink the remainder at your leisure. The Reef should be poured in one; any spillages should be noted and acted upon appropriately. The key to the whole cocktail is knowing when there is enough room in the pint glass to pour in the entire bottle of reef refilling it to the brim without any spillage.

name: Natural Right
preparation: Pour a can of Natural Ice lager into a pint glass add cranberry juice and serve.

name: Pina Vina
preparation: Blend with a glassful of crushed ice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a goblet and garnish with a pineapple chunk and a slice of lemon.

name: Venus Rum
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda water) and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add soda add straws garnish with a slice of starfruit and serve.

name: Caribbean Champagne
preparation: Pour the white rum and creme de bananes into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne and stir lightly. Garnish with a slice of banana and serve.

name: Chelsea Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth bourbon blackberry brandy Cointreau and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the crushed slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Far West
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon and serve.

name: Constellation
preparation: Pour both normal advokaat and cherry advokaat in shot glass at same time beside each other. Add butterscotch schnappes. Then add dash of blue curacao. There should be no set layers it should be a mix of colours.

name: Exotica
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker shake hard and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Wild Jackalope
preparation: Pour the whisky peppermint schnapps and Pernod into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Hot Minty Kiss
preparation: Add the Irish whiskey to the hot coffee first. Follow by adding the creme de menthe and creme de cacao and serve.

name: Minty Crotch
preparation: Add the white rum banana liqueur apple schnapps and orange juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously with ice. Pour into a collins glass top up with ice and drizzle the creme de menthe over the top. Serve.

name: Mrs. Taylors
preparation: Pour the gin Lillet and triple sec into a red wine glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda. Garnish with a burnt orange peel and serve unstirred.

name: Ramshanked
preparation: Place the lemon slice at the bottom of a highball glass. Add ice and pour the rum and southern comfort. Finally add the bottle of Bacardi. Stir and serve.

name: Captain Climer
preparation: Stir well.

name: Rickyrootbeer
preparation: Take 1/2 oz Baileys and Absolut Vanilla vodka put together in tall 1-1/4 oz shot glass. Put 4 oz 1919 Rootbeer in 10 oz glass or mug. Drop in shot glass and enjoy. This is a shooter for anyone.

name: Chocolate Dream
preparation: Mix the Bailey's ice cream and vodka. Drizzle chocolate syrup on top and add chocolate chips.

name: Black Forest Shake
preparation: Blend all ingredients; chocolate syrup cherry brandy vodka and milk with ice cubes very well in a blender. Pour into an attractive low glass and serve.

name: the Canaan
preparation: put the ice cream in the pint glass with the Barenjaeger Honey liqueur. fill with milk and stir/muddle in glass. can also be blended. Cookies and Cream ice cream can also be used instead of Vanilla.

name: Cherryvanilla Icecream Soda
preparation: Place one scoop ice cream into each of four tall glasses. Evenly pour soda and milk if desired in glasses. Top each with a scoop of ice cream; stir lightly.

name: Nick's Mountain Dew
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fake Mountain Dew
preparation: Add all ingredients into a big glass and stir.

name: Good Stuff
preparation: Combine ingredients in a glass with ice.

name: Berry Good Smoothie
preparation: In a blender combine nectarine strawberries blueberries milk powder and crushed ice. Blend until smooth. pour into glasses and serve.

name: Sexual Harrassment
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. *Pineapple Juice is optional.

name: Joy Jumper
preparation: Combine the vodka kummel lime juice lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Lesbian Joy
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice and serve with straws.

name: Loren's Lay
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Jack London Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Bizonkadonk Martini
preparation: Combine the Absolut Mandrin vodka Tanqueray gin Tuaca citrus liqueur Grand Marnier orange liqueur and orange juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass float Red Bull energy drink on top. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Supreme
preparation: Shake strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: The Moby
preparation: Pour surge into a highball glass and add vodka.

name: Fresh Air
preparation: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and lemon slices and serve.

name: Green Slime
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

name: Green Slime
preparation: Pour green Gatorade over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add Sprite stir well and serve for a fast and easy energy drink.

name: Axelrod's Sweet Concoction
preparation: Serve iced stirred not shaken.

name: Jackalope Punch
preparation: Combine ingredients shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. You can adjust the sweetness as desired by adding more grenadine. For more bite use 1 oz 99 Bananas.

name: pepsi pleaser
preparation: Mix the Vodka and the Kahlua in a shaker with ice pour in to a Old fashion glass and top the glass of with Pepsi It is also good with other types of vodka Also you may like to add ice to the glass if the Pepsi is warm Best served cold! My math made it out to be about 15% not to high for the point to get drunk but god to sit back and relax.

name: Midori Ecstacy
preparation: Pour the Midori melon liqueur rum blue curacao and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with pineapple juice to taste and serve.

name: Screaming White Orgasm
preparation: Fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredients in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking place ice cubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaken the drink. Take the ice cubes and water out of the glass and fill the glass again with ice cubes and pour the drink in the glass.

name: Turtle
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Mad Scientist #2
preparation: Mix melon liqueur sour mix and soda water with ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Top with rum and carefully ignite. Extinguish before serving.

name: Evergreen
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Bitter Pill
preparation: Mix JD & vodka together add dash of lemon juice and top up glass with coke!

name: Bitter Tea
preparation: Make tea mix with juice and Campari. Stir well. Pomegranate juice can probably substituted with 100% cranberry juice as well. Tazo tea could be subsituted with a strong hibiscus tea or another strong fruity tea. Use 1 or 2 ounces of Campari depending upon how bitter you want the drink. If you like your tea sweet add 1 tsp of sugar.

name: Bitter Lime
preparation: Pour gin over ice cubes and add lemon-lime gatorade. Top with lime juice and mix.

name: Screaming Epsilon
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.

name: Boku's Blend
preparation: Put all ingredients in the blender and blend until slushy. Serve very cold.

name: Penguin
preparation: Pour the vodka blue curacao and lemon-lime mix into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill almost with sprite floating the banana liqueur on top.

name: Rummy Sour
preparation: Blend in blender with a scoop of crushed ice. Serve in a parfait glass.

name: B2 C2
preparation: Pour into a glass. Alternatively multiply the amounts and use a large jug with chopped fruit.

name: Crooked Monkey
preparation: Fill beer mug with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

name: Gin Lollipop
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass and add water. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Honeymoon
preparation: In a cocktail shaker combine orange juice vodka and nectar. Pour over ice and gently stir in ginger ale. Add twist of lime and serve.

name: Idaho Dimetapp
preparation: Combine the vodka and rum in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add the chilled grape soda and serve.

name: Scrumpy Strong
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Anatole Coffee
preparation: Blend cognac coffee liqueur Frangelico hazelnut liqueur and iced coffee with a little cracked ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a chilled white wine glass. Add whipped cream garnish with a sprinkling of chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Hard Cory
preparation: Build this drink in order in an ice-filled highball glass stirring well in the serving glass before filling with cola. The 2 oz of cola is an approximation. It is intended to be filled to the brim with cola to dilute the alcohol and mixed gently so as not to flatten the carbonation. A garnish of a marachino cherry and/or lime or lemon is optional.

name: Bordij
preparation: Stir and strain into an ice-filled wine glass.

name: Hard Eight
preparation: Add rum lime juice and bitters to an ice-filled collins glass. Fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon spiral.

name: Lychee Martini
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with/without ice. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pomegranate Polecat
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Twin Peaks
preparation: Pour whiskey Dubonnet and Cointreau into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Bananalyzer
preparation: Pour the liquors ice and coca-cola into a collins glass to make it 3/4 full. Fill to the top with milk.

name: Granny Tequila
preparation: Pour the tequila and apple juice into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Thriller
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tropical Storm Jack
preparation: Put all in hi-ball glass and shake garnish w/lime.

name: Jack's Log Cabin
preparation: Put ice cubes into a highball glass or any kind of small drinking glass. Add 3 oz Jack Daniels Whiskey followed by 3 oz of Mr. & Mrs. T's Sweet & Sour Mix. Follow this up by a teaspoon of Maple Syrup. Stir in the ingredients with a spoon or knife (Mixing the syrup in).

name: Jolly Jumper
preparation: Put together fill with orange juice add ice and drink.

name: Doc Holliday
preparation: Mix all three shots in glass and stir. Top off with Dr. Pepper. Mix and Enjoy

name: Siberian Dutchman
preparation: Mix ingredients and pour over ice into highball glass.

name: Rensselaer Slam
preparation: Mix liquors with the coffee in an irish coffee cup and serve.

name: Purple Pancho
preparation: Shake with ice and pour into a salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Hyp-Gator
preparation: Make sure the Gatorade lemon-lime has been chilled as much as possible. Pour Hpnotiq into the shot glass followed by the Gatorade Lemon-Lime. Serve and enjoy the fruity sensation!

name: Minerva
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Costa del Sol
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange paper parasol and a cherry.

name: Anchors Away
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a blender with ice. Blend on high until smooth pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Lorraine Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Kirschwasser benedictine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frozen Aquavit
preparation: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer heaped with crushed ice.

name: Ballack
preparation: Mix ingredients in a mixing glass and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

name: Forget-Me-Not
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: Highland Fling Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Brandy Old Fashion (Pressed)
preparation: Place 2 or 3 green olives on a toothpick and put it at the bottom of a highball glass. Then fill the glass 1/3rd of the way with ice. Add 2 oz. brandy. Add Old Fashion Mix. Fill nearly to the top with 7-Up. Stir several times. Enjoy a bit of Wisconsin.

name: Tequini
preparation: Stir tequila vermouth and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel top with the olive and serve.

name: Piper At The Gates Of Dawn
preparation: Combine the scotch kahlua and maraschino liqueur in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink.

name: Poor Tim
preparation: Pour whiskey vermouth and Chambord into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Soviet
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Gumdrop Cocktail
preparation: Pour the amarula cream liqueur cream and butterscotch schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and pour a dash of blue curacao down two opposite sides of the glass (using a teaspoon).

name: Chocolate Cappuccino
preparation: Pour Carolan's irish cream creme de cacao Kahlua coffee liqueur and milk into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well until frothy. Strain into a cocktail/martini glass garnish with a chocolate ovation and serve.

name: 5th Avenue
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old fashioned glass straight up or on the rocks and serve.

name: Viking's Helmet
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass add a twist of lime and serve.

name: Nord-Norsk Depresjon
preparation: Pour cointreau aquavit gin and lime juice over ice in a small highball glass. Stir top with sprite or 7-up and serve.

name: Martian Cherry
preparation: Shake and strain into a glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Galway Grey
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cream) together and pour into a cocktail glass. Float fresh light cream on top sprinkle with grated orange peel and serve.

name: Jager Punch
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a punch bowl and serve.

name: Cherry Crush
preparation: Muddle four of the cherries with the lemon juice and maraschino in a mixing glass. Add gin shake well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with remaining cherry and serve.

name: Dixie Whiskey Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jack's Bagpipe
preparation: Pour the Gentleman Jack bourbon whiskey into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and add butterscotch schnapps. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: Puerto Apple
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Raspberry Jello Spritzer
preparation: Mix Jello with 2 cups boiling water. Once disolved set in fridge to cool for 10 minutes. Add 7-up vodka and Chambord (raspberry liquor) to and stir until blended. On a cookie sheet line plastic 1 oz cups or dixie cups and pour into containers. Chill until firm and serve.

name: Moment Brutale
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except gin) in a blender. Strain into seperate cocktail glasses stir in the gin and serve.

name: The James Robert Dean
preparation: Mix to make a large punch.

name: Rick James
preparation: FIll Highball glass with ice pour the Hennessey and the 151 together fill with 7 up garnish with a lime and serve.

name: Music City Sunset
preparation: When making a  Music City Sunset  I like to use a standard white wine glass. Fill the glass with half ice before making. Pour the alcohol in with rum first then the triple sec. Use just a splash of pineapple juice and orange juice first  which is about an oz. Once you've done that then add the cranberry juice but don't mix or shake. I like to give the appearance that the the sun has settled in the clouds and it looks like it too. Just garnish with a cherry and a couple of cocktail straws.

name: Flaming Anus
preparation: Combine all ingredients in mug. Let stand until room temperature. Enjoy!

name: Passion
preparation: Blend the frozen grape juice and ice together in a blender. Add the rum and blend until smooth. Add whipped cream to desired smoothness. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Halloween Punch
preparation: 1. Use grape juice and a variety of carbonated soft drinks (club soda ginger ale lemon-lime etc). Mix them in a punch bowl. 2. Take scoops of the orange and lime sherbet and float them in the punch. Let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch. (There should still be bubbles in it in the form of sherbet scoops.) Looks horrible tastes just fine.

name: Confetti Punch
preparation: Chill ingredients seperately for a minimum of two hours. Combine in a large punch bowl with a small amount of ice and serve into wine glasses.

name: Hematoma
preparation: Combine the Absolut vodka grape juice orange juice and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Pour blue curacao in on the top and serve.

name: Grapes of Wrath
preparation: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into the glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thoroughly.

name: MacAttack
preparation: Add gin and midori to a shaker with ice and fill with equal parts of grape juice and club soda. Shake and strain over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Amade Surprise
preparation: Shake Amade ChocOrange and the mango-juice with ice and pour into a champaign flute. Fill with Prosecco or sparkling wine. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Frisky's Surprise
preparation: Put all ingredients in blender mix well and enjoy.

name: Stan's Surprise
preparation: Pick a highball glass and add some ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw stir and serve.

name: Orange Surprise
preparation: Shake the peachtree schnapps vodka and sour mix in a shaker. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill with orange fanta. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Chocolate Mocha Surprise
preparation: Place coffee yogurt in freezer: freeze for 2 hours or until almost frozen. Combine cocoa and honey in a small bowl: add milk and stir well. Gently stir in coffee yogurt. To serve pour 3/4 cup mixture into each of 4 serving glasses. Garnish each with 1 tbls vanilla yogurt and a sprinkle of nutmeg on top if desired could also use sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Sweet Surprise
preparation: Pour ingredients into shot glass. They won't layer. Try to use one of those spiraled shot glasses from the liquor store for added effect.

name: Chocolatier
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except chocolate shavings) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute garnish with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: Chocolate Fudge Shake
preparation: Combine the milk ice cream and brownie in a blender and blend for at least 30 seconds. Let the froth settle before pouring into a tall glass. Add a mountain of whipped cream to the top and scatter the flaked chocolate onto the top.

name: Cranberry Steamboat
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Champagne Julep
preparation: Combine 4 mint leaves with the sugar and a few drops of water and muddle well. Add the bourbon and stir well. Strain into a collins glass add ice cubes and the champagne. Garnish with 2 mint leaves and serve.

name: Pineapple Julep
preparation: Muddle the leaves from two sprigs of mint with the pineapple wedges and simply syrup in a mixing glass. Add bourbon and ice and shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice and stir well until frosted. Garnish with two further mint sprigs and serve.

name: Dixie Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bourbon Float
preparation: Chill a beer mug. Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream then bourbon. Fill with coke.

name: Southern Delta
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Carolina
preparation: Pour strega into a chilled wine glass add champagne and stir slightly.

name: Quiet But Quick
preparation: Pour vodka cherry brandy orange juice and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Eagle Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a wine glass and serve.

name: Bisp
preparation: Let sugar water and spices simmer for two hours. Strain. Add wine and alcohol. Serve.

name: Nazi Qualik
preparation: Pour the vodka amaretto almond liqueur Frangelico hazelnut liqueur Bailey's irish cream and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with milk and serve.

name: Gareth Glowworm
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum creme de cacao and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

name: German Beauty
preparation: Chill cocktail glass. Fill shaker half way with ice add juices and shake vigorously. Drain in cocktail glass and add frozen berries.

name: Purple Cactus
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Nut Case
preparation: Pour the light rum Frangelico hazelnut liqueur amaretto almond liqueur and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Banana Bliss
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Norwegian Orgasm
preparation: Layer mint liqueur on top of the irish cream in a shot glass.

name: Jello Love
preparation: Pour the Bacardi O DeKuyper Watermelon Pucker schnapps and Cruzan orange rum into a cup and mix well. Add the Gatorade Fierce Melon; do not stir. Chill for one hour before serving.

name: Alpine Sprite
preparation: Pour and stir. Add ice if desired.

name: Carla
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a wine glass. Add lemonade and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Spear Chugger
preparation: Simply add in order vodka ice orange juice lemon and vinegar. Ice can be crushed.

name: Federal Punch
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.

name: Straight Law Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Citrus Cooler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a large ice-filled hurricane glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lime wheel and serve.

name: Molester Cocktail
preparation: Stir the rum vodka watermelon schnapps and hawaiian schnapps together in a wine goblet filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of 7-up and sour mix and serve.

name: Crimson Tide
preparation: Combine all ingrediants chill over ice strain.

name: Harakiri Shot
preparation: Mix the ingredients in a shot glass and serve with a pint of beer on the side.

name: Tabouzo
preparation: Chill ouzo beforehand. Pour into a shot glass add a splash of tabasco sauce and serve.

name: Gates of Hell
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the tequila lemon juice and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the cherry brandy over the top.

name: Quick Thrill
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet.

name: Quick Decision
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Smart Bomb
preparation: Pour the Jager and Orange Vodka into a shot glass and then drop it in a glass or cup of redbull and chug.

name: Jug Wobbler
preparation: Serve in an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Northern Comfort
preparation: Heat large mug in hot water. Add 8 oz of boiling water into mug and stir in 1 tsp of hot chocolate powder. Add 2 oz of Southern comfort. Cool to drink with 1 oz of cold milk or cream.

name: Alrighty Then!
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the Ice 101 and Tequila Rose. Fill with equal parts Bailey's Irish Cream and your favorite amaretto. Stir and serve.

name: J-Lu
preparation: Pour just under half a shot glass full of Dooleys then add Tequila Rose leaving enough room to add a dash of Tia Maria. Serve.

name: Event Horizon
preparation: Blend ingredients at high speed and serve immediately.

name: Black Suede
preparation: Prepare a double-shot glass filled with Tia Maria coffee liqueur. Prepare a pint of Guinness. Drop the shot glass into the beer and chug.

name: Amalyzer
preparation: Shake the amarula cream vodka and coffee liqueur together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top up with cola and serve.

name: Winning Horse
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

name: Pennsylvania Dutch Horse & Buggy Bomb
preparation: Pour a double shot of Bailey's and set aside. Pour Lionshead into a pilsner glass. Drop the Bailey's double shot in and chug. Don't let it sit or else it curdles.

name: Horse Jizz
preparation: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.

name: Midnight Samurai
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Midnight Mocha
preparation: Melt the chocolate in a pan until it becomes syrupy and in a separate container combine the milk and the coffee. Pour in chocolate and Southern Comfort and stir. Sprinkle the cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Orchard Punch
preparation: Combine the applejack orange juice grapefruit juice grenadine and orange bitters in a large punch bowl and stir well. Add lemon-lime soda and ginger ale; stir again. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with orange and apple slices. Makes 24 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Tennessee Coffee
preparation: Put Jack Daniel's whiskey into a mug and add sugar as you would with your coffee. Brew coffee preferably with an espresso machine but any good dark coffee works. If you have an espresso machine froth and steam milk. If not add cream to taste. Tastes like a good strong coffee with a hint of Jack.

name: Cabronasaurus
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend on the highest setting for 55 seconds and serve into coffee mugs.

name: Jungle Spice
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Ultra-Marine
preparation: Add Blue curacao then top up with Champagne and garnish with a grape or strawberry.

name: Dysentery
preparation: Lightly mix chocolate syrup and Bailey's in separate cup. Poor Dr. Pepper into High ball. Now Poor the Chocolate Bailey's into Dr.Pepper. Bailey's will congeal Add Vodka of you want Severe Dysentery

name: Firetruck
preparation: Serve in a shot glass and toss it straight down.

name: Be Sweet
preparation: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale.

name: Vodka Dry
preparation: Pour the sherry into a brandy snifter. Swirl it around in order to coat the glass then pour out the excess. Stir the vodka in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and strain into the snifter. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Kalimocho
preparation: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of coke. Then simply pour red wine cheap or not into the bottle slowly until full. Do not shake the bottle but simply turn it over a couple of times.

name: Deceased Rabbit
preparation: Pour the vodka and liqueurs in the above order into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir the ingrediens and fill up with soda water and sprite. Squeeze a lime wedge over (optional but make sure to use one as garnish) and serve.

name: Gin Lollipop
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except water) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add water garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

name: Burning Worm
preparation: Put into seperate shot glasses. Shoot the mezcal first then chase with goldschlager.

name: Hot Cider Energy
preparation: Pour monster into a beer mug then fill a shot glass with bacardi 151 and light the shot on fire. When taking the drink blow out the flame and drop the shot into the mug filled with monster and chug.

name: Deidru
preparation: Add brandy to glass and fill with lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.

name: Nitro Cocktail
preparation: Combine vodka whiskey and juices in a shaker half-filled with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice and shake. Strain into a collins glass almost-filled with ice add grenadine and serve.

name: Ferris Wheel
preparation: Pour the Sambuca and brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ce cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Powder Keg
preparation: Pour one twelve ounce Heineken Special Dark lager into a chilled pint glass. Fill a one ounce shot glass with Kahlua Especial. Drop the shot glass into the pint glass and drink all of it at once.

name: Nuts Banane
preparation: Blend with half a glassful of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a banana slice and cherry.

name: Berry Banana Shake
preparation: Blend.

name: Blender Frosties
preparation: In blender container combine ingredients; blend until smooth. Serve immediately. Refrigerate or freeze leftovers. Candy Bar Shakes: Omit fruit; add 1/2 cup chocolate-flavored syrup and 2 to 3 candy bars broken. Proceed as above.

name: Dutch Punch
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail glass over ice and shake well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Lassi Khara
preparation: Blend (frappe) in a blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

name: Schlagerfloat
preparation: Put two scoops of vanilla ice-cream in a glass. Pour in a shot of Goldschlager then fill the glass with root beer. Mix with a spoon and enjoy.

name: Obadoba
preparation: Heat the milk and add it to the salt and cocoa powder in a tall glass. Place some whipped cream on top and serve.

name: Crockpot Hot Cocoa
preparation: In large saucepan combine sugar cocoa and salt. Add hot water slowly mixing well. Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until mixture boils. Boil and stir 2 minutes. Add milk; heat to serving temperature stirring occasionally. DO NOT boil. Remove from heat; add vanilla cinnamon if desired and whip with a whisk. Serve hot with whipped cream or marshmallows if desired. This recipe can be doubled and kept in crockpot for easier serving to large groups.

name: Avocado Aperitif
preparation: Peel avocado and cucumber; chop in chunks and place in a blender. Add parsley lemon and blend until smooth. Add the crushed ice and blend together again. Strain into glasses. Garnish with lemon slices or cucumber peel.

name: Coffee Old-Fashioned
preparation: Dissolve the instant coffee in the water in an old-fashioned glass. Gradually stir in the sugar the bitters and the bourbon whiskey. Add ice and top with club soda. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange and serve.

name: Canadian Old-Fashioned
preparation: Shake the whisky triple sec angostura bitters and lemon juice with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists.

name: Climax
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Berry Punch Country Cooking
preparation: 1. One day before serving hull strawberries. Cut two 1-inch berries in half; set aside Very thinly slice remaining berries into a small bowl. Toss with sugar. Add halved berries to top; cover tightly and refrigerate overnight. 2. Next day place a berry half in each of 4 chilled 8-oz punch glasses or mugs. Thoroughly strain sugared berries allowing juice to flow into 2 quart pitcher or punch bowl. (Strained berries may be reserved for another purpose.) 3. Stir sparkling water and grenadine into juice. Pour into prepared glasses; serve immediately. If desired serve punch over ice cubes.

name: Jersey Girl
preparation: Pour as much vodka as you think you can handle and top it off with cream soda. Enjoy and drink Jersey style!

name: Krazy Carl
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pickled Ruski
preparation: Mix vodka of your choice and pickle juice together in equal parts in a shot glass and serve. Especially good with garlic pickle juice.

name: O-Brye
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Bloody Mary Intoxicating Vegetable Soup
preparation: Pour mix vodka olive juice lemon and tobasco sauce in glass over ice. Stir. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Garnish with a lime wedge olives pepperocinis a celery stalk and/or pickle spear.

name: Poison Ivy
preparation: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass either layered in order or mixed together.

name: Lion's Blood
preparation: Mix both shots into a 2-oz shot glass and serve.

name: Muddpuddle
preparation: Mix all ingredients into shaker pour over ice.

name: Mint Cow
preparation: Mix syrup with milk and peppermint. Stir well and add ice cream.

name: Frozen Cappuccino
preparation: Combine the liqueurs ice cream and cream in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. Add a straw and serve.

name: Sneaky Ashley's
preparation: Make sure the frozen pink lemonade mix is in the fridge or out where it can become liquid before preparing the drinks. Cut up two large peaches or three small ones depending on size. Use as much of the peach as possible and throw the pitts away. Put the cut up peaches in the blender and pour eight ounces(roughly half the can) of the pink lemonade mix into the blender as wel. Then add eight to ten ounces of vodka depending on tastes. Fill the remainder of the blender with ice until it is completely full. Then blend and serve!

name: Orange Crunk Mix
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Mortuary Mix
preparation: Fill a pitcher with one bottle of tom collins mix. Add everclear as above or to taste. (Caution: everclear is extremely potent.) Add ice and serve.

name: Titty Excreation
preparation: Pour in a big glass. Mix. It's best when it's cold and on the rocks.

name: Diaper Stripes
preparation: Drink the Yoohoo down to the top of the label fill with rum and shake. Chocolate will seperate out leaving a diaper stain appearance.

name: Chocodka
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass stir and serve.

name: Caliope
preparation: Pour the brandy creme de cacao and soymilk into a cocktail shaker over 3 ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a pousse-cafe glass. Add a shot of espresso dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Brenda and Nicholes Homemade punch
preparation: Pour 7-UpVodkaPink lemonadecranberry juiceorange juice and sugar in a icecream bucket .. Blend bananas and pineapple juice together plus four pineapple slices. Then add to the vodka mixture stir. Place in freezer stiring every 30 mins till slushy. then Enjoy!!!!!!!!

name: Citrus Cream
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a goblet or london dock glass. Serve.

name: Apple Tango
preparation: Peel grapefruit and orange and remove all the seeds and pith. Core the apple and chop coarsely. Place all the fruits in a blender until smooth. Chill in the refrigereator for about 30-45 mins. Pour into a jug add lemon juice and syrup and stir well to mix. Fill glass with ice shavings or ice cubes pour and garnish according to your liking.

name: L.A. Cocktail
preparation: Combine the whiskey vermouth lemon juice sugar and egg in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Serpentine
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum brandy vermouth lemon juice and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Safe Scrumpy
preparation: Pour the lemon juice egg and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Top with apple cider stir well and serve.

name: El Sabor
preparation: Slightly stir all ingredients in a glass with ice.

name: Purple Fantasy
preparation: Pour vodka and rum over ice in a highball glass. Top with grape soda and a splash of 7-up.

name: Harvard
preparation: Stir in a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Le Saintongeais
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Arkansas Buttermilk
preparation: Pour ingredients one at a time preferably in a new plastic gas can that has been cleaned and serve from gas can.

name: Barney Obliterator
preparation: Put the shot of of Vodka and 99 Blackberries into a shaker with ice. Then add the Grapeade/Grapejuice. Shake well. After that prepare glass with adiquate ice. First add the Red Bull to the glass then the mix from the shaker and stir gently until completely mixed. Add a purple straw for more character affect. Use more or less Grapeade/Grape Juice to suite your taste. Enjoy!

name: Mello Goose
preparation: Shake and strain over ice.

name: Italian Sunrise
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral and serve.

name: Northeastern Early Riser
preparation: Pour vanilla vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add ginger ale stir slightly and serve. Tastes like cream soda.

name: Roman Punch
preparation: Combine and mix all ingredients except champagne and rum in a punch bowl with ample ice. Add orange slices and the grated zest of one orange. Add champagne and rum prior to serving.

name: Sugar-Free Cardamom mango Smoothie
preparation: Place mango yogurt ice and milk into a blender. Sprinkle in cardamom and sweetener to taste. Puree until smooth frothy and creamy.

name: Grapes of Bath
preparation: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass. Best served ice cold.

name: Cranberry Wassail
preparation: Combine cranberry juice cocktail apple juice sugar cinnamon sticks and allspice in a large pot. Heat to boiling over medium heat; reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Strain punch to remove spices. Serve warm in a heat proof punch bowl or chill and serve over ice. Garnish with orange slices studded with cloves. Makes 42 4-ounce servings.

name: Virgin Blackberry Fizz
preparation: Crush blackberries in a large kettle. Add water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 10 minutes. Strain through a jelly bag reserving juice and discarding pulp. Add water to juice if necessary to equal 2 quarts; pour into a large kettle. Slowly stir in sugar until dissolved. Place spices in a cheesecloth bag; add to juice. Simmer uncovered for 30 minutes. Bring to a boil; remove the spice bag and discard. Pour hot into hot jars leaving 1/4 headspace. Adjust caps. Process for 15 minutes in a boiling-water bath. To serve mix about 1/3 concentrate with 2/3 soda. Yield: about 4 pints concentrate

name: Nadir Blue
preparation: Pour the gin cherry brandy lemon juice strawberry syrup grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill with soda water. Pour the blue curacao into the middle. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Raggae Sunsplash
preparation: Pour gin and pineapple juice into a shaker and shake well. Pour into a glass over ice and add the strawberry syrup. Add a small amount of food coloring to the froth and serve.

name: Land Shark
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. shake and strain into a cocktail glass over some crushed or shaved ice and serve.

name: Net Surfer
preparation: Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

name: Live Human Brains
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Nadir Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin cherry brandy lemon juice strawberry syrup grenadine and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill with soda water. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Cream Bomb
preparation: Shake the Malibu coconut rum white rum melon liqueur orange juice and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the syrup last and serve.

name: Peej Fuzz Limeade
preparation: Pour over ice.

name: The Hot Churchill
preparation: Let crushed ginger sit in the rum for as long as possible preferably overnight. Add honey to the glass. Top with hot water.

name: The Saint Lawrence
preparation: Stir pour into plastic cup and chug.

name: Saint Paul
preparation: Take a tall glass put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass. Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

name: Dirty Toilet
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass at room temperature. Add a handful of peanuts and serve.

name: Cappuccino Cooler
preparation: In blender container place cofee ice cream and syrup. Cover; blend until smooth. Serve immediately over crushed ice; garnish with whipped cream.

name: Rum Alexander
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Null and Void Punch
preparation: Mix with ice in a tupperware dish pan. Serve in 16 oz glasses (with caution). Tastes great but potent.

name: Beach Peach
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass half-filled with broken ice.

name: Peach Sangaree
preparation: Pour the peach brandy into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda and stir gently. Float the port on top. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: The Whammie
preparation: Fill a 20 ounce glass with ice. Add the 7 shots. Finish off with with equal parts orange and pineapple juice. Add grenadine until it turns pink. Top with cherries.

name: Count Blythe
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Serve with straws.

name: Brandy Melba
preparation: Pour the brandy peach brandy raspberry liqueur lemon juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of peach and serve.

name: Cantaloupe Cup
