preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass garnish with a slice of melon and serve.

name: Brainstorm
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hot Springs Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Emerson
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Alleluia
preparation: Combine the tequila blue curacao maraschino liqueur lemon juice and sugar in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with tonic water garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice and serve.

name: Girlie Martini
preparation: Coat the inside of a chilled cocktail glass with dry vermouth. In a mixing glass filled half way with crushed ice combine vodka champagne and maraschino liqueur. Stir and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and a maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer.

name: Oasis
preparation: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Mirage
preparation: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Gator Juice
preparation: Drain fruit (if using canned fruit) or use fresh fruit if desired and set juice aside. Place fruit in a bowl or container add half of each bottle of alcohol and allow to soak for as long as possible (overnight works best). The following day or whenever ready add the fruit juice you saved to the marinated fruit. Add hawaiian punch to strength of your liking then add ice. Serve in punch cups or suitable glasses.

name: Watermelon-Kazi
preparation: Pour all ingredients over 2 or 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve. Add water if too strong until just right.

name: Bourbon Cream
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Carman's Dance
preparation: Pour vodka and gin simultaneously. Add strawberry and cranberry together. Fill the rest with orange juice.

name: Jewel Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Soulard Cordial
preparation: Mix vodka vermouth grenadine and cherry juice in a shaker with lots of ice. Shake very thoroughly and then strain into a cordial or cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cordial Cooler
preparation: Muddle rockmelon and pineapple chunks with sugar in the bottom of a highball glass. Add Bacardi white rum and a few ice cubes. Top with orange squash (premixed with water as per normal cordial ratio).

name: Green Alexander
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Ginger in Fashion
preparation: Muddle about four peices of fresh ginger in the bottom of the glass. Put a spoon of bar sugar in the bottom of the glass with one ice cube and a dash of bitters. While stiring add bourbon bitters and ice. Continue to slowly add the bourbon and ice for about 5-15 minutes to dilute and chill the drink. Just stick to the classic old fashioned method.

name: Ginger Punch
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except ginger ale) in a large jug and chill for two hours. Add ginger ale and serve into wine glasses.

name: Ginger Bite
preparation: crush lemon and ginger togerther in a shaker. Add all the spirits. Shake and strain into a collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with lemon grass (halved) and a slice of fresh ginger.

name: Cherry Cola Float
preparation: Pour the grenadine syrup into 2 large glasses; add the cola and stir gently. Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream to each and top with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry.

name: Orange Kiss
preparation: Mix vodka orancio and sprite in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Cardamom Tea #2
preparation: For indigestion mix 15 pulverized seeds in 1/2 cup hot water. Add 1 ounce of fresh ginger root and a cinnamon stick. Simmer 15 minutes over low heat. Add 1/2 cup milk and simmer 10 more minutes. Add 2 to 3 drops of vanilla. Sweeten with honey. Drink 1 to 2 cups daily.

name: Andes Ratt
preparation: Make the Ovaltine as per usual. Add peppermint schnapps stir well and serve. Tastes like an Andes mint.

name: Chai I
preparation: Combine the water tea masala cardamon and 1 tsp of the sugar in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 5 min. Add the milk and the rest of the sugar. Add the ginger 1-2 min after that or when the mixture returns to a simmer. Wait for 15-30 seconds then strain the tea into 2 cups. Note: tea masala is a prepared spice mixture of ground black pepper ground cardamon ground cloves and ground cinnamon. It is available at most Indian food markets or you can create your own depending on your taste.

name: 7-up Punch
preparation: In a sauce pan simmer cinnamon with water and sugar about 5 minutes. Cool. In a large bowl combine cinnamon mixture with orange juice lemon juice and pineapple juice. Pour in 7-Up just before serving.

name: Brighton Punch
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Black Stuff
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add dark tea to taste. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a mint sprig and serve.

name: Beijing Mix
preparation: Combine ingredients in a highball glass. Arizona green tea works fairly well but the best is a chinese grand called tong yi that makes bottled sweet green tea.

name: Cranapple Tea
preparation: Combine the tea juices cinnamon sticks and cloves in a saucepan and simmer over low heat for 3-4 min stirring occasionally. Remove the spices and pour the mixture into 4 cups. Add sugar to each cup if desired and garnish each with a slice of apple.

name: Whiskey Bucket
preparation: Pour entire bottle of Mekong Whiskey into metal bucket. Add ice and Red Bulls and Cokes. Drink through straws.

name: Midgetini
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fucked by a Pharaoh
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Falcon Eddy
preparation: Pour the gin and vodka into a cocktail glass. Add sugar and stir thoroughly. When dissolved add the peppermint schnapps and serve.

name: Green Gables
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Ten Quidder
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin triple sec and bitters. Stir well. Pour the Curacao into the center of the drink.

name: Green Hell
preparation: Pour both into glass over ice and serve.

name: Green Meadows
preparation: Press juice from two oranges and 2 limes Mix the ingredients in a shaker with ice cubes. Shake an pour in a coctail glass. Add slowly the Curaoa at the end in each glass You should get a green color at the bottom of the gals and a yellow color of orangejuice at the top. Those who like a more acid taste just add more lime juice. The best results are obtaine with dark rum and Nolly Prat vermouth Dry Martine can also be used instead of Nolly Prat but has a stronger tast.

name: Green Delight
preparation: Mix all the ingredients together and serve cold.

name: Wild Wendy
preparation: Pour each ingredient into a shaker. Shake well. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: Green Ocean
preparation: Blend quickly and serve.

name: Molokai Mike
preparation: 1. Shake white rum brandy juices and almond syrup together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice and mix. 2. Combine dark rum and grenadine with sufficient crushed ice to produce a sorbet/sherbet and gently add to the top of the cocktail. 3. Garnish with in-season fruit and serve with straws.

name: Pardo's Party
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shot glass in above order stir and serve.

name: Mike Tyson
preparation: Mix and serve with ice.

name: Jacana
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Highland Margarita
preparation: Pour the tequila Grand Marnier Drambuie and sour mix (to taste) into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Chippy
preparation: Shake all ingredients well w/ ice ensuring the honey is fully dissolved. Strain into glass and float a thin lemon slice on top and serve.

name: Tk special
preparation: Mix in a boston cocktail shaker tequila and strawberry daquiri mix over ice. Shake and pour into shot glass.

name: Puckerita
preparation: Combine ingredients and shake well in a tall glass with ice.

name: Pink Beaner
preparation: Add tequila pineapple-coconut juice and grenadine to a beer mug three-quartes filled with crushed ice. Stir until pink in color.

name: Submarino
preparation: Add tequila to a beer pilsner filled with mexican beer and serve.

name: D.W.I.
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in a large pint glass stir quickly and chug.

name: Fancy Tequila Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: 1800 Pink Grapefruit Margarita
preparation: In a tall mixing glass filled with ice add 1800 Silver Tequila and all ingredients. Shake vigorously and serve in a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a slice of grapefruit.

name: Dr. Red
preparation: Completely fill a collins glass with uncrushed ice cubes. Mix the alcoholic ingredients except grenadine over the ice in the glass. Top with red bull stir and garnish with a slice of lemon. Add grenadine to intensify the color of the drink.

name: Pineberry
preparation: Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into two seperate shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.

name: Strike's On
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except sparkling apple) and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add sparkling apple juice a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Bacon and Tomato Sandwich
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Dickel Tickle
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Ferandina
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass add a slice of orange and serve.

name: Melanie Pimm
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with slices of orange lemon and lime speared with a cherry and serve with straws.

name: Dutch Trade Winds
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: UFO
preparation: Pour genever gin into a glass and fill with bitter lemon. Add ice cubes and serve.

name: Holland Martini
preparation: Pour gin and vermouth into a cocktail glass. Squeeze a twist of lemon peel over the glass drop into glass and serve.

name: Mr. Stumpfy
preparation: Start with a cup pour in one shot of the gin then a splash of grenadine to taste (you will figure this out after you drink 2 or 3) then add a dash of lime juice and a dash of lemon juice. Fill up the rest of the cup (about 6 oz) with vault energy soda and stir.

name: Frozen Matador
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Island Rose
preparation: Shake well with ice and serve straight up or over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Float a rose petal on the surface and serve.

name: Toreador #2
preparation: Pour tequila dark creme de cacao and cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cocoa powder dusted over the top and serve.

name: Yabba Dabba Dew
preparation: Use equal parts in a double bubble glass. Mt Dew on bottom. Tequila on top. NOW SLAM IT!!

name: Mexican Dew
preparation: Pour the tequila into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with Mountain Dew stir gently and serve.

name: Cherry Shake
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Citrini
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin slice of orange and serve.

name: Chocolatier Cake
preparation: Chill all ingredients prior. Layer in order into a cocktail glass; creme de cacao first brandy on top followed by cream.

name: Night and Day
preparation: Add to a wine goblet half-filled with crushed ice and serve

name: Black Bottom Special
preparation: Into each of 4-6 chilled 8 or 10 ounce glasses spoon 3 tablespoon of the chocolate syrup. Stir ice cream to soften slightly; quickly blend in milk and coffee. Pour mixture over syrup in glasses. Trim with shaved unsweetened chocolate if desired. You can also use 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon instead of the instant coffee.

name: Douglas Fairbanks
preparation: Shake ingredients extremely well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Buddha's Banshee
preparation: Pour the spiced rum creme de cacao creme de bananes and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a dusting of nutmeg and serve.

name: Raspberry Truffle
preparation: Pour vodka and liqueurs into a cocktail glass. Fill with milk and serve.

name: Krazee Keith
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum anisette cherry brandy and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the cola and stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Generation X
preparation: Pour liquors in first then add zima.

name: Daffy Duck
preparation: Combine ingredients in a wine glass and serve.

name: Owdham Edge
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Flaming Tree
preparation: Pour the chartreuse first then top with rum and serve.

name: Douglas Slammer
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Black Hawk
preparation: Stir blended whiskey and sloe gin with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Nhardkiss
preparation: First crush ice in blender...pour white zinfindale wine only... at least a cup....then a half a cup of sprite soda...then squeeze 2 or 3 slices of lime...drop them in after...finally a shot or two of cruzan coconut rum o rany other type coconut rum...stir and pour in what ever glass is comfortable...honestly speaking measuring the alchohol depends on how strong you would like your drink...ENJOY!!! p.s. I recommend cruzan coconut rum...very smooth...no after taste and has a kick aswell

name: Jenna Pop!
preparation: Pour the whiskey into a shot glass. Add cola eat cherry and consume.

name: Irish Catholic
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Irish Energy
preparation: Pour both the Jameson Irish whiskey and Red Bull into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Irish Pecker
preparation: Fill up an old fashioned shot glass with 3/4 oz. of Jamesons Irish Whiskey top off with 1/4 oz. of lime juice garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: kitchen sink martini
preparation: Shake it all I like to throw a slice of lemon and lime in the shaker strain it into a cocktail glass. Sugar on the rim is up to you I like to drop a cherry in the glass also.

name: Edith Day Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Pour over shaved ice in a champagne flute and serve.

name: Mercenary
preparation: Pour the vermouth Armagnac and creme de menthe into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Quilt Lifter
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass. Garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Brandy Scaffa
preparation: Add to a cocktail glass in the order listed.

name: Black Hole
preparation: Fill glass 2/3 with ice add Sambuca and fill with soda.

name: Blanqita
preparation: Pour Anisette Kahlua Pineapple Juice and a handful of crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake hard. Then pour into a Collins glass. Garnish with the slice of pineapple.

name: Laze on the Deck
preparation: Pour the white sambuca into a highball glass. Fill up to the top with coca-cola and serve.

name: Violetta
preparation: Add anis parfait d'amour juice and grenadine to a cocktail shaker. Fill with soda water and shake. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a slice of orange mint sprig and a cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Quick-Sand
preparation: Pour the orange juice (with the fruit pulp) over the sambuca in a highball glass.

name: Clarity Cocktail
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Southern Santa
preparation: Pour coconut rum into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Fill with eggnog. Stir in grenadine to desired red (no more than 1 oz).

name: East West Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain over two ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Christina Ricci Cocktail
preparation: Pour the Scotch whisky into a whiskey sour glass filled with ice. Add the spoonful of coffee and serve.

name: Danini
preparation: First two shots of Vodka then the lime juice. Add ice. Top up the glass with Coke.

name: Christina Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vodka vermouth and Pisang Ambon into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with Schweppes bitter lemon stir again and serve.

name: Larney
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade garnish with an orange slice and cherry and serve.

name: East India Cocktail #1
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Osaka Dry
preparation: Pour the vodka and sake into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a picked plum and serve.

name: Bushranger
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum Dubonnet and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Stork Club Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Club Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a martini or cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and a strawberry and serve.

name: Hyatt Club
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry. Serve.

name: Sly Goes To Havana
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Coffee Flip
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Hawaiian Death
preparation: Put rum over ice fill half way with punch fill with 7-up.

name: L.A. Sunset
preparation: Add the Jagermeister amaretto triple sec pineapple rum and the Di Saronno (0.15 oz is an estimate just use a small amount mainly for color) to a collins glass. Swirl the ingredients together until mixed. Fill the remaining volume of the glass with pineapple juice and full pulp orange juice poured in the center of the glass. If poured correctly the ingredients should mix so that the drink has an overall yellow/orangeish-brown color with the brown occupying the lower three-quarters of the collins glass. No extra mixing should be necessary. The pulp of the Orange Juice should swirl in the brown region of the drink giving it an overall smoggy appearance not unlike a Los Angeles Sunset.

name: Dubonnet Cassis
preparation: Stir dubonnet and creme de cassis over ice cubes in an aperitif glass. Fill with soda add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Antoine Special
preparation: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

name: Duplex
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Periodista
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass add a twist of lime peel and serve.

name: Tailor Made
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Pelican
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Holly Berry
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Rudolph's Nosebleed
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend for 20 seconds and serve over ice in rocks or old-fashioned glasses.

name: Candy Corn Martini
preparation: First ring 6 oz Martini glass with orange juice then with Cocoa powder. Pour 1/2 cup of ice into shaker then spirits and Orange Juice. Shake vigorously and pour into glass. Garnish with Orange Peel Twist and 3-4 pcs of Candy Corn skewered on a plastic sword.

name: Cafe de Paris Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pineau-cchio
preparation: Rim a wine glass with orange juice and caster sugar and fill with broken ice. Pour in the ingredients garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Washington Applecart
preparation: Combine both ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Snitchee's Cider
preparation: Used crushed ice. Can be made in any size from punchbowl to personal serving.

name: Comforting Coffee
preparation: Pour the coffee into an Irish coffee glass or cup. Add the Southern Comfort bourbon whiskey and creme de cacao and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon on top of the drink so that it floats and serve.

name: Celebration #2
preparation: Shake vigorously over ice pour into cocktail glass and garnish with either lemon or orange peel.

name: Candle in the Window
preparation: Pour the rum bourbon whiskey creme de cacao cherry brandy and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top and serve.

name: Hot Zultry Zoe
preparation: Pour the tequila Galliano and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee cup or glass and stir well. Float the cream on top and serve.

name: Daring Dylan
preparation: Let the mexican hot chocolate cool to room temperature. Pour all of the ingredients into an irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Glogg
preparation: 1. Pour the wine and vodka into a large pot. Add spices fruit and nuts. Turn on the heat and bring the ingredients to a temperature just below the boil. 2. Now for the fun part. Invite all of your guests into the kitchen. Place the sugar cubes in a sieve (one that you don't mind sacrificing to the greater good). Don oven mitts and set the glogg on fire. Ladle the burning glogg over the sugar cubes until it has all melted. 3. When the sugar is melted cover the pot to extinguish the flame. Ladle glogg fruit and nuts into irish coffee cups and serve.

name: Red Bruiser Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite add grenadine and serve.

name: Pinerito
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: September Morn
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Seventh Heaven Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprig) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Frosty Dawn
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Madison Avenue Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and a slice of lime and serve.

name: Frank Davis Punch
preparation: Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the tequila champagne and sauternes and stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with melon balls cut out from a honeydew melon. Makes 36 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Black Samurai
preparation: Add the one oz. of Sake to a shot glass followed by the 1/2 oz. of Soy Sauce...Let settle for 30sec...

name: Hot Cambodian Skin
preparation: Pour Kahlua sake Bailey's and 151 rum into a cocktail glass. The rum should be on top which is then ignited (carefully). Blow out before consuming.

name: Ganja Juice
preparation: Pour the vodka 7-up gatorade and hawaiian punch into a punch bowl and stir. Add orange juice stir and watch it turn green. Add ice and serve to guests in highball glasses.

name: Hallenbeck Punch
preparation: Leave the rainbow sorbet in a fridge for a few hours to allow to melt and add to a 5-gallon sports cooler container (the kind that stand up and have a spout on the bottom). Add all other ingredients. Shake it up good before serving to a healthy amount of party guests.

name: Ordinary Seaman
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lime) well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a small highball glass over crushed ice squeeze in the lime wedge and serve.

name: Cossack Charge
preparation: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Crimean Cocktail
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the soda garnish with two cherries on a stick and serve.

name: Pink Pitch
preparation: Mix in a blender on low speed and serve in a chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Spanish Crown
preparation: Prefer 7 oz rocks glass Fill with ice 3/4 oz Crown Royal 3/4 oz licor 43 stir or Shot glass in a shaker mix equal amounts Licor 43 and Crown Royal serve chilled in shot glass

name: Barcelona
preparation: Add to an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of seville orange speared with a cherry and paper parasol.

name: Coronado Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Strangelove
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Chinatown
preparation: Blend until smooth. Add a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Serve with straws in a rocks or old-fashioned glass.

name: Gogl-Mogl
preparation: This is essentially a hot eggnog. You beat an egg add a tablespoon of honey and a jigger of whisky. Pour this into a irish coffee cup and then fill the glass with warm milk and stir until it's well mixed.

name: Moroz
preparation: Stir in equal parts in a shot glass and serve.

name: Mulatto
preparation: Serve in a 2-oz shot glass and stir without ice.

name: Mozart Chocolate Liqueur
preparation: Shake well with no less than 6 ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry and serve.

name: Pousse Mozart
preparation: Pour the white mozart into a cordial glass. Slowly and carefully pour original mozart on top using the back of the spoon. Serve.

name: Cum Guzzler
preparation: In a blender mix ice cream chocolate syrup instant coffee milk and cookies. Blend together. Add gin and blend again. Pour into mug and top with whipped cream.

name: D.R.F.O.
preparation: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Mussaka
preparation: Pour ouzo and drambuie into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with pepsi cola and serve.

name: Monty's Coffee
preparation: Pour the butterscotch schnapps into a coffee mug fill mug with hot coffee (decaf regular or instant) add milk to taste and sugar if you wish (the schnapps adds a bit of sugar so be careful). Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur stir and serve.

name: Chocolate XS
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except cream) briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice. Float the cream on top and serve with straws.

name: Bosco 42DD
preparation: Put 1 scoop chocolate ice cream into glass. Add Kahlua then gin then creme de cacoa then brandy and finally put a 2nd scoop of choclate ice cream on top.

name: Orange Truffle Mocha
preparation: Fill a tall glass halfway with ice. Whisk together the ingredients (not the milk) and pour over the ice. Fill the glass the rest of the way with cold milk. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Creamy Crotch
preparation: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass. Stir well and serve.

name: Alternatini
preparation: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sweetened cocoa powder and garnish with a hershey's kiss.

name: Hot Pants
preparation: Shake with ice cubes and pour into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

name: Spiking Coffee
preparation: Incidentally a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course you serve it in a coffee mug.

name: Cherry Almond Tea Mix
preparation: Place all ingredients in a food processor; process until well blended. Store in an airtight container. Give with serving instructions. Yield about 1 - 1/2 cups tea mix. To serve: Stir 2 teaspoons mix into 8 ounces hot or cold water.

name: Aberfoyle
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Golden Fleece
preparation: Pour the yellow chartreuse and Danzig Goldwasser into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Speaker of the House
preparation: Pour whisky ginger wine cherry brandy and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pistachio Rumba
preparation: Blend briefly in a wine goblet half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Serve with short straws.

name: Killarney
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Josephine
preparation: Serve in a brandy snifter.

name: Irish Canadian
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Egril
preparation: Cut a lime into eight seperate segments and place into an old-fashioned glass. Add sugar and crush until the juice is released. Add remaining ingredients ensure sugar has dissolved and fill with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Add a short straw and serve.

name: Hot Brown Lizard
preparation: Mix midori with cinnamon schnapps until the desired tone of brown is achieved.

name: Anjan's harem
preparation: Pour the amaretto liqueur and jagermeister into a highball glass. Add the dark rum gently pouring. In a mixing glass combine the cola with crushed ice and stir together. Pour into the highball glass (should roughly fill the glass). Serve.

name: Strip and Yell
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass add a spiral of lemon and serve.

name: Quantum Theory
preparation: Pour rum strega and grand marnier into a collins glass. Add pineapple juice and fill with sweet and sour mix. Garnish with a lemon cherry flag.

name: Camel's Coffee
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Russian Coffee
preparation: Add coffee vodka and kahlua to irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float cream on top add amaretto and garnish with a cherry.

name: Lagos Coffee
preparation: Pour coffee and liquor into an irish coffee cup and sweeten to taste. Gently float the cream on top add amaretto and serve.

name: Government Sponsored Killer (GSK)
preparation: Pour all 4 shots into the glass then mix until the red and gold flakes are evenly mixed throughout the drink. Try to not let the gold gather in the middle as it's color has meaning to the drink. The first sip is usually dedicated to something Military related. Drink up Devil Dog!

name: Filthy Mudblood
preparation: First you've got to make pumpkin soup. If you can find Pumpkin juice or a quality Tinned Soup go for it! Build over ice and garnish.

name: Glogg #2
preparation: 1. Combine all the non-alcoholic ingredients in a heavy enamel or stainless steel saucepan bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. 2. Add the red wine and the port and bring to a boil again. Remove from heat and let steep covered for at least 2 hours. 3. Bring back to a simmer add the brandy and heat for 1 minute. If you want to be fancy you can put it into a warmed metal bowl turn down the lights and ignite it before serving. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Pawpaw Paradise
preparation: Using a papaya or mango cut into small pieces and puree in a blender. Add the milk rum ice and sugar. Blend until smooth. Pour into 4oz glasses and garnish with strawberries.

name: Chocolate Paradise
preparation: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.

name: Spanish Guitar
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a speared cherry and serve.

name: Belle of Ellis Island
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy Cointreau sugar and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Grandfather's Coffee
preparation: Warm ingredients in a small saucepan. Pour into a cup when hot and serve.

name: Major Bailey
preparation: Pour gin lemon and lime juice into a double-cocktail glass. Add the sugar. Gently crush the mint and add to the glass. Fill with crushed ice and serve with a cherry and fresh mint sprig.

name: Opera House Special
preparation: Add all ingredients to a metal mixer and strain into a shot glass.

name: Campari Cocktail
preparation: Shake well over ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Byrrh Cassis
preparation: Pour Byrrh and creme de cassis into a wine glass. Add ice cubes fill with pre-chilled soda water to taste and serve.

name: Monday at Midnight
preparation: Vigorously shake the first three ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker until water condenses on the outside of the shaker. Strain onto a Collins glass full of ice. Fill the glass with Ginger Ale. Decorate with the lime slice.

name: Midnight Manx
preparation: Fill a mixer with ice and add baileys kahlua goldshlager and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and strain into an ice-filled double rocks glass. Add chilled coffee stir and serve.

name: The Melford Midnight Mix
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass with a couple of ice cubes. Stir well and serve. Add Coconut jelly for effect

name: Earl of Sardinia
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice and serve.

name: Chocolate Charlies
preparation: Put a little Hersheys syrup in the bottom of a glass and add warm milk (1/2 glass) and mix well. Add Voyant on top to fill glass and then froth up - sprinkle powdered nutmeg or cinnamon on top and serve warm as an after dinner drink.

name: Curly Samson
preparation: Blend all ingredients together until they're all mixed up well and ice is chopped even more. Pretty much til it's like a nice smoothie mix.

name: Floater
preparation: Pour a shot of vodka into a shot glass and top with a spoon of peanut butter. Add a drizzle of chocolate syrup garnish with a kernal of corn and serve.

name: Groader
preparation: Mix ingredients in order.

name: Lime Chiver
preparation: Muddle the fresh lime with the caster sugar then add the liquors and shake with plenty of ice. Pour into a highball glass add a dash of lemonade and serve.

name: Olaffson's Punch
preparation: Dissolve sugar and shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Serve with straws and garnish with twists of orange and lime.

name: Blackberry Fizz
preparation: Dissolve sugar shake and strain ingredients (except lemonade) into a highball glass half-filled with ice. Add the lemonade and garnish with a cherry and orange slice. Serve with straws and a muddler.

name: Monongahela Cobbler
preparation: Place the icing sugar in a tumbler with some thin parings of orange and lemon peels. Fill 1/3 of the glass with shaved ice and add bourbon whiskey to taste. Stir and garnish with fruit and 2 straws.

name: Annabelle Special
preparation: Pour the ingredients over cracked ice in a mixing glass. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Annabele Special
preparation: Mix with cracked ice in a mixing tin and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: London Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin orange bitters simple syrup and maraschino liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bronx Terrace Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cooperstown Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: H.P.W. Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Forgive Me
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fjellfinn
preparation: Mix the two ingredients. Garnish with a birch leaf.

name: Kitten Cuddler
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except sprite) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add sprite. Garnish with a cherry slices of orange and lemon and serve.

name: Cloudberry Cocktail
preparation: Rim a cocktail glass with pineapple juice and sugar. Shake ingredients and strain into the glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Hairy Coconut
preparation: Rim a champagne saucer with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients and strain into the saucer. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry and serve.

name: Golden Salsa
preparation: Combine both ingredients over crushed ice in a collins glass and serve.

name: Shalom
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Amaretto Mist
preparation: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime if preferred.)

name: Macarena Mist
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Citrus Mist Colada
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender; blend until thick. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime and serve.

name: Diet Cherry Vanilla Yummy
preparation: Add your 2 shots of Skyy vodka into a highball glass followed by Diet Cherry Vanilla Dr.Pepper to the top. Sip or chug to enjoy.

name: Cielo
preparation: Build in an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Earthquake Cocktail
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

name: College Punch
preparation: Combine and mix all ingredients in container; serve

name: Smart Christine
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin Benedictine and orange juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Peabody
preparation: Shake everything except Ginger Ale with ice; strain into a collins glass with a handful of ice cubes. Fill with the ginger ale.

name: Summer Peach
preparation: Combine ice sherbet orange juice and peach schnapps in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour cranberry juice into the bottom of a hurricane or other tall glass add mixture on top and serve.

name: Scottalian
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients except the Grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice if you like. Drop the Grenadine into the center and serve.

name: Allegro
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass and serve.

name: Martini Milano
preparation: Pour the gin dry vermouth dry white wine and Campari bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Chilled Cinnamon Cookie
preparation: In a cocktail shaker fill with DeKuyper Buttershots Baileys Irish Cream Kahlua cinamon and ice. Shake until mixed and well-chilled. Pour into any 4-8oz. glass. *note* This drink can be consumed either as a double-shot or sipped like a small cocktail. If served as cocktail pour over 2-3 cubes of ice. This is a very party-friendly drink so feel free to proportionally increase the amounts listed above for multiple drinks. I personally make up to six at a time.

name: Branded Nipple
preparation: Float each ingredient over the previous set on fire and shoot it!

name: Black Monday
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Coldsick
preparation: Add the barenjager to some mint tea stir well and serve. Good for colds.

name: Mindtrip
preparation: Stir in a shot glass and serve.

name: Yule Toddy
preparation: Combine all ingredients and serve hot in an small irish coffee glass or coffee cup. This recipe produces a drink that is about 40 proof so please use care in it's consumption.

name: Jackass Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Diarrhea Bomb
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Serve.

name: Dirty Dick
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dick Deming Martini
preparation: Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.

name: Captain Dick
preparation: Mix bourbon coconut rum and cola in highball glass over ice. Add wedge of lime. Mix.

name: Tanqueray & Chronic
preparation: Mix ingredients 1-5 in a shaker with ice (drop the limes in the shaker the oils add more flavor) Pour over ice in a chilled highball (the colder the drink the better) Top with 1 1/2 oz of 7-up

name: Mock Pink Champagne
preparation: Boil sugar and water until the sugar dissolves and allow to cool. Stir cranberry pineapple and orange juice and chill. Prior to serving add carbonated beverage.

name: Crusta
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass and serve.

name: R-Float
preparation: Pour ingredients into a frosted beer mug over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Brittle Fracture
preparation: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

name: The Southern Code
preparation: Put ice cubes in a regular drinking glass. Add southern comfort to taste a lot for a strong drink or a little for a mild drink. For an average alcohol flavor add Southern Comfort just to he top of the ice cubes. Top off with Mt. Dew Code Red. Tastes like smarties. For a sour twist add a lemon wedge for show.

name: Chastity Belt
preparation: Layer in order in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Clove Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Leapfrog
preparation: Pour tequila sloe gin and vermouth into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Soft Love
preparation: Shake strain into a cordial or liqueur glass and serve.

name: Silent Monk
preparation: Pour the benedictine Cointreau and light cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blood Punch
preparation: 1. Grasp bottle lid firmly with left hand and the bottle with your right hand. (lid pointing up; towards the sky and the bottle down; towards the ground) 2. Apply clockwise turning with your right hand hold left hand in place and apply turning pressure counter-clockwise. (bottle should be open by now) 3. Place bottle down on a flat surface (open end up). 4. Grasp about a cm (half inch) of the top of the package with left hand firmly and with your right hand touching your other hand. 5. Hold right hand in place and pull left hand away from you. 6. Slowly pour contents of package into open end of bottle. (repeat steps 4-6 if more than one package is used) 7. If contents of bottle start to bubble fast quickly grab lid and twist on the opposite way you did before and turn tightly so it dosen't leak. 8. Shake bottle well. 9. Wait until fizz bubbles go down. 10. Open and drink once fizz bubbles are gone

name: Purple Bang-Up
preparation: Stir together in a 6-oz cocktail glass and serve.

name: Sheak's Purple Shirt
preparation: Put as much vodka in a glass as you think you can handle. add 1- 1 1/2 oz of lime margarita mix and equal parts grape soda to sprite til glass is full. Stir. Try and not spill it on your shirt.

name: Jim's
preparation: Fill a pitcher with ice. Add all liquors. Add juices and stir. Serve into 2 12-oz glasses.

name: Timberwolf
preparation: Mix together in a large glass and fill remainder of glass with orange juice. Serve cold.

name: Body Maid
preparation: Put Tequila into glass. Then fill with Limeade. Stir with straw garnish with lime wedge. Enjoy!

name: Jim's Special
preparation: Add vodka cherry brandy grenadine and ice to a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and serve.

name: California Stripper
preparation: Pour the raspberry schnapps into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add half-and-half to taste and serve.

name: Blue Bomb
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a beer glass. Drink fast.

name: Oh Yeah!
preparation: Mix blackberry brandy triple sec grape pucker schnapps and a splash of 7-up together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Island Remix
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Blue Island Pucker schnapps into an old-fashioned glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the Sprite Remix stir and serve with a stirring straw.

name: Hawaiian Rain Drops
preparation: Build over ice stir and enjoy!

name: Bilge Water
preparation: Put first 4 ingredients into a mason jar. Add about 1-2 cups Sprite or as much as you want.

name: Cherrytini
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fag Juice
preparation: Put the coconut milk in the glass first and then pour the liquors over it. Add 7-up and ice (equal parts) to top off and serve.

name: Oasis #2
preparation: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dr. Mysti's Apple
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Dana's Nicotine Fit
preparation: Pour ingredients into an iced mixing glass. Serve on rocks.

name: Make Believe
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a mint leaf and serve.

name: Perfect Screw
preparation: Pour the Harvest pear schnapps orange juice and vodka into a highball glass in that order. Serve.

name: Sailing By
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Add ginger ale and garnish with a slice of lemon and a blue cherry. Serve with a short straw.

name: Red Gypsy
preparation: Pour whiskey and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add cream soda and serve.

name: Black Magick
preparation: Combine spirits in a stainless steel shaker. Shake and strain over ice in a cocktail glass. Top glass off with apple juice and serve.

name: Captain Plah
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass ice if preferred and serve.

name: 7-Nut
preparation: Pour coconut rum and 7-up into a highball glass. Add ice to suit and serve.

name: Hot Piper
preparation: Pour the tequila lemon juice dark creme de cacao and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass stir well and serve.

name: Piper
preparation: Pour tequila lemon juice dark creme de cacao and coffee (cooled to room temperature) into an irish coffee cup or irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Cranberry-Cider Punch
preparation: Pour ginger ale and cider into punch bowl. Squeeze juice from 2 of the limes and thinly slice the third. Stir juice into punch. Taste and add raspberry concentrate if you wish. If concentrate is still frozen you may not need to add ice. Refrigerate until serving time. Float lime slices on surface. Makes 16 cups enough for 32 punch-glass servings.

name: Jellybean
preparation: Use 1 bottle of each spirit the Pernod should be a smaller bottle - equivalent to a half bottle. Put all the spirits in the freezer - 10 to -20 Centigrade. Use 1 liter of raspberry juice if you can't get raspberry juice you can use grenadine. Take care with the quantity grenadine is a cordial so use a lot less. Add to the above 2 liters of good quality lemonade you can add more but do not drown it. Lots of ice and some garnish to look nice.

name: Bagce
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cup.

name: Gina's Pussy
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Requiem
preparation: Mix or shake the Malibu Triple Sec and Vikingsfjord and pour over ice into glass top it up with the lemon lime soda (Sprite etc.) stir....but not too much. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Rolling Green Elixer
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker strain into a hurricane glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Melon Berry Smoothie
preparation: Blend all together!

name: Teddybear
preparation: Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice and shake until completely cold. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Zimartini
preparation: Pour together over 2-3 ice cubes and serve.

name: Teddybear Shooter
preparation: Pour 3/4 oz. Rootbeer Schnapps into a shot glassthen use barspoon to carefully pour 1/4 oz. vodka on top to layer.

name: Fancy Brandy
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Fancy Nancy
preparation: Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Fancy Bourbon
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the bourbon triple sec sugar and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Marianne
preparation: 1. Blend strawberries raspberries and apple juice until slushy. 2. Fill champagne flutes half way with the fruit mix. Fill the remainder of the glasses with champagne and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed. 3. Top each off with whipped cream (optional).

name: Meatbox
preparation: Freeze the sunkist in ice cube trays in advance. It should make approx. 2 trays of ice cubes. Soak the crushed pineapple in 8 oz. of vodka for at least 30 minutes (at most 24 hours). Refrigerate. Do the same for the frozen berries. In a pitcher or bowl combine the fruit soaked in vodka and the punch. Stir well. Add in the ginger ale. Finally put in a few sunkist ice cubes. For a less sweet drink substitute all or part of the fruit punch for cranberry or cran-raspberry juice. If you really want to get yourself f'd up soak some of the fruit in everclear too!

name: Bernardo
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin triple sec lemon juice and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bluebird
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine the gin triple sec Curacao and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

name: Red Melon
preparation: Pour vodka watermelon and peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with sprite stir well add grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime) or a piece of melon.

name: Peppermint Suzi
preparation: Combine the Tullamore Dew 1-oz of the creme de menthe and chocolate syrup in an Irish Coffee cup. Prepare a double espresso and steam the milk. Add espresso and steamed milk to the mix in the Irish Coffee mug. Stir well. Top with whipped cream and the last 1/2 oz of creme de menthe and serve.

name: Naughty Gnome
preparation: Pour the rum into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with Vernors ginger soda add a dash or two of bitters and serve.

name: Tree House
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Biscay
preparation: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange twist.

name: Jagger's Satisfaction
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: North Pole Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except whipped cream) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Barrier Breaker
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Bittersweet Symphony
preparation: Add all ingredients (except Campari) to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Add the Campari to create a multi-colored cocktail and serve.

name: Doralto
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the tequila lemon juice sugar and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water and garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Worried Monk
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Scorpino
preparation: Blend all ingredients in a blender pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Multi-Colored Smurf
preparation: Shake the orange juice vodka and mango syrup with ice in a shaker. Carefully layer the apricot liqueur and blueberry schnapps into a highball glass. Float the pre-shaken mixture of vodka and juices on top and serve.

name: Robitussin
preparation: Stir without ice and serve.

name: Jay's Rootbeer Dream
preparation: Add all ingredients except the cola into a flash cup. Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Serve in a beer mug preferably chilled half-filled with ice. Add a splash of cola on top.

name: Easy Money
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except grenadine) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle grenadine on top garnish with fruit and serve.

name: Easy Action
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Easy Sodas
preparation: Dissolve soft drink mix and sugar in water in nonmetal bowl or pitcher. Stir in club soda. Place a small scoop of ice cream in each of 6 tall glasses. Stir in soda mixture; top with a second scoop of ice cream. Makes about 2 quarts or 6 large servings.

name: Blame It On Rio
preparation: Pour the vodka rum amaretto peach schnapps banana liqueur and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Top with soda water to taste. Squeeze in the juice from a lime wedge and drop the shell into the glass. Serve.

name: Ogre Piss
preparation: Ice is not recommended but the Monster and Everclear should be refrigerated before use. For best results use standard-variety Monster not other variations such as Khaos or Assault. Pour Monster into glass or cup add Everclear and schnapps and stir vigorously. (Do *not* shake; given the volume of carbonated beverage involved this will only create a mess.) Enjoy.

name: Choklad Prins Bertil
preparation: Pre-warm a coffee mug then add Grand Marnier and cognac. Fill with hot chocolate and stir well. Top with whipped cream.

name: Extremely Drunk
preparation: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frankenjack Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

name: The Banx
preparation: Pour one ingredient after another till the shot glass is filled. Then shoot.

name: The Dirk
preparation: Half fill glass with ice add Canadian Club Disaronno and lime slice. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Gallietto
preparation: Poor in 1oz Galliano mix in Amaretto stir 7 times. Top with a fruit juice works best with apple and add a couple of ice cubes last. After all ingredients are in stir again 7 times.

name: Bruja Cubana
preparation: First mix/blend the sugar and mint together add lime juice to molsify. Add liquor. Add 7-up or Sprite to fill. Mix well and pour.

name: Madeleine
preparation: Shake all ingredients with four ice cubes strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Party Colada
preparation: Pre-crush as much ice as desired. Combine juice wipe-out (an imitation Malibu rum) and cream in bowl with milkshake blender add ice. Stir. (Note: as with ice amount of cream used varies according to the preference of the drinker has been known to be served without cream.) Serve in a punch bowl or (preferably) a bucket most effective if drunk directly from the bowl/bucket with crazy straws by number of people. Serves 6-8.

name: Lawnmower
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Wicked Lime
preparation: Ice the highball glass. Mix 1.5oz of Everclear and Rose's Lime Juice and finish the drink with approximatley 6oz of Fresca soda. Garnish with a lime wedge if you so desire.

name: Small Sand
preparation: Mix the first 4 ingredients with ice. Fill with lemonade. Garnish with carambole and strawberry on the edge of glass.

name: Clueless
preparation: Once the vodka and all of the extra ingredient's are added to your glass stir. Add ice.

name: Savannah
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gagarin
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except babycham) and strain into a cocktail glass. Add babycham garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Coconut Breeze
preparation: Combine all three ingredients in a cocktail shaker along with store bought ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Flying Zambo
preparation: Shake everything together and pour into glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Orancio Royal
preparation: Pour orancio into a champagne flute and fill with brut champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Shello
preparation: Prepare the cherry-flavored jell-o as per on the packet however substitute the use of water with the sherry.

name: Pink Torpedo
preparation: Stir over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Tyson Punch
preparation: Pour all 8 liters of soda in cooler/bowl over 1 bag of ice. Add 2 quarts of Orage Juice. Add 1 bottle of Everclear. Add 4 big scoops of Kool-Aid. (preferably Tropical Punch) Stir.

name: Jim Carrey
preparation: Combine whiskey Stoli vodka and Frangelico liqueur together in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with Mello Yello soda. Stir and serve.

name: Laugh a Minute
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade and serve.

name: Hpnotiq Martini
preparation: Add cherry vodka to a cocktail shaker filled with ice then add Hpnotiq liqueur. Shake shake shake. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Madonna
preparation: Pour cherry vodka into a whiskey-sour glass. Fill with 7-up and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Laguna
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Martini Bovine
preparation: Place Martini & Rossi vermouth and white wine into a beer mug. Mix the two together add vodka and top off with Strongbow. Serve.

name: Opening Night
preparation: Pour the whiskey Martini & Rossi dry vermouth and strawberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Ideal Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Woodpecker
preparation: Pour vodka over 4 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add peychaud bitters and stir.

name: Lime Lambada
preparation: Pour the lime liqueur into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Emily Emily
preparation: Muddle the kumquats in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add the other ingredients and shake vigorously. Double strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Yes!
preparation: Pour rum passoa orange vodka and cherry liqueur into a hurricane glass filled with ice. Fill with Red Bull and serve.

name: Think Pink
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cold glass. Stir well.

name: Mamacita
preparation: Pour malibu rum passoa and cointreau into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Fill with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple chunk.

name: Anestesia
preparation: In a shaker glass put all ingredients and shake for 10 seconds. Then serve it in a coctail glass adding a piece of orange and a cherry.

name: F-104
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker filled with crushed ice. Shake and strain into a chilled champagne glass and serve.

name: Salem Witch
preparation: In a collins glass with ice pour vodka midori and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

name: Sparkling Hunt Punch
preparation: Chill all ingredients (except champagne) and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne and serve.

name: Cock-A-Bendy
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Bairn
preparation: Mix over ice and shake. Strain into an old-fashioned glass on the rocks.

name: Field Artillery Special
preparation: In a shaker combine bourbon Jagermeister powerade and ice. Shake well strain and add to glass. Float everclear on top. Drink as a shooter.

name: Bosom Caresser
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Radio City
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Kooky Boa
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry and serve.

name: Quiescent
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Fiesta
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Weep-No-More Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Knickerbocker Martini
preparation: Pour into a mixing glass filled with ice and stir well. Strain into a chilled martini glass add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Temptation Cocktail
preparation: Shake blended whiskey Dubonnet triple sec and anis with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twists of orange and lemon peel and serve.

name: Colony Room Cocktail
preparation: Place a dash of ricard into a cocktail glass and swill to coat the inside. Pour out the excess. Chill the gin vermouth and bitters by stirring with ice and strain into the prepared glass. Serve.

name: Czarina
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Parisienne
preparation: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass over a single ice cube and serve.

name: Hornless Unicorn
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in an old-fashioned glass. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Penzance Cocktail
preparation: Pour the orange juice and ginger beer into a beer mug with a few ice cubes and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Long Happiness
preparation: Muddle in the bottom of a boston shaker the ginger and pineapple. Add vodka gin and pineapple juice. Shake and strain into a collins glass top with ginger beer garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Drew's Peartini
preparation: Place all ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into martini glass. Garnish how ever you like.

name: Fruitopia
preparation: Shake everything with ice and pour into glass.

name: Fruitopia Snap
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper sour apple and watermelon pucker into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peach schnapps and Malibu rum and shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Boardwalk
preparation: Pour the vodka dry vermouth maraschino liqueur and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Cavalier
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Creme de Gin
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Flaming Goat
preparation: Mix vodka gin rum tequila triple sec and curacao. Add sour mix. Add curacao until it's dark purple. Fill glass with ice cubes and float bacardi 151 rum on top. Have the flame blown out before drinking and add a straw.

name: Zerg Rush
preparation: Pour the Bawls and gin into the highball glass filled with ice cubes squeeze the lime wedge's juice into the glass and stir. Optionally you can forgo the lime wedge for a larger concentration of Bawls.

name: Pretty Thing
preparation: Pour vodka amaretto coconut cream and heavy cream into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Combat Cocktail
preparation: Combine first 5 ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a hurricane glass over ice. Add a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Pam Super Juice
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into an aperitif glass and serve. (Good for kids who wants to have a drink like grown ups.)

name: Lei Lani
preparation: Pour the rum lemon juice pineapple juice papaya juice and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine and stir well. Top with soda water. Garnish with a fruit flag or pineapple wedge and serve.

name: Letter Bomb
preparation: Shake vodka and Bailey's over ice then pour into a shooter. Swallow and catch your breath. Best if poured into glass a tad bigger than shot glass.

name: Litnos' Lemonade
preparation: Layer the Crown Royal Canadian Whisky and the Captain Morgan Parrot Bay over ice in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Fill with mountain dew and serve.

name: Frosty Nog
preparation: Combine the eggnog and sugar in a blender. Blend at medium speed slowly adding 3 cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and frosty. Pour into a parfait glass and garnish with almond slivers and a dusting of nutmeg.

name: Faux Nog
preparation: Shake ingredients well with ice and strain over crushed ice in a goblet. Dust with nutmeg and serve.

name: Toreador
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.

name: Sir Walter Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jaffa Schnapps
preparation: Line the rim of a cocktail glass with sugar syrup and shaved chocolate. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into the rimmed glass. Garnish with orange sprinkles and serve.

name: French Night
preparation: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Manchurian Candidate
preparation: Pour vodka into a shot glass and add a dash of soy sauce.

name: Russian Bawls
preparation: Put mostly a splash of Bawls (Energy Drink) into a glass. Add in some ice cubes for the Russian Feel. Then put a shot (or more) of vodka in it. Stir well.

name: Bawlers
preparation: Put the Absolut in the bottom of the glass add ice and then slowly pour the Bawls energy drink into the vodka no need to stir just drink up.

name: Death Shot
preparation: Pour the Opal Nera into a shot glass then over a spoon add the tequila and serve.

name: Belizan Punch
preparation: Fill 1/4 of a punch bowl with orange juice. Fill another 1/4 of the bowl with apple juice. Add 1/2 can of canned cherry juice then add white rum to taste. Serve in cups.

name: Lunatic Giant
preparation: Pour beer Schweppes bitter lemon and raspberry cider into a beer mug or pint glass. Add ice. Pour nut toffee schnapps blue curacao and vodka into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the beer mug and serve.

name: Cupcake
preparation: Fill a glass half full with cubed ice. Pour in 1/2 cup of Seagram's vanilla vodka (or other vanilla vodka). Pour in 1/2 cup of Sprite from 1/2 a foot above glass (helps make it mix better). Stir for 10 seconds and serve.

name: Amarula Colada
preparation: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Frost Bite
preparation: Mix vodka and icewine in a shaker with ice shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the grapes at the bottom and serve.

name: Black Polack
preparation: Begin by pouring 5 ounces of mudslide mix into a glass add 2 shots of 70 proof vanilla vodka then add 1 and 1/2 ounces of chocolate syrup. Stir to mix and serve cold.

name: Apricot Tea
preparation: Combine the apricot nectar cinnamon sticks orange and lemon peels in a saucepan and simmer over low heat for 1-2 min stirring occasionally. Add the tea and stir to mix all the ingredients together. Remove the cinnamon sticks and the orange and lemon peels and pour 6oz of the mixture into each of 4 cups. Add the brown sugar if desired.

name: Kamora & Coffee
preparation: Mix Kamora into your hot cup of coffee.

name: The Force
preparation: Begin by pouring in six cans of Bush Light mixing in 1/4 of the total Everclear as you pour. Next add one can Red Bull and one can of lemon concentrate. Continue this process three more times until all ingredients are mixed into the punch. Stir the entire time to ensure thorough mixing. Finished batch should taste mostly of Red Bull but be advised that it is fairly powerful hence the name. Serve in the standard sized party cup but be prepared to make several batches because one batch is only enough to feed the smallest of parties. Large amounts of Aristocrat Vodka or other vodka can be substituted for Everclear if you want to be a cheapass about it; but in order to maintain the kick you have to use at least twice the ammount.

name: Morning Junkie Monkey
preparation: Add ingredients to a glass with ice. Shake and serve.

name: September Morning
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Morning Milk
preparation: Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Prohibition Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Squeeze in a twist of lemon and discard.

name: Culross
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Edith's Fizz
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Twentieth Century
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Old Etonian
preparation: Pour the gin Lillet orange bitters and creme de noyaux into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Hoopla
preparation: Pour the brandy cointreau Lillet and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Black Tie
preparation: Pour into a wine glass and garnish with a black grape.

name: Banana Punch
preparation: Pour brandy vodka and juice of lime into a collins glass over crushed ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with banana slices and mint sprigs and serve.

name: Flaming Cock Smack
preparation: Combine ice cubes with the pineapple juice banana schnapps and peach schnapps in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a large collins glass then layer the Bacardi 151 on top with the back of a spoon. Ignite and allow to burn extinguish and serve.

name: Clover Leaf Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

name: Missile Rider
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Candy Rider
preparation: Pour both ingredients over into a highball glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Beauty On The Beach
preparation: Pour white rum Southern Comfort Grand Marnier lemon juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fantasio Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Friskey
preparation: Put some ice cubes into a Collins style glass. Pour 1 and a half or 2 shots over the ice. Fill the the rest of the glass with your preferred flavor of Fresca. Stir and Enjoy.

name: Ironman
preparation: Mix seagram 7 and vodka in an old-fashioned glass. Stir. Add a few ice cubes fill with soda and stir gently.

name: Tropical Pepsi Float
preparation: Served in the collins glass (14oz) fill glass 3/4 with ice then add the triple sec then add the coconut rum then the sweet and sour. Float the Pepsi right on top. Serve with a straw and garnish with an thin slice of orange peel. Let the drinker enjoy the color separation and mix with the straw.

name: Cossack Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Coffee Cream
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated coconut and serve with short straws.

name: Gemini
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of orange and serve.

name: Brigitte Bardot
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Cocoa Espresso Cooler
preparation: Combine cold coffee cocoa and vanilla. Pour over ice in tall glasses. Top each with 2 tablespoons of whipped cream. Nutritional analysis per serving: 225 calories; 15.5 grams total fat; (61 percent of calories from fat) 57.2 milligrams cholesterol 75.4 milligrams sodium.

name: Cognac Coupling
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashined glass 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Alize Martini
preparation: Mix in a martini glass.

name: Candida
preparation: Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice.

name: Goodness Gracious
preparation: Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Purple Pussycat Juice
preparation: Shake everything with ice and pour into a glass.

name: Pepper Eater
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with red pepper.

name: Pink Wasi
preparation: Combine 12 oz of Frozen Pink Lemonade 12 oz of rye whiskey. Add three beers of your choice. Stir and serve. The rye and lemonade cancel each other out and leave a mild fruity taste the beer adds carbination. White Lemonade can be used for the White Wasi.

name: Alzheimers
preparation: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

name: Lamb's Wool
preparation: Mix ale spices and sugar with 6 roasted apples (cored peeled and mashed) in a large warm jug. Serve in heat-proof goblets.

name: Clerico
preparation: Remove the skin of all the fruits and cut the fruit into small pieces. Put the fruit in a large bowl and cover the fruit with the sugar. Pour enough wine to cover the fruit and sugar and place bowl in the fridge. Leave it for at least 2 hours (longer preferred) and then mix it with the rest of the wine. Serve each drink with some fruit in the glass.

name: Green Poison
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Matinee
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin chartreuse orange juice and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bijou Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Hayley's Comet
preparation: Mix vodka rum Midori blue Curacao tequila and pineapple juice with ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Pour into glass; top with Sprite. Garnish with cherries coated in sugar. Serve.

name: Campton Place Cafe Sonia
preparation: Lightly beat the cream adding a few drops of the vanilla extract. Add the Metaxa Amaretto and Tia Maria to a warmed 7-oz. mug. Pour in coffee. Taste for sweetness: add sugar if desired. Top with beaten cream.

name: Bangkok Bomb
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice and blend until frothy. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Black Bottom
preparation: Pour the brandy Cointreau blackberry brandy gin lemon juice and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: T-Town Tranquilizer
