preparation: Cut the fruit up into bite size pieces. Get the biggest size container you can find; an ice chest or a witch's cauldron. Then pour all the ingredients in and stick tiny umbrellas in the floating fruit. Allow the fruit to soak for several hours or overnight before serving.

name: Gin Swizzle
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the lime juice sugar gin and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Bourbon Swizzle
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the lime juice sugar bourbon and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Vodka Swizzle
preparation: Add the lime juice sugar vodka and bitters to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture from the shaker into the glass and add club soda. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Champagne Flip
preparation: Shake brandy cointreau cream sugar syrup and egg yolk over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute and carefully fill with champagne. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Gin Sangaree
preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top sprinkle lightly with nutmeg and serve.

name: Mikado
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Nikipumpin Mix
preparation: Mix all the liquid ingredients in a small punch bowl or pitcher. Grate the nutmeg into it leave for 10 mins then seive out the nutmeg. Add the diced cucumber. Chill before serving.

name: Jungle Wild
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into a pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Add lemonade and garnish with fruit. Serve with straws.

name: Blue Chili
preparation: Shake the first 5 ingredients in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail class. Add a dash of sprite. Garnish with cherry and lemon reel.

name: Apple Swizzle
preparation: Shake apple brandy dark rum lime juice and syrup in a shaker and strain into a frosted collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Swizzle briefly to frost the glass. Add the apple juice and serve with a swizzle stick and straws.

name: Postman
preparation: Chill shake and pour over ice cubes in a shot glass.

name: Screaming Peach
preparation: Pour all in a blender with enough ice to fill and blend. Blend on low speed as blender will be pretty full.

name: Frozen Bikini
preparation: Blend everything except champagne until smooth. Transfer to glass and top with champagne.

name: Smeraldo
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice shake it for a while and serve in a cold cocktail glass.

name: Flying Penguin
preparation: Pour 1.5 ounces each of Vodka White Rum and Gin into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Add a good spash (approx .25 ounces) of angora bitters and swirl with a metal stirring rod. Add 5 ounces of Pink Grapefruit Juice. Add 1.5 ounces of sugar syrup. Slice a fresh lime into a slice approximately 1/2 of an inch wide. Cut in half squeezing one half directly into the drink (then drop the squeezed lime half in). Make a small nick 2/3rds of the way up the second halfof lime and use to rim the glass then as a garnish. Include a metal stirring rod.

name: Noche de Phoof
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Drink should be frothy on top. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Citrus Gin Cooler
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a large food processor or smoothie maker and whizz until the ice has been crushed. If your processor is small consider slushing the cocktail in batches as it may fizz over somewhat. Serve in a high-ball glass with a wedge of fresh lime - brush the lime-wedge over the rim of the glass.

name: Sir Knight
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Buddy
preparation: Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.

name: Fuck Your Buddy
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Put in order of jack crown amaretto rum. Fill with the pineapple and splash of grenadine. Stir.

name: Reggae Cocktail
preparation: Pour vodka creme de bananes juices bitters and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

name: Absinthe Margarita
preparation: Combine all liquids in cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a margarita glass. Garnish with lemon slices.

name: Tropical Nat
preparation: Pour rum and vodka over ice and add juices one by one letting the juices swirl together rather than mix. Garnish with a slice of lime orange or pineapple.

name: Cemetary Cider
preparation: Combine the rums and whiskey over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Add the apple cider and stir lightly. Pour into a pint glass and serve.

name: Donna's Glowing Sunrise
preparation: Combine schnapps and vodka add juices grapefruit and twists of lime then Fresca. Serve with lots of ice.

name: Shriner Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Durban Poison
preparation: Pour both ingredients over crushed ice in a champagne flute or tall thin glass and serve.

name: Gaston
preparation: Pour gin lime juice and lemon juice into a highball glass and fill with 7-up.

name: Pamplemousse
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a small slice of grapefruit and a cherry.

name: Borrowed Time
preparation: Combine the Canadian whisky port egg yolk and grenadine in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up
preparation: Add all items to a whiskey sour glass. Mix well with a bar spoon.

name: Smilie Juice
preparation: Add all the ingredients into a large cup give it a little stir or a little chill but dont drown in ice! Good recipe for 2 or 1 large serving.

name: Crackberry Cooler
preparation: Fill collins glass with ice cubes. Add limoncello and top with blackberry soda. Squeeze lemon wedge into drink and drop lemon wedge into the glass. Stir briefly and serve. Serves one.

name: Izayoi
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve. Izayoi means the 16th moon in japanese.

name: Daydream
preparation: In cocktail mixer filled with ice combine all ingredients. Shake or stir & strain into rocks glass or large shot glass. Tip: If the right amount of grenadine is used it should be the color of orange sherbert.

name: H.A.V.
preparation: Combine ingredients. Stir and pour into highball glasses over ice.

name: Funky Filly
preparation: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.

name: Blackberry Mint Bisque
preparation: 1. Puree blackberries and lemonade in a food processor or blender. 2. Pour fruit mixture into a medium saucepan and heat on low for about 5 minutes to blend flavors. Remove soup from burner and whisk in yogurt. Remove soup from burner and whisk in yogurt. Chill if desired. Serve topped with fresh mint.

name: Blackberry Julep
preparation: Shake blackberry liqueur lemon juice and simple syrup with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Stir until the glass begins to frost. Garnish with the berry marinade and serve.

name: Maui Fizz
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Maui Cocktail
preparation: Add the Mountain Dew Code Red to a highball glass over ice then add in the rum and serve.

name: Eruption
preparation: Pour the whisky and creme de cassis into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Tiffany Marshall
preparation: Mix as punch (Lemon Juice to taste). Add orange or lemon slices or olives.

name: Vodka 7
preparation: Pour vodka and lime juice over ice cubes in a collins glass. Drop the lime wedge in and fill with lemon-lime soda. Stir well and serve.

name: Lemon Top
preparation: Pour the ale (or lager) into a beer pilsner or beer mug. Add lemon-lime soda and serve.

name: Panther Juice
preparation: Combine Vodka Jager and Hawaiian Punch in Gatorade cooler/ dispenser. Slice lemons and limes in half squeeze out juice and throw in with mixture. Let chill. Immediately before serving add Mountain Dew and Club Soda.

name: Scorpion Punch
preparation: Combine and mix ingredients in a large ice-filled jug. Add slices of orange and a sprig of mint and serve.

name: SigTau Scorpion
preparation: Mix ingredients stir and add ice to bring level to top of glass.

name: C-MOB
preparation: Two ice cubes 2 oz of whisky 1 shot of vodka and fill the rest with coca cola.

name: Green-Eyed Monster
preparation: Fill glass 2/3 of the way with ice cubes. Pour in vodka triple sec and sour mix. Dump contents of glass into shaker and shake until outside of shaker is frosty. Pour into glass with more ice. Fill with Mountain Dew shake blue curacao on top. Squeeze lime on top of drink set on rim. Serve with two straws.

name: Kiwi Colada
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in pina colada glasses.

name: Monkey Madness
preparation: Combine the Jose Cuervo gold tequila rum vodka banana juice and 4 slices of banana (about 1/4) in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass add the creme de cassis and serve.

name: Masculating Madness
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice.

name: Italian Heather
preparation: Pour the scotch and galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Listerine
preparation: Pour Ingredients into a shaker over crushed ice. Shake well and serve in a Cocktail Glass. It should be the color as the Creme de Menthe.

name: Drunkin' Gator
preparation: Place two scoops of Gatorade mix (any flavor) together with vodka in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

name: Jeyplak Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Turf Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Third-Rail Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Peggy Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Knockout Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Du Barry Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Tuxedo Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Cloister
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Champs Elysees Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bacchanalian Cocktail
preparation: Shake all the ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the lemonade and serve with seedless grapes.

name: Geraldine
preparation: Pour whisky Chartreuse Dubonnet vermouth and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Jonathan
preparation: Spoon the powdered sugar into the glass. Add gin and stir until sugar is mostly dissolved. Add rocks and Chartreuse. Top with champagne.

name: Chartreuse Cooler
preparation: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Drop in an orange spiral and serve.

name: Pajala Sunrise
preparation: Pour the moonshine and water into a normal glass and stick the sausage (the real Pajala Sunrise uses Falukorv/Falun Sausage a swedish sausage) on the edge of the glass like you do with lime slices. Serve with a straw and umbrella.

name: The C-Hag
preparation: Add a shot of the three alcohols listed above to a cup and drink away!

name: The Scranton
preparation: Mix ingredients over ice and stir. Strain into cocktail glass and garnish with lemon twist.

name: Georgia Swamp Water
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a mason jar.

name: Moontini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. If actual moonshine can be acquired it is better. If not Georgia Moon will suffice.

name: Rebel Raider
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade and serve.

name: Birth Control
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned or rocks glass swill and serve.

name: Connolly's Irish Connection
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Emporia Martini
preparation: Fill one 16 oz. red Solo cup with cubed ice. Gently pour 4 oz. of Kentucky's finest table whiskey Henry McKenna over the ice. Fill remaining space with Sun Drop (approx. 8 oz.) Use second cup as mixer cup mix four times. Place full cup inside mixer cup and enjoy.

name: Mist Cream
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Presticles Spectacles Wallet and Watch
preparation: Add all four ingredients to a small cup over ice.

name: Buzzer
preparation: Pour the whisky orange juice raspberry liqueur lemon juice and 7-Up into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bankers Doom
preparation: Put the spirits in together then add the soda water. Stir.

name: Infuriated Plasma
preparation: Mix the Chartreuse and Fireball in the bottom of the jar. Pour in the cranberry juice and let the cream soda go flat. Pour in the cream soda and mix the whole thing with a wooden spoon and then drink as you please.

name: Cranberry Zamboni
preparation: Add ingredients to shaker with ice shake strain and serve.

name: K.G.B.
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Lady's Mango
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Roffsing
preparation: Pour passoa vodka lime juice and pear soda into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir top with cream and serve.
Pour the Strongbow cider and V energy drink in equal parts into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Purple Peril
preparation: Pour vodka and pernod into a tall ice-filled glass. Add blackcurrant cordial top with lemonade and serve.

name: Energy Flux
preparation: Stir ingredients together with ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Blue Bong
preparation: Combine Absolut Bombay Sapphire and Kool Aid into a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into hurricane glass over ice add Blue Bubblegum Soda on top and squeeze in the lemon. Garnish with a Blueberry in the glass.

name: Pickerdo
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Sobo
preparation: Pour Sobe Energy into a collins glass. Add Bacardi O and serve.

name: Counter Strike
preparation: Fill a highball glass half way with ice cubes then combine all liquids and pour over the ice. The drink turns a nice unearthly green colour. You can add more or less Sobe if desired. Other energy drinks can be substituted; AMP is a good alternative.

name: Booga Booga
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with two ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Fade 'o Rade
preparation: Pour the tropical gatorade into a jug. Add 3-4 oz of vodka shake and add Captain Morgans Original spiced rum. Serves about 4 in cocktail glasses.

name: Blue Brain Trasher
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a large mug or container and add 4 large ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Vodka Fizz
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except nutmeg) and pour into a large white wine glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: H2O
preparation: Pour in vodka pineapple orange lemonade and fresca then mix.

name: The Nomad
preparation: Mix vodka lemonade and fresca and serve over ice. Add a dash of grenadine.

name: Appleton Skyy Soda
preparation: Add Skyy vodka and Appleton Estate rum to a hurricane glass over ice cubes. Peel and squeeze a segment or two of sweet Clementine peeled. Drop in. Add Schweppes club soda stir and serve.

name: Undead Monkey
preparation: Mix shot in order. Stir and enjoy.

name: Midland Mayham
preparation: Combine ingredients together in a beer mug / pint glass stir well and serve.

name: Loopy Juice
preparation: Half-fill a pint beer glass with ice. Pour in a can of Red Bull and the blackcurrant at the same time. Fill to top with cola.

name: Corrupt the Righteous
preparation: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: Zero Gravity
preparation: Adjust to taste. Stir em all together and enjoy!

name: High on Irony
preparation: Pour the lime juice soda and punch into the glass then add the rum and vodka. Shake and add ice. Top with a cherry. Serve.

name: Red Eisentrout
preparation: Pour liquors over ice in a collins glass and almost fill with surge soda. Top off with cherry juice and shake. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: SG03
preparation: Pour rum over ice cubes in a collins glass. Add a splash of grenadine and pour in a can of MC2 berry blue energy drink Serve.

name: The Brett Schroeder
preparation: Shake then add Orangina and ice cubes.

name: Godson
preparation: Fill glass with ice add 1/2 shot of Southern Comfort and 1/2 shot of whiskey to the glass. Top it up with ginger ale and splash a small amount of amaretto for taste.

name: Shwin-tastic
preparation: 1.) Pour ginger ale into cup(do not add ice yet). 2.) Add 1 and 1/2 to 2 shots of Brandy. 3.) Stir moderatly with a stirring rod. 4.) Add 3- 4 ounces of Grape Juice and stir same as above. 5.) Add ice. Final color should look a bit darker than a regular beer.

name: Fru Fru Drink
preparation: Mix one gallon of pink lemonade to half a gallon of raspberry vodka. Pour into Margarita machine and freeze or pour over ice. Great drink for the hot summer day and a good party drink for the non heavy drinker.

name: Black Cherrymeister
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into a shot glass then add the soda. Take the shot. Also works well with six soda to one jager as a cocktail.

name: Solitaire
preparation: Pour ingredients into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add a straw and serve.

name: Jump Starter
preparation: Mix in a chilled glass.

name: Warrens Liquid Energy
preparation: Stir over ice.

name: Animazement
preparation: Build in a glass over ice.

name: Iconoclast
preparation: Fill an old-fasioned glass halfway with ice. Add the juice of 1/2 lemon and 2 oz. gin (I prefer Bombay Sapphire). Stir. Fill the rest of the way with diet Verners and gently stir. Enjoy. Nutrition Info: 156 calories and 3 g carbohydrates per glass(!)

name: Napalm #2
preparation: Add ice to glass 1/2 full. Pour in Gin. Squeeze lemon juice over ice. Add Gatorade mix. Slowly add 7-up to top. Gently stir until powder mix is dissolved.

name: Liquid Sex
preparation: Add marshmallow to a shot glass pour over vodka and add red food coloring. Mix it together with a wire whisk.

name: Glo-Jito
preparation: Mash 5 spearmint leaves in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Add the Everglo and rum and top with soda.

name: Master Chief
preparation: Add all ingredients (except orange skin) to a blender. Blend on high setting for 30 seconds. Add orange skin and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: Gilroy Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rum Sunday
preparation: Blend briefly all ingredient (except overproof rum) with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a collins glass float overproof rum on top and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Cannonball
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan Tattoo into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Top with coke with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Pineapple Cooler
preparation: Pour white wine pineapple juice powdered sugar and two-ounces of carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir again. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and an orange spiral over the rim.

name: Pink Mafia
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Apres Ski
preparation: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Serve with a slice of lime or mint sprig.

name: Conca de Fuego
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry on a stick and serve.

name: Tequila Colagallo
preparation: Pour lemon juice into glass. Add ice cubes. Add salt. Pour tequila and stir to blend. Fill with coke and serve.

name: Pall Mall Martini
preparation: Stir the gin vermouths creme de menthe and orange bitters together in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Same Old Song
preparation: Pour the vermouth gin juices and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: Income Tax Cocktail
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Alabazam
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice and strain into a highball glass with ice. Top with soda stir and serve.

name: Dry Hole
preparation: Pour the white rum apricot brandy Cointreau and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with club soda stir briefly and serve.

name: Gentleman's Cocktail
preparation: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mulled Madeira
preparation: Combine madeira honey juice peel cloves and cinnamon in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs leaving peel and spices in pan.

name: Mexican Bike Race
preparation: Pour everything into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Orville's-Gasm
preparation: Place a few icecubes in a cocktail shaker. Add each ingredient in its respective amount. Leave the ice in the glass once poured into the cocktail glass (don't strain). Sit back and enjoy Orville's-Gasm.

name: Festive Fuck
preparation: Mix schnapps together with tequila and grenadine in a shot glass and serve.

name: Jubilee
preparation: Pour tequila gin vodka curacao lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Ice-Cream
preparation: Mix both the ice-cream and cherries together and freeze in a mason jar or similar container.

name: Jocose Julep
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except carbonated water) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

name: Green Tee This
preparation: Pour vodka then zen in an old-fashioned glass with ice. Fill with green tea and stir.

name: Blitz
preparation: Shake with ice. Strain or with ice.

name: Canado Saludo
preparation: Pour the white rum orange juice pineapple juice lemon juice grenadine and bitters into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple slice orange slice and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Benelyn
preparation: Pour the tequila Southern Comfort and peach schnapps into a tall glass. Add Hoopers Hooch and Red Bull. Top with cranberry juice to taste and serve.

name: Bennett Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Blue Volcano
preparation: Add the vodka to a highball glass then fill to the brim with pre-mixed Kool-Aid. Serve. Alternatively use another variety of Kool-Aid and rename the drink to match.

name: Jealous Queen
preparation: Mix together in a glass.

name: Royalty Fizz
preparation: Combine the gin lemon juice Curacao sugar and egg in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda stir well and serve.

name: Lemon Kvas
preparation: Dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup warm water. Boil remaining water and pour into a large stone crock. Add pitted halves of lemons sugar and raisins and mix until sugar dissolves. Cool to lukewarm. Add beer and yeast mixture. Cover with cheesecloth and ferment at room temperature for 24 hours. Strain liquid through muslin. Store in sealed glass jars or bottles. Keep for 3 to 4 days before serving.

name: Momosa
preparation: Pour orange juice and ginger ale in equal parts into a chilled hi-ball glass. Add mango nectar and stir once or twice. Garnish with speared mandarin piece and serve.

name: Brittany Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin Amer Picon orange juice lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Cocomacoque
preparation: Combine rum juice of lemon pineapple juice and orange juice. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Garnet Crow
preparation: Stir all ingredients together without ice. Pour into chilled cocktail glass half full of shaved ice. Garnish with fruit and sprig of mint.

name: Peach Tequila
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lime juice stir and drop lime slice into drink.

name: Bernardete
preparation: The Bernardete is very sweet lots of fun and yet very easy to mix. Just put 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass and cover with the Peach Liqueur. Then fill up the glass to the top with Peach Juice. Both ingredients should have been in the fridge before serving.

name: Ejhazz
preparation: Add vodka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet dilute it with water.

name: Demolitious
preparation: Fill collins glass with ice. Add Aliz and coconut rum then fill with equal amounts of cranberry and pineapple juice leaving space for the 151 rum to float on top. Shake ingredients before adding the 151 rum. Garnish with sliced pineapples and cherries on a toothpick.

name: Gang Up
preparation: Pour ingredients into a highball glass. Garnish with fruit add straws and serve.

name: Old Lady
preparation: Shake the ingredientes together in a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Strain into a Champagne saucer glass garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Sprawling Dubinsky
preparation: First add one part of Johnnie Walker Red. Next add one part Johnnie Walker Black followed by another part of Absolut Citron. Finally throw in a touch of amaretto for flavor.

name: Gin-Dew-It
preparation: Pour 1 shot of your favorite gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add mountain dew till glass is almost filled then give it a splash of sprite. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Forza FCK
preparation: Mix the tequila vodka banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice and put it in an glass. Last pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sinks to bottom of the glass.

name: Saoco
preparation: Pour over crushed ice in a collins glass stir and serve.

name: Pesticidal Cherries
preparation: Add the grenadine to the tonic water in a mixing glass and mix well. Add the cherry cola and one shot of vodka at the same time. Place the 5 cherries in a seperate shot of vodka and soak for at least 10 minutes (cherries can be soaked in advance and kept in the refrigerator). Remove cherries and add this shot of vodka to the mixing glass. Stir strain into a collins glass and serve. Garnish with some more cherries and serve.

name: Teal Squeal
preparation: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend well. Serve in highball glass. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Pineapple Punch
preparation: Place the pineapple pieces in a punch bowl and pour the sherry over them. Chill for 2 hours. Place tea and sugar in a pot add red wine lemon juice and rum. Heat but do not boil the mixture. Pour over the pineapple pieces and sherry.

name: Apple Karate
preparation: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour into a tall glass and serve.

name: The Chalise
preparation: Throw all ingredients into a blender and blend to your hearts delight. After pour into an iced punch bowl garnish with lemon slices and drink immediately!

name: Anton's Ecto Cooler
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

name: Golden Panther
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Pomegranate Apple Martini
preparation: Remove seeds from pomegranite and crush to extract juice. Add vodka to seeds and let set for a couple hours. Add sugar and shake. Mix 3 shots vodka mix 1 shot vermouth and 3 shots apple juice.

name: Georgia's
preparation: Start by chucking a Martini Glass in your freezer to really chill it down. So start by using a Boston Shaker muddle the sugar syrup and pomegranate in the glass half of the shaker. Add the Vodka Fill the metal part of the shaker with COLD ICE (dont leave it on the bench to half melt and ruin the drink) Shake hard and fast so the pomegranate realeases more juice for about 30 seconds. Pull your nicely frosted glass out of the freezer and double strain starting with a hawthorn strainer then through a fine sieve. Take your orange rind and squeeze it acoss the top of the drink give it a little twist and drop it into the drink

name: Christmas Carol Punch
preparation: Core apples slice into 1/2 inch rings. In Dutch oven combine cider cinnamon cloves apple rings and raisins. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer 5 to 8 minutes or until apples are just tender. Add orange and lemon slices and lemon juice. Pour into punch bowl. Ladle into large mugs including an apple ring some raisins spices and citrus slices in each serving. Serve with spoons. If the weather is extremely cold add some brandy or add the brandy anyway.

name: Creamy Date Shake
preparation: Combine first 4 ingredients in blender and process until dates are finely chopped. With blender on add ice cubes1 at a time and process until smooth.

name: Margariteata
preparation: Squeeze citrus fruits into pitcher. Add sugar to boiling water until completely dissolved. Let cool and add this simple syrup to pitcher. To serve combine tequila green tea and 2 oz of citrus mixture over ice in a margarita glass.

name: Old Pirate
preparation: Shake everything with ice pour and serve.

name: Boilerjager
preparation: Drop a double-shot glass of Jagermeister into a 3/4 pint of Samuel Adams and serve.

name: Michelle's Indigo
preparation: Shake everything but blue curacao 7-up and sugar in a shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir in sugar and fill with 7-up. Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink and serve without stirring.

name: Creamy Punch
preparation: Spoon ice cream by tablespoons into a large punch bowl. Add juices stirring to muddle ice cream. Very slowly pour in chilled carbonated beverage. Stir gently to mix. Makes 36 (4 ounce) servings. (For color substitute sherbet for ice cream and omit juices.)

name: Dolly Iced Tea
preparation: Prepare iced tea as per usual or by instructions on can. Add grenadine and bitters to a cocktail glass and pour in the iced tea mixture. Add vodka. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Mexican Midget
preparation: Pour the gin tequila and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranapple juice to taste and serve.

name: Pink Valdimar
preparation: Place about a cup of ice in a blender. Add the Knudsen juice to cover the ice. Add some strawberries and blend. While blending add vodka to equal desired state of inebriation. Goes well with pickles and honey.

name: Citizen Cane
preparation: First take slices of pear and place them on a saucer pour on raw sugar douse in the overproof rum and light. When caramelised this will become the drink garnish. Pour the rest of the ingredients into a shaker shake hard and fast and strain over crushed ice into a highball glass. Serve.

name: Amigo
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Roadkill Toaster Oven
preparation: Shake rum tequila lime juice juice of 1/2 can pears and a pinch of red pepper flakes in a mason jar. Garnish with 1 pineapple ring and 2 cherries arranged to form face.

name: Guadka
preparation: Pour both ingredients chilled into a glass and enjoy.

name: Kis-Kesay
preparation: Shake ingredients and strain into a champagne saucer. Float cream on top garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Asskicker #2
preparation: Add the vodka everclear coconut juice and pineapple juice to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up stir and serve.

name: Wrightsville Sunset
preparation: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a large white wine glass half-filled with crushed ice.

name: Egg Sour
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral and serve.

name: Carol's Eggnog
preparation: Beat egg whites until stiff. Add sugar to the egg yolks beat until creamy yellow. Add vanilla half & half and whipping cream. Mix well. Fold in whipped egg whites. Serve cold and sprinkled with nutmeg. If desired a little brandy (or a lot) may be added.

name: Angler's Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice pour contents into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Cherry Poppers
preparation: Mix the Jell-o water and vodka. Do not boil the water do not let the jell-o solidify. Prepare a funnel for the beer pour a double shot of the mix in the top and funnel it! If a funnel isn't readily available pour the mix in a double shot glass drop the shot glass in a full beer cup and chug it all. Don't puss out - pop that cherry.

name: The Manager's Daughter
preparation: And to an ice-filled highball glass.

name: Max Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Apollo 13
preparation: Pour the white rum cream Grand Marnier Galliano and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a 5 oz champagne saucer or glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Black Feather
preparation: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an Orange Twist.

name: California Barbie
preparation: Pour the Malibu rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill the glass with yellow lemonade. Stir and serve with a straw.

name: Flapjack Shooter
preparation: Shake and strain into a cordial glass and serve.

name: Mounds Martini
preparation: Pour over ice in shaker. Shake well. Served up in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with shaved coconut if desired.

name: Hot 'n' Frosty
preparation: Fill a shot glass with cinnamon schnapps. Drop the full shot glass into a frosted mug o' beer and serve.

name: O.D.
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Tropical Rainstorm
preparation: Pour dark rum cherry brandy lemon juice and Cointreau into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Little Red Riding Hood
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with berries a short straw and serve.

name: Claret Punch
preparation: Stir the lemon juice and sugar togeher in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the claret brandy apricot brandy bourbon whiskey Cointreau club soda and cold tea. Stir well. Add one large block of ice then add orange slices. Makes 30 (6-ounce) punch cups.

name: Embassy Cocktail
preparation: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Canadian Pineapple
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Pall Mall Cocktail
preparation: Stir the gin vermouths and creme de cacao together in an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Old Groaner
preparation: Pour Canadian whisky and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir and serve.

name: Mexican Mountie
preparation: Pour each part into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with a wedge of lime.

name: Davenport
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cola garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry and serve.

name: Spymaster
preparation: Pour vodka banana liqueur lemon juice and egg white into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Thunderclap
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Paez
preparation: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Lasky Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Nude Ell Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Stem-Winder
preparation: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a double-cocktail glass add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Charmer
preparation: Shake ingredients with crushed ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Cabaret
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the gin vermouth benedictine and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Syracuse Special
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled wine goblet. Garnish with a seedless grape a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Even Pair
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add tonic water and serve.

name: The Maxim
preparation: Mix all ingredients except cranberry juice and sprite in a shaker of ice. Add cranberry juice slowly till you reach desired gray color. Shake top off wiht a splash of sprite. Garnish with a lemon peel. Enjoy

name: Jamaican Martini
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry peppers and serve.

name: Gene Splice
preparation: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: J-Unit's Wookie Surprise
preparation: Mix everything together in a big bowl. Then fit as many people around the bowl with straws as possible and drink as fast as possible.

name: Juan Blue
preparation: Pour tequila orange juice grapefruit juice lemon juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Carefully float the curacao on top by pouring over the back of a teaspoon and serve.

name: Ozone #2
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Pabst-Smir
preparation: Pack an 8-oz glass with ice. Add Smirnoff vodka and fruit juice concentrate. Fill glass with Pabst. Dump contents into a shaker. Shake gently and strain. Makes one big shooter.

name: The Beavis
preparation: Pour all the ingredients together and hope it don't explode! Drink as fast as you can with no food and say your prayers.

name: Green Elevator
preparation: Fill half of an glass an old-fashioned glass with peppermint liqueur. Fill with beer stir and serve.

name: Black Velveteen
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a large beer mug and serve.

name: Fuzzy Faser
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

name: The Buckshot
preparation: First take the unopened can of beer and pierce a shotgun hole in the side of the can near the bottom. Without spilling take a 1-2 oz. sip of the beer through the shotgun hole you'll need the room. Next pour the cold shot of Jagermeister in the can. Put the shotgun hole up to your lips securely. Tip the top of the can towards the sky pop the tab and chug.

name: Tropiflipano
preparation: Put all ingredients into a large mixing bowl (or simmer pot whenever possible). Mix well! This drink serves 2-3 quite well.

name: Deer's Tounge
preparation: Pour the jagermeister into a shot glass. Drop into a pint of Blue Moon Belgian ale and serve.

name: Tequila Moonrise
preparation: Combine the tequila light rum dark rum Rose's lime juice lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes top with ale and serve.

name: Michealado
preparation: Pour desired amount of tequila into mug or glass. Add the juice of one lime. Fill the rest of the glass with beer (preferably corona or dos equis). Add the hot-sauce of your preference and a dash of chili powder. Stir the contents of the drink and add ice if desired.

name: Sizzler
preparation: Mix altogether until fizzing.

name: Upstate Manhattan
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice and add - in order - the bitters bourbon/whiskey vermouth and brandy. This should only require a little stir to mix the ingredients enough. Twist the orange peel over the drink and drop in: voil! Note: As with all bourbon or whiskey drinks DO NOT use SoCo; it is not at all related to bourbon or whiskey and makes this and any other drink taste COMPLETELY different.

name: Sherry Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Parisiana Punch
preparation: Add madeira cognac sugar and lemons (washed and halved) to a large jug. Mix until sugar dissolves and chill for 2 - 3 hours. Add the champagne and serve in wine glasses.

name: Holy Fuck
preparation: Pour all of it into a shaker with crushed ice; shake; pour into shot glass.

name: House Destruction
preparation: Put the concentrate in a BIG pitcher. Then add vodka triple sec and schnapps. fill to top with sprite (normally about 3/4 of the 2 litter) serve over ice. You won't taste anything but the fruit and sprite!!! Extremely smooth and extremely strong!

name: Deshler Cocktail
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Chulitro
preparation: First goes pisco then the ice cubes fill with coke a little bit of beer (any kind) and the lemon juice.

name: Coconut Climber
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with toasted coconut and serve.

name: Flamenco
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Maya Kiss
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
preparation: Pour triple sec vodka rum and gin into a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and sweeten to taste. Add a splash of sprite stir garnish a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Loudmouth
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass full of ice cubes.

name: Fun Ship
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker filling with equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake and strain into cocktail glasses.

name: Ridley
preparation: Stir tequila and gin and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle galliano on top. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.

name: Bikini Cocktail
preparation: Shake rum vodka milk sugar and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Fondaudege
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Liberator
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Feliz Natal
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

name: Guiness Slammer
preparation: Start with oranje juice in the bottom of a pint glass layer Guinness stout on top of the OJ float amareda on top chug the whole thing

name: Croc Punch
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors fill nearly with sprite and top off with lime juice.

name: Epitaph
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shot glass and draw your last breath!

name: Frosty Amour
preparation: Rim a collins glass with lemon and caster sugar and fill with ice. Shake ingredients strain into the glass and add 7-up. Garnish with a slice of orange and a green maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Peach 200
preparation: Pour koskenkorva peach vodka into a glass and fill with coca-cola. Stir and serve cold.

name: Kenny
preparation: Mix the peach vodka with the sprite and some ice cubes.

name: Cherry Mash (or Cherry Bomb)
preparation: Take 3/4 pint of Young's Double Choclate Stout pour the shot of Cherry Vodka and the optional shot of Vanilla Vodka then fill the remainder of the glass with the Irish Cream. Slam the pint.

name: Fruit Extravaganza
preparation: Combine all ingredients shake and pour over ice in any size cup.

name: Blue Crayons
preparation: Pour blueberry flavored vodka into a highball glass over ice. Add a small can of chilled cranberry juice and serve.

name: Berrytini
preparation: Pour the vodka and framboise into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberries and serve.

name: Spiced Lemon
preparation: Pour the Country Time lemonade into a highball glass. Add the spiced vodka stir and serve.

name: Coffee Nip
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: L&C
preparation: Put pineapple chunks in the blender and blend until smooth. Add vodka rum and enough ice to raise the level to five cups. Blend until the ice gets all smashed up. Pour into tall glasses garnished with the cherries.

name: Pink Almond
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with fruit and serve

name: Ladybug
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.

name: Gracious Enjee
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a coffee mug stir well and serve.

name: Cucumber-Melon Delight
preparation: Fill your blender with ice (I used a magic bullet wich is like 1/3 of a blender). Add the cut up cucumber on top of ice. Pour the bacardi over the cucumber. Pour in the sweet and sour mix. Blend. Add a squeeze of lime and blend again- 2 seconds. Pour into glass and enjoy. (Add more cucumber to taste i leave the seeds in. depending on the brand of melon liquor depends on the taste of the cucumber.) These are great-NO JOKE!

name: Loom Cooler
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well pour into a whiskey sour glass and serve.

name: Mophead
preparation: Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass and serve.

name: Tequila Press
preparation: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.

name: Molotov Cocktail
preparation: Pour a shot of vodka (preferably russian) into a shot glass. Float the 151 ignite blow out and shoot.

name: Peep Show
preparation: Pour the Dubonnet brandy pernod and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: The Molotov
preparation: Fill a mixing glass 1/2 with ice pour the vodka triple sec lime food coloring into the mixing glass and stir. Seperately in a chilled cocktail glass squeeze a lemon discard twist and ignite then smother the flames with a damp clean rag. Stir contents of the mixing glass into this cocktail glass and garnish with a (clean) spent rifle casing (optional). Squeeze 1 lemon and 1 orange twist on top of drink toast with a friend ignite smother with damp rag and enjoy.

name: Calvarniac
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Stranger-In-Town
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine the rum vermouth Calvados and cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Irish Pancake
preparation: Mix equal parts of Guinness and Buttershots in a cocktail glass (or mug shot glass etc) and serve.

name: Hollywood Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a blue cheese-stuffed almond and serve.

name: Roadster
preparation: Shake strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Rum Ramsay
preparation: Squeeze lime juice directly in a mixing glass and add spent shell. Add remaining ingredients stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice.

name: Seelbach Cocktail
preparation: Add bourbon bitters and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

name: Jackass
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a red wine glass; swirl until mixed. Add several ice cubes and serve.

name: Arcadia
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jump Start
preparation: Add all ingredients to a coffee mug and stir for about 5 or so seconds. Serve.

name: Pan de Cafe Infectado
preparation: Put ice strawberrries and bananas into a blender and blend for 5 seconds. Add malibu and Bailey's and blend until there is a smoothie-like consistency. Finally add mint leaves into blender and stir not blend. Pour into a suitable glass and serve.

name: Pollyanna
preparation: Muddle ingredients together in a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Burfentailor
preparation: Pour vermouth gin brandy Pernod lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Mandeville-Polar
preparation: Funnel the rums pernod lemon juice and grenadine into one small cola bottle (185-200ml) roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard stein or british pint) and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle.

name: Pink Elephants On Parade
preparation: Mix and serve.

name: Boswellian Booster
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy orange bitters lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Cherry Repair Kit
preparation: Combine all ingredients together with half a cup or less of crushed ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a medium-sized cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: T-Bone's Black-Razz Tea
preparation: Fill a tall/collins glass with ice then combine the alcohols and cherry juice or grenadine fill with sour mix shake vigorously top with club or lemon-lime soda garnish with an orange and cherry flag and serve.

name: Iced Captain
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a large highball glass and mix together. Serve.

name: Porterhouse Blue
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

name: Swedish Blue
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a blue cherry and serve.

name: JaCocoa
preparation: Make a cup of hot cocoa by boiling 3/4 of a cup of water and adding 1 full package of hot cocoa. Add 1/4 cup jack daniels ( more or less depending on how strong you like your drinks). Stir together and serve.

name: Durango
preparation: Pour the tequila grapefruit juice and orgeat syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with water garnish with mint sprigs and serve.

name: Justine
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Bali Hai
preparation: Shake ingredients (except champagne) with cracked ice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with champagne.

name: Queen's Cousin
preparation: Pour the vodka Grand Marnier lime juice bitters Cointreau and wine into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a large wine glass and add the wine. Stir well and serve.

name: Papagena
preparation: Mix well in a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Jufu Cocktail
preparation: Shake. Serve on the rocks.

name: Feeler Cocktail
preparation: Blend everything together in a blender and serve in champagne glasses.

name: Black Lab
preparation: Pour Jagermeister liqueur into a rocks or old-fashioned glass or large shot glass. Top with a splash of cola cover with bar napkin and slam on table top; shoot it immediately.

name: Captain Kinger
preparation: pour and shoot

name: Bakkus
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.

name: Muddy Madagascar
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top off with a slice of pineapple and serve.

name: Cruz Azul
preparation: Stir and serve.

name: Rum Fix
preparation: Stir juice of lemon powdered sugar and water in a highball glass. Fill glass with ice add rum and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

name: Peach West Indies
preparation: Peel and slice the half-peach and add with the white rum maraschino liqueur and Rose's lime juice to a blender. Add 3-oz of crushed ice. Blend for 10-20 seconds. Strain into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Maragato Special
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled double-cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and lime.

name: La Bella Blu'z
preparation: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Green Apple slice & Enjoy

name: Pink Rose Fizz
preparation: Shake everything with ice (except for the soda). Strain into a highball glass fill the glass with soda.

name: Hot Devilish Daiquiri
preparation: In 2 qt. microproof casserole combine hot water sugar spices and concentrated juices. Stir then cook on HI 5-6 minutes or until mixture boils. Heat rum in microproof container on HI for 30 seconds. Ignite and pour over hot beverage. Ladle into punch cups for serving.

name: Maraschino Cherry
preparation: Pour the rum amaretto peach schnapps juices and grenadine into a blender with two cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Crockpot Hot Chocolate
preparation: Set crockpot at high. Break in chocolate add half & half milk coffee brown sugar vanilla spices and salt. Stir and cover. Cook stirring thoroughly every 15 minutes until chocolate has melted completely about 1 hour. Add orange peel and stir. (Use a vegetable peeler to cut the orange peel into a long spiral.) Serve immediately or turn crock to low and keep covered removing orange peel after 15 minutes. Served with whipped cream.

name: Greathead
preparation: Pour the Canadian whisky and Applejack brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Max The Silent
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Max the Silent
preparation: Pour the anejo rum brandy Applejack brandy and anisette into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Czarine
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Pineapple Hornblower
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

name: The Ooze
preparation: Mix tequila vodka and Sour Monkey in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour a few fingers of Lime cordial into a Hurricane glass half filled with ice cubes then strain mix from cockatial shaker over it. Fill the rest of the glass with Sueno soda (or a similar citrus based soda). The drink should now be a toxic green and smell of pure gasoline.

name: Venezia
preparation: Mix and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest and serve.

name: Daily Mail
preparation: Stir all ingredients together in a lowball or old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Peregrine's Peril
preparation: Pour the dark rum lime juice creme de bananes southern comfort and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Peregrine's Peril
preparation: combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Frisco Sour
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Squeeze in an orange wedge garnish with a stemmed cherry and serve.

name: Mauipazaui
preparation: Mix ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Best made with Malibu brand rum and California style Sunny D.

name: Floridanian
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Endurance
preparation: Combine the hazelnut liqueur irish cream Kahlua coffee liqueur banana liqueur banana and espresso in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Swirl the chocolate sauce or syrup into a cocktail glass and pour the mixture on top. Serve.

name: Downshift
preparation: Start with the sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that add the Minute Maid fruit punch then float the 151 proof rum. Rocks optional.

name: Ragged Company
preparation: Combine bourbon vermouth benedictine and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Lennart #2
preparation: Pour pear brandy over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a slice of lime.

name: Poire Fantastic
preparation: Pour poire au cognac pear liqueur into a highball glass. Add sprite and ice if desired.

name: Piedra Putamadre
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a cordial glass and serve. A mexican party-hangover cure.

name: Football
preparation: Fill a glass with fernet branca. Drop in a splash of cream either whipped or foamed and serve.

name: Hanky Panky
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Brandy Fino
preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into a brandy snifter.

name: Inedible Cocktail
preparation: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Strawberry Frenzy
preparation: Mix all ingredients into shaker including the frozen strawberries with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Drop in a fresh strawberry for garnish.

name: Snowflake
preparation: Blend Pear Liqueur Milk and Ice. Add 7-Up to taste.

name: Wolf's Lair
preparation: Shake strain into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Caipirao
preparation: Cut the lime and crush it in a old-fashioned glass. Fill the glass with crushed iced (ice cubes can also be used). Pour the Licor Beirao into the glass and stir well. Note that no sugar is added.

name: Mary Poppins
preparation: Pour the dark rum apricot brandy and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well and pour into a collins glass. Top up with ice and drizzle the creme de cassis and grenadine over the top. Serve.

name: Verboten
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry and serve.

name: The Bears Den
preparation: Add 1 oz Chateau Monet Framboise into a glass and fill with cranberry juice. Makes a simple tasty drink.

name: Cranberry Zambonee
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned or rocks glass and serve.

name: Avril Cocktail
preparation: Pour whisky and cranberry liqueur into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Purple Pussy
preparation: Pour the entire bottle of Xrated into a bowl or another bottle that is empty. Then pour the entire bottle of vodka into the bowl/bottle with the Xrated. (I have found Peach and Raspberry vodka taste the best with this drink) Once you have poured the Xrated and the vodka into the bowl/bottle then pour just enough blue curacao into the mixture and mix until Purple. Sorry for not giving an exact amount on the blue curacao it really depends on how purple you want the drink to be. I have found that it usually takes anywhere from 2-8 shots to get it right.

name: Smoochie Smoochie Blue
preparation: Fill 1/2 of glass with crushed ice add 2 oz of 99 Blackberries fill glass with glacier freeze gatorade add splash of Sprite or Sierra Mist for a little touch of fizz garnish with lime and serve.

name: Dr. Black
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass filled with ice and serve.

name: Coterie
preparation: Stir and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Pinata
preparation: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake until frothy. Pour into 1-2 chilled martini cocktail glasses and serve.

name: Picker's Peach
preparation: Blend in a blender until smooth. Add a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a wedge-like slice of peach speared with a cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Jupiter Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Buckshot
preparation: The Tequila and Whiskey are mixed in the bottom of the shot glass. The Baileys is to act like the 'wax' in a shotgun shell and is layered on top of the whiskey/tequila mix. The fresh ground pepper is your 'buckshot' that creates the spice/burning sensation. Sprinkle it on the top.

name: DJ Shooters
preparation: In a pitcher full of ice add Peach Schnapps Rum Vodka Gin and juices. Stir well. Serve.

name: Duncan MacLeod
preparation: Combine pre-chilled shochu and scotch in a beer mug. Fill with coke mix gently and serve.

name: Skinhead Paramedic
preparation: Add all ingredients in a collins glass. Do not stir. Garnish with a lime wedge or an ear of baby corn.

name: Journalist Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Nuttier Russian
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with 3 - 4 ice cubes. Shake well strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pink Drink
preparation: Pour vodka galliano cointreau grenadine and milk into a cocktail shaker shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a squirt of cream on top and serve.

name: Mug Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.

name: Captang Poontag
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan spiced rum into a highball glass. Add the Tang and serve. It should taste akin to an orange dreamsicle.

name: Raspberry Cream
preparation: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Tropical Strawberry
preparation: In a blender blend the strawberries pineapple milk yogurt sugar and ice until smooth.

name: Frosty Noggin
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a few drops of green creme de menthe and a rolled cookie and serve.

name: Good Golly
preparation: Pour the rum Galliano creme de cacao and coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass and stir well. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink and serve.

name: Red Velvet
preparation: Build gin pisang ambon sprite and lime juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine garnish with a lime boat and serve.

name: Lu Lu's Velvet Cream Cocktail
preparation: Add the Baileys Courvoisier Tia Maria and Ice cubes into a blender and blend until ice has broken down. Then add the ice cream and chocolate liqueur and blend until smooth then serve.

name: Mistral
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

name: Alfonso Special
preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Morning Cocktail
preparation: Pour the brandy dry vermouth triple sec maraschino anisette and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: The Race
preparation: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.

name: Liquid Candycane
preparation: Pour both liquids into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir and serve.

name: Bluebeard #2
preparation: Pour vodka and brandy into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Crimson Coma
preparation: Pour vodka over ice then add raspberry and fill with Coca Cola.

name: Knickerbein Cocktail
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake extremely well. Serve in a frosted glass and dust with freshly grated nutmeg and orange zest.

name: Midnight's White Whisker
preparation: 2 shots of Brandy and 4 ounces of cranberry juice (or to taste). Simply pour the ingredients over ice and drink.

name: The Fran
preparation: Slap it in stir it around and take it down.

name: Armada Martini
preparation: Pour vodka and Amontillado sherry over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.

name: Andalusia
preparation: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice strain contents into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Guesswork Cocktail
preparation: Shake strain into a frosted cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chinese Mary
preparation: Make like a Bloody Mary improvising with ingredients until you find your preferred taste and texture. Try adding extra vodka to thin out the sauce a little. When heated this also makes a great sauce for food.

name: T-Bone
preparation: Pour the 151 rum in a shot glass and splash a little A-1 sauce on top. Really easy to make but not so easy to go down.

name: Mounaki
preparation: Shake all ingredients with 5 ice cubes for a good 10 seconds. Pour don't strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Orgasm #10
preparation: Build ingredients in above order in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Cabaret Martini
preparation: Pour the gin Dubonnet Angostura bitters and Pernod into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist and serve.

name: Mutiny
preparation: Combine the rum dubonnet and bitters in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: European
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin sherry dubonnet vermouth and grand marnier. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Dubonnet Royal
preparation: Stir the Dubonnet wine gin Angostura bitters and curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a dash of Pastis garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Golden Friendship
preparation: Mix amaretto sweet vermouth and white rum in a collins glass with ice and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with an orange spiral and a cherry.

name: Dianne-On-The-Tower
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Malihini Punch
preparation: Combine orange juice lilikoi syrup and guava syrup blend well. Chill. Serve over ice cubes.

name: Asphalt
preparation: Pour brandy over ice the glass. Fill with Coke. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Old Nick
preparation: Combine the whisky Drambuie orange juice lemon juice and orange bitters in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

name: Donnington Brainstorm
preparation: Mix well the Thunderbird with the Vodka and pour into an empty litre coke/lemonade bottle. The exact ratio of vodka:thunderbird can be altered to the creator's taste. Fridge for at least 12 hours. Donnington Brainstorm is best at temperatures between 2-4 degrees centigrade. If the drink is too cold it will tend to be too bitter; if it is too warm it will tend to be too sweet. At just the right temperature it should be light refreshing slightly peary and the alcohol taste minimal. Drink very carefully.

name: Goin' Home
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except apple juice) and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add apple juice and serve.

name: Immaculata
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dissidente
preparation: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an highball glass. Fill half glass with ice cubes. Pour the rum and angostura into the glass. Stir well. Fill with chinotto and serve.

name: Skylab Fallout
preparation: Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila gin vodka and your blue curacao in. Put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry.

name: Pineapple Island
preparation: Blend with half a glassful of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a collins glass garnished with a slice of pineapple. Serve with straws.

name: Dolores
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Napalm
preparation: Pour into a shot glass in order; aftershock schnapps rum. Ignite the rum allow to burn for a few seconds extinguish and serve.

name: E.T.
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with some ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pajala Sunrise
preparation: Fill a glass with vodka and place a slice of sausage on the edge.

name: Still Water
preparation: Start with a 16oz glass Add the ice cubes first. Float the ice in 3 oz of Myers's Dark Rum Open the can of Fresca and pour it all at once into the glass letting it foam. This effervescence from the soda's carbonation serves to mix the rum with the Fresca.

name: Freefall
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass and stir. Decorate with a piece of pineapple and a cherry. Serve.

name: Embassy Royal
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lover's Nocturne
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Downhill Cocktail
preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry add straws and serve.

name: Cola-Rolla
preparation: Funnel the curacao cognac vodka and lemon juice into one small cola bottle (185-200ml) roughly half-filled with cola. Briefly invert the bottle to mix the ingredients. Place in the center of a large glass (tankard stein or british pint) and fill glass with broken ice. Add a straw to the bottle and serve.

name: La Panthere Rose
preparation: Shake and strain into a wine goblet three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add champagne garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Slugger's Delight
preparation: Pour the Rock & Rye into a glass with ice. While the Rock & Rye is still fizzing quickly add the 151 proof rum. Stir thouroughly before drinking. (Heavy concentrations of 151 have been known to cause a few sore throats.)

name: Dunlop
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice.

name: Mary Elizabeth Wagoner
preparation: Shake the vodka rum everclear and sour mix in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass add lime juice on top and serve.

name: Grapevine
preparation: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve with a short straw.

name: Pyrenees Greeting
preparation: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Malmaison
preparation: Pour the white rum cream sherry and fresh lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with anisette and serve.

name: Maktak Special
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice; strain into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Creamy Orange
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dirty Pat-Trick
preparation: Fill a cup with ice. Pour the Kahlua then add the root beer and serve.

name: Doh Doh
preparation: Pour vodka gin lime juice and lemon juice into a medium-sized glass. Top with 7-up to taste and serve.

name: Doh
preparation: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Robinson
preparation: Prepare in a blender with crushed ice and pour into a large highball glass. Serve.

name: Banana Cookie
preparation: Put all ingredients into blender. Blend and pour into glass top with chocolate flakes.

name: Pillow Biter
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey and peach schnapps into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a powder-rimmed highball glass. Add a twist of citrus fruit for flavor and serve.

name: Bourbon Sangaree
preparation: Pour bourbon whiskey and water into a highball glass. Add sugar allow to dissolve. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice and club soda. Float the tawny port on top. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel sprinkle with nutmeg and cinnamon and serve.

name: Cioccolato e Cocco
preparation: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour in glass.

name: Victory Collins
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Derby Cocktail
preparation: Stir gin and peach bitters (or peach brandy) in a cordial glass. Add an olive and a mint leaf and serve.

name: Mayflower Cocktail
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy Pernod Cointreau and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rosita
preparation: Stir ingredients in an old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve with short straws.

name: Woozy Wombat
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl with ice and serve in individual glasses.

name: Jeannie's Dream
preparation: In a hurricane glass (or a long drink glass) pour orange juice pineapple juice and 7-Up. Add malibu rum and stir gently. Slowly add as a top off the sloe gin so that the red color slowly mixes down through the rest of the drink.

name: Dambuster
preparation: In a highball glass with ice pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk (Homo or 2% never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy

name: Riviera
preparation: Shake brandy creme de cacao punt e mes and kahlua together in a shaker and strain into a champagne flute. Float cream on top sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: Nathalie
preparation: Shake liquors and lemon juice and strain into an ice-filled wine goblet. Add lemonade and serve.

name: Bunueloni
preparation: Stir ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Twist both lemon and orange peels over the glass and drop in. Serve.

name: B.A.V.
preparation: Shake or stir and enjoy.

name: Plaza Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

name: LiT
preparation: Place 5 ice cubes in old-fashioned glass. Pour the Smirnoff triple distilled vodka into glass. Add Green Berry Rush Hawaiian punch and Fruit Juicy red Hawaiian punch. Drink with red straw and enjoy.

name: Frosty Lay
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cranberries and a slice of lime and serve.

name: The Sal Costa
preparation: Combine Tequila Gin Rum Vodka and Amaretto in a blender and mix. Add Sour mix and blend. Add Everclear and blend. Strain into Collins glass full of ice. Top with Cola and garnish with Lemon wedge.

name: Red Alert
preparation: Shake all ingredients together pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Anchors Aweigh
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey triple sec peach brandy cherry brandy and half-and-half into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Ladybird
