preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker half with ice cubes. Add brandy cassis and half-and-half. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass serve straight-up. Garnish with chocolate powder (try to create dots like on a ladybird beetle for effect).

name: Caribbean Smuggler
preparation: Pour the dark rum triple sec orange juice margarita mix and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda and stir briefly. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange flag and serve.

name: Crimson Fizz
preparation: Shake well with ice. Strain into a wine goblet add a little club soda and serve.

name: Blue Horizon
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Blender Lemon Drink
preparation: Wipe lemons cut into pieces and place in blender. Add sugar and water and blend for 30 seconds. Wash egg and add whole to the blender with the ice cubes. Replace lid and blend for further 30 seconds. Strain into a jug or glass add ice if liked and decorate with mint sprigs.

name: Nassau Paul
preparation: Combine the white rum Cointreau lemon juice egg white and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: JT Delight
preparation: Add the vodka tropical schnapps orange juice and the cranberry juice in that order into a collins glass and serve.

name: Tailspin Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve. (An olive may be substituted for the cherry if preferred.)

name: Wild Sacramento
preparation: Add everything but the bitters and lemon juice to a blender with four ice cubes. Blend for less than a half minute (the ice cubes should not be totally disintegrated). Pour into a highball glass add the bitters and lemon juice and serve.

name: Tequila Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Mexican Virgin
preparation: Pour into a mixing glass and stir. Serve in an 8 oz. glass over ice.

name: Sauterne
preparation: Mix the cognac and curacao several hours ahead of time. When ready to serve pour the necessary amount of this mixture over a block of ice or ice mold in a cold punch bowl and add thoroughly chilled champagne. Stir and serve at once. *Do not let the mixture ladle back and forth over the ice as this will eliminate the bubbles.

name: On the Deck
preparation: Mix ingredients in a frosted beer mug and serve.

name: Bengal
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lawnmower #2
preparation: Stir together in a shot glass and serve.

name: Flander's Flake-Out
preparation: Bang 'em both in.

name: Diplomatic Answer
preparation: Pour into an ice-filled pina colada glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve with straws.

name: Strawberry Frosty
preparation: Put strawberry flavored gelatin and boiling water in blender container blend at low speed until gelatin is dissolved. Pour 1/2 cup of gelatin mixture into measuring cup; set aside. Add half the milk to remaining mixture in blender container blend on low speed until mixed. Add half the strawberry ice cream blend until smooth. Pour into tall glasses. Repeat with reserved gelatin mixture milk and ice cream. Garnish each glass with a fresh strawberry if desired. Makes 6 servings.

name: Byrrh Special
preparation: Stir both ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Betty Paige
preparation: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

name: Judgette Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Pilgrim Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve hot or cold.

name: Saratoga Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Warped Thursday
preparation: Empty half a can of cherry coke pour the vodka into the can then pour in the kool-aid. Alternatively use a 12oz glass. Stir. A kabob stick works well in the can.

name: Combo
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Maurice Chevalier
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dingleberry
preparation: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

name: Pineau Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Archbishop
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Unicorn
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker shake & strain into martini glass or champagne cup. Garnish with red straws & tacky plastic animals (preferably horses or mermaids) Add parasols & slice of orange if available.

name: Crum
preparation: Pour hte Crown Royal into a brandy snifter filled with ice. Add Parrot Bay stir gently and serve.

name: Beltane Punch
preparation: Pour the wine into a punch bowl. Add sugar and woodruff (available through many wine-making suppliers) and stir lightly. Cover the mixture and let it rest in the refrigerator overnight so the wine is infused with the herb's essence. Strain out the herb. Add strawberry slices and serve cold. This is a traditional punch to be served around May 1st the Witch/Pagan Beltane or Walpurgas Night.

name: Millionaire
preparation: Shake well and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with broken ice.

name: Country Time
preparation: Mix vodkas lemon juice and raspberry schnapps together in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake until very cold. Strain into a large shot glass. Top with a splash of sprite and serve.

name: Longdog
preparation: Pour the gin tequila triple sec and fresh lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a collins glass unstrained. Leave a little room at the top; fill with the lemonade. Stir briefly garnish with lime and serve.

name: Widow's Kiss
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Freak Show
preparation: Pour the sambuca into the bottle of a beer mug. Slowly add the Guinness to float it on top. Serve.

name: Alcudla
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of grapefruit peel.

name: Joulouville
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Peggy Martini
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Frightleberry Murzenquest
preparation: Pour the vodka Galliano Cointreau lime juice maraschino liqueur and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Macbeth's Dream
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Arrowhead
preparation: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Noblesse
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a seedless grape and serve.

name: Carob Milk
preparation: BLEND smooth all but additional water. When smooth add remaining water.

name: 1800 Blueberry-Infused Tequila
preparation: In a sealable container combine 1800 Select Silver Tequila the lychees with syrup and half of the blueberries. Gently muddle the other half of the blueberries then add to the tequila as well. Seal the container and allow the mixture to rest at room temperature for at least 24 hours. Serve in your favorite tequila cocktails.

name: Kaufman
preparation: Combine milk and salami sausage in a blender and blend on 'high' or 'puree' for 40 seconds. Serve warm in a coffee mug or chilled in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Cashew Milk
preparation: Place the water and cashews in a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Pour through a strainer. Refrigerate. Shake before using.

name: Creamy Raspberry Sipper
preparation: Combine raspberries and grape juice in container of an electric blender; cover and process until smooth stopping once to scrape down sides. Strain mixture through several layers of dampened cheesecloth reserving liquid and discarding solids. Combine reserved liquid sherbet water and lemon juice in blender container; cover and process until smooth. Add ice cubes; cover and process until frothy. Serve immediately. Garnish with fresh mint sprigs if desired. Yields four 1-cup servings.

name: Banana Lemonade
preparation: In the container of an electric blender combine the banana lemon juice water honey ice and mint leaves. Blend until smooth. Pour over ice cubes in a tall glass and garnish with lemon.

name: Iced Tea Cocktail
preparation: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass stir well and serve.

name: Imitation Beer
preparation: Pour the rum into a beer mug or glass and fill with lemonade. Sweeten with sugar to taste. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: RAC Cocktail
preparation: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a speared cherry and a twist of orange peel.

name: Rainmaker
preparation: Combine all the ingredients (except for Midori) into a shaker glass filled with ice. Shake for about 4 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Then circle(float) the Midori into poured cocktail about 2 times around. Midori will sink to the bottom giving the drink a 2 layer effect. (garnish with a washed off maraschino cherry if desired)

name: Zocolo
preparation: Pour dark rum tequila pineapple juice and grapefruit juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda and stir well. Garnish with a slice of orange a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Zoksel
preparation: No specific mixing instructions just poor every ingredient in one glass experiment to taste. The lemon goes with it.

name: Zambeer
preparation: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice.

name: Zorro
preparation: Pour all ingredients into an irish coffee cup. Add hot black coffee top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Cafe Zurich
preparation: Add amaretto cognac and anisette to a coffee mug. Fill almost to the top with hot coffee. Add honey and top with a puff of whipped cream.

name: Catherine Of Sheridan Square
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Black Marie
preparation: Shake well with crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass and serve.

name: Hot Marie
preparation: Heat liquors in a heat-resistant glass or cup and fill with coffee. Add sugar to taste and serve.

name: Eastwind
preparation: Stir over ice cubes in aperitif glass. Add a slice of orange and lemon and serve.

name: Sacrifice
preparation: Pour the rums creme de cacao coconut cream juices and bitters into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well at high speed and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Sand-Grown-Un
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktial glass.

name: Half-Man Half-Wit
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Add grenadine garnish with fruit and serve unstirred with a straw.

name: Halfway Special
preparation: Combine with ice strain and serve in a hollowed-out pineapple.

name: Anesthetic
preparation: Pour gin vermouth cognac and bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add sugar to taste garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Ambijaxtrious
preparation: Pour mixture into a cup filled with crushed ice and stir briskly.

name: Ambience
preparation: Rim a collins glass with lime juice and dip in caster sugar. Fill with broken ice. Shake all ingredients in a shaker and strain into the collins glass. Add a slice of lime or a cherry and serve with straws.

name: B.F.D.
preparation: Fill glass half full with ice. Add vodka triple sec & Everclear. Top off with grapefruit juice.

name: Bacardi Special
preparation: Shake all but rum with ice until cold. Add rum and shake again. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Axe Murderer
preparation: Mix like a long island iced tea. Very strong.

name: Mikie's Remorse
preparation: All ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice in old-fashion glass. Top off with Coke Cola. Swirl a bit. Enjoy!

name: Grovschpol
preparation: Fill a glass (40-50 cl) with whiskey midori bailey's and then coca-cola untill you have enough foam (it looks horrible). Drink it with a straw and don't look at the color.

name: Vik n' Rum
preparation: Pour rum over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add neatea lemon-flavored iced tea stir well and serve

name: Kampai Cocktail
preparation: Pour the rum triple sec pineapple juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Absolut Tooch
preparation: Chill with ice and strain into shot glasses.

name: Cafe Antrim
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Astral Gateway
preparation: Put ingredients into the glass fill with ice.

name: Apple Knocker
preparation: Pour the vodka apple cider lemon juice and strawberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Necrophiliac
preparation: Pour the vodka rums melon liqueur and juices into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.

name: Jackath
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Danbooka
preparation: Pour it in and mix it.

name: Yoda
preparation: Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker or if you don't have a shaker two identical glasses will work if you are careful. Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour Mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka and mix a couple more times then pour over ice.

name: Yaka
preparation: Combine the water and lemonade mix following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolut vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. Serve cold.

name: B.V.D. #2
preparation: Add the shots to a large cocktail glass and fill with equal parts cola and 7-up.

name: Boro Punch
preparation: Add all ingredients to a large cooler. Serve as appropriate.

name: Brain Surgery Without Anesthesia
preparation: Get a large (preferably clean) 5 gallon foood service grade bucket or drink cooler with a bottom tap for serving. Open everything and pour it on in. Cut the limes and leons in half crush them into the mix and then drop what is left of them in the mix as well. Get your cordless (must be a CORDLESS BATTERY POWERED) drill and BRAND NEW stainless steel impeller type paint stirer Chuck it up in the drill and start mixing. Add the ice in while mixing. Serve chilled. Makes about 4.5 gallons

name: Occhi Blu
preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Mix pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Gumby Dammit
preparation: Half-fill a pint beer mug with ice cubes. Add vodka and midori. Fill with cider. Sip.

name: Gauguin
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except cherry) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass add the cherry on top and serve.

name: Tanyahtoo
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice.

name: Tempo Setter
preparation: Shake strain into a liqueur or cordial glass and garnish with a speared cherry. Serve.

name: Lady 52
preparation: Pour kahlua into a pousse cafe glass and float irish cream over the top. Shake cream with cointreau and float over the irish cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

name: La Paz
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.

name: LA Water
preparation: Fill the glass with ice add shot after shot of tantalizing liquors top with a lemon wedge and enjoy!

name: L.I.E.
preparation: Pour all liquors into a highball glass 3/4 filled with ice cubes. Add a small splash of orange juice top with Coca-cola (or equivalent) and serve.

name: Sugar & Spice
preparation: Muddle sugar cube with SMIRNOFF Whipped Cream flavored vodka and add coffee into a coffee mug. Garnish with grated cinnamon.

name: Apple Fluff
preparation: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker and serve in a shot glass. Garnish with apple slices.

name: Whipped Mango
preparation: Shake and strain ingredients in a mixer and pour in to a shot glass.

name: Blue Jaguar
preparation: Shake Vodka Blue Curacao and lemon juice with ice and strain into champagne flute. Top up with champagne.

name: Jacey's Blue Bi-yatch
preparation: Pour a chilled can of 7 - up into a collins glass. Shake (with ice) a shot of Blue Curacao and rum until well incorporated. Strain into the glass of 7 -up and stir.

name: Peachtree Martini
preparation: Mix over ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve. (As with all Martini's always use a top shelf vodka. People will thank you for it.)

name: Captain and Cola
preparation: Add Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum and cola in ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: The Ultimate Margarita
preparation: Shake together with ice and strain into a margarita glass. Optional: rub the cut side of a lime on the glass rim and dip it into salt; and add a lime wedge to the rim of the glass as a garnish.

name: LCM
preparation: Layer the spirits with Grenadine at the bottom followed by the Blue Curacao topped with the Sauza Blanco.

name: Seagram's 7 & Lemon-Lime Soda
preparation: Add Seagram's 7 and lemon-lime soda to a highball glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Custom SK Slammer
preparation: If possible freeze the beer mug before beginning. Put ice cream in the mug followed by the alcohol and the root beer. Muddle serve and enjoy!

name: Fantaisie
preparation: Pour into a frosted wine glass and serve.

name: Black Bush and Ginger
preparation: Pour Bushmills Black Bush and ginger ale over ice cubes into a tall glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

name: Failure
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry and serve.

name: Fairytale
preparation: Pour the vodka and white chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.

name: Man in the Melon
preparation: Pour the melon liqueur vodka Cointreau lemon-lime soda and club soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: U.D.
preparation: Fill glass with ice add ingredients and shake and serve with a cherry.

name: Bargo
preparation: Pour the brandy and vodka into a mason jar. Add the root beer and a splash of red wine and serve.

name: Beatle Juice
preparation: Fill a hurricane glass with ice. In shaker with scoop of ice combine all alcohol and fill with sour mix. Shake. Strain into glass and add grenadine for color and top with 7-up. Garnish with a lime and cherry.

name: Hyped Up Mu
preparation: Pour brandy over ice in a beer mug or pint glass. Add root beer stir and serve.

name: Akis Special
preparation: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

name: Amaretto Cruise
preparation: Put everything into a blender with ice. Blend adding ice until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Banana Jabs
preparation: Pour banana liqueur into a highball glass over ice. Add malibu rum top with mountain dew and serve.

name: Cherie
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Boina Roja
preparation: Pour rums sugar and grenadine over crushed ice in a small highball glass and stir well. Add lime juice garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry and serve.

name: Camen Miranda
preparation: Squeeze lime wedge over ice. Pour in rum fruit juice and coca-cola. Stir lightly. Add club soda or tonic to taste. *Fruit Juice should be pineapple orange or banana.

name: Bellevue
preparation: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

name: Banana Slushee
preparation: Blend ingredients in a pitcher until the mixture is slushy. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Coconut Daiquiri
preparation: Rim glass with lime and grated coconut. Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and sprinkle dark rum on top using a barspoon. Serve with short straws.

name: Cocobanana
preparation: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with fruit and add straws.

name: August Moon
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Drum Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a blender with 2 - 3 ice cubes. Blend for about 10 seconds and pour into a highball glass over 2 - 3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.

name: Motel Wrecker
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer.

name: Scrumptious Coffee
preparation: Sweeten the coffee with brown sugar to taste. Mix coffee liquor and orange peel in a pan. Heat gently but do not boil. Let infuse for a couple of minutes. Pour into pre-warmed heat-resistent glasses. Float whipped cream on top. Garnish with thin strip of peel of orange and nutmeg.

name: Plantation Coffee
preparation: Shake and strain into a goblet filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle with grated chocolate add short straws and serve.

name: Peejon's Kiss
preparation: Extract juice from three lemon wedges and add to a highball glass over three ice cubes. Pour in the iced tea and dark rum and mix well. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with cherries.

name: Orange Hawaiian
preparation: Pour the Bacardi O orange-flavored rum into a blender. Add ice enough so that it will be slushy when you drink it. Pour in as much Hawaiian punch as you can and blend. Pour into a pitcher make a glass for yourself and store the rest in the fridge.

name: Orange Ed
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Bootzilla
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

name: Buzzby
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with ice and stir. Add a slice of lime if desired and serve.

name: Baso
preparation: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously strain into a highball glass garnish with lime and serve.

name: Camshaft
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice and serve.

name: Green Island
preparation: Shake with ice strain into a parfait glass and top with creme de menthe. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: Scofflaw
preparation: Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Angelfire
preparation: Pour 1/2 oz. of each; Stolichnaya Rasberi vodka Absolut Mandrin vodka Midori melon liqueur and Malibu coconut rum over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice orange juice and pineapple juice and serve.

name: Buffalo's Milk
preparation: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the vodka Kahlua coffee liqueur creme de bananes and creme de cacao. Add milk until glass is full. Pour mixture into blender and blend until smooth. Return to glass and serve.

name: Bleacher Creature
preparation: Pour butterscotch over rum. Do not stir.

name: Extended Jail Sentence
preparation: Flash blend with ice cubes.

name: Howell Says So
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Cheese Sandwich
preparation: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Vodkatini
preparation: Stir the vodka with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with a pitted cocktail olive and serve in front with an open bottle of vermouth situated in front of a fan across the room.

name: Beetle Juice
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker over ice. Close the shaker and shake briskly two or three times. Strain into a large (9-oz) martini or cocktail glass and serve.

name: Gumdrop Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a sugar-rimmed chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and some gumdrops and serve.

name: Bridesmaid Cooler
preparation: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and a lemon spiral.

name: Big Hicky
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Heaven's Gate
preparation: Pour the Chambord raspberry liqueur slowly down the side of a hurricane glass almost filled with ice cubes. The liqueur should sit evenly on the bottom. Add the Malibu coconut rum and Captain Morgan spiced rum to a cocktail shaker. Add the pineapple juice and shake well. Add the Sprite and stir steadily. Strain into the hurricane glass and the liquid should float on top of the Chambord raspberry liqueur. Top off with more Chambord then with Cointreau floated on top. Serve.

name: Golden Miller
preparation: Mix above ingredients together with lots of crushed ice. Enjoy!

name: Lift
preparation: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur Drambuie and Tia Maria into a coffee mug. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Tropicetto
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Changuirongo
preparation: Pour the tequila and ginger ale into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Berta's Special
preparation: Combine the tequila honey orange bitters egg white and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda water garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Diabloow
preparation: Frost the rim of a collins glass with salt. Pour the 4 ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake gently. Pour into the collins glass. Fill with 7-up and garnish with wheel of kiwi fruit and lemon twist. Serve.

name: Blue Tahoe
preparation: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last.

name: Buttafuoco
preparation: In a cocktail shaker combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir then add cherry.

name: Parkeroo
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a small champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

name: Compadre
preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lolita
preparation: Shake strain over one or two ice cubes in a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Tequila Manhattan
preparation: Shake tequila vermouth and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange top with the cherry and serve.

name: Green Ant
preparation: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Flip a Pack
preparation: Combine all ingredients with crushed ice in a blender. Keep adding ice and blending in stages until slurpee-consistancy. Pour into a hurricane glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

name: Blue Green
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Commando Cocktail
preparation: Pour the bourbon whiskey triple sec pernod and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Lewie
preparation: Fill a pilsner glass with ice. Add rum amaretto and orange juice. Shake. Top with a splash of grenadine. Adjust rum and amaretto to taste.

name: Caribbean Chat
preparation: Pour the rum creme de cacao and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Add club soda stir again gently and serve.

name: Chocolate Gatail
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg and serve.

name: Banff Cocktail
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Barnstormer
preparation: Pour whisky peppermint schnapps creme de cacao liqueurs and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Codswallop
preparation: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass and serve.

name: Dirty Gold
preparation: Put 2 shots of Amaretto over ice and finish with Mountain Dew for a sweet smooth potent drink.

name: Voodoo Juice
preparation: Mix all together. Make in any amount you like just keep the one part liquor to two parts juice mixture and you have yourself a fantastic rum punch for parties.

name: Vegas Bomber
preparation: Pour the firs 2 ingredients over ice tthen fill with Red Bull shake and serve

name: Bolshoi Punch
preparation: Pour the vodka lemon juice powdered sugar rum and creme de cassis into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Black Lodge
preparation: Start with glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add Triple Sec Malibu and Citrus Vodka. Add splash of Rose's lime juice. Fill glass with cola. Stir.

name: Passion Cocktail
preparation: Add the coconut rum white rum and sugar to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a collins glass. Fill with equal amounts of sour mix and pineapple juice pre-chilled. Top with Sprite and serve.

name: The Hurtado
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a glass with a lot of ice shake well and serve.

name: Red Ox
preparation: Pour rums and juices into a pint glass one-quarter filled with ice. Almost fill with sweet and sour top with grenadine and mix.

name: Explorer's Reward
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Extraterrestrial
preparation: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Layer the Irish Cream on top then layer the Stoli Vodka. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!

name: De-Lay
preparation: Combine equal amounts of each liquor in a shot glass and stir. Add a splash of grenadine and serve.

name: Green Sneaker
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Claremont
preparation: Muddle an orange slice and a cherry with bitters and curacao in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Remove the orange rind and add bourbon ice and soda. Garnish with the remaining orange slice and cherry and serve.

name: Blue Denim
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Strain into an old fasioned glass.

name: Dinguskhan
preparation: Pour the bourbon into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Mountain Dew and serve.

name: Elsinore Elbow
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a large shot glass give a quick stir and serve.

name: Friendly Fire
preparation: Pour the Hot Damn into a shot glass. Float 151 on top ignite and serve.

name: Smoothie
preparation: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a 4 oz. shooter glass.

name: Menace Shot
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a 2-oz shot glass and shoot.

name: Spy Catcher
preparation: Pour both ingredients into a shot glass and serve.

name: The BV
preparation: Add ice first then vodka OJ and tomato juice. Give a light stir. Substitute Bloody Mary Mix for Tomato Juice for a spicier taste.

name: Rum Highball
preparation: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Caribbean Frenzy
preparation: Mix the 3 different rums (amount of your choice) in a glass. Add Mango juice (also of your choice). Stir Take a shot glass of 151 and light it on fire. Quickly drop it into the rum mixture and drink. Voila. Caribbean Frenzy

name: John's Bomb
preparation: Pour very cold tequila with benedictine in a shot glass. Serve it with a slice of orange that has cinnamon on it nad kalo methisi. (that was Greek)

name: Choad
preparation: Pour each ingredient into shot glass. Do not attempt to layer drink as this is pointless. Mix.

name: Sweet Red
preparation: Put all the ingredients except orange juice and 1 strawberry with ice in a blender blend to high speed for ten seconds. In a Highball glass put on the bottom the orange juice and add the ingredients blended. Garnish with remained strawberry and an orange slice

name: Dungeon Punch
preparation: Mix fruit punch flavored kool-aid with schnapps vodka and orange juice. Once stirred garnish with cherries.

name: Cavanaugh's Special
preparation: Pour coffee liqueur into a brandy snifter and set aside. Combine white reme de cacao amaretto and vanilla ice cream in a blender with ice cubes. Blend until smooth. Pour over coffee liqueur. Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles and serve.

name: Godhead
preparation: Pour rum vodka raspberry liqueur and lime juice into a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 rum will lower the alcoholic content.)

name: Coffeeshake
preparation: Prepare coffee and allow to cool. Add cocoa powder sugar and milk; blend well. Fill 6 glasses top with fresh cream and sprinkle with chocolate.

name: Marmalade Highball
preparation: Pour the curacao into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with tonic water garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

name: GG
preparation: Pour the galliano liqueur over ice cubes. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and serve.

name: Skip Morrison
preparation: Pour ingredients into a tall shot glass and serve.

name: Bonecrusher
preparation: Mix ingredients and serve.

name: Cherry Floating Island
preparation: Combine the 2 egg whites and pinch of salt in a bowl. Beat with rotary beater until soft peaks form. Gradually add the 1/4 c. sugar beating constantly until stiff peaks form. Pour milk into a large skillet; place over low heat (about 200 F) and bring just to simmering point. Drop egg white mixture by tbls. into milk; there should be 6 meringues. Cook slowly uncovered until firm about 5 minutes. Lift meringues from milk and drain on paper toweling. Reserve milk. Beat the 3 eggs and the 2 yolks slightly; add the 1/2 c. sugar and the 1/8 tsp. salt. Stir in the 3 c. reserved milk; cook mixture in the top of a double boiler over hot--not boiling--water stirring constantly until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon. Remove from heat cool slightly and add vanilla. Place cherries in bottom of a 2 quart serving dish cover with custard and top with meringues. Chill. Serves 6.

name: Nutty Banana
preparation: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Potent Possum
preparation: Put all ingredients into a bar blender except the banana liqueur. Blend the drink until it is thick and slushy. Pour into a highball glass and then put the shot of banana liqueur over the top. If you want to spruce up the appearance spray a little whipped cream over the top of the banana liqueur.

name: Beansy's Battleground
preparation: Pour the vermouth brandy peppermint schnapps Pernod and bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Orange Striptease
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Get your significant other to strip by giving her/him one of these.

name: Cyberlady
preparation: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

name: Brandy Champarelle
preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into a cordial glass.

name: Francine
preparation: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar-dipped raspberry and serve.

name: Bunky Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Maxim's
preparation: Stir brandy cointreau raspberry liqueur and orange juice and strain into a champagne saucer. Add the champagne and serve with a twist of orange.

name: Russian Soda
preparation: Pour half the quart into a bottle and then pour one bottle of Cream Soda then add the rest of the quart then add the second bottle of Cream Soda then stir Then add all into the half a letter of Fruit Punch then shake and drink away.

name: Lulu
preparation: Pour the vodka triple sec white rum amaretto peach schnapps sour mix and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer or medium-sized cocktail glass. Add a splash of grenadine add a straw and serve.

name: Organ Grinder
preparation: Blend and pour over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with coconut shavings and serve.

name: Liquid Lite
preparation: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lime flag and serve.

name: Hot Hopper
preparation: Mix spirits in mug or coffee glass add hot chocolate and top with whipped cream and mint leaf.

name: Pete's Feet
preparation: 1. Fill 5 Gallon cooler with medium/large bag of ice 2. Add ingredients in this order: - 1st liquors - 2nd soft drinks - 3rd powder mix - 4th ice tea 3. Mix with large spoon 4. Cover

name: Campari Tonic
preparation: Simply add the Campari to a cooler glass with Tonic and lots of ice.

name: Warm Hart
preparation: This can differ usually I mix it in a can because I dont have any glasses. But trust me on this its good. Add 3 part Cointreau into any glass a cooler works best. Add 1 part cola your not suppose to have an over whelming taste but just a hint of it.

name: Jungle of Nool Juice
preparation: Pour all liquids into tub stir. Add some sugar (amount depends on the maker anywhere from a pinch to a pound) slice the fresh fruit and berries and throw in the cooler. Seal the cooler and let sit overnight.

name: Rasta Monsta
preparation: Mix the first four ingredients together in a 5 gallon cooler so that most of the lemonade dissolves. Next pour in the Mountain Dew (we use Ramp soda from Bi-Lo) one at a time. Don't worry about the carbonation its not important to the final drink. Pour in the Blue Curacao next mostly for color but putting in too much ruins the drink. Fill the remaining part of the cooler with water and you're set.

name: Death Mix (UMKC Version)
preparation: Pour in cooler and mix well.

name: Cantarito
preparation: Combine tequila juices and Squirt. Stir vigorously. Drop in fruit slices. Pour mixture into ice-filled cooler glass.

name: Tucker's Death Mix
preparation: Mix together in a 2 L container or a CamelBak.

name: Coffee Granita
preparation: Stir water and sugar in a medium sauce pan over medium heat until sugar dissolves and syrup boils for 1 minute. Cool syrup mix in coffee. Pour mixture into med sized metal bowl and freeze until mixture is solid about 3 hours. You can stir the mixture occasionally to form coarse flakes. Pile frozen coffee granita into stemmed glasses and top with whipped cream.

name: Scottish Flamethrower
preparation: Gently pour the shot of Drambuie into the pint glass. It can also be used to coat the interior of the glass if prefered. Next pour in the Ale allowing for just a small amout of head or froth to appear. Finally top off with the shot of Single Malt which can be dropped in boiler-maker style or tossed in... Drinkers choice. (Scots are all about personal freedoms!) Warning: This is a STRONG DRINK! It makes an Irish Car Bomb seem like a Mudslide by comparison. It's about one step below a Pan-Galactic Gargleblaster but tastes a lot better.

name: Your Tongue My Panties
preparation: Fill pint glass with ice add liquor mix and serve.

name: Zombie Blood
preparation: Pour 3 parts Barcardi Silver Rum into glass. Add 1 part Blue Curacao. Fill glass with pineapple juice.

name: Dark Side of the Moon
preparation: Same thing as a Black and Tan but you get the use a sweet reference to Pink Floyd. Pour in Blue Moon to 1/2 the pint glass. Layer the Guiness on top of the Blue Moon. Drink!

name: T.O Car Bomb
preparation: Get A glass pour half bottle of la fin du monde in and drop a 2oz shot of Jagermeister in and chug. (Best if both chilled)

name: California Car Bomb
preparation: Pour orange Stoli and Jager in mixer shake with ice. pour red bull and cranberry juice in glass. Then pour cold liquor in glass w/ juices.

name: Peach Flambe
preparation: Mix all ingredients except 151-proof rum w/ ice in shaker. Pour into shot glass. Float 151-proof rum (or Everclear) on top and light w/ a match. Note: Do not use too much grenadine as doing so will produce a pink or reddish color rather than the desired peach color!

name: Love Punch
preparation: Use mixing glass first fill with ice and chill martini with glass. Pour the peach schnapps first. Then pour the vodka and 99 bananas liquer together. Fill the shaker with cranberrry and pineapple juice. Splash soda into mixer. Shake then strain into martini glass and dress it with a cherry and lime twist.

name: Honkey Tonk Lemonade
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker over ice shake and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with mint and a straw and serve.

name: Mucielago in a glass
preparation: Grab a mixer and just add all ingredients together with a few cubes of ice. Shake the hell out of it serve in a martini glass with a crazy straw.

name: Coffee Cream and Chocolate
preparation: Layer of back of bar spoon in order given. It will layer on its own with Kahlua on the bottom Dark Creme de Cacao next followed by Godiva White Chocolate and cream on top. A very sweet cordial for after dinner!

name: Xocolatl
preparation: In a shaker mix tequila liqueur and ice. Shake fervently and serve. Should be quite spicy.

name: The Hang Glider
preparation: Combine room-temperature Baileys and Kahlua in bottom of an apertif glass or larger shot glass (this will represent the Earth). Combine Orange Vodka and Blue Curacao in a shaker cup over ice. Chill thoroughly. Using the back of a spoon carefully layer contents of the shaker cup atop the Baileys/Kahlua mixture (this will represent the sky). Top this with 2 or 3 small dollops of whipped cream (representing the clouds). Finally add the cross-cut tip of a mint leaf atop the whipped cream (this represents the 'hang glider').

name: Horsley's Honor
preparation: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes combine the gin vermouth applejack and triple sec. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice.

name: The Cock
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large container. Refrigerated. Ready to drink in 1 week.

name: Cold Fusion
preparation: Mix Rum V-8 Fusion and ice in cocktail shaker strain into test tube using borosilicate glass funnel defend scientific claims despite lack of experimental confirmation.

name: Omaha-Jamaica Express
preparation: Mix all the ingredients

name: A Biscuit
preparation: Pour 1/3 Kahlua into the bottom of shot glass then with a normal spoon or bar spoon layer 1/3 De Kuypers Butterscotch Creme and 1/3 Luxardo Amaretto Disaronno on top.

name: Orange Swamp
preparation: Build over ice in a beer mug. Stir.

name: Caribbean Delight
preparation: Pour the Malibu coconut rum vanilla schnapps and vodka into a highball glass. Add Sprite and serve.

name: Gunga Water
preparation: Mix it all together stir serve and ENJOY!

name: DP-25/Jack Morgan MD
preparation: Fill Bucket-glass with ice add one ounce Captain Morgan Spiced Rum then fill the glass with Dr. Pepper. Top the beverage off with a one ounce float of Jack Daniels Tennessee Whiskey.

name: Silly Colin
preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir well.

name: Edwin
preparation: Combine ingredients in rocks glass over ice. Serve with swizzle stick.

name: Celebration
preparation: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and fill with ice. Shake with gusto for half a minute and pour/strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel or lime peel if you use fresh lime juice.

name: Island Delight
preparation: Blend vodka rums and ice cream briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Top with whipped cream sprinkle grenadine on top and serve.

name: Island Jack
preparation: Mix all ingredients (except cola) in a mixing tin. Pour over ice in a collins glass top with cola and serve.

name: Rauhreif
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Island Jim
preparation: Combine all ingredients (except cola) in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain over ice in a collins glass top with cola and serve.

name: Raspberry Tea
preparation: Fill pint glass with ice. Add all the clear liquors then top with Chambord. Garnish with lime.

name: Russian Satellite
preparation: Shake and strain all but dark rum into a brandy snifter filled with broken ice. Float the dark rum on top sprinkle with nutmeg and serve.

name: Ringo
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a hurricane glass with four ice cubes.

name: Riedinger
preparation: Mix rum midori and lime juice in a highball glass with crushed ice. Fill with cola garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Round-Up
preparation: Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Round-Up
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except 7-up) and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with 7-up and serve.

name: Eliminator
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass. Add more orange soda if it is unpalitable. The first one is awful. By the third you will be begging for more. There won't be a fifth.

name: Enigma
preparation: Pour the rum vodka triple sec Southern Comfort and amaretto into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of orange juice and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine. Stir well and serve.

name: Exterminator
preparation: Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a green cherry and serve.

name: Epidural
preparation: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or if you have a test tube or beaker handy go for it!

name: Eye-Opener
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Splender Blenders
preparation: Add all ingredients in blender blend till slushy add sugar to taste.

name: Spikey Hedgehog
preparation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.

name: Sex Appeal
preparation: Mix two rums melon peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

name: Seaboard
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except mint leaves) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

name: Searoot
preparation: Pour over Rocks

name: Sharples
preparation: Pour both ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Skane-i-Fier
preparation: Fill glass with ice. Add whiskey Malibu and Dr. Pepper. Stir.

name: Smut
preparation: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

name: Smooch
preparation: Pour into a tall glass over ice shake to mix all ingredients well garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire.

name: Somebird
preparation: Mix ingredients in random order and shake on ice.

name: Southern Bound Meteor
preparation: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from cherry and drop in glass. Pour in Southern Comfort and Goldschlager. Carefully float in a splash of 151 Rum. With a cigarette lighter ignite 151 Rum on fire and serve. Put out fire before drinking.

name: Highlander
preparation: Shake and strain into a collins glass with ice. Garnish with a flag.

name: Stratocaster
preparation: Pour into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry add a short straw and serve.

name: Strain the Rein
preparation: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with a lime wedge and dip into a flat bowl of sugar (2 tsp) in order to thoroughly coat the rim. Discard the lime shell. Pour the rum raspberry liqueur Cointreau lemon juice and a teaspoon of sugar into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into the cocktail glass and serve.

name: Steeplechase
preparation: Muddle the mint leaves with the curacao and brandy in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add all other ingredients shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

name: Strangeways to Oldham
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add lemonade add straws and serve.

name: Harry's Cocktail
preparation: Muddle two mint sprigs with vermouth and absinthe in a mixing glass. Add gin shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a stuffed olive and remaining mint sprig and serve.

name: Luxor Boom-Boom
preparation: Add all alcohols to a shaker with ice. Fill remaining space with 1/3 apple juice and 2/3 orange juice. Shake vigorously strain into a highball glass and serve. The most popular cocktail of Luxor Plaza. (a disco in Deventer - the Netherlands)

name: Jitterbug
preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda water) over ice in a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Fill with soda water and serve.

name: Liquid Courage
preparation: Add all ingredients to a blender and liquify until shake-like consistancy. Serve in beer mugs.

name: Grungeist
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour contents of the blender into a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

name: Purple Love
preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well for about 25 seconds and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes.

name: Wong Tong Cocktail
preparation: Pour liquids into a strainer with 4 - 6 ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries and serve.

name: Winston Martini
preparation: Add a dash of frangelico to a mixing glass swill to coat and discard the excess. Add the rum gin and lime juice stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Nevins
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Penetrator IV
preparation: Pour all ingredients together over 2 ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

name: Morro
preparation: Rub the rim of old-fashioned glass with lime juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients with ice strain into the sugar-rimmed glass over ice cubes and serve.

name: Mumbo Jumbo
preparation: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Oral Intruder
preparation: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay coconut rum Midori melon liqueur ginger ale sour mix and lime juice into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Modern Cocktail
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Canadian Apple
preparation: Combine the whisky apple brandy lemon juice sugar syrup and cinnamon in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Carnegie Sunrise
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Strain into a collins glass and serve.

name: Broker's Thought
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Strawberry Patch
preparation: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry and serve.

name: Cotillion Cocktail
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Dolph Lundgren
preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with pineapple chunks and serve.

name: Barbed Wire
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Petit Zinc
preparation: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or orange slice.

name: Pictionary Punch
preparation: In a saucepan bring sugar and water to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; cool. Pour into a large bowl; add juices. Cover and refrigerate. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. (5 servings.)

name: Phreaker Cocktail
preparation: Fill a fifth of a bottle with equal parts of vodka and water. Add the egg white. Shake well until egg is thoroughly mixed and pour into a punch bowl with the triple sec juice and sugar.

name: Piggot's Preference
preparation: Pour the vermouth Southern Comfort light rum Cointreau and orange bitters into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pic-Walsh
preparation: Swirl all ingredients together in a blender pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Chocolate Twist
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Peach Shize
preparation: Fill a blender half up with ice. Add peaches (with syrup) and tequila. Blend until frothy. Serve in a margarita glass.

name: Playita Bomb
preparation: Get all the liquor and sweet and sour and shake it  server it into a highball glass.

name: Pintado
preparation: As with most simple cocktails first place ice cubes and then the liquor. Fill almost to the top with soda and at the end give it a splash of coke.

name: Pinchaser
preparation: Add vodka Southern Comfort first amount of grenadine sloe gin and triple sec to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Add juices and shake briefly. Pour into a highball glass and drizzle a further splash of grenadine around the edge of the glass. Garnish with a cherry and slice of orange and serve.

name: Pink Coconade
preparation: Pour rum into a collins glass and pour in pink lemonade. Stir and add ice and enjoy.

name: Pinesol
preparation: Pour ingredients in equal amounts into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pineapple Jupiter
preparation: In a blender blend the milk water pineapple juice concentrate sugar vanilla extract banana and ice cubes until smooth. Sprinkle with cinnamon and serve immediately.

name: Volvo
preparation: Pour ingredients in order into a shot glass. Mix and serve.

name: Karlina
preparation: 1) Fill a highball glass with 2/3 ice and pour in lemonade. 2) Add the tequila vodka and orange juice into a shaker and shake vigourously for roughly a minute. 3) Pour the alcohol over ice cubes slowly.

name: Kathleen's Catastrophe
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl; add ice. Serve into cups when chilled.

name: Knock-Out
preparation: Fill a 475ml glass with ice - about 1/4 of the way. Pour beer into glass. Pour white rum & dark rum into glass. Top-up with apple juice and serve.

name: Koontaka Punch
preparation: Stir al ingredients together in a large punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

name: Kiss and Tell
preparation: Shake with three-quarters of a glassful of broken ice. Pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice and serve.

name: Carleenie
preparation: Mix thirds of above ingredientes in some kind of tall glass (allways use thirds)!

name: Caricature Cocktail
preparation: Shake all ingredients over ice and strain into a large chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

name: Morning Wood
preparation: Pour the vodka peach schnapps orange juice and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. Sink the blackberry liqueur by pouring it at the side of the glass thus forming a layer at the bottom. Serve.

name: Green Doodoo
preparation: Pour ingredients into ice filled shaker shake and strain into glass.

name: Guy Punch
preparation: Use a highball or old fashioned glass pour ice up to two third the glass height. Pour in the Vodka Triple Sec press the lime into the mix. Add the Red Bull and slowly pour in the Grenadine taking care not to stir in the Grenadine into the mix. Top off with Maraschino cherry and a slice of Orange on a Mix stick. Serve immediately.

name: Leadville Hot Chocolate
preparation: Add everything to a coffee mug and fill to the top with hot half and half.

name: Mazrick
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.

name: Frosted Coke
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Add Coca-Cola and serve.

name: Novocaine
preparation: Shake pisang gin and chartreuse with half a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass. Add the bitter lemon and serve.

name: Nevada Cocktail
preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Jamaican Banana
preparation: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg top with a whole strawberry and serve.

name: Jagerjito
preparation: Make this like a standard mojito but substitute Jager for the rum. Muddle the mint in the simple syrup add the lime juice Jager and top off with club soda or Sprite.

name: Jamie's Dream
preparation: Combine ingredients over ice except for whipped cream. Shake vigorously over ice. Top with whipped cream and a cherry. Yum!

name: Drug Test Specimen
preparation: Mix it all up and pour into a cocktail glass.

name: DeeDee Cocktail
preparation: Pour the gin cranberry juice maraschino liqueur lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with gin-infused cranberries and serve.

name: Death to Smurfette
preparation: Pour all the ingredients into a large blender. Blend with enough ice to give the cocktail the consistency of a frozen margarita. Pour into a margarita glass and garnish as you see fit.

name: Cola Fizz
preparation: Combine ice cream and lime juice in a blender. Process 5 seconds. Pour into glass; fill glass with cola. Garnish with lime slice and serve with a straw.

name: Cranberry Sangria
preparation: In large pitcher or punch bowl mix cranberry juice cocktail small peaches or nectarines (cut into chunks) lemon slices ice cubes and club soda. Stir. Pour or ladle into glasses and garnish with sprig of mint and a skewer with a few watermelon balls on it.

name: White Sandy Beach
preparation: Pour coconut rum ameretto and equal parts pineapple juice/sweet and sour into mixing tin with ice. Shake. Strain into pre-iced hurricane glass. Float hpnotiq. Garnish with 2 lime wedges and a pineapple cube. serve.

name: White Carnation
preparation: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Whoomp
preparation: Add everything to a large cooler or similar. Add one block of ice and mix. Serve.

name: White Cargo
preparation: Mix in a blender until smooth. Add a little extra white wine if necessary. Serve in a chilled wine goblet.

name: Wolfsbane
preparation: Rub the inside of a highball glass with lemon juice and sprinkle with sugar. Frost in a freezer. Shake ingredients pour into the frosted glass and serve.

name: Wobbly Knee
preparation: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate and serve.

name: The Davy Wright
preparation: Mix together as a punch. Add oranges or grapes to taste. Limes also go well in punch.

name: Frizzy Punch
preparation: Pour all of the ingredients in a trash can or large cooler. Stir until completely mixed.

name: Frog Gigger
preparation: Pour the amaretto and rum over ice into a punch bowl. Add the kool-aid and sugar to the vodka and shake. When the kool-aid and sugar are dissolved pour into the bowl and stir.

name: Moheezy
preparation: Stir ingredients together in a cup (ingredients pre-chilled or mixed with ice) and serve.

name: Linfield's Spare Part Punch
preparation: Select a large container (at least 5 gallons) that can dispense the drink. Simply mix at will add the ice on top and go.

name: Orange George
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Leftover Salmon
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl; ice if desired. Stir well.

name: Osh Kosh Besloshed
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass half full of ice.

name: Gump Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice and sprinkle fresh-ground nutmeg on top.

name: Grovspol
preparation: Start by pouring the whiskey then bailey's then cointreau. Add a splash of pepsi on top of it.

name: Gin Squirt
preparation: Stir gin grenadine and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

name: This-n-That
preparation: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass stir and serve.

name: The Seabass
preparation: Pour into a mixer 1 1/2 oz of pineapple rum 1 oz of peacsnapps and a spalsh of pineapple juice. Shake well. Pour it into a martini glass. Top it with champagne. Garnish with an orange wedge

name: The Liquerice Dream
preparation: Add all ingredients to a shot glass. Mix well and serve.

name: The Minion
preparation: There's no specific way to mix the drink. Just pour the ingredients in any order you wish the result will be the same.

name: Tweaked
preparation: Fill glass 3/4 way full with ice add Vodka and Southern Comfort then fill to the top with Root Beer stir then drink.

name: Lina
preparation: Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass and serve.

name: Limelon
preparation: Mix all liquids then fill with ice. Finally cap with powdered sugar.

name: Little Yellow Different
preparation: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Lombomba
preparation: Pour the ingredients into a normal drink glass with a few ice-cubes. Stir.

name: Lizbuth
preparation: Pour the rum amaretto coconut cream pineapple juice and half-and-half into a blender with 6 ice cubes. Blend well and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Latavia
preparation: Start with a large pot on the stove.Pour in the Carlo Rossi Canadian Whiskey and Grain Alcohol and cup of sugar. Place the heat on low. You just want to warm the mixture enough to desolve the sugar and not cook off the alcohol. Take your decanters and place in the marachine cherries (amount is up to the person making the drink). Pour in the latavia and be sure to use a funnel because it can be a mess otherwise.

name: Leo Special
preparation: Shake well with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Rum sunrise
preparation: Build the drink over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve with straw.

name: Blue Lagoon No.1
preparation: Into the bar glass put 5-6 Ice cubes then pur the ingreadents from the recepie and after the good sheaking pur that in Highball glass and get the Sprite.

name: Long Island Ice Tea
preparation: Add Tanqueray London Dry Gin Smirnoff No.21 Vodka Captain Morgan Silver Spiced Rum Jose Cuervo Especial triple sec and sweet and sour mix in ice-filled Collins glass and stir. Top with cola. Garnish with lemon wedge (optional).

name: Fruit Breeze
preparation: Mix ingredients together in a shaker with ice. Strain into a glass with ice.

name: Fort Lauderdale
preparation: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Flapper
preparation: Pour the rum and vermouth into a cocktail glass. Sweeten to taste. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of orange.

name: Manhattan Iced Tea
preparation: Fill a collins with ice. Add and mix all ingredients. Garnish with a lemon and serve.

name: Mexican Doo-Doo
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a 1-gallon jug. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Million-Dollar Cocktail
preparation: Shake ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Miscegenation
preparation: Put the vanilla and chocolate ice cream into a large martini cocktail glass. Add the half and half and vodka give it just one stir. Drizzle on the Kahlua top with a splash of bourbon and the cherry. Serve.

name: Montmartre Cocktail
preparation: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Mistress
preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle with campari and serve with a cherry.

name: Moira
preparation: Shake and strain into a liqueur or cordial glass.

name: Mango Marimba
preparation: Mix all ingredients in blender with crushed ice.Pour into 10 oz glass.top with speared fruit mango & cherry or pineapple.

name: Marimba
preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange and pineapple slices.

name: Mellow Hiker
preparation: Combine alcohol over ice and add mountain dew. Stir and garnish with a melon ball if desired.

name: Maria-Rocker
preparation: Pour the DeKuyper Peachtree peach schnapps passoa and Absolut vodka into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Add the lime juice and fill with Sprite. Add cranberry juice for color. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

name: Colibri
preparation: Shake well with ice in a shaker. Strain over crushed ice in a highball glass.

name: Confirmed Bachelor
preparation: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Confidence Builder
preparation: Mix vodka dry and sweet vermouth in a cocktail shaker then shake with ice cubes thoroughly. Add a shot of orange juice to a whisky glass and fill halfway with lime soda. Pour the martini-like mix into the glass including some ice then stir the drink. Garnish with an orange slice cherry or other citrus fruit.

name: The Rummy Peach
preparation: You put 2 shots of rum into a glass followed by a peach and then a little bit of peach juice. once the drink is made and then drank you then eat the peach!

name: Coco's Cocktail
preparation: Mix in a shaker and serve with a slice of lime.

name: El Gringo
preparation: Shake with ice pour into chilled martini glass and garnish with orange.

name: El Latino
preparation: Mix the Gatorade powder with the Sprite then add the rum Mix well serve with salt rimmed glass.

name: Grape Tootsie Pop
preparation: Mix all ingredients into a shaker and shake... then pour and drink!

name: The Red Queen
preparation: Mix all ingredients except for the Pomegranate Schnapps into a shaker filled with ice. Give it a good shake and dump it into a Hurricane glass and add the Pomegranate Schnapps at the very end. Garnish with big chunk of lime.

name: Sour Rocket
preparation: Add 1 oz. Blue Curacao and 2 oz. Lemonade into a mixing glass with ice. Shake well then pour into cocktail glass. Add 1 oz. Sour Raspberry as filler.

name: Poor Harry's Rocket Fuel
preparation: Mix in a pitcher all shots over ice and enough orange juice to make it taste like Hawiian punch. Serve in pitcher with one straw per person at the table and drink till it's gone.

name: The Admiral's Wife
preparation: In a martini shaker combine vodka limeade and ice. Shake well. Pour into a pint glass and garnish with lime wedges and cilantro. Enjoy confidently.

name: Naughty Shirley Temple
preparation: Pour gin and grenadine into an ice-filled highball. Add Sprite or other lemon-lime soda until full and mix. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Kiki
preparation: Shake the orange juice cranberry juice and triple sec then pour in any glass you wish. Add the San Pellegrino. Stir a bit and add a slice of orange either in the glass or to decorate the drink.

name: Chocolate Caramel Cream
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a 6-8 oz glass and enjoy!

name: Angry Red-headed Stepchild
preparation: Pour the amaretto first then add the vodka lastly add the splash of Kahlua there should be a slight separation of liquids in the the shot glass with a fairly solid red tone throughout. Its a sneaky drink so be prepared. If you want the shot to be a bit smoother chill the ingredients in a shaker first then pour into a shot glass and enjoy.

name: Angry Pirate's Pistol
preparation: Mix together in shot glass and serve at room temperature.

name: The Bloody Goose
preparation: First you fill the glass with 4 ice cubes. next add in the vodka next comes the raspberry pucker then finally the pomegranate soda. You stir it together with a straw and enjoy!!

name: Peachy K
preparation: Pour first 3 ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain in to a rocks (old fashion) glass. Top off with Red Bull. May use another energy drink only if it taste like Red Bull.

name: The Dirty Carnie
preparation: Mix equal parts PBR with Jones cream soda. Serve over ice. It tastes better than you think.

name: The Dirty Rico
preparation: Pour schnapps first then rum over ice. Fill glass with root beer (adjust schnapps and root beer to taste). Stir and serve chilled.

name: Muchaha Susia a.k.a. The Dirty Girl
preparation: Get a regular 10-12 oz. kitchen glass and add ice to preference. Measure out 2 shots of each of the listed ingredients: Raspberry Rum Sweet and Sour Mix Cranberry Juice Sprite. Top the rest of the glass off with Tonic Water and have at it. ENJOY!

name: Samoan Suprise
preparation: In a tall glass add preferred amount of ice Captain Morgan's Pineapple and Coconut rum. When the desired amount of the good stuff is added fill the rest of the cup with Hawaiian Punch or any type of tropical type juice you or your company enjoy the most. Enjoy!

name: Blue Juice
preparation: Mix and drink real fast....tastes delicious.

name: The Italian Wedding Cake
preparation: Very well shaken.(more froth the better) Drop a cherry.

name: Blueberry White Chocolate Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker add ingredients and shake until frosty.

name: Blue Angel Martini
preparation: Mix Vodka and Pucker in cocktail shaker with ice and strain into martini glass. Add splash of fresh lemon juice. Float a lemon slice on top.

name: Pineapple Upside Down Cake
preparation: In a shaker with ice; mix rum and pineapple juice. Strain and pour into small rox glass. Pour grenadine along the side of the glass to make it layer on the bottom. Pour enough to completely cover the bottom of the glass; but not too much.
